smras| |de kho na nyid bdag don zab/ /des bstan la sogs bye brag tu/ /srog gi dbyug pa bzhugs thabs nas/ /rtsa dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba drug /thig le shar ba nub pa dang /
'pho ba sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / /rtsa yi 'khor lo 'byung ba dgyes/ /dbang gi rim pa de bzhin no/ /srung ba'i 'khor lo lha mo che/ /snying po sngags kyi rgyal po nyid/ /sku brgyad
bdag nyid mchod sbyin dang / /thim dang longs spyod dang ni dbang / /rdo rje lha mo ye shes sku/ /gsang ba'i sgra yang de bzhin no/ /srung ba'i dam
tshig la sogs dang / /dpal ldan sbyin sreg don dam par/ /bsrub dang srub pa'i dgyes pa dang / /sngags kyi bzlas pa mchod sbyin dang / /gnas brgyad sku yi ngo bo dang / /
dga' ba la sogs pa yi mchog /dur khrod rnam rtog med par grags/ /chu ngogs rtog pa med pa dang / /snang ba la sogs mchog ye shes/ /dngos po la sogs
bde ba che/ /thog ma tha ma dur khrod brgyad/ /zhing la sogs pa bstan pa dang / /rlung gi de nyid snying po'i don/ /'jug pa gnas pa 'gro ba dang / /nyer 'gro sbyor ba rab
mchog dang / /nyid ni ye shes thig le dang / /rang gi ngo bo rnam pa mchog /sa la sogs pa'i bdag po dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyabs dang / /rgyud kyi rim pa
bstan pa dang / /phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin no/ /gsang ba yi ni don dam par/ /de nyid mchod pas bskul ba dang / /shes rab ye shes ji bzhin no/ /gsang ba'i dkyil
'khor 'khor lo sogs/ /zhal bzang tshig rgyas bstan pa 'o/ /gtor ma 'byung la phan don du/ /sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed/ /de ni bde ba chen po'i mtha'/ /
de nyid bsdus pa'i snying po'i don/ /bzhi bcu'i bdag nyid de nyid don/ /gsang chen bdag gis rab tu bshad/ /de nyid sum cu drug bdag po/ /char yang ye shes tshor byed do/ /
thig le ye shes bdag nyid tshor/ /de ni sum cu bdun dbang phyug /tshul gyis ye shes bdag nyid tshor/ /de ni sum cu brgyad dbang phyug /tshul tsa ma ye shes tshor byed pa/ /
dgu lhag sum cu de nyid do/ /mchog shes pa yi rnal 'byor gang / /bzhi bcu'i mnga' bdag chen po 'o/ /gzhan mchog gsung lam brjod du med/ /rnam par dag pa de
nyid mchog /thams cad de kho'i bdag nyid phyir/ /de bas bye brag mi bya 'o/ /dpal ye shes thig le las/ de kho na nyid kyi snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi
shu rtsa drug pa'o// //lha mos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ni mchog dga' ba/ /kun dga' ba yi rnam pa sku/ /de kho na nyid zhal brgyad pa'i//
rnam par dag pa ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de nyid sgom pa rnam par dag /skal ldan lha mo khyod nyon cig /zhal brgyad rnam par thar
pa brgyad/ /nang gi stong pa de nyid do/ /spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni/ /sa dang stobs dang ye shes so/ /phyag rnams stong nyid rnam par dag /brgyad gnyis phyag ni stong pa nyid/ /spyangs
pa'i yon tan sde dang ldan/ /thod pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid/ /sangs rgyas chos ni ma 'dres pa/ /'jigs byed ma ni brgyad gnyis dbye/ /bsdu ba'i
dngos po bzhi po ni/ /zhabs bzhi ru ni dran pa 'o/ /chags sdang de bzhin gti mug ni/ /legs dgyes zla nyi 'jigs byed do/ /gang zhig srid pa'i gnas su bzhugs/ /zhal
bzang de phyir g.yas brkyang ba/ /lha mo g.yon bskum mya ngan 'das/ /ye shes sku nyid bzhugs pa'o/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das min phyir/ /lha mo de phyir bzhengs pa 'o/ /
gzugs brgyad rnam par dag pa yis/ /sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad/ /gzugs med gnyis kyi 'du shes phyir/ /shes rab thabs gnyis bdag nyid do/ /gar
dgu'i ro dang ldan pa'i phyir/ /zhal bzang mo ni sna tshogs gzugs/ /lha mos gsol pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa mchog dbang phyug /bcom ldan bdag gis rnam
dag shes/ /gsang ba'i don gyis 'di ltar mgon/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa bka' drin gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i sgom pa rnam par
dag /lha mo shes rab chen mo nyon/ /zhal dang lhan cig pa yi spyan/ /zhal bzang gnas la sogs pa 'o/ /longs spyod rdzogs par yod pa'i rtsa/ /bcu drug phyag ni
bcu drug pa 'o/ /A li thig le rnam dag pa'i/ /thod pa yin par 'di ru bstan/ /'jigs byed rnam par 'jigs byed ma/ /legs dgyes dga' ba bcu drug go /skad cig
bzhi yi sbyor ba yis/ /zhabs ni bzhi ru dran pa 'o/ /g.yas brkyang ba ni mchog gi dga'/ /g.yon brkyang dga' ba dga' ba yin/ /bzhengs pa lhan skyes dga' ba 'o/ /phyag
rgya pha rol phyin par dran/ /dbang gi rang gi ngo bo 'o/ /thim pa smad kyi tshangs pa'i ras/ /longs spyod zhi ba'i pags pa'i gos/ /legs dgyes dbang phyug yang na gnas/ /
bskyed pa tshangs pa'i pags par grags/ /bong bu'i zhal ni 'jigs pa'i sgra/ /phyag rgya shes rab thabs ni che/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med dran/ /byang chub sems
kyi rnam dag pas/ /rus pa sna tshogs rgyan la sogs/ /nam mkha' ru ni 'gro pa'i phyir/ /gyen du 'bar ba'i dbu skyes so/ /rang gi ngo bo bde chen phyir/ /sku mdog nag po
mkha' dang mtshungs/ /dga' bral gyi ni bdud chen po/ /'jigs pa byed phyir 'jigs pa che/ /dpal ye shes thig le las/ rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi
shu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das mas ma mchu'i bdud rtsi'i ro phul te nyi ma dang zla ba'i me tog gis mchod nas bcom ldan 'das rab tu
tshim par mdzad nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye bcom ldan 'das/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus su yang dag par gsang pa'i rgyud 'di skal ba dang
ldan pa'i sems can rnams la sus 'chad par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dpal phyag na rdo rje mgon pos bshad par byed do/ /bcom ldan
'das mas gsol pa/ ye shes bdud rtsi'i char pa che/ /mgon po khyod kyis rmad byung sbyin/ /phyag na rdo rje mgon po che/ /de yi bskyed pa ji ltar lags/ /rgyal ba'i
mnga' bdag ye shes rgyal/ /de ni tshig gcig bka' stsol cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig khyod kyis yongs zhus pa/ /bcom ldan ma
de yang dag nyon/ /phyag na rdo rje mgon chen po/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag /mtha' yas pa yi 'jig rten khams/ /skye dang 'jig pa'i rgyu yin no/ /de las skye pa gang
yang med/ /rang byung mchog gi dbang phyug go/ /de yi phyag gi rdo rje ni/ /ye shes bcu gnyis skye ba med/ /thog ma yis ni rwa lnga las/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga
'byung ngo / /mtha' nas 'byung ba chen po lnga/ /dbus nas 'gro ba'i rigs drug 'byung / /lta ba kun ni bsrung don phyir/ /sna tshogs pa yi gzugs su spyod/ /la lar
rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / /la lar sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs/ /la lar he ru ka yi gzugs/ /la lar de bzhin gshegs pa dang / /la lar byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs/ /la
lar nyan pa lta bur bzhugs/ /la lar 'chad do dgyes pad+ma/ /la lar klog pa'i tshul du bzhugs/ /la lar rgyud dang bstan bcos ni/ /mdzad pa dang ni la lar
'dzin| |mang du brjod lta ci zhig dgos/ /de ston phyag na rdo rje rgyal/ /lha mos gsol pa/ dkyil 'khor dang ni 'khor la sogs/ /de la mdor bsdus ji ltar lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /mkha' 'gro dbang phyug ma dgyes mdzod/ /gru bzhi la sogs dang ldan pa/ /dur khrod kyi
ni rgyan gyis brgyan/ /shing brgyad kyis ni chal par bkram/ /rdzing brgyad kyis ni brgyan pa 'o/ /de dbus sna tshogs chu skyes ni/ /'dab ma dang ni ge sar bcas/ /de yi dbus
su lha thod pa/ /dum bu gsum pa kun dang bzhi/ /rang gi ngo bo chos kyi dbyings/ /bdud rtsi lngas ni shin tu gang / /hUM gi yig 'bru de dbus gnas/ /ye shes ma yi 'od dang mnyam//
zla ba nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed/ /hUM la sogs pa yongs gyur las/ /skad cig gcig gis rmad du byung / /lha mo bcu gnyis dang ldan
pa| |phyag na rdo rje rgyal po bzhengs/ /zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa/ /char sprin gyi ni mdog dang mnyam/ /phyag bzhi pa ni rta la bcibs/ /
ma'i 'od dang mnyam pa'i spyan/ /bskal pa chen po'i me dang 'dra/ /nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang mnyam/ /gdul dka' chen po 'dul bar mdzad/ /snying rje'i rlan gyis brlan
par mdzad/ /phyag rgya lnga 'dzin dpa' bo che/ /ral pa'i dbu rgyan gyis ni brgyan/ /ra la pa sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan/ /sna tshogs rdo rje zla cod pan/ /phyag g.yas pa ni rdo rje
'dzin| |sna tshogs kyi ni 'od zer 'phro/ /g.yon ni thod pa kha T+wAM ga /gzhan pas rdo rje'i mda' dang gzhu/ /rta ni 'di ru sngon po'i gzugs/ /spyan gsum pa la drag po'i
'od| |zhi ba'i pags pas sga cha byas/ /dgod pa'i nga ro gshog pa can/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ /shar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang du rdo rje 'jigs byed ma
dang / rdo rje drag mo dang / rdo rje gtum mo dang / rdo rje nag mo ste/ nag pa dang / dmar ba dang / ljang ba dang / dkar po ste ngang pa la bcibs pa'o/ /phyag dang mtshon
cha la sogs pa ni/ gtso bo bzhin no/ /mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhir bdud rtsi sna tshogs pas gang ba'i bum pa'i steng na thod pa'o/ /mtshams su rdo rje 'dod ma dang / /rdo
rje gtsag bu ma dang / rdo rje phreng ba ma dang / rdo rje brtson ma rnams ni/ gzugs gnyis pa'i sku/ nam mkha' lding la bcibs pa gtso bo lta bu'o/ /shar sgo la sogs par rdo rje
sha wa ri dang / rdo rje ro langs ma dang / rdo rje rab tu gtum ma dang / rdo rje Dom+b+hi ni ste/ nam mkha' sngon po dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / me'i kha dog dang / du ba'i mdog bya
rgod la bcibs pa mtshams kyi bzhin no/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi'i snam bu la tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / drag po dang / mi mchog la sogs pa 'dre'i
rgyal po rang rang gi mtshon cha phyag na bsnams pa du ma bya'o/ /lha mos gsol pa/ phyag na rdo rje gtso bo'i gsang sngags ni/ gang / sems can rnams kyis ji ltar bsgom
par bgyi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo sngags ni yi ge drug /thams cad 'dod pa'i don grub byed/ /gdug pa thams cad 'jigs byed cing / /nad
rnams kun ni zad par byed/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu sbyin/ /thams cad mkhyen pas mi thub bo/ /oM badzra pA Ni hUM/ rnal 'byor khro po'i lta bas bzla/ /skad cig gcig/
gis khams gsum gsod/ /yang na zhi ba'i lta bas bzla/ /mtha' yas pa yi nad zhi byed/ /mchod sbyin yang dag cher byas nas/ /sngon du bsnyen pa bye ba bya/ /zhi ba la
sogs sbyin sreg bya/ /ji ltar sngar ni bdag gis smras/ /dur khrod yang na chu ngogs su/ /phyag na rdo rje bsgrub par bya/ /dung chen gyi ni phreng ba yis/ /
'grub pa'i don phyir bye ba bzla/ /zhi ba zhi ba'i sems kyis ni/ /drag po drag po sgrub par dka'/ /dbang bskur med pa'i sems can la/ /sngags 'di sbyin par mi bya ste/ /mkhas
pas bris sku glegs bam ni/ /nam yang de la bstan mi bya/ /de lta min na 'grub mi 'gyur/ /kun nas kun tu rab tu blta/ /gsang ba yis ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /kun nas
kun tu zhal bzang mo/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad gyes pa/ /'dab ma sna tshogs pa yis mdzes/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /mnga' bdag phyag na rdo rje rgyal/ /rgyal
po'i bzhugs thabs kyis ni bzhugs/ /nam mkha'i mdog ltar sngo ba ste/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal gcig pa/ /spyan gsum pa la zhi ba'i gzugs/ /g.yas dang g.yon
pa'i phyag gnyis ni/ /rdo rje thod pa kha T+wAM ga /chos kyi don ni 'chad pa'i phyir/ /phyag gnyis chos kyi phyag rgya 'o/ /'dab ma bdun la sangs rgyas bdun/ /brgyad pa la ne byams
pa 'o| |pa ti la sogs shing la brten/ /thams cad zla ba'i gdan du dran/ /gshin rje gshed la sogs pa bzhi/ /gzhan min sgo la sogs par dgod/ /rdo rje lcags kyu la
sogs bzhi/ /sgo yi mtshams su gnas pa 'o/ /sgo yi phyi rol snam bu'i gnas/ /yang dag lha chen la sogs pa'o/ /rdo rje phreng bas kun tu mchog /mkhas pas yongs su
bskor bya 'o/ /dpal ye shes thig le las/ dpal phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i sgom pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de
nas de'i dus su 'khor thams cad stan las langs te lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te tshigs su bcad pa
'di dag brjod do/ /mgon khyod bka' drin gyis ni bdag cag dag /gzhan dang mi mnyam rgyal bas rnyed dka' ba/ /blta bar dka' ba shes dka' gzung bar dka'/ /
gsang ba'i gsang ba mchog gi mchog rab nyid/ /dpa' bo dbang phyug chos dbyings phyag 'tshal bstod/ /log shes mun nag 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang
po'i sangs rgyas mchog char grags la 'dud/ /yig bral thig le skye med la phyag 'tshal/ /nam mkha'i rang bzhin tshul grags la phyag 'tshal/ /gnyis su med pa'i
tshul tsam la phyag 'tshal/ /mchog gi rang bzhin phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /gzhan min gzhan mchog rang bzhin phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ye shes thig le las/ bstod
pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// //yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams cad dang bcas
pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma la bos te/ kye bcom ldan 'das ma/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma sbyor drug gi grags pa bcu dang bral ba bcu gsum gyi bdag nyid/ dpal
mchog gi bla ma'i zhal snga nas pad+ma btsal te bsam gtan la sogs pas yang dag par mthong ba zhes gtan la phab pa'o// //dpal ye shes thig le
las| mchog tu gsang zhing shin tu gsang ba thams cad mkhyen ba rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka' ba/ rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rmad du byung ba mchog chen po nang gi rnam
par shes pa drug gi bstod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// //dpal ye shes thig le rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po shrI pra dz+nyA gup+tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ slad kyis dpal sa skya'i dben gnas su zhu gtugs g.yar
khral bgyis so/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI tA twa pra dI paM nA ma ma hA yo gi nI tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal de kho na nyid kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/
dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
rdo rje dpa' bo chen po dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug mas yang dag par bskor nas shes rab kyi b+ha ga la bzhugs so/ /der bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas
legs dgyes chen po'i rol pas sgeg pas nye bar longs spyod pa dang / ma mchu'i bdud rtsi'i btung bas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byas te kha sbyor gyi thabs kyi sbyor ba
las langs nas ri rab kyi nyi rdul gyi grangs kyi rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig pas lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan ye shes zla bar grags/ /lte ba'i ku mud kha 'byed pa/ /gang zhig bdag gi zhu ba kun/ /mnga' bdag chen pos bdag la gsungs/ /
dpal ldan bla na med pa'i rgyud/ /rnal 'byor ma zhes rab grags pa/ /e baM ma ya la sogs sgra'i/ /don ni ji lta bur ni brjod/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
nyon cig lha mo spyan bzang ring / /khyod kyis nga la gang zhus pa/ /e baM ma ya sogs sgra yis/ /khams gsum 'gro dang mi 'gro bcas/ /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin
gyis| |thams cad rgyas btab gzhan gyis min/ /de kho na nyid sgron mar grags/ /dri med rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu'i gzugs/ /e baM ma
ya de nyid gsum/ /thog mar bdag bcas pa dang ni/ /rang bzhin bzhi yi bye brag tu/ /don dam bar ni shes par bya/ /thos pa'i don ni zla ba bde/ /de ni nam mkha'
bzhin du mchog /gcig ces bya ba gzhan mchog rab/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das pa spangs/ /dus ni phyag rgya chen po ste/ /bskyed pa dang ni rdzogs dang bral/ /bcom ldan
'das ni mtha' zhes bya/ /rang dga' nyams su myong ba'i dngos/ /thams cad ye shes gsum stong nyid/ /de nyid de nyid kyis ni spangs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
'byed grags/ /dang po'i gnas ni rab tu byed/ /sku ni dga' ba'i gzugs su grags/ /dbang po gnyis byung dang bral ba/ /gsung ni mngon par dga' zhes bya/ /
dam tshig las byung gis ni spangs/ /thugs ni dga' bral dga' zhes bya/ /ye shes las byung bde dang bral/ /rdo rje lhan skyes zhes su bstan/ /rang bzhin gyis
ni spangs pa 'o/ /lha mo dpal chen nyi ma skyes/ /zhu ba dga' bral dang bral lo/ /dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma bde rten/ /dang po'i bdud rtsi las skyes so/ /yan lag kun
gyis yang dag bskor/ /khyab pa srog gi pad+ma bzhin/ /shes rab tshangs pa'i sgo lnga'i khyim/ /tshangs pa'i ye shes 'dzin phyir ro/ /b+ha ga dngos po 'jig pa yis/ /yang na longs
spyod myong bas so/ /bzhugs pa rang gi ngo bo la/ /gnas pa yang na gshegs pa 'o/ /de lta bu ni don dam par/ /'di skad bdag la sogs par bshad/ /thams cad rnal
'byor rgyud du sbas/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor bla mar yang / /nges dang dran don bye brag tu/ /e baM ma ya la sogs gnas/ /rgyud shes pa yi don phyir te/ /gnyis su dbye ba'i
rgyud rab bstan/ /'bras bu ye shes chen po'i ro/ /rang gis nyams myong ngo bo nyid/ /rang rig ngag gis mi rnyed pas/ /rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /lha mos
gsol ba/ bcom ldan ye shes rgyal po nyid/ /log pa'i ye shes mun 'joms pa/ /de nyid nyi shu gnyis bdag nyid/ /gang zhig ye shes thig ler gsungs/ /de
la yang ni nges ba'i don/ /mchog gi dbang phyug bdag la gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig de nyid nges don du/ /zhal bzang de ni gsang ba
'o| |khyod kyi ngor byas bdag gis bshad/ /de lta min na sbas pa 'o/ /e baM rnam pa'i dbus su gang zhig drug cu rtsa bzhi'i 'dab ma'i dbyibs kyi rtsa'i 'khor lo de ni/ rnam
pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /de'i nang du gang du rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid ut+pa la'i rnam pa'i 'khor lo de ni/ mtha' ste/
de la gang zhig zur brgyad pa'i rnam pa'i lte ba de ni/ snang ba'o/ /gang zhig lte ba'i dbus yangs pa de ni/ nam mkha'o/ /der ni lnga gnyis nas bzung ste bco lnga'i bar
gyi sa'am| dbang phyug gi mnga' bdag bzhugs so/ /der gang zhig de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid de ni/ lan gsum 'bab pa'i phung po'i rnam par shes pa sems
dang sems las byung ba dang ma rig pa'i gzugs kyis gsum du dbye ba zur dang po la thun tshod gcig gi bar du 'phar ba'o/ /gang zhig srog gi dbyig pa de ni/ lu
gu rgyud kyi rnam pa'i mdud pa sum cu rtsa gnyis su sbom pa dang phra ba'i thig le ro gcig pa'i gzugs kyis dbyig pa'i bdud rtsi zur gnyis pa la thun tshod gnyis kyi
bar du zhu ba'o/ /drug po de ni/ bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i grags pa dga' ba drug zur gsum pa la thun tshod gsum gyi bar du 'dzag pa'o/ /gang zhig thig le shar ba
dang nub pa de ni/ thim pa dang longs spyod du grags pa'i srog de ni/ zur bzhi pa la thun tshod bzhi'i bar du 'bar ba'o/ /gang zhig 'pho ba'i sbyor ba de ni/ steng dang
'og gi 'dab ma yod par byang chub kyi sems 'dus pa'i dbang ni/ zur lnga pa la thun tshod lnga'i bar du zhu ba'o/ /gang zhig rtsa'i 'khor lo 'byung ba de ni/ yan lag thams
cad la bdud rtsi rgyas pa zur drug pa la thun tshod drug gi bar du 'dzag pa'o/ /gang zhig dbang gi rim pa de ni/ gcig nyid srog gi kha ru srog la 'bab pa dang / 'phur
pa dang khyab pa de yang zur bdun pa la thun tshod bdun pa'i bar du 'bar ba'o/ /gang zhig srung ba'i 'khor lo de ni/ mthe'u chung gi mdud pa'i nang du bdud rtsi la bskor
ba zur brgyad pa la thun tshod brgyad kyi bar du zhu ba'o/ /de dag ni/ g.yon du bskor ba'i srog gi rlung la zhon pa nyi ma skye ba la mtshan mo dang / nyi mo'i bar du sum cu rtsa
gnyis kyi cha rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi nang na bcu drug bral ba'i mtshan nyid mi gsal ba dang / dga' ba'i mtshan nyid bcu drug gsal ba de'i don
gyi phyir dga' bral gyi dga' ba'i mtshan nyid A li'i rang gi ngo bo zla ba'o/ /phyi dang phyi'i don rnams kyis ni/ nang dang nang gi don gnas par shes par bya'o/ /de yang
phyi'i tshes kyi grangs kyis so/ /nang srog gi rlung gi grangs kyis so/ /lha mos gsol pa/ sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi chu skyes kyi ut+pa la'i rnam pa la bde ba chen po'i kun tu spyod pa
nges pa'i don gyis gnas pa de mchog gi dbang phyug gi dka' drin bskyab tu gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig lha mo
skal ldan mo/ /gsang ba chen po ye shes mchog /gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /thams cad sa yi dbang phyug 'gyur/ /gang zhig snying po'i sngags ni nyid/ /de ni bdag
nyid bcu drug bde/ /kun rdzob ri bong can gyi 'od/ /don dam par ni nam mkha' bzhin/ /gang zhig sku brgyad mchog sbyin ni/ /de ni mtshan mo brgyad mchog go /lha mo yang
na ye shes brgyad/ /mtshan mo nyin mo gnyis las 'byung / /gang zhig thim dang longs spyod dbang / /de ni nges par bskyed rim mo/ /lha mo bskyed rim gsal ba ste/ /
rim las byung ba'i bde ba che/ /skal ldan mo gang ye shes sku/ /de ni rim sogs yan lag spangs/ /yan lag bzhir dbye drug dbye 'am/ /bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i
rim pa 'o/ /lha mo gang zhig gsang ba'i sgra/ /de ni ye shes gsum dang bral/ /yang na gzhan min bdag nyid gsum/ /mtshams kyi ye shes yod pa'i phyir/ /lha mo
gang zhig dam tshig ni/ /srung ba la sogs nges par ro/ /de ni bde ba dbus gnas su/ /gzung bya yang na gang nang du/ /gang zhig sbyin sreg don dam par/ /de ni ha zhes
glo bur ste/ /char yang dbus yod thig le ni/ /gang du skad cig gis thim mo/ /gang zhig bsrub dang srub thabs ni/ /de ni thog ma'i dga' ba spangs/ /lha mo de bzhin tha
ma'ang min/ /thog ma tha ma gnyis dang bral/ /skal ldan mo gang sngags kyi bzlas/ /de ni srid pa 'das ba'i yid/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas kyang min/ /gnyis kyi ngo bo
gnyis dang bral/ /gang zhig gnas ni brgyad du bstan/ /de ni nyi skyes ma rgyas pa/ /gnas kyi dbang gis shar ba la/ /nye bas myur du rgyas pa 'o/ /gang zhig dga' ba la
sogs rim/ /de ni rim pa gnyis su dbye/ /rnam bcas las ni dang po ba/ /rnam bral bcu yi dbang phyug go /gang zhig dur khrod rnam rtog bral/ /dbugs dbyung la sogs
rnam par spangs/ /byang chub kyi ni sems ro la/ /rnam par zhu ba dam tshig phyir/ /lha mo gang zhig chu yi ngogs/ /de ni rtog med ma yi mthar/ /yang na de ru srog gi rtsa/ /bde
ba'i chu bo 'bab pa'i phyir/ /gang zhig snang ba sogs ye shes/ /de ni dga' ba dang ldan yid/ /sa dang chu dang 'od kyi gzugs/ /de bzhin rlung gi ngo bo dang / /gang zhig dngos
po rten la sogs/ /de ni bde ba'i dang por rig /rang gi rnam pa'i bye brag gam/ /rnam par dpyod pas nges par spyod/ /lha mo gang zhig dur khrod brgyad/ /de ni bde ba la thim
zhes| |rnam par rtog pa 'dzin pa'i sku/ /de la thim zhing thim pa 'o/ /gang zhig shing la sogs pa'i don/ /de ni dang po'i bdud rtsi rgyu/ /rtsa de
rten pa'i gzugs su grags/ /thams cad rnam pa'i bde sbyin ma/ /gang rlung de nyid snying po'i don/ /de ni rin chen gdu bu'i bde/ /'dzum pa yis ni yang dag par//
pad+ma'i zhal de myong ba 'o/ /lha mo gang zhig mdzub la sogs/ /de ni gyen du bzung ba'i rlung / /yang na rtsa yi kun spyod las/ /'gro ba'i bdud rtsi 'dzin pa 'o/ /gang zhig
nyer 'gro'i bsam gtan sbyor/ /de ni zla ba gyen du byed/ /yang na tshangs bzhi rnam dbye byas/ /rnam par shes pa las gshegs gsol/ /gang nyid ye shes thig le
ni| |de ni drug byed gsum dang bral/ /bcu dang lnga yis rnams ni/ /dbang phyug 'pho med skye med do/ /gang zhig bdag gi rang ngo mchog /de ni nges par bzhi pa'i 'bras//
yang na tor ya nyams su myong / /'bras bu'i sgras ni brjod pa 'o/ /gang zhig sa yi dbang byed pa/ /de ni de nyid drug rang bzhin/ /de nyid drug las de nyid gsum/ /de nyid
gsum las rang bzhin gcig /gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ /de ni mya ngan 'das mtshan nyid/ /yang na dga' ba dang ni bral/ /dga' bral dga' min rang
ngo bo| |lha mo gang zhig rgyud bstan pa/ /de ni bde ba shin tu 'phel/ /bde dang bral ba'i bde ba ni/ /yang na de nyid rnyed pa 'o/ /gang zhig phyag rgya che rang bzhin/ /de ni thim sogs yid
las 'das/ rang gis nyams myong rang ngo bo/ /bsam gtan 'dzin pa spangs pa 'o/ /gang zhig gsang ba don dam par/ /de ni dga' ba dga' dang bral/ /yang na nang gi reg
bya ste| |reg bya dang bral rtog pa med/ /gang zhig bskul ba'i mchod pa'i don/ /de ni dri med bde ba 'byung / /'das pa las ni yang skye ba/ /skye ba de la 'phel ba 'o/ /lha mo
shes rab ye shes gang / /de ni kha la snying gar bde/ /kha ni rtag tu shes rab yin/ /snying ga ye shes brjod pa 'o/ /gang zhig gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'khor/ /de ni khu ba
'pho med dge /yang na bde chen rang ngo bo/ /bde ba'i rnam par rtog dang bral/ /lha mo tshigs rgyas gang zhig ni/ /bya gdong ma de khong du chud/ /yang na tshigs ni zhu med khu/ /
dga' mo rgyas pa mchog yin no/ /'byung ba bsrung don gtor ma gang / /de ni srog chags bsad pa 'o/ /bcad pa de ni mchog gis gnas/ /'gro ba 'gog par byed
pa 'o| |de dag ni/ mchog gi gsang ba chen po'i gsang chen bcom ldan 'das ma bzhi bcu'i bdag nyid kyi de kho na nyid bde ba chen po'i rgyal po'i bdud rtsi'i gter la
nges pa'i don to/ /lha mos gsol pa/ bzhi bcu'i bdag nyid de nyid ni/ /shin tu reg med gzung bar dka'/ /sa yi dbang phyug du tsam
zhig /mchog gi dbang phyug gis mkhyen lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sna tshogs rnyed pa sum cu drug /bcu gcig sa yi bdag po 'o/ /dga'
ba rnyed pa sum cu bdun/ /bcu gnyis sa yi bdag por brjod/ /mchog dga' rnyed pa sum cu brgyad/ /de ni bcu gsum pa yi sa/ /sum cu dgu lhag mthar thug
pa| |sa ni bcu bzhi rnyed pa 'o/ /bzhi bcu de ni lhan skyes so/ /bco lnga rnyed pa'i mnga' bdag go /gang zhig bcu drug pa yi sa/ /brjod du med pa nam mkha' bzhin/ /de la
dbang phyug mchog gi mkha'/ /thams cad mkhyen pa rnyed dka' ba/ /zag med 'pho med zhi ba ste/ /skye med rmad byung bas rmad byung / /kye bcom ldan 'das/ sum
cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i gter de kho na nyid de la kun tu spyod pa'i dus ni/ gang lags/ 'dus pa ni/ ci zhig lags/ nyams su
myong ba ni/ gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid la sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi chu tshod kyi bar du srog dang rtsol ba'i
rlung gnyis shar ba ni/ kun tu spyod pa'o/ /rtsol ba'i rlung 'byung ba'i dus su gang zhig yan lag thams cad la khyab pa'i srog de g.yon bskor du 'byung bas ut+pa la'i
rnam pa 'dzum zhing nang gi lte ba'i snying po rtsa ba'i sdong bus 'jug pa'o/ /'jug pa tsam gyis zur brgyad pa'i nang na yod pa'i bde ba chen po'i srog gi rgyal po la gang
zhig ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid de ni/ 'dus pa'o/ /de'i dus su gang zhig bdag dang gzhan gyi bye brag med pa gnyis su med pa'i spros pa dang bral ba'i ye shes kyis thams
cad gzigs pa de nyams su myong ba'o/ /lha mos gsol pa/ gang zhig nyams myong las rnyed de/ /mnga' bdag de ni ji ltar lags/ /nyams su myong bas gang rnyed pa/ /de
nyid mdor bsdus bka' stsol cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dris pa de ni rmad byung mchog /nyon cig lha mo spyan bzang ring / /nyams su myong bas
gang rnyed pa/ /dga' ba'i dbang mo de brjod med/ /bla ma'i zhal nas nyams su myong / /dbang bskur las ni rnyed pa 'o/ /lha mos gsol pa/ dbang bskur ba ni du ma zhig /
rgyud rgyud nang du rab tu gsal/ /'di ru bye brag ci 'dra ba/ /su la sbyin par bgyi ba lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' ba'i 'bras bu bye brag tu/ /
dbang ni re zhig bzhi ru dbye/ /dang po dga' ba dang ldan pa/ /las dang po la sbyin par bya/ /gnyis pa mchog dga' dang ldan pa/ /snang ba gsum
ni thob pa la/ /dga' ba gsum pa dang ldan pa/ /chos kyi sprin rnyed nges pas so/ /kun tu 'od sa zhes bya ba/ /rnyed pa bzhi la sbyin par bya/ /lha mos gsol pa/ kye bcom
ldan 'das/ snang ba la sogs pa dang / chos kyi sprin dang kun tu 'od rnyed pa la de lta bu'i dbang gi rim pa lags na/ sa la sogs pa ma rnyed pa la ji ltar lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa la sogs pa ma rnyed pa rnams la thog mar rang gri ngo bos so/ /sa la sogs pa rnyed pa rnams la mthar thug pa'i rang gi ngo
bos so| |gang gi phyir zhe na/ de rnams la brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis shin tu bsod nams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bya ba la sogs pa dang bral ba'i ye shes chen po
mthong ba tsam gyis thob bo/ /ji ltar pad+ma yongs su smin pa nyi ma'i 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis rgyas so/ /ma smin pa de bzhin du ma yin no/ /lha mos gsol pa/ ma
smin pa rnams la yongs su smin pa'i dus gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin sogs bsod nams bsags pa yis/ /mchog gi
bla mas gtan la phab/ /skal ldan mo de smin pa'i dus/ /de las bla med byang chub ni/ /bla med gnas ni thob pa gang / /phyi nas ci yang bslab mi dgos/ /bla med ye shes
chen po'i gnas/ /'bad min de ni mthong ba 'o/ /ji ltar nyi ma shar tsam gyis/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin bla med 'od kyis ni/ /ye shes chen po
mthong bar 'gyur/ /ye shes chen po sku dang bral/ /gnyis su med pa nam mkha' bzhin/ /lus dang ngag dang yid gzugs min/ /sgra la sogs pa rnam par spangs/ /
dpe med nam mkha' dang bral ba/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das pa spangs/ /sbom dang phra la sogs las 'das/ /char yang thig le dang bral ba/ /tshul dang tshul tsam ma yin
te| |mchog dang gzhan mchog gnas las grol/ /skye ba med dang 'chi med pa/ /rmad byung chen po'i 'du shes so/ /lha mos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ ye shes
chen po'i dbang phyug bla na med pa'i yang dag pa'i byang chub rnyed pa la ye shes chen po brjod du med pa'i gnas gzhan rnyed pa yod dam ci/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa| grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum khyod ci la de lta bur 'dri/ brjod du med pa'i ye shes chen po khyod kyis ci phyir mi shes/ de ltar yin na bdag
gi rang gi ngo bo yang dag par khyod mi shes so/ /lha mos gsol pa/ khyod kyi ngo bo bdag gis shes/ /'on kyang bdag gis gzhan zhig zhus/ /
sems can byang chub las gzhan ci/ /mchog gi dbang phyug rnyed pa 'am/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub rnyed las gzhan ci zhig /zhal bzang mo
de rnyed yod dam/ /'on kyang de la mthong ba yod/ /tshil la bdud rtsi ji bzhin no/ /lha mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan dpa' bo'i dpa' dbang phyug /rang bzhin ye shes sbyin
pa po| |bdag gis gzhan zhig zhu ba bgyid/ /de la bka' drin bdag la stsol/ /dbang gi rim pa'i ye shes gang / /bzhi pa de ltar de bzhin no/ /de la re zhig ji bzhin
don| |rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag la gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzhi pa de nyid ngo bor grags/ /de ltar ye shes 'dus shes so/ /de bzhin ye shes
las byung zhes/ /ye shes las byung lte bar bde/ /lha mo ye shes kha la yod/ /ye shes las byung ske ru ste/ /ske ru longs spyod ngo bor grags/ /snying ga ru ni dbang zhes bya/ /
thim pa kha ru shes bya ste/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa yi ni phyogs/ /yang ni de bzhin gyi ni sgra/ /ji bzhin shes rab la sngar thal/ /de ltar ye shes lta ba yis/ /bkug nas rang gi
kha la bkod/ /rang gi snying ga'i pad gnas su/ /byas nas nyid kyis nyams su myong / /de yi skad cig ye shes bde/ /spros pa dang bal rtog med pa/ /sems kyis thams cad mthong
nas su| |nam mkha' bzhin du bsam par bya/ /de yang bsam pa bor nas su/ /phyi nas bsam pa ci yang med/ /nyid ni bde chen ye shes te/ /nam mkha' zla ba bzhin du
mthong / /lha mo de ni rdzogs pa'i rim/ /don dam par ni shes par bya/ /lha mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan ye shes rin chen nyi/ /'dod pa thams cad rab 'grub pa/ /snang ba
bzhi la go rim gnas/ /mnga' bdag chen pos bka' stsol cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snang ba bzhi la go rim gnas/ /sems dang sems byung
'du shes so/ /de dag las ni ma rig 'byung / /mtshams kyi 'du shes mtshan nyid can/ /nyin mo'i rang bzhin sems las 'byung / /sems ni mtshan mo'i ngo bo nyid/ /
yang dag 'od ni gsum dang bral/ /lhan skyes ye shes mtshan nyid do/ /gang tshe tshangs pa'i tshigs su sems/ /lha mo de tshe nyin mor 'gyur/ /gang tshe de las srog 'phro
ba| |de tshe mtshan mo 'og na gnas/ /steng yang ma yin 'og ma min/ /de tshe mtshams shes dran par bya/ /de yang me yi rang bzhin grags/ /nyi ma la ni srog 'dzin ma/ /gang
gis nyi ma yod pa ni/ /snang ba las ni shar dus 'gyur/ /snang ba zla ba zhes par bstan/ /yongs su zhu ba'i bdud rtsi g.yo/ /lha mo chen mo
g.yo ba'i phyir/ /dga' bral dga' bar rab tu grags/ /gang du chad pa las ni thim/ /mchog gi dga' ba shar ba'i dus/ /de ni snang ba dang po'i dga'/ /de las mchog
ni gsal bar 'gyur/ /gsang phyir snang ba mtshan par grags/ /zhu med g.yo med ska ba 'o/ /ska ba la ni phra mo'i dngos/ /bde sbyin yang na kun spyod do/ /kun spyod las ni
thob pa yin/ /zhal bzang mo ni snang bas so/ /de ni mtshams zhes grags pa ste/ /dbus kyi gnas su yod pa'i phyir/ /dbus kyi gnas na yod pa na/ /de phyir kun tu spyod
byed pa'o/ /dbus ni dngos po thams cad la/ /'dus par byed pa dran pa 'o/ /yang na gang du mtshan mo ni/ /ma byung nyi ma nub pa 'o/ /de ni dbus kyi mtshams zhes
grags| |rang bzhin dga' ba sbyin byed ma/ /de nyid snang ba thob pa yin/ /thams cad skye ba'i rgyu yin no/ /gang du dbus mtshams skad cig gis/ /bde ba'i tshor ba
ma shes na| /skal ldan lha mo de ru ni/ /dga' bral gsal bar 'gyur ba'o/ /de yi nyams su myong shes pa/ /skyon ni cung zad mi byed do/ /mi shes pas ni skal ldan mo/ /
rtsa ba dang bcas med par byed/ /rtsa ba snang ba zhes byar dran/ /khu ba'i gzugs ni zla ba 'o/ /bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i gter/ /bsrubs las skye ba yin pa'i phyir/ /lha mo me
tog snang ba mched/ /dmar ba'i phyir na nyi mar brjod/ /bde chen rnam par smin pa'i phyir/ /dmar ba'i gzugs ni sngar 'gyur ro/ /'bras bu thob pa'i grags pa ste/ /mtshan
dang dpe byad dang ldan no/ /dngos dang dngos min bral ba'i phyir/ /zhal bzang mtshams kyi ye shes so/ /nyin mo snang ba mched 'khor grags/ /mtshan mo snang ba mya ngan
'das| |srid dang mya ngan 'das bral pa/ /mtshams ni snang ba thob pa 'o/ /de lta bu yi gsang chen mchog /gang du yang ni gsal ma byas/ /skal ldan khyod kyi ngor byas pas/ /
ye shes rin chen gsal byas so/ /lha mos gsol pa/ 'bras bu de nyid rin chen gang / /mnga' bdag de ni ji ltar rnyed/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'bras
bu de ni rin chen gang / /de ni gnyis su dbye bar gnas/ /mchog gi dga' ba'i ngo bo gcig /mchog gi dga' ba dang bral ba/ /mchog dga' ngo bor grags pa ni/ /nyams
su myong bas rnyed pa yin/ /mchog gi dga' ba dang bral ba/ /rang las rab tu gsal bar 'gyur/ /skal ldan mo gang nyams su myong / /de ni rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin no/ /
nyams su myong min rdzogs pa ni/ /gang du sus kyang mi shes so/ /ji ltar bu mo lang tsho bab/ /skyes bu med na nam yang min/ /legs dgyes
kyi ni bde myong ba/ /legs dgyes dbang mo mi shes so/ /gang zhig bsam pa la sogs kyis/ /de ni bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /bskyed pa dang ni rdzogs bral ba/ /de ni 'bras
mchog rang bzhin no/ /de ru gang zhig sgom pa ni/ /phra mo'i phra mo yang dag mchog /gang gis bla na med pa rnyed/ /'gro ba'i ma de yod pa min/ /bla na med pa'i ye
shes che| |bzhi dang bral ba rtag tu shar/ /rtag tu shar ba las gzhan ci/ /gang du yang na sgom yod dam/ /gal te gang gis sgom pa de/ /khyad par can du yongs mi
skye| |mi skye'i phyir na bsam gtan ngal/ /gal te khyad par 'ong 'gyur na/ /de ni de nyid rang bzhin min/ /de nyid min par the tshom med/ /de nyid mi sgom de nyid ni/ /su
zhig de la rnyed par 'dod/ /de ni mkha' la ri mo ni/ /mchog gi dbang mo 'bri ba 'o/ /lha mos gsol pa/ gsang ba chen po'i rgyud 'di ni/ /shes pa dang ni bshad pa su/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang phyogs su dpal rdo rje'i gnas auD+yan du rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU ti zhes bya bas shes pa dang / bshad pa dang / sems can
la gsal bar byed do/ /lha mos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal po chen po in+d+ra b+hU ti zhes bya ba de sa du'i dbang phyug lags bka' stsol cig /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dpal ye shes thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las gang zhig ngas bstan pa'i phyag na rdo rje'i rgyal po de nyid in+d+ra b+hU ti sprul pa'i sku sa bcu'i dbang phyug /
ye shes kyi sku sa bcu bzhi'i dbang phyug go /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / ri rab kyi nyi rdul gyi grangs bcom ldan 'das ma dang lhan cig tu stan
las langs te lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis sna tshogs pa'i mchod pas mchod sbyin byas nas bstong pa/
de kho na nyid bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho'i snying po rab tu mchog rgyal gyur cig /ye shes nam mkha' skye med gzugs med brjod med sku rab rgyal gyur cig /dngos dang dngos min ro
gcig ngo bo'i rmad byung de nyid rab gter rgyal gyur cig /stong nyid stong pa nyid min mchog dang gzhan mchog 'od kyis grub pa rgyal gyur cig /de lta bu'i bstod pa'i rgyal pos
bstod nas 'khor thams cad bcom ldan 'das dang bcas bar mi snang bar gyur to/ /dpal rnal 'byor ma chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgyal po mchog chen po rmad du byung zhing rmad du byung ba da
kho na nyid kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po pra dz+nyA shrI gup+tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
dus phyis dpal sa skya'i dben gnas su bsgyur cing zhus te dag par byas so/ /rgya gar skad du /tan+t+ra rA dza shrI la g+hu sa wa ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po
dpal bde mchog nyung ngu zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas gsang ba bshad par bya/ /mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par
min| |dpal he ru ka yang dag sbyor/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed yin/ /bla ma las kyang bla ma ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes
pa na| |thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /'di ni rang byung bcom ldan dpa'/ /
mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sdom pa yin/ /sgra yi tshul las nges 'byung rnams/ /dam tshig spyod ba'i spyod yul yin/ /'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba/ /thog ma dbus
mthar yang dag gnas/ /bsrub bya srub byed yang dag sbyar/ /ji lta ba ni de bzhin du/ /sngags bzlas bsam gtan la sogs ldan/ /sbyor nyid cho ga'i ye shes ni/ /rnal 'byor bla na med pa yi/ /
rgyud las gsungs pa mnyan par gyis/ /dbugs 'byin bar ma mchog dag dang / /dri yi chu dang bcas pas kyang / /rnal 'byor pas dus khyad par du/ /rigs ldan rtag tu
mchod par bya/ /pho nya lhan cig skyes grub ma/ /mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma ste/ /yid ni nang du chud pa yis/ /'dod pa yi ni dngos grub bya/ /rang rdzas thig les sangs
rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya/ /mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang / /thos pa 'am ni dran pa yis/ /sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur ba/ /de lta nyid du the tshom/
med| |rnal 'byor pa nyid bsod nams mchog /dag byed sdig pa 'joms byed pa/ /gsang sngags bzlas dang bsam gtan dang / /bde bas kyang ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /
dam tshig rtag tu bskyang bar bya/ /shin tu mnyam bzhag sgrub pa pos/ /dam tshig nyams pas dkyil 'khor du/ /dbang bskur dngos grub thob mi 'gyur/ /sbrang rtsi mar dang
ga pur bcas/ /tsan+dan dmar po dang sbyar ba/ /tshogs kyi nang du bzhag ba ni/ /thams cad rdor mtshan mtshan ma 'dzin/ /ming med mthe bong rtse sbyar bas/ /rnal 'byor rig
pas rtag tu spyad/ /myangs pas zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin/ /dngos grub rtag pa thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni mi 'chi bcu phyed 'gyur/ /dngos grub thams cad 'jug byed yin/ /
mchod bzhi dpa' bo chen po ni/ /yid la 'dod pa byed pa ste/ /dbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa yi/ /snyoms par zhugs pa'ang de
nyid 'dzin/ /lha dang mi yi bde ba ni/ /bsdus byas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /de lta bur ni byed pa yi/ /bcu drug char ni mi phod do/ /ri bo tshang tshing sman ljongs sam/ /chu
bo che rnams ngogs dag dang / /gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod du/ /der ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ dkyil 'khor du
'jug pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //der ni lci ba ma lhung bas/ /dkyil 'khor sa ni nye bar byug /dur khrod thal bar ldan pa dang / /bdud rtsi
lnga dang bcas pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor sa ni nyer byugs te/ /der ni dkyil 'khor yang dag brtsam/ /gnas de ru ni bsgoms pa yis/ /dur khrod du ni kun tu
brtag /ro bsregs sol ba'i phye ma dang / /dur khrod so phag ldan pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po bri bar bya/ /slob dpon dge ba'i mtshan nyid can/ /yang dag
shos shing rgyud shes pa/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung gsang sngags shes/ /khro med gtsang zhing mkhas pa dang / /sbyor shes ye shes pha rol 'gro/ /thod pas spyi bor
brgyan byas shing / /yan lag bral bas byugs pa dang / /gug skyed dag gis lus brgyan cing / /rus pa'i phreng la sogs pas brgyan/ /dum gcig spyi bor brgyan pa dang //
rus pa'i phreng ba rnam par 'phyang / /kha T+wAM ga ni lag na gnas/ /bdag nyid khrag 'thung dpal byas nas/ /de 'og khrag 'thung dpal dran bya/ /'khor lo 'di ni snying gar
dgod| |bdag nyid de ltar go bgos nas/ /ra ba rnams ni phyogs su dgod/ /de ltar bdag nyid go bgos nas/ /'og tu yang ni mtshon cha dgod/ /'khor lo mtshon cha'i
phreng ba dag /steng du mda' yi dra ba nyid/ /slar yang bdag nyid mkha' spyod du/ /gur byas de ni go char 'gyur/ /de ltar go cha de bgos na/ /sum cu pas kyang mi phyed do//
de ltar bdag nyid rab bsrungs shing / /sngags dang phyag rgyas rnam brgyan nas/ /dngos grub chen po rab ster ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya/ /de nas sems
med srad bu 'am/ /ru d+hi ra ni chen pos brlan/ /he ru ka dpal grong khyer mchog /dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa thig gdab bya/ /khru gang khru bzhi'am khru brgyad pa/ /sgo bzhi kun nas
zur bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/ /sngags pas nyis 'gyur rnam par spyad/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog mchod/ /de yi dbus su pad+ma ni/ /'dab bcas
lte bar 'bar dang bcas/ /ge sar yang dag ldan par gzhag /lte bar dgod bya dpa' bo ni/ /'jigs byed kyang ni 'jigs par mdzad/ /mdangs
dang ldan zhing rab tu 'bar/ /ha ha zhes pa'i sgra cher bzhad/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan dang ldan/ /bzang po spyan gsum zhal bzhi mnga'/ /glang po'i phags pa rnam par
bgos| |smin ma bzang po rdo rje dbyes/ /phyag na kha T+wAM mi thod bsnams/ /brgya phyed phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /de mdun gnas pa'i lha mo ni/ /rdo rje phag mo rab 'jigs
ma| |he ru ka dpal che la phyogs/ /spyan gsum drag po'i gzugs can yin/ /ka pA la ni an+t+ras bkang / /kha nas ru d+hi ra 'dzag cing / /lha dang lha min mir bcas pa//
phyogs kun tu ni sdigs mdzub byed/ /mkha' mgro ma ni nyi shu bzhi/ /phag mo yi ni rigs las byung / /phyogs dang phyogs kyi mtshams rnams dang / /'khor lo'i
dbus su mchod par bya/ /de bzhin 'dir ni dpa' bo yang / /'khor lor yang dag gnas pa mchod/ /sgrub po gal te dngos grub 'dod/ /gnyis med dpa' bo mchod
par bya| |de nas bum pa bya ba ni/ /rtsa pa nag po la sogs med/ /mu tig gser dang rin chen dang / /byi ru dngul dang zangs ma ste/ /bza' ba kun gyis legs bkang ba'i//
snod ni steng du gzhag par bya/ /mgrin pa slad bus dkri ba dang / /kha ni 'dab mas brgyan par bya/ /gos zung gis ni legs dkris pa/ /brgyad ni sgo ru rnam par dgod/ /gos
zung gis ni legs dkris pa'i/ /bum pa dgu pa dbus su gzhag /gser ram dngul lam rin chen nam/ /mu tig rnams kyis mdzes par bya/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu rin chen
dang / /gser gyis mdzes par spras par bya/ /grong mchog yid 'ong mchod pa ni/ /grub pa nyid du the tshom med/ /bdag nyid kun nas zhal la ni/ /dri yi chu yis legs par
gdab| |gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /mar me brgya ni dbul bar bya/ /nam mkha'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni/ /yid kyis thams cad steng du dgod/ /sa steng mkha'
'gro ma gang yin/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu dgod par bya/ /gang yang sa 'og mkha' 'gro ma/ /de ni sa 'og rnams su dgod/ /ma mo thams cad phyogs dang ni/ /phyogs mtshams
rnams su dgod par bya/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /dri dang me tog de bzhin spos/ /cho ga bzhin du de bzhin mchod/ /mar me brgya yang dbul bya zhing / /dpal he ru
ka'i dkyil 'khor gnas/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams mchod/ /rgyal mtshan dmar dang de bzhin ser/ /dkar dang nag dang ser skya dang / /me tog phreng ba du ma dang / /de bzhin
gos ni sna tshogs dang / /bla re dang ni yol ba dag /mdzes pa ji lta de bzhin te/ /de bzhin bza' bca' btung ba yis/ /rab mnyam
bzhag ste mchod par bya/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ 'khor lo mchod pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas sgrub pos dngos
kun gyis/ /dang por slob dpon mnyes par bya/ /grub 'dod shin du mnyam bzhag pas/ /ci nus pas ni bla ma mchod/ /dril bu sgra ldan dbyangs pa dang / /me tog spos
rnams kyis brgyan cing / /shin tu sgra snyan dril pu dkrol/ /sgrub pa po yis rnga brdung zhing / /ha ha zhes ni brjod par bya/ /de ltar cho ga bzhin dkyil 'khor/ /'dod pa kun
ldan mchod nas ni/ /bu sdug de dag gdong pa la/ /dar ras legs par bkab nas su/ /thal mo me tog gis bkang ste/ /yang dag par ni zhugs pa dag /sgrub po shin
tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /de nas bskor ba byas nas ni/ /blo bzang yid ni mnyam bzhag pa/ /pho brang nyams dgar gzhug par bya/ /lho yi phyogs su lus bstan la/ /
thal mo'i me tog de nas dor/ /dkyil 'khor steng du dor bar bya/ /gang du me tog de ltung ba/ /shrI he ru ka'i gnas sogs bstan/ /de yi rigs ni rnam bstan te/ /de ni rigs
de'i ming 'gyur ba/ /slob dpon gyis ni ming bstan to/ /de nas slob dpon legs par ni/ /mnyam par bzhag ste phyag rgya mchod/ /de nas slob ma phyi de nyon/ /las ni yang dag
spyad par bya/ /mtshal chen lan gsum bzlas pa yis/ /de rnams su ni thig le bya/ /slob ma yi ni gdong phye la/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya/ /lha gang gi ni gnas
gang yin/ /der ni yang dag bstan par bya/ /slob dpon dang bcas pho brang la/ /de nas slob mas rab btud nas/ /phyir yang g.yon nas brtsams pa yis/ /de nas bskor ba
byas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dang ni bla ma la/ /ji bzhin cho gas phyag bya 'o/ /de nas bla ma dag la yon/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa dbul/ /gser ni brgya stong dbul
ba dang / /rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /ras ni zung gyur brgya nyid dang / /glang po rta dang yul 'khor dang / /rna rgyan 'am ni gdu bu dang / /mgul gdub sor gdub dam pa dang //
gser las byas pa'i mchod phyir thogs/ /chung ma bzang dang bu mo nyid/ /bran pho bran mo sring mo rnams/ /phyag btsal nas ni dbul bar bya/ /ji skad gsungs bzhin slob
ma ni| |blo dang ldan pas bla ma la/ /dngos po kun gyis bdag nyid ni/ /de bzhin du ni dbul bar bya/ /deng nas brtsams te bran du bdag /khyed la bdag gis phul ba lags//
de nas sgrub pos rab nges par/ /de ltar cho ga byas nas ni/ /de nas de la mkha' 'gro ma/ /rnal 'byor ma mo rnams mnyes 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro
ma dang lA mA dang / /khaN+Da ro hi gzugs can ma/ /sgrub po mkha' 'gro ma lhan cig /de dang rnam spyod kun tu 'gro/ /thams cad sgrub po de yi ni/ /ci bgyi byed par the tshom
med| |rnal 'byor 'di ni sgrub 'gyur na/ /'jig rten gsum du mi ldog cing / /mi snang phug dang nam mkhar rgyu/ /rkang mgyogs de bzhin bcud kyis len/ /sgrub pa po
yi 'dod tsam gyis/ /rtag par rgyun du bskyed par 'gyur/ /gzugs ni du ma byed pa dang / /nam mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro rnams kyang khyad par du//
skad cig de la sbyor bskyed de/ /'gro ba rnams kyang nges par gnon/ /lhan cig bltas pas rnal 'byor pas/ /sngags pa dkyil 'khor ma mthong bar/ /gang zhig
rnal 'byor pa nyid 'dod/ /mkha' la khu tshur gyis brdeg dang / /smig rgyu'i chu ni 'thung dang mtshungs/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog rab dang / /sbyor ba kun gyi dam pa
yin| |gang zhig rtag tu 'dod gyur pa/ /lha dang lha min mi rnams te/ /'di dag zil gyis gnon par 'gyur/ /rgyud 'di ru ni dbang bskur bas/ /thams cad kyi ni sgrub pa
po| |dgod dang lta dang lag 'dzin gyis/ /'khyud dang gnyis sprad la sogs la/ /dbang bskur bar ni gyur pa yin/ /thams cad rgyud las dam pa 'o/ /'di ni lha mi zil
gnon 'gro/ /de nyid bsdus pa'am sdom pa'am/ /gsang ba'am rdo rje 'jigs byed las/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rgyal po 'di/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bshad
dang ma bshad gang ci'ang rung / /de kun he ru ka la gnas/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ yon tan dang bcas pa'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste gsum
pa'o// //de nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni/ /gnas na rnam par 'gying ba ste/ /brtson chen 'khor los bsgyur ma dang / /stobs chen ma dang rab
dpa' mo/ /'khor lo'i go cha chang tshong ma/ /khaN+Da ro hi 'khor lo'i shugs/ /bya gdong ma dang rta rna mo/ /shin tu bzang mo ljang lha mo/ /chang 'thung ma dang rlung shugs ma/ /de

bzhin 'jig byed chen mo dang / /sa srung ma dang shing grib ma/ /lang+ka'i dbang phyug mi'u thung ma/ /dpa' bo'i blo ma sna chen ma/ /'od ldan ma dang gtum mig ma/ /rab gtum ma ste sgrub byed pa'i/ /mkha'

'gro ma ni nyi shu bzhi/ /'di dag sngon nyid sgrub pa yin/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbus su ni/ /ji ltar phyi rol nang de bzhin/ /rang ming brjod pa'i sngags la ni/ /mthar ni hUM hUM phaT sbyar te/ /rnal 'byor ram mchog
'di mthong na/ /me ste gzhan dag sog mar mtshungs/ /oM ni kun la gsal byed de/ /grub stsol 'dod pa thams cad byed/ /dpa' bo nyid 'gyur
grub pa ni/ /khyim du dkyil 'khor mthong ba yin/ /de nas de rtag bsgom par bya/ /dngos grub de bzhin gshegs gsungs bzhin/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa
las| dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma gnyis su med par dgos pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas thams cad chos 'byung bar/ /sna tshogs lte bar mi
shigs dge /sngags pas cho ga bzhin du bri/ /chos kun gcig tu bsdu bar bya/ /'dir sngags tshig ni 'di yin te/ /A li kA li mnyam byas nas/ /sde tshan la ni yongs
bsdoms pa/ /bzhi bzhi ru ni shes byas la/ /thub pa mchog gi re mig la/ /der gnas dpa' bo btu bar bya/ /'dod don thams cad sgrub byed pa'o/ /bzhi pa'i lnga pa
gang yin dang / /lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang / /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /dang po'i gsum pa gang yin dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa dgu pa/ /bzhi pa'i dang po gang yin
dang / /mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang / /de nyid kyi ni gnyis pa dang / /sum cu pa ni yang dag blang / /de bzhin nyi shu drug pa nyid/ /de dag thams cad legs bsdus
la| |de bzhin brgya yi phyed phyed kyang / /de nas sum cu rtsa gsum gzung / /dang po'i dang po nyid dag dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang / /dang po yi ni gsum pa dang / /sum
cu rtsa gnyis nyid dag dang / /bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /lnga pa yi yang bzhi pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi dang po dang / /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /gsum pa'i dang po gang
yin dang / /lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang / /dang po yi yang dang po dang / /de bzhin bcu gcig pa nyid dang / /de bzhin mkhas pas bcu drug pa/ /gsum pa'i dang po gang yin dang / /de
bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa/ /bzhi pa'i gsum pa gang yin dang / /uSh+ma Sha yi gnyis pa nyid/ /dang po'i dang po gang yin dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/ /nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa yang ngo //
dang po yi ni gsum pa dang / /lnga pa yi yang bzhi pa dang / /de bzhin sum cu rtsa gcig blang / /bco lnga pa ni nyid dag dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa lnga pa/ /dang po'i gnyis pa gang yin
dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa/ /yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / /uSh+ma Sha yi tha ma nyid/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis pa nyid dang / /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa
dang / /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /uSh+ma Sha yi gsum pa dang / /gzhan yang nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/ /an+tas+tha yi dang po dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa gcig pa/ /an+tas+tha yi gnyis pa dang //
de bzhin yang ni sum cu pa/ /lnga pa yi ni dang po dang / /uSh+ma Sha yi dang po nyid/ /de bzhin yi ge d+ya nyid dang / /bzhi pa'i dang po gang yin dang /
uSh+ma'i dang po gang yin dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa/ /dang po'i gnyis pa gang yin dang / /gsum pa'i dang po nyid dag dang / /dang po'i gsum pa gang yin dang //
bzhi pa'i bzhi pa gang yin dang / /an+tas+tha yi gnyis pa dang / /gsum pa yi yang lnga pa dang / /yi ge bya ni de nas blang / /dang po yi ni bzhi pa dang / /de nas brgyad pa
nyid dag dang / /bzhi pa'i lnga pa nyid dag yin/ /lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/ /bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /slar yang nye shu rtsa bdun pa/ /
de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga yang dag blang / /sum cu rtsa gsum nyid dag dang / /bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /bzhi pa yi yang lnga
pa dang / /dang po'i dang po nyid dag dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/ /an+tas+tha yi bzhi pa dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa gcig pa/ /uSh+ma Sha yi gnyis pa nyid/ /de bzhin nyi
shu rtsa drug pa'o/ /dang po'i dang po nyid dang ni/ /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa nyid/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po nyid/ /drug pa yi yang gnyis pa'o/ /dang po yi ni dang po
dang / /mthar gnas gnyis pa de bzhin te/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang / /bdun pa yi ni gnyis pa dang / /drug pa yi yang gsum pa dang / /bzhi pa yi yang lnga pa la/ /
bzhi pa yis ni sbyar bar bya/ /mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang / /lnga pa yi yang lnga pa la/ /bzhi pa yis ni gdan du bya/ /lnga pa yi ni dang po la/ /'og tu me yig gdan
dang ldan/ /uSh+ma Sha yi gsum de bzhin/ /mthar gnas pa yi dang po yang / /bzhi pa yi ni dang po nyid/ /me yis gdan du byas pa'o/ /bdun pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /drug
pa yi yang dang po gang / /ka Shar grags pa'i dang po gzung / /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi dang po gang / /de bzhin yang ni ril po nyid/ /lnga pa yi ni bzhi
pa dang / /bdun pa yi yang dang po dang / /uSh+ma Sha yi bzhi pa gzung / /bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phye ba dag /uSh+ma Sha yi bzhi pa nyid/ /'od byed gdan
du byas pa'o/ /bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa la/ /'og tu yang ni me yi gdan/ /tsheg drag dang ni yang dag ldan/ /lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang / /de bzhin nyi shu gnyis pa nyid/ /
drug pa yi ni gnyis nyid dang / /de bzhin bcu gcig par ni nges/ /slar yang nyi shu rtsa gnyis gzung / /gsum pa yi ni dang po dang / /bzhi pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /uSh+ma Sha
yi bzhi pa nyid/ /lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /nyi shu gcig pa de nas btu/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang / /lnga
pa yi ni dang por nges/ /gnyis las drug pa'i yi ge'o/ /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /de bzhin ka Shar grags nyid dang / /nyi shu bzhi pa de nas btu/ /slar yang ril po ji
bzhin dang / /lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /uSh+ma Sha yi gsum pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa nyid/ /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /slar yang 'od byed sbyin par bya/ /
yi ge nyi shu 'og tu ni/ /bcu drug pa ni gdan du bya/ /'og tu me yis gsal byas la/ /lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang / /lnga pa yi ni
gsum pa dang / /drug pa yi yang gsum pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang / /nyi shu lnga pas khyad par dbye/ /bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /gnyis pa yi ni
gsum pa la/ /nyi ma'i bu yis khyad par dbye/ /uSh+ma Sha yi bzhi pa dang / /'og tu bco lnga pa yi gdan/ /dang po yi yang gsum pa dang / /de nas me yis gdan du
bya| |bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /'og tu bco lnga pa yi gdan/ /uSh+ma Sha yi gsum pa nyid/ /lnga pa yi ni dang po la/ /bcu drug pa yis gdan du'o/ /de nas nyi shu
gcig pa blang / /bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang / /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang / /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /gsum
pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /dang po yi ni gsum pa dang / /uSh+ma Sha yi gsum pa nyid/ /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa gcig pa/ /'od byed mnyam par mnan pa'o/ /lnga pa yi ni gsum pa
dang / /bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang / /gsum pa yi ni gsum pa la/ /me yis steng nas gsal bar bya/ /mthar gnas pa yi dang por gsungs/ /de nas yi ge bcu drug 'og/
gsum pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /spyi bor me yi yi ges mtshan/ /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug nyid/ /dang po yi ni dang po dang / /gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang / /gsum pa yi ni
bzhi pa la/ /bcu gsum pa yis mnan pa'o/ /dang po'i dang po de bzhin te/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang / /gsum pa yi ni bzhi pa yi/ /steng du bcu gsum pa nyid dang / /
uSh+ma Sha yi bzhi pa la/ /nyi shu bdun pas gdan du bya/ /ya yig brgyad pa'i sa bon la/ /'od byed kyis ni gsal byas pa/ /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa la/ /bco lnga pa yis
gdan du bya/ /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa la/ /gsum pa'i lnga pa la ni bskyon/ /ka Sha'i sa bon btus nas ni/ /nyi shu lnga pas gdan du bya/ /ril po mdzes pa btus nas ni/ /yi
ge ma yis gdan du bya/ /uSh+ma Sha yi bzhi pa nyid/ /bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /ya tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon dang / /de bzhin sum cu gsum par
nges| |lnga pa'i bdag nyid yongs btus la/ /yang ni de la gnyis par nges/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang / /de bzhin sum cu rtsa gnyis
pa| |drug pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /drug pa'i gsum pa de bzhin te/ /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /drug pa yi ni gsum pa ste/ /gnyis gnyis
rkang pa bzhi yin no/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i gsang sngags te/ /bya ba thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /'di las shin tu mchog gyur pa/ /'jig rten gsum na yod min te/ /
he ru ka dpal sngags shes na/ /me ste gzhan dag sog ma 'dra/ /rtsa ba'i sngags su rab tu grags/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /rtsa ba'i sngags yi ge btu
ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //gzhan yang yi ge nyi shu gnyis/ /snying po nye snying yi ge bdun/ /ya tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon dang / /de bzhin
gug skyed bcu gnyis kyi/ /yi ge bar ma dor byas la/ /yan lag drug ni he ru ka /dpa' bo drug dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /yi ge re rer yang dag gnas/ /oM na maHswAhA
bau ShaT| |hUM hUM phaT dang yang dag ldan/ /sgrub pos snying por shes par bya/ /dang po snying ga nyid du ste/ /gnyis pa spyi bor shes par bya/ /gsum pa spyi gtsug dag tu sbyar/ /bzhi pa
go cha nyid du yin/ /lnga pa mig tu gyur pa ste/ /drug pa mtshon cha zhes byar 'dod/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /dpa' bo drug gi go cha btu ba'i le'u ste drug
pa'o|| //de nas dbyangs yig bcu gsum nyid/ /yi ge gnyis pa dag dang sbyar/ /dbyangs yig bcu gcig yang dag ldan/ /yi ge drug par
brgyan par bya/ /dbyangs kyi bzhi pa nyid kyang ni/ /yi ge bdun pa nyid dang sbyar/ /dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa nyid ni/ /mkhas pas yi ge brgyad dang sbyar/ /dbyangs yig
gnyis pa dang ldan par/ /yi ge dgu pas brgyan par bya/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa nyid/ /yi ge bcu gnyis pa dang sbyar/ /dbyangs yig gnyis par ldan pa ni/ /yi ge nyi
shu gcig par gzung / /mkhas pas yi ge bcu bzhi pa/ /yi ge nyi shu ba dang sbyar/ /dbyangs kyi gsum pa nyid dag ni/ /yi ge bco lnga pa dang sbyar/ /dbyangs yig bco lngar
yang dag ldan/ /yi ge bcu drug pa mdzes bya/ /dbyangs yig gsum dang ldan pa yi/ /yi ge bcu bdun pa ru 'dod/ /dbyangs kyi gnyis pa nyid dag ni/ /yi ge bco brgyad pa ru
sbyar| |dbyangs yig gi ni gnyis pa nyid/ /yi ge nyi shu gcig par sbyar/ /dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dang ni/ /yi ge nyi shu gsum par sbyar/ /
dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa nyid ni/ /yi ge nyi shu bzhi par sbyar/ /sde tshan dang po blangs nas ni/ /yi ge nyi shu lnga par sbyar/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan pa/ /yi ge nyi
shu rtsa drug 'gyur/ /nyi shu brgyad pa nyid dag ni/ /dbyangs yig bco lnga pa dang sbyar/ /gsum pa'i dang po yang dag ldan/ /'og ma'i cha ni me dang bcas/ /de bzhin dbyangs
yig gnyis par sbyar/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o/ /yi ge sum cu rtsa gcig pa/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dag dang sbyar/ /yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis pa/ /dbyangs
yig bcu gsum pa dang sbyar/ /yi ge sum cu rtsa gsum pa/ /nyi mar yang dag ldan par bya/ /dbyangs yig bzhi pa nyid dang ni/ /yi ge sum cu bzhir ldan pa/ /'dod pa'i
don kun sgrub byed yin/ /dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dag ni/ /sum cu bdun par yang dag ldan/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams sgrub byed yin/ /sum cu brgyad pa 'di dag ni/ /dbyangs
yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba/ /lha rnams thams cad sgrub pa ni/ /'di nyid yin par the tshom med/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa nyid la/ /'og gi char ni sgrub pa po/ /me dang sbyar
ba byas pa nyid/ /bzhi bcu gnyis pa nyid dag ni/ /dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dang sbyar/ /yi ge bzhi bcu lnga pa ni/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis par sbyar/ /dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid
dag kyang / /bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa ldan pa/ /dpa' bo thams cad rab mchod yin/ /bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa nyid ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba/ /'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'
mchog /de bzhin lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa/ /dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dag gis/ /mdzes pa mchog ni yin par 'dod/ /lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa nyid ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang
sbyar ba| |lha rnams thams cad sgrub byed ni/ /'di nyid yin par the tshom med/ /de bzhin lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa/ /dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa dang sbyar/ /yi ge lnga bcu rtsa drug
pa| |dbyangs yig drug pa dang yang sbyar/ /dgra rnams nges par gsod byed yin/ /an+tas+tha yi bzhi pa dang / /dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar bar bya/ /de bzhin bco lnga pa
dang sbyar/ /dngos grub thams cad grub pa yin/ /yi ge lnga bcu rtsa dgur 'gyur/ /yi ge drug cu rtsa gcig nyid/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dag dang sbyar/ /'di nyid mchog
ni yin par bshad/ /de bzhin drug cu rtsa gnyis pa/ /dbyangs yig gsum par sbyar ba ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi mchog tu 'dod/ /yi ge drug cu rtsa gsum nyid/ /dbyangs yig
bcu gcig yang dag ldan/ /mdzes pa'i yi ge kun mchod nyid/ /de bzhin drug cu rtsa lnga pa/ /rdo rje sems dpas phye ba dag /sa bon 'di ni lha rdzas
mchog /sgrub sbyin thar pa sbyin chen po/ /yi ge drug cu rtsa drug pa/ /dbyangs yig gsum pa dang yang sbyar/ /bya ba kun la sgrub sbyin par/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas
gsungs/ /yi ge drug cu rtsa bdun pa/ /dbyangs yig gnyis par yang dag ldan/ /rnal 'byor ma yi bya ba kun/ /'di nyid yin par the tshom med/ /drug cu brgyad pa nyid
la yang / /der ni yi ge pa sbyar ba/ /sa bon yi ge 'di yi ni/ /'og gi char ni brtag par bya/ /yi ge bdun cu rtsa gcig pa/ /dbyangs yig gnyis par yang dag sbyar//
yi ge kun la mdzes pa ni/ /'di nyid yin par the tshom med/ /bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa nyid ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar ba dag /gdod nas grub pa yin par ni/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas gsungs/ /yi ge bdun cu lnga pa nyid/ /ma mo drug pa dang ldan pa/ /'di ni rnal 'byor rab mchog ste/ /bya ba kun la dam pa yin/ /
bdun cu rtsa drug pa nyid ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan zhing / /nyi ma yis ni dbye bya ste/ /yi ge pa ni der sbyar bya/ /mchog tu mdzes pa gzhan yod min/ /yi ge bdun
cu rtsa bdun pa/ /der ni d+ha dang sbyar bar bya/ /sa bon 'di ni rdzas kyi mchog /mkha' 'gro ma yi mdzes par 'dod/ /bdun cu rtsa brgyad pa nyid ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan zhing //
sa bon 'di ni mchog bzang po/ /rgyu yi mchog ni yin par 'dod/ /yi ge brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa/ /bzhi pa'i mtha' yi khyad par gyis/ /gdod nas grub byed 'di yin te/ /dngos
grub kun la 'jug byed pa'o/ /yi ge brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar bya/ /ma mo rnams las lnga pa nyid/ /de bzhin yi ge brgyad cu brgyad/ /ma mo
dag las lnga pa nyid/ /yi ge brgyad cu rtsa dgu pa/ /ma mo rnams las lnga pa nyid/ /de bzhin yi ge dgu bcu pa/ /ma mo dag las lnga pa dang / /yi ge dgu cu rtsa gcig pa/ /ma mo
rnams las gnyis pa nyid/ /yi ge dgu bcu rtsa drug pa/ /dbyangs dag las ni gnyis pa dang / /yi ge dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa/ /gdug pa rnams ni skrag byed cing / /sngags
pa rnams la bde 'byung byed/ /dbyangs rnams kyi ni bcu gsum pa/ /yi ge gnyis par yang dag ldan/ /dbyangs las bcu gsum pa nyid dang / /yi ge lnga par yang dag ldan//
gdug pa rnams ni zad byed cing / /mkha' 'gro rnams kyi bde 'bab pa'o/ /dbyangs rnams las ni bcu bzhi nyid/ /yi ge brgyad par yang dag ldan/ /bco lnga pa yi gdan du
bya/ /dbyangs dag las ni bcu bzhi pa/ /yi ge dgu par yang dag ldan/ /spyi bor thig les mtshan pa'o/ /sgrub po mkha' 'gro ma rnams
ni/ /khyad par du ni dga' byed pa'o/ /dbyangs rnams las ni bcu gcig pa/ /bcu gnyis pa yi yang dag ldan/ /spyi bor thig les mtshan pa'o/ /'byung po
thams cad skrag byed cing / /sgrub po rnams la phan 'byung ba'o/ /bcu gcig par ni yang dag ldan/ /yi ge bcu gsum pa nyid la/ /thig les rnam par brgyan pa'o/ /
'byung po thams cad skrag byed cing / /sgrub po rnams la phan 'byung ba'o/ /dbyangs rnams las ni lnga pa nyid/ /yi ge sum cu gnyis par ldan/ /dbyangs rnams las ni
gsum pa dang / /yi ge sum cu gsum par ldan/ /dbyangs kyi gnyis pa nyid dang ni/ /yi ge sum cu bzhi par ldan/ /dbyangs rnams las ni gnyis pa nyid/ /
yi ge sum cu drug par ldan/ /thog ma'i gnyis par yang dag ldan/ /yi ge sum cu rtsa bdun pa/ /dbyangs las gsum par yang dag ldan/ /yi ge bzhi
bcu pa la'o/ /ma mo'i bcu gcig yang dag ldan/ /yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa/ /dbyangs dag las ni gsum pa nyid/ /yi ge bzhi bcu gnyis par ldan/ /dbyangs dag las ni gsum pa
nyid| |yi ge bzhi bcu bzhi par ldan/ /ma mo las ni gnyis pa nyid/ /yi ge bzhi bcu brgyad par ldan/ /dbyangs dag las ni gnyis pa nyid/ /yi ge bzhi bcu dgu par ldan/ /ma mo
las ni lnga pa nyid/ /yi ge lnga bcu gsum par ldan/ /yi ge lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa/ /thig les kyang ni rnam brgyan pa'o/ /yi ge lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa/ /spyi bor thig les mtshan pa la//
dbyangs kyi gnyis par sbyar ba 'o/ /yi ge lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa/ /spyi bor thig les mnan pa 'o/ /dbyangs rnams las ni gnyis pa nyid/ /yi ge lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa/ /ma mo
las ni gnyis pa nyid/ /yi ge drug cu lnga pa la'o/ /ma mo las ni gnyis pa nyid/ /yi ge drug cu brgyad par ldan/ /dngos grub thams cad 'gugs byed cing / /sgrub po
rnams la dpal sbyin pa'o/ /ma mo las ni bzhi pa nyid/ /yi ge bdun cu gcig par ldan/ /thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ /ma mo las ni bzhi pa nyid/ /yi ge bdun
cu gnyis par ldan/ /sems can thams cad dbang byed pa/ /thig le yis ni mnyam par mnan/ /dbyangs kyi bcu bzhi par nges ldan/ /yi ge bdun cu rtsa gsum pa'o//
ma mo las ni bcu bzhi pa/ /yi ge bdun cu bzhi par ldan/ /de bzhin thig les rnam brgyan pa'o/ /dbyangs rnams las ni gnyis pa nyid/ /yi ge bdun cu lnga par ldan/ /ma mo
las ni gnyis pa nyid/ /yi ge bdun cu brgyad par ldan/ /steng du thig les mtshan pa'o/ /ma mo las ni bzhi pa dang / /yi ge bdun cu rtsa
dgu pa| |spyi bor thig les mnan pa'o/ /dbyangs rnams las ni drug pa nyid/ /rta yi rgyal po bskyed pa la/ /thig le nA das rnam brgyan pa/ /dbyangs rnams las ni gsum pa
nyid| |yi ge bcu drug ldan pa'o/ /yi ge'i grangs ni brgya yi steng / /dgu bcu dang ni rtsa brgyad do/ /'di ni re mig las btus pa/ /he ru ka dpal mgon po yi/ /rtsa ba'i
sngags mchog tu shes bya/ /dngos grub kun gyi gnas yin zhing / /mkha' 'gro'i snying ni 'joms pa yin/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung lha rig rgyal/ /ba klags pas grub
pa don yod pa/ /yi ge oM ni dang po ste/ /hUM hUM phaT ni mtha' mar sbyar/ /rtsa ba'i sngags te sngags 'di ni/ /sgrub pa thams cad sbyin byed yin/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par
brjod pa las/ sngags btu ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas rang gi bdag nyid kyi/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro

po ngas bshad pa/ /g.yon pa'i kun spyod la rtag dga'/ /'di dag rang rgya'i mdog gis khyab/ /rigs kyi rig pa'i yi ge yang / /rigs kyi rjes su 'dir 'gyur ba/ /'di la kha dog
drug tu 'gyur/ /rang gi phyag rgya 'ching ba dang / /rang rigs las byung tshig tu smra/ /g.yon nas 'gro ba'i bud med gang / /rnal 'byor ma la'ang g.yon la brtag /skad ni chen
por rab smra ba/ /g.yon nas blta bas rnam par lta/ /bud med rnams mthong rab smra ba/ /de ni dam tshig ldan par bshad/ /bud med rnams gang gsol gdab byed/ /rigs
kyi sa bon rab tu smra/ /rigs kyi bya ba mi 'dor zhing / /rang gi bstan bcos gsung pa skyong / /rang gi rigs kyi rig pa zlos/ /de ni dam tshig ldan par brjod/ /phyag
'tshal ba ni gang 'ching ba/ /g.yon pa'i lus kyis rtag tu 'dud/ /lha mo rnams dang kun smra ba/ /de ni nges par bden par 'gro/ /mthe bong g.yon pas sa la ni/ /rkang pas
ri mo 'bri byed cing / /mgo ni dkrug par byed pa ste/ /zur gyis lta zhing lag g.yon gyis/ /sgrub pa po la khyad par du/ /de yi rang rig dran pa'o/ /mkhur ba'am kos ko
drag dang ni/ /sna dag tu ni sor mo ston/ /zur gyis lta zhing lan gcig sngags/ /bzlas nas rig la rnam par lta/ /bden par 'gro ba'i rnam 'byor ma/ /nges pa dam tshig can/

yin no| |dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /rnal 'byor ma'i mtshan nyid nges par brtag pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// //de nas rnyed dka' rnal 'byor ma/ /de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi/ /bdud rtsi rnams la yang dag 'byung / /ya mi nI dang skrag byed ma/ /nags tshal ma dang de bzhin
'jigs/ /gzugs kun spyod ma mdzes ma dag /b+ha su ra mkha' 'gro rnams bdun/ /bsdus ma rang mtshan nyid 'dir bshad/ /gzugs can ma dang tsum bi ka/
lA ma yongs gyur byis bcas mo/ /mi ldog e hi ka lha mo/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams bdun du bshad/ /mngon par zhen pas lta ba dang / /smin ma 'degs par gar
byed cing / /sngon gyi gzugs ni sdud byed gang / /phyis ni 'jig par byed pa yin/ /de ni gzugs can mar shes bya/ /dpa' bo gnyis med bstan par bya/ /grung pa
'am yang na mi grung pa/ /byis pa 'khyud cing tsum pan/ /de ni tsum+bi kir zhes bya/ /mkha' 'gro sdig pa 'joms ma yin/ /zur lta gdong la khro gnyer ldan/ /smin
ma sgyur zhing sdigs mdzub dang / /dbugs 'byin 'jigs par byed gang yin/ /'di na gzhan yang dbugs mi 'byin/ /'jigs par byed pa gang yin pa/ /de ni
lA ma yin par bstan/ /phag dang dred dang byi la dang / /lce sbyang ra dang rta dag dang / /thams cad der ni 'jigs byed pa/ /yongs su gyur par de bshad do/ /shin tu dga' bas
dgod pa dang / /song nas slar yang mi ldog pa/ /rjes su chags pas gsol bar 'dod/ /khaN+Da ro hir de bshad do/ /yid ni byung bas lag pa 'am/ /bong ba 'am ni rkang pas
sam| |gos mtha' ma yang na shing dag gis/ /des reg pa ni 'tsho mi 'gyur/ /mi ldog par ni shes bya ste/ /bsgrub bya min par de la brjod/ /dgod smra rgyu med pa ru ni/ /du
zhing rab tu khros pa ste/ /de ni e hi kar dran bya/ /lha mo gsong por smra ba yin/ /sangs rgyas pa dang rtag tu smra/ /de nyid rdo rje'i rigs las byung / /mkha' 'gro ma yi rigs
phyag rgya| |dpa' bos bsten phyir mtshan par bya/ /thod pa dgra sta mche ba dang / /'khor lo rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / /ral gri kun tu skrag byed nyid/ /dung dang brgyad du shes
par bya/ /rigs kyi phyag rgya yin par bshad/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi gzugs yongs su brje ba dang phyag mtshan dang phyag rgya
bstan pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro mchog gi go 'phang ni/ /gang gis yang dag shes
pa yis| |mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig la gnas pa'o/ /dmar zhing ser ba'i bud med gang / /pad+ma'i dri ni rnam par gtor/ /lta stangs rang bzhin
zhi ba dang / /zhen par lta ba'i rjes 'gro ba/ /bud med gang zhig ser mo dmar/ /de bzhin skye bo kun la brtse/ /khyim du pad+ma 'bri ba ni/ /pad+ma gar dbang rigs byung yin/ /
smin ma'i dbus na rtse gsum yod/ /lus kyi mdog ni skya bsangs dang / /rtag tu rdo rje rigs sgom pa/ /gang gi khyim du rdo rje 'bri/ /rtag par mchod pa byed pa yi/ /mkha'
'gro ma de dpal ldan ni/ /he ru ka yi rigs byung yin/ /gang gi dpal bar rtse gsum ni/ /mdung thung dag kyang snang gyur cing / /mig dmar mdog ni dmar ser yang //
de bzhin rkang pa lag pa dmar/ /ra skyes khyim bya dag la yang / /rtag tu yod na dgar gyur cing / /de yi khyim du rdo rje'i mtshan/ /rtag tu gang zhig mchod byed pa/ /shrI he
ru ka'i gzugs las byung / /mkha' 'gro yin par gdon mi za/ /'khor lo gang gi dpral ba 'am/ /lag par yang ni snang gyur pa/ /sbrin sngon dag dang 'dra pa ste/ /
rtag tu dbral bar dar 'ching ba/ /skal pa chen por kun tshogs shing / /mchog tu bde ba gang yin dang / /khyim du 'khor lo 'bri byed cing / /rtag tu de la mchod byed pa//
rdo rje bag mo'i rigs byung ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi stobs kyis dregs/ /gang zhig smin ma snag 'dra zhing / /so ni dkar zhing mtho ba dang / /g.yon pa rtag tu ma rungs pa/ /snying stobs
ldan par gyur pa dang / /rtag tu khrus la dga' ba dang / /mang du smra bar mi byed cing / /khyim du rdo rje 'bri ba dang / /rtag tu dge bas mchod byed pa/ /rdo rje phag mo'i rigs byung ba/ /
stong phrag bcu dang ldan pa yin/ /ser zhing ser gyi mdog 'drar snang / /mig mi g.yo zhing kha spu ser/ /rdo rje gang gi dbral ba 'am/ /lag par yang ni snang gyur pa/ /rtag
tu rgyal srid dag la gnas/ /snyems shing bden par smra ba dang / /mA li ka yi dri byung zhing / /gang gi khyim du rdo rje ni/ /rtag tu 'bri zhing cher mchod pa/ /khaN+Da ro hi'i rigs
las byung / /rnal 'byor ma yi dbang phyag mchog /gang zhig rtag par sha la dga'/ /skem zhing smin ma nag po'i mdog /dpral bar mdung rtse lta bu yod/ /gan gzhig
gdug pa'i las la dga'/ /rtag tu dur khrod dag tu 'gro/ /'jigs pa med cing rtog med de/ /gang gi dpral bar thig le dang / /khyim du thad pa 'bri zhing mchod/ /dpal
ldan he ru ka de yi/ /mkha' 'gro'i rigs las byung ba yin/ /srin gyi mdog 'dra'i bud med gang / /so ni mi mnyam par gnas shing / /rtag tu gdug pa'i las la
dga'| |g.yon gyi mche ba gtsigs pa dag /de yi khyim du dgra sta ni/ /'bri zhing rta tu mchod byed pa/ /rnam par 'dren pa'i rigs byung
ba'i| |mkha' 'gro yin par the tshom med/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni tshogs 'di dag/ /shrI he ru ka'i rigs las byung / /sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir/ /gsang ba'i mtshan nyid
sprul pa yin/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi kha dog gi mtshan nyid dang / mtshan ma'i nges pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste
bco brgyad pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /lA ma yi ni khyad par du/ /sgrub po gang gis yan lag gi /cha shas yang dag par shes
pa'o| |gang gi bzhin ni yongs rgyas par/ /kun nas zlum por snang gyur cing / /kha yi sma ra rtag par yod/ /spu dang smin ma ring ba dang / /gos bzang gtsang zhing zhi ba
dang | |mi g.yo bden par smra ba dang / /rtag tu dam pa'i chos la dga'/ /de ni dpa' bo'i sring mor bshad/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya sbyin bya ba/ /yang na rus sbal phyag rgya bya//
pags pa ril ba spyi blugs nyid/ /phyag rgya'i lan du brjod pa yin/ /de ni tshes bcu'i dus tshigs la/ /khyim du pad+ma 'dri bar 'gyur/ /lA ma'i bud med rnams kyi ni//
mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin/ /mchu gnyis rlo zhing mig dkyus ring / mig ni dmar zhing ser skyar gnas/ /phyug cing skal bzang phan yon can/ /dkar zhing tsam pa lta bur
snang / /shin tu ring min thung ba'ang min/ /sna tshogs pa yi gos la dga'/ /dpral bar ri mo gsum yod cing / /mtshams na gyen du bsten pa las/ /dgod cing dga'
ba nyid dag dang / /lam ni rnam par gnon cing gnas/ /g.yul du 'chi ba rnams kyi ni/ /gtam dag la ni rtag tu dga'/ /de ltar rab dregs mthong nas ni/ /mdung gi phyag
rgya bstan par bya/ /rkang pa g.yon pa bskum pa yi/ /gar nyid kyang ni bstan par bya/ /g.yon pa dag nas yongs bzlog pa/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad/ /bcu bzhi
dang ni tshes brgyad ni/ /de yi dus tshigs yin par bshad/ /khyim du mdung rtse gsum pa yang / /bris nas de ni rtag tu mchog /'jig rten dbang phyug la ma yi/ mtshan nyid gyur
pa 'di dag yin/ /gang gis mkhur tshos dag tu ni/ /khung bur snang ba'ang gnas gyur cing / /de bzhin rtag tu dmar zhing ser/ /mig ni ljang ser dag tu snang / /skra ni de
bzhin 'khyil pa dang / /mgo dang dpral bar dar bcings snang / /ri mo gcig par rab tu gnas/ /de bzhin mgrin pa ring ba dang / /rtag tu gos dmar la dga' zhing / /dgod
cing glu ni len pa nyid/ /glo bur du ni khro ba dang / /sems ni rnam par g.yo ba dang / /rtsod pa la ni dga' ba ste/ /'di 'dra'i rab dregs mthong nas ni/ /
mdung gi phyag rgya rab sbyin bya/ /gnyis pa nyid ni 'bad pa yis/ /dril bu'i phyag rgya rab sbyin bya/ /g.yon gyi phyogs su bzlog pa yin/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad/ /thung
zhing byin pa sbom pa dang / /rtag tu gos ser la dga' zhing / /phrag pa dag nas gos kyang 'phyang / /de 'dra'i bud med mthong nas ni/ /'khor lo'i phyag rgya bstan bya zhing / /'bad
pa yis ni gnyis pa yang / /dung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /g.yon nas yongs su bzlog pa ni/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad/ /bcu bzhi de yi dus yin te/ /de
yi khyim du rdo rje 'bri/ /shrI he ru ka lA ma yi/ /mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin/ /lus kun la ni ba spu yod/ /mig ni nag cing ser ba dang / /spom zhing rnam 'gyur
mi bzad pa/ /bzhin 'phel che zhing kha che la/ /gsus pa rlo zhing kha dog nag /mig zlum sna ni nyams pa dang / /rtag tu glu la mkhas pa dang / /sprin gyi mdog can yid
'phrog pa/ 'di 'dra'i rab dregs mthong nas ni/ /glu yi phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /gnyis pa yang ni 'bad pa yis/ /mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /g.yon nas yongs
su bzlog pa ni/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad/ /de yi dus tshigs bcu gcig ste/ /khyim du mche ba 'bri bar byed/ /rdo rje phag mo lA ma yi/ /mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di

dag yin/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /lag pa g.yon gyi brda rnams ni/ /gang gis shes pas yang dag par/ /ming sring du ni de bzhin 'gyur/ /gang gis lag g.yon ston pa
ni| |gsong por smra zhes ston pa yin/ /gang zhig srin lag ston pa ni/ /gsong por smra ba'i lan 'gyur yin/ /gang zhig lto ba rdeb pa ni/ /bdag nyid bkres par
ston pa yin/ /gang zhig dpral pa ston pa ni/ /nam mkha' las ni 'ongs zhes pa'o/ /gang zhig khar ni sor mo 'jug /zos zin zhes ni smra ba yin/ /gang zhig lce ni bskyod pa
dag |za'o zhes ni smra ba yin/ /gang zhig pus mo la reg pa/ /ngal lo zhes ni ston pa ni// gan zhig sor mo'i rtsal reg /ngal sogs zhes ni smra ba yin/ /gan zhig so ni 'cha' phyed
pa| |bza' yis zhes ni ston pa yin/ /gang zhig pa ti sa ston pa/ /de ltar gyis zhes ston pa yin/ /gang zhig khro gnyer ston pa ni/ /bcings so zhes ni ston pa yin/ /gang zhig
mkha' lding ston pa ni/ /grol lo zhes ni ston pa yin/ /gang zhig khu tshur ston pa ni/ /de la ba ti'i so bstan bya/ /rnam par 'gyur ba bltas
nas ni| |gang zhig sgra ni ston pa yi/ /kha T+wAM ga ni de la bstan/ /gang zhig yan lag bskyod pa dang / /de la mche ba gnyis bstan bya/ /gang zhig lag pas lag pa
ston| |gtor ma za zhes smra ba yin/ /gang zhig lag pa g.yas pa ston/ /de ltar gyis zhes smra ba yin/ /gang zhig rna ba la reg pa/ /gnas par bya zhes ston pa yin//
gang zhig sen mos sen mo reg /shi yi khyer ces smra ba yin/ /gang zhig sa 'di dkyil 'khor du/ /de ring 'jug ces smra ba yin/ /gang zhig nu ma la reg pa/ /bdag
gi bu ni srung zhes bya/ /gang zhig g.yon mtheb sa la 'bri/ /bla ma'i skye bos nga srungs smra/ /gang zhig mig ni rnam 'dzum byed/ /de ltar byos zhes smra ba yin/ /gang
zhig tshigs la reg pa ni/ /bde bar nyal zhes smra ba yin/ /pho nya mo ni gang yang rung / /de dag kun gyis yang dag spyad/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/
rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi lag pa'i phyag rgya'i brda'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu ba'o// //de nas gsang ba chen po yi/ /lta ba nga yis bshad
par bya| |bud med spyi gtsug reg byed pa/ /mgo bo de la bstan par bya/ /gang zhig dpral pa ston pa ni/ /de la mkhur tshos bstan par bya/ /gang zhig so ni ston pa na/ /de la
lce ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig mchu ni ston byed pa/ /de la kos ko bstan par bya/ /gang zhig mgrin pa ston byed pa/ /lto ni de la bstan par bya/ /gang zhig lag pa ston byed
pa| |de la dpung pa bstan par bya/ /gang zhig sum rked ston byed pa/ /de la rgyab ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig nu ma ston byed pa/ /de la kos ko bstan par bya/ /gang
zhig lto ba ston byed pa/ /de la lte ba bstan par bya/ /gang zhig gsang ba ston byed pa/ /de la ling+ga bstan par bya/ /gang zhig brla ni ston byed pa/ /de la 'phongs ni
bstan par bya/ /gang zhig pus mo ston byed pa/ /de la byin pa bstan par bya/ /gang zhig rkang pa ston byed pa/ /de la rkang mthil bstan par bya/ /gang zhig sor tshigs
ston byed pa/ /de la sor mo bstan par bya/ /gang zhig sa ni ston pa na/ /de la nam mkha' bstan par bya/ /gang zhig nam mkha' ston byed pa/ /de la nyi ma bstan
par bya| |gang zhig 'bab chu ston byed pa/ /de la rgya mtsho bstan par bya/ /'di dag mkha' 'gro ma yi ni/ /lus kyi phyag rgya the tshom med/ /'di dag rtag bstan gsang
ba ste| |yang dag ston par 'gro bar 'gyur/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /yan lag gi mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'i le'u ste
nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /yan lag phyag rgya'i cho ga bzhin/ /gang zhig shes pas ming po'am/ /srid mor
the tshom med 'gyur ba'o/ /sor mo gcig ni ston pa yis/ /legs par 'ongs zhes smra ba yin/ /sor mo gnyis ni bstan pa yis/ /legs 'ongs lan ni smra ba
yin| |'di ni rnal 'byor ma kun gyi/ /yan lag phyag rgyar rab tu bshad/ /g.yon gyi gung mo brkyang ba la/ /cung zad mdzub mo bskum pa ni/ /mig gi phyag rgyar
shes par bya/ /sngags pas de la de bstan te/ /do mod ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar/ /dbang du 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /gang zhig gung mo ston byed pa/ /de la mdzub
mo bstan par bya/ /gang zhig srin lag ston byed pa/ /de la lce ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig pa ti'i sa ston pa/ /de la mdun ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig spyi po
ston byed pa/ /de la mtshams kyi mtha' bstan bya/ /gang zhig sa ni ston byed pa/ /de la mkha' ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig khro gnyer ston byed pa/ /de la mtshams
kyi mtha' bstan bya/ /gang zhig so ni ston byed pa/ /de la mchu ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig mgrin pa ston byed pa/ /de la kha ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig dpral ba ston
byed pa| |de la mig ni bstan par bya/ /'di ni rnal 'byor ma kun gyi/ /rim bzhin yan lag phyag rgya yin/ /'di dag rtag bstan gsang ba pa/ /yang dag lta bar 'gro
bar 'gyur/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /khyad par gyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// //de nas yang
dag bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rnam rol pa/ /gang gis rig nas ring nas kyang / /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i sring mo ru'o/ /dam tshig can gang rjes chags pa/ /dpa'
bo'i longs spyod sa gzhi yin/ /gzhi ni sa gzhir byas nas su/ /rnal 'byor pa yi sdom pa mchod/ /'di dag rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi/ /go ldog pa yis lta ba
ni| |bzhin ni rnam par 'gyur ba nyid/ /bde ba rtag pa smin ma g.yo/ /sna tshogs myur du shes bya ba/ /de bzhin mkha' 'gro las byung ba'o/ /rnam 'gyur bskor
bar shes bya ste/ /ri mo gsum pa yongs su zlum/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams nges 'gro ba'i/ /de yi mtshan ma kun shes bya/ /glo bur rnam par ldog 'gyur te/ /sngar
bzhin gdong ni 'jig gyur pa/ /rnam pa de lta de yi ni/ /gang gi rdo rje lta bur gsal/ /sgra ni khu byug skad lta bur/ /mchog tu gsal
bar de'i de nyid/ /'di yi mtshan ma khyim du ni/ /rdo rje lta bur me long bcas/ /gnyis par yang ni gyur pa yang / /ral gri 'dra bar me long bcas/ /rgyal mtshan mdung
'drar rtag tu 'byung / /me long kha sbyar bar shes bya/ /mtshan mar byas pa'i gzugs rnams ni/ /mdor bsdus rnam par shes bya ste/ /mtshan nyid 'di dag dang
ldan pa| |mkha' 'gro ma mchog yin zhes bya/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i khyad par gyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid kyi cho
ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas gzhan skad brda rnams ni/ /sgrub po la 'dir bshad bya ba/ /gang gis ming po'am ma sring mo
ni| |the tshom med par shes 'gyur ba'o/ /po ting+ga zhes bya ba ni/ /gsong por smra ba'o/ /pra ti po ting+ga zhes bya ba ni/ /gsong por smra ba'i lan no/ /ga mu zhes bya ba ni/
'gro'o zhes smra ba yin no/ /lum pa zhes bya ba ni/ /'ong ngo zhes brjod pa yin no/ /de haM zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer zhes smra ba'i lan no/ /tsa tu ka zhes bya ba ni/ zungs
cig ces smra ba yin no/ /bI rA Na zhes bya ba ni/ snying nyid do/ /mA ra Na zhes bya ba ni/ smra ngan no/ /kar+Ni ka ni/ dril bu'o/ /ka ra NaM ni/ /phag pa'i za ba'o/ /shra ba Na ni/ rna
ba'o| |a mr-i ta naM ni/ bdud rtsi'i gnas so/ /sa mA ga mA ni/ mi'o/ /tA li ka ni/ mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /na ra kaM ni/ dkyil 'khor ro/ /a mu kaM ni/ dur khrod do/ /kA
khi la ni/ sgo'o/ /shwa sa naM ni/ bram ze'i rigs so/ /pa ri di ni/ rgyal rigs so/ /bi ra ta ni/ rje rigs so/ /kru ra ni/ /dmangs rigs so/ /an+tas+tha ni/ sme sha can no//
pa shu li ka ni/ khyim mo/ /b+ha gi ni/ mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /me da ka ni/ chu'o/ /gr-i ha de ni/ phyag rgyas 'debs pa'o/ /lce so la reg pa ni/ bdag cag ltogs so//
zhes ston pa'o/ /gan+Da pa si ni/ sred pa'o/ /kun ta ni/ gnas che ge mo nas 'ongs so zhes bya'o/ /ki ra Na ni/ me tog go /tu laM pa ni/ dgod pa'o/ /da ro ni/ so'o//
ni ro d+ha ni/ char 'bab bzlog pa'o/ /tri pa ti ni/ zhu ba'o/ /d+hU ra yu ni/ phyi rol lo/ /d+hU pa tri ya ni/ sprin no/ /sA nu ni/ ri bo'o/ /sa ri ta ni/ 'bab chu'o//
