ang+gu li ni/ yan lag go /ba da na ni/ gdong ngo / /rA dzA ka ni/ lce'o/ /a da na ni/ /so'o/ /pak+ti ni/ rgyal mtshan no/ /tshAn+d+ro ni/ phreng ba'o/ /tsa la ni/ rlung ngo / /pra ba
ha ni| gru'o/ /pa shu ni/ ri dwags so/ /ya ti ni/ dkyil 'khor ro/ /so sa ni/ bzhi mdo'o/ /phal gu shaM ni/ skye ba'o/ /ma hA k+Sha raM ni/ phyugs
chen po'o/ /ga ni/ ra skyes so/ /nA zhes bya ba ni/ mi'o/ /go zhes bya ba ni/ khyu mchog go /ma zhes bya ba ni/ ma he'o/ /b+ha ni/ za ba'o/ /ha rnam grangs so/ /a p+pa ka
ni| rgyal po'i skyes bu'o/ /brang la reg pa ni/ nags na gnas pa'o/ kha la reg pa ni/ zos so zhes pa'o/ /so la reg pa ni/ ngoms so zhes pa'o/ /ho zhes pa ni/
rnam grangs te/ kha cig tu'o/ /hri ni/ ngo tsha'o/ /stong pa la reg pa ni/ med do zhes pa'o/ /brla la reg pa ni/ mi thun gyis shig pa'o/ /steng nyid ni/ /de bzhin no zhes
pa'o| |e ba zhes bya ba ni/ 'og na med pa'o/ /phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan gsang ba'i brda nyid de dpa' bos gsungs pa sde bzhi'i mtshan nyid do/ /dpal he ru ka'i
nges par brjod pa las/ sde bzhi'i mtshan nyid thams cad kyi brda'i tshig gi brdar btags pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de nas
don kun 'dod pa yi/ /sbas pa brgyad mthar sbyar ba ste/ /mos pa dman pa'i sems can dag /rmongs shing mi shes sems ldan la'o/ /de la dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor
ma rnams kyi gsal bar gsungs pa'i gsang sngags ni/ 'di yin te/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te wI re shA ya/ ma hA kalpa ag+ni saM ni d+gA ya/ dza TA ma ku Tot+ka TA ya/ daMSh+Ta ka rA

lo gra b+hI Sha Na mu khA ya/ /sa ha sra b+hu dza b+hA su rA ya/ pa ra shu pA sho d+ya ta shU la kha T+wAM ga d+ha ri Ne/ byA g+hA dzi nA m+ba ra d+ha rA ya/ ma hA d+hu m+b+rAn+d+ha kA ra wa puShA ya/ ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/

ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ tra sa ya tra sa ya/ k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya/ hrauM hrauM/ hraHhraHphaiM phaiM/ phaT phaT/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+ha k+Sha b+ha k+Sha/ ba sa ru d+hi rA n+t+ra mA lA ba lam+bi ne/ gr-ih+na gr-ih+na/

sap+ta pA tA la ga ta b+huM dza ga /sarba m+bA tar+dz+dza ya/ tar+dz+dza ya/ A kaD+D+h+ya AD+D+h+ya/ hrIM hrIM/ dz+NauM dz+NauM/ k+Sh+mAM k+Sh+mAM/ hAM hAM/ hIM hIM/ hUM hUM/ ki li ki li/ si li si li/ hi li hi li/ d+hi li
d+hi li| hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyi gsang ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas
gzhan yang 'jig rten ni/ /gsum po dag na yod min pa'i/ /shrI he ru ka'i sngags shes na/ /gsang sngags thams cad yongs 'dor ba'o/ /lugs 'byung lugs
las ldog pa yis/ /pho nya rnams ni yang dag gnas/ /'og dang steng gi dngos grub ster/ /bdag gi pho nya mo kun 'gro/ /pho nya mo de don kun steng / /mthong dang de
bzhin reg pa dang / /tsuM pa na dang rtag par 'khyud/ /rnal 'byor gnas kyi khyad par nyid/ /ji snyed rnal 'byor tshogs rnams ni/ /thams
cad dngos grub byed par bshad/ /bden dngos thams cad sbyin bya ste/ /gzhan du nam yang ma yin no/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo dang / /chung ma pho nya mo gnas la/ /
gang la rtag tu sngags sbyin pa/ /de yi de nyid cho ga bshad/ /de nas rnal 'byor rgyud du ni/ /rnyed dka'i dam tshig nga yis bshad/ /skyes pa bud med g.yon nas
'gro/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub ster bar byed/ /khyim dang zhing du rnam gnas pa/ /shin tu ring yang shes par 'gyur/ /he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor mchog /slob
dpon rnal 'byor ma nyid yin/ /rgyud 'di ru ni sgrub pa po/ /legs par gyur pa nyid yin te/ /brnyas mi bya zhing spang mi bya/ /nus pa yis ni mchod par bya/ /kA ka'i
gdong sogs brgyad po ni/ /grol dang dad pa 'phel byed pa/ /rtag par dngos grub rnams kyi rgyu/ /dam tshig rnams kyang skyong bar byed/ /lha mo gzhan yang kun sbyor
ba| |rnam par rmongs pas 'dod pa min/ /gnyis su med dang thogs med min/ /dam tshig spyad pa spyad bya ba/ /bud med dbang phyug legs par sbyor/ /tshangs spyod de
bzhin bsam gtan de/ /khro med sbubs su kun tu spyod/ /'di brgyud dam tshig kun spyod yin/ /sgrub pa la ni gnas pa yi/ /sgrub pa pos ni rtag shes bya/ /rgyud rnams
thams cad thun mong ste/ /rgyu med par ni gzhom mi bya/ /dad pa nyid kyis blang bya yi/ /mig dang lag pas ma yin no/ /gsang pa 'di ni mi bstan cing / /rab tu 'bad de
bstan par bya/ /blo ldan mthe'u chung bskyod pa ni/ /pho nya mo rnams yang dag gnas/ /ngag dang ma dag 'dres pa ste/ /sgrub pa po ni gsum du gnas/ /mnyes byed rnam
par dag pa dang / /gsol byed yon tan ldan pa'i mi/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /slob ma yongs su brtag pa dang sdom pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu
rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas dpa' bo'i spyod brtul zhugs/ /rnal 'byor ma kun rab sgrub pa/ /mtshan nyid dbye ba shes byas nas/ /dngos sgrub myur du
'jug byed ni/ /grong dang grong du de song nas/ /pho nya'i gzugs ni mtshon par bya/ /pho nya ral gri'i so 'dra zhing / /dag byed bsod nams 'phel byed yin/ /de bzhin pho nya
legs 'grogs pas/ /sgrub pa po yis dngos grub 'thob/ /bzlas brjod bsam gtan mchod med par/ /myur pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas sgrub
pa po| |mchod pa nyid la rab tu 'jug /'di las gzhan pa'i mchod med de/ /de ltar bstan bcos nges pa yin/ /pho nya'i lam la dga' rnams kyi/ /sgrub pa po ni dngos
grub brtson/ /rig sngags phyag rgyar yang dag ldan/ /tsa ru rtag tu bza' bar bya/ /sgrub po shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /rigs rnams kun la spyad par bya/ /bza' min par ni mi brtag go /de
nyid dbyer med de yis ni/ /pho nya mo ni gnyis bsgrub bya/ /dngos grub cho ga la spyad tshe/ /pho nya gcig pu kho na yin/ /rang dga' nyid dang dngos grub ni/ /sgrub pa dag dang nye ba ste/ /bla
ma brgyud rim gyis thob pa'i/ /dbang bskur bas ni sngags legs ldan/ /pho nya rnams su yang dag bshad/ /phyag rgyar legs sbyor ngang tshul can/ /legs rdzogs ye
shes rgyu skyes pa'o/ /nang bar sngar langs sems bdag nyid/ /lus la thams cad byas nas ni/ /yan lag las 'das mtshon cha rnams/ /lus la gnas pa kun tu spyad/ /lus
ni dag byed byas nas su/ /rtag tu sngags ni brjod nas su/ /rnal 'byor gnas rnams nges bstan cing / /mtshon cha rnams ni bsgom mi bya/ /dam tshig can la khro mi bya/ /mngon
par brtson las 'da' mi bya/ /de dang lhan cig bde bar bya/ /grol ba'i don dang bde don du/ /dam tshig spyod pa nyid du bya/ /rnam 'phrul sems pa las grol zhing / /mtshan mo

rtag par gcer bu ste/ /nag dang dmar bar rtag tu 'gyur/ /srog chags yan lag na bzar gyon/ /mgul rgyan gdu bu dpung rgyan dang / /rna cha tshangs pa'i skud pa dang / /mgo bo'i phreng bas mgul du brgyan/

skye rag sil sil sgra sgrog cing / /ral pa'i cod pan dar gyis bcings/ /bcos ma'i skra la sogs pas brgyan/ /rdo rje thod pa kha T+wAM bcas/ /Da ma ru rdung hUM sgra sgrog/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo thams cad ni/ /go cha

gsum gyis brgyan pa yin/ /bde ba 'dod pas bde bskyod bya/ /mchod phyir thogs ni yongs spangs la/ /gtsang sbra shrI he ru kar gnas/ /phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /sgrub pa po yis dngos grub brtson/ /
mgul rgyan gdu bu rna rgyan dang / /spyi bor nor bus rnam par brgyan/ /mchod phyir thogs dang thal ba dang / /dus kun tu ni rnam par gnas/ /mtshan mo rtag par gsal bya zhing / /nyin par gsang ba nyid
du bya| |dbye ba'i ye shes shin tu slas/ /rab tu zhi zhing ngal ba thul/ /gtsang sgra gsum du shes bya zhing / /rang gi rgyun bzhin rnam par gnas/ /rigs dang rigs min ngor mi blta/ /spyi gtsug
la sogs bcings pa spangs/ /pho nya gtsang sbra drang po yin/ /gnyis pa zhi ba lan par 'dod/ /zas gcig tu ni za ba dang / /gtsang sbra gsum pa yin par bshad/ /rnal 'byor pa yis
rtag par ru/ /gtsang sbra 'di dag rtag tu bskyang / /gtsang ma dag pa'i rim thob na/ /dngos grub gang la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nyid bsdus las gang gsungs dang / /de bzhin bde
mchog las gang gsungs/ /gsang ba'i rgyud las yang dag bshad/ /de bzhin dpal mchog dang po dang / /rdo rje 'jigs byed rgyud du ni/ /
bzlas dang brtul zhugs sogs 'grub ste/ /de 'dir bsam gtan tsam gyis ni/ /sngags pas skad cig gis 'grub 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor lam la dga' rnams
kyis| |'di ni gtsang sbra'i sbyod par bshad/ /gtsang sbra'i bsod nams gang gyur pa/ /smra bar nus par 'os ma yin/ /sgrub po'i yon tan rgya chen po/ /kha cig gis
ni smra ba 'am/ /gdong gcig gcig gis brjod de ci/ /stong phrag brgya yi gdong gyur min/ /he ru ka dpal ye shes che/ /rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid kun/ /sgrub
pa po yi bde ba'i chu/ /gnyis med gnyis su med pa nyid/ /gnyis med sbyor bas reg pa ni/ /dag byed sdig pa 'joms byed pa/ /reg pa dang ni smra bas kyang / /sdig pa
kun las rnam grol 'gyur/ /lus dag pa la skyon med pa'i/ /mi mchog kun nas spyod byed pa/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam dag ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa thob po/ /sdig
pa thams cad rnam dag pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs skye zhing / /chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /de ltar rtag tu mchod byas nas/ /gus pa yis ni gtor ma
sbyin| |rang 'dod las la rnal 'byor pas/ /chog ji bzhin sbyin par bya/ /mar gyi ngo yi tshes bcu dang / /zla ba yar ngo'i gang gyur la/ /myur du 'bad pas mchod bya ste/ /rdo
rje phag mo myos byed sha rnams kyis/ /skye bo gus pas de rnams mchod byas pas/ /he ru ka dpal mngon dgar gyur pa la/ /mgu ba'i thugs kyis mchog ni stsol 'gyur
te| |de rnams lag gnas mchog rnams so/ /mtshan mo brtul zhugs can gtor ma/ /skra grol gcer bur gyur pas sbyin/ /shri he ru ka'i bdag nyid du/ /sbyor des ma mo
rnams mnyes 'gyur/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /spyod pa dang / /brtul zhugs dang / mchod pa dang / gtor ma'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun
pa'o|| ||gang yang legs mchod rnam dag dngos/ /mya ngan 'das 'byung dpa' bo ste/ /bdag nyid mchod pa de yis ni/ /sangs rgyas sogs kun
mchod pa yin/ /dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma/ /brtan pa sngon 'gro'i g.yo ba ste/ /zhi ba'i 'dus pas legs gnas pa'i/ /spun dang dpa' bo mchod par bya/ /spun dang bu
dang lhan cig tu/ /bde dang sdug bsngal kun 'byung bya/ /sngags dang phyag rgya nyid dag dang / /ye shes de ni bstan mi bya/ /dag byed zas la bza' bar bya/ /rtag tu dam tshig
spyod byas pa/ /gsang sngags su la'ang sbyin mi bya/ /man ngag nyams par sbyin mi bya/ /dam tshig gnas la don ji bzhin/ /man ngag gnas
kyang sbyin par bya/ /pho nya ma gtogs gzhan dag la/ /'dod la rmongs pas 'gro mi byed/ /pho nya la rtag zhen thar pa/ /'da' ba yis kyang longs spyod bya/ /skye gnas dman
dang gcig shos la'ang / /bsnyen bkur nyid ni bya ba min/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo dang / /chung ma pho nya mo nyid gnas/ /dka' thub nges par zad par 'gyur/ /'khor lo'am
de bzhin grub pa la/ /mchod la lhan cig dgug par bya/ /de ltar rdzas ni rnam nges yin/ /'jig rten la rtag g.yon nas spyod/ /rkang pa g.yon pa sngon du 'dor/ /lag pa
g.yon pa yongs su bsgyur/ /g.yon gyi spyod pas rab mchod byed/ /g.yon pas 'khyud pa tsam dang ni/ /g.yon pa yis ni mchod cing za/ /brtul zhugs ma nyams brtul
zhugs rdzogs/ /sgrub pa po ni bya ba brtson/ /dam tshig rigs la spyod pa dang / /gcig tu zas la spyod par byed/ /rigs lnga la ni kun spyod pa/ /rigs bzhir rab tu brtag
par bya| |rigs gcig la ni kun spyod pa/ /rnal 'byor grub pa rab tu mchod/ /ba lang sha dang rta sha dang / /khyi sha dag dang bya dag gis/ /dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas nas ni/ /
sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig /phyag rgya sngags dang yang dag ldan/ /dpa' bo rnams kyi zas de bzhin/ /shrI he ru ka'i sprul pa ste/ /nyes spyod bstan bcos kun rnams spangs/ /rtag
pa nyid du 'dzin pa ni/ /las rnams kun la srung ba dang / /bgegs med ji bzhin de sgrub pa/ /'dir ni 'gar yang 'grub ma yin/ /de yi pho nya ma mchog bzang / /lhan cig brtson
par ldan pa yin/ /kun nas chags dga'i legs sbyor bas/ /rnal 'byor rdzas kyi rnam 'byed nyid/ /bla ma'i man dag la chags pa/ /de ni don nor sbyin dang mtshungs/ /dpal
he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /nang gi sbyin sreg dang / /rigs gcig dang ldan pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang
bstan pa ni/ /pho nya'i mtshan nyid shes bya ba/ /gang gis yang dag shes 'gyur ba/ /mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig la gnas pa'o/ /ming po dang ni pha ngang yang / /bdag po nyid du
skad cig bshad/ /lce sbom mig ni dmar ser la/ /rtsub cing spu ni dmar ser yin/ /thun mong dngos grub thams cad dang / /bzlas dang brtul zhugs la rtag dga'/ /dran
pa dang ni yang dag ldan/ /pho nya mo sogs go 'phang bcas/ /mkha' 'gro ma mchog nyi shu bzhi/ /spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras rab ster/ /rtsa ba'i sngags ni rtag tu zlos/ /'dod pa'i
don kun sgrub byed pa/ /bdud kun rab tu zhi bar byed/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum/ /rnal 'byor rol pa'i 'bras rab ster/ /gsang
sngags 'di las 'byung ba yin/ /sngags dang phyag rgyar yang dag ldan/ /sgrub pa po ni dngos grub brtson/ /phyag rgya dang bral gsang spags te/ /lus can rnams la
'grub mi 'gyur/ /ji srid dro ba'i bya ba dag/ /mngon par brtson par rtogs par bya/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa'i/ /rnal 'byor che la gang zhig sdang / /khyi yi skye
gnas brgyar skyes te/ /rme sha can du skye bar 'gyur/ /dper na la la mar 'dod pas/ /'bad pas chu ni bsrubs gyur kyang / /mar gsar 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi/ /lus
nyon mongs pa kho nar zad/ /'dzin cing mchod par byed pa ni/ /'tsho ba'i thabs kyi rgyur gyur pa'i/ /rnal 'byor gzhan la bsten pa ni/ /gzhan du de bzhin don med 'gyur//
rnal 'byor che mchog dpa' bo ni/ /yul phyogs gang na gnas gyur pa/ /rigs ngan kla klo yin na yang / /yul de yongs su brtags pa ste/ /sems can yongs su
gzung ba'i rgyur/ /de ru nga ni brtag par gnas/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ pho nya'i mtshan nyid dang / nus pa'i gnas skabs kyi cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa
dgu pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /shin tu rnyed dka'i dgod pa ste/ /gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /myur du dngos grub sgrub byed pa'o/ /sa yi cha ni mnyam yid 'ong / /tsan+dan

gyis ni nye bar byug /dri bzang dri ldan sa la ni/ /me tog sil ma gcal bkram zhing / /mar me'i phreng ba yang dag dkrigs/ /spos kyi dri yis nyams dga' bar/ /bdag gis thams cad byas nas ni/ /phyogs bcing
pa ni byas nas su/ /de nas rdza rnga bcing bya ste/ /ri mo dgu pa yongs su zlum/ /yi ge phyi mo mnyam bris la/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag dgod par bya/ /der gnas pa las dpa' bo ni/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub
byed btu/ /lugs su 'byung dang ldog pa yi/ /dbyangs dang yi ge sgrub pa pos/ /grangs de dag ni nang chud par/ /dge ba thub pas byas nas ni/ /re mig sum cu gnyis pa blang / /lnga pa yis ni
khyad par bya/ /brgya phyed phyed pa yang dag blang / /nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa yis phye/ /re mig gsum cu drug pa blang / /gsum pa yis ni khyad par dbya/ /de nas sum cu gnyis pa blang / /lnga pa yis
ni khyad par bya/ /de nas nyi shu lnga pa gzung / /nyi shu bzhi pa dag dang sbyar/ /sum cu gsum pa yang dag blang / /re mig bco lnga pa yir ldan/ /lnga pa dag dang
yang dag bcas/ /mdzes pa'i mchog ni yin par 'dod/ /nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa dang ldan/ /bcu gcig pa yis mtshan pa'o/ /tshig gi dang po yin par 'dod/ /re mig bcu dgu pa
gzung bya/ /me yi bu dang yang dag ldan/ /re mig gsum pas phye ba'o/ /ya tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon la/ /re mig sum cu drug pa dang / /yang
dag ldan pa'i yi ger gyur/ /slar yang tshig ni de dag nyid/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed yin/ /de nas rang byung blangs nas ni/ /re mig las ni lnga par sbyar/ /spyi bor
nA da thig ler sbyar/ /don kun sgrub ces bya ba yi/ /tshig ni gnyis pa yin par bshad/ /re mig bcu dgu pa nyid la/ /nyi shu rtsa bdun pa yis phye/ /gsum pa dag dang
yang dag ldan/ /sum cu gsum pa legs blangs te/ /re mig gi ni gnyis par sbyar/ /nyi shu pa dang yang dag ldan/ /mdzes pa'i mchog ni yin par 'dod/ /de bzhin
nyi shu gcig pa nyid/ /de bzhin nyi shu drug pa yin/ /lan gnyis bzlas pa'i tshig tu ni/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste btu/ /de nas go rim ldog pas gzung / /re mig
las ni dang po nyid/ /bzhi pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan/ /de bzhin bco lnga ba dang bcas/ /chos don 'dod dang thar pa yi/ /tshig ni gsum pa yin par bshad/ /re mig
gnyis pa'i sa bon dang / /re mig sum cu drug pa nyid/ /de bzhin nyi shu drug pa yang / /sum cu gsum pa yang dag blang / /re mig bcu gsum pa yir ldan/ /re mig
las ni bcu pa nyid/ /go rim ldog pas sgrub pos blang / /re mig las ni bcu dgu pa/ /re mig nyi shu gsum pa la/ /re mig gnyis par yang dag ldan/ /steng du thig les rnam
par brgyan/ /de nas chu yis sa bon gzung / /brgyad pa yang ni de bzhin te/ /me yi bu yis khyad par dbye/ /yi ge hUM gis mtha' ru sbyar/ /'di ni khams gsum rgyal
zhes bya'i/ /sngags tshig bzhi yis rnam brgyan pa'i/ /oM ni kun la gsal byed yin/ /hUM dang phaT ni mthar ru sbyar/ /rig rgyal 'khor los bsgyur ba'i sngags/ /'di ni ma
byung 'byung mi 'gyur/ /de nyid bsdus dang dpal mchog dang / /bde mchog rdo rje 'jigs byed pa/ /khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /skad cig gis ni sku brgyad 'gyur/ /bde
ba'i dkyil 'khor bsrung don du/ /gdug pa thams cad khyad par gyis/ /'di ni rnyed pa tsam gyis kyang / /brtag mi dgos par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /'khor lo'i sbyor bdag

nyid kyis bzla/ /dngos grub kun gyi 'bras skyed pa'o/ /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+na gr-i h+na hUM hUM phaT/ gr-ih+na pa ya gr-ih+na pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho/ /b+ha ga wAn bid+yA rA
dza hUM hUM phaT/ dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /rdza rnga bcing pa'i sngags btu ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// //de nas sha chen thams cad
kyi| |'dzin byed rdo rje skyes yin bshad/ /'di ni gdug pa thams cad kyi/ /'jigs byed mi bzad par bshad do/ /'di ltar khyi dang phag gi
sha| |zangs kyi gtsug phud can de bzhin/ /mngon spyod kyi ni bya ba la/ /bza' dang sbyin sreg gtor ma bya/ /bya ba rnam spyod med par bya/ /ma lus lus pa med grub cing //
rgyal srid thams cad rab grub 'gyur/ /dung dang nya phyis mu tig gi/ /rgyu mtshan gsum po 'byung ba yis/ /chos kyi sku yi lus can gyi/ /thod pa la ni su zhig smod/ /
dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /zla ba phyed pas rgyan du byas/ /rnam pa de ltar gyur pa nyid/ /dpa' bo'i dbang phyug yin par bshad/ /brda ni lnga po bstan pa dag /sgrub pa po
yi lag g.yon gyis/ /'di ni dpa' bo'i gnas yin te/ /brda rnams kyi ni rab 'jug pa 'o/ /khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu dang / /'gro kun g.yon las byung ba yin/ /
rdo rje sems dpa' mthe por bzhugs/ /lcug mar de bzhin rnam snang mdzad/ /go cha'i rnam pa de lta bur/ /gtso bor pad+ma gar mdzad de/ /brtan par dngos grub thams
cad ni| |rab stsal pa yi dpa' bo bzhugs/ /mthe'u chung la ni mkha' snying po/ /mi zad sku dang ldan pa nyid/ /sen mo'i ngos ni rta mgrin gyi/ /gnas su gyur par
bshad pa yin/ /'di dag thams cad dpa' bo ni/ /g.yon pa las zung rgyu yin no/ /lag mthil shrI he ru ka yi/ /phag mo'i 'das pa dga' byed yin/ /rgyab tu shin tu nges byas
nas| |bdag nyid lnga po bstan par bya/ /'di dag lag tu dgod pa ste/ /mdza' ba thams cad 'dus pa yin/ /rnam pa de lta'i cho ga yis/ /dpa' bo dam pa mchod par bya/ /
sa ni spyan zhes bya bar bshad/ /chu khams mA ma kI ru brjod/ /me ni gos dkar mor bshad de/ /rlung ni sgrol mar rab tu brjod/ /tsum pi ka ni stong pa ste/ /de bzhin pha rol phyin
pa yin| |dbus su dpa' bo kun gyi gnas/ /mkhas pas rgyab tu gshegs su gsol/ /gsang ba 'di ni mi bshad cing / /rab tu 'bad de spa bar bya/ /de ltar brda bya
dpa' bo rnams/ /gcig tu zas la brtsam par bya/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa
las| bza' ba dang spyin sreg dang gtor ma'i bya ba la lag pa'i brda'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//
bza' dang ston mo 'dus pa ste/ /yang dag cho ga gang gis ni/ /dngos grub myur du rab 'jug pa'o/ /phyugs rnams kyi ni dgug pa nyid/ /sgrub pos sngar bstan rim pa
'dis| |phyugs rnams dang ni de bzhin lnga/ /bong bu rus sbal mi rnga mo/ /lce spyang rta la sogs rnams kyis/ /dngos grub sgrub pa'i dkyil
'khor du/ /phyugs 'di dag ni sgrub yan lag /rigs rnams las ni rigs mchog phyugs/ /rkang bzhi rnams las glang por brjod/ /'dab chags rnams las dang
pa nyid| |dud 'gro rnams las dud 'gro phyug/ /lha rnams las ni mchu g.yo ba/ /rnam pa de ltar brjod pa ste/ /dngos grub sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /phyugs de dag ni
rnam par bshad/ /khwa dang chu skyar lce spyang dang / /skye gnyis blon po chen po dang / /khrung khrung bzhad dang ka dam pa/ /bza' dang sbyin sreg gtor bya bas/ /'dod pa dag ni
'grub par 'gyur/ /khyi nag po yi 'o thug ni/ /ma sha'i 'bras ni nag por ldan/ /'dod pas dogs pa med pa ru/ /ji srid brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar/ /ro yi khar ni sbyin sreg
bya| |de nas yi dwags langs nas ni/ /sgrub po de la 'di byed de/ /ci bgyi zhes ni smra 'gyur zhing / /sa 'og las sam ral gri 'am/ /tshar gcod phan 'dogs nyid dag
dang / /ril bu mig sman gter rnams sam/ /rkang mgyogs dag gam bcud kyis len/ /dngos 'di de bzhin gcig byin nas/ /'gro bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ /steng
du 'og tu pho nya 'grub/ /rgyud 'dir the tshom med pa yin/ /ba lang gnas dang lding pa nyid/ /lhag ma skam po rtsa de nas/ /bde ba chen po'i ngo bor bya/ /yang na rus sbal dag gi 'o/ /'di de
dngos grub sbyin 'gyur zhing / /phyag bzhi pa dang zhal bzhi pa/ /ji srid phyag ni 'bum gyi bar/ /sku ni dkar ba'i khro bo che/ /de nas drag shul gzugs 'chang ba/ /rdo rje phag mo la
gzigs pa/ /de yi sku mdog mtshon cha 'chang / /dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /sku la thal bas nye bar byugs/ /ral pa'i cod pan mdung dang ldan/ /phyag rgya yis ni sku la
brgyan| |zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs/ /yi dwags chen po gdan du bya/ /sgrub pa po yis dus rtag tu/ /sngags de shes nas bsgom par bya/ /de lta'i yon tan khyad 'phags
pas| |'dod pa yi ni dngos grub 'gyur/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /dud 'gro phyugs dang ro langs sgrub pa dang / /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum
cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas sgrub po'i mchog kun ni/ /sbyor ba kun la med pa'o/ /bza' dang bca' dang nya sha sogs/ /nus pa ji bzhin bya ba ste/ /
med par gyur kyang bza' ba ni/ /lnga po nyid du bya ba yin/ /bza' dang bca' pa rgya che ba/ /rtag tu mtshan mo nyid du bya/ /de nas pho nya rab sbyin zhing / /khyad par du ni sgrub pa po/ /rang
gi bang du mgo bzhag la/ /dpa' bo gnyis med rab tu mchod/ /ma 'am yang na sring mo 'am/ /nu mo'am yang na chung ma gnyen/ /rnam pa
'di lta'i cho ga yis/ /bcings pa las ni rab grol bya/ /de nas sngags 'di 'grub 'gyur te/ /ji srid 'byung ba yod bar du'o/ /slob dpon lus su legs gnas
te| |sgrub pa po las mchod pa len/ /dpa' bo rnams kyi stan dag dang / /phyag rgya nyid du the tshom med/ /sgrub po shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /glu dang gar la sogs pa
bya| |ji srid lus can thams cad kyang / /rnal 'byor ye shes zhen ma gyur/ /de srid 'khor bar 'khor 'gyur zhing / /sdug bsngal mya ngan gyis g.yengs 'gyur/ /
dngos po kun gyis sgrub pa pos/ /de nas phyag rgya mchod par bya/ /mchod pas mchod par 'dod pa ste/ /brnyas pa yis ni nges par sreg /rnal 'byor rgyud du mi rnams
kyi| |phyag rgya chen po dang po 'grub/ /rab tu 'bad pas mchod par bya/ /phyi nas dpa' bo rnams kyis ni/ /dpa' bo nyid la spyad par bya/ /de ltar mchod byas de nas ni//
sa 'og sgrub po langs pa dang / /zhi ba nyid dang rgyas pa dang / /dpa' dang dgug pa dag dang ni/ /bsad dang bskrad pa la sogs dang / /rmugs dang rengs ba de bzhin te/ /
dbye ba nyid dang tshar gcad dang / /las kyi dngos sgrub mchod par bya/ /gang ci'ang rung pa'i las gyur la/ /nyon mi rmongs par 'grub 'gyur te/ /the tshom med par sgrub pa po'i/ /
dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur gyi mchod pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gsum
pa'o|| ||de nas mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i/ /'khor lo zhes pa'i cho ga rgyas/ /las gang ci yang de myur bar/ /sgrub pa po ni the tshom med/ /dpa' bo kun dang
rnal 'byor ma/ /pad+ma'i lte bar nges par sbyar/ /smin ma'i dbus su gzhug par bya/ /a ba d+hU ti'i gnas de bzhin/ /dpa' bo'i 'chol bar byas chags par/ /bza'
ba yang ni de nas sreg /go mAM dang ru d+hi ra/ /'bad pas bsreg bya lnga dag bya/ /de nas 'bar ba'i byin sa la/ /sreg blugs dgu ni sbyin par bya/ /'bar phreng rgya mtsho
blta bar bya/ /kun nas sgo yi 'khor lo nyid/ /dpa' bo'i dbang po zhal bzhi pa/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i gnas de bzhin/ /'dab la pho nya mo bzhi yin/ /dpa' bo kun
dang gnyis med bde/ /cho ga ji bzhin rnam pa yis/ /khaN+Ta ro hi phyi rol ni/ /rang gi gzugs su rnam zhugs pa/ /'khor lo'i dbus su blta bar bya/ /'khor lo 'di dag
gsal bar ni/ /rim pa ji lta ba bzhin bya/ /rig pa'i rgya mtsho'i las de bzhin/ /mdor bsdus nas ni gsungs pa yin/ /pho nya gnyis med sbyor

ba'i bdag /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ pho nya mo'i sbyin sreg dang las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de nas las kyi rab mchog ni/ /ji bzhin rim gyis mtshon pa ste/ /mchod pa gnyis med sbyor ba'i bdag /las ni so sor sbyar bar bya/ /gang dag rab grub byed pa'i sngags//
de yi dbye ba rim bzhin bshad/ /kha dog pho nya sogs sngags gang / /mda' yi shugs kyis yongs su 'khor/ /phan tshun mdud rgyud dpa' bo ni/ /yul nyid kyis ni phye
ba'o| |sa bon phreng bas de nas bzung / /hUM ni mthar ru gnas pa yin/ /bsgrub bya 'gog par gyur pa ni/ /gom pa gcig kyang mi 'gro 'o/ /kha sbyar sbyar bar gyur pa dang / /rdo
rje'i lu gu rgyud bcings pas/ /rdo rje dbye ba nyid dang ni/ /de bzhin bud ba ltar 'khor bya/ /lcags kyu nyid kyis dgug pa dang / /gtun shing gis bskyod de bzhin te/ /rdo rje nyid
kyis 'dabs par bshad/ /dbug la mdas ni sbyar bya ste/ /dus min 'chi ba blu ba la/ /yan lag kha T+wAM ga dang sbyar/ /thod pa'i mchod yon snod du ni/ /zhal du mtshon cha

nges par sbyar/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ gnyis su med pa'i las dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba blu ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas phyag rgya'i mchod chen dang / /sngags kyi dgod pa rab tu grags/ /myur du dngos grub byed par ni/ /phyag rgya'i mchod 'di the tshom med/ /mtshan ma gnyis la sngags sbyar te//
mkha' 'gro dpa' bo gnyis med pa/ /snying po rnams kyis de bzhin du/ /sngags pas mkha' 'gro ma la sbyar/ /blo ldan mkha' 'gro ma bsrub bya/ /dag pa'i lus ni rang 'dod pa/ /dpa' bo mchod pa rnams
byas nas/ /las ni 'bad pa nyid kyis bya/ /rnam dbye rang dgas sngags pa ni/ /phyin ci log tu nges par sbyar/ /tshar gcod phan 'dogs don rnams la/ /las kyi dngos por

rnam par sgom/ /de nyid dbye bar phye nas ni/ /rtsa yi lam du sbyar bar bya/ /rab tu sgrub pa'i sbyor don la/ /phyi rol ji bzhin nang de bzhin/ /'di yis myur du lha dang ni/ /lha min mir bcas bsgrub par bya/ /dpal
he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa dang las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gzugs
ni gnon pa'i cho ga ste/ /phan tshun sbyar ba'i gsang sngags ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang gcig tu sbyar/ /bza' ba zos ming de nas ni/ /bzlas pa'i mthar ni skyug par bya/ /mtshan
mo bdun ni rdzogs pa dang / /bza' dang btung ba dag la sbyar/ /'di yis ji srid 'tsho yi bar/ /dbang du 'gro bar the tshom med/ /ser skya'i
mar ni 'thungs nas su/ /bzlas pa'i mthar ni skyug par bya/ /de yis rang gi gdong bskus nas/ /gal te rtag tu khros gyur pa/ /mthong ba tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur/ /
til mar sA lu btags pa dang / /ldan pas lus ni bskus gyur cing / /snum khur sngags pas byas nas ni/ /bza' ba la ni rab tu sbyar/ /gal te las 'di
ma btang na/ /ji srid 'tsho bar rtag dbang 'gyur/ /til nag dag ni zos nas su/ /ske tsher bcas pa skyugs pa dang / /ru rta bshang ba dang ldan pa/ /las skyes lto ba'i
srin bu ni/ /rang gi khrag dang btags nas ni/ /rang gi khu ba nyid dang sbyar/ /bza' btung mig sman gos la ni/ /byug pa nyid du rab tu sbyar/ /'di yis ji srid
'tsho yi bar/ /dbang du 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /ba lang sha sreg sbyin sreg ni/ /khrag gis bskus na lha rnams ni/ /de mod dbang du 'gyur ba 'am/ /gal te ma
'ongs 'chi bar 'gyur/ /bdag nyid de yi mdun du ni/ /bsgoms nas mkhas pas sbyin sreg bya/ /sbyin sreg mthar ni gtor ma bya/ /khams gsum skad cig gis
'gugs pa/ /mtshan bdun gyis ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /'jig rten gsum na rnyed dka' ba'i/ /dam tshig spyod pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /rtag tu rang sngags sbas pa yis/ /rab tu 'bad de
gsang bar bya/ /sbas don rnyed par mi 'gyur zhing / /skal ba dman pas 'grub mi 'gyur/ /bsod nams chung ba'i sgrub pos kyang / /nga mnyes byas pas rnyed par 'gyur/ /dpal he
ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /nang gi bdag nyid kyi dbang du ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas brda ni mkha' 'gro ma'i/ /lus kyi
mtshan nyid gang yin dang / /dbang po'i yan lag dbye ba ni/ grub par gyur pa de grub 'gyur/ /dpa' bo'i dbang phyug mi bri zhing / /rnam pa kun tu sba bar bya/ /gang gi thad du'ang
mi gdon te/ /g.yon pa'i kun spyod sgrub pa pos/ /gsang ba'i mtshan nyid mkha' 'gro yi/ /sngags rnams bag med pas 'dod na/ /de la nga ni mi blta ste/ /mkha' 'gro stong
phrag du ma yis/ /dan pa'i bdag nyid can de za/ /dam tshig 'joms shing ngan spyod de/ /bram ze gsod par the tshom med/ /sdig spyod rmongs pa'i bdag nyid can/ /lus gyur ngan
ba'i bdag nyid de/ /mkha' 'gro ma yis zos gyur kyang / /de lar ni skyob mi byed/ /gsang ba pa yi nang na ni/ /sgrub po de ni phyugs dang 'dra/ /bla ma dam tshig la 'khu ba/ /sangs
rgyas 'jig rten de las lhung / /he ru ka dpal blta dka'i rgyud/ /gang zhig srung bar byed pa ni/ /mkha' 'gro mar bcas dge sdong zhes/ /de la nga ni rjes su 'dzin/ /bla ma la ni bsnyen
bkur byed/ /gsong por byed pa'i sgrub pa po/ /mkha' 'gro ma la rtag dga' ba/ /de la dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sgrub pa po ni dpa' nyid 'gyur/ /khams gsum mkha' la rgyu ba'i bdag /sgrub po
dpa' bo nyid 'dod pa/ /thams cad du ni mchod par 'gyur/ /de ni rnal 'byor la rab 'jug /yang dag sbyin pa'ang rig par 'gyur/ /he ru ka yi brtul zhugs 'dzin/ /slob dpon dpa' bo mthong
gyur na| |mthong zhing mthong zhing kun tu dga'/ /sgrub pa pos ni sngags 'di yis/ /dpa' bo'i rtsa ba'i gsang sngags mchog /lan bdun du ni brjod par bya/ /rab sngags hUM la sogs pas phye/ /de rnams
'bad de phyag byas na/ /sangs rgyas la sogs thams cad mchod/ /rtag pa nyid du dpa' chen dang / /rol par ldan pa the tshom med/ /de yi thugs kar gnas phag mo/ /nga dang dpa' bo rnal 'byor
ma| |pho nya rnams dang lhan cig bcas/ /de dang gang zhig legs skyes pa/ /srog chags bsod nams mthong ba yin/ /'bab chu'i 'gram dang rgya mtsho dang / /ri bo dang ni bzhi mdo

dang / /lteng ka dang mi khron pa mtshe'u/ /khang stong dang ni lam srang dag /thams cad du ni mkha' 'gro ma/ /kun tu zhen par lta la gnas/ /'jigs pa chen po dur khrod du/ /mkha' spyod de bzhin sa 'og dang /
ro langs kyang ni du ma zhig /'jigs pa'i gzugs dang stobs chen pos/ /de dag lhan cig dpa' bo che/ /ci bde bar ni rol par mdzad/ /ri sul tshang tshing gsang ba dang / /rnal
'byor ma dang gsang ba'i mi/ /phyogs ni de dang de dag tu/ /sgrub pa po dang sa steng rol/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub pa'i sa dang gsang ba'i
dpa' bo'i gnas kyi cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor che/ /sngags kyi rnam pa brgyad kyis dgod/ /de nas 'di la
yang dag mthong / /gsol bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /'jigs pa'i sgra ni rnam mang po/ /mi bzad mkha' 'gro 'jigs byed pa/ /dpa' bo 'jigs par gyur na ni/ /skrag
cing rnam par 'byed par byed/ /gal te dpa' bo mi 'jigs na/ /lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas ni/ /rang gi gnas su khyer nas su/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni de dag dang / /rtag tu mngon
par rtse byed de/ /bde ba can gyi gnas 'gro 'gyur/ /he ru ka dpal gus 'dod pas/ /mkha' la 'gro ba'i gnas su khyer/ /sgrub pa po ni sngags lus can/ /'khor bar 'chi
dang rga ba med/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ blta ba dang ha har dgod pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o// //da ni rab tu bshad bya ba//
gang gis sa steng dbang du 'gyur/ /dpa' bo'i sngags kyi zla ba yis/ /rnal 'byor cho ga gnas pas 'grub/ /sgron ma myos byed bcas pa dang //
nya yi sha dang ldan par ni/ /dpa' dbang gnas skabs thams cad du/ /nyi ma bdun gyis sgrub pa be'i/ /mtshan mo'i sbyin sreg byed la gzhol/ /dngos grub rgya chen gsol
bar 'gyur/ /brgya dang rtsa brgyad ldan nyid kyis/ /thun gsum du ni sgrub byed na/ /rgyal po dpung dang bcas par ni/ /nyin bdun gyis ni dbang du 'gyur/ /byed kyis dpa' bo
blon po ste/ /de yi phyed kyis blon po yi/ /rgyal phran la ni sum cu gnyis/ /sreg pa'i rim gyis sbyin sreg bya/ /nyi shus bram ze nyid la ni/ /nyi ma bdun gyis sbyin sreg
bya| |de bzhin rgyal rigs dag la bdun/ /sbyin sreg lnga po rje rigs la/ /dmangs rigs la ni sbyin sreg gsum/ /tha ma la ni sbyin sreg gcig /de ltar dpa' bos
rigs rim gyis/ /zla ba gcig ni yang dag spyad/ /sngags kyi nus pa sgrub pa pos/ /'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya/ /dpa' bos cho ga snga ma yis/ /'dod pas bsten na thob
bar 'gyur/ /sa steng 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bzhin/ /dpal ldan skal ba bzang por 'gyur/ /sgrub po mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi/ /yid 'ong 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /dpal he ru
ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ rigs lnga po dbang du bya ba dang phyag rgya chen po bsten pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// //de nas las kyi mchog rab ni/ /
gang gis shes na sgrub pa pos/ /dbang dang dgug dang dbye ba dang / /bsad dang bskrad pa la sogs dang / /rmugs dang rengs par bya ba dang / /rmongs dang de bzhin phur bus gdab/ /
tshig 'phrog lkugs par 'gyur ba dang / /'on dang de bzhin long ba dang / /ma ning nyid du bya ba dang / /gzugs ni yongs su 'gyur ba ste/ /las chen bcu gnyis 'di dag ni/ /rtag
tu sgrub pa po yis bsgrubs/ /dngos grub sgrub pa po la ni/ /dran pa 'grub 'gyur gdon mi za/ /thams cad bla ma'i gnas la sogs/ /mkha' 'gro mas ni thams cad khyab/ /
ye shes ldan pa'i rang skye gnas/ /yul dang yul du mngon par skye/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor gtso mo yin/ /de rnams mkha' 'gro ma ru bshad/ /ku lu ta dang dgon pa dang / /sin+d+hu'i
yul dang grong khyer dbang / /gsar gyi gling dang so raSh+Ta/ /de bzhin lha yi khyim dang ni/ /yi dwags grong dang kha ba'i gnas/ /kAny+tsi'am lAM pa ka yi yul/ /ka ling+ka dang ko sa la//
tri sha ku ne o tre dang / /kA ma ru pa mA la wa/ /lha mo'i mkhar dang rA ma'i dbang / /god ba ri arbu ta/ /au D+yan dzA lan+d+ha ra dang / /pu li ra ma la ya sogs/ /yul 'di dag gi bu mo
gang / /dpa' bo gnyis med rnal 'byor ma/ /de kun 'dod pa'i gzugs can te/ /yid kyi shugs kyis 'jug pa yin/ /rnal 'byor ma drug ku
lu tar| |mya ngan yul na ma mo rnams/ /sin+d+hu'i yul na lA ma ste/ /rigs kyi gtso mo na ga rar/ /lAM pa ka dang sauSh+Tar/ /rigs kyi lha mo rnams yin no/ /yi dwags grong dang
nags chen por/ /mkha' 'gro ru pi ka ru bcas/ /kha ba ri dang kAny+tsir ni/ /byis bcas ma ru bshad pa ste/ /pAny+tsa la yi yul dag na/ /khyim gyi lha mo ka ling+kar/ /brtul
zhugs 'dzin pa rnams yin no/ /ko sa lar ni sha za ba/ /yi dwags grong du de bzhin du/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro sbom dbang phyug /tri sha ku ner dum skyes ma/ /pu lir ma la ya
de bzhin/ /gser rir sme sha can rigs skyes/ /bud med stong phrag nyi shu gcig /lhag ma gzhan dag ji srid pa/ /dpal ldan he ru ka yi ni/ /'khor lo'i rnal 'byor ma
yin no/ /he ru ka dpal sbyor ba che/ /de yi dkyil 'khor gtso mo yin/ /mkha' 'gro nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'dis/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten gsum/ /'gro ba kun ni 'di yis
khyab| |mkha' 'gro ma yi dam tshig 'di/ /sprul pa sgom pa nyid yin te/ /bsam gtan la sogs dang ci'ang rung / /sa steng na ni rdzogs 'gyur ba'o/ /g.yon gyi spyod pa
gcer bu yin/ /mtshan mo rtag tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /skyes pa'am gal te g.yon pa kun/ /rnal 'byor ma kun dpa' bo 'gro/ /phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa yis/ /rang
byung rtag tu mchod na ni/ /ma lus lus pa med grub cing / /g.yon pa'i mchod pa la rab 'jug /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dkyil
'khor dgod pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas dpa' bo me tog chu/ /'thungs nas sngags 'di rjes dran bya/ /rtag tu 'di ltar
bya ba nyid/ /phyag rgya lhan cig sgrub pa pos/ /mtshan mo rtag tu sha bza' ba/ /sngags 'di nyid kyis lan gsum bsngags/ /myur du bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /'thungs
dang de bzhin byin pa dang / /reg nas bzhag na gtso mo che/ /bden pas tshangs par spyod pa dang / /thog mar bzhad pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /blta ba'i bsnyems pa grags ldan pa/ /
mtshan mo'ang de bzhin nyin mo ni/ /'dis ni bzhad pa dag tu bya/ /gzugs dang las kyi gsang ba gang / /ji ltar gnas pa dpa' bo nyon/ /rtag tu de yi mchi ma 'byung / /
dad pas de yi spu yang ldang / /rdo rje la ni 'gom mi byed/ /de bzhin gcer bus mchod pa ste/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug thams cad kyi/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi rim pa nyid/ /dbugs
'byin bskul dang dgod pa dang / /sgeg pa'i gar ni ngo mtshar bas/ /sna tshogs gang dag mdun byed cing / /phyag rgya sngags ni rjes dran bya/ /
ha ha he he rnam brgyad bzhad/ /sna tshogs dbang phyug mchog tu dga'/ /hA hA zhes bya 'di nye bar/ /rtag tu mchi ma 'byung ba dang / /de nyid kyis de dgar 'gyur zhing / /bsam
gtan gyi sngags legs par sbyor/ /gtso mo rnams dang dpa' bo ni/ /spu ldang ba dang lhan cig bde/ /rdo rje 'gom par mi bya ba/ /g.yon pas yongs su brtags pa yin/ /
dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ bzhad pa'i sngags dang mkha' 'gro ma'i gzugs kyi sgyu ma'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de
nas spyan ras gzigs bshad de/ /dpa' bo dang ni gnyis med mi/ /gnas kyi dbye ba chog shes/ /sgom la rtag tu mngon dga' ba'o/ /lam gyi bzhi mdo'am khyim bdag
gam| |dpa' bo'i gnas dang ri bor ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yis dam tshig gnas/ /ring po nas kyang gzigs par 'gyur/ /phyag rgyas gcer bu mchod pa yi/ /lag pas
go 'phang dam pa ste/ /gos nyid kyis ni bkab pa'am gzhan/ /'dod pa rnams kyis gos mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin sgra grol gtsor gyur pas/ /las rnams thams cad brtsam
par bya| |rtsa ba'i sngags dang de bzhin gzhan/ /phyogs bcing bar ni 'jug pa yis/ /lha dang lha yi tshogs kyis kyang / /ma mthong bar ni mchod par bgyi/ /snyim pa me tog gis
bkang ste/ /mkha' la spyod la gyen du 'thor/ /me tog de dag ma lhung zhing / /me tog sa la ma mthong na/ /gnas kyi khyad par la gnas dang / /mkha' la 'gro ba stong phrag
gi /gnas la dbang ni byed par 'gyur/ /ngag gi dbang phyug ma rnams dang / /ngag gi dbang phyug 'gugs par 'gyur/ /lha dang lha yi gtam shes shing / /rim pa ji lta
bzhin du 'o/ /skar ma'i rgyu ba shes par 'gyur/ /grong dang grong rdal de bzhin dgon/ /grong khyer dang ni bzhi mdo dang / /shing gcig dang ni dpa' bo'i khyim/ /ri rtse dang ni mtshan
drung du| |snying po'i nye snying rtag dan na/ /lha dang mi yis mthong mi 'gyur/ /de bas yul phyogs 'di dag tu/ /sgrub pa po ni rtag tu gnas/ /yi ge bdun gyi bdag nyid
can| |shing rtser kha dog dmar bsams nas/ /myur du lhung ba mi phyed par/ /sa rnams kyang ni gzhan du min/ /bdag gi lus la rnam bkod de/ /sa la ku sha'i stan du nyal/ /
yi ge bdun gyi bdag nyid sngags/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni nyid du bzla/ /rmi lam du ni bya ba kun/ /yid la 'dod pa ston par 'gyur/ /dus min 'chi dang bcom dang nyams/ /bya ba
kun tu gang gyur dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang / /thams cad rmi lam dag tu ston/ /de bzhin sngags bzlas ral gri chu/ /mthe bong
mar me me long la/ /sngags pa bdag nyid rtag rnal 'byor/ /pra se na ni 'bebs par byed/ /bsgoms nas lan bdun bzlas brjod pas/ /dge dang mi dge ston par 'gyur/ /
de nas dpa' bo'i yi ge bdun/ /sngags dgod dbye ba nyid kyis te/ /nyi ma'i dbus su bsams nas ni/ /stong gi bar du bzla bar bya/ /shel gyi rnam pa lta bur ni/ /nad
kyis gdungs la bstan par bya/ /mthong ba tsam gyi mod la ni/ /nad kun 'jigs par the tshom med/ /nad las rnam par grol 'gyur na/ /ston kha'i dus kyi zla ba 'dra/ /
zla ba'i dbus su rnam bkod cing / /lag pa g.yon par 'khor lo nyid/ /yi ge shel gyi mdog ltar snang / /nad rnams kun la dgod par bya/ /rims dang gdon
sogs brjod byed dang / /gzer sogs kun dang mdze can dang / /dug gis zin sogs nad rnams dang / /nad kun the tshom med par ni/ /zla gzugs yi ge bsams nas
ni| |phyogs bcur rnam par 'byer bar 'gyur/ /mtshan mo gsang ba la gnas te/ /go mAM sa ni mngar gsum btags/ /yig bdun gsang sngags shes pa dang / /stong
phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas/ /sngags pa nang par dus su ni/ /gser srang stong ni rnyed par 'gyur/ /sbyin sreg stong phrag bcu yis ni/ /yul 'khor dam pa rnyed par 'gyur/ /
yang na gsang sngags rgyal po ni/ /gnas ni gang du bsam pa dang / /de dang der ni de yi tshe/ /skye bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /dkar po yis ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /nag pos skad
cig dag gis gsod/ /dmar pos dbang du 'gyur ba ste/ /'phral du nges par 'gugs par 'gyur/ /ser pos thams cad gnon 'gyur te/ /'di ni bstan bcos nges pa
yin| |ser pos dpung ni gnon pa dang / /gru dang 'khrul 'khor glang po gnon/ /dkar po bsam pa tsam gyis ni/ /'chi ba nges par grol bar 'gyur/ /sprul chen brgya yis
zin pa ni/ /de yang myur du slong bar byed/ /dug gis brgyal ba rnams mthong nas/ /rab tu sad pas sad par 'gyur/ /rims dang gdon dang brjed byed ni/ /lag pa mthong bas
'jigs par 'gyur/ /g.yul gyi dus su khu tshur bcings/ /yid la rtag tu zlos byed na/ /khu tshur ma bkrol de srid du/ /bya ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /dgra
bo gal te lag na ni/ /mtshon cha 'phyar bar byed pa yang / /ji srid khu tshur ma bkrol par/ /mtshon cha gtong bar mi nus so/ /gzhan yang bya ba thams cad ni/ /de bzhin
nyid du sgrub par byed/ /'bras bu me tog 'dab ma dang / /so rtsi de bzhin zas rnams la/ /lus kyi sbyor ba dang po ste/ /de bzhin gnyis pa
nus pa yin/ /gsum pa dag ni ngag nyid do/ /bzhi pa dmigs par mi 'gyur te/ /sngags kyi rgyal pos 'grub par 'gyur/ /sa bzhi shing dang bcas pa dang / /
rgya mtsho ske rags btags de la/ /'dir ni 'grub par the tshom med/ /khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu'i bar/ /dmod 'debs phan 'dogs nus pa yin/ /dpal
he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /nye ba'i snying po'i las sgrub pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas pho nya la bsten
te| |yi ge bdun pa dang ldan pa/ /gang du las la yang dag brtsams/ /de yi mod la myur du 'grub/ /yi ge bdun pa'i cho ga yis/ /rnal 'byor ma drug rnam
par dgod/ /'khor lor legs par gnas pa drug /rnam pa de lta'i cho ga yis/ /g.yon pa nyid du bskul dang bcas/ /gang gis gzung 'dzin bsams
nas ni| |kha nas gsang sngags rgyal po zlos/ /gang la lag pa de bstan pa/ /de ni nges par 'gugs par 'gyur/ /tsan+dan dmar po'i rdul dang ni/ /de bzhin ske
tshe lan tshwa dang / /bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes la/ /gcig tu byas nas brtag par bya/ /lag pa gnyis kyis mnyes nas ni/ /rnal 'byor ma la sbyin sreg bya/ /mtshan mo me
sha can me 'am/ /dur khrod me la phye ma bsreg /bsgrub par bya la mngon phyogs te/ /sbyor ba 'di ni brtsam par bya/ /ji srid brgya yi bar du bzlas/ /des ni nges par
'gugs par 'gyur/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i bdag nyid dang / /nor dang skye bo dbang du 'gyur/ /sbyor ba 'di ni grub pa ste/ /gzhan du na ni nga mi smra/ /rdul de nyid ni blangs
nas su| |lcags phye dang ni rnam par bsres/ /dur khrod ras la btums nas ni/ /lan bdun bzlas la bzhi mdo ru/ /sor brgyad tsam du sa brkos nas/ /dgra yi ming
dang bcas par ni/ /gang gi ming smos sbas gyur pa/ /de ni myur du gnon par 'gyur/ /phye ma de nyid bzlas nas su/ /'bad de ba yi 'o ma yis/ /de ni slar yang gsos
gyur na| |'grub pa nyid du the tshom med/ /phye ma de ni blangs nas ni/ /myos byed lnga dang ldan pa ru/ /de ni dur khrod ras kyis bcings/ /dgra yi ming yang bri bar bya/ /bzlas
brjod lan brgya byas nas ni/ /dur khrod du ni nges sbas na/ /bsgrub bya smyo ba nyid du 'gyur/ /bton pa nyid kyis thar par 'gyur/ /bton nas ba yi 'o ma yis/ /'bad
pas de bzhin bkru bar bya/ /slar yang gso ba de dag ni/ /'grub pa nyid du the tshom med/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ rnal
'byor ma drug gi yi ge bdun gyi las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de nas las kyi rab mchog ni/ /ngag gi dngos grub byed
pa'o| |kA ra bI ra'i me tog dmar/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni blangs nas su/ /'bad de ba yi 'o ma dang / /bzlas brjod brgya yang bya ba yin/ /lan re bzlas pa'i me tog
gis| |ling+ga'i spyi bor bsnun par bya/ /de ltar shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /nyi ma bdun du bya ba yin/ /de nas nyin zhag bcu gcig par/ /me tog dag ni blangs
nas su| |chu bo chen por song nas ni/ /re re nas ni chu la dor/ /de dag thams cad rim bzhin du/ /lan re bzlas nas rab tu bya/ /chu bor me tog tha ma ni/ /rgyun las ldog
ste rab 'bab na/ /chu dang bcas par blangs nas ni/ /sos ma reg par de 'thungs na/ /gsang ba'i rgyud las byung ba yi/ /sgrub po'i tshig ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas
skye gnas rgya bcings la/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas ni/ /sngags pa bsgrub byar mngon phyogs na/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i lto bar gnas/ /de la yid kyi gnas
bzhin du/ /blo ldan thun gsum mthe'u chung bskyod/ /bram ze gsod pa dag gis kyang / /zhag bdun brgya byin sogs nges 'gugs/ /tsan+dan dmar po'i rdul las ni/ /bsgrub
par bya ba'i gzugs byas la/ /tsha ba gsum gyis lus la bsku/ /spra tshil gyis kyang rab tu byug /sgrub pa po yi gsang gnas su/ /zangs ma'i khab kyis phug nas
ni| |seng ldeng mdag me du med la/ /mkhas pas nyi ma bdun du bsro/ /lan brgya bzlas te bzlas pa'i mthar/ /mi yi bdag po mdun na 'don/ /btsun mo'i 'khor
dang bcas pa ni/ /nges par 'gugs par byed pa yin/ /mi yi bdag po 'khor bcas pa/ /gro ga'i 'dab mar bri bya ba/ /gi wang dag gis bris nas ni/ /ming
dang spel nas gang la ni/ /mngon par phyogs te brgya bzlas nas/ /seng ldeng me la de gdungs shing / /dur khrod me steng bsgrub phyir bshad/ /ji srid spra tshil ma zhu
bar| |bsros par gyur na rgyal po ni/ /'khor los bsgyur dang bcas par yang / /nges par 'gugs par 'gyur pa yin/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes las/ /tsan+dan
dmar po nyid dang ni/ /dur khrod lhag ma thal bas spyod/ /sgrub pa po yis gcig bsdus la/ /seng ldeng me ni du med la/ /rab tu 'bad pas bsro bar bya/ /rdul de lag
pa gnyis kyis ni/ /mnyes nas sbyin sreg byas nas ni/ /ji srid du ni bsregs pas 'grub/ /rdul de blangs nas ma yengs par/ /dbugs mi
'byin par sbas na ni/ /brgyal zhing sems dang bral 'dra la/ /myos shing smyon rmongs pa nyid dang / /rlung gi shugs kyis 'ongs nas ni/ /sgrub pa po yi steng du lhung / /
phyugs sam yang na pho nya mo/ /mkhas pa yis ni dbye ba yin/ /de nas las kyi pho nya mor/ /bya ba 'di ni 'dzin pa nyid/ /kA ra bI ra'i lcug ma ni/ /rlan bcas
dpung pa'i tshad mnyam blangs/ /'bar 'gyur ro bsregs me la dor/ /ji srid de ni ma tshig pa/ /myur du song ste de blangs la/ /rig pa lan bdun bzlas nas
ni| |gang zhig bzlas te bskor na ni/ /de ni de yi skad cig la/ /skyes pa 'am bud med rang gzugs can/ /rlung gi shugs kyis 'ongs par 'gyur/ /kA ra bI ra'i me tog
dmar| |brgya bzlas rgyal gyis sbyor pa las/ /sgrub pos gi wang gis byugs la/ /me tog chu la gnas pa la/ /chu bo chen por zhugs nas ni/ /lte ba man chod
chur bcug ste/ /lag pa sbyar ba'i dbus gnas la/ /rig pa stong du bzlas nas ni/ /lag pa gnyis kyis phyer blangs te/ /chu dang bcas par btung bar bya/ /de nas sgrub
pa bo de yis/ /tshig gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal po'am rgyal po'i chung ma ni/ /yid kyis nges par 'gugs par 'gyur/ /lhar bcas lha min mi rnams ni/ /myur du
dbang du byed par 'gyur/ /khros pas tshig gis gsod 'gyur zhing / /dbye dang bskrad pa nyid kyang byed/ /sgrub pa po yi tshig nyid kyis/ /tshar gcod par ni byed par
'gyur| |tshig tsam gyis ni chu bo dang / /shing rta 'khrul 'khor rgya mtsho dang / /glang po rta dang de bzhin sprin/ /skyes bu'am yang na bya yang gnon/ /yid kyis yid la
gang 'dod pa/ /tshig gis thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /dgug pa yi ni sbyor ba dag /bud med thams cad rmongs byed pa/ /kA ra bI ra'i me tog ni/ /dmar po yang
dag blangs nas su/ /rig pa lan brgya bzlas pa dag /skye gnas dbus su gzhug par bya/ /me tog de ni kha sbyar byas/ /gsang ba'i gnas su nges par sbyar/ /gnyis
med ye shes rnal 'byor ldan/ /sngags pas brgya phrag gcig tu bzlas/ /skye gnas dbus kyi me tog dang / /sgrub pa po yis gcig blangs la/ /me tog gis ni gang
bsnun pa/ /de ni mdo la dbang du 'gyur/ /brgyal zhing sems dang bral ba yang / /yan lag tshigs kun gzhan dbang ste/ /mngon 'gyur sems ni ldog pa ru/ /skad cig
gis ni dbang du byed/ /'di ni yid ches dngos grub ste/ /don yod dbang du byed pa yin/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ rnal
'byor ma drug dang tshig gi dngos grub lung bstan pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas yi ge ha lnga ni/ /las rnams thams cad
sgrub byed pa/ /gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /myur du dngos grub rab 'jug pa'o/ /haM hau ho he ha/ yi ge ha lnga lag pa yis/ /bskul dang ldan pas mnyes nas ni/ /kha
nas kyang ni khrag 'dzag cing / /dgra bo de yi mod la 'chi/ /rang gi khrag ni thod gnas pa/ /srin lag gis khrag mnye bar bya/ /ji srid bskams kyi bar du ste/ /des ni
bsgrub bya rnam par 'jig /gal te khro ba 'bar ba dang / /mig dmar ba yis bzlas na ni/ /dpung tshogs bzhon par bcas pa yis/ /rgyal po myur du 'chi bar byed/ /
byi la dang ni ne'u le dang / /khwa dang wa dang chu skyar ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma la stobs can sbyar/ /'di dag myur du grub yin par/ /rgyud 'di la ni the tshom med/ /ri bong la sogs
spu las ni/ /srad bu byas te lan stong bzlas/ /gang gis mgul du bcings gyur pa/ /de ni de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /lag par bzlas brjod stong byas te/ /kA ra bI ra'i me
tog dang / /yi ge re re mngon bzlas la/ /sbrum ma la ni reg gyur na/ /mngal ni rnam par 'pho 'gyur te/ /btang na thar bar 'gyur ba yin/ /gang la sdigs mdzub

byas te 'chi/ /slar yang 'tsho bar byed pa yin/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ yi ge ha lnga'i las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro kun gyi snying po ste/ /'di ni brjod pa tsam gyis kyang / /dngos grub thams cad skyed byed yin/ /de nas mkha' 'gro ma'i rig
pa chen po bzlas na/ rigs thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bzlas brjod byas pas ni/ dpal chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /mi rus kyi rgyu la
phur bu sor drug pa byas la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas nas gang gi sgor sbas pa de'i rigs rgyud rnams gcod par 'gyur ro/ /zhing dang / ra ba dang / ma he dang /
glang po che dang / rta'i gnas su brkos te sbas na/ /thams cad brlag par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po'am rgyal po'i blon po dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ /rgyal po'i sgor sa
las byas pa'i gzugs brnyan sor brgyad pa byas la/ mkhas pas bzhag nas nyin zhag dang bo la ma tu lung ka'i me tog dang 'bras bu rnams dang ku su ma bsres pas
sbyin sreg brgya stong byas na/ /de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /sngags 'di nyid kyis dgug pa dang / gnon pa dang /skem pa dang / rmongs pa dang / rmugs pa dang / tshig 'phrog pa dang /
long bar byed pa dang / dig pa nyid dang / slar gtong bar byed do/ /de nas skyes pa bud med du bya bar 'dod na/ skyes pa'i ro'i me tog dang / ka ga an+di ka'i 'bras bu
dang / khwa'i sen mo dang / rkang pa'i 'og gi pags pa cha mnyam par byas la ri bong gi khrag dang btags te ril bu bcu gcig byas la grib ma la skam mo/ /de bzhin
du zhag bzang po la lag pa la bcings te nyi ma gnyis pa la gang gi spyi bor phye ma bzhag pa de bud med du 'gyur ro/ /de nas skyes pa khyir bya bar 'dod na/ gnam lcags
ne'u le'i mgo bor bzhag la mtshan mo bdun gyi bar du brgya stong sbyin sreg byas la nyin zhag brgyad pa la gur gum dang mnyam por sbyar te lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon
par bzlas nas phye ma'i sbyin sreg byas la de'i thal ba gang gi spyi bor bzhag pa de khyir 'gyur ro/ /slar gso ba ni/ mtshan mo'i dus su mkha' 'gro ma rnams la
mchod pa chen po byas te gtor ma byin na/ de'i 'og tu rnal mar 'gyur ro/ /rdzas rdzas ma yin par bya bar 'dod na/ /gser shing gi 'bras bu sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad
byas na| rdzas ma yin par 'gyur ro/ /a ru ra'i sbyin sreg byas na/ rnal mar 'gyur ro/ /de nas smyo bar bya bar 'dod na/ bya chen po'i gnas kyi sbyin sreg byas na/ nyi ma
bdun pa la smyo bar 'gyur ro/ /slar zlog pa ni/ 'bras kyi phub ma'i sbyin sreg byas na/ zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /byi la'i spu zla ba gzas zin pa'i tshe bsdus la gang gi ming
nas smos nas sngags kyi sbyin sreg byas nas thal ba de gang gi spyi bor bzhag pa de byi lar 'gyur ro/ /slar bzlas na/ rnam par zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bya rog gi rgyus
pa la srad bu byas pa bzung la mngon par bzlas te gang gi mgul du bcings pa de bya rog tu 'gyur ro/ /gang dang gang gi rgyus pas srad bu byas pa la mngon par bzlas
te mgul du bcings pa de de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du khwa dang / thi ba dang / rma bya dang / chu skyar dang / 'ug pa dang / khra dang / bya rgod kyi gzugs 'dzin par
'gyur ro/ /ba lang gi spu la srad bu byas la lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te mgul du bcings na/ de ba lang du 'gyur ro/ /rkang bzhi pa la sogs pa gang dang
gang gi spu las srad bu byas la mngon par bzlas te mgul du btags na/ de de'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /bkrol na/ thar par 'gyur ro/ /'bras so ba la bzlas
la nor gyi bdag po chen po'i khyim du bcug la lhag mas bdag nyid dang dbang bskur na/ mtshan bdun gyis so ba thams cad 'gugs
par 'gyur ro/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags kyi las thams cad kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa
bdun pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro kun gyi dge gang ba'i/ /snying po rnal 'byor ma kun gyi/ /'dod don thams cad
sgrub byed pa'o/ /gang zhig dran pa tsam gyis ni/ /'jig rten gsum po g.yo byed cing / /rjes su dran pa tsam gyis kyang / /yang dag dngos grub rim gyis so/ /hA swA ta pha hUM huM
ye ni r+N+Nawa dzrab ye nI ki DA d+d+ha bu rbas oM/ /sngags 'di bklags pas grub pa ste/ /las rnams kun byed dge ba yin/ /mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma rnams dang / /khan+Da ro hi lA
ma sogs/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad kyi/ /sngags ni 'di nyid yin par grags/ /sa 'og yang na mtho ris sam/ /de bzhin mi yul dag tu yang / /las ni gang dag
yod pa dag /sngags kyis de dag thams cad sgrub/ /dngos grub kun byed dge ba yin/ /dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba/ /'di las shin tu mchog gyur med/ /'jig
rten gsum na ci yang med/ /gang phyir 'di ni bla med de/ /las rnams thams cad sgrub byed yin/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni kun gyi gnas/ /mdor bshad rgyas par ma yin no/ /me tog
'bras bu sna tshogs kyi/ /ri bo bzang po bri bya zhing / /de yi steng du rtag sgom pa/ /mkha' 'gro de bzhin lA ma dang / /khaN+Da ro hi rnal 'byor ma/ /dpa' bo rnams kyi dpa'
bo nyid/ /ha ha he he zhes bya ba/ /dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yi/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam snang mdzad/ /de bzhin pad+ma gar dbang dang / /
shrI he ru ka nyid dang / /mkha' snying dang ni rta mgrin nyid/ /rin chen rdo rje stobs po che/ /mig mi bzang dang 'jigs byed dang / /rdo rje bzang dang rab bzang dang / /rdo rje hUM
mdzad dpa' chen po/ /de bzhin rdo rje ral pa can/ /myu gu can dang rdo rje'i lus/ /rdo rje 'od ni nyid dag dang / /'od dpag med dang lha yi dgra/ /de bzhin mche ba
rnam gtsigs dang / /keng rus keng rus chen po dang / /thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa/ /dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis/ /'gro ba 'di dag thams cad khyab/ /dpa'
bo rnams dang mkha' 'gro nyid/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rab gtum sogs/ /bya ba kun la sgrub pa bos/ /'khor lor bzhugs par blta bar bya/ /grub 'dod shin tu mnyam
bzhag pas/ /'khor lo'i bdag nyid rtag tu bsgom/ /sngar bshad pa yi cho ga yis/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog brjod/ /'khor
lo chen po grub kun gnas/ /de bzhin dngos grub kun gyi bzhi/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba dang / /dpa' bo bye bas legs par gsungs/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni re re yi/ /
'khor ni bye ba dag tu 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ma ni mkha' 'gro nyid/ /gzugs can ma dang dum skyes ma/ /de bzhin lA ma la sogs ni/ /dngos grub kun byed dge
ba yin| |dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi gnas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi
bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /ji bzhin cho gas phyugs bsgrub bya/ /gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /myur
du dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'o/ /sngags pas 'bras kyi phye ma las/ /rim bzhin du ni phyugs gzugs bya/ /mi dang rus sbal rnga mo dang / /bong bu spyang ki rta
la sogs/ /de ltar sna tshogs phag dag ste/ /phyugs 'di dag tu shes par bya/ /mtshan nyid ji ltar gyur pa dang / /'di rnams las ni bshad par bya/ /skye ba
gcig dang skye ba gnyis/ /gsum mam bzhi 'am lnga nyid dam/ /skye ba drug dang bdun gyur pa/ /phyugs rnams su ni gdon mi za/ /gang gis kha yi dri zhim zhing / /mig me
'dzum par rnam par blta/ /bden par smra zhing mthong na dga'/ /rtag tu dam chos dgar 'gyur zhing / /rang gi skye ba shes pa dang / /lus kyi dri ni rtag tu zhim/ /mtshan
nyid 'di dag ldan par ni/ /skye ba bdun du 'byung ba yin/ /de ni zos ba tsam gyis ni/ /lha yi gzugs ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ /bsnams pa'am reg pa tsam gyis
sam| |gang gis thig le byed pa ste/ /mod la 'grub par 'gyur bste/ /'di ni rang dga'i gzugs 'chang 'gyur/ /de yi snying ga'i ro tsa na/ /mkhas pa yis ni blangs nas
ni| |snying bo'i sngags ni bzlas nas su/ /de yi thig le bya ba yin/ /sems can gang dang gang gi ni/ /gzugs su byed par 'dod pa na/ /de dang de yi gzugs su ni/ /thig les 'gyur bar
the tshom med/ /mkhas pas shing la khu ba ni/ /ro tsa dar bcas blangs nas su/ /dpral bar thig le byas nas ni/ /de gzugs 'gyur ba the tshom med/ /phyugs nyid kyi
ni ba spu yis/ /lag pa spyi bor bcing bar bya/ /de yi yan lag ldar ldan zhing / /de yi spu dang rnam bsres la/ /lag pa spyi bor bcings na ni/ /de yi gzugs 'gyur
the tshom med/ /rnal 'byor pa ni bsgoms shing zlos/ /mi rnams nus pa ldan yin yang / /dka' zhing nyon mongs la dga' ba/ /dngos grub lam
ni 'gog pa yin/ /glang po rta dang bong bu dang / /rus sbal rnga mo phag dang wa/ /khwa dang 'ug sogs bya rgod dang / /khrung khrung khra dang sa ra la/ /gzugs bzang ba dang
gzugs ngan dang / /lha yi gzugs su de 'gyur ro/ /rnal 'byor dpa' chen rang dga'i gzugs/ /skye 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /'di bas shin tu mchog grub
pa| |'jig rten gsum na yod ma yin/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ /skye ba bdun pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs yongs su brje ba'i cho ga'i
le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// //de nas sbyin sreg cho ga ni/ /nges par dbang du byed 'gyur ba/ /yang dag cho ga gang gis ni/ /myur du dngos
grub thob 'gyur bshad/ /go mAM sa ni myos byed bsre/ /lag pa g.yon pas sbyin sreg byas/ /sangs rgyas kyang ni dbang 'gyur na/ /phran tshegs mi ni smos ci dgos//
kha chu so shing dag dang ni/ /de bzhin rang gi lus mnyes pa/ /myos byed mi dang bcas pa yis/ /khams gsum po ni dbang du 'gyur/ /zla mtshan gyi ni khrag dang ni/ /zos
nas rlon pa'i zas dag dang / /mi yi skra dang ldan pa yis/ /mdo la 'gugs par 'gyur pa yin/ /rang gi lus las skyugs pa 'am/ /mkhas pas rang skras sbyin sreg bya/ /nim
pa'i shing la rab sbyar nas/ /mod la dbye bar 'gyur pa yin/ /mnyam par bzhag pas d+ha dur me/ /nyungs mar mtshan der bsgres pa yi/ /bya rog gshog pas
sbyin sreg byas/ /'phral du 'chi ba'am skrod par 'gyur/ /nyal dang ma nyal 'dug pa 'am/ /zas dang sbyor ba sogs rnams la'ang / /mkhas pas rtag tu zlo byed
na| |de la bgegs ni yod ma yin/ /wa yi sha yis bsreg blugs brgyas/ /yang dag bsreg blugs byed pa'i mi/ /de ni zla ba gsum rjes la/ /rigs kyi dbul ba 'jig
par 'gyur/ /sha chen dag gis la la zhig /myos byed ldan pas sbyin sreg byed/ /brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du ni/ /sgrub pa po ni thun gsum byed/ /ma lus sa rnams spyod
pa dang / /zla ba drug gis dbang du 'gyur/ /tshim 'gyur mkha' 'gro ma de la/ /rgyal srid ster bar gdon mi za/ /lha rnams thams cad bsgoms nas ni/ /thun
gnyis bar du sbyin sreg byas/ /rang gi lus ni de nyid kyis/ /mkha' la 'gro ba nyid thob 'gyur/ /go yu ba yi sha chang gis/ /phyi dang nang gi sbyin sreg bya/ /myur du de
yi lag tu 'gyur/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu 'jug /sngags kyi bzlas brjod mtshan ma bzlas/ /yul 'khor yang ni 'gugs
par byed/ /de ltar nyan re byas na ni/ /rgyal po nyid du de byed 'gyur/ /'di las rab mchog gzhan dag ni/ /'jig rten gsum na yod ma yin/ /rnal 'byor chen po
rang dgas 'chi/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin cing rol/ /bil ba de bzhin ba la sha /u dum wa ra nyid dag ni/ /sbyin sreg 'bum byas myur du ni/ /nor gyi bdag
po chen por 'gyur/ /go mAM sa dad myos byed bsre/ /rgyal srid 'dod pas sbyin sreg bya/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug mnyes byas na/ /dbul po nyid du ga la 'gyur/ /go ma
yu ni bsregs byas pas/ /ci bde bar ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /go ma yu yi sbyin sreg gis/ /myur du nor bdag mnyam par 'gyur/ /brtul zhugs gtsang sbra med
na yang / /bstan pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /lhag pa'i tshe dang kuSh+maN+DaM/ /mud ga ma Sha tsa na ka /sbrang rtsi gtsigs ma ske tshe dang / /khyim gyi ta ma la 'dab blangs//
kha bcings par ni 'gyur ba yin/ /ci rung spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /gang du dga' ba der gnas so/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rnal 'byor ma yis dang gnas/ /
he ru ka dpal rgyu yan lag /thams cad brtan g.yo'i bdag nyid can/ /gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa/ /de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med/ /zhing 'dir 'od byed shes par bya/ /
nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phro ba/ /tshan+do ha ni mngon 'gyur zhing / /nye ba'i tshan+do spyad dka' ba/ /'dus pa ring du song ba yin/ /nye bar 'dus pa mi g.yo ba/ /dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros
nyid| |nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin/ /shrI he ru ka gzhung spyod pa'i/ /'di ni nang gi bdag nyid sa/ /pha rol phyin bcu sa rnams ni/ /rnal 'byor ma yi brda yi skad/ /mtho ris
sa steng sa 'og tu/ /dpa' bo'i yan lag brtan g.yo'i bdag /pu lIr la sogs gang bstan pa/ /phyi nang bdag nyid can du gnas/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po che/ /'dod
pa kun gyi dbang phyug gtso/ /kun tu phyag dang zhabs ldan zhing / /thams cad du ni spyan zhal dbu/ /kun tu thos ldan 'jig rten na/ /thams cad g.yogs te rnam par bzhugs/ /
de nas dngos grub bsgrub bya ba/ /bsam gtan ldan pa'i sems kyis te/ /sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir/ /gsang ba 'di nyid gsungs pa yin/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par
brjod pa las/ /dbang gi sbyin sreg dang gnas la sogs pa'i sa bstan pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /man
ngag shin tu rnyed dka' ste/ /dpa' bo'i brda yi skad du ni/ /nga yis rgyud du sbas pa yin/ /gos dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs/ /shes rab yan lag
phur bu dra/ /A li kA li zhes brjod pa/ /rgyu la sogs stong sngon 'gro ba/ /'jug pa sgra la sogs pa nas/ /ji srid bsdus pa'i sbyor ldan pa/ /bdud rtsi tshim byed mya ngan
'das| |lag pa'i mchod pa'i dbang bskur ba/ /go cha chen pos yang dag srung / /sngags rnams kun gyis mchod par bya/ /de ltar de nyid bcu bzhi ni/ /mdor bsdus nas
ni bshad pa yin/ /mi mchog gang zhig kun spyod pa/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam dag bdag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa 'thob cing / /skye dang skye bar bde gshegs
kyi| |rigs skyes rgyal po chos ldan 'gyur/ /ji ltar sngon bsags sdig pa yi/ /mtshan nyid thams cad dman pa ste/ /gang zhig 'di ni rtag sgom pa/ /sa la 'dod pa
kun dbang phyug /dper na mar gyis gang ba'i snod/ /me yi dbus su bzhag na ni/ /mar gsar steng du zhu 'gyur zhing / /snod kyi dri ma 'jig par 'gyur/ /de bzhin shrI he
ru ka yi| |mchan gyis sdig pa 'jig par 'gyur/ /bsam gtan sems pa tsam gyis sam/ /klo ga cing kha ton bris pa yis/ /mtho ris longs spyod thob 'gyur ba/ /
yang na 'khor los bsgyur ba 'thob/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams 'pho ba'i tshe/ /khrag 'thung dpal sogs rnal 'byor ma/ /lag na me tog sna tshogs thogs/ rgyal mtshan ba dan
sna tshogs dang / /rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang / /sna tshogs glu yi mchod pa yis/ /'chi ba zhes bya rnam rtog 'di/ /mkha' spyod gnas su 'khrid bar byed/ /de 'dra'i dpa'
chen rnal 'byor ma/ /sa steng na na rnyed par dka'/ /dpal ldan he ru ka'i rgyud chen/ /gang zhig shes nas ma dad pa/ /dbul po sdug bsngal gyis gdungs par/ /de la rtag
tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mgul rgyan gdu bu dpung rgyan dang / /rna rgyan tshangs pa'i skud pa dang / /do shal mgo yi phreng ba dang / /ska rags sil sil sgra sgrog pa/ /ri steng sna tshogs
pad+ma yi| |lte bar A li kA li skyes/ /dkar mo bdag po rnam gnon cing / /rdo rje dril bus sku la 'khyud/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i phyed ldan pa'i/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs
dang / /he ru ka dpal rgyal po che'i/ /go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma'i/ /'khor bcas dbus su sbyor ldan pa/ /thams cad dgyes shing
gnyis med gyur/ /'byin dang sdud par mdzad pa yin/ /mos pa du ma'i sems can la/ /spyod pa sna tshogs ston mdzad de/ /sna tshogs tshul gyis gdul bya ba/ /thabs ni sna tshogs
ston pa yin/ /zab mo'i chos ni ston pa la/ /gal te mos par ma gyur kyung / /smod pa dag tu mi bya ste/ /chos nyid bsam mi khyab dran bya| |
gang gis 'dir bdag yul min pa/ /gang gis chos nyid mi shes yin/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de'i sras ni/ /bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis mkhyen/ /sangs rgyas
rnams ni byung gyur tam/ /ma byung na yang rnam kun tu/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i chos nyid ni/ /'phel 'grib spangs pas gnas pa yin/ /de ltar rnam par bzhag nas
kyang / /'jig rten pa kun yong mi smad/ /de yi bgrod pa bsam yas shing / /sangs rgyas rol ba bsam mi khyab/ /mdo sde bya ba spyod pa rnams/ /rnal 'byor gsang
mtha'i dbye ba nyid/ /sems can mos pa 'jug pa rnams/ /de dang de la dga' ba bzhin/ dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa 'bum pa'i nang nas phyung ba grub pa'i
rtog pa rmad du byung ba/ ngo mtshar dang bcas pa byed pa/ bstan bcos thams cad kyi rgyal po/ /dpal he ru ka dpa' bo chen po bklags pas 'grub pa/ gzhan
thams cad kyis mi thub pa/ gdod nas grub pa'i bla ma yin no/ /dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ le'u
lnga bcu gcig pa rdzogs so// //grags pa yid 'ong rgyal mtshan mtho ldan pa'i/ /rin chen dang mtshungs rin chen bzang
po yis/ /mkhas pa pad+ma ka ra'i zhal sngar ni/ /rig pa'i 'byung gnas kha che'i dpe las bsgyur/ /lhag pa'i tshul khrims dri yis bsgos gyur cing / /dri med bka' don 'thad
pa dang bcas par/ /rtogs pa dang ldan grags pa'i zhal sngar ni/ /sgra sgyur dge slong pra dz+nyA kI rti dang / /mar pa sgra sgyur chos kyi dbang phyug gis/ /mkhas pa'i 'byung gnas
yul dbus dpe dang gtugs/ rgya gar skad du/a b+hi d+ha na ut+ta ra tan+t+ra nA ma/ /bod skad du/ mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal
rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji srid 'gro ba drug gi mthar/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par 'byung / /rdo rje sems dpa' yis ni byed/ /chos kyi dbyings
la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni/ /sku gsum ye shes lnga yi dngos/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lor bzhugs/ /'gro ba sgrol la phyag 'tshal
bstod| |ji srid rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /kun tu rtog pa'i bcings ba bcad/ /'jig rten bya ba rab tu 'jug /de srid rtag tu phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'di skad bdag gis
thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro bo dang / mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams
gsang ba'i snying po la rnam par bzhugs te/ der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa bcom ldan 'das thog ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la
zhus te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro bo dang / mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba mngon par brjod pa'i
bla ma'i snying po ngas bshad kyi/ /lag na rdo rje khro bo chen po'i bdag po 'khor sna tshogs par rnam par 'khrul pa rgyas par bshad kyi/ legs par rab tu nyon la
yid la zungs shig /de la bcom ldan 'das la legs so/ /zhes gsol te thal mo sbyar ba btud pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ de nas gsang
pa bshad bya ba/ /mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par min/ /dpal he ru ka yang dag sbyor/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed yin/ /bla ma las kyang bla ma ni/ /mngon par brjod
pa'i phyi ma ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sems dpa' ni/ /
rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /'dir ni rang byung bcom ldan dpa'/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sdom ba yin/ /thog ma med pa'i tshul chen 'di/ /b+ha gar srid sgra gzugs
skyes gnas/ /dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul yin/ /thog ma dbus mthar dri ma med/ /'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba/ /srub dang bsrub par yang dag sbyor/ /gang la
de la ji ltar bzhin/ /rang bzhin dag pa 'od gsal ba/ /gsung ba'i gnas las byung ba yin/ /rtag tu nyes bral zhi ba ste/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam gyur pa/ /spro dang bsdu
ba byed pa yin/ /rang bzhin dag pa rang byung ste/ /rnal 'byor ma yi bde ba ster/ /bzlas dang bsam gtan ldan pa dang / /sbyor nyid cho ga'i ye shes kyi/ /de dag rgyud
las gsungs pa dag /gsang ba'i bdag po rab tu nyon/ /dbugs 'byin par ma mchog dag dang / /dri yi chu dang bcas pa dag /mkhas pas ril bur byas nas ni//
'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag la mchod/ /'byung ba'i dus kyi khyad par la/ /pho nyas lhan cig skyes pa 'grub/ /mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma ste/ /mthar thug dngos grub thams
cad 'byung / /dga' ba yid la 'dod pa yi/ /dngos grub kyang ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /rang rdzas thig legs sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa bya/ /rang gi lha
yi sbyor ba yis/ /rang dang gzhan yang mchod par bya/ /mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang / /thos pa dang ni dran pa yis/ /sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur
te| |de ltar 'di la the tshom med/ /rnal 'byor pa nyid bsod nams mchog /dag byed sdig pa 'jig par byed/ /bzlas dang bsam gtan dag pas kyang / /skye ba 'di la
dngos grub 'gyur/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dam tshig la 'jug pa'i gsang ba sbas pa bstan pa ste le'u dang po'o// //de
nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la rnam par 'khrul pa zhes bya ba khro bo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dngos grub
thams cad kyi gsang ba gsungs pa/ chags pa med cing chags pa dang bral ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po la 'di lta ste/ dpa' bo chen mo gzugs rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po tshor ba rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po 'du shes rdo rje
zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po 'du byed rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po rnam par shes pa rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad gtso bo rdo rje dbang phyug chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po gti mug rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po rna ba rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po sna rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po chags
pa rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po phrag dog rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po sa rdo rje dang / dpa'
bo chen po chu rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po me rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po rlung rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po mkha' dbyings rdo rje dang / 'di lta bu la sogs pa ma lus shing lus pa
med pa chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa mtha' yas pa rnam par 'phro ba'i gsang ba'i snying po 'byung bas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sna tshogs 'dus pa gsang
ba gsum gyi dam tshig gi 'khor lo dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ dpa' bo chen po rdo rje thod pa'i dum bu dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje keng rus chen po dang / dpa' bo
chen po rdo rje keng rus dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje lha dgra dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje dpag med dang / dpa' po
chen po rdo rje 'od dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje lus dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje myu gu dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje ral pa can dang / dpa' po chen po rdo rje dpa' bo chen po
dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rab bzang dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje bzang po dang / dpa' po chen po rdo rje
'jigs byed chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje mig mi bzang dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje stobs po che dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rin chen dang / dpa' bo chen po
rdo rje rta mchog dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje nam mkha'i snying po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje dpal he ru ka chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug
dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje sems dpa' dang / 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad yongs su gang bar mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig
gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi gsang ba'i dam tshig gsang ba'i b+ha ga las 'byung ba rnal 'byor ma dang / dpa' bo'i
gsang ba'i dam tshig gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i dam tshig chen po gsungs ba 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo ltung byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo

gsod byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chan mo 'gugs byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo gar gyi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo pad+ma'i dra ba mo zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje
mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje lA ma zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje dum skyes ma zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje
gzugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab gtum ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo gtum mig ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo
'od ldan ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo sna chen mo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo dpa' ba'i blo gros ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo mi'u
thung ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo lang+ka'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo shing grib ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mos srung ma
zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'jigs byed chen mo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rlung gi shugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo chang
'thung ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo sngo sangs ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab bzang ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rta rna ma zhes bya ba
dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo bya gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor lo'i shugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma
chen mo dum skyes ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo chang tshong ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor lo'i go cha ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor
ma chen mo rab dpa' mo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo stobs chen ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor los bsgyur ma zhes bya ba dang /
rnal 'byor ma chen mo brtson 'grus chen mo zhes bya ba dang / de lta bu la sogs pa sna tshogs pas nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par hUM dang phaT kyi sgra sgrog
pa| gar sna tshogs byed cing rang gi dam tshig dang 'khyud pa dang / tsum pa nas snying rje chen po'i ro yongs su rdzogs pa'i dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis
gang bar mthong ngo / /mthong nas zhugs te dpa' bo'i mchog rnams kyi dam tshig rjes su dran no/ /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje phag
mo'i dam tshig gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yang dag par 'byung zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma mo'i tshogs
thams cad kyi rigs dang gsang ba gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ rdo rje ma mo khwa gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo 'ug gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo kyi gdong ma zhes bya ba dang /
rdo rje ma mo phag gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje sreg ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje pho nya mo zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje mche ba ma zhes bya ba
dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje 'joms ma zhes bya ba dang / 'di lta bu'i ma mo'i tshogs kyi mchog thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad gang ste/ rigs kyi bdag po
rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'byung ba/ dpal he ru ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid/ dam tshig chen po rdo rje
rigs kyi dam tshig yin te/ chos rnams thams cad dngos po med/ /mtshan nyid thams cad rnam par spangs/ /bdag med chos las yang dag byung / /'di ni dam tshig
mchog yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje go cha zhes bya ba'i rdo rje dam tshig gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje sems
dpa' dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phug chen po rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po
rdo rje he ru ka dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje nyi ma dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje rta mchog dang / rigs drug po de
ni| yan lag drug tu dgod pa ste/ srung ba gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig gi mchog de ni/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa las byung ngo / /rnal 'byor chen po'i
mchog tu gsang ba sbas pa bshad par bya ste/ rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo rdo rje phag mo dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo ya mi ni dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo rmongs byed ma
dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo g.yo byed ma dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo skrag byed ma dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen po tsaN+Ti ka ste/ 'di lta bus yang nam mkha'i khams
dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig yang dag par srung ba'i sbyor ba'i thugs gsang ba chen po ste/ de lta bu sna tshogs du ma'i rnal
'byor ma rang gi lag pas khrag dron mo mchog gis mchod pa byas nas thal mo sbyar te mos pa mchog gis spyi bos gtugs so/ /de nas dam tshig chen po rnam par
'phrul pa rdo rje sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi ba spu'i bu gnas sems dpa' sna tshogs spros te phyung nas gdul ba du ma la
thabs sna tshogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings yongs su gang bar byas te sna tshogs pas mdun gyi nam mkha' yongs su gang bar mthong ngo / /bcom
ldan 'das kyis rigs sna tshogs pa'i snying rje chen po'i khro bo'i cha lugs 'dzin cing sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i ro dga' ba sna tshogs kyi cho
'phrul rdul snyed dang mnyam pa bstan te khams gsum gyi bdag pos gsungs pa/ chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / dbang chen gyi steng du sna tshogs pa'i ri'i rgyal po ri
rab sna tshogs rin po che sna tshogs pa'i gzi brjid kyis mdzes pa/ de'i steng du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings las rdo rje khro bo chen po phyung nas spros te/ rdo rje chen
po'i gzhal yas khang dkyil 'khor chen por sprul pa la kun tu bzang po chen po byung ste/ rdo rje 'khor dang lhan cig byung nas brtan par bzhugs so/ /phun sum
tshogs pa sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i rgyan gyis spud pa/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i mdog ltar sdug pa/ dril bu dang / rnga yab dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
g.yer ka'i dra bas mig mang ris su bris pa/ rdo rje dam tshig srad bu chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug pa'i sgra sgrog pa sna tshogs pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin
bu dang / 'byung po dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / smyo byed dang / brjed byed dang / grib gnon dang / ma rungs pa dang / shin tu
gdug pa dang / ro langs dang / ro dang / ro sreg pa dang / khyi dang / lce spyang dang / lce spyang mo'i sgra sgrog pa/ dpa' bo dang / mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i sgra pheM
dang / a la la'i sgra sgrog pa/ dril bu dang / cang te'u'i sgra sgrog pa/ mgo bcad pa gar byed pas nye bar brgyan pa/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyod pa dang /
dge ba'i las kyis grol ba/ sems can thams cad la snying rje'i ros phan 'dogs pa/ rnam par 'khor bas bskor ba/ pad+ma'i gar gyis gar byed cing thal mo
sbyor ba| g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa/ lag pa'i thal mo sbyar ba/ sangs rgyas thod pa'i dum bu'i chos kyi mchog zab mo'i tshul dang / khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i 'dod
pa ston pa/ sku lus chen po 'dzin pa/ zab mo'i sgra sgrog pa/ rang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor can/ mngon par brjod pa'i bla ma chen mo nye bar 'byung ba/ mkha' 'gro
dang mkha' 'gro ma'i sdom pa'i rgyal po'i dra ba'i dra ba can/ chos sna tshogs pa'i rjes su bstan pa'i ston pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs kyi bde ba ster zhing ston
par byed pa sems dpa' chen po legs so legs so/ /lag na rdo rje legs par nyon cig /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ zhu ba'i le'u ste gnyis
pa'o|| ||de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rdo rje gsang ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ snying gar zla ba bsgoms nas ni/ /rdo rje phra
mo'i rnam 'phral ba/ /bde gshegs thams cad gsang ba ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom/ /der ni gsang ba byin brlabs pa/ / snying po mchog ni legs par nyon//

bla ma yi yang bla ma ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+hAHsar+b+ba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM shU nya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM badzra shud+d+hAHsarba/

d+harmA badzra shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM yo ga shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHyo ga shud+d+hA+o\u0f85haM/ oM dz+nyA na shud+d+haHsarbA d+harmA dz+nyA na shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM sa ma ya shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHsa ma ya shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM sarba

ta thA ga ta shU n+ya tA a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta su pra ti bi shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmA b+hA tu dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM man+t+ra shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHsarba

man+t+ra shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM kro d+ha shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHkro d+ha shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM tsit+ta shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHtsit+ta shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM wA ka shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmA wA ka shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM kA ya shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHkA

ya shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM dz+nyA na a mr-i ta shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmA dz+nyA na a mr-i ta shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM nA nA sa ma ya shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmA nA nA sa ma ya shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM tsA R+ya na ya

shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHtsAR+ya na ya shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM tri yo ga pa ri shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHtri yo ga pa ri shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM a phi She ka shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHa b+hi She ka shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM pU dza shud+d+hAHsarba

d+harmAHpU dza shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a dwa ya pU dza badzra swa b+hA pa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM maN+Dal la shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHmaN+Dal la shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM a d+hi pa ti shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHa d+hi pa

ti shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM bI ra shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHbI ra shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM yo gI ni shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHyo gI ni shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM ta twa shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHta twa shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ he i ti he tu a pa

ga ta sarba d+harmA he tu a ba ga to\u0f85haM/ ru i ti rU ka ra a pa ga ta sarba d+harmA rU ka ra a ba ga to\u0f85haM/ ka i ti nA kA tsit+ta s+thi ta sarba d+harmA nA kA tsit+ta s+thi to\u0f85haM/ oM dz+ha Ti ta kA ra shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmA dz+ha Ti ta kA ra shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/

oM b+ha pa shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHb+ha ba shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM dzA la shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHdzA la shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM A ha ra shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHAM ha ra shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM b+hak+Sha shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAH
