b+hak+Sha shud+d+ha\u0f85haM/ oM a sa mA hi ta shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHa sa mA hi te shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM si saM be da na shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHsi saM be da na shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM dwe Sha shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHdwe Sha

shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM mo ha shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHmo ha shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM rA ga shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHrA ga shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM mA na shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHmA na shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM i R+Sha shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHiR+Sha

shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM kha badzra shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHkha badzra shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM tri tsa kra pa ri shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHtri tsa kra pa ri shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM DA ki ni shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHDA ki ni shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM shad+ku la shud+d+hAH

sarba d+harmAHshad+ku la shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM mA tri shud+d+hAH sarba d+harmAHmA tri shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM pi tri shud+d+hAH sarba d+harmAHpi tri shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ 'di ltar ji nye ba'i dur khrod kyi bar thams cad rnam par dag
par shes par bya'o/ /pu dza o a gor de ma ka o tri ko ka la ka haM pre gri sau su na si ma ku/ sa bcu rnam par dag pa'i bdag /pha rol phyin bcu'ang de bzhin te/ /shes pa bcu
yang rnam dag bdag /bcu po de dag rnam par bsgom/ /'khor lo gsum yang yongs dag phyir/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi bdag nyid dge /dus dang tshod rnams rnam grol bas/ /
rnal 'byor ma yi yid dga' ba/ /sum cu rtsa bdun rnam dag don/ /mngon mtho he ru ka las byung / /mngon brjod rgyud ni bla ma'i bla/ /gsang chen mchog gi dam pa 'o/ /
g.yon dang g.yas su bskor ba yis/ /dgod cing mchod dang bskor bar bya/ /gang gis de nyid shes pa yis/ /brda ni lnga po bstan par bya/ /gang yang dbang bskur med
pa la| |gzhan du de nyid ma bstan cig /mngon brjod rgyud la bla ma yis/ /dbang bskur slob ma dag la sbyin/ /gzhan du slob ma smyo ba dang / /brgyal dang
rmongs pa dag tu 'gro/ /mnar med 'jigs pa chen po dang / /ngan pa der ni lhung bar 'gyur/ /glegs bam bshes min la ster ba/ /ngan pa de ma thag tu 'chi/ /phol mig rims
dang dug dang nad/ /mkha' 'gro gdon gyis gtses par 'gyur/ /mi srun bgegs dang tshogs bdag gis/ /gsod cing dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur/ /ji srid 'bad pa thams
cad kyis/ /bla ma slob mas rim bzhin du/ /de nyid rtag tu sbas na ni/ /myur du sngags kyi dngos grub 'gyur/ /bla mas thams cad rim bzhin du/ /mngon brjod rgyud kyi rim
pa bzhin/ /lha yi rnal 'byor la sbyor ba/ /gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'gyur/ /de ma thag tu byang chub ste/ /mchog ni nges par rnyed par 'gyur/ /mi yi bu mo 'di 'dra
spang / /bdag gi dam tshig mi shes shing / /drag cing log lta rang bzhin ngan/ /mi srun snying rje med pa dang / /brkam chags ser snar ldan pa dang / /spyang zhing ngan la
phrag dog can/ /skyes pa gzhan la chags pa dang / /rnam par rtog pa mang ba dang / /'di 'dra'i phyag rgya spang bar bya/ /sbyor ba'i dngos grub ring ba yin/ /puk+ka sI ni mdzes
sdug blang / /gzugs sdug gzhon pas rnam par brgyan/ /sbyor ba la ni gcig tu sems/ /brtul zhugs brtan zhing dam tshig shes/ /dpa' zhing chags bral ngo tsha med/ /
nga rgyal med cing ser sna med/ /sngags pa rang gi spyod pa ste/ /rig ma brtul zhugs khyod kyis longs/ /phyag rgya lnga ni rtag tu 'chang / /mgo la thod pa'i rgyan yang byas/ /
thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /thal ba'i rdul gyis rnam par byugs/ /rtag tu ma hA mA sa bza'/ /thams cad btung bas myos pa dang / /ro yi gdan la 'dug pa dang / /pags
pa chen po gos su gyon/ /rjes su mthun pa'i bza' ba za/ /zhag dang khrag gis tshim pa dang / /grong ngam dgon pa dag tu yang / /gang zhig yul du 'gro ba na/ /rtag tu chags
bas mi gnas shing / /rtag tu dur khrod spyod byed la/ /yang na tshong 'dus gnas pa dang / /nyan thos 'jig rten skal med pa'i/ /mi shes gti mug gis khyab pa/ /nyan thos yongs su
longs spyod pa'i/ /gtsug lag khang du gnas mi bya/ /ji ltar skyes bu dbul po bzhin/ /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gnas/ /rdo rje gar gyis rnam par rol/ /rtag tu dur khrod
la gnas shing / /dri chen sha chen zas su bza'/ /myos byed btung bar ldan pa yi/ /dpa' ba'i gtso bos rtse gcig pa'i/ /sems kyis rab tu bsgom par bya/ /phyag rgya chen po ma
rnyed na| |g.yeng ba thams cad rnam spangs pa'i/ /de ni ye shes 'byung gnas te/ /shes rab pha rol phyin las 'byung / /gzung dngos yin
pa mi dmigs pa'i/ /gnyis su med pa nyid la gnas/ /rtse gcig sems ni byas nas kyang / /sgom pa'i spyod pa la gnas na/ /bde la dga' ba'i dngos grub 'gyur//
shes rab thabs kyi cho ga'i rim/ /phyag rgya che dang nges par rol/ /sgom pa mngon du gyur pa yis/ /rnam grol sangs rgyas thams cad kyang / /skye ba 'di la dngos
grub 'gyur/ /g.yon pa'i spyod pa shes rab ste/ /g.yas pa de bzhin thabs yin no/ /sgom par ldan pa'i mthu stobs ni/ /sum cu'i dbang phyug la dbang byed//
rnal 'byor ma ni dngos grub dang / /gnod sbyin klu yi bu mo dang / /gzhan yang sna tshogs dri za mo/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag la spyod/ /de nyid gsang ba'i mchog
gyur pa| |A li kA li rtag tu bsgom/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad de bzhin rnam par brtag /dpa' bos brda rnams bstan pa ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yi
lag g.yon gyis/ /brda rnams la ni 'jug par bya/ /dpa' bo'i gnas su gyur pa 'di/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum/ /'gro kun g.yon las byung ba yin/ /
rdo rje sems dpa' mthe bong nyid/ /mdzub mor rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs/ /gung mor pad+ma gar dbang gnas/ /srin lag dpa' bo dngos grub can/ /tha ma la ni mi zad sku/ /sen
mo'i ngos la rta mgrin gnas/ /g.yon pa'i rgyu las byung ba ni/ /dpa' bo thams cad yin par bshad/ /lag mthil pho nya 'dus pa'i mchog /rgyab tu shin tu nges byas te// brda ni lnga po
brtan par bya/ /sgrub pa po yis shes par gyis/ /sa ni spyan zhes bya bar bshad/ /chu khams mA ma kI ru bshad/ /me ni gos dkar mo ru bshad/ /rlung ni sgrol ma dag tu grags//
'o byed ma ni stong pa ste/ /de bzhin pha rol phyin pa yin/ /dbus kyi dpa' bo thams cad ni/ /mkhas pas rgyab tu gshegs su gsol/ /gsang ba 'di ni mi bstan
cing / /rab tu 'bad de sba bar bya/ /de ltar brda yis dpa' bo rnams/ /de dang lhan cig bza' ba bza'/ /dpa' bos thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i
bde mchog yin/ /phan tshun rjes 'gro thams cad kyi/ /sna tshogs brda ni bshad par bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan nyid dang / /pho nya rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang / /
sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir/ /de dag thams cad bshad par bya/ /ras bris dang ni sku gzugs dang / /'bri na de bzhin dam tshig dang / /sku mdog gi
ni khyad par gyis/ /gang gis sgrub pa po 'grub pa/ /sna tshogs sngags kyis mdzes pa yi/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / /lha
yi dam tshig yid 'ong ba/ /rnal 'byor ma ni sna tshogs mchog /dpa' bo sna tshogs yid 'ong ba'i/ /rnal 'byor ma ni yang dag 'dus/ /mkha' 'gro ma yang yang
dag 'dus/ /rang rigs sna tshogs mchog dam pa/ /bla ma brgyud pa'i bka' bzhin du/ /slob ma la ni phan pa'i phyir/ /bdag po'i las la shin tu mkhas/ /
sngags dang rgyud la legs par bslabs/ /gzhan yang cho ga'i rim pa dang / /mngon brjod bla ma'i las la mkhas/ /phyugs kyi mtshan nyid sngags pas rtogs//
sna tshogs rigs kyi khyad par dang / /rnal 'byor ma yi spyod pa dang / /mkha' 'gro ma yang de bzhin te/ /phyi rol ma mo'i phyag rgya dag /phag mo yi ni rigs las
byung / /dpa' po kun gyi spyod pa dang / /'khor lo'i spyod pa shin tu bslabs/ /phyi yi rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi /mtshan nyid spyod pa dag la mkhas/ /he ru ka
dpal rigs las byung / /dge ba'i spyod pa dag la bslabs/ /yul gyi spyod pa'i khyad par dang / /slob dpon spyod pa dag la mkhas/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud spyod
dang / /rnal 'byor rgyud ni rgya che ba/ /bya ba'i rgyud kyi dbye ba'i rim/ /thams cad rgyud rnams rnam par shes/ /'grub pa'i lung dang bstan bcos dang / /mdo sde skyes rabs de bzhin
te| |bla na med pa'i spyod pa dag /shes rab pha rol phyin las byung / /phyi rol bstan bcos yongs la mkhas/ /phun sum tshogs pa slob dpon mchog /sbyor ba'i sgom par
ldan pa dang / /yid gnyis med pa nyid kyis ni/ /bza' ba thams cad bza' bar bya/ /yi ge brgya pas thams cad du/ /gsang sngags brtan par bsgoms nas su/ /rang
gi ming dang ldan par ni/ /gcig tu spel nas bzla bar bya/ /rtag tu phreng ba'i sngags kyang bzla/ /don rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /bla ma las kyang bla ma ste/ /mkha'
'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom/ /gsang sngags btus pas go cha dang / /snying po dang ni nye snying dang / /gsang sngags btus par rjes su bsrung / /dkyil 'khor shin tu mdzes
pa la| |yi ge'i dkyil 'khor legs bkod nas/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams bskyed/ /'di ni gsang sngags thams cad do/ /ma mo rnams kyi dam pa mchog /
gsang ba dga' ba sbas pa ste/ /gsang sngags thams cad bsdus pa yin/ /gsang sngags kun gyi gnas yin no/ /'gro ba 'byung ba'ang ma mos khyab/ /de nyid 'di ni
mi bstan te/ /dngos grub 'joms par 'gyur ba yin/ /sgom pa 'di ni mchog yin te/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub bla na med/ /skye 'gros
'di ni bsgoms tsam gyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang rnyed/ /byams pa'i go cha bgos pa ste/ /snying rje chos kyi go cha yin/ /shes rab mtshon char ldan pa yin/ /nyon
mongs bdud ni rnam par spangs/ /phyir ldog chen mos srung ba dang / /rdo rje zhal bzhis rnam par mtshan/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/ /kha sbyar gsum gyi rdo
rjes mtshan/ /thams cad mchog gi srung ba che/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /bka' yi 'khor lo srung ba che/ /phur bus bgegs med dngos grub 'gyur/ /
srung ba mchog ni 'di dag gis/ /sgrub pa po la byang chub stsol/ /rdo rje phur bus ra ba dang / /rdo rje'i sa dang dra ba dang / /steng gi gur dang bla re yis/ /gdug pa'i bdud
ni bskrad byas nas/ /mi gsod gsod pa med pa yin/ /gang gis rang sems thul ba yis/ /bdag gi sems ni bcings pa yin/ /gang la gang gis gsod pa
yin| |mnyam pa'i sems ni dri yin te/ /gru bzhi pa ni byug pa yin/ /tsan+dan dkar po lus yin te/ /mnyam par gnas pa nyid yin no/ /me tog bzod pa rnal
'byor pa/ /'bad pas gtor pa yin par bshad/ /rang bzhin dag pa bdug pa ste/ /mnyam pa'i sgom pa bdug pa yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma chen pe las/ de
kho na nyid kyi snying po'i don dam pa bstan pa ste le'u gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gros de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba gsungs
pa| de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /mngon brjod rgyud ni bla ma'i bla/ /bla ma brgyud pas bshad pa bzhin/ /phyi rol rnam rtog spangs nas ni/ /mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog
dam pa| |rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med/ /'jigs pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /tshes grangs med cing skar ma med/ /bslab pa'i cho ga'ang yod ma yin/ /gtsang
spra med cing mi gtsang med/ /dag pa'i bya ba'ang yod ma yin/ /dus dang tshod las rnam par grol/ /dag pa'i spyod pa rnam par spangs/ /rang gi sngags rgyud sbyor ba shes/ /
sems can kun gyi don yang byed/ /ril bu dang ni ri rtsi dang / /chu bo chen po'i ngogs dag dang / /rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dag dang / /shing gcig dang ni dge ba'i
gnas| |ma mo'i khyim mam dur khrod dam/ /sna tshogs dam pa'i ldum ra dang / /lha khang dang ni mchod rten gnas/ /khyim mam bzhi mdo dag tu ni/ /sgrub pa po yis sbyor
bsgrubs na/ /'dod pa kun gyi 'bras bu ster/ /gnas ni brtag pa byas nas kyang / /yid ni gang du dga' ba der/ /sna tshogs bde
mchod dam pa ni/ /de ru bsgrubs na dngos grub 'gyur/ /sems sbyor med pa nyid las ni/ /du mar dbye ba'i sgom pa yis/ /ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsis ni/ /sa
ni byug pa byas nas kyang / /bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa yi/ /me tog 'bad pas dgram par bya/ /sna tshogs phyag rgya yid 'ong gdan/ /mnyam par bzhag pas
rgya cher bya/ /rtse gcig pa yi sems kyis ni/ /bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa sgrub/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas te/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po bya/ /dge
ba bcu yang dmigs nas ni/ /sems can kun gyi don yang bya/ /phyi dang nang du bltas na ni/ /chos rnams thams cad stong pa yin/ /byang chub tshogs kyi
mchog dam pa/ /sems tsam la ni rab tu gnas/ /rang gi snying ga mkha' dkyil du/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gnas par bsgom/ /de steng de nyid mchog gyur
pa| |ye shes lnga po zhi ba yin/ /sna tshogs 'od zer gsal ba yi/ /rnam par 'phro bas kun tu khyab/ /sngon grub pa rnams bskul nas ni/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'ang
byed pa yin/ /nam mkha'i khams ni sgom dga' bas/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni mthong ba yin/ /til gyi gang bu lta bu yi/ /lha dang khro bos khyab par mthong / /sangs
rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /byang chub sems dang bla ma'i gtso/ /lha mo sna tshogs mthong nas ni/ /bdag gis mchod cing brjed par bya/ /sangs rgyas spros te
sprul pa'i tshogs/ /khro bo'i rgyal po rnal 'byor mas/ /'gro ba rigs drug sems can rnams/ /sangs rgyas gnas su dgod par byed/ /nam mkha'i dkyil ni kun
khyab pa'i/ /mchog de mthong nas bsdus nas su/ /thams cad gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /byang chub mthar thug bar du ni/ /sems can ma lus gyur pa rnams/ /
sangs rgyas go 'phang de la gzhag /de la sgrub pa pos gsol gdab/ /dge ba'i las las byung ba la/ /rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /rmongs pa'i gzugs can
nga rgyal dang / /gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang / /'du byed rnam shes de bzhin no/ /oM b+h+ruM oM hrIM hoHhUM/ de ni rnam par snang mdzad dang / /rdo rje nyi ma gar dbang phyug /
rdo rje rgyal pos khyab pa yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog de bzhin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni/ /he ru ka dpal rdo rje yi/ /mig dang rna ba sna dang ni/ /lce dang
reg pa yid de bzhin/ /oM hUM traM aM khaM haM/ gti mug dang ni zhe sdang dang / /de bzhin phrag dog 'dod chags dang / /ser sna dang ni rmongs
pa nyid| |skye mched dag ni thams cad la/ /dbang phyug rdo rje nyid yin no/ /sa dang chu dang de bzhin me/ /rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dag go /lAM mAM pAM tAM khAM/ ltung
byed ma dang gsod ma dang / /'gugs byed dang ni gar dbang dang / /pad+ma'i dra ba mo lha 'o/ /mkha' mnyam nam mkha' lta bu 'o/ /de ltar phung po khams dang ni/ /skye
mched rnams ni rnal 'byor pas/ /tha mal dngos po'i rang bzhin ni/ /yongs su dag par shes par bya/ /tha mal chos kun yongs dag ste/ /bdag kyang yongs
su dag pa yin/ /de nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro/ /sngags kyi sku ru 'gyur ba yis/ /he ru ka dpal dag gyur nas/ /sems can kun gyi don yang byed/ /
he ru ka yi go 'phang mchog /thob nas sems can ma lus pa/ /'di la 'jog cing 'god par shog /oM pra kr-i ti pa ri shud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHpra kr-i ti pa ri shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/
oM swa b+hA baHshud+d+hAHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ lan gsum bar du bzla bar bya/ /dngos med mdun sogs phyogs bcu ru/ /snying po'i phreng ba spro bar bya/ /
des na snying po de mthong nas/ /dra ba ra ba de bzhin te/ /rdo rjes sogs byin gyis brlabs/ /bla re mda' yi dra ba dang / /rdo rje me ni 'bar bar bskor/ /phyi rol ring nas dgod par bya/ /oM me de ni

badzri b+ha ba badzra ban+d+ha hUM/ oM badzra pra ka ra hUM baM hUM/ oM badzra pany+tsa ra hUM baM hUM/ oM badzra bi tA na hUM khaM hUM/ oM badzra sha ra dzA la trAM shaM trAM/ oM badzra dzA lA na lA rka hUM hUM hUM/ he ru ka yi bka' 'khor
lo| |gtso bo brgyad po 'bar ba dag /de mthong nas ni legs pa ru/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ /zhal gsum phyag drug
zhi ba ste| |dag pa'i shel dang zla mdog 'dra/ /phyag rgya che dang mnyam par ldan/ /shes rab skyil krung legs par bzhugs/ /thod pa'i phreng 'dra ldan pa'i dbu/ /mi bskyod
pa ni dbu rgyan bzhugs/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /thams cad mtshan mas mtshan pa yin/ /dpe byad kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing / /rdo rje
dril bus legs par 'khyud/ /zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin mdzad cing / /dpa' chen bde ba'i go 'phang bzhugs/ /dkar zhing ser la ljang gu ste/ /zhal gdong gnyis po
rnam par 'gyur/ /lugs su 'byung dang ldog tshul gyis/ /de yi khro bo brgyad dag spro/ /rdo rje drag po na larkaM/ /rdo rje gtsug tor de bzhin te/ /thab sbyor rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / /rdo rje
nag po stobs po che/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed ces bya ba/ /khro bo 'di dag rnam par dgod/ /sngo zhing ser la de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu du ba'i mdog can
te| |dkar zhing nag la gur gum mdog /rab 'jigs thod pa'i dbu rgyan can/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ /thams cad na ra'i rus pa yi/ /rgyan gyi sa spud pa rab tu
'bar| |g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis ni/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i nang bzhugs shing / /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po dag /zhabs kyis
mnan par rnam par bsam/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /zhags pa lcags kyu mchog kyang 'chang / /thams cad dril bu cang te'u/ /shes rab bde bas legs par 'khyud//
dmar ser dbu skra dag gis brgyan/ /mche ba rnam gtsigs 'jigs pa can/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /'jigs pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan can te/ /des ni
bdag nyid rgyan du byas/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad rnam par bsgom/ /khro zhing 'bar la g.yo ba dang / /drag cing 'jigs la rnam par 'gyur/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis legs par
brgyan| |g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /lcags kyu zhags pa kha T+wAM 'chang / /dril bu rdo rje thod pa 'dzin/ /mgo yi do shal sku la 'chang / /thod pa'i phreng ba'i
ska rags can/ /gdug pa thams cad zhabs 'og mnan/ /thabs dang shes rab mnyam par ldan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dbu rgyan can/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed bsgom par bya/ /khro go gnyis
po rnam par bsgom/ /steng du gtsug tor 'khor bsgyur te/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par bsgom/ /'og tu rdo rje sa 'og go /dkar la sngo ba'i mdog can yin/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /
'khor lo dang ni mdung 'dzin cing / /zhabs pa lcags kyu dril rdo rje/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /phur bu khro bo byas nas su/ /de ni phyogs bcur rnam par spro/ /de la
bka' lung bsgo ba ni/ /bgegs ni myur du med par gyis/ /gsang sngags rjes su dran nas su/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu mnyam par gzugs/ /mthe bong sdigs mdzub sbyor ba yis/ /

phyogs bcu dag tu se gol brdab/ /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM hUM phaT shar du'o/ /oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM hUM phaT byang du'o/ /oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM hUM phaT nub tu'o/ /oM a na ya hoHb+ha ga bAM bi d+yA rA dza
hUM hUM phaT lho phyogs su'o/ /gsang sngags rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /bgegs kun gyi ni klad pa la/ /rdo rje phur bus dgod cing mnan/ /lugs su 'byung dang ldog pa yin/ /oM g+ha g+ha g+ha ta ya

sarba duSh+TaM big+hA na hUM phaT/ oM kI la ya kI la yA sarba pA paM hUM hUM phaT/ /hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la ya badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti kA ya wAk+tsi t+ta badzra kI la ya hUM phaT/ phur bu do rje khro bo ru/ /bltar
nas yongs su brtag par bya/ /lugs su 'byung dang ldog pa yis/ /dngos grub rdo rjes brdung bar bya/ /oM badzra hUM mung+ga ra badzra kI la ya A ko Ta ya hUM hUM

phaT phaT/ mkhas pas rdo rje khro bo'i tshig /gsang sngags tshig ni drag tu bzla/ /oM kha badzra d+h+r-ika badzra hUM kA ra hUM phaT/ oM badzra tsaN+Da badzra hUM phaT/ /oM badzra a na lA rka badzra hUM phaT/ oM badzra

uSh+NI Sha badzra hUM phaT/ oM badzra kuN+Da li badzra hUM phaT/ oM badzra yak+Sha badzra hUM phaT/ oM badzra kA ra la badzra hUM phaT/ oM badzra ma hA ba la badzra hUM phaT/ oM badzra b+hI Sha na badzra hUM phaT/ oM badzra uSh+NI

Sha tsakra brti badzra hUM phaT/ oM badzra pA tA la badzra hUM phaT/ bka' 'di dag ni sgrub pa yis/ /de ma thag tu bgegs med 'gyur/ /mAM sa rkang dang zhag kha chu/ /shu kra rak+ta lhan cig sbyar/ /rnal
'byor pa yis ril bur byas/ /zos na dngos grub nges par 'gyur/ /sngo zhing ser la ljang gu ni/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad rang byas te/ /ser zhing nag la ljang gu dang / /dud ka ser la ser skya
dang / /dkar zhing ser la ljang gu dang / /dmar zhing ser la ljang bdag /de ltar bzhi ni bdag po bzhin/ /mi bskyod dbu rgyan dam tshig can/ /bsgoms pas rdo rje 'dzin pa dgyes/ /
'di ltar khro bo thams cad kyang / /dam tshig las ni 'gal ma byed/ /'di ltar sna tshogs du ma yi/ /gtso bo'i bka' ni blang bar gyis/ /rnal 'byor pa ni gar gnas pa/ /bgegs
rnams thams cad med par mthong / /gcer ba'am yang na mi gcer ba'am/ /skra grol thal bas yan lag byugs/ /ji ltar ji srid ma ngal bar/ /'khor lo dag gi bzlas pa bya/ /stong pa'i

ye shes rdo rje ni/ /dad pas dran zhing mnyam par gzhag /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM a ni mit+ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM a pra Ni hi ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko\u0f85haM/
smig rgyu tsam gyi ye shes ni/ /sems tsam du ni rnam par brtag /'di ni mkha' dang mnyam pa yi/ /chos med chos min pa yang med/ /nam mkha' gos pa med pa ltar/ /dngos po med cing
dmigs su med/ /gang gi snying gi kha sbyar dbus gnas gsal/ /phra bar lta ba rang byung myong ba'i sems 'jug pa/ /khams gsum ma lus gnyis med par ni nye bar 'gre/ /gsal ba chos
kyi dbyings mchog de la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /dbang po'i g.yo ba rta kun nang du nges sbyar ba'i/ /ye shes rgyal ba ma lus 'dus pa'i snod gyur pa/ /khams gsum ma lus gnyis med
par ni nyer 'gro ba'i/ /mthong ba mkha' dang 'dra bar dri med dpal du gyur/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis/ /chos ni rjes su dran pa bsgom/ /chos rjes dran pa'i rnal 'byor
gyis/ /chos kyi sku ni rang byung 'gyur/ /dbus na gsal byed rnam par shes/ /ye shes mchog ni shes rnams kyi/ /shin tu gsal bar bsgoms pa las/ /'bar ba 'di ni the tshom
med| |rtag tu snying la gnas pa yi/ /thig le gcig pu yi ge med/ /skyes bus de ni bsgoms gyur na/ /ye shes skye bar gyur pa mchog /sems pa rjes dran
rnal 'byor gyis/ /sems dpa' rjes su dran par bsgom/ /sems dpa' rjes dran chos kyis ni/ /chos kyi sems dpa' khyad par 'byung / /bdag ni snying rjes phan 'dogs pa/ /smon lam
dbang gis mthong ba dang / /mthong nas ji srid 'og tu ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' kun mkhyen dag /dgar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /sngon po yi ni
zhal dang bzhi/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam/ /yi ge yaM las yang dag 'byung / /sngo pa'i mdog can gzhu lta bu'o/ /rgyal mtshan gyis ni mtshan par bsgom/ /dud pa'i
phreng ba khyab par dmigs/ /de yi steng du yi ge raM/ /me yi dkyil 'khor mchog dam pa/ /gru gsum pa la dmar ba'i mdog /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'bar bas khyab/ /nyi ma bye ba
'od mtha' yas/ /rdo rjes mtshan pa bsgom par bya/ /de yi steng du chu nyid de/ /yi ge baM mchog las byung ba/ /du sha ra yi mdog 'dra ba/ /zlum la 'od zer phreng ba can/ /de yi
steng dus dkyil 'khor/ /laM las byung ba ser po ste/ /zur bzhi pa la rdo rjes mtshan/ /'od zer ser po khyab par 'khrigs/ /rnal 'byor de steng bsgom pa ni/ /ri rab
lhun po mchog gyur pa/ /zur bzhi pa la rin chen bzhi/ /rtse mo brgyad kyis rnam par mdzes/ /yi ge suM las legs par byung / /'od zer gzi brjid mchog dam pa'o/ /de yi steng du
bsam pa ni/ /bruM ni dkar po las byung ba/ /de steng 'khor lor bcas pa dag /khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par bsam/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /dra ba dra phyed

kyis mdzes shing / /ba dan phreng bas rnam par rgyan/ /zur gyi cha ni thams cad dang / /sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan cing / /phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo/ /de yi nang
du 'khor lo ni/ /brgyad po dkar po'i mdog can la/ /de yi dbus su pad+ma che/ /sna tshogs 'dab ma brgyad pa la/ /lte ba ge sar gyis khyab pa/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rig
mar bcas/ /dkar po ser po de bzhin te/ /dmar dang ljang gu zhal bzhi pa/ /zhi zhing dgod dang khro ba dang / /rnam par 'gyur ba shin tu 'jigs/ /rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan/ /mdung dang
dgra sta cang te'u dang / /gri gug thod pa kha T+wAM ga /tshangs pa'i pags pa gos su mnabs/ /zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo dag /phyag ni bcu gnyis de bzhin te/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo
krung du bzhugs/ /dbu rgyan thod pa'i cod pan can/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /dpe byad mtshan dang yang dag ldan/ /thugs kyi ye shes dam tshig can/ /cod
pan rdo rje 'dzin pa yin/ /ji ltar thabs bzhin shes rab de/ /phyag rgya lnga po byin gyis brlab/ /rigs kyi dbye bas phye nas ni/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang
phyug mchog /bde ba chen po'i thabs sbyor bas/ /sku ni gnyis su med par thim/ /mnyam pa nyid las byung ba'i sku/ /mkha' 'gro'i 'khor ni dpa' bo dang / /rnal 'byor ma
dang bcas par byung / /g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang tshul gyis bzhugs/ /dkar sngon ser dmar zhal mdog ste/ /'khor lo dril bus 'khyud pa'i phyag /sngar gyi rdo rje sems
sogs pa'i/ /phyag mtshan rim par 'dzin pa yin/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan dang ni/ /mgo bo'i phreng ba rlon pas spud/ /zla ba phyed pa rab 'dzin pa/ /zhal bzhi mche ba rnam par
gtsigs/ /spyan gsum phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/ /tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha zhabs kyis gnon pa/ na ra'i rus pa'i rgyan can/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan can/ phyag
rgya drug gis brgyan pa/ stag gi pags pa bgos pa/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro mas pang du 'khyud pa/ sku la thod pa dang gdug pa la sdigs mdzub kyi 'khor lo 'dzin pas
'khyud pa/ byin pa gnyis kyis 'khril ba/ bde ba dang dgyes pas myos pa/ khams dang / phung po dang / skye mched rnams byin gyis brlabs te sa'i khams ni/ laM ste/ ltung
byed ma'o/ /chu'i khams ni/ maM ste/ gsod byed ma'o/ /me'i khams ni/ raM ste/ 'gugs byed ma'o/ /rlung gi khams ni/ yaM ste/ gar gyi dbang phyug ma'o/ /nam mkha'i khams
ni| khaM ste| pad+ma'i dra ba ma'o/ /ser ba dang / sngo ba dang / dmar ba dang / dud ka dang / /sngo ba'o/ /gzugs kyi phung po rnam par snang mdzad de/ oM mdog dkar po/ tshor ba'i phung po rdo rje
rin chen te/ aM gser btso ma'i mdog lta bu/ 'du shes hri ste/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dmar po/ 'du byed rdo rje rgyal po ho ljang gu /rnam par shes pa rdo rje sems dpa' hUM dkar po/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid ni/ dpal he ru ka ste/ hi mdog nag po/ mig bruM ste/ gti mug rdo rje dkar po/ rna ba hUM zhe sdang rdo rje ste/ nag po'o/ /sna ni/ khaM phrag dog
rdo rje ste| ser po'o/ /ngag chags pa rdo rje ste/ a dmar pa'o/ /reg pa ni/ ser sna rdo rje ste/ haM ljang gu'o/ /skye mched thams cad dbang phyug rdo rje ste/ haM dkar po'o/ /lus ni/ hUM ste/
dkar po'o/ /ngag ni/ AHste/ dmar po'o/ /yid ni/ oM ste/ sngon po'o/ /de ltar lus ngag yid gsum gyi bar byin gyis brlab cing dmigs so/ /de la shar gyi 'dab ma'i mkha'
'gro ma ni/ sku mdog sngon po'o/ /lho phyogs kyi 'dab ma la lA ma ni/ ljang gu ste/ sngo sangs so/ /nub phyogs kyi 'dab ma la dum skyes ma dmar mo/ byang gi 'dab ma la gzugs
can ma gser gyi mdog ser skya zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ spyan gsum pa/ skra grol ba/ phyogs kyi gos 'chang ba/ g.yas brkyang
bas gnas pa/ 'jigs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba/ phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa/ thod pa dang kha T+wAM ga dang cang te'u dang gri gug 'dzin pa/ zhal gdong rjes su chags
pas gnas pa/ dgyes pa'i chags pas lta zhing reg pa'o/ /mtshams bzhir bdud rtsi lnga'i bum pa'i steng du byang chub kyi sems kyis gang ba'i snod bzhi gzhag go /shar
du pre ta pu rir stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can ma nag po/ /byang du gr-i ha de ba tar rdo rje rin chen dang / dum skyes ma ser mo/ /nub tu sau raSh+Tar rta mgrin dang /
chang tshong ma dmar po'o/ /lhor su war+Na dwI par nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma ljang gu'o/ /mer nag rar dpal khrag 'thung dang / rab dpa' mo dmar po'o//
bden bral du sin+d+hur pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen ma ste zla ba dang / ser skya'o/ /rlung phyogs na ma ru tar rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor los bsgyur ma dud ka'i
mdog dang / dbang ldan du ku lu tar rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson 'grus chen mo dkar po'o/ /stobs po che la sogs pa'i dpa' bo ni/ zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/
ral pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ phyag gnyis la 'khor lo dang dril bus 'khyud pa/ phyag gzhan la kha T+wAM ga dang cang te'u 'dzin pa/ phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa/ g.yas brkyang bas
bzhugs pa'o/ /'khor lo'i shugs can ma la sogs pa'i lha mo ni/ gdong gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ thod pa dang / sdigs mdzub 'khor lo 'dzin pas 'khyud pa/ spyan gsum
pa| drag po'i gzugs can/ skra grol pa/ gcer bu gnyis su med par sbyor bar mnyam par gnas pa/ phyogs kyi gos can ma mgrin pa'i nor bu dang / gdu bu dang /
dpung rgyan dang / rna cha dang / tshangs pa'i skud pa dang / mgul rgyan dang / mgo'i phreng ba dang / g.yer kas 'og pag byas pa shar dang / byang dang / nub dang / lho'i
sgor kha gdong ma dang / 'ug gdong ma dang / khyi gdong ma dang / phag gdong ma rnams so/ /me dang / bden bral dang / rlung dang / dbang ldan du ni gshin rje sreg ma dang /
gshin rje'i pho nya mo dang / gshin rje mche ba ma dang / gshin rje 'joms ma rnams so/ /ji ltar mkha' 'gro ma bzhi ni/ khwa gdong ma la sogs pa'i dbye ba yang de
bzhin no/ /mtshams kyi lha mo gzugs gnyis pa/ yid 'phrog ba'i tshul can/ yi dwags kyi gdan la bzhugs pa/ drag po chen po thugs rjes sems can
gyi don mdzad pa'o/ /dpa' bo 'di dag thams cad kyang dpral bar 'khor lo'i phreng ba can no/ /'di dag ni/ sku'i 'khor lo sa
'og na gnas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor la bzhugs te dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnam pa sna tshogs pa chags pa'i mig gis blta zhing / sna tshogs
ro bcud bde ba ste/ /chags pa'i bde ba chen po ni/ /de ring du ni bdag gis rnyed/ /a la la ho dgyes pa che/ /bde ba chen po de nyid yin/ /bde gshegs
lha ni shin tu mdzes/ /glu 'di blangs pa tsam gyis ni/ /dga' bas srid pa dag las grol/ /bde bar gshegs pa dag pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor du ni rnam
par brtag /mngal skyes glu yi dbang gyur par/ /rnal 'byor kha cig 'dod pa yin/ /mngal skyes sku yi 'khor lo ste/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor bltas nas
ni| |mchod dang bstod pa byas nas gzhug /spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par bsgom/ /rnal 'byor pa yis ma nor bar/ /
bzlas pa khri 'am 'bum du bzla/ /skye ba can gyi lus grub ste/ /mkha' la spyod par the tshom med/ /oM shrI kA ya DA ka ru lu ru lu b+h+rUM hUM phaT/ DA ki nI
dzA la shaM wa ra swAhA/ snying po'o/ /oM b+h+rUM haM ha b+h+rUM hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye b+h+rUM bai ro tsa nI ye b+h+rUM hUM phaT swAhA/ snying po'o/ /oM

b+h+rUM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye hUM b+h+rUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM k+Sh+mAM ma hA ba la k+Sh+mAM huM hUM phaT/ oM tsakra be ge huM hUM phaT/ oM haM raM badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he
huM hUM phaT/ oM ha ya grI bA hi huM hUM phaT/ oM shoN+Di nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM hUM A kA shA gar+b+ha huM hUM phaT/ oM tsakra warma NI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ki li shrI he ru ka
ki li huM hUM phaT/ oM su bI re huM hUM phaT/ oM si li pad+ma ni rte shwa ra si li huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ba le huM hUM phaT/ oM hi le bai ro tsa nI ye hi li huM hUM phaT/ oM tsakra
brti nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM d+hi li badzra satwa d+hi li huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA biR+ya huM hUM phaT/ oM kA kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM u lU kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM shwA nA s+ye huM hUM
phaT| oM sU ka rA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dA D+hI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dU tI huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma daMSh+TI NI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ma ma ma tha nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM
DA ki nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM lA me huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT/ oM rU bi NI ye huM hUM phaT/ mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma sogs la/ /thog ma pad+ma
la gnas nas/ /mchod pa bya zhing sngags kyang bzla/ /rtag tu bdag nyid lnga po dag /'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ /
zhi ba dang ni dbang nyid dang / /rmongs par bya dang gnon pa dag /sku yi mkha' 'gros byed pa ste/ /dngos grub dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /dam tshig can dag
langs dus su/ /yan lag drug tu bsgom bya ba/ /rnam dag ye shes mig gis ni/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams blta/ /oM ha snying ga la/ na maH hi mgo
bo la/ swA hA hu spyi gtsug la/ oM bau ShaT he go cha 'o/ hUM hUM ho mig la'o/ /phaT haM yan lag kun gyi mtshon cha'o/ /dkar ba ser dang dmar ba dang / /sngo dang
ljang gu dud kha dang / /yid kyis mdog drug rnam par bsgom/ /oM baM sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma ste/ lte ba la'o/ /hAM oM ya mi ni ste/ snying ga la'o/ /hrIM moM rmongs
byed ma ste/ kha la'o/ /hriM hrIM g.yo byed ma ste/ mgo bo la'o/ /hUM hUM skrag byed ma ste/ spyi gtsug la 'o/ /phaT na maH tsaN+Ti ka ste/ yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon
cha'o| |dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma thams cad/ /mkha' 'gro rnams ni bzhugs nas kyang / /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad 'di yis rnam par brtag/ 'chi
med ye shes lnga bza' zhing / /ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya/ /rdo rje dam tshig can mchod nas/ /dus bzhi dag tu bsnyen pa bya/ /mngon par brjod ba'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/
sku'i sdom pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnam bsgoms te/ /sngar gyi dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu/ /
gsung gi 'khor lo rnam par bsgom/ /rtsibs brgyad dmar po'i mdog can la/ /nang gi 'dab ma snga ma bzhin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bla med pa/ /gsung gi rdo rje rnam par bsgom/ /
gdong bzhi pa la phyag bcu gnyis/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro mas 'khyud cing / /rtag tu bde ba che la bzhugs/ /pad+ma dril bus mnyam
par 'khyud/ /dbang phyug chen po'i mgo bsnams shing / /dbang phyug chen po'i pags pa ni/ /phyag gnyis dag gis brkyang nas 'dzin/ /lhag ma ni/ snga ma'i rim pa bzhin du
'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug chen po'i 'khor rnams ni/ /zhabs 'og mnan par rnam par blta/ /dmar zhing sngo la de bzhin ser/ /g.yon pa dkar la spyan gsum pa/ /ral ba'i
dbu rgyan dag gis brgyan/ /thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la mdzes/ /zla ba phyed pa 'chang ba dang / /sna tshogs pad+ma rnam dgod cing / /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / /'jigs
pa'i zhal ni rnam 'gyur zhing / /sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su bgos/ /mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng ba can/ /mgul
rgyan gdu bu rna cha dang / /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /mchod phyir thogs dang thal ba ste/ /phyag rgya drug tu rab tu grags/ /de dag pha rol phyin drug ste/ /phyag rgya
drug gis rgyas btab pa'o/ /de yi pang na bcom ldan ma/ /pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ma rang mdog/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa/ /gcer bu skra ni grol ba ni/ /dum
bus brgyan pa'i ska rags can/ /phyag g.yon thod 'dzin 'khyud pa dang / /gdug pa'i bdud kyi khrag 'chang zhing / /pad ldan lag pas phyogs kun tu/ /gdug pa kun
la sdigs mdzub byed/ /bskal pa'i me lha gzi brjid 'bar/ /zhal nas kyang na khrag 'dzag cing / /byin pa gnyis kyis rnam par 'khril/ /bde ba chen po thugs rje'i
bdag/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs sngar bshad bzhin/ /pad+ma la sogs phyogs bkod na/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /sngar bshad mdog tu gnas pa ste//
'on kyang mkha' 'gro ma dkar po/ /dum skyes ma ni de bzhin nag/ lha mo gnyis po mdog de bzhin/ /phyag g.yon kha T+wAM thod pa dang / /g.yas pa cang te'u gri gug
'dzin/ /mtsham pa ni bzhi po dag tu yang / /'chi med lnga po'i bum steng du/ /byang chub sems kyi snod kyang gzhag /gsung gi 'khor lo'i shar du kA ma ru pa na myu gu can dang / sa srung ma
ste/ dkar po'o/ /byang du o te na rdo rje ral pa can dang / 'jigs byed ma chen mo ste/ dmar po'o/ /nu ba tu tri sha ku na na dpa' bo chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma ste/ nag po'o//
lho ru ko sa lar rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma ste/ gnam mdog ljang gu'o/ /me'i phyogs su ka ling+ka na rab bzang dang / sngo sangs ma ste/ ser skya'o/ /bden bral du lAM pa ka na rdo rje
bzang dang / rab bzang ma ste/ dkar po'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su kA ny+tsi na 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rnam ste/ ljang gu'o/ /dbang ldan na hi ma la ya na mig mi bzang dang / bya gdong ma ste/
gnam mdog sngo sangs so/ /gsung gi 'khor lo sa la spyod pa'o/ /myu gu can la sogs pa'i dpa' bo ni/ zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ spyan gsum pa /ral pa'i cod pan
can/ dar dpyang dang ldan pa/ phyag gnyis na pad+ma dang / dril bus 'khyud pa/ g.yon pa'i phyag na kha T+waM ga /g.yas na cang te'u/ phyag rgya lnga la sogs pas brgyan pa/ /g.yas
brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs pa'o/ /e rA ba ti la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni/ phyag gnyis pa/ zhal gcig pa/ thod pa dang / sdigs mdzub pad+ma can gyis 'khyud pa/
mgul rgyan dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rna rgyan dang / tshangs pa'i skud pa dang ldan pa'o/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i mgul rgyan can/ /'og pag dag
gi sku rags ldan/ /kha gdong la sogs dbye ba yis/ /sngar bshad sgo srung la sogs bzhin/ /gshin rje sreg sogs lha mo rnams/ /mtshams bzhi 'di ltar shes par
bya| |dpa' bo 'di dag thams cad kyang / /dpral pa pad+ma'i phreng ba can/ /phung po skye mched khams rnams kun/ /sku gsung thugs su rnam par brtag/ sngar bshad pa yi cho
ga bzhin/ /yi ge rnams ni dgod cing sgom/ /thugs ni AH ste dmar po yin/ /gsung ni oM ste dkar por bshad/ /rdo rje sku ni hUM yin te/ /nam mkha' zla ba lta bu'o//
dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kyang / /thams cad sbyor zhing bsgoms nas su/ /ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas/ /dbang bskur bas ni gzhug par bya/ /thams cad
byung ste thim nas su/ /thams cad sgom zhing bsam par bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rim pa yis/ /spro bsdu dag gi sbyor bar bya/ /oM shrI wA ka DA ka A ro li ka hUM phaT/ hUM

DA ki nI dzA la shaM pa raM swA hA/ snying po'o/ /oM A ro li ka hrIH hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM pad+ma DA ki ni ye hrIH huM hUM phaT swA hA/ snying po'o/ /oM sarba pad+ma DA ki nI pe a huM hUM phaT swA hA/

nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM DA ki nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM lA me huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT/ oM rU pi NI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM phaT aM ku ri ka phaT huM hUM phaT/ oM ai rA ba tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM

da ha badzra dza Ti la da ha huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA b+hai ra bI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa ma hA bI ra pa tsa huM hUM phaT/ oM bA yu be ge huM hUM phaT/ oM b+hak+Sha badzra hUM ka ra b+hak+Sha ba sa ru d+hi ra an+t+ra mA lA ba laM bi ne

huM hUM phaT/ oM su ra b+ha k+ShI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na su b+ha dre gr-ih+Na sab+ta pA tA ga ga ta b+hu dzaM ga sarba bA/ tardza ya ta rdza ya huM hUM phaT/ oM sh+yA ma de bI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM a ka D+D+h+ya badzra badzra b+ha dra A

kaD+D+h+ya huM hUM phaT/ oM su b+ha dre huM hUM phaT/ oM hr-I ma hA b+hai ra ba hrAM huM hUM phaT/ oM ha ya kar+Ne huM hUM phaT/ oM dz+NauM bi rU pAk+Sha ye dz+NauM huM hUM phaT/ oM kha gA na ne huM hUM phaT/ oM kA kA s+ye hUM hUM phaT/

oM u lU ka s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM shA nA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM sU kA rA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dA D+hI ya huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma du tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma daMSh+Ti NI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma tha nI ye huM
hUM phaT/ rdo rje dam tshig gis mchod nas/ /bzlas pa'i cho ga rab tu bya/ /dgug pa dang ni rgyas pa nyid/ /sna tshogs las ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /chos can yid 'ong gyur pa ste/ /ngag
gi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur/ /mchog dang bar ma thams cad dang / /tha ma thams cad mthar gnas la/ /de la thams cad gnas pa ste/ /sna tshogs gdul ba'i mchog
dam pa| |'dod pa'i chags pas rjes su chags pas rjes su chags/ /'dod pa'i dga' bas myos pa dag/ bdag nyid chen po sgrub pa po/ /de yi dbang du gnas
pa yin/ /sna tshogs pad+ma mdzes gnas nas/ /rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyod/ /b+hur+b+hu 'dod chags chos kyi bdag/ bde ba che la rnam par bzhugs/ /langs pa'i dus
su dam tshig ni/ /dri chen rdo rje chu bza' zhing / /chos kyi phung po rdzogs gyur nas/ /rig pa'i rgyal po la sogs 'grub/ /oM ha snying ga la/ na maH hi mgo la/ Sha swA hA hu A
ro li ka spyi gtsug la/ bauShaT he go cha/ hUM hUM ho mig la'o/ /phaT haM mtshon cha'o/ /chos kyi rdo rje dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / rdo rje 'jigs
byed dang / rdo rje nyi ma dang / rta mchog ste/ dmar ba dang / ser ba dang / dkar ba dang / sngo ba dang / dmar ba dang /gur gum gyi mdog dang / ljang gu ste/ bye brag go/ oM

baM pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ma ste/ lte ba la'o/ /haM yoM pad+ma ya mi ni dang / hrIM moM pad+ma rmongs byed ma dang / hrIM hrIM pad+ma g.yo byed ma dang / hUM hUM pad+ma skrag byed ma dang / phaT phaT haM pad+ma
tsaN+Dika ste/ snying ga dang / mgo dang / spyi gtsug dang / mig dang / chos kyi mtshon cha rnams so/ /dmar ba dang / sngo ba dang / dkar ba dang / ser ba dang / ljang gu dang /
dud ka'i mdog can no/ /bzlas pa'i dus su dgod pa ste/ /ji ltar bde bar spyad par bya/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi/ /go 'phang gnas ni bzhugs pa yin/ /mnyam
par bzhag pas drod 'byung ba/ /rtse gcig dmigs pas blang bya ste/ /gsung gi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yi/ /chos rnams thams cad rab tu brtag /rdo
rje chu dang rnam snang dang / /sbrang rtsi mar dkar lhan cig sbyar/ /lce yi dam tshig sbyor ba yis/ /snying po'i ye shes de nyid do/ /bdag po dbu rgyan la bsgoms la/ /ci bde bar ni
bza' ba bza'/ /lha yi gzugs su gyur nas su/ /'dod pa'i lha yi bdag por skye/ /bza' ba'o ma'i btung ba yis/ /nad dang rga ba rnam par spangs/ /sems can rjes su
chags pa yi/ /lha mo glu 'dis bskul ba yis/ /byang chub chos rnams thams cad kyi/ /sems can don ni bla med mdzad/ /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa yis/ /thugs rje
bskyed cing bstan par mdzad/ /gsang ba'i chos ni bstan nas kyang / /ngag gi dngos grub mchog kyang 'grub/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji lta bar ni bstan
pas grol/ /de nyid rnal 'byor mas bskul nas/ /sna tshogs du ma mang po yi/ /dam tshig mchod pa ngo mtshar rmad/ /mig bye nas ni bstod pa ni/ /A par ta ru su ra ta
su kha bA hA su kha me tA sau khya ma ya/ sa ma ya ra ma ra ma ho/ /sur ta so bya ya tre sa ma tsa ri ti/ su ra ta sau khya ya tre sa ma tsa ri ti/ /su ga ta sA n+ta ma ya pra bi 'i

bi kurba bi kurba/ su ra ta di ya pad+ma dz+wa le/ pra bi dzim+pa dzim+pa/ su ra to su kha pad+ma dz+wa le/ pra bi nan+ta na rta su kha sa da na pad+ma dz+wa le/ pra bi marda su ra ta ma ba si bi shwa dza le ho ha hUM ha ha ho/ /dza

ya mahA su kha su kha te dze ma ya ra ma ra ma ho/ /su ra ke tu su kha ba hUM bi ti te dza mu ka dza ya te dza ra/ ha na ta ho ba rA ha/ sa su kha ho hUM ho ho su ra to twA ra ga su kha ra ti rI dzi na par ma shrI ra ti

ho| |pa ra ma he tu ma hA su kha ho/ /su kha ma nu yo na ra ba ra me shwa ra ho/ /ho b+ha ga wA na ma hA su khaM hUM ho/ /ba huM bi ti bi shwa dzA la ri ta bi shwa ma ho/ /su ra ti su khaM ga tsit+ta pa ra ma mahA su
kha ho/ /su khu ma nu gr-ih+dz+ya ho/ /su ra ta ut+ta ma san+di su khaM a A ro li ka/ a ma hA su kha gr-i h+dz+ya ho/ /glu 'di dag ni blangs tsam gyis/ /dga' zhing bde ba yang dag 'dus/ /bde ba chen
po yid 'dod pa/ /dngos grub kyang ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /'khor tshogs chen po byin brlabs nas/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dgyes pa che/ /pad+ma dra ba'i sdom pa yin/ /mngon par
brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma las/ gsung gi sdom pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /gzhal yas
brtsegs ma'i dbus dag tu/ /'khor lo mchog ni dgod par bya/ /sngon po'i mdog can gzi brjid che/ /gsang ba las byung rtsibs brgyad pa/ /de yi dbus su pad+ma ni/ /sna tshogs
pad+ma ge sar can/ /'dab ma brgyad du bshad pa ste/ /rnam dag gdan du byas pa yin/ /de yi dbus su zla ba bsgom/ /der ni zla ba khyab par ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /lha

mchog grol zhing bzhengs par gyur/ /oM hUM a mahA su kha a la la ho/ /ma hA su ra ta s+t+waM su ra ta su kha bi yo ga su ra ta ut+ta ma bo d+hi su khaM/ su kha ma nu sid+d+hi ho/ /su ra ta ba ya sau khya ma ya

oM AH hUM hoH b+ha ga wA na ma hA su kha ut+ta ra ut+ta ra/ sar+b+ba ut+ta ma sau khya ma ya hUM/ a la la ho/ /mahA su kha s+t+waM/ ba ra ma su khA ma lai du bi bi ut+ta ma dzA la su khaM a la la ho/ /su ra te sau
khya ma ya/ bcom ldan bde ba chen po ni/ /'khor dang bcas par mnyam par bzhengs/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo zhal bzhi pa/ phyag bcu gnyis pa/ g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum
pa'i zhabs kyis bzhugs pa/ spyan gsum pa/ mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/ sngo ba dang / dkar ba dang / ser ba dang / dmar ba'i zhal/ rdo rje dang dril bus 'khyud pa/ khyab 'jug
gi mgo bo phyag na bsnams pa/ khyab 'jug gi pags pa rlon pa brkyang nas phyag gzhan gnyis na bsnams pa'o/ /lhag ma sku'i mkha' 'gro dang mtshungs so/ /thod pa'i phreng ba
can| mgo'i phreng ba 'chang ba/ mgo'i phreng bas sku rags bcings pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' dbu rgyan can/ /zla ba phyed pa'i rgyan yang 'chang / /sna tshogs
rdo rje cod pa na gnon/ /stag gi pags pa gos su man bas/ /phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan/ /mdun gyi mkha' 'gro ma ni/ zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ spyan gsum
pa| skra grol ba/ gtser bu dum bus brgyan pa/ ska rags can/ phyag g.yon pa thod pa thogs pas 'khyud pa/ g.yas pa rdo rje sdigs mdzub can/ /ska rags g.yer ka'i sgra
sgrog pa/ /chos kyi sgra ni yid 'ong ba/ /'byung bar 'gyur ba bye ba snyed/ chos kyi dbyings te stong pa yin/ /mnyam pa nyid dang so sor rtog/ /bya byed pa yang de bzhin bsgom/ /sbyor
ba mchog gi dam pa ste/ /rnam dag legs par brtags nas su/ /mnyam nyid chos kyi ro gcig byas/ /'khor lo la ni rnam par blta/ /shar gyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro dang //
lho phyogs lA ma de bzhin te/ /nub phyogs dum skyes ma dang ni/ /byang phyogs gzugs can ma de bzhin/ /dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu'i mdog can mchog
dam pa| |thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /cang te'u gri gug de bzhin te/ /spyan gsum pa la bzhin rnams bsgyur/ /gcer bu skra grol 'jigs ba can/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas
pas bzhugs/ /'dod pa'i chags pas legs par myos/ /cung zad ngo tsha'i mig zur dang / /nu ma rab rgyas dga' ba 'dzin/ /zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs/ /phyag rgya lnga yis
rgya yang gdab/ /mtshams bzhi ru ni bum pa dag/ ye shes bdud rtsi gang bas dgod/ /de steng byang chub sems kyis ni/ /yongs su gang bar gzhag par bya/ /thugs kyi 'khor
lo'i shar phyogs su pU li ra ma la ya na thod pa'i dum bu dang / rab gtum ma ste/ dkar po'o/ /byang du dzA lan+d+ha ra na keng rus chen po dang / gtum mig ma ste/ ser bo'o/ /nub tu au
D+yan na keng rus can dang / 'od ldan ma ste/ dmar po'o/ /lho phyogs su arbu ta na ma che ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / sna chen ma ste/ ljang gu'o/ /me'i phyogs na go dA ba ri na lha dgra
dang / dpa' ba'i blo gros ma nam mkha'i mdog can ma'o/ /bden bral du rA me shwa ra na 'od dpag med dang / mi'u thung ma ste/ dkar skya'o/ /rlung gi phyogs na de bi ko Ti na rdo rje'i
'od dang / lang+ka'i dbang phyug ma ste/ ljang gu dang / mu tig lta bu'o/ /dbang ldan na ma lA ba na rdo rje lus dang / shing grib ma ste/ pad+ma dang / ser skya'o/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo nam
mkha' la spyod pa'o/ /thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bo ni/ gdong gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ ral pa'i cod pan can/ thugs rjes khro zhing 'jigs pa/ rdo rje dang dril bu'i
phyag gnyis kyis 'khyud pa/ g.yon pa dang g.yas pa'i phyag gnyis la khwa T+wAM ga dang / cang te'u 'chang ba/ phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa/ g.yas brkyang
pas bzhugs pa'o/ /rab gtum ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni/ zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ sdigs mdzub kyis thod ba 'khyud pa/ spyan gsum pa/ ser skya'i gzugs
can no| |skra grol ba/ gzugs gnyis pa/ gnyis su med par mnyam par ldan pa/ phyogs kyi gos can rnam par rol pa/ mgrin pa'i nor bu dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang /
rna cha dang / tshangs pa'i skud pa dang / mgul rgyan dang / mgo bo'i phreng ba dang / g.yer ka'i sku rags can/ sgo dang zur gyi lha mo rnams/ /khwa gdong gshin rje sreg la sogs//
ji ltar mkha' 'gro mdog bzhin du/ /khwa gdong la sogs de bzhin no/ /mtshams rnams lha mo de bzhin te/ /gzugs gnyis 'dzin cing yid 'phrog pa'o/ /phyag sogs de
ltar bsgoms nas ni/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas/ /mchod dang bstod dang dbang yang bskur/ /sgom pa rtse gcig byas na ni/ /bdag
med ma yi go 'phang gnas/ /snying po ye shes dam tshig ni/ /sgrub pos 'dod pa kun gyi phyir/ /sku gsung thugs la rnam bkod nas/ /sangs rgyas mchog ni rnam par spro/ /rtag

tu dam tshig bskyang bya zhing / /ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsi chu/ /dam tshig mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /cho ga bzhin du bzlas pa bya/ /oM shri tsit+ta DA ki d+hi ka a khaM huM hUM phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra

huM hUM phaT/ snying po'o/ /oM hrIH ha ha huM hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM badzra DA ki nI huM hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM sarba badzra DA ki nI ye badzra bar+Na nI ye huM hUM phaT/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying

po'o/ /oM DA ki nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM lA me huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT/ oM rU pi Ni huM hUM phaT/ oM ka raM khaN+Da ka pA la ka ra huM hUM phaT/ oM pra tsa N+De huM hUM phaT/ oM ku ru mahA kaM kA la ku ru

huM hUM phaT/ oM tsaN+DA k+Shi ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ban+d+ha kaM kA la ban+d+ha huM hUM phaT/ oM pra b+ha pa tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM tA sa ya bi ka Da daM Sh+TaM Ni tA sa ya huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA na se huM hUM phaT/ oM k+Sho b+ha ya su

ra bai ri Na k+Sho b+ha ya huM hUM phaT/ oM bI ra ma tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM hroM a mi tA b+hA hroM huM hUM phaT/ oM kharba rI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM hra badzra b+hA hra huM hUM phaT/ oM laM ke shwA rI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM pheM badzra

de ha pheM huM hUM phaT/ oM dru mats+tsha ye huM hUM phaT/ oM kA kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM u lU kA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM shwA nA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM sU ka rA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dA D+hI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma du
tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma daM Sh+Ti NI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma tha nI ye huM hUM phaT/ bzlas pa sgom par ldan byas nas/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i rim pa yis/ /sngags pa myur du 'grub pa ste//
rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang rnyed/ /mnyam pa'i dam tshig dam tshig mchog /thugs kyi rnyed pas khyab pa la/ /rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyod/ /mkha'
la spyod pa nyad thob 'gyur/ /'di ni khams gsum thams cad du/ /go 'phang mchog la legs par bzhugs/ /langs ba'i dus su dam tshig can/ /yan lag drug tu sbyor ba
bshad/ /oM haH snying ga ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po/ /na ma hi mgo la ste/ rnam par snang mdzad ser po/ /swA hA hu spyi gtsug la ste/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug zla ba dang ser
skya'o| |bau ShaT he go cha ste/ he ru ka nam mkha'i mdog can no/ /hUM hUM ho mig la ste/ rdo rje nyi ma gser btso ma lta bu'o/ /phaT haM ni/ yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha ste/ rta
mchog ljang gu ser skya'o/ /oM baM lte ba la ste/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro nam mkha' dang ser skya'o/ /haM yoM snying ga la ya mi ni/ dkar mo'o/ /hrIM moM kha la ste/ rmongs byed ma dmar mo'o/ /hreM
hrIM mgo la ste/ g.yo byed ma ser mo'o/ /hUM hUM spyi gtsug la ste/ skrag byed ma sngon mo'o/ /phaT phaT yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha ste/ tsa N+Di ka dmar ser ro/ /ji ltar bde bar
cho ga bzhin du spyod cing gnas so/ /'gro ba du ma'i bsam pal/ /thugs kyi rdo rje tshul can 'di/ /gnyis med sbyor ba mtha' yas pa/ /srid pa kun gyi dngos por gnas/ /dri
ma med cing nga rgyal med/ /yi ge med cing brjod du med/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma las/ thugs kyi sdom pa dang / bla ma'i bsnyen bkur gyi le'u ste drug pa'o// //de
nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor dam tshig mchog gyur pa/ /'dod pa'i gsang ba kun ster ba/ /shin tu gsang ba'i dngos grub stsol/ /sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir/ /sgrub
pa'i don ni bshad par bya/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma'i dbus su ni/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri/ /sna tshogs mdog can ge sar bcas/ /'dod pa kun gyi 'dras bu ster/ /de yi dbus su
yi ge hUM/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ /mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /dpe byad kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /dgyes pa chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ /gnyis med
gnyis su med pa'i mchog/ byang chub sems kyi rgyu las ni/ /byang chub zla ba dri med pa/ /de mthong lha mo langs nas ni/ /glu 'di yis ni bskul bar byed/ /hUM/ rol cig rol cig
dgyes pa ho/ /bde ba chen po'i rdo rje ni/ /bde ba chen po ro nyid las/ /'di nyid du ni bzhengs su gsol/ /a la la ho dgyes pa che/ /khyod ni bde ba'i mchog yin te/ /khyod kyi zhal
ni khums tsam gyis/ /bdag gis 'dir ni ro gcig rnyed/ /kye ma'o bcom ldan bde chen dgyes/ /oM/ rdo rje sems dpa' legs dgyes khyod/ /ro dang ro mchog thams cad de//
dgyes pa chen po bde ba rnams/ /rtag par dngos grub kun la yang / /rol cig rol cig lha mo la/ /rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad dang / /bcom ldan
rdo rje chen po ni/ /lha mo'i pad+ma dgyes la rol/ /hUM/ a la la ho dgyes pa che/ /bcom ldan 'dod la dgyes pa khyod/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub legs par stsol/ /pad+ma mchog la
dgyes par rol/ /oM/ a la la ho dgyes pa che/ /tshogs kyi bde bas dus rtag tu/ /rdo rje mchog ni 'dzin pa yis/ /pad+ma'i zhal mchog bye ba yi/ /pad+ma la ni rol par mdzod//
ji ltar bung bas sbrang rtsi bzhin/ /lha rnams pad+ma nyid la rol/ /kye ma grogs po dgyes chen 'dir/ /rdo rje mchog ni bde bar sbyar/ /dus kun bde ba 'dir mdzod cig/ de ring
dus ni 'di nyid du/ /yang dag byang chub 'dus pa yin/ /a la la ho dgyes pa che/ /bde chen kun tu dgyes mchog rol/ /a la la ho dgyes pa che/ /glu 'di dag gis bskul
nas su| |mnyam nyid las ni bcom ldan 'das/ /sdom pa'i rdo rje bzhengs par gyur/ /'khor dang bcas par gzigs nas ni/ /bcom ldan 'das ni zhal bzhi pa/ /sngo ba
dang | ser ba dang / dmar ba dang / ljang gu'i zhal te/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag bcu gnyis pa/ g.yas brkyang bas 'jigs byed chen po dang dus mtshan zhabs 'og tu
mnan pa/ phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams pas dam tshig rdo rje phag mo la 'khyung pa/ phyag gzhan gnyis po na tshogs bdag gi pags pa 'dzin pa/ g.yas pa'i gsum pa na cang te'u
bzhi pa la dgra sta/ lnga ba la gri gug/ drug pa la rdo rje mdung bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon pa'i gsum na rdo rje kha T+wAM ga/ bzhi pa la khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa/ lnga pa la rdo rje zhags pa/ drug
pa la bdud bzhi'i mgo bo bsnams pa'o/ /ral pa'i cod pan rgyan cha can/ /dbu la thod pa'i phreng ba 'chang / /zla ba phyed pa dbu la 'dzin/ /dbu la sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan/ /'jigs pa'i
mche ba rnam bsgyur zhal/ /sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /mi yi mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin/ /mgrin nor gdu bur na cha dang / /mgo yi nor bus rnam
par brgyan/ /tshangs pa'i skud pa thal ba ste/ /phyag rgya drug tu rab tu grags/ /de yi pang na bcom ldan ma/ /dam tshig rdo rje phag mo ni/ /sku mdog de dang 'dra bar bya/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag
gnyis pa/ /spyan gnyis pa la skra grol ba/ /gcer bu ska rags 'og pag gis rnam par brgyan pa/ phyag g.yon pas 'khyud pa ste/ bdud kyi khrag gis yongs su gang ba'i thod pa
bsnams ba/ g.yas pa na sdigs mdzub rdo rje dang bcas pas phyogs bcur sdigs par byed pa/ bskal pa'i me yi gzi brjid can/ /khrag la dgyes shing zhal nas 'dzag/ byin
ba gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khyud/ /thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can/ /chos kun gnas ni dge ba yin/ /A li kA li las byung ba/ /rnam par rtog pa
med pa ste/ /chos dang chos min rnam par spangs/ /pad 'dab lha mo dgod pa yis/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang / /dum skyes ma dang gzugs
can ma/ /g.yon phyogs bskor ba'i dgod pa yis/ /rnal 'byor ma la dngos grub stsol/ /nag cing ser la de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu drag po'i gzugs can te/ /thams cad zhal
gsum phyag drug pa/ /spyan gsum g.yas brkyang gnas pas bzhugs/ /gcer bu dbu skra grol ba ste/ /bdud bzhi zhabs kyis gnon pa dang / /chags shing zhen pas myos pa
dang / /thod pa dag gi dbu rgyan can/ /phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par brgyan/ /nag cing sngo la ljang ba dang / /shin tu 'jigs shing sdang mig can/ /ser zhing nag la ljang gu ste/ /snying
rje'i ro ni yongs su rdzogs/ /dmar zhing nag la ljang ba dang / /sgeg pa la sogs nyams kyi 'khor/ /ljang zhing nag la ser ba dang / /'jam zhing khro bas 'jigs pa dang / /thod
pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /g.yon pa cang ta'u gri gug ste/ /mgo bo rdo rje mdung g.yas na/ /mtshams ni bzhi bo dag tu yang / /bum pa bdud rtsi lnga yi chus/ /yongs su gang ba'i
steng du yang / /byang chub sems kyis gang snod gzhug/ khwa gdong la sogs lha mo rnams/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /nag dang sngo sangs dmar ser skya/ /zhal gcig
pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /spyan gsum drag po'i gzugs can la/ /skra grol ba yis rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /gcer bu yi dwags
gdan du mnan/ /'dod pa'i snying rjes rnam par myos/ /g.yon par mgo bo kha T+wAM ga/ g.yas na thod pa gri gug go/ /mtshams ni bzhi po dag tu yang / /gshin rje sreg sogs mkha'
'gro ma/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /spyan gsum pa la yi dwags gdan/ /skra grol pa yang rab tu 'jigs/ /thod pa'i phreng
ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /gcer bu sna tshogs gzugs can la/ /dga' zhing bde bas rnam par myos/ /g.yon la thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ g.yas la
cang te'u gri gug ste/ /g.yon nas bskor zhing dgod byas na/ /mtshams kyi dngos grub stsol bar 'gyur/ /khwa gdong la sogs sgor dgod pa/ /g.yas nas bskor zhing dgong par
bya| |khams dang skye mched phung po rnams/ /sku gsung thugs su rnam par bsgom/ /sngar bshad rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /go cha bzhin du dgod par bya/ /dbang chen dang ni chu
dang ni/ /me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /de yi dbus su bkod pa ni/ /sa sogs bzhi po dag yin no/ /ltung byed ma dang gsod ma nyid/ /'gugs byed
ma dang gar ma dag/ de nyid nam mkha'i khams yin te/ /pad+ma'i dra ba stong pa yin/ /gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad yin/ /tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma yin/ /'du shas gar dbang rgyal po
ste| |'du byed rdo rje rgyal po yin/ /rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /bde gshegs kun nyid he ru ka/ /mig ni gti mug rdo rje ste/ /rna ba zhi sdang rdo rje yin/ /sna ni phrag dog rdo rje ste//

lce ni chags pa rdo rje yin/ /lus ni ser sna rdo rje'o/ /skye mched kun dbang rdo rje'o/ /hUM ni thugs kyi rdo rje ste/ /A zhes bya ba gsung du 'gyur/ /oM ni sku yi rdo rje ste/ /he ni rdo rje ye shes
yin| |lus sogs rim pa'i sbyor ba yin/ /dngos po thams cad rnam par bsgom/ /bde ba'i chags pa bcom ldan 'das/ /chags pa med pa'ang de bzhin te/ /ye shes
'khor lo de mthong nas/ /mchod dang bstod dang dbang yang bskur/ /rjes su chags pa'i sbyor ba dag/ 'jug bas mnyam pa'i bcud du 'gyur/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam
bsgoms nas/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor byas nas/ /sbyor ba'i dam tshig mchod pa yis/ /cho ga bzhin du bzlas par bya/ /oM shrI badzra he he ru ru kaM hUM hUM phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la saM ba

ra swAhA/ snying po'o/ /oM hrIH ha ha hUM hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM badzra bai ro tsa na ni ye hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM sarba bud+d+ha TA ki nI ye badzra war+N+Na nI ye hUM hUM phaT/ phag mo'i snying po dang / nye ba'i snying

po'o/ /oM DA ki nI hUM hUM phaT/ oM lA me hUM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Ta ro he hUM hUM phaT/ oM ru pi NI ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM kA kA s+ye hUM hUM phaT/ /oM u lU s+ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM swA nA s+ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM sU ka rA

s+ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dA D+hI ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dU tI ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma daM Sh+Ti NI ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma tha nI ye hUM hUM phaT/ spros dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /sgom pa mchog ni
bsgom par bya/ /'di ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi/ /mchog tu gsang ba smras pa yin/ /bcu drug cha ni yongs rdzogs pa/ /sngags dang gsang sngags kun gyi gtso/ /sgom pa'i dus las
langs nas ni/ /go cha gnyis ni rnam par dgod/ /oM ha rdo rje sems dpa' snying ga la/ na maH hi rnam bar snang mdzad mgo bo la/ swAhA hu pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug spyi gtsug la/ bau
ShaT he khrag 'thung ste/ dpung pa la'o/ /hUM hUM ho rdo rje nyi ma ste/ mig la'o/ /phaT haM rta mchog ste/ yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha'o/ /oM baM rdo rje phag mo ste/ lte ba la'o/ /haM
yoM ya mi ni steng / /snying ga la'o/ /hriM moM rmongs byed ma ste/ lce la'o/ /hreM hrIM g.yo byed ma ste/ mgo bo la'o/ /hUM hUM skrag byed ma ste/ spyi gtsug la'o/ /phaT haM gtum mo ste/ yan
lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha'o/ /'di ltar dngos dang dngos med mnyam/ /thams cad chos su ro gcig ste/ /mnyam pa nyid la rnam par bzhugs/ /
mnyam pa'i ye shes lnga po 'di/ /rnal 'byor dam tshig can gyis skyongs/ /dus bzhi'am yang na dus gsum du/ /ci tsam nus pa bsrung bar bya/ /'di ni gsang ba'i mchog
yin te/ /gang la yang ni bstan mi bya/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma chen po las/ sdom pa'i dam tshig bstan pa ste le'u bdun ba'o// //de nas cho
ga'i gzhung bzhin bshad/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad legs par mdzes/ /sna tshogs 'dab ma yid 'ong ba/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /pad+ma'i rgyal po rnam par bsam//
lte bar sna tshogs rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa'o/ /de la lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis mtshan pa/ /de steng A li kA li ste/ /dbus su reg bya stong pa yin//
rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gis khyab/ /bdag nyid he ru ka dpal nyid/ /zhal gdong lnga la phyag bcu gnyis/ /spyan gsum rnam par 'gyur ba ste/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi
gnas pas bzhugs/ /g.yon brkyang ba yang de bzhin bzhugs/ /'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan nyid/ /zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan par bri/ /stag gi pags pa gos su
mnabs/ /thugs rje khro bos rnam par rol/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /ral pa'i cod pan rgyan du thogs/ /zla ba phyed pa'i spyi gtsug la/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la
mnan| |sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan/ /mi mgo'i phreng ba 'dzin pa ste/ /thod rlon phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /mgul rgyan gdu bu rna cha dang / /thod ba'i phreng bas dbu la
brgyan| |tshangs pa'i skud pa thal ba ste/ /phyag rgya drug po rnam par bsgom/ /phyag gnyis thod pa'i dril bu yis/ /phag mo la ni rnam par 'khyud/ /phyag gzhan gnyis po dag
gis ni/ /'jigs byed chen po'i pags rlon bsnams/ /g.yas pa'i phyag gsum pa la rdo rje gsor zhing bdan gsum pa 'dzin pa/ phyag bzhi pa la mdung rtse lnga pa/ lnga pa
la dgra sta/ drug pa la rdo rje cang te'u rnams so/ /g.yon pa'i phyag gsum pa rdo rje kha T+wAM ga/ bzhi pa la rdo rje zhags pa/ lnga pa la gri gug/ drug pa la drag po'i mgo bo/ /pang na
gnas pa'i phag mo ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mdog can phyag gnyis pa/ zhal gcig pa/ spyan gsum pa/ skra grol ba/ /gcer bu dum bus brgyan pa'i ska rags can/ /phyag
g.yon pa la byang chub kyi sems kyis gang ba'i thod pa bsnams pas 'khyud pa/ phyag g.yas ba'i sdigs mdzub kyis gdug pa kun la phyogs su sdig mdzub byed cing gri gug
'dzin pa/ /bskal pa'i me yi gzi brjid can/ /khrag la dgyes shing khrag 'dzag pa/ /byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /bde ba'i mchog
gi dam pa'o/ /drag po'i gzugs can rnam par 'gyur/ /thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par rol/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can/ /he ru ka dpal rnam par bsgom/ /nam
mkha'i mdog can ser ba dang / /dmar dang ljang gu ser skya'o/ /khro dang bzhad dang sgeg pa dang / /rngam dang zhi bar ldan pa dang / /khams dang skye mched phung po dang / /reg
pa'ang de bzhin sgom pa ste/ /mkha' 'gro lA ma de bzhin te/ /dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma/ /phyag bzhi pa la gdong gcig pa/ /spyan gsum pa la drag po'i gzugs/
skyil mo krung ni phyed par bzhugs/ /phyogs kyi gos can mchog yin no/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /skra grol ba yis rnam par brgyan/ /lha mo phyag rgya lnga 'chang
zhing / /'dod pa'i rnam grol rab tu ste/ /shar dang lho dang nub dang ni/ /byang gi phyogs su rnam par dgod/ /dkar dang ser ba de bzhin du/ /dmar dang ljang gu chags pas myos//
thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /dril bu cang te'u gri gug 'chang / /mtshams bzhi dag tu bum pa bzhi/ /ye shes lnga yis yongs gang ba/ /thod pa'o mas yongs gang bas/ /bum
pa'i steng du gzhag par bya/ /g.yon nas bskor zhing bkod nas kyang / /ye shes sems dpa' bkug nas su/ /mchod dang bstod dang gzhug par bya/ /yid ngag lus la bkod nas ni//
go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /hUM AH oM ni rnam par bsgom/ /gsang sngags ji bzhin bzlas na ni/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /oM shrI badzra he he ru ru kaM hUM hUM paT/ /

DA ki nI dzA la saM ba ra swAhA/ oM hrIH ha ha hUM hUM phaT/ snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM badzra bai ro tsa ni ye hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ /oM sarba bud+d+ha Ta ki nI ye badzra bar+Na ni ye hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ /lha

mo'i snying po dang / /nya ba'i snying po'o/ /oM DA ki nI hUM hUM phaT/ oM lA me hUM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Ta ro he hUM hUM phaT/ oM rU pi NI ya hUM hUM phaT/ khro bo'i sprul pa spros nas ni/ /'gro ba gsum po
rdzogs par byas/ /sgom par bzlas par ldan pa yis/ /bdag gis spro dang bsdu bar bya/ /khams gsum ma lus kun tu yang / /lus ngag yid gsum ci bder spyad/ /dam tshig can
bsgoms langs nas ni/ /go cha gnyis po bgo bar bya/ /oM ha rdo rje sems dba' ste/ snying ga la'o/ /na maH hi rnam par snang mdzad ste/ mgo bo la'o/ /swAhA hu pad+ma gar dbang
ste/ spyi gtsug la'o/ /bau ShaT he dpal khrag 'thung ste/ dpung pa gnyis la'o/ /hUM hUM ho rdo rje nyi ma ste/ mig la'o/ /phaT haM rta mchog ste/ yan lag thams cad kyi go cha'o/ /
oM baM rdo rje phag me ste/ lte ba la'o/ /haM yoM ya mi ni ste/ /snying ga la'o/ /hrI moM rmongs byed ma ste/ kha la'o/ /hreM hrIM g.yo byed ma ste/ mgo bo la'o/ /hUM hUM
skrag byed ma ste/ spyi gtsug la'o/ /phaT phaT oM ni/ tsaN+Di ka ste/ yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha'o/ /'di ni dam tshig ngo bo ste/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin no/ /sngags

dbyi bas chos bdag rnal 'byor ni/ /bdag nyid chos su sbyor ba yis/ /ji ltar bde bar spyad par bya/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma las/ /gnas kyi rim pa ste le'u brgyad pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dpa' bo gcig bu'i cho ga ni/ /sngags pas lte bar rnam bsams pa/ /rlung dang me yi dbus su na/ /de'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma/ de'i
steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du thod pa ye shes lnga'i bdud rtsis gang ba/ de'i dbus su A li kA li lugs su 'byung ba dang / lugs las ldog pa'i tshul
du gnyis ltab tu byas la/ hUM byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba dga' zhing dgyes ba las byung ba ni/ dpal thugs rje'i bdag nyid he ru ka chags
pas rnam par 'khor bar bsgom mo/ /de yang zhal bzhi pa/ phyag bcu gnyis pa/ zhabs g.yas pa brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/
spyan gsum pa/ zhal rnam par 'gyur ba/ thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /dpa' bo'i phyag rgya drug gis sku lus phyag rgyas btab pa/ 'jigs byed chen po dang / dus mtshan gnyis kyi mgo
dang nu ma mnan pa/ stag gi pags pa mnabs pa/ snying rje'i ros 'khor ba/ rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud ba'i phyag gnyis la rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ rdo rje dril bu/ phyag gzhan gnyis
la tshogs kyi bdag po'i phags pa'i stobs 'dzin pa/ g.yas pa'i phyag gsum pa la rdo rje mdung / bzhi pa la lcags kyu/ /lnga pa la rdo rje gri gug/ drug pa la rdo rje cang te'u /phyag
g.yon pa'i gsum pa na thod pa rkang gis yongs su gang ba/ rnal 'byor gyi mchod phyir thogs pa dang / rdo rje kha T+wAM ga/ steng du rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rje rab tu 'jigs pa'i rdo rje dril bu
rab tu 'phyang ba/ sna tshogs ba dan rab tu dpyangs pa/ dbus su sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa/ 'og nas rdo rje rtse gcig pa/ bzhi pa la rdo rje zhags pa/ lnga pa la tshangs pa'i mgo
bo| |drug pa la dgra sta bsnams pa/ zhal mdog sngo ba dang / ser ba dang / dmar ba dang / ljang gu rab tu 'jigs su rung ba/ sgeg pa dang / dgod pa dang / 'gying bag
can du bzhugs pa'o/ /de'i mdun du A li kA li las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje phag mo 'khyud nas bzhugs te/ sku mdog dmar po/ phyag bzhi pa/ zhal
bzhi pa/ spyan gsum pa/ dbu skra grol ba/ gcer bu dum bu'i ska rags can/ /phyag g.yon ba na thod ba/ byang chub kyi sems dang gdug pa'i
bdud kyi rak+tas yongs su gang ba/ g.yas pa'i sdigs mdzub can la rdo rje gri gug thogs pa/ phyag gzhan gnyis la cang te'u dang / kha T+wAM ga bsnams pa/ bskal pa'i
me ltar gzi brjid can/ zhal nas khrag 'dzag cing khrag la dga' ba/ byin pa gnyis mnyam par bsnol ba/ bde ba chen po'i snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ dmar ba
dang / ljang gu dang / ser ba dang / sngo ba'i zhal/ gdug cing 'jigs par mdzad pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal dang / sku mdog ji lta ba phyag dang sku mdog kyang
de bzhin du bris te/ 'di la rnal 'byor pa mchog gis nang gi gnas la sogs pa'i rim par dgod do/ /pu ste thod pa'i dum bu dang / /rab gtum min mgo la'o/ /
dzA ste/ keng rus chen po dang / gtum ma'i mig can ma ni/ spyi gtsug la'o/ /oM ste/ keng rus can dang / 'od ldan ma ni/ rna ba g.yas par ro/ /a ste/ mche ba
rnam par gtsigs pa dang / sna chen ma ni/ spyi bo'i rgyab tu gnas so/ /go ste/ lha dgra dang / dpa' bo'i blo gros ma ni/ rna ba g.yon par ro/ /rA ste/ smin ma'i
dbus su ni 'od dpag med dang / mi thung ma'o/ /de ste/ mig gnyis su ni rdo rje'i 'od dang / lang+ka'i dbang phyug ma'o/ /mA ste/ dpung rtsar ni rdo rje lus dang / shing grib ma'o/ /nye
ba'i gnas te/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la spyod pa'o/ /kA ste/ mchan khung gnyis su ni myu gu can dang / sa srung ma'o/ /oM ste/ nu ma gnyis su rdo rje ral pa can dang
'jigs byed chen mo ste/ zhing ngo / /tri ste/ lte ba'i dbus su stobs po che dang / rlung gi shugs can ma'o/ /ko ste/ sna rtser ni rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma ste/ nye ba'i
zhing ngo / /ka ste/ kha la ni rab bzang dang / sngo sangs lha mo'o/ /lA ste/ mgrin par ni rdo rje 'od dang / rab bzang ma ste/ tshan+do hA+o/ /ka ste/ snying la ni rdo rje 'jigs byed
dang | rta rna ma'o/ /hi ste/ bshad sgo la mig mi bzang dang / bya gdong ma ste/ nye ba'i tshan+do hA+o/ /gsung gi 'khor los la spyod pa'o/ /pre ste/ mtshan ma la ni stobs po che
dang / 'khor lo'i shugs ma'o/ /gr-i ste/ gzhang la ni rdo rje rin chen dang / dum skyes ma'o/ /'dus ba can no/ /sau ste/ brla gnyis su rta mgrin dang chang tshong ma'o/ /su
ste| byin pa gnyis la ni nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma'o/ /nye ba'i 'dus ba can no/ /na ste/ sor mo rnams la ni dpal he ru ka dang / shin tu dpa' mo'o//
si ste/ rkang pa gnyis su ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen mo'o/ /dur khrod do/ /sa ste/ mthe bong gnyis la ni rnam par snang mdzad
dang | 'khor los bsgyur ma'o/ /ku ste/ pus mo gnyis su rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson 'grus chen mo'o/ /nye ba'i dur khrod de/ sku'i 'khor lo sa 'og na gnas pa'o//
mkha' 'gro ma ni/ rdo rje/ lA ma ni/ dril bu/ dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma ni/ /glang po che'i pags pa 'dzin pa'i khu tshur/ /khwa gdong ma ni/ /rdo rje mdung / 'ug gdong
ma ni/ lcags kyu/ khyi gdong ma ni/ gri gug/ /phag gdong ma ni/ cang te'u/ gshin rje sreg ma ni/ thod pa'i kha T+wAM ga ma/ gshin rje pho nya ma ni/ zhags pa ma/ gshin rje
mche ba ma ni/ tshangs pa'i mgo bo ma/ gshin rje 'joms ma ni/ dgra sta ma/ byang chub sems kyi snod ni/ zhal bzhi'i ngo bo/ /sa'i khams ni/ 'bebs ma/ chu'i khams
ni/ gsod ma/ me'i khams ni/ 'gugs ma/ rlung gi khams ni/ gar gyi dbang phyug ma/ nam mkha'i khams ni/ pad+ma'i dra ba can no/ /gzugs kyi phung po ni/ rnam par snang
mdzad/ tshor ba'i phung po ni/ rdo rje nyi ma/ 'du shes kyi phung po ni/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug/ 'du byed kyi phung po ni /rdo rje rgyal po/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni/ rdo rje sems
dpa' ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid ni/ dpal rdo rje he ru ka'o/ /mig gnyis ni/ gti mug rdo rje/ rna ba gnyis ni/ zhe sdang rdo rje/ sna ni/ ser sna rdo rje/ kha ni/
'dod chags rdo rje/ reg bya ni/ phrag dog rdo rje/ skye mched thams cad ni dbang phyug rdo rje/ yid ni/ mi 'khrugs pa/ ngag ni/ tshe dpag med/ lus ni/ rnam par snang mdzad do/ /oM
ha snying la rdo rje sems dpa'/ na maH hi mgo la rnam par snang mdzad/ swAhA hu spyi gtsug la pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug/ bau ShaT he dpung pa gnyis la he ru ka/ hUM hUM ho mig gnyis
su rdo rje nyi ma/ phaT haM yan lag thams cad du rta mchog gi go cha'o/ /oM baM lte ba la rdo rje phag mo'o/ /haM yoM snying la ya mi ni'o/ /hrIM moM ni/ kha la rmongs byed ma'o/ /hrIM hrIM ni/ mgo
la skyod byed ma'o/ /hUM hUM spyi gtsug la skrag byed ma'o/ /phaT phaT tsaN+Ti ka ste/ yan lag thams cad kyi go cha'o/ /mdzub mo mdud byas gung mo nges par sbyar/ /mthe bong rdo rje brtan
por rab tu sbyar/ /de yi dpral ba'i dbus su rab bzhag nas/ /bskor zhing bskor bas kun tu bskor bar bya/ /rkang pa mnan cing steng du blta/ /gyen du pheM gyi sgra sgrog cing / /
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams 'gugs/ /dzaHhUM baM hoH/ rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sbyor bas dgug cing rab tu
gzhug ste bcing la dbang du bsdu'o/ /dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma des nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su gang bar mthong bzhin du thod pa bdud rtsi lngas yongs
su gang bas stangs thabs dang bcas pas dbang bskur dbul lo/ /ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis kyang / /de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol pa/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /de
bzhin bdag gis khrus bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya shri ye huM hUM/ rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du thod pa/ der yi ge a bskyed pa la ye shes lnga'i
bdud rtsis yongs su gang ba/ zla ba'i cha bcu drug pa la yi ge hUM dang AH oM gyis byin gyis brlabs te/ yi ge gsum pa'i spro ba las 'khor lo gsum 'byung bar bsgom
mo| |oM sa ma ya shud+d+haH sarba d+harmaH sa ma ya shud+d+hony+haM/ chos thams cad kyi bcud mnyam par gnas par bsam mo/ /ye shes lnga yi sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu
btung ngo / /oM badzra a mr-i ta u ta ka hUM Tha Tha traM a khaM hUM oM/ /ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'khor lo mchog ni rnam par spro/ /dung chen phreng ba blangs nas ni/ /de nas
de la bzlas par bya/ /rang srog rtsol ba byas nas ni/ /bsgoms pas de ma thag tu 'bar/ /oM badzra shrI he he ru ru kaM hUM hUM phaT/ oM TA ki nA dzI la saM ba ra swAhA/ oM hrIH ha ha huM

hUM phaT/ snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM badzra bai ro tsa na nI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM sarba bud+d+ha TA ki nI ye badzra bar+N+Na nI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ lha mo'i snying po dang / nye ba'i snying bo'o/ /ci steng
bar ma gyur na/ /de ltar bzlas shing bsam gtan bya/ /ngal bar gyur na rnam dag bsgom/ /de la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun te/ gang zhe na/ lus dran pa nye bar
gzhag pa ni/ mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni/ lA ma'o/ /chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni/ dum skyes ma'o/ /sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni/ gzugs
can ma'o/ /'dun ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni/ rab tu gtum mo'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni/ gtum pa'i mig can ma'o/ /dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni/
'od ldan ma'o/ /sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni/ sna chen mo'o/ /ye shes kyi pad+ma rnam par sbyang ba'o/ /dad pa'i dbang po ni/ brtan pa'i blo chen ma'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni/ mi'u
thung ma'o/ /dran pa'i dbang po ni/ lang+ka'i dbang phyug ma'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni/ shing grib ma'o/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo rnam par sbyang ba'o/ /shes rab kyi dbang po ni/ /sa srung
ma'o| |dad pa'i stobs ni/ 'jigs byed ma'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni/ rlung gi shugs can ma'o/ /dran pa'i stobs ni/ chang 'thung ma'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni/ sngo sangs
lha mo'o| |shes rab kyi stobs ni/ shin tu bzang mo'o/ /ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni/ rta rna ma'o/ /brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub
kyi yan lag ni/ khwa gdong ma'o/ /gsung gi 'khor lo rnam par sbyang ba'o/ /dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni/ 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o/ /shin tu sbyangs pa yang
dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni/ dum skyes ma'o/ /chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni/ chang tshong ma'o/ /dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni/ 'khor
lo'i go cha ma'o/ /btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni/ shin tu dpa' mo'o/ /yang dag pa'i lta ba ni/ stobs chen ma'o/ /yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni/ 'khor los
bsgyur ma'o/ /yang dag pa'i ngag ni/ dpa' mo chen mo'o/ /sku'i 'khor lo rnam par sbyang ba'o/ /yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni/ khwa gdong ma'o/ /yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni/ 'ug
pa'i gdong can no/ /yang dag ba'i rtsol ba ni/ khyi gdong can no/ /yang dag pa'i dran pa ni/ phag gdong ma'o/ /rnam par thar pa bzhi'i sgo'o/ /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin
ni| bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka ste/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i rang gi ngo bo ni/ bdag kho na'o/ /dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams
bskyed pa ni/ gshin rje sreg ma'o/ /dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par srung ba ni/ gshin rje pho nya ma'o/ /mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yang dag par spong ba ni/ gshin rje
mche ba ma'o/ /mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa ni/ gshin rje 'joms ma'o/ /dam tshig gi 'khor lo'i rnam par sbyong ba'o/ /'di ltar ma lus pa bsgoms na/ /sgrub
pos nges par 'grub par 'gyur/ /sems can don du rnal 'byor bdag/ mnyam nyid dam tshig dam pa'o/ /'khor lo lnga po so so yi/ /cho ga so so'i dbye ba bsgom/ /mngal skyes
so so'i dbye ba dag /'khor lo lnga yi mchog nyid can/ /rnal 'byor ma sogs gtsor sgom pa/ /so so'i dbye ba'i dbye ba yin/ /ji ltar rdo rje he ru ka/ /de bzhin lha mo'i dbus su ni/
sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma sbyor ba/ /rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor de bzhin/ /rdo rje sku yi dpa' bo dag/ b+ha ga'i dbus su rnam par bsgom/ /ji ltar sgom pa'i rim pa yis/ /de ltar
'khor lo gsum du sbyor/ /b+ha ga lnga po bdag gis bsgom/ /dbus su mkha' 'gro ma sbyor dang / /pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ma sbyor dang / /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dbye la/
b+ha ga'i dbus su 'khor lo gsum/ /he ru ka ni mchog nyid bsgom/ /dam tshig 'khor lo bsgoms pa la/ /dam tshig mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor/ /ye shes mkha'
'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor/ /sna tshogs pad+ma la sogs dbus/ /ye shes 'khor lo'i sbyor ba dag/ /de 'di b+ha ga'i dbus dag tu/ /'khor lo lnga
pa dag la bsgom/ /dpa' bo gcig pu he ru ka/ ji bzhin phag mo de bzhin du/ /sku mdog zhal dang phyag dang mtshan/ /de nyid sna tshogs pad+mar bsgom/ /da nyid pad+ma'i dbus
dag tu| |he ru ka ni mchog nyid bsgom/ /thod pa lhan cig mnyam par ni/ /lnga yi dbye ba bdag sbyor te/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rim pa bsgom/ /b+ha ga'i dbus su rnam par
bsgom| |'khor lo'i bdag po mthong ma gyur/ /'khyud pa yi ni phyag rgya can/ /dpa' bo 'khor lo de la bsam/ /rang rang gi ni rnal 'byor ma/ /snying du sbas pa rnam par
bsgom| |tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor ni/ /phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par mdzes/ /gnyis ni 'khyud pa'i phyag yin te/ /gzhan ni sna tshogs mtshan ma 'dzin/ /
phyag gnyis dag ni 'khyud pa dang / /de yi b+ha ga'i dbus su ni/ /dpa' bo sa sgom pa ma mthong ngo / /kun rdzob spas pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /sgom pa'i mchog kyang ma mthong ngo / /sgo pa
las skyes rim sbyor ba'i/ /sgom pa'i rnam par sgom pa ni/ /lnga po 'dus pa'i bsam pa ste/ /sgong skyes mchog ni sgom pa'o/ /'khor lo'i dbye ba'i dbye ba yis/ /'di
ltar rnal 'byor sgom pa'o/ /ji ltar bsam pa'i bye brag gis/ /de ltar 'dod pa sgom pa'o/ /bdag po'i dbye ba'i dbye ba yis/ /rigs kyi dbye ba rnam par bsgom/ /lha mo'i dbye ba'i
dbye ba mis/ /bdag po yang ni rnam par bsgom/ /mig gi dbye ba'i dbye ba yis/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi sgra la sbyor/ /yang na sku gsum dbye gang gis/ /de ni bdag por bya gang yin/ /bdag
la sogs dbye ba yis/ /'khor lo'i dbye ba'i dbye ba yin/ /rigs kyi dbye ba thams cad kyis/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma yis dbye/ /mngal skyes glu yi sbyor ba yis/ /sgom pa rnams ni
yongs su brtag/ sgong skyes glu ni med pa ste/ /sgra dang sgra nyams spangs pa'o/ /'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /rnal 'byor bde ba'i mchog dam pa/ kha cig gi ni rnal 'byor
'dod| kha cig rnal 'byor 'dod min te/ /glu sgra la sogs spangs pa yi/ /dngos po med pa'i go 'phang bzhugs/ /phra zhing mi zad dngos po med/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs
pa'o| |glu sgra la sogs bcas pa yis/ /go 'phang mchog gi longs spyod ni/ /glu sgra la sogs spangs pa yi/ /dngos po med pa'i go 'phang bzhugs/ /phra zhing mi zad dngos po med/
gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa'o/ /go 'phang mchog gi longs spyod ni/ /glu sgra la sogs bcas pa yi/ /'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad kyang / /phan dang snying brtser bdag gis
bza'| |sems can don la brtson pa yis/ /bzod pa brtson 'grus mchog dam pa/ /rnal 'byor pas glu mi smad cing / /mkha' 'gro mas ni
phan par dbyes/ /ho| srid pa gsum na bde brnyes gtso/ /a la la ho/ /rgyal ba bde can greng ba'i tshogs/ /pad+ma la ni rdo rje rol/ /a la la ho/ /bde gshegs bral ba'i bzhad
las grol/ /bdag po dgyes pa kun gyi bcud/ /chags pas rab tu dgyes mdzad cing / /srid pa gsum na tshogs kyi bcud/ /a la la ho/ /dgyes pas mngon par grol
ba po| |bdag ni 'dod las rang grol mdzod/ /A la las ni byung ba yis/ /pad+ma yi ni rnal 'byor pas/ /glu yi rgyal po 'di blangs pas/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bde ba ni/ /
pad+ma'i dra ba las bzhengs so/ /'dis bskul bas ni mgon po rnams/ /bde chen bde phyir gzhal yas nas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bzhengs 'khrungs te/ /rgyal ba ma lus
skye bar 'gyur/ /glu dang bcas pa'i dngos po med/ /sgong skyes cha ni spangs pa yis/ /de yi gzugs ni ma mthong ste/ /bde ba med cing sdug bsngal med/ /gnyis su med cing
dngos po med/ /brtag pa'i spyod yul rnam par brtag /tshes dang chos las rnam grol zhing / /sdig pa nyas pas mi gos so/ /thams cad gnyis med rnam grol ba'i/ /sgong
skyes dngos po dang bcas yin/ /glus ni gnyid las sad pas na/ /rmongs pas mkhas pa mi smad do/ /ma rtogs pa dang rtogs bya'i phyir/ /sems can don du sangs rgyas so/ /zhing skyes lhan
cig skyes lha mo/ /gnas skyes rnal 'byor ma de bzhin/ /rigs skyes lha mo skyes lha mo/ /mi snang mkha' spyod ma de bzhin/ /tha ma'i skye ba mchog nyid de/ /bar ma sna tshogs dam pa
yin| |sum cu pa ni sa la spyod/ /sa 'og spyod pa 'og na gnas/ /gnod sbyin ma dang glu mo dang / /mi 'am ci mo dri za mo/ /lha mo thams cad sngon grub dang / /gzhan yang bde
gshegs bsam pa can/ /dkon mchog gsum la bdag dga' ba/ thams cad phyi yi dkyil 'khor lo/ /sna tshogs glu ni nyer spyad cing / /rtag tu glu ni blang bar bya/ /
sna tshogs ro yi bde ba yis/ /lha mo mkha' 'gro'i gtso bo mchod/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ /sku yi 'khor lo rnam par bsgom/ /mkhas pas chu la rab gnas
nas| |gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par bsgom/ /me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bde ba che/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ /dam tshig
dkyil 'khor mchog dam pa/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor de nyid ni/ /de las bsam zhing rnam par bsgom/ /b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i rnam pa
bsgom| |nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /dpa' bo gcig pu rnam par bsgom/ /'khor lo pad+ma rdo rje phreng / /'khor lo gsum po yongs su
bskor| |ji ltar dam tshig mchog 'khro lo/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng gis bskor/ /yi dwags rnam pa lngas de bzhin/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor yongs su bskor/ /phyi rol dur khrod
ma rungs pa'i/ /sna tshogs mdog can mchog dam pa/ /sna tshogs shing ni nyams dga' ba/ /khyi dang lce spyang 'jigs pa dang / /bya rog 'ug pa chu skyar dang / /bya rgod dang ni si bi ka/
sreg pa'i sa yang de bzhin te/ /keng rus gsal zhing bskyon pa dang / /rag rog bsregs pa rnam par 'phyang / /de bzhin phyed tshig phyed ma tshig /mgo bo thod pa rje ngar dang / /khog pa lag

pa mgo bo dang / /lce spyang sgra ni sgrog pa dang / /sbrul ni sna tshogs dga' bar gnas/ /seng+ge phag dang stag dang ni/ /ra dang lug dang de bzhin te/ /glang po khyi dang bong bu glang / /rnga mo sna chogs
bde ba'i mchog /bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /chang gi btung ba'i mchog rnams dang / /dpa' bo 'dus pa'i mchog dag dang / /rnal 'byor ma ni mchog sna tshogs/ /thod pa
kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing / /gri gug cang te'u mchog rnams dang / /sna tshogs lha yi rnga dag dang / /ro mchog bza' ba sna tshogs dang / /sna tshogs tsum+pa A li ka /ku sha le
