'dzin| |sna tshogs rdo rje dbu la brgyan/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan/ /rdo rje mtshan ma dag gis brgyan/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /'og pag dag gis ska rags
byas| |dpung rgyan rdo rje mtshan pa ste/ /sngags pa'i gtso bos gsang sngags ni/ /'di ltar cho ga'i snying po shes/ /phag mo bde bar gnas pa ni/ /rgyal ba'i pags pa
rnam par spangs/ /phag mo rgyal ba'i mtshan sogs las/ /cang te'u gri gug rnams kyis brgyan/ /bcom ldan 'das ni lte ba'i dbus/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad yid 'ong ba/ /
sna tshogs pad+ma mdog mdzes la/ /thams cad rnam dag mchog dam pa/ /shar gyi 'dab sogs phyogs cha la/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs bzhi po dgod/ /shar du mkha'
'gro ma dgod cing / /byang du lA ma de bzhin te/ /nub tu dum skyes ma yin no/ /lho ru gzugs can ma yin te/ /sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu dag ni bzhi pa 'o/ /
zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa/ /spyan gsum drag po gzi brjid can/ /skyil mo krung ni phyed par bzhugs/ /skra grol ba ni yid 'ong ba/ /phyogs kyi gos can mgo yi phreng //
phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing / /dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang / /de bzhin gzhu dang mda' 'dzin cing / /rdo rje mdung mchog phyag na 'dzin//
snyems pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing / /thugs rje chags pas rnam par myos/ /sngo ba dang ni ser ba dang / /ljang gu steng gi zhal dkar po/ /ser zhing sngo la ljang ba dang //
steng gi zhal gdong drag la dmar/ /dmar dang sngo dang ljang ba dang / /steng gi zhal ni dkar la zhi/ /ljang dang dmar dang sngo ba dang / /steng gi zhal ni ser po mchog /bdud
bzhi bo ni zhabs kyis gnon/ /bcom ldan 'das la gdong gis lta/ /zur gyi char ni bum pa dag /ye shes bdud rtsis yongs gang ba/ /de yi
steng du thong pa ni/ /byang chub 'o mas rab gang ba/ /phyi rol dam tshig gsum 'khor la/ /khang pa brtsegs pa legs par mdzes/ /shar phyogs su ni gau rI ste/ /byang du de
bzhin tsau ri ma/ /nub tu rab rmongs ma yin no/ /lho ru yang ni ro langs ma/ /me la spos byed ma yin te/ /bden bral du ni gtum mo yin/ /rlung phyogs sme mo nyid yin te//
dbang ldan he ru ka ma ste/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor ma brgyad ni/ /dkar mo ser la sngo ljang gu/ /skul byed dmar la sngo ljang gu/ /rab rmongs ma ni sngo ser ljang / /ro langs
ma ni dkar sngo ljang / /spos byed ma ni sna tshogs mdog /dmar dang sngo dang ljang gu'o/ /gtum mo yang ni ljang sngo ser/ /sme mo yang ni dud sngo ljang / /he ru ka ma sngo ljang
dmar| |'di ltar de dag thams cad kyang / /spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba/ /phyogs kyi gos 'chang gar dang bcas/ /yi dwags gdan la legs par bzhugs//
phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /kha T+wAM thod pa dril bu dang / /cang te'u zhags pa lcags kyu thogs/ /thams cad thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan/ /mi bskyod pa yis cod
phan byas/ /'di ltar gnas dang nye gnas kyi/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /'di ltar thugs kyi 'khor lo ni/ /lha mo dkar mo la sogs pa/ /rnal 'byor ma ni
rab tu bshad/ /bsnyen pas bka' drin stsol mdzad de/ /thogs pa med pa'i 'bras bu 'grub/ /lha mo mkha' spyod grub nas ni/ /mkha' la spyod pa'i go 'phang rnyed/ /de
yi phyi rol gsung 'khor lo/ /shar du pi paM stangs thabs ma/ /byang du gling bu'i stangs thabs ma/ /nub tu rdza rnga che stangs thabs/ /lho ru rdza rnga'i stangs stabs te/ /sngo dang ser
dang dmar ljang gu/ /me sogs rdo rje bzhad ma ste/ /rdo rje sgeg mo rdo rje glu/ /rdo rje gar te dmar ba dang / /sngo dang ser dang ljang gu'o/ /de dag zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ /gcer
bu dbu skra grol ba dang / /thod pa yi ni phreng ba can/ /spyan gsum pa la yid 'ong ba/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /tsham ngam lag pa'i stangs thabs kyis/ /rdo rje dril bu stangs
thabs can/ /mkhrig ma mnyam par byas nas ni/ /pad+ma bskor ba'i stangs thabs can/ /zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang ni/ /tshan+do dang ni tshan+do ha/ /de dag 'od dpag med dbu rgyan/ /sku
yi 'khor lo'i shar du ni/ /me tog ma byang bdug pa ma/ /nub tu mar me lho ru dri/ /ser dang dud ka dmar dkar po/ /me long ro dang reg bya chos/ /me phyogs la sogs mtshams
bzhi ste| |zla ba'i mdog can dmar ljang dkar/ /de dag spyan ni gsum pa ste/ /gcer bu dbu skra grol ba dang / /zhabs kyis kun tu gar
byed cing / /phyag tu mchod pa thogs nas ni/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing / /cang te'u ni phyag ni bsnams/ /thod pa yi ni phreng ba can/ /lha mo de dag 'du sa dang / /nye ba'i
'du sa dur khrod dang / /nye ba'i dur khrod dag yin te/ /rnam par snang mdzad dbu rgyan byas/ /sgo rnams rdo rje lcags kyu dang / /rdo rje zhags pa rdo rje sgrog /rdo rje dril bu de
bzhin te/ /sngo dang ljang dang dmar dang ser/ /shar dang byang dang nub dang ni/ /lho yi phyogs kyang de bzhin no/ /me la sogs pa'i mtshams su ni/ /gshin rje sreg la
sogs pa dag /dmar dang sngo dang dud ka ser/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga /rang gi mtshan ma cang te'u dang / /gri gug dang ni mgo bo 'chang / /spyan gsum dbu skra grol
ba ste/ /gcer bu gar gyis gnas pas bzhugs/ /thams cad phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan/ /thod pa yi ni phreng ba can/ /rang gi rigs kyi cod pan can/ /ji lta'i
rim pas rjes su gnas/ /de yi snying gar ye shes sems/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo gsum/ /gtso bo'i bdag po bsgom par bya/ /dkar dang dmar dang sngo ba
yod| |dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma lhan cig /ji lta bu yis bsgoms pa ni/ /rjes su bstan pa'i sgom pa las/ /ye shes lcags kyu dag gis ni/ /ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas
ni| |ji ltar rim pas mchod dbang bskur/ /gcig tu bsdus te bstims nas su/ /ji lta'i rim pa bsgoms nas su/ /ye shes bzlas pa dag kyang bya/ /spro bsdu srog dang rtsol
ba yis| |'thor 'thung rim pas byas pa yis/ /slob dpon gyis ni bzlas pa bya/ /oM AHhUM hUM/ 'di lta bu yi rim pa yis/ /grangs med par ni byas nas su/ /ji srid skyo bar
ma gyur par/ /gong gi dam tshig 'khor lo ni/ /mnyam par bzhag ste bzlas pa bya/ /dung chen phreng ba blangs nas ni/ /sdom pa mchog gi bzlas pa bya/ /oM AHhUM/ oM shrI badzra

he he ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT DA ki nI dzA la saM ba raM swAhA/ oM badzra bA ra hi huM hUM phaT/ oM DA ki nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM lA me huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT/ oM rU pi NI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM

gau rI huM hUM phaT/ oM tsau rI huM hUM phaT/ oM pA ma he huM hUM phaT/ oM pai tA li huM hUM phaT/ oM puk+ka si huM hUM phaT/ oM tsaN+Da li huM hUM phaT/ oM g+hasma ri huM hUM phata/oM he ru ka san+ni b+ha huM hUM

phaT| oM badzra bi ne huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra baM she huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra mr-i daM ge huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra muM ra dze huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra hA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra lA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra gI te huM
hUM phaT/ oM badzra nri t+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra puSh+pe huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra d+hu pe huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra dI pe hUM hUM phaT/ oM badzra gan+d+he huM hUM phaT/ oM rU pa

badzri huM hUM phaT/ oM ra sa badzri huM hUM phaT/ oM spaR+Sha badzri huM hUM phaT/ oM d+harma d+ha tu badzri huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra aM ku sha dzaH huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra pA sha huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra s+pho Ta
baM huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra A be sha hoH huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dA D+hi ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dU tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma daMSh+Ti NAM ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma tha nI ye huM hUM
phaT| dam tshig can gyis tshig dag pas/ /mos pa'i yid kyis rtag tu bzla/ /nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid can/ /rang gi
thabs dang rigs pa'i lus/ /gnyis su med par mnyam pa'i bdag /khro bo sprul pa'i tshogs spros pas/ /'gro ba gsum po bcas par ni/ /he ru kar ni byas nas
kyang / /sa rnams gsum po ma lus par/ /thams cad der ni bsdus nas kyang / /sku gsung thugs la rnam par gnas/ /'di ni rnal 'byor cho ga ste/ /'khor lo
sgom pa'i bzlas pa 'o/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu mthong ba na/ /dam tshig can nyid langs dus su/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / /dpa'
bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma/ /mkha' 'gro dang ni mkha' 'gro ma/ /kun gyis gsol ba gdab par bya/ /khro bo bde ba'i dgyes pa yi/ /longs spyod las ni byung ba yi/ /rab rmongs ma
yis bsnyen byas nas/ /bde ba'i sbyor ba la zhugs te/ /ra ma he nad+Ta Na su ra A ma hA su hU ba ra dzo i ni ka ma la su hu/ a la la la ho/ /su ra a ut+ta ma ma hUM/ ma hA sidz+dza/ u
ma dzo i ni dza la ma ho/ /a I/ A a ra ho/ /a ru he byi nu su ba ya nA he/ su ra a su hu de hi ba ra TA i ni/ dza la su hU bi sa pha na ta ro Na Na pa de hi ma hA su hU ma dz+dza mu hU mo
k+Shu pa la ga kha u/ tut+tu sa hU na i su hUM/ badz+dzi u mo khu su hUM/ i na i du/ kha la tha i mo khu su hu/ ba su i paM ka u mdza ta nu na ba rA/ A pa da triM/ b+hu dza ta nu muny+ma
hA su hU/ i la daR+pa ya/ u ma hU/ a ra bI a gi a paM u ra su/ 'di yis mgon po bskul na ni/ /dkyil 'khor dngos grub nges pa ste/ /snyan cing 'jam pa'i mgrin
pa'i dbyangs/ /dpyid kyi rgyal po'i glu blangs pas/ /mkha' 'gro'i dra ba dri med rnams/ /gzigs shing las kun mdzad pa yin/ /rdo rje pad+ma yid 'ong ma/ /sbyor pas dngos grub
thams cad 'grub/ /dgyes pa 'di yis bskul na ni/ /bde ba chen po stsol ba yin/ /sbyor ba yi ni dus dag tu/ /rdo rje can gyis rab tu sbyar/ /thog ma dbus dang mthar thug
par| |yi ge brgya pa'i gsang sngags bzla/ /'khor lo dag ni brtan byas te/ /dpa' bo dang ni mkha' 'gro ma/ /'di ni kun gyi gsang sngags
te| |khro bo sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs/ /thams cad snying gar brtan byas te/ /bsgoms pas thams cad brtan par 'gyur/ /gal te bdag nyid dngos grub
'dod| |dngos grub thams cad gnas pa yin/ /oM badzra he ru ka sa ma ya ma nu pA la ya badzra he ru ka /twe no pa tiSh+Tha/ dri D+ho me b+ha ba/ su toSh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha

b+ha ba| |su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me tsit+taM shri yaH ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ /badzra he ru ka mA me muny+tsa he ru ka b+ha ba/ ma hA sa ma ya satwa aH
hUM phaT swAhA/ 'di ni bcom ldan kun khyab cing / /yi ge brgya pa mchog gyur pa/ /he ru ka mchog rang nyid yin/ /phyir zlog pa ni gang yin pa/ /bcu drug 'dab ma la
bkod cing / /rjes su bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor kun/ /bdag gis bsgoms shing brtan par bya/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya/ /
rnal 'byor 'di 'dra bsgoms na ni/ /khams gsum pa yang mthong 'gyur te/ /bdag nyid dpa' bo'i mtshan nyid de/ /de ltar srid ba'ang stong pa yin/ /bsgoms
bas bdag nyid yang dag gnas/ /'dir ni dka' thub bshad pa med/ /phreng ba med cing sngags kyang med/ /gzungs dang sbyin sreg las rnams dang / /cho ga'i rim pa'i gzhi
yang med/ /rnal 'byor phyag rgya byed pa'ang med/ /g.yas brkyang zhabs kyi rim pa'ang med/ /rdo rje chen po dngos 'dzin pa/ /rang byung dngos grub kun mdzad pa/ /'gog pa nyid
kyang mdzad pa med/ /bdag nyid bdag gis mchod par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang ba ni/ /lte ba'i dbus su rnam par bsgom/ /yi ge gnas kyi mchog gyur pa/ /lha yi
gzugs su sgom pa ni/ /de yi dbus su rnam par bsam/ /sku gsung thugs ni 'dus pa can/ /de yi lus las 'das gyur te/ /sems kyi dngos kyang btsal du med//
chags pa med cing chags bral med/ /chags bral dang ni ldan gyur pa/ /snying gi pad+ma'i dbus su ni/ /brtags pas legs par rnyed pa ni/ /yid kyis ngal bsos byas
pa ste| |rnal 'byor ma kun bud med yin/ /phyag rgya mchog tu bshad pa 'o/ /zla ba'i steng du brgya phyed rgyan/ /ye shes sems ni bsam pa ni/ /mchog ste spyad par bya ba med/ /bla
ma'i man ngag lam dang ni/ /sems ni mchog tu 'bar ba yis/ /'di ltar zhi ba'i gnas de ni/ /'jig rten du mas ma rtogs te/ /sbyor dang sbyor ba bral byas nas/ /go 'phang
gcig bus khyab pa yin/ /'di ltar byang chub 'bras bu rnyed par dka' ba ste/ /dang por dbyangs kyi yi ge las byung gzhan du yang / /steg dan
gzhung lugs log pa'i blo gros de nyid ni/ /ma ning shes rab long ba gzugs bzhin 'bras bu med/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ /sku gsung thugs
kyi gnas kyi rim pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba/ /thod pa sangs rgyas mchog dam pa/ /de nyid sbyor ba kun gyi mchog /dngos
grub thams cad rab stsol ba/ /gsang ba legs par sba bya zhing / /gang gis su la 'ang mi bstan to/ /de nyid mchog gi sgom pa gzung / /rnal 'byor ma yi snying la gnas//
gsang ba bstan par sba bya zhing / /bla ma'i ngag ni bsgom par bya/ /dur khrod gnas ni yid 'ong ba/ /sgrub pa po yis nges bstan pa/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sa
dang gnas kyi rim pa dang / /rdo rje lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /yi ge hUM ni bsgom par bya/ /de yis khyab par bdag nyid ni/ /sangs rgyas thod pa can gyi mchog /gnas med zhi
zhing dag pa ste/ /rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs yin/ /A li kA li las rang byung / /gnyis med mchog tu zhi ba ste/ /phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa/ /phyag rgya
drug gis rnam par brgyan/ /'dzam bu'i mdog can mnyam pas khyab/ /'od zer phreng bas kun tu 'khrigs/ /thod ba'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /spyan gsum pa la bzhad pa'i
zhal| |sems dpa' kun gyi sgom pa ste/ /gnyis med chos ni bla na med/ /stag gi pags pa gos su banabs/ /na ra'i pags pa steng du brkyang / /thod pa dang ni kha twAM 'dzin/ /
g.yas pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya can/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /de yi phyag g.yon thod pa ni/ /rkang gis rab tu gang ba dang /
sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /ye shes 'chi med lngas bsres pa/ /kha T+wAM ga ni lha'i rnal 'byor/ /thod pa dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma/ /g.yas pa mi 'jigs dag pa ste/ /'jigs
pa ma lus mi 'jigs grol/ /gdug cing 'jigs pa ma lus kun/ /'dir ni zhabs kyis gnon par mdzad/ /gdug pas 'jigs pa thams cad spong / /zla ba phyed pa zhi ba
'dzin| |sna tshogs rdo rje dbu la mtshan/ /rdo rje phreng bas dpral ba mdzes/ /rkang rgyan yid 'ong rgyan cha can/ /sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi/ /lte ba'i dbus nas bzhengs pa ni//
'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag /chags pa zhe sdang zhabs kyis gnon/ /ye shes sems dpa' de gzugs can/ /yi ge bruM las byung bar bsgom/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo
snying ga ru/ /he ru ka ni rnam par bsgom/ /gsung gi 'khor lo kha la bsgom/ /sku yi 'khor lo snga ma bzhin/ /sngo dang dmar dang dkar ba dang / /
phyag drug pa la zhal gsum pa/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /spyan gsum pa la bzhin rnam sgyur/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /rtse gsum pa dang thod pa 'chang / /rang
rig lus dang yang dag 'dus/ /bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi yi dbus dag tu/ /yi ge gsum sogs las byung ba/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu
rgyan can/ /rang gi mtshan ma'i mchog dang ldan/ /gnas la sogs pa'i rim sbyor ba/ /sdom pa gsum gyi mchog dam pa/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang / /dum skyes ma
dang gzugs can ma/ /pad+ma'i phyogs kyi gnas la dgod/ /thod pa bzhi po mchog yin te/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni kha dog ser/ /lA ma pa la sha yi mdog /dum skyes ma ni sngon po
ste| |gzugs can ma ni dmar la 'bar/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /g.yas pa mi 'jigs mchog yin te/ /sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi/ /khwa gdong la sogs mkha'
'gro ma| |sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu drag po'i gzugs can no/ /mtshams su gshin rje sreg la sogs/ /rab 'jigs shin tu 'jigs pa ste/ /thod pa dang
ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /mi 'jigs mchog kyang de bzhin te/ /cang te'u dang ni gri gug nyid/ /bdud ni bzhi po'i steng na bzhugs/ /spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba/ /phyogs kyi gos mchog
'dzin pa ste/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /me long ro dang dri dang ni/ /reg gi mchod pa bzhi po ste/ /sa bcu dag ni rim pa dang / /sku gsung
thugs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /phyi dang nang gi chos rnams kun/ /byang chub phyogs kyis rnam par dag /ka la sogs pa nyi shu bzhi/ /mgo la bin+dus mnan pa ste/ /gsal byed hUM
gnyis dang yang sbyar/ /mthar ni phaT dang rab tu sbyar/ /dpa' bo kun gyi gsang sngags ni/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad ster/ /gsal byed mkha' 'gro ma yi ming / /
mthar ni hUM hUM phaT yin te/ /'di ltar rab gtum mkha' 'gro ma/ /sngags kyi de nyid bde ba ster/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /hUM AHoM/ 'di ni rab tu gsang ba ste/ /pad+ma'i
'dab la mkha' 'gro ma/ /gsal byed ma ning dang bcas pa/ /hUM ni gnyis pa nyid yin te/ /mkhas pas mthar ni phaT dang sbyar/ /kha gdong la sogs gsang sngags ni/ /ya
ra la wa| gsal byed dang ni bcas pa ste/ /mthar ni hUM dang phaT dang sbyar/ /gshin rje sreg ma la sogs pa/ /sha Sha sa ha/ gsal byed dang ni hUM gnyis dang / /phaT kyang de
bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /dbus su sangs rgyas thod pa yi/ /gsang sngags de bzhin rjes su dran/ /oM aM AM/ iM IM/ uM UM/ e ai/ aM aH Sha swA hA
khams dang phung po skye mched la/ /go cha rnams ni sbyar bar bya/ /ye shes 'khor lo dam tshig dang / /mnyam pa'i ro yis mchod par bya/ /mchod pa bzhi po'i gsang sngags
rnams| |rang ming gsal byed hUM byas te/ /'di ltar dkyil 'khor dag dang sbyar/ /sangs rgyas thod pa las byung ba/ /rdo rje rgyan ni bgos pa ste/ /thams cad rim pa bzhin
du sbyar| |'thor 'thung du ni rab sbyar bas/ /gsang ba bzhi po bzla bar bya/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /'khor lo gsum gyi rim pa dang / /'dir ni cho ga'i sbyor ba
yis| |dus bzhi dag tu sbyar nas su/ /dam tshig 'khor lo'i bzlas pa bya/ /dam tshig mchog ni dngos grub 'gyur/ /dam tshig can gyi gsang sngags kun/ /sangs
rgyas thod pa mchog yin te/ /mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba yis/ /'di ltar thams cad rab tu brtag /dam tshig rtag tu bskyang bya zhing / /ye shes 'chi med lnga yi mchog/
yang na rang ming bzlas pa bya/ /sngags kyi de nyid bzlas par bya/ /oM shrI bud+d+ha ka pA li bruM AH hUM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba raM hUM phaT swAhA/ 'di ni yid 'ong sbyor ba'i mchog /rnal 'byor
ma yi ye shes mchog /gang du dam tshig nyams pa la/ /sbyor ba 'di ni sbyin par bya/ /zhi bar gyur nas bla med pa/ /rnal 'byor me yis dbang yang bskur/ /dus bzhi dag tu
rim pa yis/ /phyi dang nang gi chus khrus bya/ /yang na dam tshig sdom pa blang / /bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab/ /bdag ni mi shes rmongs pa ste/ /dam tshig las ni 'gal
zhing nyams/ /bla ma mgon pos skyabs mdzod cig /gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa ste/ /thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can/ /'gro ba'i gtso la skyabs su mchi/ /des ni the tshom
med byas nas/ /nges par dngos grub can du 'gyur/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dam tshig las ldang ba sangs rgyas thod pa bskyed pa ste le'u nyi shu
rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gsang ba'i de nyid rnyed dka' ba/ /gsang sngags kun ni bskyed pa dang / /'gro ba'i gnas dang 'gro ba
dang / /rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo kun/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas mchog yin/ /mi zad gnyis med rnam par dag /thog ma dbus mthar dri ma med/ /a yi ye shes
las byung ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste/ /spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams/ /phyag rgya che dang yang dag ldan/ /rang bzhin dag cing
dri ma med/ /ral pa zla phyed dbu la brgyan/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mtshan/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam
par brgyan/ /sems dpa' skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /ral gri lcags kyu phyag na bsnams/ /rin
chen zhags pa mdzes pa 'dzin/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba'i zhal/ /rnam thar gsum gyi gnas kyi mchog /ye shes sems
dpa' snying ga ru/ /'khor lo gsum gyi mchog kyang sgom/ /hUM las thugs kyi 'khor lo ste/ /de yi phyag mtshan sngon po dang / /AH las gsung gi 'khor lo ste/ /de
yi phyag mtshan dmar po 'o/ /oM las sku yi 'khor lo ste/ /de yi phyag mtshan dkar po yin/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mnyam sbyor/ /sku gsung thugs ni dri ma med/ /raM
las phyag rgya chen po ste/ /lte ba'i dbus su rnam par bsam/ /i las b+ha ga pad+ma ste/ /byang chub zla ba dri ma med/ /u ni snying gar bsam pa ste/ /e ni mgo la rnam par
dgod| |e ni spyi gtsug dag tu dgod/ /aM ni mig tu dgod pa ste/ /i ni go char byas nas su/ /a ni mdun gyi mtshon cha'o/ /l-i las lha mo spyan yin te/ /r-i las
dam tshig sgrol ma yin/ /l-I las lha mo gos dkar mo/ /r-I las rin chen yang dag 'byung / /rin chen sgron dang ye shes sgron/ /dkar zhing pa la sha yi mdog /dmar zhing
dzam bu chu bo'i mdog /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ /spyan gsum dgyes pas rnam par myos/ /thams cad phyogs kyis gos can te/ /rang gi thabs dang mnyam par
ldan| |'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rje dang / /pad+ma dmar po rin chen dang / /rdo rje dril bu lhan cig sbyar/ /'dod pa thams cad rab tu stsol/ /ral gri mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin//
gzhu ni 'gugs par 'dzin pa ste/ /mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /thod pa yi ni cod pan can/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i dbus su ni/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du
bzhugs/ /de dag sgo ru dgod pa ste/ /dbus su gtso bo'i zla ba'i gdan/ /zur la mchod pa rnam pa bzhi/ /phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa//
sbyan gsum thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /me long dang ni pi wang dang / /dri dang dung dang bcud kyis len/ /chang gi btung ba lag pas mchod/ /gzhan du ji ltar bdag po bzhin/ /rgyan
rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /skyil krung phyed par legs par bzhugs/ /lag pa snyim pa'i thal mo yis/ /mchod pa lag tu thogs nas ni/ /'di lta'i cho gas
thams cad mkhyen/ /A li de nyid dri ma med/ /gsang ba mchog ni rnyed dka' ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bshad pa yin/ /sngags kyi de nyid cho
ga dag /sku gsung thugs su yang dag sbyar/ /oM shrI ma hA su kha badzra sa twa a AH hUM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba raM swAhA/ oM sid+d+hi lo tsa nI li AH hUM swAhA/ oM sa ma ya tA re
tut+ta re tu re r-i AH hUM swAhA/ oM pad+mo d+d+ha we pAN+Da ra ba si ni si li AH hUM swAhA/ oM rat+na ku la ke ka rat+na dzA li nI r-I AH hUM swAhA/ oM rU pa badzri bruM/ oM shab+da badzri hUM/ oM
gan+d+ha badzri khaM/ oM ra sa badzri hrIH/ thams cad mkhyen pa dbang phyug mchog /b+ha ga'i dbus su gnas par bsgom/ /A li rdo rje gsang ba ste/ /sems can kun gyi
snying la gnas/ /gang gis dngos po kun gsang ba/ /de yi gsang ba bshad pa yin/ /rnal 'byor pa yis dus bzhi ru/ /bzlas dang bsgom par ldan par bya/ /som nyi
thams cad spangs nas ni/ /sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtan/ /ye shes 'khor lo mthong nas ni/ /dam tshig can gyis mchod dbang bskur/ /de dag gcig tu
bstims nas su/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa/ /thams cad rdo rje 'dzin lta bu/ /'das pa dang ni da ltar dang / /ma 'ongs pa yi
du sa gsum po/ /de ltar sems can gsum pa la/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang gnas/ /lhan cig skyes dga' dag pa'i bdag /thog ma med pa'i mchog yin no/ /mngon par
brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas mchog gi cho ga bshad/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje sgrub
pa ni| |maM gyi ye shes las byung ba'i/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje bde ba che/ /zhal drug phyag drug zhi ba ste/ /sku mdog dkar bo dri ma med/ /spyan gsum rdo rje skyil krung can/ /phyag rgya
drug ni 'bar bas brgyan/ /mi bskyod pa yi cod pan can/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /zla ba che ba zhi ba 'dzin/ /ral pa'i thor tshug ba cings pa ste/ /dkar dang sngo dang
dur smrig nyid/ /ser dang ljang gu de bzhin te/ /steng gi zhal ni zhi ba ste/ /lha yi dngos grub 'bras bu stsol/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan /ral gri po ti 'dzin ba ste/ /ut+pa la
dang lcags kyu nyid/ /ye shes lus can rnam par bsgom/ /sku gsung thugs kyi snying po ni/ /'khor lo'i dbus su rnam par bsgom/ /sngar bshad gnas kyi sbyor ba yis/ /ji
ltar rdo rje sems dpa' ltar/ /gsang sngags 'di ni rjes su dran/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje gsang ba ni/ /gsang gsum ye shes dam tshig can/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma sbyor
bya'o/ /oM shrI ma hA su kha many+dzu badzra a maM hUM DA ki nI dzA la saM ba raM swAhA/ rang gis dbang bskur byas nas ni/ /brtul zhugs chen po gsang sngags
bzla| |gsang gsum 'khor lo spros nas ni/ /khams gsum dag ni bsdu bar bya/ /'di ni mchog tu gsang ba ste/ /gang gis su la'ang bstan mi bya/ /mngon par brjod
pa'i rgyad bla ma'i bla ma las/ 'jam pa'i rdo rje sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /yi ge dgu pa sgrub pa ste/ /k+Sha
yi ye shes las byung ba/ /gdug pa thams cad za byed pa/ /za byed mkha' 'gro za byed cing / /rnam rtog zos shing zad par byed/ /mkha' mnyam stong pa las byung ba//
nam mkha'i longs spyod za byed cing / /zhal drug phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/ /spyan gsum pa la zhal rnam sgyur/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /gdug
pa'i bdud ni za byed cing / /'jigs byed dang ni 'jigs byed ma'o/ /khas bub zhabs kyis mnan par bzhugs/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /mgo bo'i
phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /zla ba'i phyed pas nye bar mdzes/ /sna tshogs rdo rje ral pa mnan/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku lus brgyan//
zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs/ /'jigs byed rab tu cher 'jigs shing / /sngo dang dung ka ljang gu dang / /dmar dang lnga pa ser po 'o/ /drug pa dag ni bong bu'i mgo /steng
gi zhal gdong rab tu 'jigs/ /thal ba sprin gyi mdog can la/ /gdug pa thams cad rab 'joms ma/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /dgyes pa'i longs spyod longs
spyod cing / /dpang du rdo rje phag mo ni/ /de mdog steng zhal phag mgo ste/ /gnyis su med par mnyam par ldan/ /skra grol ba dang phyogs gos can/ /byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam
par 'khril/ /thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myos/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing / /tshangs pa'i pags pa mnabs pa ste/ /rdo rje mdung dang cang te'u dang / /gri gug zhags
pa mgo bo dang / /phyag tu ral gri 'phyar ba ste/ /drag po gdug pa kun 'joms pa/ /snying gar ye shes mkha' 'gro ni/ /kha gdong la sogs yongs kyis khyab/ /'khor lo
'dab brgyad dbus dag tu/ /g.yon nas g.yas su bskor nas ni/ /dur khrod dang ni nye dur khrod/ /mkha' 'gro mchog ni dgod par bya/ /yaM raM laM waM/ shaM ShaM saM haM/ ye shes
'khor lo mkha' 'gro dgod/ /zhag bdun bar du bsgoms nas ni/ /gang yang thun ni bzhi yi rim/ /chu 'gram dang ni dur khrod du/ /bsgoms pas dngos grub nges par rnyed//
'phrog pa dang ni gsod byed cing / /gang du las ni ci 'dod pa/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor los 'grub/ /las 'dir yid gnyis dpyod pa med/ /
sngo dang pa la sha yi mdog /dmar dang bzhi pa ser po ste/ /gshin rje sreg sogs bzhi po ni/ /sna tshogs mdog can mdzes pa'i zhal/ /dmar dang sngo dang dud ka ste//
zhal mdog dkar po mchog tu mdzes/ /thams cad sbyan gsum pa yi zhal/ /skra grol ba la phyogs gos can/ /khwa gdong g.yon dang g.yas kyi zhal/ /'ug gdong
zhal yang de bzhin te/ /gsum pa khyi yi zhal gdong yin/ /bzhi pa phag gi zhal gdong ste/ /g.yon dang g.yas pa'i zhal gdong ni/ /drag po'i gzugs can cho ga
bzhin| |gshin rje sreg sogs zhal gdong ni/ /g.yon dang g.yas pa gnyis de bzhin/ /thug ri rnga mo rta dang ni/ /seng+ge ra dang glad ma he/ /gzhan yang dom gyi zhal
yin te| |thams cad kyang ni mnyam par bya/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams/ /dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang / /thod pa'i phreng ba'i
dbu rgyan can/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /yi dwags gdan la gar gyis bzhugs/ /mi 'u thung la skyes gnas ring / /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i
zhal| |thugs rje'i ro yis rnam par myos/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba ni/ /sgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya/ /hUM AH oM/ /'di ni gsang bar bshad pa ste/ /rdo rje pad+ma
'khor lo dbus/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro snying ga ru/ /mkha' 'gro'i yi ge'i 'khor lo ni/ /ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas/ /mchod cing thim par rnam par bsgom/ /mnyam par
bzhag nas yi ge rnams/ /srog dang rtsol bas gsang sngags bzla/ /rang gis 'thor 'thung byas nas su/ /gsang ba gsum gyi ye shes spro/ /oM shrI k+Sha DA ki nI dzA la sa ba raM
huM hUM phaT swAhA/ thog mar gsal byed ming dang hUM/ /mthar ni phaT dang rnam par sbyar/ /mkha' 'gro zla bas bshad pa yi/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad stsol/ /mchog
'di dag ni gsang ba ste/ /su la yang ni sbyin mi bya/ /zhag bdun gyis ni dbang 'gyur te/ /rtse gcig pa yis bsgoms nas ni/ /'khor lo gsum gsang mkha' 'gro ma'i/ /
dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ k+Sha'i mkha' 'gro sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// //de nas mchog
tu bshad bya ba/ /A li mkha' 'gro sgrub pa ste/ /A li ye shes las byung ba/ /A li mkha' 'gro mchog dam pa/ /zhal brgyad pa la phyag bcu drug /spyan gsum
'jigs pa rab 'jigs pa/ /zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /zla ba phyed pa ral pa
'chang / /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes spyi gtsug mnan/ /dpral ba la ni rdo rje phreng / /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /phyag rgya drug gis
sku la brgyan/ /rnam par rtog pa 'jigs byed nyid/ /sred dang phrag dog dus mtshan nyid/ /zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon par mdzad/ /gdul dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad
cing / /bgegs kyi mgo bo'i phreng ba can/ /sna tshogs mdog can legs par mdzes/ /dkar ba'i mdog can sked pa phra/ /lha yi gzi brjid 'bar ba can/ /sngo zhing
ser la dud ka dang / /g.yas pa'i zhal yang de bzhin te/ /ljang gu dmar dang ser skya ste/ /g.yon pa'i zhal yang sna tshogs mdzes/ /steng gi thal kha sprin mdog zhi/ /chags
shing rjes su chags pas lta/ /thugs rje'i ro ni yang dag rdzogs/ /sku lus ldem zhing 'dzo bag can/ /A li mkha' 'gro ma yi sku/ /phyag gnyis pa la gcer bu'i
lus| |thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la brgyan/ /skra grol ba yis rnam par myos/ /spyan gsum nag po 'jigs pa can/ /de yi mdog can ska rags can/ /byin pa gnyis
kyis legs par 'khril/ /gnyis med sbyor bas yang dag gnas/ /rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan/ /lha mo'i ku tsa 'tshir ba'o/ /ji ltar mkha' 'gro'i phyag rgya ltar/ /mkha'
'gro ma yang de bzhin sbyar/ /phyag gnyis dag ni brkyang ba la/ /khyab 'jug pags pa mnabs pa yin/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /ral gri dang ni thod pa 'chang / /mdung rtse
gsum pa cang te'u nyid/ /dgra sta lcags gyu de bzhin te/ /zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang / /gri gug dang ni 'khor lo nyid/ /snying gar rtsibs ni bcu gnyis pa'i/ /'khor
lo'i rgyal po legs par mdzes/ /de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro rnam par bsgom/ /de mdog zhal dang 'dug stangs dang / /phyag dang phyag rgya de bzhin
te| |shar du dam tshig mchog ces bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yi ge a'i rigs las byung ba'o/ /byang phyogs su sna tshogs mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge I las
gyur te bzhugs pa'o/ /nub phyogs su nam mkha'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge e dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /lho phyogs su gnas kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro
ma yi ge ai las yang dag par bzhugs pa'o/ /me'i phyogs la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su mkha' 'gro ma bzhi po dgod par bya ste/ thog ma che ba'i mchog ce
bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge u dang sbyar bya'o/ /bden bral du drag po mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge U dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /rlung
gi phyogs su dpa' bo'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge o dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /dbang ldan du khro bo'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge au dang sbyar
bar bya'o/ /de bzhin 'dis ni mtshams bzhi ru/ /dbang ldan la sogs phyogs dgod pa/ /yi ge ri las dngos grub kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / yi
ge li las dur khrod kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / yi ge r-I las rnal 'byor gyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / yi ge l-I las gtum pa'i
mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / mkha' 'gro ma ni de kun gyi/ /yan lag bcu gnyis rnam par dag /zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste/ /thams cad spyan
gsum rnam sgyur la/ /sku lus dkar po thams cad zhal/ /sngo dang ljang gu gnyis med bde/ /g.yon dang g.yas pa'i zhal gnyis ni/ /mkhas pas rnam par
bsgom par bya/ /phyogs kyi gos can gar dang bcas/ /skra grol ba la rab tu 'jigs/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /cang te'u dang ni gri gug mchog /mdung dang mgo
po thams cad kun/ /sna tshogs mdog dang phyag mtshan bsnams/ /ro yi mgo yi steng bzhugs shing / /thugs rje'i ro ni yongs su rdzogs/ /phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa ste/ /thams
cad thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan/ /mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin pa ste/ /thams cad a la la yi sgra/ /oM ni thugs kyi rdo rje ste/ /AH ni gsung du 'gyur ba yin/ /a ni sku yi rdo rje ste/ /
rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo'i dbus/ /'di ni mchog tu gsang ba ste/ /rnal 'byor ma yi sbyor ba mchog /rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa ste/ /rdo rje snying pos zhus pa yin/ /dkyil
'khor 'khor lo'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /'khor la sogs pa thams cad dgod/ /ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas/ /gcig pu chos kyi ro yang bsgom/ /ye shes bzlas pa'i
sbyor ba yis/ /rang gi sngags kyi 'thor 'thung bya/ /nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas/ /'khor lo mchog gi tshogs dang spro/ /mchog de mthong na slar yang bsdu/ /yan
lag bcu gnyis mchog dam pa/ /sa ni bcu gnyis dag nyid de/ /rdo rje sa ni bcu gsum pa/ /rab tu dga' dang dri ma med/ /'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro ba/ /spyang dka'
ba dang mngon du gyur/ /ring du song dang mi g.yo ba/ /legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin/ /gzugs med pa dang ye shes ldan/ /de ltar sa ni bcu gnyis po/ /'khor
lo'i lha mo rnam par dgod/ /dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i rdo rje sems dpas dbus su'o/ /'khor la sogs pa kun gyi
sngags| |ming dang gsal byed hUM byas te/ /de dag mthar ni phaT dang sbyar/ /sngags kyi gtso bos gsang sngags ni/ /rang snying rang gi sa bon dgod/ /sku gsung thugs
dang rnam par sbyar/ /ye shes 'khor lo 'di mthong nas/ /gcig tu bsdus te mchod par bya/ /bdag gis phyi dang nang du yang / /mnyam par bzhag ste mi smra bzla/ /
rang gi 'thor 'thung byas nas ni/ /blo ldan srog rtsol bzlas pa bya/ /oM shrI A li DA ka a aM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba raM hUM phaT swAhA/ srid pa ma lus thams cad kun/ /
dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te/ /sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag nyid/ /sbyor ba yi ni bdag nyid rnams/ /sems can khams ni cha gnas pas/ /rang gi lha
yi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag nyid sbyor zhing mchod par bya/ /mnyam par ma bzhag sems kyis ni/ /sgom zhing rab tu bsgoms byas te/ /sngags dang dbyibs dang chos
nyid de| |chos gcig ro ni stong pa yin/ /chos rnams bdag med nyid yin te/ /rang bzhin med pa'i chos la ni/ /rjes su brtag par bya ba yin/ /mngon par
brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ /gsang ba chen po'i gsang ba A li'i mkha' 'gro sgrub pa ste le'u sum cu tham pa'o// //de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba/ /
sna tshogs gar gyi dbang phyug mchog /thams cad mchog ste rnal 'byor che/ /dngos grub chen po legs stsol ba/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sgom zhing rab tu
bsgom par bya/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /siM oM dwaM las rdo rje 'byung / /de nyid yongs gyur bdag nyid de/ /gsal byed mkha' 'gro mchog gyur pa/ /sna tshogs
dbang phyug sna tshogs mdog /thams cad rigs kyi mchog dam pa/ /zhal drug pa la phyag bcu gnyis/ /spyan gsum pa la g.yo ba'i sgra/ /zla ba phyed pa zhi ba 'dzin/ /
thod pa'i phreng bas spud pa ste/ /sna tshogs rdo rje dbu la 'chang / /spyi gtsug ral pa 'chang ba ste/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku la mtshan/ /lha yi rgyan gyis sdud pa ste/ /skal ngan
mu stegs can rnams ni/ /zhabs kyi pad+ma'i 'og tu mnan/ /lta pa lnga yi rim pa dag /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis mnan/ /skyil krung phyed pa'i gar zhabs can/ /
zhal drug gis ni rnam par brgyan/ /khyab 'jug gi ni pags pa mnabs/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan pa ste/ /rdo rje lha mos rnam par 'khyud/ /gcer bu 'og pag ska
rags can/ /skra grol ba la spyan gsum can/ /mchu dang mchu ni rnam 'tshir zhing / /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par 'khril/ /byang chub yan lag
gnas 'tshir zhing / /byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khril/ /thugs rje chags pa'i ro yis bde/ /tshangs pa'i pags pa yan lag ni/ /phyag gnyis dag gis
brkyang nas 'dzin/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'chang / /dbang phyug chen po'i mgo bo thogs/ /mdud rtse gsum dang ral gri dang / /cang te'u zhags pa lcags kyu bsnams/ /
dkar dang sngo dang ljang ba nyid/ /ser dang dud ka dur smrig ste/ /g.yon dang g.yas pa'i ngos dag tu/ /pi la dang ni nye bi la/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni gnyis po sbyar/ /chos kyi
mchog ces bya ba yi/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni/ /yi ge dwaM las yang dag 'byung / /g.yon gyi phyogs su dgod par bya/ /yi ge si las nges byung ba/ /rgya mtsho'i
mchog ces bya ba yi/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma gnyis ni/ /sna tshogs mdog can sna tshogs zhal/ /spyan gsum pa la bzhin rnam bsgyur/ /skyil krung phyed pas
gnas pa ste/ /zhabs ni gar dang bcas pa'o/ /zhal lnga pa la phyag bcu pa/ /spyan gsum drag po 'jigs pa ste/ /'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag /zhabs
kyi 'og tu mnan par bzhugs/ /mgrin pa dag ni drug dang bzhi/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i sku rags can/ /
rkang gdub g.yer ka'i sil sgra can/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /'khyud pa yi ni mchog dam pa/ /rdo rje gsor zhing sdigs
mdzub kyis/ /gnyis su med par rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa gnyis med rnam brgyan te/ /zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams/ /thod pa dang ni gri gug mchog /sku gsung
thugs kyi dbu rgyan can/ /dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro ma dbus su/ /'khor lo gsum gyi thabs kyang sgom/ /oM gyi ye shes mkha' 'gro ni/ /
thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su ste/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mkha' 'gro ni/ /rang gi snying gar de dag bsgom/ /sngar bshad sbyor ba'i rim pa yis/ /gnas la sogs pa'i
rjes rim pa/ /de ru bsam zhing rnam bsgoms te/ /gsum po'i rim pa rjes su spro/ /des ni dngos grub gnyis med pa/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang lhan cig bsgom/ /ye shes
'khor lo'i ro rnams ni/ /bsgoms la gsang sngags bzlas par bya/ /oM shrI pra Na baDA ka A A oM hUM DA ki nI dzA la saM ba raM a swAhA/ oM hrIM d+harma ut+ta me ma hA badzra DA ki nI ye dwaM
hUM phaT swAhA/ oM siM sA ga ra ut+ta me ma hA badzra DA ki nI ye siM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ gsang gsum ye shes bzlas nas ni/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro
ma bzla bya/ /gsal byed rang ming hUM gnyis dang / /mthar ni phaT dang sbyar bar bya/ /gsang gsum 'khor lo bsgoms nas ni/ /gsum po bsdu zhing bsgoms nas su/ /
dam tshig gsang gsum sbyor ba yis/ /b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /byang chub zla ba dri ma med/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo nA da gsum/ /gtso bo dag ni gsum yin
te| |mkha' 'gro ma gsum gsum mkha' 'gro/ /sdud cing skyed par mdzad pa ste/ /b+ha gar rdo rje phag mo ni/ /gsang ba gsum du rnam par bsgom/ /de nyid sgom pa'i
sbyor ba yis/ /de na nga rgyal rnams spangs nas/ /dus bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis/ /de bzhin bsgom dang bzlas pa bya/ /rtag tu dam tshig bskyang bya zhing / /'o ma sna tshogs
pas byung ba/ /bram ze tsha dang sbrang rtsi mar/ /ma hA mAM sa mnyam ldan pa/ /de nyid gsum gyis mngon bsngags te/ /bza' ba dag ni bza' bar bya/ /'du 'dzi med cing
sred pa med/ /yongs su bzung ba'i 'khor yang med/ /longs spyod min pas longs spyod la/ /'chi ba med pa'i zas bza' zhing / /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang
bsten| |longs spyod med pa'i zas bza' zhing / /rnal 'byor sgom pa'i skom yang btung / /gzhan du gang yang btung ba min/ /nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas/ /rang nyid byin
gyis brlabs byas nas/ /bcom ldan mkha' 'gro pi la ba/ /rnal 'byor ma ni nye pi la/ /thabs ni pi la bar shes bya/ /shes rab nye ba'i pi lang / /grong khyer mthar ni pi
la nyid| |grong gi mtha' ni nye pi la/ /zla ba nyi ma mnyam sbyor ba/ /pi la dang ni nye bi yin/ /skad cig sbyor ba pi la ba/ /dga' ba nye ba'i pi la ste/ /mthu stobs du ma ldan par
ni| |skye ba 'di la 'grub pa yin/ /pa shu thams cad bza' bya zhing / /lha bshos dag kyang de bzhin bsgrub/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma 'dus nas/ /dus la mthun pa 'dus
byas nas/ /glu dang gar dang bza' ba dang / /'dus pa mchog gis mchod par bya/ /rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs nas/ /dam tshig gi ni spyad pa spyod/ /mngon par brjod
pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gsal byed mkha' 'gro sgrub pa'i mtshan ma bstan pa ste le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dngos grub
sbyor ba'i rim pa ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang mkha' 'gro sbyor/ /dam tshig mchog gi sdom pa yin/ /chos rnams kun gyi sdom pa ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi bde ba che/ /mkha' dbyings
rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa/ /dkyil 'khor dam tshig mchog dam pa/ /de yi dbus su 'khor lo che/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /
dbus su nyi ma'i gdan yang mdzes/ /A li kA li mnyam par ldan/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan/ /byin gyis brlabs/
pa byas nas ni/ /rang gi sa bon las bskyed de/ /yi ge hi las yang dag 'byung / /dus mtha'i me ltar rab tu 'jigs/ /zhal gyi mche ba rnam par btsigs/ /spyan gsum
ljags ni bskyod pa'i zhal/ /gdug pa thams cad zhabs 'og gnon/ /khro bo dang ni bzhad pa'i zhal/ /bskal pa'i mthar yang 'khrug pa ste/ /ral pa yi ni dbu
rgyan can/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /'jigs byed chen po'i pags pa yis/ /rked par ska rags
bcings pa yin/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed 'chang / /dpral ba las ni rdo rje phreng / /khro bo mthong nas rnam par brtag /lha rnams
thams cad tshar yang gcod/ /keng rus can gyi brtul zhugs 'dzin/ /'chi ba 'tsho bar byed pa'i mchog /gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon/ /phyag rgya drug gis
sku lus brgyan/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis spung pa ste/ /phyag drug pa la zhal lnga pa/ /sna tshogs ro yi bcud mchog can/ /sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu dkar po zhi ba ste//
rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pa/ /phag mo yi ni sku lus khyab/ /lha chen pags pa 'dzin mdzad cing / /bla re tshul du brkyang bar mdzad/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /drug pa na ni
cang te'u dang / /zhabs g.yon du ni dus mtshan mnan/ /g.yas pa yis ni 'jigs byed de/ /zhabs kyi sa 'og tu mnan mdzad cing / /rmongs shing rab tu myos par mdzad/ /
rdo rje phag mo de mdog can/ /skra grol ba dang gcer bu ste/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can/ /byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /
mgul nas 'khyud cing myos pa ste/ /de yi phyag mtshan phyag rgya bsnams/ /gri gug cang te'u mchog kyang 'dzin/ /drug pa la ni tshangs pa'i mgo /'di 'drar rdo rje mkha' 'gro
ni| |mkhas pas re'u mig dbus su dgod/ /shar du sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ste/ /byang du las kyi mkha' 'gro yin/ /nub tu pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ste/ /lho ru rin chen mkha'
'gro yin/ /dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba dang / /ljang gu dang ni ser po 'o/ /'khor lo dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /ljang gu ser po
dmar po sngo/ /dkar po steng bltas dril bu dang / /sna tshogs rdo rje bde chen 'khyud/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi tshul gyis bzhugs/ /dmar po ser
dang ljang gu dang / /dkar po yang ni de bzhin no/ /pad+ma dril bus snyoms 'jug cing / /lha mo'i nu ma 'tshir ba'o/ /ser po sngon po de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu dkar po'i
kha dog ste/ /rin chen dril bus snyoms par 'jug/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /de dag mkha' 'gro lnga yin te/ /sdom pa lnga yang de nyid do/ /me dang
bden bral rlung dang ni/ /dbang ldan de ni bzhi po ru/ /sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro las mkha' 'gro/ /pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro rin chen mkha'/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug
pa| |spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /phyogs kyi
gos can gar mchog can/ /mgo yi phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /rdo rje mda' la sogs pas brgyan/ /zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na
mdzes| |'dod pa thams cad stsol mdzad cing / /thugs rje'i ro ni yang dag rdzogs/ /thugs rje'i 'dod pas rnam par myos/ /cung zad ngo tsha'i mig zur can/ /dgyes
pa stsol bas bde ba ste/ /de ltar sna tshogs du ma yis/ /dkyil 'khor rnams ni yongs su khyab/ /du ma'i gzugs dang gzugs sdug ma/ /rdo rje mchu dang 'od byed ma/ /rta gdong

dang ni drag po'i gdong / /rdo rje drag po snyan grags ma/ /rdo rje pho nya rdo rje sen/ /rdo rje gzhon nu ma de bzhin/ /kaM bo ci yang de bzhin te/ /rdo rje ro langs ma dang ni/ /rdo rje ma mo'ang de
bzhin te/ /dri can ma dang 'jigs byed zhal/ /zla ba'i spyi gtsug de bzhin te/ /khro gnyer can dang sna tshogs gzugs/ /rdo rje gri gug de bzhin te/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang ni/ /
sgyu 'phrul lha mo grags byed ma/ /na lar ki dang ser skya ma/ /rdo rje 'bar ma thal sbyor ma/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed ma nyid de/ /dkyil 'khor grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /mkha'
'gro ma ni de dag kun/ /spyan gsum pa la zhal rnam sgyur/ /gsus pa 'chang la skra grol ba/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /
phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /phyogs kyi gos can gang mchog ste/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /thams cad ro yi gdan la bzhugs/ /sna tshogs gzugs
can yid 'phrog pa/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing / /zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams/ /rdo rje mchog ni gsor byed cing / /dril bu dang ni cang te'u mchog /zhal gsum
dpa' zhing sgeg pa ste/ /thugs rje'i nyams ni yongs su rdzogs/ /spyan ni zur gyis gzigs mdzad cing / /dgyes pa'i stsol bas g.yo
ba ste| |dngos grub thams cad stsol mdzad cing / /sgrub pa po kun rjes su chags/ /zla ba drug gis sgrub pa po/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo 'grub/ /yid gnyis
med par dngos grub mchog /mkha' 'gro thod par byed pa yin/ /dus 'dir de ma thag tu yang / /mkha' la spyod par the tshom med/ /nang gi pho brang de nyid ni/ /re'u
mig dgu sogs sgo dang bcas/ /sgo ru lha mo bzhi bkod la/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni dngos grub ste/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor lha mo bri/ /snam bu'i mtshams bzhi de ru ni/ /
lha mo nyi shu dgod bya zhing / /mkha' 'gro ma sogs mtshams rnams su/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor dag tu brtag /sgo rnams su ni lha mo
bzhi| |'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad du/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /zur bzhi cha ni thams cad dang / /sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin
chen gyis brgyan cing / /phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo/ /de yi nang du re'u mig dgu/ /sgo rnams kyang ni bya ba ste/ /'di ltar mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma/ /dra
ba'i sdom pa stong pa ste/ /byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun/ /chos kyi rnam par dag pa yin/ /dbus su sa ni bcu gsum ste/ /phyi rol gnas dang nye ba'i gnas/ /dur khrod
dang ni nye dur khrod/ /'di ltar sbyor bas rnam dag par/ /sdom pa mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /de ni thugs kyi ye shes te/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /phung po
khams dang skye mched la/ /cho ga gnyis po sbyar bar bya/ /ye shes mchog gi sgom pa ste/ /gsang ba gsum gyi 'khor lo dgod/ /phyed dang phyed du rnam par dgod/ /mkha'
'gro gsum ni 'khor lo'i dbus/ /dam tshig rnal 'byor 'byung ba che/ /ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas ni/ /zhabs bsil byas nas gzhug par bya/ /ye shes chu yis
dbang bskur nas/ /gtso bo dag ni rnam par bsgom/ /bdag med chos kyi ro kun gyis/ /dam tshig mchog ni dri ma med/ /ba spu khung bu thams cad las/ /dam tshig gsang
ba gsum spros nas/ /sems can ma lus dam tshig gi /mkha' 'gro ru ni rab gnas bya/ /'bad pa yis ni bsdus nas kyang / /gsang ba gsum du gzhug par bya/ /
sngon grub pa yi mkha' 'gro ni/ /byin rlabs gnas su dgod par bya/ /'di ni rdo rje theg chen te/ /mkha' 'gro spyod pa'i gnas la bzhugs/ /sdom pa mchog ni bzlas
pa yis| |bla na med pa'i go 'phang ster/ /dus bzhi dag tu ci 'dod par/ /skyo ba med par rtag tu sgom/ /lugs su 'byung dang ldog pa
yis| |'khor lo mchog ni rnam par spro/ /ba spu'i khung bu las mdun du/ /bde mchog spros nas mchod par bya/ /rdo rje gsum ni dbang bskur nas/ /'gog pa'i
khro bo rnam par bsgom/ /ye shes khro bo lhan cig tu/ /sprin gyi 'brug sgra lta bur bzla/ /'gro zhing 'ong ba sbyor ba yis/ /mi smra rdo rje brtul zhugs che/ /zhag bdun gyis
ni nges par yang / /mthu dang stobs ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /g.yo zhing ldeg par byed pa dang / /'khrug cing g.yengs dang gzhug pa dang / /nad med pa ni nad yod byed/ /nad
yod pa ni nad med byed/ /de ltar sgom pa byas nas ni/ /las 'dir the tshom med pa yin/ /nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas/ /bsgom dang bzlas la dga' ba dang / /dam
tshig zas la dga' ba ni/ /thogs pa med par tshe yang brtan/ /'di ltar rang gi cho gas bzlas/ /sangs rgyas gnas su legs par 'jug /der ni dam tshig 'khor
lo ni| |mkhas pas sgom mchod bzlas pa bya/ /gsang sngags 'di dag bshad bar bya/ /oM shrI badzra DA ki nI AH d+hi hUM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba raM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI bud+d+ha DA

kI nI A b+h+ruM hUM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI karmA DA ki a khaM hUM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI pad+ma DA ka a hrI hUM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra huM hUM phaT/ oM
shrI rat+na DA ka aM hUM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra huM hUM phaT swAhA/ mkha' 'gro bzhi po de dag dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang / /dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma/ /mgrin
pa mnyam par bsnol ba ste/ /byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /de yi mdog dang phyag dang zhal/ /phyag mtshan rnams kyang rnam par bsgom/ /lha mo mngon du byas

nas ni| |snying po'i gsang sngags so so yin/ /oM shrI badzra bA rA hi baM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI DA ki nI DAM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI lA me lAM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI khaN+Da ro he khaM huM hUM
phaT swAhA/ oM shrI rU pa Ni rUM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ 'di ni lnga po'i bdag nyid kyi'o/ /mtshams kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags ni/ oM shrI bud+d+ha DA ki nI huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI karmA DA ki nI
huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI pad+ma DA ki nI huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI rat+na huM hUM phaT swAhA/ sgo ru mkha' gro ma yi sngags/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad ster/ /bzhi po sna tshogs
mdog can te/ /ji bzhin rigs kyis kun la khyab/ /oM hUM rU pe huM hUM phaT/ /oM su rU pe huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra dun+ti huM hUM phaT/ oM pra b+hA ka ri huM hUM phaT/ shar phyogs kyi ni
snam bu la/ /lha mo bzhi po dgod pa ste/ /sku lus dkar po'i mdog can la/ /de yi gsang sngags bshad pa yin/ /oM badzra pa DA ba mu khI huM hUM
phaT| oM g+ho ra mu khi huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra g+ho Ne huM hUM phaT/ oM ya sha swi ni hUM hUM phaT/ lho phyogs kyi ni snam bu la/ /lha mo bzhi po dgod par bya/ /sku mdog dag ni ser ba ste/
de yi sngags su bshad pa yin/ /oM badzra dU ti huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra na kha huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra kau ma rI huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra kaM puts+dzi huM hUM phaT/ nub phyogs kyi ni snam bu la/ /
lha mo bzhi po sku mdog dmar po can gyi sngags yin no/ /oM badzra be tA li huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra sa yi ki hUM hUM phaT/ oM gan+d+ha ri huM hUM phaT/ oM ba mi ba da ne huM hUM phaT/ byad
gi snam bu la lha mo bzhi sku mdog ljang gu ste/ de'i gsang sngags bshad pa yin/ /o tsaN+Da shaM kha re huM hUM phaT/ oM b+h+r-i ku Ta huM hUM phaT/ oM bi shwa rU pe huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra
kaD+D+ha ni huM hUM phaT/ dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams bzhi ru lha mo bzhi po gzugs gnyis pa'i mdog can te/ de'i sngags bshad pa/ oM shrI badzra kha le huM hUM phaT/
oM badzra ma le huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra ya shaH ka ri huM hUM phaT/ oM badzra nA lA ra ke huM hUM phaT/ sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi po sna tshogs pa'i mdog can drag po'i gzugs ldan

pa ste| de'i sngags su bshad pa/ shar du oM shri badzra paM ge le dzaH dzaH huM hUM phaT/ lho ru oM shrI badzra dz+wa li ni hUM huM hUM phaT/ nub tu oM shrI badzra kuN+Da li paM baM huM hUM phaT/ byang du
oM shrI badzra phai ra bi ho huM hUM phaT/ thams cad gsal byed mtha' ru ni/ /shrI ni sbyar zhing mchog rim bzhin/ /sngags pas de ltar bzlas na ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni dra ba yi/ /sdom
pa'i dngos grub thob pa ste/ /zla ba drug gis bde dbang 'gyur/ /gcug tu byas te bsdus na ni/ /rnal 'byor chen po gzi byin can/ /dra ba'i mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /gsang
sngags 'di dag thams cad ni/ /khri 'am du bzlas na ni/ /gsang sngags rgyal po 'grub pa yin/ /snying po dag ni bzlas pa yis/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma grub cing / /rang
nyid ji ltar 'dod par 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi lus su zhugs 'gro zhing / /mi snang ba dag thob nas ni/ /rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyod/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin pa yin/ /

mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dam tshig gi sdom pa las 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i cho ga'i rim/ /sngar bshad sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yi/ /lung la sogs pa'i rim pa bya/ /rnal 'byor lung ni
mi shes pa/ /sangs rgyas mu stegs can yin te/ /rtag tu lung ni spang mi bya/ /dkon mchog gsum ni mi spang zhing / /sangs rgyas chos dang
dge 'dun la/ /rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su 'gro/ /shes rab pha rol phyin dmigs na/ /rnal 'byor gyi ni dngos grub 'grub/ /gcig car 'jug pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bdag
gi lus ni rnam par bsam/ /sngo zhing drag la bzhin rnam sgyur/ /gtum zhing 'jigs pa 'jigs par mdzad/ /zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs/ /ral pa zla phyed spyi
gtsug 'chid/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes ral pa gnod/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /baM hUM badzra las byung sku lus can/ /
phyag rgya drug dang yang dag ldan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /skyil krung phyed pas legs par gnas/ /spyan gsum drag po'i sku lus can/ /mgrin pa bzhi la
zhal bzhi pa/ /bcu gnyis phyag dang yang dag ldan/ /stong pa'i ye shes yang dag mchog /gdug pa kun gyi thod pa'i phreng / /dus mtha' las byung do shal can/ /gdug
pa kun ni zhabs 'og gnon/ /nyon mongs 'jigs byed mgo bo dang / /sred pa gti mug phrag dog ste/ /dus mtshan mo ni khas phub la/ /gdug pa'i bgegs ni
'jigs pa can/ /thams cad zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon/ /nam mkha' dang ni skya ba dang / /dkar ba dang ni dmar ba dang / /ljang gu steng du bltas pa'i zhal/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam
ldan pa| |phag mo dag dang bde bas 'khyud/ /kun tu gnyis med sbyor ba yis/ /chos rnams kun gyi ro gcig tu/ /sbyangs pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba/ /dpal gyi bde ba chen po
ni| |rdo rje he ru ka nyid yin/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /chos kyi 'khor lo mkhar gsil dang / /lhung bzed mdung dang zhags pa dang / /lcags kyu mgo bo cang te'u dang / /g.yas
dang g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis/ /na ra'i pags pa brkyang nas bsnams/ /shar du mA tang+gi dang DoM bi ka /dza ra ki dang puk+ki si/ /kha Ta ki dang sha ba ri/ /dzi ba ri dang sa ma ri/ /lha
mo brgyad po de dag ni/ /ji bzhin rim pas rjes su dgod/ /ser dang sngo dang de bzhin dmar/ /dud pa yi ni mdog can te/ /dmar dang ljang dang dud ka'i mdog /brgyad pa
dkar po nyid yin no/ /sgo rnams su ni dgod bya ba/ /khrag 'thung rdo rje gtum mo dang / /rdo rje srid mchog ma dang ni/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed drag mo ste/ /gdul dka' thams cad
gsol mdzad cing / /thal pa sprin mdog ljang gu dang / /dmar dang sngo dang lhag par 'jigs/ /brgyad pa'i dbus su chos mkhar gsil/ /thod pa cang te'u gri gug ste/ /phrag
ba'i steng du gos 'dzin pa'o/ /sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi/ /thod pa kha T+wAM mi 'jigs pa/ /chos kyi mkhar gsil cang te'u/ /zhal gcig pa
la phyag bzhi pa/ /yi dwags gdan gyi steng du ni/ /skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs/ /bsod snyoms pa dang chos gos gsum/ /phyis mi len dang tsog bu ba//
gzhi ji bzhin dang stan cig pa/ /bla gab med dang shing drung pa/ /dgon pa pa dang dur khrod dang / /khrod pa dang ni phying ba pa'o/ /'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis/ /sbyangs pa'i
yon tan rnam dag bsgom/ /ye shes mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog /ro gcig tu ni rnam par bsgom/ /oM shrI ma hA su kha badzra he he ru ru kaM AH huM hUM phaT/ oM maM ma taM

gi huM hUM phaT/ oM DaM badzra DoM bi ni huM hUM phaT/ oM raM rA dza ki huM hUM phaT/ oM puM puk+ka si huM hUM phaT/ oM khaM kha ta kaM huM hUM phaT/ oM shaM shA ba ri huM hUM phaT/ oM dziM dzi ba ri huM hUM phaT/

oM saM sa ma ri hUM hUM phaT/ oM teM he he ru ki huM hUM phaT/ oM baM badzra tsaN+Di huM hUM phaT/ oM hUM badzra rAk+Sha si huM hUM phaT/ oM b+heM badzra b+hai ra bI huM hUM phaT/ de kun gcer bu skra grol ba/ /spyan
gsum pa la zhi ba ste/ /mche ba rnam gtsigs lce bskyod cing / /phyag rgya lnga yis sku lus brgyan/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /bzhad dang zhi dang snying rje dang / /sgeg
pa dang ni rngam pa dang / /drag cing khro ba'i nyams can te/ /bzlas dang sgom pa spro zhing bsdu/ /lus dag yid la bde bar gnas/ /sems can mos pa sna tshogs pa/ /gdul ba'i thabs
kyi bde ba yis/ /yul la yongs su spyod pa na/ /bla med ye shes 'bras bu 'thob/ /sems can thams cad 'di yis bde/ /'chi med bde ba'i longs spyod kyis/ /ye shes 'bras
bu rnyed pa yin/ /'di ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /mchog gi go 'phang thob pa'o/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan bskyed pa'i le'u
ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /char dbab cho ga'i rim pa ni/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad mchog gi/ /lte ba ge sar bcas pa la//
de yi dbus su rdo rje che/ /mche ba rnam gtsigs 'jigs pa can/ /phyag brgyad pa la zhal bzhi pa/ /spyan gsum 'jigs pa'ang rab tu 'jigs/ /rdo rje mtshon ni gsor mdzad
cing / /sdigs mdzub zhags par ldan pa dang / /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /lcags kyu dang ni mdung bsnams shing / /dpa' bo'i pags pa bsnams shing 'dzin/ /cang te'u
dang ni brgyad par bshad/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni/ /chu lha 'jigs pa myos pa gnon/ /zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'ching / /sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam par brgyan/ /phyag rgya
drug gis sku la brgyan/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su man bas/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan mchog/
mchus gnon zhal gdong rnam sgyur zhing / /khro bar lta zhing 'jigs par gzigs/ /'dab ma brgyad la klu brgyad bri/ /mtha' yas dang ni nor rgyas dang / /'jog po
pad+ma pad+ma che/ /dung skyong dang ni stobs kyi rgyu/ /dga' bo dang ni brgyad yin te/ /dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ljang / /ser dang dud pa'i mdog can te/ /ljang gu dang ni ser
po ste| |thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni/ /bcom ldan 'das la mngon phyogs pa/ /'jigs pas bka' drin slong bar byed/ /skrag pas lta zhing gnas pa 'o/ /bcom
ldan sku lus sngon po can/ /'jigs shing shin tu 'jigs par mdzad/ /g.yas pa dud ka dmar po ste/ /g.yon pa ljang gu dud ka 'o/ /steng gi zhal ni mkha' lding
gdong / /zhal rnam sgyur zhing 'jigs pa 'o/ /nyi ma dmar po'i gzi brjid can/ /nyi ma bcu gnyis nyi mnyam 'od/ /phag mo dag gis mgul 'khyud cing / /byin pa gnyis
kyis legs par 'khril/ /yang na phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/ /bde chen mchog ni bcu gnyis pa/ /gri gug tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang / /rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan/ /lha mo'i
mchu ni rnam par 'tshir/ /gcer bu dbu skra grol ba dang / /spyan gsum pa la sku rags can/ /dzam+bu'i chu bo mchog gi sku/ /gnyis su med par sbyor bar gnas/ /klu ni rang
gi chung mar bcas/ /chu lha'ang chung mar bcas pa dang / /chu lha'i lus ni dkar po can/ /bka' drin dag ni slong bar byed/ /snying gar ye shes 'khor lo dag /de mdog phyag
dang zhal yang skyed/ /de yi snying ga hUM nAM hUM dgod cing / /lus ngag yid kyang de bzhin te/ /klu yi rang snying de nyid la/ /hUM nAM hUM ni rnam par dgod/ /gsang sngags rgyal
po'i cho ga ni/ /khro bo'i tshig ltar bzlas brjod bya/ /chu bo'i 'gram mam rgya mtsho 'am/ khron pa'am klu yi mtsho dang ni/ /rdzing bu lteng ka rnams su ni/ /blo can khro bo'i bzlas
pa bya| |yang na klu yi gnas su ni/ /sgom pa bzlas pa dag la 'jug /oM shrI badzra he he ru ru kaM hUM nAM nA ga bar ShA pa ya hUM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra hUM phaT swAhA/ 'di dag bsgom
te khri tsam bzla/ /dus bzhi dag tu stong du 'o/ /zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang / /sa rnams kun tu char 'bab 'gyur/ /dam tshig sbyin sreg mchod dus su/ /glu dang gar
ni nyer ldan pas/ /'o ma dag ni bza' zhing btung / /rnal 'byor pas ni klu brgyad bzla/ /'o ma'i khrus kyi cho ga yis/ /'o mas sbyin sreg bsreg blugs bya/ /'o ma'i shing
gi bud shing bya/ /'o ma'i shing gi yam shing dang / /'o mar bcas pas sbyin sreg bya/ /bum pa 'o mas yongs su dgang / /me sogs
mtshams dang phyogs rnams su/ /'o mar bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin/ /oM aM a nan+ta ya hUM nAM hUM swAhA/ oM baM bA su ke hUM nAM hUM swAhA/ oM taM tak+Sha ka hUM nAM hUM swAhA/ oM paM

pad+ma hUM nAM hUM swAhA/ oM maM mahA pad+ma hUM nAM hUM swAhA/ oM shaM shaM kha pA la hUM nAM hUM swAhA/ oM kaM karko Ta hUM nAM hUM swAhA/ oM aM a nan+ta tap+ta hUM nAM hUM swAhA/ oM hUM baM ba ru Na ya nA
gA d+hi pa te ye nA gaM baR+ShA pa ya hUM nAM hUM swAhA/ 'di bzlas khro bo dang bcas pas/ /kun gyi bzlas pa khri tsam bya/ /'o ma 'bras snying zas su bza'/ /dbang po thul cing yod
mi smra| |bri gzugs spangs pa'i mngon sum du/ /khri tsam bzlas na mngon du 'gyur/ /mngon sum du ni dngos grub cing / /smras pa tsam gyis char 'bebs te/ /'di la
the tshom ma byed cig /dngul gyi snod kyi nang du ni/ /yungs kar dang ni chu blugs la/ /de la nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongs su bzlas te sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs la
dri chu dang 'om bsres pas khrus byas te chu 'gram gyis sbrus pa las klu'i gzugs byas la nub tu mgo bstan te mgo bo dgu la chus dbang bskur te/ /de nas chu bo'i
nang du bzhug go/ /de ma thag tu lhas char 'bebs shing / dzam+bu'i gling du char 'bebs 'gyur/ /sa rnams 'bru yis gang 'gyur zhing / /nags tshal rnams ni 'phel bar byed/ /
sems can thams cad bde reg nas/ /phan tshun khro bo'i gzugs can ni/ /bdag bsgoms rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /rang gti snyin ga kho nar ni/ /he ru rdo rje bsgoms pa yi//
char pa yang ni 'bab par 'gyur/ /ri'i steng du 'dzegs te rtse gsum pa la yongs su bzlas na ser ba gcod par 'gyur ro/ /cang te'u la yongs su bzlas na me mched
pa'i me rengs par 'gyur ro/ /zhags pa la yongs su bzlas na 'gugs par byed/ thod pa la yongs su bzlas na khrag 'gugs par byed do/ /dgra sta la yongs su bzlas
na gsod par byed do/ /kha T+wAM ga la yongs su bzlas na zhi bar byed do/ /gri gug la yongs su bzlas na 'jig rten gsum du rgyu ba gsod par byed do/ /mgo bo la yongs su
bzlas na 'chi ba slong bar byed do/ /rdo rje gsor zhing yongs su bzlas na sa 'og gi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /dril bu la yongs su bzlas na mi dga' ba yongs su 'gugs
par byed do/ /glang po che'i pags pa la yongs su bzlas te bting na bar snang la 'phur bar 'gyur te/ dpag tshad stong phrag brgyar 'gro zhing slar ldog go /phyag rgya drug la
yongs su bzlas na pha rol gyi mdun du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /sa steng du ni kun spyod cing / /ci bde bar ni gnas par 'gyur/ /mngon par
brjod pa'i rgyud bal ma'i bla ma las/ char dbab pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gsang ba mchog
ni mdor pa sdus nas/ /skad cig gis ni bdag sgom pa/ /he ru ka dpal gzugs su bya/ /sdo zhing drag po rnam sgyur pa/ /drag po spyang sum zhal drug mchog /zla ba
phyed pa ral pa 'dzin/ /sna tshogs rdo rje dbu mchog la/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /rdo rje phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /sku la mgo bo'i do shal can/ /phyag rgya
drug gis rnam par brgyan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /phag mo yis ni sku la brgyan/ /zhabs gcig pa ni bzhengs pa ste/ /g.yas pa ser la dud pa'i
mdog /g.yon pa dmar la ljang gu 'o/ /steng gi zhal ni rta gdong ste/ /dkar zhing sprin mdog drag cing 'jigs/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /lha mo mchu ni
'tshir ba ste/ /rgyal ba'i pags pa gos su man bas/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rigs 'dzin cing / /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /rdo rje mtshan gyis brgyan pa ste/ /zhags pa
lcags kyu phyag na bsnams/ /cang te'u dang ni mgo bo 'dzin/ /gri gug zhags pa de bzhin te/ /phyag ni bcu gnyis dag tu bshad/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kyang / /
zhabs gcig tu ni rnam par bsgom/ /glang po'i gdong dang byi 'u'i gdong / /seng+ge'i gdong yang de bzhin te/ /dang po khyi yi gdong yin te/ /gnyis pa 'ug pa'i gdong yang
yin| |gsum pa phag gi gdong yin te/ /bzhi pa khra yi gdong can no/ /gnas kyi dbyibs kyi chos bdag nyid/ /sna tshogs gzugs ri chen po 'dzin/ /mtha' yas rnam
rgyal grags pa ste/ /thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad pa/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i sku lus 'chang / /de bzhin bsgom zhing rnam bsgom ste/ /sna tshogs gzugs can rin chen
bzhin| |bdag nyid chen po rnam par rol/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ /las sna tshogs sgrub pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas
gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /phag mo'i mchog ni sgrub ba ste/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bdag nyid bsgom zhing rnam par bsgom/ /sku ni nyi ma bcu gnyis gzi//
sku lus sin+dur 'dra mi g.yo/ /me tog ban+tu ka lta bu/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis
bzhugs/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /dbu skra mdzes pas 'khril ba ste/ /thabs kyi zhal mchu rnam
'tshir zhing / /mda' dang gzhu ni 'dzin pa ste/ /rna ba'i mthar thug 'gengs par byed/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /lcags kyu mchog gis 'gugs pa ste/ /pad+ma dmar
po'i dbus bzhugs shing / /'dod pa thams cad rab tu stsol/ /yang na phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/ /zhal drug lha mo'i sku lus 'byung / /steng gi zhal ni phag rgod gdong /
drag po gzi brjid 'jigs pa'i gzi/ /shar gyi 'dab la rdo rje gsang ba'i mchog /g.yon pa'i phyogs su rdo rje dam tshig mchog /nub kyi phyogs su rdo rje gzi brjid
mchog /lho yi phyogs su rdo rje rin chen mchog /me yi phyogs su rdo rje ye shes mchog /bden bral phyogs su rdo rje rig mchog ma/ /rlung gi phyogs su rdo rje grub mchog
ma/ /dbang ldan phyogs su rdo rje thal mchog ma/ /sgo la rdo rje 'bar mchog ma/ /rdo rje gzi brjid mchog ma ste/ /rdo rje khro bo mchog ma dang / /rdo rje mche ba mchog ma 'o/ /lha mo
de dag thams cad kyang / /dmar ba'i mdog can zhal gsum pa/ /phyag drug pa la spyan gsum pa/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs/ /dbu skra dag ni grol ba ste/
thams cad rgyan gyis rnam brgyan cing / /rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas/ /rang gi lus kyis thabs la 'khril/ /zhags pa dang ni lcags kyu dang / /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin//
grwa bzhi dag tu mda' gzhu dag /yongs su 'gengs pa gnas par bzhag/ /sgo ru g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /gcer bu rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal/ /thams cad yi
dwags gdan la bzhugs/ /rdo rje gsor zhing sdigs mdzub dang / /zhags pa dang ni yang dag ldan/ /gzhan yang phan tshun dag tu yang / /ji ltar 'khor la sogs phyag
'tshal| |de snyid ye shes lha mo ni/ /sku gsung thugs dang bcas pa bsgom/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/ /chos kyi ro ni mnyam par thim/ /ye shes bzlas pa spros nas
ni| |cho ga'i rim pas yang dag bsdu/ /dam tshig mchog gi bzlas pa yis/ /zla ba'i de nyid 'grub par 'gyur/ /oM shrI badzra bA rA hi A baM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badzra gu h+ya ut+ta me

huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shri badzra sa ma ya ut+ta me huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badzra te dzot+ta me huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badzra rat+not+ta me huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badzra dz+nya no t+ta me huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI

badzra bid+ya ut+ta me huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badzra sid+d+he t+ta me huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badzra b+hasmot+ta me huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badzra dzA lot+ta me dzeH huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badzra aM mr-i tot+ta me huM hUM phaT
swAhA/ oM shrI badzra kro d+hot+ta me baM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badzra daMSh+Tot+ta me hoHhuM hUM phaT swAhA/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis/ /sgom pa dang ni bzlas pa
bya| |bsdu dang spro ba byas nas ni/ /chos rnams kun dang chos tsan ni/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor bas dag /sems can thams cad rab tu brtag /rnal 'byor gnas ni chos yin
te| |gsang ba gsum la rab tu gzhug /gsang gsum gnas ni chos yin te/ /chos kyang de bzhin de lta bu/ /bdag med chos ni chos yin te/ /chos las chos ni

yod ma yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gsang ba gsum gyi dam tshig gi mchog ces bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rnal 'byor ma drug cho ga'i rim/ /pad+ma 'dab lnga bris nas ni/ /lte ba ge sar khyab par ni/ /de yi dbus su phag mo ni/ /dmar zhing sna
tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug mdzes/ /spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba ste/ /thod pa'i phreng pa'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyogs kyi gos ni 'dzin pa'i
mchog /skyil krung byed pa gar dang bcas/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku brgyan cing / /mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin pa ste/ /gdug pa'i bdud ni thams cad dang / /dus mtshan
khas spub byas pa la/ /zhabs kyis kyang ni mnan par bzhugs/ /dmar dang sngo dang ljang ba ste/ /sangs rgyas lngas ni rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+rAM 'dzin/ /zhags pa
lcags kyu phyag na bsnams/ /mgo bo dang ni gri gug 'dzin/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /snying gar ye shes dam tshig ni/ /sku gsung thugs su sbyor las byung //
shar phyogs lha mo ya mi ni/ /g.yon du bskor nas rnam par dgod/ /rmongs byed ma dang skyong byed ma/ /skrag byed ma dang tsaN+Di ka/ /spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba ste/ /zhal
gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /sngo dang dkar dang ser ba dang / /ljang gu dud pa'i mdog can te/ /thod pa dang ni kha TaM 'dzin/ /dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang / /thod pa'i phreng ba'i
dbu rgyan can/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /phyogs kyi gos can gar gyi mchog /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /mi bskyod pa yi cod phan 'chang / /thugs rje'i
nyams kyi bde ba ste/ /gnyis med sbyor pas mnyam par ldan/ /rdo rje sems sogs mchog de nyid/ /phag mo dang ni rdo rje sems/ /ya mi ni dang rnam snang mdzad/ /rmongs byed ma
dang pad+ma'i gar/ /skyong byed ma dang khrag 'thung ste/ /skrag byed rdo rje nyi ma dang / /tsaN+Di ka dang rta mchog ste/ /rdo rje sems sku dkar po ste/ /rnam par snang mdzad ser po yin/ /pad+ma
bkad dbang dmar ba ste/ /he ru ka dpal sngon po yin/ /rdo rje nyi ma dmar po ste/ /rta mchog dag ni ljang gu 'o/ /yang na so sor bsgom par
bya| |rdo rje sems dpa' zhal gsum pa/ /phyag drug spyan ni gsum pa ste/ /phyag rgya drug gi mtshan gyis brgyan/ /rdo rje dril bu thod kha T+wAM/ /ral gri cang ti'u mgo bo
'chang / /na ra'i pags mnabs gar dang bcas/ /rnam snang la sogs dpa' bo kun/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /thod pa dang ni kha TaM dang / /cang te'u dril
bus mtshan pa'i mchog /yang na thams cad phyag bcu gnyis/ /zhal gdong drug par bsgom par bya/ /de dag gsang sngags 'di yin te/ /oM shri oM baM baM huM hUM

phaT swAhA/ oM shri hAM yoM yaM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI hI moM maM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI hreM hriM saM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI hUM hUM saM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI phaT phaT tsam hUM hUM
phaT swAhA/ de dag ni/ rnal 'byor ma drug gi gsang sngags so/ /oM haHbaM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM na ma hi b+h+ruM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM swAhA hu hri huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM bau ShaT he hiM
hUM phaT swAhA/ oM hUM hUM ho trAM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM phaT haM hIM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ 'di ni dpa' bo drug gi sngags/ /bzlas pa dang ni bsgoms tsam gyis/ /'khor lo drug ni
mchog grub cing / /'khor los bsgyur ba thob pa ste/ /'khor los bsgyur drug rgyal por 'gyur/ /mi pham rgyal ba yang dag rdzogs/ /stobs chen rtsal mchog rnyed pa
yin| |phyag mtshan drug la rtag mchod cing / /cho ga bzhin du mngon bsngags ni/ /de ni myur du grub nas ni/ /rnal 'byor rgyal bo mchog kyang thob/ /mi snang la sogs
grub nas ni/ /khams gsum dag tu rnam par dpyod/ /'gro ba drug gi sems can grol/ /bsgoms pas rdo rje 'dzin dang mtshungs/ /yang na 'khor lo zur drug la//
bde ba chen po rnam snang mdzad/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje 'chang rgyal po/ 'khor los bsgyur ba bdag po ni/ /gur gum gyi ni mdog lta bu/ /gzi mdangs 'bar ba'i 'od can
te| |phyag rgya che dang yang dag ldan/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang ngo bo/ /rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pa'i/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'khyud/ /ral gri po ti kha T+wAM ga/
thod pa lcags kyu zhags pa dang / /ut+pa la dang cang te'u/ /gur gum mdog dang sngo pa dang / /dmar dang ljang gu steng zhal dkar/ /chos kyi dbyings ni dag pa che//
sems can khams ni rab grol byed/ /shar sogs g.yon bskor dgong pa ni/ /sta mchog rtsa ba'i ka dang bcas/ /de dag da ru dgong byas pas/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje
rang nyid grub/ /dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang / /sngo dang dmar dang dkar sngo ljang / /yan lag drug tu dpa' bo dag /mkha' 'gro/
ma dang lhan cig bcas/ /rdo rje sems dang phag mo dang / /rnam snang mdzad dang ya mi ni/ /pad+ma gar dbang rmongs byed bcas/ /khrag 'thung dang ni skyong byed ma/ /rdo rje
nyi ma skrag byed ma/ /ljang dang dud pa'i mdog can te/ /de lta'i sku mdog rnam par bsgom/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa'o/ /lha mo rnams ni phyag gnyis pa'o//
thod pa dang ni gri gug 'dzin/ /dpa' bo thod pa kha T+wAM ga /rang gi phyag mtshan gnyis med sbyor/ /dril bu lhan cig yang dag ldan/ /cang te'u ni 'dzin pa'i
mchog /spyan gsum pa la g.yas brkyang bzhugs/ /stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /mgo bo'i do shal 'dzin
pa ste| |thams cad yi dgas steng du bzhugs/ /dbus su 'jigs byed dus mtshan dag /lha mo byin pa gnyis kyis 'khril/ /skra grol ba la phyogs gos can//
snying gar ye shes dam tshig ni/ /sku gsung thugs dang rnam par sbyar/ /cho ga gnyis pa yang dag sbyar/ /gnas kyi 'khor lo bsgoms nas ni/ /dpa' bo mkha'
'gre ma rnams dgod/ /gsang ba gsum ni snying gar gnas/ /khwa gdong la sogs mkha' 'gro ma/ /phyi rol sgo ru rnam par dgod/ /zur du gshin rje sreg la sogs//
thams cad gcer bu rnam par bsgom/ /sngar bshad mdog dang phyag mtshan te/ /yi dwags gdan la yang dag bzhugs/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis gnas//
drag po skra ni grol ba ste/ /thams cad thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /rang gi phyi dang nang du yang / /pha rol phyin drug rnam par dag /bsgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya/ /spro zhing
bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzlas pa bya/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma bzlas na/ /bsgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs
spros nas/ /'gro ba gsum po rdzogs par byas/ /nang gi bdag nyid bsgoms pa yis/ /'khor lo gsum gsang bsgoms nas bzlas/ /de nyid gsum dang sngags
lhan cig /dpa' bo dang ni mkha' 'gro ma/ /hu hUM phaT ni mtha' ru ste/ /'khor lo gsum gyi bzlas pa bya/ /rnal 'byor cho ga bzhin du ni/ /dam tshig can gyis de bzlas

huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma daMSh+Ti NI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma tha nI ye huM hUM phaT/ g.yon dang g.yas kyi lag gnyis su/ /go cha gnyis po bkod nas ni/ /gang zhig
ji ltar 'dod pa ru/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa yin/ /the tshom med par las byas na/ /nges par dngos grub gzhan du min// yang na mgon pos bcu'i
dbang / /pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus/ /bsam gtan shes rab drug pa ste/ /thabs dang stobs dang smon lam//
dang / /ye shes sgo skyong rnam dag pa'o/ /rab tu dga' dang dri ma med/ /'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro can/ /sbyang dka' ba dang mngon du gyur/ /ring du song dang mi g.yo
ba| |legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin/ /'di yis rnam par dag pa bsgom/ /gshin rje sreg sogs bzhi po ni/ /'phags pa'i bden par rnam par bsgom/ /sdug bsngal
dang ni kun 'byung dang / /'gog pa dang ni lam rnams te/ /bcom ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje dpal/ /chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam dag ste/ /ye shes rang gi ngo bo yin/ /'di
ltar rnam par dag pa bsgom/ /gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i lam/ /gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba ste/ /rnal 'byor stobs kyis gsang ba mchog /sgrub pas rjes su
bstan pa dang / /ji bzhin bdag po'i dbye ba dang / /bla ma'i rim pa legs par bslangs/ /'di ltar cho ga gnyis med pa/ /sbyor ba'i dam tshig mchog yin te/ /dngos
grub kun gyi thabs kyi rgyu/ /rnal 'byor ma thugs gsang ba che/ /las rnams kun gyi 'bras bu ster/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gnyis su med pa'i
go cha'i sbyor ba bskyed pa'i sgom pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /brda ni mchog tu gsang ba ste/ /brda ni yongs
su mi shes par/ /sbyor ba'i dngos grub mi 'grub ste/ /'di ni nges par shes pa na/ /dngos grub 'grub par the tshom med/ /dra zhes bya ba skyes bur bshad/ /di zhes bya ba
bud med yin/ /bu zhes bya ba gnon pa yin/ /su zhes bya bzang nyid/ /ma zhes bya ba ma ru bshad/ /ya zhes bya ba chung ma
nyid/ /b+ha zhes bya ba sring mo can/ /b+hi zhes bya ba mdza' mor bshad/ /lu zhes bya ba bu mo yin/ /sri zhes bya ba khrag tu bshad/ /so ni zhi ba'i btung ba yin//
pe zhes bya ba thug pa ste/ /di zhes bya ba de bzhin sha /ba zhes bya ba za ba yin/ /b+hu zhes bya ba 'dres pa yin/ /pi zhes bya ba dur khrod yin/ /du zhes bya ba ro yin no//
TI zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma/ /gA zhes bya ba lA ma yin/ /tri zhes bya ba gzugs can ma/ /ku zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro ma/ /ha ni khaN+Da ro nyid ma/ /dza zhes bya ba byin pa
gnyis/ /ba zhes bya ba gsong bor smra/ /swa zhes bya ba legs 'ongs yin/ /mi zhes bya ba nya yin la/ /byo zhes bya ba bza' ba yin/ /phyo zhes bya ba btung ba yin/ /
ga ni bgrod dang bgrod min yin/ /ka zhes bya ba 'dod pa yin/ /sa zhes bya ba gzhan mi 'gro/ /ra zhes bya ba khyo mid mo/ /du zhes bya ba spyod ngan mo/ /
su zhes bya ba skal bzang mo/ /na zhes bya ba skal ngan/ /sa zhes bya ba dam tshig can/ /a zhes bya ba dam tshig med/ /i zhes bya ba 'ongs pa yin/ /na zhes
bya ba ma 'ongs yin/ /so zhes bya ba chags pa yin/ /'di dag yi ge'i brda yin te/ /dbang bskur dus su rnal 'byor pas/ /bza' dang bza' med sbyin par bya/ /dbang
bskur ba ni mchog yin te/ /dam tshig mchog ni shes pa dang / /dam tshig can gyi dam tshig dus/ /dam tshig 'khor lo 'dus pa dang / /dad pa rnams la sbyin par bya//
ma dad pa la sbyin mi bya/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ brda'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//
rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan nyid ni/ /gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /sgrub pa po yis dngos grub thob/ /bud med pad rtsa ltar dkar zhing / /pad+ma'i 'dab ltar dkyus ring
mig /rtag tu gos ni dkar la dga'/ /tsan+dan gsar pa'i dri dang ldan/ /de gshegs 'dus pa nyid la dga'/ /de rigs las byung shes par bya/ /bud gang btso
ma'i gser 'dra zhing / /dmar dang ser ba'i gos la dga'/ /dzA ti tsam pa'i dri dang ldan/ /de yang bzang po'i rjes 'gror 'gyur/ /thams cad ut+pal ltar sdo bsangs//
dri dang gos ni sdo la dga'/ /ut+pal sngon po'i dri yod pa/ /de /ni dpa' bo bzang rjes 'gro/ /bud med pad dkar 'dra mdog gang / /rtag tu pad+ma'i rtsa ba dri/ /de yang de
bzhin dpa' mo'i blo/ /dmar zhing ser skya'i bud med gang / /gzugs bzang gos ni dmar ba dang / /ma la ki dang ut+pal dri/ /de
ni rdo rje'i rigs byung yin/ /ser zhing ljang ba'i bud med gang / /gos ni dkar la dga' ba dang / /mgo la me tog dri dang ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs rigs rjes
'gro yin/ /bud med gang zhig kha dog dmar/ /de'i mdog can gyi gos 'chang zhing / /rtag tu ga bur dri dang ldan/ /rnam snang rigs kyi rjes 'gro zhing / /rnal
'byor ma yi rigs rnams ni/ /de ltar bdun po ngas bshad pa/ /g.yon pa'i kun spyod la rtag dga'/ /rang gi mdog gis rigs drug ldan/ /rigs kyi rigs
pa'i yi ge yang / /kha dog drug tu 'gyur ba yin/ /rang gi phyag rgya 'ching ba dang / rang rigs las byung tshig tu smra/ /g.yon las 'gro ba'i bud med gang / /rnal
'byor pa la g.yon la rtag /lag pa g.yon gyis mtshon pa dang / /g.yon nas lta bas rnam par blta/ /lha mo rnams dang gar smra ba/ /de ni dam tshig ldan par
bshad| |bud med gang byas de nyan cing / /rigs kyis bon rab tu smra/ /rigs kyi bya ba mi spong ste/ /rang gi bstan bshad mi 'dor la/ /rang gi rigs kyi rig pa
zlos| |de ni dam tshig ldan par bshad/ /phyag 'tshal ba ni gang 'ching ba/ /g.yon pa'i lus kyis rtag tu bdud/ /lha mo rnams dang kun smra ba/ /de ni nges par bde bar
'gro| |mthe bong g.yon pas sa la ni/ /rkang pas ri mo 'bri byed cing / /mgo ni 'phrug par byed pa dang / /zur gyis lta zhing lag pa ston/ /sgrub pa po la khyad par du/ /de
yis rang rig dran pa dang / /'khur pa'am kos ko dag dang ni/ /sna dag tu ni thal mo ston/ /zur gyis lta zhing lan gcig bsngags/ /zlos shing rigs la rnam par lta/ /
bden par 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ma/ /nges par dam tshig can yin na/ /de nas rnyed dka' rnal 'byor ma/ /de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi/ /bdud rtsi lnga rnams yang
dag 'byung / /ya mi ni dang skrag byed ma/ /'dod ldan phag mo 'jigs gzugs ma/ /kun tu spyod pa bsu ra/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rnam pa bdun/ /mdor bsdus rang
mtshan bshad pa yin/ /gzugs can ma dang tsum+ba ki/ /lA ma yongs gyur byis bcas mo/ /mi ldog a hi ka lha mo/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni bdun du bshad/ /mngon
par zhen pas lta ba dang / /smin ma 'degs par gar byed cing / /sngon bzhin gzugs ni sdud byed la/ /phyis ni 'jigs par byed pa dag /gzugs can ma ni yin
par bshad/ /gnyis med dpa' bos bsnyen par bya/ /sdug pa'am yang na mi sdug pa/ /byis pa 'khyud cing tsum pa na/ /de ni tsum+pa kir
zhes bya| |mkha' 'gro mchog kyang de nyid yin/ /zas mi lta bar zur du lta/ /khro gnyer dang ni gdong dag dang / /smin ma sgyur zhing sdigs mdzub dang / /'di ni
gzhan yang dbugs mi 'byin/ /'jigs par byed pa gang yin pa/ /de ni lA ma yin par bstan/ /phag dang dred dang byil dang / /lce spyang rigs dang rta dag
dang / /thams cad dar ni 'jigs byed pa/ /yongs su gyur par de bshad de/ /shin tu dga' bas dgod pa dang / /song nas slar yang mi ldog la/ /rjes su chags
pas gsal bar dgod/ /du ma skyes mar ni de bshad de/ /yid ni kun tu skye ba dang / /rkang pa lag pas bong ba'am/ /gos mtha' ma yang na shing dag gis/ /
des reg pa ni 'tsho mi 'gyur/ /mi ldog par ni shes bya ste/ /sgrub min par ni de bshad do/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rigs phyag rgya/ /dpa' bos bsnyen cing mtshan ma
blta| |thod pa dgra sta mche ba dang / /ral gri kun tu skrag byed yin/ /rdo rje dang ni dung nyid dang / /rigs kyi phyag rgya yin par bshad/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i
bla ma las/ rnal 'byor ma'i mtshan ma'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /
gang zhig yang dag shes pa yis/ /mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig la gnas pa'o/ /dmar zhing ser ba'i bud med gang / /pad+ma'i dri ni rnam par gtong / /lta stangs rang bzhin
zhi pa dang / /zhen pas lta ba'i rjes 'gro ba/ /bud med gang gi sen mo dmar/ /mig ni kun tu zhen pa dang / /khyim du pad+ma 'bri ba ni/ /pad+ma gar dbang rigs 'byung yin//
smin pa'i dbus na rtse gsum yod/ /lus ni sngo bsangs skya ba dang / /rtag tu rdo rje rigs sgom pa/ /gang gi khyim du rdo rje 'bri/ /rtag par mchod pa byed pa yi/ /mkha'
'gro ma ste dpal ldan ni/ /he ru ka yis rigs byung yin/ /gang gi dpral bar rtse gsum ni/ /mdung thung dag ni snang 'gyur zhing / /mig dmar mdog ni dmar ser
dang / /de bzhin rkang pa lag pa dmar/ /ra skyes khyim bya dag la yang / /rtag tu yid ni dgar 'gyur zhing / /de yi khyim du rdo rje mtshan/ /rtag tu gang zhig mchod byed pa//
shrI he ru ka'i rigs byung ba/ /mkha' 'gro yin par gdon mi za/ /'khor lo gang gi dpral ba'am/ /lag par yang ni snang 'gyur ba/ /sprin sngon dag dang 'dra ba ni/ /
rtag tu dpral bar 'chang byed pa/ /skal ba chen po kun tshogs shing / /mchog tu bden pa gang yin dang / /khyim du 'khor lo 'bri
byed cing / /rtag tu de la mchod byed pa/ /rdo rje phag mo rigs byung ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni stobs kyis dregs/ /gang zhig mig sman nag 'dra zhing / /so ni
dkar zhing mtho ba dang / /rtag tu gdug par gyur pa dang / /sems stobs ldan par gyur pa dang / /rtag tu khrus la dga' ba dang / /mang du smra bar mi byed cing //
khyim du rdo rje 'bri ba dang / /rtag tu dge bas mchod byed pa/ /rdo rje phag mo'i rigs byung ba/ /stong phrag bcu dang lnga pa yin/ /ser zhing gser gyi mdog 'drar
