snang / /mig mi g.yo zhing kha spu ser/ /rdo rje gang gi dpral ba'am/ /lag par yang ni snang 'gyur ba/ /rtag tu rgyal srid dag la gnas/ /snyems shing bden
par smra ba dang / /mi li ka yi dri 'byung zhing / /gang gi khyim du rdo rje ni/ /rtag tu 'bri zhing cher mchod pa/ /dum skyes ma yi rigs las byur/ /rnal 'byor ma
yi dbang phyug mchog/ /gang zhig rtag par sha la dga'/ /skem zhing mig sman nag pa'i mdog/ /dpral ba mdung rtse lta bu yod/ /gang zhig gdug pa'i las
la dga'/ /rtag tu dur khrod dag tu 'gro/ /'jigs pa med cing rtse med de/ /gang gis dpral bar thig le dang / /khyim du thong pa 'bri zhing mchod/ /dpal ldan he
ru ka de yi/ /mkha' 'gro'i rigs las byung ba yin/ /sprin gyi mdog 'dra'i bud med gang / /so ni mi mnyam par gnas shing / /rtag tu gdug pa'i las la dga'//
g.yon gyi mche ba gtsigs pa dang / /de yi khyim du dgra sta ni/ /'bri zhing rtag tu mchod byed pa/ /rnam par 'dren pa'i rigs byung ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro mar ni the tshom med//
mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs 'di dag /shri he ru ka'i rigs las byung / /sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir/ /mtshan nyid yang dag bshad pa yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i
rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ mkha' 'gro ma'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sgrub pa po yis lA ma yi/ /
mtshan nyid kyi ni khyad par dang / /yan lag tshogs ni shes par bya'o/ /gang gi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /kun tu zlum por snang 'gyur zhing / /kha yi smra ra rtag tu
yod| |spu dang smin ma ring ba dang / /gos bzang gtsang zhing zhi ba dang / /mi 'khrug ba den par smra ba dang / /rtag tu dam pa'i chos la dga'/ /dpa' bo'i sring mor de
shes bya/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgyar sbyin bya ba/ /yang na rus spal phyag rgya bya/ /pags pa bum pa spyi blugs nyid/ /phyag rgya'i lan du
shes par bya/ /de ni tshes bcu'i res dag la/ /khyim du pad+ma 'bri bar 'gyur/ /lA ma yi ni bud med kyi/ /mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin/ /gsus pa rlo zhing
mig dkyus ring / /mig ni dmar zhing ser skyar gnas/ /phyug cing skal bzang dpal yon tan/ /ser zhing tsam pa lta bur snang / /shin tu ring min thung ba'am
min| |sna tshogs pa yi gos la dga'/ /dpral bar ri mo gsum yod cing / /mtshams kyi gyen du bltas pa nas/ /rgod cing dga' pa nyid dag dang / /lam
ni rnam par gnon cing gnas/ /g.yul du 'chi ba rnams kyi ni/ /gtam dag la ni rtag tu dga'/ /de lta'i rab dregs mthong na ni/ /mdung gi phyag rgya bstan
par bya| |rkang pa g.yon pa bskum pa yi/ /bdag nyid kyang ni bstan par bya/ /g.yon pa dag ni yongs ldog pa/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad/ /bcu bzhi
dang ni tshes brgyad ni/ /de ni dus tshigs yin par bshad/ /khyim du mdung rtse gsum pa yang / /bris nas de ni rtag tu mchod/ /'jig rten dbang phyug lA ma yi/ /
mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin/ /gang gi mkhur tshos dag tu ni/ /khung bur snang ba gnas gyur cing / /de bzhin bzhin rtag tu dmar zhing ser/ /mig ni ljang ser dag tu snang / /
ska ni de bzhin 'khyil ba dang / /mgo dang dpral bar dar bcings snang / /ri mo gcig par rab tu gnas/ /de bzhin mgrin pa ring ba dang / /rtag tu gos dmar la dga'
zhing / /dgod cing lug ni len pa nyid/ /lan 'ga' zhig ni khro ba dang / /sems ni rnam par g.yo ba dang / /rtsod pa la ni dga' ba ste/ /'di 'dra'i rab dregs mthong na ni//
mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /gnyis pa nyid ni 'bad pa yis/ /dril bu'i phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /g.yon gyi phyogs su ldog pa ni/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par
bshad| |thung zhing byin pa sbom pa dang / /rtag tu gos ser la dga' zhing / /phrag pa dag na gos kyang 'phyang / /de 'dra'i bud med mthong na ni/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya bstan
bya zhing / /'bad pa yis ni gnyis pa yang / /dung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /g.yon nas yongs su ldog pa ni/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad/ /bcu bzhi de yi
dus yin te/ /de yi khyim du rdo rje 'bri/ /shrI he ru ka lA ma yi/ /mtshan nyid gyur ba de dag yin/ /lus kun la ni ba spu yod/ /mig ni nag cing ser ba dang / /sbom
zhing rnam sgyur mi bzod pa/ /bzhin 'phel che zhing kha che la/ /ma mchu rlo zhing kha dog nag /mig zlum sna ni nyams pa dang / /rtag tu glu ni
mkhas pa dang / /sprin gyi mdog can yid 'phrog pa/ /'di 'dra'i rab dregs mthong na ni/ /glu yi phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /gnyis pa yang ni 'bad pa yis/ /mdud
gi phyag rgya bstan par bya/ /g.yon nas yongs su ldog pa ni/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad/ /chos grangs bcu gcig de yi dus/ /khyim du mche ba 'bri
bar byed/ /rdo rje phag mo lA ma yi/ /mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ lA ma'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi
bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro rnams kyi brda rnams te/ /gang zhig spun dang sring mo ru/ /yang dag
shes par 'gyur pa'o/ /gang zhig lag g.yon ston pa ni/ /gsong bor smra ba ston pa yin/ /gang zhig srin lag ston pa ni/ /gsong por smra ba lan 'gyur yin//
gang zhig lto ba rdeb pa ni/ /bdag ni bkres par sten pa yin/ /gang zhig dpral ba ston pa ni/ /nam mkha' las ni 'ongs zhes pa'o/ /gang zhig khar ni sor mo 'dzud//
zos zin zhes ni smra ba yin/ /gang zhig lce ni bskyod pa dag /za 'o zhes ni smra ba yin/ /gang zhig pus mo la reg pa/ /ngal lo zhes ni ston pa yin/ /gang zhig sor mo rtse
la reg /ngal sos zhes ni smra ba yin/ /gang zhig so ni 'cha' byed pa/ /sha za'o zhas ni smra ba yin/ /lag pa g.yas pa ston pa ni/ /'di ltar gyis zhes ston pa yin/ /
gang zhig khro gnyer ston pa ni/ /bcings so zhes ni smra ba yin/ /gang zhig mkha' lding ston pa ni/ /grol lo zhes ni ston pa yin/ /gang zhig khu tshur ston pa ni/ /de
la pa ta ti bstan bya/ /gang zhig skra ni ston pa la/ /rnam par 'gyur ba bltas nas ni/ /kha T+wAM ga ni de la bstan/ /gang zhig yan lag bskyod pa dang / /de la mche ba
bstan par bya/ /gang zhig lag pas lag pa ston/ /gtor ma za zhes smra ba yin/ /gang zhig lag pa g.yas pa ston/ /de ltar gyis shig smra ba yin/ /gang zhig rna
ba la reg pa/ /gnas par bya zhes ston pa yin/ /gang zhig sen mos sen mo reg /she yi khyer ces bya ba yin/ /gang zhig sa 'bri dkyil 'khor du/ /de rig 'jug
ces smra ba yin/ /gang zhig nu ma la reg pa/ /bdag gi bu ni srungs zhes bya/ /gang zhig mthe g.yon sa la 'bri/ /gnyen dag srungs shig pa ru bshad/ /gang zhig
mig ni rnam 'dzum pa/ /de ltar bya zhes smra ba yin/ /gang zhig tshigs la reg byed pa/ /bde bar nyal zhes smra ba yin/ /pho nya ma/

ni gang yang rung / /de dag kun gyis yang dag spyad/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ brda'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de nas yan lag phyag rgya yi/ /mtshan nyid de yis bshad par bya/ /bud gang spyi gtsug reg byed pa/ /mgo bo de la bstan par bya/ /gang zhig dpral ba ston
pa ni| |de la mkhur tshos bstan par bya/ /gang zhig so ni ston pa la/ /de la lce ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig mchu ni ston byed pa/ /de la dpung ba bstan par bya//
gang zhig rked rgyab ston byed pa/ /de las ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig nu ma ston byed pa/ /de la kos ko bstan par bya/ /gang zhig lto ba ston byed pa/ /de la
lte ba bstan par bya/ /gang zhig gsang ba ston byed pa/ /de la ling+ga bstan par bya/ /gang zhig brla ni ston byed pa/ /de la 'og ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig pus
mo ston byed pa/ /de la byin pa bstan par bya/ /gang zhig rked pa ston byed pa/ /de la ling+ga bstan par bya/ /gang zhig sor tshigs ston byed pa/ /de la sen mo
bstan par bya/ /gang zhig sa ni ston byed pa/ /de la nam mkha' bstan par bya/ /gang zhig nam mkha' ston byed pa/ /de la nyi ma bstan par bya/ /gang zhig chu bo ston

byed pa| |de la rgya mtsho bstan par bya/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ yan lag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ /yan lag ji bzhin phyag rgya'i mchog /gang zhig shes pas spun nam ni/ /sring mor the tshom med 'gyur ro/ /sor mo gcig ni
ston pa yis/ /legs par 'ongs zhes smra ba yin/ /sor mo gnyis ni bstan pa yis/ /legs 'ongs lan ni smra ba yin/ /'di ni rnal 'byor ma kun gyi/ /yan
lag phyag rgyar rab tu bshad/ /mdzub mo gnyis bkug mig gi rgyu/ /sngags pas gang la de bstan te/ /de mod ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar/ /dbang du 'gyur bar the
tshom med/ /gang zhig gung mo ston byed pa/ /de la mdzub mo bstan par bya/ /gang zhig srin lag ston byed pa/ /de la lce ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig pa ti sa
ston pa| |de la mdun ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig spyi bo ston byed pa/ /de la mtshams kyi mtha' bstan bya/ /gang zhig sa ni ston byed pa/ /de la kha ni bstan
bar bya/ /gang zhig khro gnyer ston byed pa/ /de la mtshams ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig so ni ston byed pa/ /de la mchu ni
bstan par bya/ /gang zhig mgrin pa ston byed pa/ /de la kha ni bstan par bya/ /gang zhig dpral ba ston byed pa/ /de la lte ba bstan par bya/ /'di ni rnal
'byor ma kun gyi/ /rim bzhin yan lag phyag rgya yin/ /'di dag rtag bsten gsang ba pa/ /yang dag lta bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /mngon par brjod pa'i
rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ mkha' 'gro ma'i yan lag gi phyag rgya'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//
mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan nyid do/ /gang gis ring nas dpa' bo dang / /dpa' mo sring mor shes 'gyur ba'o/ /dam tshig can gang rjes chags pa/ /rnal 'byor
longs spyod sa gzhi yin/ /gzhir ni sa gzhi byas nas su/ /rnal 'byor pa yi sdom pa mchod/ /go ldog pa yis lta ba ni/ /bzhin ni rnam par 'gyur ba dang / /
rtag tu bzhin gyi smin ma g.yo/ /sna tshogs myur du shes bya ba/ /de bzhin mkha' 'gro las byung ba'o/ /rnam bsgyur 'khyil par shes bya ste/ /ri mo gsum pa yongs
su zlum/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams des 'gro ba'i/ /de yi mtshan ma shes par bya/ /gal te ldog par gyur na ni/ /sngar bshad don ni btang bar 'gyur/ /de yi dngos
ni 'jig gyur pa/ /rdo rje lta bur gsal ba yin/ /sgra ni khu byug skad lta pur/ /gsal ba de ni rtag tu gyur/ /'di ni mtshan ma'i khyim du ni/ /rdo rje lta bu me long
bcas| |ral gri 'dra ba'i me long bcas/ /phyag mtshan mdung 'drar rtag tu 'byung / /de gsal me long yin zhes bya/ /mtshan mar byas pa'i gzugs
dag ni| |mtshan nyid 'di dag dang ldan pa/ /de ni mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi/ /mchog yin par ni shes par bya/ /po taM gi zhes bya ba ni/ gsong bor smra ba'o/ /pra
ti po taM gi zhes bya ba ni/ /gsong por smra ba'i lan no/ /ga mu zhes bya ba ni/ 'gro'o zhes bya ba yin no/ /luM baM zhes bya ba ni/ /'ong ngo zhes bya ba yin no/ /de
hi zhes bya ba ni/ zas zhes bya ba yin no/ /gri ha na zhes bya ba ni/ bram ze zhes smra ba yin no/ /pi ra NaM zhes bya ba ni/ /snying nyid do/ /ma ra Na zhes bya ba ni/ sgra
dan no| |g+han+d+ha zhes bya ba ni/ /ka ra ni ka'o/ /shi ro ni/ rdzun no/ /ka ra ni/ lto ba'o/ /ba ra ni/ sgra'o/ /shra ra mo No n-i/ rna ba'o/ /a mr-i ta swa ni/ srub pa'o/ /sa ma
ga ma ni| mi'o/ /ta li ka ni/ mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /na ra ka ni/ dkyil 'khor ro/ /a mo ka ni/ dur khrod do/ /ka li ka ni/ sgo'o/ /
shwa sa ni| bram ze'i rigs so/ /ba ri d+hi ni/ rgyal rigs so/ /bi ra ti ni/ rje'i rigs so/ /kru ra ni/ dmangs so/ /an+ta s+tha ni/ sme sha can no/ /ba shu li
ka ni| khyim mo/ /TA ka ni/ sring mo'o/ /me la ba ka ni/ chu'o/ /gri ha ra Na ni/ rdo rje chu gtong ba'o/ /lce so la reg pa ni/ ltogs par ston pa'o/ /hri sham
ni| dris bsgo ba'o/ /ku ta ni/ gnas che ge mo nas 'ongs so zhes bya ba'o/ /ki ra ni ni/ me tog go /tu mu la ni/ rgod pa'o/ /tan+ta ni/ char dbab pa zlog pa'o//
tri p+ta ni| zhu ba'o/ /d+hur R+yo ni/ shes pa'o/ /nri ha ni/ sprin no/ /d+hu pa ni/ bdug pa'o/ /sa nu ni/ ri bo'o/ /sa ri ta ni/ chu bo'o/ /a gu li ni/ yan
lag go /ba da na ni/ ga dong ngo / /dza ti ka ni/ lce'o/ /an+ta na ni/ so'o/ /pak+Shi ni/ rgyal mtshan no/ /tshan+do ni/ phreng ba'o/ /tsa la ni/ rlung ngo / /pa shu
ni| ri dwags so/ /yan+ti ni/ dkyil 'khor ro/ /sha na ma ni/ bzhi mdo'o/ /phal ku shi ni/ skye ba'o/ /ma hA k+Sha ra ba ni/ phyugs chen po'o/ /ga ni/ ra skyes
so| |na ni/ mi'o/ /go ni/ khyu mchog go /ma ni/ ma he'o/ /b+ha ni/ bza' ba'o/ /ha ni/ rnam grangs so/ /a d+h+ya ni/ rgyal po'o/ /kha la reg pa ni/ zos so zhes
pa'o| |lce la reg pa ni/ ngoms so zhes pa'o/ /na sti ni/ snying po'o/ /hri ni/ ngo tsha'o/ /me thun gyis shig pa'o/ /brla la reg pa ni/ stong pa'o/ /steng du gcig
go /'og tu med pa'o/ /phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan no/ /dpa' bo'i gsung gi gsang ba'i brda'o/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ mkha' 'gro
ma'i brda'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas rnal 'byor rgyud du ni/ /rnyed dka'i dam tshig nga yis bshad/ /skyes pa'am bud
med g.yon nas 'gro/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub ster bar byed/ /khyim dang zhing du rnam gnas pa/ /shin tu ring yang shes par 'gyur/ /he ru ka las sbyor gzhan
med| |slob dpon rnal 'byor ma nyid ni/ /rgyud 'di ru ni sgrub pa 'o/ /legs par gyur pa nyid yin te/ /brnyas mi bya zhing spang mi bya/ /nus pa yis ni mchod
par bya| |pho nya mo brgyad 'di dag ni/ /mos dang dad pa 'phal byed pa/ /rtag par dngos grub rnams kyi rgyu/ /dam tshig rnams kyang skyong ba 'o/ /lha mo gzhan dag
kun sbyor ba'i/ /'dod la rmongs par gyur pa dang / /gnyis su med dang thogs med dang / /dam tshig spyad par spyod pa dang / /bud
med dbang phyug shin tu sbyor/ /tshangs par spyod pa de bzhin gzhi/ /khro med rgyun gyi kun tu spyod/ /'di brgyad dam tshig kun spyod yin/ /sgrub pa la ni gnas
pa yi| |sgrub pa po yis rtag shes bya/ /rgyud kun gyi ni thun mong ste/ /rgyu med pa ni gzhom mi bya/ /dad pa nyid kyis blang bya yi/ /mig dang lag pas ma yin
no| |gsang ba 'di ni mi bstan cing / /rab tu 'bad de sba ba dang / /blo ldan mthe chung bskyed par ni/ /pho nya mo rnams yang dag gnas/ /dag dang ma dag
'dres pa ste/ /sgrub pa po ni gsum du gnas/ /mnyes byed rnam par dag pa dang / /gsal byed yon tan ldan pa'i mi'o/ /yul yul du ni dka' thub
can| |pho nya'i gzugs kyi mtshan ma brtag /pho nya ral gri so 'dra zhing / /dag byed pa bsod nams 'phel byed yin/ /de bzhin pho nya legs 'dres pas/ /
sgrub pa po yis dngos grub thob/ /bzlas mchod bsam gtan med par yang / /myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/ /sngags dang phyag rgya sgrub pa pos/ /mchod
pa nyid la rab tu 'jug /'di las gzhan pa'i mchod med de/ /de ltar bstan bcos nges pa yin/ /pho nya'i lam la dga' ba dang / /sgrub pa po ni dngos grub
brtson| |rig sngags phyag rgyar yang dag ldan/ /zas la rtag tu spyad par bya/ /sgrub pa po ni legs pa ru/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'i rigs rnams ni/ /kun
la nye bar spyad bya zhing / /bza' min par ni mi brtag go /'di nyid du ni de dbyer med/ /pho nya mo yi sgrub pa nyid/ /dngos grub cho ga la spyod tshe/ /pho nya gcig pu kho na
yin| |byang chub phyogs kyi dngos grub ni/ /sgrub pa dag dang nye bar dang / /bla ma brgyud rim gyis thob pa'i/ /dbang bskur bas ni sngags legs ldan/ /pho nya rnams su
yang dag bshad/ /phyag rgya legs sbyor ngang tshul dang / /chags med gtong dang tshul khrims dang / /ye shes chu skyes yang dag rdzogs/ /sems kyis bdag nyid nang
par langs/ /lus kyi bya ba kun byas te/ /lus la shin tu mtshon cha ni/ /lus la gnas par kun tu spyad/ /dag byed byas pa'i lus kyis ni/ /rtag tu sngags ni brjod
par bya| |rnal 'byor gnas rnams nges bstan cing / /mtshon cha rnams ni 'gom mi bya/ /dam tshig can la khro mi bya/ /mngon par brtson las 'da' mi bya/ /de dang lta
lhan cig bde bar bya/ /bdag gi don dang gzhan don du/ /dam tshig spyod pa nyid du bya/ /'di la lhan cig longs spyod bya/ /mtshan mo rtag
par nam mkha'i gos/ /nag dang dmar bar rtag 'gyur bya/ /srog chags yan lag las byung gyon/ /bde ba 'dod pas bde thob 'gyur/ /mchod phyir thogs ni
yongs spangs gtsang / /shra'i he ru kas byin brlabs pas/ /phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /dus kun tu ni yang dag gnas/ /rigs dang rigs min dor mi
blta| |spyi gtsug la sogs bcing pa spang / /pho nya gtsang sbra dang po yin/ /gnyis pa sbyor ba yin par 'dod/ /zas gcig tu ni za ba nyid/ /gtsang sbra gsum
pa yin par bshad/ /gtsang sbra 'di dag rab sbyangs pas/ /gtsang ma'i dag pa'i rim thob na/ /dngos grub gang la 'byung mi 'gyur/ /de nyid bsdus las
gang gsungs dang / /de bzhin bde mchog las gang gsungs/ /gsang ba'i rgyud las yang dag bshad/ /de bzhin dpal mchog dang po dang / /rdo rje
'jigs byed nyid las gsungs/ /bzlas dang brtul zhugs sogs pa 'grub/ /de 'dir bsam gtan tsam gyis ni/ /sngags pas skad cig gis
'grub 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor lam la dga' bas kyang / /gtsang sbra 'di ni yang dag spyad/ /bsod nams gtsang sbra las byung gang / /sgrub pa'i yon tan rgya chen
po| |stong phrag gcig pa'i zhal min par/ /kha cig gis ni brjod mi nus/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung ye shes che/ /rnam dag mtshan nyid kun sgrub pa/ /bde ba'i
bsod nams chu 'thung ba/ /dag byed sdig pa 'jigs byed yin/ /reg pa dang ni smras pas kyang / /sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing / /lus ngag skyon ni med pa
yi| |gang zhig spyod pa byed pa yi/ /mi mchog sdig pa thams cad ni/ /rnam dag bdag nyid bde gshegs kyi/ /sa rnams kyang ni thob par 'gyur/ /skye zhing skyo
bar de bzhin gshegs/ /rigs 'gyur chos ldan rgyal por 'gyur/ /de ltar rtag tu mchod byas nas/ /dad pa yis ni gtor ma sbyin/ /de nas mchod pa rnam
dag pas/ /mya ngan 'das las byung ba 'o/ /de bzhin bdag nyid mchod pa dang / /sangs rgyas kun tshogs sras bcas dang / /dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma//
brtan pa dag dang g.yo ba dang / /spun gyi mchod pa'i dus 'dzin pa/ /zla ba'i dus la gnas pa yi/ /spun dang bu dang lhan cig tu/ /bde dang sdug bsngal kun
'byung ba/ /sngags dang de bzhin phyag rgya dang / /ye shes der ni bstan mi bya/ /dag byed zas la spyod pa ni/ /rtag tu dam tshig spyod
byas 'gyur/ /gsang sngags su la'ang sbyin mi bya/ /man ngag rnam par nyams mi bya/ /dam tshig gnas la ci rigs par/ /man ngag rnams kyang sbyin par
bya| |pho nya ma gtogs gzhan dag la/ /'dod pa rmongs par 'gro mi byed/ /rtag tu pho nya chags bral ba/ /mi 'da' ba yis longs spyod bya/ /skye gnas
dman la mi gnas pa/ /bsnyen bkur nyid ni bya ba min/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo dang / /chung ma pho nya mo nyid gnas/ /'khor lo'am de bzhin grub pa la//
dka' ba nges par zad par 'gyur/ /mchog dang tha ma ldan cig 'gugs/ /de ltar rdzas ni rnam nges yin/ /rnal 'byor pa rtag g.yon nas spyod/ /rkang pa
g.yon pa sngon du 'dor/ /lag pa g.yon pa yongs su bsgyur/ /g.yon gyi phyed ni rab mchod byed/ /lus ni g.yon ni rnam par gnon/ /g.yon pa yis
ni tshim dang za/ /brtul bzhugs ma nyams brtul zhugs rdzogs/ /sgrub pa po ni dam tshig brtson/ /dam tshig rigs la spyod pa dang / /lhan cig zas
la spyod par byed/ /rigs lnga la ni kun spyod pa'i/ /rigs ni rnam pa bzhi ru bsgrags/ /rigs gcig la ni kun spyod pa'i/ /rnal 'byor sgrub la rab tu mchod//
pa lang sha dang rta sha dang / /khyi sha dag dang sna tshogs pas/ /dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas na ni/ /sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig /de bzhin dpa' bo rnams/
kyi zas| |sngags pas phyag rgya yang dag ldan/ /shrI he ru ka'i sprul pa yi/ /nyer spyod bstan bcos kun la brtag /rtag tu de dag gzung zhing bsrung / /las rnams
dag ni thams cad la/ /bgegs med ji bzhin 'grub 'gyur bar/ /'dir ni gzhan dag 'gyur ma yin/ /'di ni pho nya mchog bzang po/ /brtson zhing lhan cig
ldan pa yin/ /ma chags dga' ba'i longs spyod rdzogs/ /rnal 'byor rdzas kyi rnam dbye nyid/ /bla ma'i man ngag la dga' zhing / /de yi don ni mchog mtshungs
pa'o| |spun dang yang na pha dang ni/ /bdag po nyid du skad cig mthong / /lce sbom mig ni dmar ser la/ /rtsub cing spu ni dmar ser yin/ /dngos grub kun gyi
thun mong du/ /bzlas dang brtul zhugs la rtag dga'/ /dran pa dang ni yang dag ldan/ /pho nya la sogs gnas dang bcas/ /mkha' 'gro ma mchog nyi shu
bzhi| |spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras rab ster/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa'i/ /rtsa ba'i sngags ni rtag tu zlos/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i
'jig rten gsum/ /rnal 'byor 'bras bu rab ster ba/ /gsang sngags 'di las byung ba yin/ /sngags dang phyag rgyar yang dag ldan/ /phyag rgya dang bral
gsang sngags ni/ /lus can rnams la byin mi rlob/ /ji srid 'gro ba'i bya ba dang / /shin tu sbyor bas rtogs par bya/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa/ /rnal
'byor pa la gang zhig sdang / /khyi yi skye gnas brgyar skye ste/ /sme sha can du skye bar 'gyur/ /dper na la la mar 'dod pas/ /'bad pas chu ni bsrubs gyur
kyang | |mar gsar 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi/ /lus nyon mongs pa kho nar zad/ /'dzin cing mchod par byed pa ni/ /'tsho ba'i thabs kyi rgyur gyur pa'i/ /rnal 'byor
gzhan la brtan pa ni/ /gzhan du de bzhin don med 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor che mchog dpa' bo ni/ /yul phyogs gang na gnas gyur pa/ /rigs ngan kla klo yin
na yang / /yul de yongs su brtags pa yin/ /sems can rjes su gzung ba'i rgyur/ /da rung da ni rtag tu gnas/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/
pho nya'i grangs kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi snying po mchod/ /dpa' bo rnams kyi khyad par
ni| |gang zhig dran pa tsam gyis ni/ /'jig rten gsum po g.yo byed cing / /rjes su dran pa tsam gyis ni/ /yang dag dngos grub rim gyis ster/ /oM sarba bud+d+ha TA ki
nI ye badzra ra war+Na nI ye huM hUM phaT swAhA/ gsang sngags 'di ni gsang sngags che/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa'i mchog /sngags chen bklags pas grub pa
sta| |'dod pa thams cad grub pa yin/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang rnal 'byor ma/ /dum skyes ma dang lA ma'ang de/ /oM hrIH ha ha huM hUM phaT/ gsang sngags 'di ni gsang
sngags che/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa'i mchog /'di ni bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub/ /gsang sngags kun gyi gsang sngags gtso/ /thod pa'i dum bu la
sogs pa/ /dpa' bo kun gyi snying po mchog /gsang sngags de dag mchog dam pa/ /'dod pa'i don kun 'grub byed yin/ /bla ma las kyang bla ma ste/ /dpa' bo'i
sdom pa mchog yin no/ /'di ni kun gyi gsang sngags te/ /'di ni sngags su grags pa yin/ /sa 'og dang ni mtho ris dang / /ji ltar mtshams kyang de bzhin te//
gang yang ji bzhin las rnams kyis/ /'jig rten gsum po grub pa yin/ /de yis thams cad grub nas ni/ /gsang sngags
mchog ni bla med pas/ /'jig rten gsum po grub pa yin/ /gang gis bla na med pa dag /sgrub pa pos ni thams cad 'grub/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang dpa' bo kun//
mdor bsdus rgyas par ma yin no/ /ri bo mdzes par bris nas ni/ /sna tshogs me tog 'bras bur ldan/ /de yi steng du dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang
lA ma dang / /rnal 'byor ma dang dum skyes ma/ /dpa' bo dang ni dpa' mo nyid/ /ha ha he he zhes bshad pa/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi dpa' bo'i rigs/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi
dra ba'i sdom/ /sngar bshad dpa' bo dpa' ba'i mchog /dpa' bo'i mchog ni thams cad nyid/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi dpa' bo rnams/ /de yi 'gro ba grangs med
khyab| |dpa' bo dang ni mkha' 'gro nyid/ /rnal 'byor ma dang lA ma dang / /dum skyes ma dang de bzhin te/ /'khor lo'i gnas su rnam par blta/ /las rnams
thams cad 'grub byed cing / /'khor lor bzhugs la rtag tu mchod/ /legs par mnyam gzhag 'dod pa 'grub/ /sngar bshad cho ga bzhin bzlas shing / /
mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom/ /bsam pas 'khor lo chen po yi/ /dngos grub kyang ni thams cad 'grub/ /sangs rgyas bye bas gsungs pa ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni re re
la| |'khor gyi grangs kyang bya ba rnyed/ /rnal 'byor ma dang lA ma dang / /dum skyes ma ni khyad par du/ /dngos grub thams cad byed pa dge /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud
bla ma'i bla ma las/ mkha' 'gro ma dang dpa' bo'i las kyi rim pa sgrub pa rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo gnyis su med pa'i snying po'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun
pa'o|| ||de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sku gzugs ri mo'i mtshan nyid ni/ /dung chen dag ni kho na las/ /mkhas pas gzugs ni bsgrub bya ste/ /
mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /yan lag dang ni nyid lag mchog /mos ba'i yid ni sngon 'gro ba'i/ /rnal 'byor pas ni gzung zhing bsgrub/ /dri chen
chu dang rak+ta dang / /shu kras bcas pas mchod par bya/ /na ra dpal chen bdug spos ni/ /dpa' bo'i las kyi sgrub pa ste/ /bla ma yi ni go 'phang 'grub/ /de nas
bdag nyid mchod byas te/ /'dod pa thams cad thob 'gyur zhing / /rgyal po'i bud med rnyed par 'gyur/ /ji lta'i las kyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /lag pa'i mchod
pa rab tu bya/ /pags chen ri mo bris nas ni/ /sgrub pa po yis mnyam bzhag na/ /zhag bdun gyis ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /the tshom med
par rnam par spyod/ /rnal 'byor ma dang bla ma mchod/ /mkha' 'gro'i gnas su de bzhin skye/ /des ni bde ba rnyed nas kyang / /las ni rtag tu byed par
'gyur| |rtag tu bla ma mchod nas ni/ /de yi dngos grub myur du 'grub/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni sgrub pa yis/ /glang po'i pags la sku gzugs bri/ /rnal 'byor
ma yi sgrub pa yis/ /ba lang pags la ri mo bri/ /mkha' spyod dag ni sgrub pa yis/ /rta yi pags la ri mo bri/ /sa la spyod pa'i sgrub pa yis/ /ma he'i pags
la ri mo bri/ /sa 'og spyod pa'i sgrub pa yis/ /phag gi pags la ri mo bri/ /gnod sbyin mo ni sgrub pa yis/ /shing spang leb la sku gzugs bri/ /lha yi bu
mo sgrub pa yis/ /tsam pa'i spang leb sku gzugs bri/ /klu mo sgrub pa dag gis ni/ /klu shing spang leb ri mo bri/ /mi ni sgrub par 'dod pa yis/ /dur khrod
gos la sku gzugs bri/ /pha rol lta ba'i sgrub pa dag /bong bu'i pags la sku gzugs bri/ /nor rnams sgrub par 'dod pa yis/ /byi pa'i pags la sku
gzugs bri/ /chang ni 'gugs par 'dod pa yis/ /spre'u'i pags la sku gzugs bri/ /khrag ni 'gugs par 'dod pa yis/ /thod pa la ni sku gzugs bri/ /sa
bon 'gugs par 'dod pa yis/ /phug ron pags la sku gzugs bri/ /lha ni 'gugs par 'dod pa yis/ /thang shing spang leb sku gzugs bri/ /grong khyer
'gugs par 'dod pa yis/ /ce spyang pags la sku gzugs bri/ /zhi ba'i las la bram ze mo/ /zla mtshan byung dus gos la bri/ /des na zhi bar gyur pa yin/ /
rgyas pa rgyal rigs mo yi ni/ /zla mtshan byung dus gos la bri/ /dbang la rje'u rigs mo yi ni/ /zla mtshan byung dus gos la bri/ /mngon spyod la ni dmangs rigs
kyi| |zla mtshan byung dus gos la bri/ /brgyal bar bya ba dag la ni/ /rgyal mtshan gos la ri mo bri/ /rengs par bya ba rdo leb ste/ /dgar ba la ni rnga mo'i pags//
dgugs pa la ni seng+ge'i 'o/ /las kun la ni bya yi pags/ /yang na lcags ni kho na'o/ /gzhan du sna tshogs las rnams ni/ /dran pa tsam gyis nges par 'grub//
bgegs rnams med par bya ba'i phyir/ /ri bong pags pa dag la bri/ /bgegs ni ldang bar byed pa la/ /shi ba'i pags pa rnams la bri/ /gser dang dngul la
sogs pa la/ /zangs dang shel dang thang shing dang / /rdo rje las ni bya ba ste/ /dngos grub mchog ni khyad par yin/ /tsan+dan dang ni thang
shing dang / /tsan+dan dmar po tsam pa ka /a sho ka ni grub pa 'o/ /shrI brik+Sha nor sbyin 'gyur/ /a ga ru dang star ka shing / /'o ma shing gi bye brag dang / /stag pa'i
shing la sogs pa rnams/ /grub pa yi ni dngos grub 'gyur/ /sbal pa'i rus pa las byas dang / /klu shing dag gi bye brag dang / /rus sbal rus pa glang po'i so//
khyad par du ni char yang 'bebs/ /bram ze'i rus pa zhi ba ste/ /glang po'i rus pa rgyas pa yin/ /dbang la rta yi rus pa ste/ /gsad pa la ni ma he'i rus/ /dgar
ba la ni rnga mo'i rus/ /sdang la rta dang ma he'i 'o/ /rengs par bya la khyi yi rus/ /dgug pa la ni seng+ge'i rus/ /sa yi 'og tu 'gro ba la/ /phag gi rus pa dag
la bya| |sa dkar dag las byas pa ni/ /rtag tu zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rgyas pa la ni ser ba'i sa/ /dbang la dmar po'i sa yin la/ /gsod pa la ni sa nag
ste| |'di ni mdor bsdus cho ga 'o/ /dri chen chu dang zhag dang khrag /mig sman chen po de bzhin te/ /mi yi rus pa brdar ba yi/ /mdog tu lhan cig sbyar nas
kyang | |rang byung me tog sa bon dang / /rigs ngan dang ni bram ze dang / /gdol pa ma dang g.yung mo dang / /khrus mkhan ma dang gar mkhan ma/ /ma 'am yang na
sring mo 'am/ /bu mo yi ni bye brag gi /'di dag drung du blangs nas su/ /shu kra rak+ta'i khyad par dag /sna tshogs 'di dag bsres nas kyang / /cho ga bzhin du sku
gzugs bri/ /grog mkhar gyi ni sa dag la/ /shi ba'i skra dang rus pa yis/ /pir gyis dam pa bri bar bya/ /thig skud shi ba'i skud pa yis/ /sku gzugs thig
skud mchog yin no/ /yi dwags phreng sogs bsnyen nas ni/ /ba sas kyang ni mar me bya/ /dpa' bo chen po'i bdug spos dang / /rkang gis lha bshos bya ba ste/
dri chen rdo rje chu yi dri/ /thod pa dag gi bum pa ste/ /arga'i snod ni thod pa'o/ /arga rus pa'i tsUr+Na ste/ /'bad pas skyes bu dbul 'byin no/ /ji ltar nus pa dag tu
spyad| |sna tshogs phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan par ni/ /sku gzugs yang ni ri mo 'am/ /gzhan yang mkhas pas cho ga bya/ /ji lta'i
las kyi rjes mthun par/ /de lta'i gos kyi rjes 'chang zhing / /gcer bu skra ni grol ba dang / /gzugs mdog dag ni bsgyur nas kyang / /gtso bo dang ni rnal
'byor pa/ /slob dpon yang ni de bzhin te/ /phyag rgya'i rigs par gnas nas su/ /dri chen chu dang dpa' bo bza'/ /mnyam par bzhag
nas bzlas pa bya/ /rnam pa du ma bye brag gi /glu dang gar ni rnam pa dang / /bza' btung mchog ni spyad par bya/ /de dag rdzogs kyi bar bya ste/ /de 'di cho ga'i rim
pa 'o| |rab tu gnas pa'i dus dag tu/ /nyis 'gyur tshogs kyis spel ba ste/ /gdu bu dang ni kang+ka dang / /dpung rgyan gos kyi bye brag dang / /sor gdub dang
ni mchod phyir thogs/ /rkang rgyan dang ni thod pa dang / /gdugs dang rnga yab de bzhin te/ /sna tshogs skyes bu sbyin zhing dbul/ /sna tshogs dpa' bo mchog dam
pa/ /myos byed btud ba'i bye brag rnams/ /dam tshig tsho ga'i mchog rnams dang / /sna tshogs ro dang bcud rnams dang / /sna tshogs me tog mchog rnams dang //
lha mo mchog gi lus rnams dang / /rol mo sna tshogs sgra rnams dang / /slob dpon phyag rgyar sbyor ba dang / /slob ma'i tshogs kyi khyad par rnams/ /bza' ba'i
mchod pa dag gis mchod/ /bdug pa'i dri mchog rnams dang ni/ /sna tshogs rgyal ba'i bdug pa dang / /khyad par du ni mar me'i phreng / /gdugs dang bla re de
bzhin te/ /me long dang ni rnga yab dang / /dra ba dang ni dra phyed dang / /chun po dag gis rnam par brgyan/ /bum par ras dang ldan pa dag /ye shes bdud rtsis yongs gang
ba| |rin chen lnga dang sman dang ni/ /dri yi bye brag dag gis ni/ /arga'i snod ni khyad par du/ /tsu ta pa la ba lnga dang / /aM bu dzaM bu ka dam pa/ /bil ba bI dza pu ras
dgang / /ba la mo ta kri tan dza/ /ke dri ka ri kar ldan pa/ /e ka bI ra sa ha de/ /sman rnams kun ces bya ba la/ /lda po de dag shes bya ste/ /mkhas pas bum par
gzhug par bya/ /gser dang dzA ti pha la dang / /gla gor zho sha de bzhin no/ /gser gyi mchod phyir thogs dang ni/ /phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan/ /sgrub pa po
kun gcer bu yis/ /bkra shis glu yis glu len cing / /rnam par dag pa'i sems kyis ni/ /dad pa'i blo ni sngon 'gro bas/ /dus dang gnas skabs thams cad
du| |sna tshogs rgya che'i mchod par bya/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ ras ris la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad
pa'o|| ||de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /mngon mtho he ru ka zhas bya/ /dkyil 'khor snying po bsdus pa
yin| |shin tu mnyam bzhag sgrub pa pos/ /dam tshig rtag tu bskyang bar bya/ /dam tshig nyams pas dkyil 'khor du/ /dbang
bskur dngos grub 'thob mi 'gyur/ /sbrang rtsi mtshal dang ga pur bcas/ /dmar dang tsan+dan sbyar ba ni/ /tshogs kyi nang du zhugs pa ni/ /thams cad bcud kyis
lan du gnas/ /thams cad rdo rje'i mtshan ma 'dzin/ /sbom po mtha' ltag rtse sbyar bas/ /rnal 'byor rim pas rtag tu spyad/ /zhi ba'i btung bas bzhin
myangs na/ /dngos grub rtag tu thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni mi 'chi bcu phyed 'gyur/ /dngos grub thams cad 'jug pa yin/ /mchod bzhi de bzhin dpa' bo ni//
dbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa yis/ /snyoms par 'jug pa'i de nyid 'dzin/ /mngon du bsnyen pa bya ba ni/ /cho ga bzhin du 'bum du bzla/ /'khor
lo'i gsang sngags 'bum bzlas shing / /rang gi lha'i yang 'bum du bzla/ /gzhan ni khri ru bzla bar bya/ /bka' bzhin 'khor lo bri bya zhing / /mdangs ldan
mi mchog dag gis ni/ /dkyil 'khor bri zhing dgod par bya/ /sngar bshad gnas ni gang yin pa/ /der ni dkyil 'khor bri par bya/ /sa ni yongs su sbyar
bar bya| |brdung zhing legs par brdungs nas su/ /mnyam zhing zug rdu rnam par spang / /sa la ma lhung lci ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor sa ni nye bar byug /dur khrod thal
bar ldan pa dang / /mi 'chi bcu phyed bcas pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor sa ni nyer byugs te/ /der ni dkyil 'khor yang dag brtsam/ /dur khrod du ni kun spyod cing //
ro bsregs sol ba'i phye ma dang / /dur khrod brgyad dang ldan pa yis/ /slob dpon legs par mnyam bzhag ste/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po bri bar bya/ /slob dpon
mtshan nyid thams cad ldan/ /mtshan ma ngan pa kun spangs shing / /yang dag shes shing rgyud shes pa/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung gsang sngags shes/ /khro med
gtsang zhing mkhas pa dang / /sbyor shes ye shes pha rol 'gro/ /thod pas spyi bor brgyan byas shing / /yan lag thal bas byugs pa dang / /gug skyed dag gis
lus brgyan cing / /rus phreng rus par yang dag gnas/ /dum gcig spyi bor brgyan pa dang / /rus pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /kha T+wAM ga ni lag na gnas/ /
bdag nyid shrI he ru kar ni/ /byas nas de yi 'og tu ni/ /dpal ldan he ru ka dran bya/ /'khor lo 'di yi snying gar dgod/ /de ltar bdag nyid go bgos nas/ /ra
ba rnams ni phyogs su dgod/ /'og tu'ang mtshon cha dgod par bya/ /'khor lo'i bdag nyid bkod nas ni/ /steng du mda' yi dra ba
dang / /bdag nyid mtshon cha'i dra ba bya/ /de ltar go bgos sum cu ni/ /rtsa gsum pas kyang gzhig mi nus/ /de lta bdag nyid rab bsrungs shing / /sngags
dang phyag rgyas rnam brgyan nas/ /dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor 'jigs ba bri bar bya/ /de nas sems med srad bu la/ /ru d+hi ra ni chen
pos brlan/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung grong mchog gi /dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa thig gdab bya/ /khru bzhi pa la khru brgyad pa/ /sgo bzhi kun nas zur bzhi pa/ /sngags
pas nyis gyur rnam spyod cing / /mkha' 'gro dra ba bde mchog bzlas/ /de yi dbus su gzhag pa ni/ /'dab chags lte ba 'bar dang bcas/ /ge sar yang
dag ldan pa yi/ /sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /lte bar bkod bya dpa' bo ni/ /'jigs byed chen po'i gzugs can la/ /mdangs dang ldan zhing rab tu
'bar| |ha ha zhes byar sgra cher bzhad/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan dang ldan/ /bzang po spyan gsum zhal bzhi mnga'/ /glang po'i pags pa rnam par bgos/ /smin ma
bzang po rdo rje 'byes/ /phyag na kha T+wAM ga bsnams shing / /brgya phyed phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /de mdun gnas pa'i lha mo ni/ /rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba/ /rab 'jigs 'jigs byed
che la phyogs/ /spyan gsum drag po'i gzugs can bya/ /ka pA la ni an+t+ras bkang / /kha nas ru d+hi ra 'dzag cing / /lha dang lha min mir bcas dang / /phyogs kun tu ni bsdigs
mdzub byed/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni nyi shu bzhi/ /phag mo yi ni rigs las byung / /phyogs dang phyogs kyi mtshams rnams ni/ /'khor lo'i lte bar mchod par bya/ /de bzhin
'dir ni dpa' bo yang / /'khor lor yang dag gnas pa mchod/ /sgrub po gal te dngos grub 'dod/ /gnyis med dpa' bo mchod par bya/ /de nas bum pa bya ba ni/ /rtsab
nag po la sogs med/ /mu tig gser dang rin chen dang / /byi ru dngul dang zangs ma ste/ /bza' ba kun gyis legs bkang ba'i/ /snod ni steng du gzhag par bya/ /mgrin pa
srad bus dkris pa dang / /kha ni 'dab mas brgyan par bya/ /gos zung gis ni legs dkris pa/ /brgyad ni sgo ru rnam par dgod/ /gos zung gis ni dkris pa yi/ /bum pa dgu
pa dbus su gzhag /gser ram dngul lam rin chen nam/ /mu tig rnams ni mdzes par bya/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu rin chen dang / /gser rnams kyis ni mdzes par spyad//
grong mchog yid 'ong mchod nas ni/ /grub pa nyid du the tshom med/ /bdag nyid kyi ni gdong lus kun/ /dri yi chu yis legs par bsang / /gal te dngos
grub mchog 'dod na/ /mar me brgya ni dbul bar bya/ /nam mkha'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni/ /yid kyi thams cad steng du dgod/ /sa steng mkha' 'gro ma gang yin/ /dkyil
'khor kun tu dgod par bya/ /gang yang sa 'og rnams su dgod/ /ma mo thams cad phyogs dang ni/ /phyogs mtshams rnams su dgod par bya/ /gal te dngos grub mchog
'dod na| |dri dang me tog bdug spos dang / /mar me brgya yang dbul bya zhing / /dpal ldan khrag 'thung dkyil 'khor gnas/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mchod bya/ /rgyal
mtshan dmar dang de bzhin ser/ /dkar dang nag dang ser skya dang / /de bzhin gos ni sna tshogs dang / /me tog phreng ba du ma dang / /bla re dag dang dang bcas pa'i/ /mda'
ni shin tu mdzes pa dang / /de bzhin bza' bca' btung ba yis/ /rab mnyam bzhag ste mchod par bya/ /de nas sgrub bos dngos grub gyis/ /dang por slob dpon mnyes
par bya| |grub 'dod shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /ci nus par ni bla ma mchod/ /dril dbyangs me tog spos kyis brgyan/ /shin tu sgra snyan dril bu dkrol/ /sgrub pa po yis rnga
brdungs shing / /ha ha zhes ni brjod pa'ang bya/ /de ltar cho ga bzhin dkyil 'khor/ /'dod pa kun ldan mchod nas ni/ /de yi bu sdug gdong la ni/ /dar gyis legs par bka' nas
su| |me tog gis bkang thal mo dag /pad+mas gtor nas bskor ba ni/ /g.yon phyogs bskor nas phyag byas te/ /hUM dang phaT kyi sgra yang brjod/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas
pa yis| |dngos grub sras po gzhag par bya/ /thal mo me tog gtor nas ni/ /gang du babs pa'i bsam pa ni/ /bskor ba dag kyang byas nas su/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa
yis| |sgrub pa po yis byas nas gzhug /de nas yon thogs grong khyer du/ /g.yas pa'i phyogs su brten nas ni/ /snyim pa'i me tog dkyil 'khor dor/ /dkyil 'khor gang
du me tog babs/ /de yi rigs ni bstan par bya/ /de nas slob dpon legs par ni/ /rab mnyam bzhag ste phyag rgya mchod/ /de nas slob ma gnyis pa la/ /mtshal chen lan
gsum bzlas pa yis/ /de la thig le bya ba yin/ /de nas slob ma'i gdong phye la/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni bstan par bya/ /gang gi lha yi gnas gang yin/ /der de yang dag
bstan pa bya/ /slob dpon dang ni lhan cig tu/ /rab tu btud pa byas nas ni/ /g.yon nas brtsams pa'i rim pa yis/ /de nas bskor ba rab tu bya/ /dkyil 'khor dang ni bla ma la//
ji bzhin cho gas phyag bya 'o/ /de nas bla ma dag la yon/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa dbul/ /gser ni brgya stong dbul ba dang / /rin chen
rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /ras ni zung gyur brgya nyid dang / /glang po rta 'am yul 'khor ram/ /rna rgyan dang ni gdu bu dang / /mgul gdub sor gdub dam pa dang / /gser las byas
pa'i mchod phyir thogs/ /chung ma bzad dang bu mo nyid/ /bran pho bran mo sring mo rnams/ /phyag byas nas ni dbul bar bya/ /ded nas brtsams te bran du ni/ /khyed la bdag ni dbul
lags zhes/ /blo ldan kun nas dang ba yis/ /bdag nyid kyang ni dbul bar bya/ /de ltar nges par bya ba ni/ /sgrub pa po yis rab nges byas/ /de nas de la mkha' 'gro ma//
rnal 'byor ma rnams mnyes par 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang / /dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma/ /sgrub po mkha' 'gro ma lhan cig /de dang rnam spyod 'gro
ba kun| |sgrub pa po ni de dag gi /ci bgyi byed par the tshom med/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni grub gyur na/ /'jig rten gsum du mi ldog cing / /mi snang phug dang gnas mkha'
rgyu| |rkang mgyogs de bzhin bcud kyis len/ /sgrub pa po ni 'dod tsam gyis/ /rtag par rgyun du skyes par 'gyur/ /gzugs ni du ma byed pa dang / /nam mkha' la ni 'gro
bar 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro rnams kyi khyad par du/ /nges gnon 'gro ba thams cad kyang / /lan cig bltas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /skad cig gis ni sbyor nyid skyed/ /sngags pas dkyil
'khor ma mthong bar/ /gang zhig rnal 'byor pa nyid 'dod/ /mkha' la khu tshur gyis rdeg dang / /smig rgyu'i chu ni 'thungs dang mtshungs/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog rab dang / /
sbyor ba kun gyi dam pa'i yin/ /gang zhig rtag tu 'dod gyur pa/ /de ni lha mi zil gnon 'gro/ /de nyid bsdus par gyur pa'am/ /gsang ba'am rdo rje 'jigs byed las/ /dkyil
'khor rnams kyi rgyal po 'di/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bshad dang ma bshad gang ci'ang rung / /de kun dpal ldan khrag 'thung gnas/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud
bla ma'i bla ma las/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sbyor ba'i mtshams dang yang dag ldan/ /chu med
pa ni mtshams yin te/ /gos pa med cing chags spangs pa/ /mtshams ni 'byung po thams cad pa/ /de ni sems can thams cad de/ /mtshams ni srid pa dag pa ste/ /dbyangs skyong
he ru ka nyid yin/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom shing bzla/ /gcig car 'byung bar snang ba ste/ /dung dang kun da'i mdog kyang 'dzin/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /
mtshan rnams kun gyis mtshan pa ste/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ /spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams/ /skra grol dpral bar thod pa ste/ /spyi
gtsug tu ni zla ba 'o/ /he ru ka dpal yang dag ldan/ /mtshams rnams grub pa'i mchog dam pa/ /thun bzhi ru ni bya ba 'o/ /dga' ba bzhi po dga' ba dang / /lte ba'i snying pad nu
ma'i dbus/ /lce yi rtsa dang mgo steng du/ /dga' ba dang ni mchog dga' nyid/ /dam par dga' dang lhan cig skyes/ /dang po 'dab ma drug cu bzhi/ /gnyis pa brgyad pa mchog
yin te| |gsum pa 'dab ma bcu drug pa/ /bzhi pa sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dab/ /phag mo'i lte ba'i rtsar gnas pa/ /lhan cig skyes dga' khrag 'thung mchog /sbyor ba'i dus kyi
mtshams su ni/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bsgom bya/ /sdug bsngal sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste/ /kun 'byung chos kyi 'khor lo yin/ /'gog pa longs spyod 'khor lo ste/ /lam
ni bde ba chen po yin/ /de ltar mtshams su byin brlabs nas/ /rnal 'byor nges pa byas pa ste/ dkar dang sngo dang ljang ba dang / /spyan gsum thugs rje stong pa'i nyams/ /rnam thar
gsum dang sku gsum gyis/ /yongs su dag par rim par sbyor/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /mgo bo gri gug phyag na bsnams/ /sems dpa'i dkyil
mo krung du bzhugs/ /zla ba yi dwags pad dbus su/ /skra grol phyogs kyi gos can yin/ /dgyes pa'i nyams kyis myos pa ste/ /dus rtag tu ni mtshams bsgoms na/ /sdom pa mchog
ni grub pa yin/ /dri chen rdo rje chu dang ni/ /rin chen snang ba mtha' yas dang / /don yod grub pa'ang de bzhin te/ /de dag rtag tu bsres nas su/ /rnal 'byor rtag tu mtshams la 'dud
gsang sngags 'di dag rtag tu yang / /he ru ka ni dbyangs skyong mchog /oM shrI he ru kA ya bi ma he bid+yA rA dza ya d+hIHma he taM no bI ra pra dzo da ya AH hUM/ rtag tu mtshams ni rnam bsgoms
na| |dbyangs skyong mchog gi bzlas pa bya/ /dbyangs skyong ming ni rig byed de/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa dge/ /dus min 'chi bar mi 'gyur zhing / /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang yang
grub| |'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi/ /don ni sngags pa rtag tu smra/ /dngos grub 'di ni rab tu 'grub/ /de ma thag tu grub chen bcas/ /'jig rten gsum po grub pa yin/ /
sgrub po'i dbang pos rnam bsgoms te/ /khrag 'thung cho ga bzhin shes nas/ /zhag gsum brtul zhugs la gnas na/ /lha yi gnas su 'gro ba yin/ /lha yi ye
shes thob nas ni/ /lha yi lus kyi mchog kyang 'dzin/ /ngag rnams kun la dbang thob cing / /thams cad mkhyen par gyur nas su/ /rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs/
sangs rgyas lha yis bsten pa ste/ /srid par sangs rgyas rol par mdzad/ /nyin zhag gsum gyi bar du yang / /phyag rgya lhan cig 'byung
pa spyad| |mthong nas srid mo yang dag sgrub/ /zhag gsum bar du mchod byas nas/ /rdo rje he ru ka dpal lha/ /thams cad kyang ni byon par 'gyur/ /pus mo sa la btsugs
nas ni| |de yis phyag ni byas nas kyang / /sgrub pos rtag tu mchod par bya/ /sgrub po 'dod la dga' bas ni/ mod la dpa' bos thams cad mkhyen/ /gtso bo thams
cad 'dzin pa ste/ /khams gsum kun tu rnam spyod cing / /sgrub pa po ni mchog tu 'gyur/ /'di ni dpa' chen dpa' bo ste/ /gnyis pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /de
ni rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /sa gzhi ska rags kyis bskor ba/ /lha dang lha min mi rnams kyang / /sgrub pa po ni de nyid kyi/ /mod la dbang du gyur pa yin/ /mngon
par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ /dbyangs skyong gi mtshams kyi le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /yi ge bdun pa
sgom pa ste/ /yi ge hUM las yang dag 'byung / /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba che/ /phyag drug zhal gsum spyan gsum pa/ /mtshan rnams thams cad kyis mtshan
cing / /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur ldan/ /A li kA li las byung gtso/ /phag mo dang ni mnyam par ldan/ /stong zhing thugs rjes khyab pa ste/ /rdo rje dril bus mnyam par
ldan| |na ra'i pags pa gos su mnabs/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing / /g.yas pa'i phyag na mdud rtse gsum/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad stsol/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i
dbu rgyan can/ /sna tshogs rdo rje ral pa 'chang / /zla ba phyed pa'i spyi gtsug gtsang / /phyag rgya drug gis sku lus brgyan/ /'jigs byed chung mar bcas pa dag /g.yas brkyang
ba yi zhabs kyis mnan/ /sna tshogs pad+ma nyid la bzhugs/ /'khor lo drug gi dbus su bzhugs/ /rnal 'byor ma drug mnyam par sbyar/ /myur du dngos grub stsol ba
yin| |dang po khrag 'thung lha mo ste/ /gnyis pa rdo rje 'jigs byed ma/ /gsum pa drag ga tum ma yin te/ /bzhi pa rdo rje nyi ma mo/ /lnga pa rdo rje drag mo ste/ /drug pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro
ma| |g.yon gyi phyogs nas dgod par bya/ /lha mo de dag cher gtum zhing / /spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba ste/ /phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa yin/ /thams cad yi dwags nyi
steng bzhugs/ /sngo zhing ser la ljang ba dang / /dmar dang dud ka de bzhin dkar/ /cang te'u dang ni dril bu 'dzin/ /thams cad na ra'i pags pa 'dzin/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i
ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /g.yas brkyang g.yon brkyang tshul gyis bzhugs/ /yi ge drug las yang dag byung / /lha mo gzigs pa mtshan ma yin/ /ji ltar
mgon po mdog bzhin du/ /phag mo yang ni de bzhin te/ /phyag rgya phyag mtshan de bzhin no/ /sngo dang ser dang ljang ba dang / /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /lha mo'i byin
par mnyam par 'khril/ /mchog tu dga' bar rnam par mos/ /oM hrIH ha ha hUM hUM phaT/ yi ge de las mkha' 'gro ma/ /yan lag drug pa rnam par bsgom/ /bdun pa dbus
su dgod pa ni/ /yi ge hUM las he ru ka /dbus su dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka'o/ /chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang
chub kyi yan lag ni/ rdo rje he ru ka ma'o/ /brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed ma'o/ /dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni/ drag
gtum ma'o/ /shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni/ /rdo rje nyi ma'o/ /ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni/ rdo rje drag mo'o/ /btang snyoms
yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ste/ byang chub yan lag 'di bdun bsgom/ /ji lta'i rim pas sbyor zhing bsgom/ /gsang sngags gzhal med pa
bzlas shing / /khro bo kun gyi gnas mchog ste/ /bsod nams chung ba'i sgrub pos kyang / /zla phyed nang du dngos grub ste/ /rtag tu zhag re bsgoms pa ni/ zhag bdun gyis ni the
tshom med/ /dpyid zla tha chung nya la ni/ /ma sring bu mo tsha mo dang / /shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis/ /nyin mtshan bzlas shing bsgoms byas bas/ /tho rangs dpal khrag 'thung mnyam
'gyur/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ nye ba'i snying po bsgoms pas bskyed pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// //gzhan yang snying po
bshad bya ba/ /sems can kun la phan 'dogs pa/ /hUM gi yi ge las byung ba/ /bde ba chen po bde las byung / /sngo zhing dkar la drag po ste/ /zhal brgyad pa la shin tu 'jigs//
spyan gsum pa la phyag bcu drug /mgo yi phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa'i phreng pa'i dbu rgyan can/ /zla ba phyed pa'i ral pa 'chang / /sna tshogs rdo rje dbu la mnan/ /phyag
rgya drug gis sku la brgyan/ /'jigs byed chen po 'jigs pa ni/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis gnon/ /dus mtshan shin tu 'jigs pa yang / /g.yon bskum pa
yi zhabs kyis gnon/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas/ /phag mo yi ni ku tsha 'tshir/ /tshangs lpags bshus nas rgyan du 'dzin/ /mdung rtse gsum dang dgra sta dang / /kha
T+wAM cang te'u gri gug mchog /brgyad pa la ni lcags kyu thogs/ /g.yas pa'i phyag rnams de bzhin no/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga /mgo bo zhags pa 'dzin pa'i
mchog /tho ba bsdigs mdzub dam pa ste/ /shrI'i ye shes yang dag rdzogs/ /pang du phag mo'i gzugs yin te/ /drag cing dmar la dkar ba yin/ /byin pa gnyis kyis legs
par 'khril/ /skra grol ba la spyan gsum pa/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /de yi zhal dang phyag tu gnas/ /dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can/ /mche ba rnam par gtsigs
pa'i zhal/ /phyogs kyi gos can chags pas gzigs/ /rked pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya yang che/ /sngo zhing dkar la de bzhin dmar/ /ser zhing ljang la dud ka ste/ /du ba thal ba sprin
gyi mdog /'di 'dra'i zhal dang gzugs su gnas/ /lha mo mda' dang gzhu 'dzin cing / /tshangs pa'i pags pa rnam par spangs/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du ni/ /zla ba nyi ma'i dbus
su bzhugs/ /'khor lo brgyad pa'i dbus bzhugs par/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor rnam par bsgom/ /pad+ma'i lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /bcom ldan 'das ni nges par dgod/ /oM ni
shar gyi 'dab ma la/ /gsal byed mkha' 'gro ma yang dgod/ /ba ni byang gi 'dab la ste/ /rta gdong mkha' 'gro ma yang dgod/ /dzra ni rdo rje drag mo ste/ /mkha' 'gro nub tu dgod par
bya| |he ru lho phyogs 'dab la dgod/ /gser gyi mdog can mkha' 'gro ma/ /ser dang sngo bsangs dkar dang dmar/ /zhal gsum rnam bsgyur drag po ste/ /phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba//
ro yi steng du bzhugs pa ste/ /g.yas brkyang ba yis bdud bzhi 'joms/ /thod pa'i phreng ba drag po ste/ /pad+ma spom po'i 'dab ma la/ /chags pa can gyis gzigs shing bzhed//
thugs rje'i nyams kyis bde ba yin/ /mda' dang gzhu yang 'chang ba ste/ /zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin pa'i mchog /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM bsnams/ /cang te'u ni sgra yang sgrog /ser dang
ljang gu sngo ba dang / /sngo bsangs dmar dang dkar ba dang / /dkar dang ljang gu sngo ba dang / /dmar dang sngo dang ljang ba ste/ /'di ltar mdog ni khyad par gyis/ /dam tshig mchog ni bsgom par
bya| |mtshams bzhi ru ni bum pa dag /byang chub sems kyis gang bar gzhag /shar gyi phyogs su he yin te/ /ming ni he la ka zhes bya/ /byang gi phyogs su ru yin te/ /mkha' 'gro ma
ni ru tsa ki /nub kyi phyogs su ru yin te/ /ru tsa ka ma li zhes bya/ /lho yi phyogs su kaM yin te/ /keng rus ma zhes grags pa yin/ /me yi phyogs su hUM mdzad ma/ /bden bral phyogs
su phaT mdzad ma/ /rlung gi phyogs su Da ma ri/ /dbang ldan ki li ki la ste/ /de brgyad lha mo chen mo ste/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /ji ltar zhal dang gzugs bzhin du/ /
de bzhin 'dir yang 'gyur ba yin/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang / /spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba/ /phyogs kyi gos can
g.yas brkyang bzhugs/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan can te/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag ldan/ /drag cing gtum la rab 'jigs pa'i//
thams cad ro yi steng bzhugs bsgom/ /spyan gsum pa la chags pas myos/ /dbang ldan zur la ut+pal sngon po zhes bya ba/ /rlung gi phyogs la dra ba'i mchog ces bya
ba ste| |bden bral phyogs la gsus pa 'phyang ma zhes bya ba/ /me yi phyogs la sha ba ri zhes bya ba ste/ /ser dang sngo bsangs sngo ba dang / /dmar ser dang ni bzhi pa ste//
thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /gri gug cang te'u mchog yin te/ /bzhi pa rdo rje mdung yin no/ /phyogs kyi gos can chags pas rol/ /bzang mo lto ba 'phyang ma ste/ /skye
gnas ring la rgya yang che/ /spyan gsum rnam par 'gyur zhing drag /skra grol ba la rab tu 'jigs/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /rgyan rnams thams cad spud pa'o/ /
shar sgor baM las gtum mo zhes bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / lho'i sgor raM las rol gtum mo zhes bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / nub kyi sgor sa las 'bar ba'i mchog
ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dgod do/ /byang gi sgor ha las phreng ba rnam bar rgyal ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma ste/ sngo dang dkar ser nyid yin te/ /lcags kyu dang ni
cang te'u 'dzin/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga bsnams te/ /gri gug mgo bo sdigs mdzub dang / /dkar dang sngo dang ljang ba dang / /zhags pa dang ni cang te'u 'dzin/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga
'dzin cing / /sdigs mdzub gri gug mgo bo 'dzin/ /dmar dang sngo dang ljang gu ste/ /lcags sgrog cang te'u gri gug dang / /thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing / /mgo po dang ni sdigs mdzub
mchog /ljang dang dkar po 'dres pa dang / /ser dang dmar ba'i zhal mchog yin/ /dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang / /kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa dang / /mgo bo dang ni sdigs mdzub
phyag /skra grol ba la gdug pa che/ /spyan gsum rnam par 'gyur pa'i zhal/ /zhal gdangs ljags ni bskyod pa ste/ /g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum tshul gyis bzhugs/ /thod
pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste/ /ro dang pad+ma'i dbus bzhugs/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /thams cad phyag rgya lnga 'chang
zhing / /mgo bo'i do shal rnams kyis brgyan/ /mi bskyod pa yi cod pan 'ching / /rnam bsgyur spyan ni g.yo ba ste/ /yi ge nyi shu gnyis las byung / /snying gar mchog ni bsgom par
bya| |'di ni gsang sngags thams cad kyi/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis mchog /oM shrI badzra he he ru ru kaM hUM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba raM hUM phaT swAhA/ yi ge re re dgod
pa ste| |mkha' 'gro ma yi snying de bzhin/ /hUM shrI lha dang lha mo ste/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba'o/ /dbus su rnam dag bcom ldan 'das/ /sgom zhing rnam par bsgom par bya//
rnam par thar brgyad sgo sna tshogs/ /gzugs su lta ba stong pa ste/ /nang gzugs med par phyi rol gzugs su lta ba'ang stong pa yin/ /sdug dang mi sdug mthong bar byed
pa lta ba'ang stong pa yin/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dag tu lta ba'ang stong pa ste/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag tu lta ba'ang stong pa yin/ /ci yang med pa'i
skye mched dag tu lta ba'ang stong pa yin/ /'du shes med cing 'du shes med min skye mched rnams kyang stong pa'o/ /'du shes dang ni tshor ba'ang 'gog par lta ba stong pa yin//
phyag bcu drug pa'ang stong pa ste/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / /phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / /chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa
stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba
med pa stong pa nyid dang / /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med
pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhin du/ /phag mo yang ni de bzhin te/ /gnyis med gzugs can bcom ldan 'das/ /he ru ka dpa'
rnam par shes/ /phag mo nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /lha mo bzhi yis rnam dag pa/ /gsal byed mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni/ /don rnams so sor yang dag rig /rta gdong ma gang yin pa
'o| |chos rnams so sor yang dag rig /rdo rje drag mo mkha' 'gro ma/ /nges tshig so so yang dag rig /gser mdog can gyi mkha' 'gro ma/ /spobs pa so sor yang dag rig /lha
mo de dag 'dab ma'i dbus/ /rton pa rnam pa bzhi po ni/ /he li ka ni don la rton pa ste/ /ru tsa ki ni tshig 'brur rton pa yin/ /ru tsa ka me la ni ye shes rton/ /keng rus ma ni rnam
shes rton pa yin/ /shar dang byang dang nub dang ni/ /lho phyogs kyi ni 'khor lo la/ /chos kyi mdo ni bzhi po dgod/ /hUM ni/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'o/ /phaT ni/ 'du
byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o/ /Da ma ri ni/ chos thams cad bdag med pa'o/ /ki li ki la ni/ chos thams cad zhi ba'o/ /me dang bden bral rlung dang ni/ /dbang ldan 'khor
lo de dag kun/ /lha mo yis ni rnam par dag /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dngos po'i chos thams cad rtogs pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni/ ut+pal sngon po
ma'o/ /chos thams cad ston pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni/ dran pa'i mchog go /nges par 'byung ba'i lam la 'jug pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni/ gsus pa 'phyang
ma'o/ /zag pa zad pa shes pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni/ sa ba ri ma'o/ /mtshams su dkyil 'khor lha mo ni/ /'di yis zur bzhi rnam par dag /sgo bzhi dag tu
lha mo ni/ /gtum byed ma ste/ dad pa'i dbang po'o/ /rol gtum ma ni/ brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o/ /'bar mchog ma ni/ dran pa'i dbang po'o/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog
ni| ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ni/ bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung rdo rje'o/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams ni/ /'phags pa shes rab
bcom ldan ma/ /rdo rje phag mo nyid yin no/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi snying po bsgoms pas bskyed pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu
gnyis pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni rnam dag ni/ /'byung ba kun gyi spyan yin te/ /rnam par snang mdzad thig tu grags/ /b+ha
gas khyab pa'i rim pa ni/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig tu shes/ /dus ni sna tshogs rigs su shes/ /mchod pa sna tshogs cho ga bzhan/ /pu li rim pad+ma ma'o/ /dzA lan+d+ha ra thugs
'khor lo/ /u D+yan gsung gi 'khor lo ste/ /ar bu da ni sku'i 'khor lo/ /go da ba ri zur bzhi'o/ /rA me shwa ra me phyogs so/ /de bI kau Ta bden bral yin/ /mA la ba ni rlung gi zur/ /
dbang ldan kA ma rU pa ste/ /gra bzhi rnam par dag pa ni/ /'di la the tshom med pa yin/ /o tre dag ni shar gyi sgo'o/ /tri sha ku ni lho phyogs sgo/ /ko sa la ni nub kyi sgo'o/ /ka ling+ka
ni byang sgo ste/ /shar gyi rta babs lam+pA ka /kAM tsi lho yi rta babs yin/ /hi ma la ya nub phyogs so/ /pre ta pu ri byang yin te/ /gr-i ha de bu lha snam bu/ /sau rASh+Ta ni rin chen sa/ /su

bar dwI pa dra ba phyed/ /na ga ra ni rda yab dang / /dril bu rgyal mtshan ba dan no/ /sin+d+hu rdo rje thig zlum po/ /ma ru ti na sgo khyud do/ /ku lu tA ni rdo rje dang / /rin po che dang dkyil 'khor gyi//
thig ni bla na med pa yin/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /dra ba dra phyed kyis brgyan cing / /dar dang phred bas rnam par brgyan/ /zur gyi cha ni thams
cad dang / /sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan cing / /sku yi 'khor lo'i sku nyid ni/ /don yod grub pa rnam par spyod/ /gsung gi 'khor lo 'od
dpag med/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo mi bskyod pa/ /pad+ma'i dbus ni rin chen 'dzin/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshul can ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad rnam par
bsgom/ /tshor ba sku yi 'khor lo ste/ /'du shes gsung gi 'khor lo yin/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo 'du byed de/ /rnam shes pad+ma gdon mi za/ /ri mo lnga pa mchog gyur pa//
de yis rnam dag rang bzhin can/ /sa dang ri mo thams cad kun/ /dpa' bos yongs su dag par bsgom/ /ri mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa/ /de dag dpa' bos rnam par dag /'khor
lo mkha' 'gro ma yis dag /lte bar phag mo'i sa bon k+Sha/ /he ru ka dpal mchog yin no/ /'dab ma mkha' 'gro ma yis dag /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog dag
ni| |sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag /dkyil 'khor snying po mdor bsdus na/ /dkyil 'khor dang po yi ge ste/ /dkyil 'khor gnyis pa phyag mtshan yin/ /gsum pa lag
pa'i phyag rgyar bshad/ /bzhi pa gzugs su gyur pa ste/ /lnga pa me tog mchod pa yin/ /drug pa tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid/ /dbus ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa/ /pad+ma'i lte ba dang bcas
pa| |thugs kyi 'khor lo dri ma med/ /gsung gi 'khor lo 'od byed pa/ /sku yi 'khor lo 'od byed pa/ /sku yi 'khor lo 'od 'phro ba/ /zur bzhi pa ni sbyang dka' ba/ /ring du song ba sgo
bzhi yin/ /zur gyi cha ni mi g.yo ba/ /legs pa'i blo gros rdo rje'i theg /chos kyi sbrin ni rta babs yin/ /'di lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /rtag tu bsgom zhing mchod par bya/ /
dngos grub rgya chen thob par 'gyur/ /sdom pa'i 'khor lo sdom pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor mchog gi de nyid ni/ /he ru ka dpal ye shes mchog /b+ha ga'i pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor ni//
phag mo'i sku lus mchog gyur pa/ /de ni dkyil 'khor 'dus pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor bde chen mchog yin no/ /dkyil 'khor dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma/ /gnyis med kha sbyor dkyil
'khor yin/ /bdag gi de nyid ting 'dzin yin/ /lha yi de nyid de bzhin te/ /sngags kyi de nyid phyag rgya yin/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'i mchog /yan lag kun bsgoms
las 'das shing / /rtog dang rnam rtog rnam par spangs/ /phyi mo'i thig le las 'das shing / /de ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no/ /chos rnams thams cad rtag tu med/ /chos dang
chos min rnam par spyod/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa ni/ /rnam dag nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ /chags dang chags med chags par mnyam/ /pad+ma rA ga chu mnyam byung / /rang
sems chags pa dmar po'i mchog /de dag dkyil 'khor mchog yin te/ /yid ni khams rnams thams cad de/ /gzugs dang gzugs med dri ma med/ /bskul zhing sad pa yid
yin te| |sems ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yin/ /dkyil 'khor lus su bshad pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor b+ha ga yin par bshad/ /dkyil 'khor byang chub
sems yin te/ /rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba/ /sa 'og sa steng sa blar khyab/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ /dkyil 'khor gyi sgom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gsum
pa'o// //de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba/ /sems can kun la phan stsol ba/ /A li kA li las byung ba/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer mchog /dra ba dra phyed kyis brgyan pa//
dar dang phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /de yi dbus su rdo rje che/ /zhal bzhi pa la rnam par 'gyur/ /de la lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /sna tshogs 'khor lo lte bar bcas/ /thugs kyi 'khor
lo brgyad pa ste/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus dag tu/ /sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam 'dres pa/ /lha yi bzhugs
gnas nyi shu pa/ /lte ba'i dbus su bstan pa ste/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /hUM las he ru kar byas te/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa/ /spyan gsum sku lus
dkar po ste/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas/ /phag mo yi ni ku tsha'ang 'tshir/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan/ /gdug pa kun gyi
klad pa la/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis mnan/ /'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag /brgyal zhing rnam par myos pa yis/ /klad pa la ni zhabs kyis mnan/ /gcer
'o dod 'bod pa mnan/ /rgyal ba'i pags pa steng du ste/ /lcags kyu phyag gis 'dzin pa dang / /gzhan yang cang te'u de bzhin te/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga yang 'dzin/ /gzhan du yang ni
mgo bo 'chang / /sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan/ /zla ba phyed pa dbu la 'chang / /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /mi bskyod pa yis spyi gtsug 'ching / /tshangs pa'i do shal
'dzin pa ste/ /bdag gi khro bo bdun spros nas/ /ji ltar bcom ldan mdog bzhin du/ /phag mo mchog dang de bzhin te/ /sku lus nag po dmar ba'i mdangs/ /gzi byin mdangs
kyis mdzes pa ste/ /gri gug thod pa kha T+wAM ga /dril bu cang te'u mdung dang ni/ /lcags kyu zhags pa de bzhin no/ /lha mo phyag ni brgyad pa ste/ /dkar zhing sngo la ljang ba'o/ /steng gi
zhal ni dmar po mdzes/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal gdong ni/ /ser zhing ljang ba'i gzugs can te/ /gzhan du bdag po ji bzhin du/ /phag mo yang ni de bzhin gyur/ /gcer bu skra
ni grol ba ste/ /ma nyams dum bu'i ska rags can/ /pad+ma bzhi la mkha' 'gro ma/ /zur la bum pa thod pa ste/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo sngar bshad pa'o/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma de
bzhin/ /gsung dang sku yi 'khor lo gnyis/ /shar dang byang nub lho ru'o/ /sgo rnams su ni sgo srung ste/ /khwa gdong la sogs thams cad do//
zur la gshin rje sreg la sogs/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i khyad par ni/ /rdo rje snying pos bshad pa ste/ /kha cig rnal 'byor ma ru 'dod/ /bla ma'i gnas kyi rjes rim pa/ /sngar
bshad sna tshogs rigs rnams ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pas bsgom par bya/ /gzhan yang zhal dang mdog rnams ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi mdog bzhin dang / /phyag mtshan
phyag rgyar sngar bshad bzhin/ /gnas sogs rim pa de ltar dgod/ /sngar bshad pa yi cho ga bzhin/ /gsang sngags ji bzhin rim par dgod/ /sum cu rtsa bdun
rnam dag don/ /sgom pa mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /A li kA li'i nang byung ba/ /sgom zhing rnam par bsgom par bya/ /chos dbyings grong khyer rnam dag par/ /sems can
khams ni rab tu 'jug /rnal 'byor 'di ni gsang ba ste/ /su la yang ni bstan mi bya/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer
sgom pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /b+ha ga pad+ma sgom pa ni/ /rdo rje snying pos zhus pa las/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /yang dag gsang ba nges gsang ba/ /A li kA li zur gsum gnas/ /pad+ma 'dab gsum rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje phag mo he ru ka /lte ba la ni rnam
par bsgom/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro lA ma dang / /gsum pa dum skyes ma nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das ni dmar la sngo/ /phag mo yang ni dmar sngo ste/ /mkha' 'gro sngo la ser ba dang //
lA ma ljang la ser ba ste/ /dum skyes ma ni dmar la ser/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /bcom ldan mgon po zhal bzhi pa/ /zhabs bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /thod pa
dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /dril bu rdo rjes legs par mtshon/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa ste/ /zhi ba zla ba phyed pa 'chang / /mi 'khrugs pa ni spyi
gtsug 'ching / /rtag par gsang ba'i gos mnabs shing / /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /phag mo'i zhal mtshan de yin te/ byi pa gnyis kyis legs 'khyud
cing / /gcer bu dbu skra grol ba la/ /spyan gsum pa la legs chags 'khril/ /'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan nyid/ /zhabs kyis rnam par gnon pa ste/ /g.yas brkyang
ba yi gnas pas bzhugs/ /sku lus phyag rgya drug 'jin cing / /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / /thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myos/ /g.yas pa dkar zhing g.yon
ljang gu| |steng ni sngo skya sku lus dkar/ /gzugs can ma ni b+ha gar brtag /A li kA li b+ha ga'i mchog /gzhan yang zur gsum dbus dag
tu| |pad+ma'i 'khor lo rnam par bsgom/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su ni/ /sna tshogs pad+ma dag tu brtag /dbus su he ru ka phag mo/ /'dab mar mkha' 'gro ma
sogs dgod/ /zur du thod pa dkar po dag /thugs kyi 'khor lo mkha' la spyod/ /shar gyi zur la sku 'khor lo/ /rlung gi zur gyi 'khor lo la/ /khwa gdong la sogs
rnam brgyad do/ /gsung gi 'khor lo bden bral zur/ /'khor lo bzhi po zur gsum la/ /shar ni sku yi mkha' 'gro ste/ /rlung phyogs gshin rje'i mkha' 'gro'o/ /
bden bral gsung gi mkha' 'gro ste/ /dbus su rdo rje he ru ka /sngo zhing dkar po dud ka dang / /sngo zhing dmar ba bzhi po yin/ /rang gi phyag mtshan mnyam par ldan/ /
gzhan du rang bdag mdog de bzhin/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /dmar ba'i mdog can rnam par bsam/ /dpa' bo'i mdog ni nag po la/ /gnyis med
'khyud pa'i sbyor ba'o/ /sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dag /sku lus dkar po rnam par bsam/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni ser po'i mdog /dpa' bo gnyis ni rab tu sbyor/ /khwa
gdong gshin rje brtan la sogs/ /gzugs gnyis phyed ni bud med nyid/ /rang gi thabs dang lhan cig tu/ /dgyes shing chags pas rnam par myos/ /gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa'
bo dmar/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni ljang gu'o/ /sngar bshad rim pa'i mtshan ma rnams/ /de yang rigs kyi dbye bas so/ /thams cad yi dwags gdan la bzhugs/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam
par brgyan/ /thams cad phyag rgya lnga 'chang zhing / /phyag rgya drug gis bdag po dgod/ /thams cad rang rigs cod pan can/ /ji lta ba yi rim pas bsgom/ /mkha' 'gro'i dus kyi sbyor
ba yis/ /ji lta'i rjes su rnam bsgoms nas/ /go cha'i gsang sngags dgod par bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rim pa dag /sngar bshad cho ga'i sbyor ba yi/ /dpa' bo'i yan lag rim pa bsgom/ /
gsang zhing sba ba'i zhi gnas ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi bde 'khor lo/ /rtag tu mnyam par bzhag nas su/ /sbyor ba'i mchog ni rtag tu bsgom/ /'di ni su la'ang mi bstan te/ /de nyid su
la'ang brjod mi bya/ /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba dag /rtag tu bsgoms na dngos grub 'gyur/ /dam tshig rtag tu bsrung bya zhing / /bza' dang bca' ba'ang spyad par bya/ /'gro zhing 'gro
zhing dus kun tu/ /'char nub dag tu rnam par spyad/ /gang zhig ye shes 'di nyan pa/ /sngags pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gsang
ba sbyor ba'i sgom pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gsang ba'i ye shes mchog gyur pa/ /
lnga gsang sngags rgya che ba'i/ /sgom pa bdag gis bshad pa yin/ /log pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can/ /gang la'ang khyod kyis bshad mi bya/ /bla ma'i rim las ji ltar bstan/ /
gang gis myur du shes 'gyur ba/ /skye ba bye ba stong phrag tu/ /sgyu 'phrul ye shes kyis bskul zhing / /dad pa yang dag bskyed pa dang / /rnal 'byor spyod tshul gnas pa yin/ /
lkug cing glen la sdig ngan can/ /byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can/ /sems can yongs su ma smin dang / /phyi rol bstan bcos kyis 'tshal ba/ /de dag kun gyis
mi shes te/ /mi shes mun pas khebs pa dang / /khengs pa la ni rtag par dga'/ /nga rgyal la sogs gdug sems ldan/ /de kun gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi/ /spyod yul gsang
ba mi shes so/ /he ru ka dpal yang dag 'jug /slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis/ /myur du dngos grub skyed byed de/ /'phral du yid ches byed pa yin/ /sna tshogs
sdom pa shes pa yis/ /cho ga'i bya ba bstan par bya/ /srid pa gsum po ma lus ni/ /de ni kun mkhyen bstan pa shes/ /mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang / /thos pa dang ni dran
pa yis| |sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur pa/ /de ltar de ni the tshom med/ /lha rnams ldog ste bkod pa dang / /sngags kyi dbye ba bzlog pa dang / /dkyil 'khor kun yang bzlog
pa dang | |so so bsgom pa'ang mi bya ste/ /bzlog pa'i yi ge btus nas ni/ /sgom pa gsang ba bzlog pa de/ /snying po thams cad sgrub pa yin/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa
dang | |rgyud rnams kun gyi spyi yi ni/ /sems ni yongs su smin pa dag /'dir ni sbyor sogs sngags rnams kyi/ /dam tshig de ltar bstan pa yin/ /bde gshegs dbugs
'byin gsungs pa yin/ /dag pa'i lus ni skyon med pa/ /bsod nams chung ba'i sngags pas kyang / /nga dga' bas ni rnyed par 'gyur/ /de na bsrung med bza' ba med/ /dkyil 'khor
dkyil 'khor bdag po med/ /bzlas dang brtul zhugs sbyin sreg med/ /mdor na sems bsdus tshul can yin/ /gzung byas rnam shes ye shes ni/ /bla mas bstan las brtson
las te| |phyi rol gyi ni bstan bcos la/ /lam de shin tu ring ba yin/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams thabs kyis ni/ /bla ma'i bsnyen bkur la brtson pa/ /ston pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa
dang | |dpa' ba'i de nyid bstan pa yin/ /skad cig rnam par rnal 'byor bdag /skad cag rnam par phyag rgyar ldan/ /kun nas thams cad skad cig ste/ /skad cig gis ni gsang
sngags brjod/ /pus mos la btsugs nas su/ /bdag nyid kyis ni gsol ba gdab/ /bcom ldan lha mos zhus pa ni/ /go 'phang rgya che
gnyis med pa/ /'di ni 'byung po kun la gnas/ /rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu rol/ /rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa ni/ /ci rigs bshad kyi legs par nyon/ /brtags pa'i yid
kyis gzung bar gyis/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs par/ /gang zhig sngar ni bshad pa nyid/ /dkyil 'khor lus ni yin par bshad/ /de ni sgo dgu dag tu
'gyur/ /de la lte ba'i 'khor lo che/ /thams cad mkhyen pa zhes byar bshad/ /rdo rje can ni der zhugs pa/ /cha med cha ni rnam spangs pa/ /lus can rnams kyi
nang na rol/ /lus las 'das shing gos pa med/ /la lar gzugs can dag tu bzhugs/ /la lar sna dang dag dag dang / /la lar rna bar sgra dag dang / /la
lar dri chen rdo rje chu/ /la lar tshor bar bcas pa'i sems/ /la lar sgom dang la lar bkres/ /la lar khro dang la lar zhi/ /la lar bde la rnam par gzigs/ /la
lar bud med 'dod chags te/ /la lar gsod dang 'joms pa ste/ /la lar rol mo rdung bar mdzad/ /la lar me tog 'bras bur gnas/ /la lar rol cing spyod
par 'gyur/ /la lar srog tu rnam par gnas/ /la lar sa dang chu dang me/ /la lar 'byung ba chen po lnga/ /la lar rigs kyi bye brag gis/ /bram ze dang ni gdol pa
dang / /la lar ma dang sring mo ru/ /la lar chung ma bu mo ru/ /la lar tshangs dang dbang ldan dang / /khyab 'jug dang ni nyi ma nyid/ /la lar zla ba skar mar bcas/ /
la lar nyin dang mtshan mor gyur/ /la lar khams gsum pa rnams kun/ /byed pa po dang mi zad rgyal/ /la lar zhi ba'i dbang gis zhum/ /mi gsal stong pa'i rdo
rje can/ /la lar byang chub chen por gshegs/ /la lar pha rol bdud las rgyal/ /la lar byis pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /la lar rgas shing 'khogs pa'o/ /la lar
nad chen gyis zin pa/ /la lar rgyu dang mi rgyu ba/ /la lar sngo dang le brgan dang / /la lar dkar dang ser ba'o/ /la lar sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad/ /la lar sgrol
ma gos dkar mo/ /la lar spyan dang mA ma kI/ /la lar dka' zlog zhi ba mo/ /la lar 'dab chags mkha' lding dang / /nam mkha' dang ni mkha' 'gro nyid/ /la lar klu
dang sbrul chen po/ /la lar smad 'tshong spre'u dang ni/ /la lar rmi lam mthong ba dang / /la lar gnyid kyis log pa nas/ /la lar rlung dang mkhris pa dang / /la lar
khrag dang pags par 'gyur/ /la lar mya ngan du ba dang / /la lar sreg pa'i me dag yin/ /la lar mtho ris skye ba ste/ /rnam
par 'phrul pa 'di lta bu/ /thams cad bdag nyid bzhugs 'di la/ /lha gang cha ni rnam spangs pa'i/ /de yi sgyu ma'i sna tshogs 'di'o/ /rtag pa min pa rdo rje can/ /
gzugs med par ni b+ha ga'i nang / /lte ba'i nang na pad+ma che/ /bcu drug thig gis thig gdab par/ /yi ge dang yang mnyam sbyor bas/ /kha sbyor bya ba byas pa yin/ /de
dbus rtag tu gsang pa che/ /'byin dang sdud par byed pa'o/ /de nyid rang nyid rdo rje can/ /gcig pu rang byung che ba'i lha/ /de ni sangs rgyas kun dngos zhes/ /
mtshan ni rab tu bshad pa yin/ /gsang ba'i mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /thams cad mkhyen pas 'di bshad pa'am/ /mi
'gyur ba yi lam bshad pa/ /skra ni nyag ma brgya yi cha/ /mchog gi gzugs can bsam pa ste/ /stong pa ma yin dmigs su med/ /yi ge med cing stong pa'ang med/ /
gos pa med cing sa bon med/ /gzugs med mtshan ma'ang med pa ste/ /rnam shes rang gi dngos po ni/ /rnam shes ye shes dag tu gzung / /thams cad gsal byed
sgron ma ni/ /dang po'i mtshan ma dag tu blta/ /gsal byed glog gi cha tsam ste/ /mtshan ma gnyis pa dag tu brtag /dkar po'i 'od kyi tshul can ni/ /phyogs bcu dag tu blta byas
te| |nyon mongs 'byin pa gsungs pa yin/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rnam par brtag /'dod pa'i lha yi longs spyod ni/ /bzhi pa rnam shes dag tu bstan/ /gzugs dang reg
sogs lha mo ni/ /phyogs kyi ye shes lnga po yin/ /drug pa gzugs med ye shes te/ /bdun pa dag ni chos kyi dbyings/ /brgyad par rang nyid 'dod bzhin du/ /sangs
rgyas 'bras bu dag yin no/ /sbas pa lta dang lag pa dang / /'khyud dang gnyis gnyis la sogs pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pas dbugs 'byin gsungs/ /dgu pa
bla ma bla ma ste/ /thams cad 'dir ni bstan pa yin/ /rnam pa gzhan dag rtswa dang 'dra/ /de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog /de nyid mi 'gyur dam pa yin/ /de nyid thams
cad khyab byed de/ /lus kun la ni rnam par gnas/ /de nyid sangs rgyas ye shes te/ /he ru ka dpal yin par bshad/ /skyes pa ma ni nga la sogs nyid/ /phra ba'i snying
po'ang 'dzin pa yin/ /ye shes dag tu 'byung de la/ /gang zhig sa la gnas rnams dang / /bstan bcos dag ni ma lus dang / /rig byed grub mthar gnas pa
rnams| |'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dag tu/ /de med par ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /rig byed grub pa'i mtha' rnams la/ /'di ni snying po rab tu bshad/ /
'dug dang ldang ba nyid dang ni/ /'jug pa rdzogs pa nyid dag dang / /byin gyis brlabs dang dbang bskur dang / /ting 'dzin mchod pa bsdus pa yin/ /de nas cho ga ming gzhan
pa| |thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa/ /de nyid du ni kun skyes pa/ /'byin dang sdud par byed pa yin/ /a A/ i I/ u U/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e ai/ o au/ aM
aH/ ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+ShaH oM hUM hUM phaT/ 'di ni bcom ldan lha de yin/ /mchog
nyid lhag par gnas pa yin/ /lha kun gyi ni bskyed pa dang / /sgrub byas de bzhin shes byas nas/ /don dam mchog kyang de bzhin te/ /brgyad cu rtsa bzhi theg pa ste/ /sngags
kyi spyod pa la gnas na/ /des ni 'di ni nges rgyal te/ /thams cad shes rab thabs kyis 'gro/ /thog mar gsang sngags brjod par bya/ /dge dang mi dge gang yin pa/ /de ni lha
tshogs rgyan yin te/ /ska rags gnas rnams thams cad yin/ /rtag tu 'di ni 'dzin byed pa/ /chos rnams thams cad rtogs pa yin/ /A li kA li mdun bsams na/ /rnal
'byor chen po ngal bsos te/ /bsam gyis mi khyab sems nyid de/ /sems kyang brtag par mi bya'o/ /sems de nyid kyang mi bsam ste/ /des na 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur/ /gang
gis rgyud kun las gsang ba/ /khyod la yang ni bshad pa yin/ /'di ni 'bad pas sba bya ste/ /gnyis med gnyis su med pa'i sdom/ /rnal 'byor ma sogs thams cad dang / /dpa' bo'i
yan lag thams cad kyi/ /rnal 'byor pa yis 'bras bu thob/ /srid pa'i nang nas 'byung ba yin/ /bla ma'i rgyud kyi thabs la ni/ /bsnyen bkur med pa la mi bshad/ /gal te bshad na
sdug bsngal zhing / /sdug bsngal gyis ni sems kyang 'khor/ /sems ni rnam 'khor rnal 'byor pa/ /mya ngan 'das pa mi mthong ngo / /ji ltar bud med byis gtam rjes yi rang / /kun smra
bsten pa'i gtam yang rjod par byed/ /lam yang ma bshad 'ching bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rnal 'byor lam ngan de dang 'dra bar bshad/ /he ru ka dpal sku'i yan lag /sku kun brtan
g.yo bdag nyid can/ /gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa/ /de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med/ /zhing ni 'od byed shes par bya/ /nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phro ba/ /'dun pa mngon du gyur pa nyid/ /
nye ba'i 'dun pa sbyang dka' ba/ /'dus pa ring du song ba yin/ /nye bar 'dus pa mi g.yo ba/ /dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros nyid/ /nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin/ /shrI he ru ka'i
gzhung spyod ba/ /'di ni nang gi bdag nyid can/ /pha rol phyin bcu sa rnams ni/ /rnal 'byor ma ni brda yi skad/ /mtho ris sa steng sa 'og tu/ /dpa'
bo'i yan lag brtan g.yo'i bdag /thogs med dus su gang bstan pa/ /phyi nang bdag nyid can du gnas/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po che/ /'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug
gtso| |kun tu phyag dang zhabs ldan zhing / /kun tu mig dang mgo bo'i zhal/ /kun tu thos ldan 'jig rten na/ /thams cad g.yogs te rnam par bzhugs/ /de nas dngos
grub bsgrub bya ba/ /bsam gtan ldan pa'i sems kyis te/ /sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir/ /gsang ba'i de nyid gsungs pa yin/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /man ngag
shin tu rnyed dka' ste/ /dpa' bo'i brda yi skad du ni/ /nga yis rgyud du sbas pa yin/ /gos ni phyag rgya lnga la sogs/ /shes rab yan lag phur bu dra/ /A li kA li zhes
brjod pa/ rgyu la sogs stong sngon 'gro yin/ /'jug pa sgra la sogs pa nas/ /ji srid bsdus pa'i sbyor ldan nyid/ /bdud rtsi tshim byed mya ngan 'das/ /lag pa'i mchod
pas dbang bskur ba/ /go cha chen pos yang dag bsrung / /sngags rnams kun gyis mchod pa yin/ /de ltar de nyid bcu bzhi ni/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin/ /mi
mchog gang zhig kun spyod pa/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam dag bdag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa thob cing / /skye dang dga' bar bde gshegs kyi/ /rigs skyes rgyal po chos ldan
'gyur| |de ltar cha ga ldan rgyas na/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /zla ba nya la sa steng du/ /'di ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na/ /de yi bsod nams gyur pa yin/ /lha
klu mi la sogs pa kun/ /de yi bsod nams gang gyur des/ /bdag gzhan yang dag ye shes ldan/ /bsam gtan sems pa tsam gyis sam/ /klog cing 'don dang bris pa
yis/ /mtho ris longs spyod thob 'gyur ba'am/ /yang na 'khor los bsgyur ba 'thob/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams 'pho ba'i tshe/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung sogs mkha' 'gro/ /lag
na me tog sna tshogs thogs/ /rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs dang / /rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang / /sna tshogs glu yis mchod pas mchod/ /'chi ba zhes bya'i rnam rtog 'di/ /mkha'
la 'gro ba'i gnas su 'khyer/ /de 'dra'i dpal chen rnal 'byor pa/ /sa steng du ni rnyed par dka'/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gsang ba'i yi ge bskyed cing sgrub
pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /cho ga'i rim bzhin sngags btu ba/ /gcig tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su/ /mkhas pas sa ni
mnyam nas su/ /bshang gci yis ni phyug par bya/ /mahA rak+ta byugs nas kyang / /bdag nyid he ru kar byas nas/ /rigs can shan pa mo blangs
nas| |me tog la sogs gdab par bya/ /dpa' po chen po'i bdug spos dbul/ /zhag la sogs pa mar me sbar/ /cang te'u dril bu brdung bar bya/ /glu dang gar gyis mchod
par bya| |lha yi rol mo'i bye brag dang / /phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba/ /lus ni phyag rgya drug dang ldan/ /A li kA li mnyam byas te/ /sde tshan la ni thim par bya/ /bzhi bzhi
ru ni shes byas la/ /thub pa'i mchog gis rgyas par bya/ /der gnas dpa' bo btu bar bya/ /don 'dod thams cad grub byed pa/ /bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin dang / /lnga pa
yi yang lnga ba dang / /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /dang po'i gsum pa gang yin dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa dgu pa/ /bzhi pa'i dang po gang yin dang / /mthar gnas pa yi
bzhi pa dang / /de nyid kyi ni gnyis pa dang / /sum cu pa ni yang dag blang / /nyi shu drug pa nyid dang ni/ /de bzhin brgya yi phyed phyed dang / /de nas sum cu rtsa gsum dang //
dang po'i dang po nyid dag dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang / /lnga pa yi ni dang po dang / /dang po yi ni gsum pa nyid/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis pa nyid ni/ /bzhi
pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /lnga pa yi yang bzhi pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi dang po dang / /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang / /gsum pa'i dang po gang yin dang / /lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang /
dang po yi ni dang po dang / /de bzhin bcu gcig pa nyid dang / /de bzhin mkhas pas bcu drug pa/ /gsum pa'i dang po gang yin dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa/ /bzhi ba'i gsum
pa gang yin dang / /uSh+ma yi ni gnyis pa nyid/ /dang po'i dang po gang yin dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/ /nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa yang ngo / /dang po yi ni gsum pa dang / /lnga pa yi
yang bzhi pa dang / /de bzhin sum cu rtsa gcig blang / /bco lnga pa ni nyid dag dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa lnga pa/ /dang po'i gnyis pa gang yin dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa/ /
yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis pa/ /uSh+ma yi ni tha ma nyid/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis pa nyid dang / /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /gnyis pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang //
uSh+ma yi ni gsum pa dang / /gzhan yang nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/ /an+tas+tha yi dang po dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa gcig pa/ /an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa dang / /de bzhin yang ni sum
cu pa/ /lnga pa yi ni dang po dang / /uSh+ma yi ni dang po nyid/ /de bzhin yi ge bya nyid dang / /bzhi pa'i dang po gang yin dang / /u Sh+ma'i dang po gang yin dang / /de bzhin nyi
shu rtsa brgyad pa/ /dang po'i gnyis pa gang yin dang / /gsum pa'i dang po nyid dag dang / /dang po'i gsum pa gang yin dang / /bzhi pa'i bzhi pa gang
yin dang / /an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa dang / /gsum pa'i yang ni lnga pa dang / /yi ge bya ni de nas blang / /dang po yi ni bzhi pa dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa dag /de nas brgyad
pa nyid dag dang / /bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin dang / /lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang / /nyi shu rtsa gsum pa yang blang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun dang / /bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /
slar yang nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/ /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga yang dag blang / /sum cu rtsa gsum nyid dag dang / /bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /lnga pa yi ni lnga pa
dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa blang / /bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang / /bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /dang po'i dang po nyid dag dang / /de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/ /an+ta s+tha yi

dang po dang / /gnyis pa yi yang dang po dang / /de bzhin du ni bcu bzhi pa'o/ /bcu bzhi uSh+ma bzhi pa dang / /nyi shu rtsa bdun gdan du byas/ /ya sogs brgyad po'i sa bon

pa dang / /bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / /ya tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon dang / /de bzhin sum cu gsum pa nyid/ /sum cu rtsa gsum de bzhin te/ /lnga pa'i bdag nyid kun
bsdu ba'o/ /de nas kyang ni btu bya ba/ /gnyis pa yang ni de bzhin te/ /gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang / /mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang / /uSh+ma Na yi

gnyis gnyis rkang pa bzhi pa ste/ /ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ tA sa ya tA sa ya/ k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya/ hrauM hrauM/ hraH hraH/ pheM pheM/ phaT phaT/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/
