ki li ki li/ si li si li/ hi li hi li/ d+hi li d+hi li/ huM hUM phaT/ rig pa'i rgyal po gsang sngags te/ /bya ba thams cad sgrub byed pa'o/ /'di las shin tu mchog gyur pa/ /
'jig rten gsum na yod min te/ /dpal ldan khrag 'thung sngags shes na/ /gzhan dag snying po med rtsar mtshungs/ /rtsa ba'i sngags su bshad pa yin/ /mngon
par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma las/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyi yi ge btu ba'i rdo rgyus kyi cho ga'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// //gzhan yang yi ge nyi
shu gnyis/ /snying po'i yig bdun nye snying po/ /ya tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon dang / /de bzhin gug skyed bcu gnyis kyis/ /yi ge bar ma dor byas pa/ /yan lag drug ni he ru ka
dpa' bo drug dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /re'u mig drug tu sgom pa ste/ /he ru ka yi bdag por 'gyur/ /yi ge gcig tu yang dag gnas/ /oM na ma swA hA bo Sha Te/ /hUM hUM phaT dang yang dag
ldan/ /sgrub pos snying por shes par bya/ /dang po snying ga nyid du ste/ /gnyis pa spyi bor shes par bya/ /gsum pa spyi gtsug dag tu sbyar/ /bzhi pa go char gyur pa yin/ /lnga pa mig tu
gyur pa ste/ /drug pa mtshon cha zhes byar 'dod/ /de nas dbyangs yig bcu gsum nyid/ /yi ge gnyis pa dag dang sbyar/ /dbyangs yig bcu gcig yang dag sbyar/ /yi ge
drug pa brgyan par bya/ /dbyangs kyi bzhi pa nyid kyang ni/ /yi ge bdun pa nyid kyang sbyar/ /dbyangs yi ge bcu gcig pa nyid ni/ /mkhas pas yi ge brgyad par sbyar/ /dbyangs
yi ge gnyis ba dang sbyar ba'i/ /yi ge dgu pas brgyan par bya/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa nyid/ /yi ge bcu gnyis pa dang sbyar/ /dbyangs yig gnyis par ldan pa ni/ /yi ge
nyi shu gcig pa gzung / /mkhas pas yi ge bcu bzhi pa/ /yi ge nyi shu pa dang sbyar/ /dbyangs kyi gsum pa nyid dag ni/ /yi ge bco lnga pa dang sbyar/ /dbyangs yig bco
lngar yang dag ldan/ /yi ge bcu drug pa mdzes bya/ /dbyangs yig gsum pa dang ldan pa'i/ /yi ge bcu bdun pa ru 'dod/ /dbyangs kyi gnyis pa nyid dang ni//
yi ge bco brgyad pa ru sbyar/ /dbyangs yig gi ni gnyis pa nyid/ /yi ge nyi shu gcig par sbyar/ /phyi mo'i lnga pa dang yang sbyar/ /yi ge nyi shu gsum par sbyar/ /phyi mo'i lnga pa
dang yang sbyar/ /yi ge nyi shu bzhi par sbyar/ /dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa nyid ni/ /yi ge nyi shu bzhi par sbyar/ /sde tshan dang po blangs nas ni/ /yi ge nyi shu lnga par sbyar/ /

'og gi cha ni me dang bcas/ /de bzhin dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa dgu pa/ /yi ge sum cu rtsa gcig par/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dag dang
sbyar| |yi ge sum cu gnyis pa yang / /dbyangs yig gnyis par ldan par bya/ /yi ge sum cu rtsa gsum pa/ /nyi mar yang dag ldan par bya/ /phyi mo'i bzhi pa nyid
dag ni| |yi ge sum cu bzhir ldan pa'i/ /'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin/ /phyi mo'i lnga pa nyid dag ni/ /sum cu bdun par yang dag ldan/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams sgrub
byed yin/ /sum cu brgyad pa nyid dag ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba/ /lha rnams thams cad sgrub pa ni/ /'di nyid yin par the tshom med/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa nyid ni/ /
me dang 'og tu bsgrub par bya/ /bzhi bcu gsum pa nyid dag ni/ /dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dang sbyar/ /yi ge bzhi bcu lnga pa ni/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis par sbyor/ /dbyangs yig lnga pa

mchog tu 'dod/ /de bzhin lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa/ /dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dag gis/ /mdzes pa mchog ni yin par 'dod/ /lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa nyid ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis dang

nyid dag las/ /der ni yi ge ba sbyar ba/ /'og gi char ni brtag par bya/ /yi ge bdun cu rtsa gcig pa/ /yi ge gnyis par yang dag sbyar/ /yi ge kun la mdzes pa ni/ /

yig gnyis pa dang ldan zhing / /'og tu me dang ldan pa las/ /gzhan dag mdzes pa yod ma yin/ /yi ge bdun cu rtsa bdun pa/ /der ni da dang sbyar bar bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi mdzes

bzhi par sbyar/ /phyi mo bcu bzhi dag pa ni/ /yi ge bdun cu gsum dang sbyar/ /de bzhin bco lnga pa dang sbyar/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa ni/ /yi ge bdun cu bzhi
dang sbyar/ /phyi mo'i yi ge gnyis pa yang / /yi ge bdun cu bdun dang sbyar/ /thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ /phyi mo yi ni gnyis pa yang / /yi ge bdun

ni| |yi ge brgyad cu pa dang sbyar/ /thig les mgo la mnan par bya/ /dbyangs yig bzhi pa dag kyang ni/ /yi ge bdun cu dgu dang sbyar/ /thig le sgra yis bskyed pa
ste| |thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pa dag/ yi ge bcu drug pa dang sbyar/ /'og dang steng gi yi ge grangs/ /dgu bcu rtsa bdun bshad
pa ste| |'di ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags su/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis shes par bya/ /dngos grub kyi ni gnas yin zhing / /mkha' 'gro'i snying ni 'joms pa na/ /dpal
ldan khrag 'thung lha rigs rgyal/ /bklags pas grub pa don yod pa/ /oM ni dang por sbyar bar bya/ /hUM hUM phaT ni mthar sbyar ba/ /'di ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags te/ /
grub pa thams cad grub byed yin/ /de nas rang gi bdag nyid kyi/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni dra ba yi/ /'khor lo bde mchog yin

par 'dod/ /oM shrI badzra he he ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba raM swAhA/ hA swA raM ba saM la dzA nI ki DA Ta pha hUM hUM kaM ru ru he he dzrab shrI oM/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i snying po ni/ /

cha'i snying po sgom pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang lha mo yi/ /snying po bla med bshad par bya/ /oM badzra bai ro tsa nI ye hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ /lha mo'i
snying po'i sbyor ba ni/ /bcu gsum pa ni bdag nyid dge/ pad+mo dbus su phag mo ste/ /'dab ma la ni lha mo dgod/ /sgo bzhi dag gi phyogs su ni/ /lha mo'i snying po rnam par bsgom/ /oM
las byung ba'i rta gdong dang / /rdo rje snying po gdug pa'i sgra/ /drag po yang ni g.yo ma dang / /mi 'phrog ma dang dri med ma/ /hUM mdzad ma dang ldan lha mo/ /bsreg blugs ma dang phaT byed
ma| |rang 'byung ma dang bcu gnyis te/ /ha mdzad g.yas pa'i gtso bo yin/ /rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba/ /dngos grub thams cad stsol mdzad pa/ /sngo dang ser dang dmar ba dang / /ljang gu
steng zhal dkar po ste/ /spyan gsum pa la bzhin rnam sgyur/ /ma che ba rnam par gtsigs pa ste/ /g.yas brkyang bzhugs shing thod phreng can/ /gsus pa rlo zhing skra grol ba/ /phyogs
kyi gos can 'jin pa ste/ /rang gi thabs dang sbyor bas gnas/ /'jigs byed tso muN+De 'jigs mos/ /zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon pas bzhugs/ /thod
pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga /mdung dang gri gug cang te'u dang / /rdo rje dril bu zhags pa dang / /lcags kyu tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang / /dgra sta dang ni sdigs mdzub dang / /na ra'i lpags
pa steng du brkyang / /sku rags dang ni dpung rgyan dang / /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can/ /thugs rje khro gnyer 'jigs pa ste/ /'dab la lha
mo thams cad dgod/ /ma mo dag ni brgyad pa ste/ /ser dang dmar dang ljang ba dang / /lho ni sngo ba'i mdog can te/ /me phyogs dmar la dud ka ste/ /sngo ba dang ni dkar ba
dang / /dbang ldan du ni dgod pa ste/ /spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba/ /phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /skyil krung phyed pas legs par bzhugs/ /thod pa yi ni dbu rgyan
can| |phyogs kyi gos can bzhin rnams sgyur/ /thams cad yi dwags gdan la bzhugs/ /thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myos/ /rdo rje'i mchog ni gar mdzad cing / /thod
pa rak+tas bkang ba dang / /dril bu cang te'u sgra yang sgrog/ /lha rnams dga' bar byed pa yin/ /sgo rnams su ni sgo srung ste/ /dbang po'i steng du rnam par bzhugs/ /
g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /spyan gsum pa la dbu skra brdzes/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /phreng ba'i rgyan gyis spud pa ste/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje
mgo bo phyag na bsnams/ /thams cad rnam bsgyur gsus pa 'phyang / /thams cad mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan/ /sngo dang ljang dang dkar po ste/ /ser zhing phyag bzhi mdog gnyis
pa| |gcer bu pad+ma'i rgya yang che/ /rang gi rigs kyi dbu rgyan can/ /thams cad rang thabs gnyis pa ste/ /bcu gsum pa ni rnam par bsgom/ /snying po mchog ni sgom pa yin//

'dod pa thams cad rab tu stsol/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ go cha dang lha mo'i snying po sgom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa 'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /shin tu rnyed dka'i dgod pa ste/ /gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /myur du dngos grub 'grub pa 'o/ /sa yi cha ni mnyam yid 'ong / /tsan+dan
gyis ni nye bar bsku/ /dri bzang dri ldan sa la ni/ /me tog sil ma gcal bkram shing / /spos kyi dri yis nyams dgar bya/ /bdag gi bya ba kun byas shing / /phyogs bcing ba
bzhin byas nas su/ /de nas rdza rnga'i bcing byas te/ /re mig bzhi bcu dgu zlum la/ /yi ge'i phyi mo dgod par bya/ /der gnas pa las dpa' bo ni/ /'dod pa'i don kun grub/
byed btu/ /rim bzhin 'byung dang rim min sa/ /dbyangs dang yi ge sgrub pos so/ /thub pa de lta'i grangs 'gyur las/ /re'u mig sum cu gnyis pa blang / /
lnga pa yi ni khyad par bya/ /brgya phyed phyed pa yang dag blang / /nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa yis phye/ /re'u mig sum cu drug pa blang / /gsum pa yis ni khyad par dbye/ /de nas sum cu
gnyis pa blang / /lnga pa yis ni khyad par bya/ /de nas nyi shu lnga pa gzung / /nyi shu bzhi pa dag dang sbyar/ /sum cu rtsa gsum yang dag blang / /re'u mig bco lnga la yir ldan//
lnga pa dag dang yang dag bcas/ /de nas nyi shu gnyis pa gzung / /bcu gcig pa yang de bzhin no/ /mdzes pa mchog ni yin par 'dod/ /re'u mig gi ni bcu dgu pa//
ma yi bu dang yang dag ldan/ /re'u mig gsum par rnam par dbye/ /ya mtshan brgyad pa'i sa bon la/ /re'u mig sum cu drug pa dang / /yang dag ldan pa'i yi ger
'gyur| |slar yang yi ge de dag nyid/ /'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin/ /de nas rang phyung blangs nas su/ /re'u mig la ni lnga par sbyar/ /spyi bor thig le dag dang
sbyar| |de nas nyi shu gnyis pa gzung / /bcu gcig pa yang de bzhin no/ /don kun grub byed ces bya ba'i/ /tshig ni gnyis pa yin par bshad/ /re'u mig bcu dgu pa
nyid la| |nyi shu rtsa bdun pa yis phye/ /gsum pa dag dang yang dag ldan/ /sum cu gsum pa legs blangs te/ /re'u mig ni gnyis par sbyar/ /nyi shu pa dang yang dag ldan//
mdzes pa'i mchog ni yin par 'dod/ /de bzhin nyi shu gcig pa nyid/ /de bzhin nyi shu drug pa yin/ /lan gnyis bzlas pa'i tshig tu ni/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste
btu| |de nas go rims bzlog pas gzung / /re'u mig las ni dang po nyid/ /bzhi pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan/ /de bzhin bco lnga pa dang sbyar/ /de nas nyi shu gnyis
pa gzung / /bcu gcig pa yang de bzhin no/ /chos don 'dod dang thar pa yi/ /tshig ni gsum pa yin par bshad/ /re'u mig gnyis pa'i sa bon dang / /re'u
mig sum cu drug pa nyid/ /de bzhin nyi shu drug pa dang / /sum cu gsum pa yang dag blang / /re'u mig bcu gsum pa yir ldan/ /re'u mig las ni bcu pa nyid/ /go rim
ldog pa sgrub pas blang / /re'u mig las ni bcu dgu pa/ /re'u mig nyi shu gsum pa la/ /gnyis pa dag ni yang dag ldan/ /steng du thig les brgyan par bya/ /de nas chu
yi sa bon gzung / /brgyad pa yang ni de bzhin te/ /me yi bu yis khyad par dbye/ /yi ge hUM phaT mtha' ru sbyar/ /'di ni khams gsum rgyal zhes bya/ /sngags tshig
bzhi yis rnam brgyan pa'o/ /oM ni sku la gsal byed yin/ /hUM dang phaT ni mtha' ru sbyar/ /rig rgyal 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sngags/ /'di ni ma byung 'byung mi
'gyur| |de nyid bsdus dang dpal mchog dang / /bde mchog rdo rje 'jigs byed du/ /khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /sku brgyad dang ni bcas pa ru/ /dkyil 'khor bsrung ba'i don du ni//
gdug pa kun la khyad par du/ /'di ni rnyed pa tsam gyis kyang / /brtag mi dgos par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sha chen dag gis thams cad kun/ /rdo rje yang ni med par bshad/ /rnal

'byor thun mong brjod pa ni/ /dngos grub kun gyi 'bras bskyed pa'o/ /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha huM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+na gr-ih+na huM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+na pa ya gr-ih+na pa ya huM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho
b+ha ga baM badzra huM hUM phaT/ 'di ni gdug pa thams cad du/ /'jigs byed mi bzad par bshad do/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi sa yi mchog /pad+ma'i lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad rnam par
sgom| |gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon/ /phyag ni bcu drug yang dag ldan/ /zhal brgyad pa la bzhin rnam sgyur/ /zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs/ /thod pa'i phreng bas
rnam par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can/ /thams cad kun gyis rnam par spud/ /rdo rjes mtshan pa'i phyag rgya drug /sku lus drug pa thugs rje'i nyams/ /g.yas brkyang
ba yi gnas pa yis/ /dbang ldan gyi ni thod pa gnon/ /u ma mchog gi ku tsa gnon/ /khros pa'i spyan gyis rnam par gzigs/ /sku la mgo yi do shal can/ /mgo po'i phreng ba dbu la bcings/
rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya can/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal de bzhin te/ /lcags kyu sdigs mdzub 'ching ba ste/ /dpral ba'i steng du yang dag gnas/ /thugs kar dpral ba phyag rgya ste/ /
bgegs ni rnam par gnon pa yin/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /ral gri lcags kyu 'chang ba ste/ /mdung dang mgo bo cang te'u dang / /na ra'i pags pa'i steng du ste/ /phyag ni bcu
drug de bzhin no/ /stag gi pags pa gos su man bas/ /rang rig gnyis med bde ba'i sku/ /sngo dang dkar dang ser ba dang / /dmar po de bzhin g.yon pa mdzes/ /dkar
dang sngo dang ser ba dang / /steng gi zhal ni dmar po ste/ /spyan gsum pa la dmar ba'i spyan/ /khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa dge /'dod
pa'i rdo rje rdo rje sngon/ /bskyed pa'i rdo rje nyid dang ni/ /mi g.yo ba yi rdo rje ste/ /sngo dang ljang dang dmar ba dang / /dud ka ngur smrig bsres pa ste/ /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i
zhal| |thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis ni/ /bdud bzhi po ni rnam par gnon/ /na ra'i rus pas sku brgyan cing / /sna tshogs khro
bo'i rigs kyang 'phro/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /rdo rje sdigs mdzub brkyang ba ste/ /rang gi rigs dang gnyis med 'khyud/ /khro bo'i lta bas gzigs mdzad
cing | |dril bu phyag mtshan yang dag ldan/ /'dzin pa'i phyag rgya 'ching ba ste/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal phyag rgya mis/ /khro bo thams cad bcings pa yin/ /stag gi pags pa gos
su mnabs/ /spyan gsum mi bzad 'jigs pa ste/ /tho ba dbyug to mda' dang ni/ /ral gri dril bu de bzhin te/ /yang na rdo rje dril bu dang / /thams cad khre bo'i rigs rjes 'gro/ /
'khyud pa'i phyag kyang de bzhin te/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa/ /thams cad spyan gsum dngos grub mchog /sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor dngos
grub mchog dam pa/ /sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag /yi ge'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+na gr-ih+na hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+na pa ya gr-ih+na pa
ya gr-ih+Na pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga bAM badzra hUM hUM phaT/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mthong nas/ /thams cad bskyed par rnam par bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor
ba te| |kha sbyar lnga yis ngo bo nyid/ /rnal 'byor pa yi dkyil 'khor yin/ /snying po mchog gi sgom pa yin/ /de bzhin khyi dang phag gi sha /zangs kyi gtsug phung can de
bzhin/ /mngon spyod kyi ni bya ba la/ /bza' dang sbyin sreg gtor ma bya/ /ma lus lus pa med grub cing / /rgyal srid thams cad rab grub 'gyur/ /dung dang nya phyis mu tig ste/ /gsum
char rgyur las byung ba yin/ /chos kyi ye shes lus can gyi/ /thod pa la ni su zhig smod/ /dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba 'chang / /zla ba phyed pas rgyan du byas/ /dpa' bo'i dpa'
dbang yin par bshad/ /khrag 'thung rdo rje can rnam pa/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ /srung ba zhal bzhi par byin gyis brlabs pa khro bo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor
rdo rgyus kyis bris pa rdo rje hUM mdzad bskyed pa'i le'u ste drug cu pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sde tshan brgyad ni rnam sgom pa/ /mkha' dbyings pad+ma'i
dbus gnas par/ /khrag 'thung rdo rje rnam par bsgom/ /zhal lnga pa la phyag bcu pa/ /spyan gsum shin tu dmar ba ste/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /zhal
rnam sgyur zhing 'jigs pa ste/ /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /drag po zla ba phyed pa 'dzin/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan/ /ral
pa'i cod pan 'ching ba ste/ /phyag rgya drug gi mtshan gyis rgyan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /rig pa gnyis med bde ba'i nyams/ /sku la thod rlon do shal can/ /thugs
rje'i nyams kyis khyab par myos/ /dkar dang sngo dang sprin gyi gzugs/ /sku ni sgeg cing ldem bag can/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal dag ni/ /ser dang
dmar dang ljang ba dang / /dud pa yi ni mdog can no/ /rdo rje dril bus mnyam ldan pas/ /rang gi rigs dang yang dag 'khril/ /tshangs lpags bshus nas mnabs par mdzad/ /
rgyab tu nges par 'dzin pa yin/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing / /mdung dang cang te'u gri gug dang / /thod pa dag ni 'dzin pa ste/ /bcom ldan baM hUM nges 'byung ba/ /'jigs byed rang
gi chung mar bcas/ /zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan par sbyar/ /shar 'dab lha mor dgod pa ste/ /ji srid lho phyogs de bzhin te/ /me la sogs pa'ang dgod par bya/ /de srid dbang ldan sogs
de bzhin/ /A yi mkha' 'gro ma dang ni/ /kA yi mkha' 'gro ma de bzhi/ /tsa yi mkha' 'gro ma dang ni/ /Ta yi mkha' 'gro ma dag ste/ /dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang / /sngo
ba'i mdog can lho phyogs so/ /dmar dang dud ka ljang gu dang / /ser po dbang ldan yang dag gnas/ /ta yi mkha' 'gro ma dang ni/ /pa yi mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin/ /de nas
ya yi mkha' 'gro ma/ /sha yi mkha' 'gro ma brgyad pa/ /de dag kun ni spyan gsum ste/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po yi/ /rkang pa g.yas brkyang
zhabs kyis gnon/ /rnam gyur mche ba rnam gtsigs zhal/ /phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /skra grol thugs rje khro bo bzhin/ /drag po
yul 'khrug byed pa ste/ /'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin/ /'gro ba thams cad smon byed de/ /thams cad ci 'dod rdzogs pa yin/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /dril bu cang
te'u yis brgyan pa/ /sde tshan mkha' 'gro bde ba ste/ /'di dag rnal 'byor ma yis bsgom/ /yang na phag mo dgod bya ste/ /bdag mo yang ni gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje sems
dpa'i bdag po ste/ /mkhas pas kyang ni bsgom par bya/ /sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba dang / /sa 'og sa steng rab tu 'khrug /oM a ka tsa Ta ta pa ya sha huM hUM phaT swAhA/ brtan
pa dang ni g.yo ba'i bdag /ma lus ji srid 'di yis 'grub/ /sde tshan mkha' 'gro dam pa mchog /b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /a sha /kA kaM /tsarma tsa/ TaM ta pa ka /ta
pa sa ta tha/ pa ba na dza yaM ma b+ha haM tsa/ sha ra b+ha tsa ta tha/ sbrang rtsi mar dang bcas pa ni/ /rtag tu dus su 'di brgyad bza'/ /rgas dang nad dang 'chi med par/ /skye ba 'di la dngos
grub 'byung / /chang gi btung ba dang bcas pa/ /zos pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur/ /de ma rnyed na'ang sa lus bya/ /skye ba bdun pa'i nang gnas shing / /phyugs ni zas su rta spyad
na| |skad cig gis ni mkha' spyod 'gyur/ /'di la yid gnyis dpyod pa med/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ sde tshan gyi sbyor ba'i
le'u ste drug cu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rnal 'byor mchog gis gar da ba/ /dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor
sngar bshad do/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs mkha' 'gro ni/ /gar da pa yi gzugs su bya/ /phag mo'i gzugs ni de nyid kyang / /zhal ni gar da ba ru bya/ /sngar bshad gnas dang
phyag mtshan dang / /zhal ni gzhan yang rtogs par bya/ /sngar bshad mtshan ma'i rim pa yis/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni lag mdung thogs/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo thams cad kun/ /
mkha' lding gdong ni 'jigs pa can/ /gsung gi 'khor lo rma bya'i gdong / /sku yi 'khor lo seng+ge'i gdong / /khyi dang phag dang 'ug pa dang / /khwa yi zhal gdong de bzhin te/ /
zur la gshin rje sreg sogs kun/ /ma he ri dwags zhal gdong yin/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus can rnams kyang / /spyan gsum mig ni shin tu dmar/ /'di ni rnal 'byor
mchog dam pa/ /sdug bsngal thams cad zad par byed/ /rnal 'byor blo gros dngos grub dag /rnal 'byor mchog ni ster bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje theg pa'i man ngag
dang / /ngag gi dngos grub rab tu ster/ /ma thos pa yi chos bstan pas/ /sems can rnams ni srid las grol/ /bla na med pa nyid bstan pas/ /mi snang la sogs dngos
grub 'gyur/ /su yang rung bas 'jig rten gsum/ /de kun de ma thag tu mthong / /sngar bshad dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma'i/ /gsang sngags rnams kyang de bzhin te/ /mkha'
'gro ma mo de bzhin no/ /sngar bshad sngags kyi bdag po rnams/ /bzlas na dngos grub rab ster cing / /rtag tu bde ba thams cad 'thob/ /rnal 'byor nye snying bzlas na ni/ /gar
da'i dngos grub mkha' la 'gro/ /brtul zhugs med pa'ang brtul zhugs 'thob/ /mi gtsang pa'ang gcang bar 'gyur/ /dbul po'ang nor gyi bdag por 'gyur/ /nad yod pa yang
med par 'gyur/ /long ba yis kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ /mngon par shes pa lnga thob 'gyur/ /bong bu'i sha dang rta sha dang / /khyi dang ba lang glang po mi/ /rnga mo lce spyang de bzhin te/ /
brgyad po'ang mnyam pa mchog yin no/ /rnal 'byor bdag gis de brgyad bza'/ /dri chen chu dang sbrang rtsi mar/ /bsam gtan bsgoms te bza' byas nas/ /yang ba'i dngos grub
thob par 'gyur/ /gzugs yongs bsgyur pa'i dngos grub cing / /rang gi gzugs su'ang 'gyur ba yin/ /rnal 'byor gang dang gar gnas par/ /bza' ba yang ni bza' bar
bshad/ /'gro dang mi 'gro de bzhin te/ /btung zhing btung zhing dngos grub 'gyur/ /ma dang bu mo sring mo dang / /rang gi gnyen dang tsha mo dang / /blo ldan
ji ltar 'dod pa yis/ /phyag rgya phyag rgya chen po 'grub/ /gar da'i mkha' 'gro bsgoms na ni/ /myur du 'gugs pa'i dngos grub 'gyur/ /mchog 'di yang ni gsang ba ste/ /

su la yang ni brjod mi bya/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i bong bu'i mdzad pa dngos grub kyi rgyu sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //da nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro lnga yi rnam sgom pa/ /rigs las brgyad pa'i cho ga yin/ /gdan dang phyag mtshan sa bon te/ /'di ni sa bon mchog gyur pa'o/ /nga nya Na
na ma zhes pa/ /'di ni sa bon mchog grub pa/ /nga ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste/ /nya ni sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yin/ /Na ni rin chen mkha' 'gro ste/ /na ni pad+ma mkha' 'gro yin/ /ma ni sna
tshogs mkha' 'gro ste/ /mkha' 'gro lnga ni mchog yin te/ /zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang / /chags dang phrag dog de bzhin te/ /rigs ni lnga po 'di dag gis/ /'dod las
grol ba'i 'bras bu stsol/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang / /pad+ma ral gri lnga pa yin/ /sngo dang dkar ba nyid dang ni/ /ser dang dmar po ljang gu dang / /rdo rje'i phyag rgya byang chub
mchog /rin chen phyag rgya'ang de bzhin te/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya bzhi pa ste/ /ral gri'i phyag rgya lnga pa yin/ /glang po seng+ge rta dang ni/ /rma bya mkha' lding de bzhin te/ /khyab 'jug
tshangs pa nyi ma dang / /dbang phyug che dbang po yang de/ /rang rig yan lag dang bcas pa/ /gnyis med bde bas yang dag gnas/ /shar dang lho dang nub dang ni/ /byang du yang ni de
bzhin 'dir/ /dpa' bo'i 'khor dang bcas par dgod/ /lnga po yang dag lnga sangs rgyas/ /lnga po bdag nyid lnga yin no/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ste/ /zla ba'i dkyil
'khor shar du'o/ /lho dang nub dang de bzhin te/ /byang na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lo/ /yang na dbus su zla ba ste/ /shar du yang ni nyi ma'i gdan/ /de dag dpa' bor gyur pa ste/ /'di lta

ste| rdo rje thod pa dang / rdo rje mkha' mnyam dang / rdo rje snying po dang / rdo rje sra ba dang bzhi po de dag ni/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/ glang po che'i gdan khri bya'o/ /rdo rje zla ba
dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje rgyal po dang / rdo rje sgra dang de dag ni/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/ seng+ge'i gdan khri'o/ /'dod pa'i rdo rje dang / rdo rje sprin dang /
rdo rje Ta har dang / rdo rje bzhad pa dang de dag ni/ rin chen mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor ste/ rta'i gdan khri'o/ /rdo rje mes dpal dang / rdo rje 'joms pa dang / rdo rje sreg byed dang /
rdo rje dri bral dang / de dag gi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor te/ rma bya'i gdan khri'o/ /rdo rje ba dan dang / rdo rje glu dang / rdo rje dpa' ba dan dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed dang de dag ni/
las kyi mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/ /mkha' lding gi gdan khri'o/ /dpa' bo de dag kyang rang gi rigs dang / thod pa'i phreng ba can/ spyan gsum pa/ rang gi shes rab dang
'khyud pa/ rdo rje skyil mo krung gis yi dwags kyi gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /mche ba rnam bar gtsigs shing rnam par 'gyur ba/ stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs pa/
zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ thod pa dang kha T+wAM 'dzin pa/ cang te'u'i sgra hUM dang bcas pa/ mgo bo'i phreng ba'i do shal gyis brgyan pa/ phyag rgya lnga 'chang ba/ rang gi
rigs kyi dbu rgyan can/ ral pa dang zla ba 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i shar dkar po/ byang ljang gu /nub dmar po/ lho ser po/ las kyi mkha' 'gro'i shar ser
po| byang sngon po/ nub dkar po/ lho dmar po/ pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro'i shar dkar ba/ byang ljang gu /nub sngon po/ lho ser po/ rin chen mkha' 'gro'i shar ljang gu /
byang ser po/ nub dkar po/ lho sngon po/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i shar sngon po/ byang ljang gu /nub dmar po/ lho ser po/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis/ /rdo rje
'khor lo ral gri dang / /pad+ma rin chen phreng ba yin/ /chas ni yongs su bskor bar bya/ /grwA bzhi ma mo bzhi bsgom ste/ /ma mo rmongs byed ma dang ni/ /ma mo zhe sdang nyid yin te/ /
chags pa yi ni ma mo dang / /phrag dog ma mo de bzhin te/ /me yi phyogs la sogs par dgod/ /dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ljang / /skra grol ma la bzhin rnam sgyur/ /spyan
gsum pa la gcer bu ste/ /phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa yin/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal gcig pa/ /yi dwags gdan la rnam par bzhugs/ /dbang chen me dang chu dang ni/ /rlung gi
dkyil 'khor dag tu gnas/ /rigs kyi gdan la bzhugs pa yin/ /'khor lo rdo rje pad+ma dang / /ral gri thod pa kha T+wAM ga /gri gug yang ni phyag na 'chang / /ma ning las byung lha mo

bsgom| |thod pa yi ni phreng ba can/ /skyil mo krung ni phyed pa'o/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje srung ba dang / rdo rje 'gying ba dang / rdo rje rta gdong dang / rdo rje dred gdong dang / rdo rje bde
mchog dang / rdo rje dam tshig dang / rdo rje rta mchog ste/ khro bo'i rgyal po de dag ni/ /sgo rnams dang ni mtshams su ste/ /sngo dang ljang dang dmar ser po/ /dmar dang sngo dang dud ka dkar/ /
lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang / /dril bu thod pa kha T+wAM ga /cang te'u yang ni de bzhin te/ /thod pa dbyig to mdung dang ni/ /dgra sta thod pa kha T+wAM ga /mgo bo phyag na bsnams
pa'o| |zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes/ /phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa ste/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /thod pa
yi ni phreng ba 'chang / /mgo bo'i dor shal rnam par brgyan/ /nyi ma pad+ma'i steng du ni/ /g.yas brkyang ba yis zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /phyogs skyong brgyad kyi khri la bzhugs/ /
mche ba rnam gtsigs rnam gyur zhal/ /spyan gsum rang rigs cod pan can/ /rang gi rigs dang gnyis med sbyor/ /snying rje yi ni nyams can te/ /phyi rol rdo rje yi dwags
kyis| |yongs su bskor bar bsgom par bya/ /thog mar gsal byed ming dang hUM/ /mtha' ru phaT dang sbyar bar bya/ /sngar bshad cho ga'i srung ba bya/ /phung po khams dang sgye
mched dang / /lus ngag yid las bsgom par bya/ /mkha' 'gro zhal drug phyag bcu gnyis/ /rang gi mtshan ma dril bu yis/ /gnyis su med par mnyam par ldan//
mdung dang lcags kyu thod pa dang / /kha T+wAM ga dang mgo bo dang / /cang te'u dang ni gri gug dang / /na ra'i pags pa 'dzin pa yin/ /sngo dang ser dang dmar ljang gu/ /dud ka dang ni dkar
ba dang / /dkar dang sngo dang ser dmar dang / /ljang dang thal ba'i mdog lta bu'o/ /ser dang sngo dang dkar ba dang / /dmar dang ljang gu pad+ma'i mdog /dmar dang dkar dang sngon po dang //
ser dang ljang dang nam mkha'i mdog /ljang dang dkar dang dmar ba dang / /sngo dang ser dang dkar ba'i mdog /de dag mkha' 'gro lnga yi ni/ /zhal mdog gi ni khyad par yin/ /yang na
zhal gcig phyag gnyis bsgom/ /phreng ba'i gsang sngags ming dang bcas/ /mkhas pas zur bzhi mtshams nas so/ /mthar ni hUM hUM phaT dang sbyar/ /oM ma hA su kha badzra DA ka hUM Da ki

nI dzA la shaM ba ra AH hUM phaT swAhA/ /oM ma hA su kha bud+d+ha DA ka bruM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra AH hUM phaT swAhA/ /oM ma hA su kha rak+Sha DA ka traM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra AH hUM phaT swAhA/ /oM ma hA su

kha pad+ma DA ki hrIH DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra A hUM phaT swAhA/ oM ma hA su kha bi shwa DA ka khaM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra AH hUM phaT swAhA/ /de dag ni/ mkha' 'gro lnga'i snying po'i gsang sngags

te 'di ni/ ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa yin no/ /oM badzra DA ka daM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM bud+d+ha DA ka nyaM hUM phaT/ oM rat+na DA ka NaM hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma DA ka naM hUM phaT/ oM bi shwa DA ka maM hUM
phaT| ye shes dam tshig ro gcig pa/ /mkhas pas bsgoms par byas nas su/ /dam tshig gis ni legs dbang bskur/ /sna tshogs mchod pa rnam par bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor
dag ni thams cad kyang / /go 'phang dran nas dbang yang bskur/ /sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa'i mchog /de bzhin 'khyud dang tsum pa na/ /b+ha ga'i ling+ga'i sbyor ba dag /ye shes
rnam smin dpa' ba'i mchog /shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya drug /rnam par lta zhing nges par brtag /dga' pa dang po ye shes te/ /mchog tu dga' ba mnyam
par sbyor/ /bde bar dga' bar grub pa che/ /lhan cig skyes dga' bla med yin/ /sbyor ba dang ni shin tu sbyor/ /sbyor ba che dang ye shes sbyor/ /de dag cho ga'i rim pa'o/ /thig le'i
gzhung gi spyor shes na/ /phra ba'i sbyor bas blta bar bya/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgyu/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang thob/ /cho ga nges par bsgrubs nas ni/ /myur du rnal

'byor pa yis 'grub/ /'di ni nges pa kho na'o/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gsang ba'i ye shes kyi le'u ste drug cu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /thugs kyi snying po mchog gyur pa/ /mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /ye shes zla ba rnam par bsgom/ /A yi yi ge las byung ba/ /rdo rje
sems dpa' bde ba che/ /kha ba kun da'i mdog lta bu/ /dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs pa'o/ /zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste/ /spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams/ /sna tshogs
pad+ma zla dbus bzhugs/ /stong pa'i ye shes las byung ba/ /zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'ching / /thod pa yi ni dbu rgyan can/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /rdo rje skyil
mo krung gis bzhugs/ /rang gi lus dang sbyor bar gnas/ /snying rje chags dang mngon gyur pa/ /dkar zhing sngo la dmar ba'i zhal/ /rnam pa gsum gyi rang bzhin can/ /rdo rje dril bu
mnyam par ldan/ /lha mo mchu ni rnam 'tshir te/ /rdo rje mdung dang thod pa dang / /kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa 'dzin/ /yi ge A dang nyi dbus bzhugs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom//
i las rdo rje zla ba ste/ /I las rdo rje sgyu 'phrul lo/ /e las chos kyi rdo rje ste/ /ai las sna tshogs sgyu 'phrul ma/ /lha mo bzhi po de dag ni/ /de yi zhal mdog 'dzin pa'o/ /
skra grol ba la mig po che/ /snying rje chags pas rnam par myos/ /rang gi thabs dang lhan cig bcas/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sna tshogs yi dwags steng du bsgom/ /gtso
bo shes rab skyil mo krung / /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan/ /mdung dang gri gug phyag na bsnams/ /thod pa kha
T+wAM ga 'dzin cing / /dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol/ /ji ltar dpa' bo'i rnal 'byor bzhin/ /de yi mdog dang phyag mtshan 'dzin/ /lha mo bzhi yi kha sbyar gsang / /snying po sbyor ba mchog
yin no| |gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na| /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /gsang ba kun gyi mchog de nyid/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi snying po mchog /gsang ba'i ye shes dam tshig ste/ /
chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin/ /u ni snying gar sgom pa ste/ /U ni mgo bor de bzhin no/ /oM ni spyi gtsug dag tu ste/ /oM ni mig tu dgod par bya//
aM ni go char dgod pa ste/ /aH ni mtshon du rnam par dgod/ /sku gsung thugs su sbyor pa yis/ /bdag nyid kyang ni sgom par gnas/ /ye shes dam tshig sbyor ba yis/ /bla
med mchog dang dbang yang bskur/ /mnyam pa'i dam tshig sbyor ba yis/ /chos kyang de bzhin mnyam pa yis/ /dngos po kun ni ro gcig ste/ /gnyis su med pa'i mchog grub
pa| |dam tshig thun mtshams bzhin du ste/ /dus bzhi dag tu rnam par bsgom/ /kha sbyor bzhi yi sbyor ba ni/ /thun bzhi la ni rnam par bsam/ /snying rjes kun la 'gro bya zhing / /
cha med par ni rnam par bsgom/ /thams cad rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /shes rab cha med rjes su 'gro/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug sbyor/ /bdag nyid rdo rje bdag po yin/ /bgrang
du med pa'i rus pa yin/ /ye shes bzlas pa yin par bshad/ /bzlas pa ye shes sgom pa ste/ /sprul pa drug ni spro ba'o/ /de bas dam tshig bzlas pa yin/ /cho ga bzhin du bzlas
pa bya| |u o o uH/ AM aH/ oM AH/ a AH/ i I/ u U/ e A+ai/ o au/ aM AH hUM swAhA/ dung chen phreng ba blangs nas ni/ /rtag tu gsang sngags rgyal
po bzla| |dag byed bsod nams chen po ste/ /dge zhing nyes pa 'joms pa yin/ /sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms byed cing / /dge ba kun gyi 'bras bu ste/ /gsang sngags kun
gyi ston pa ste/ /rnam par dben pa'i sa phyogs su/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi snying po yi/ /dgyes pa'i bde ba las byung ba/ /lha mo bzhi po dga' ba ste/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog tu
bde| |rigs kyi bde ba bcom ldan 'das/ /rang byung rdo rje sems dpa' yin/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ lha mo bzhi'i gsang ba kha sbyor gyi le'u ste drug cu
rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de nas sbyor ba'i mchog bshad pa/ /gdug pa thams cad za byed pa/ /ma rungs phyi dang nang 'joms pa/ /nam mkha' stong ba lta bu las/ /yi ge k+Sha
las mngon byung zhing / /mkha' 'gro dra ba bde mchog ni/ /phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa/ /spyan gsum pa la 'jigs pa'i zhal/ /g.yas brkyang ba yis bzhugs pa la/ /ma rungs
bdud kyi dgra gnon cing / /phyag rgya chen po mnyam ldan pas/ /thod pa dril bus yang dag 'khyud/ /thod pa'i dbus su yid 'ong ba'i/ /rdo rje mchog gis rnam par mtshan/ /ye shes
bdud rtsis yongs gang ba/ /lag pa g.yas par bzhag nas ni/ /sna tshogs pa yi sku lus la/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku yang brgyan/ /zhal gdong mche ba rnam gtsigs shing / /spyi
gtsug thod pas rgyan du byas/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes spyi bor mtshan/ /zla ba byed par la pa 'chang / /rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed sgom pa
yin| |dogs pa rnam par spangs shing yongs su dag pa'i blos/ /rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma'i khyad par med par byed/ /byams dang snying rje'i rgyan gyis lus la rgyan du byas/ /
'dzem med bde ba'i rnal 'byor legs par bslabs pa'i bdag /shin tu 'jigs pa'i dud 'gro'i dur khrod chen po na/ /ro langs srin po sna tshogs sgra rnams sgrog
par byed/ /pheM gyi sgra byed pa yi 'jigs pas khyad par byed/ /gzhan yang sgrub po rnal 'byor mthun pa'i yul du sgrub/ /yang na zhal ni bzhi pa dang / /'di la phyag brgyad
rnam par bsgom/ /dkar dang sngo dang dmar ser po/ /zhal dag sgyur zhing 'jigs par mdzad/ /mdung dang rdo rje kha T+wAM ga /cang te'u mgo bo gri gug thogs/ /sna tshogs phyag
la bskyod pa'i ljags/ /hA hA hI hI hUM hUM phaT/ /phaT ces bya ba'i sgra sgrog cing / /dpa' bo'i gcig pu 'jigs mdzad pa/ /gdul dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad
cing | |sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /khro bo'i sprin ni mkhas pas spro/ /bsam gtan dga' ba bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /khro bo yi ni sku ru sgrub/ /dam tshig bza' zhing
bzlas pa bya/ /dam tshig kha sbyar byas nas bzla/ /mnyam par gnas shing bzlas nas su/ /chos rnams ma lus bsgom par bya/ /oM ak+sha hUM phaT/ srid gsum sdig pa
zad byed cing / /mtshams med lnga yang zad byed par/ /sdug bsngal thams cad zad byed cing / /srid pa dag kyang sbyong bar byed/ /sbyor ba yi ni mchog dam pa/ /bklags tsam gyis
ni nges par 'grub/ /gdug gcig gnod byed sems can dang / /ma rungs las la chags pa dang / /log par lta dang bcas pa las/ /'di dag nges par bza' bar bya/ /sangs rgyas
sprul pa'i rgyan rnams spro/ /khams gsum dag ni sgrol bar byed/ /sngags pas sngags kyi mchog de ni/ /ming dang bcas pas lhan cig bzla/ /oM phaT che ge mo b+hak+Sha ya phaT/ k+Sha hUM phaT/
bdag nyid khro bo'i sems kyis ni/ /mAM sa bza' zhing gcer bu dang / /skra grol ro la mnan pa dang / /zhags pa lcags kyu phyag gis 'dzin/ /gsang sngags cho ga bzhin du ni/ /khri
phrag stong du bzla zhing bsgom/ /rnal 'byor cho ga bzhin du ni/ /khams gsum po dag gsod par 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni 'khor bcas pas/ /bza' bar yang ni rnam
par bsam/ /bdag nyid rdo rje khab thogs pa'i/ /khro bo snying du gzhug par bya/ /snying dang sgyu ma rkang dang rus/ /sha dang khrag rnams 'dral byed cing / /mtshams
med lnga rnams byed pa dang / /gdugs pa can rnams bza' bar bya/ /mkha' 'gro lte bar bzhugs nas ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang lhan cig sbyor//
rdo rje blo ldan rab sbyor bas/ /zhag bdun gyis ni phebs par 'gyur/ /bsam gtan byas pa tsam gyis ni/ /gdug pa bdag gis zos par 'gyur/ /nyi ma phyed dang mtshan
phyed dang / /las 'di dag la 'jug par bya/ /gcer bu skra grol byas pa yis/ /gshin rje'i phyogs su kha bltas te/ /khyim bya'i stan gyi sbyor ba yis/ /me yi gsang
sngags bzla bar bya/ /hUM phaT raM raM raM/ mtshams med pa 'dis zhes bya ba/ /raM raM raM hUM phaT/ ji bzhin bzlas pa byas tsam gyis/ /nyin zhag bcu pa dag gis ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin
pa mngon sum pa'ang / /'chi bar yang ni the tshom med/ /gal te sdig can slar log na/ /'di la zhi ba'i las rnams bya/ /gsang sngags bzlas pa ches byas nas/ /'dis
kyang zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /oM swAhA/ a A baM a mu ka pA pa ba'i ra ho b+ha bi Sh+ya ti ta saM/ si pa shin+taM b+ha baM tu/ baM aM a oM swAhA/ 'o ma btung zhing gos dkar gyon/ /zhi
ba'i sems kyis stong nyid gnas/ /dkar po'i dri yis lus byug go /bya rog khyi dang byi la dang / /na ku la yi sha rnams bza'/ /thams cad rab tu gnas gyur te/ /
'di la yid gnyis dpyod pa med/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ khro bo rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i bdag po kha sbyar gnon pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa lnga
pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /srid pa'i nang na skye ba bdun/ /sna tshogs pa shu'i dam tshig ni/ /lha yi gzugs can yid 'phrog pa/ /lha yi gzugs
can gzi brjid dpal/ /ba shu'i nang na rgyal po yin/ /skal bzang yid 'ong bde bar 'gro/ /skra yi myu gu de bzhin ring / /mig ni dkyus ring mig kyang dmar/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma
'dra ba'i gzugs/ /de yi lus la rdul rab 'byung / /lus las lha yi dri 'byung zhing / /kha yi dbugs ni ga pur dri/ /ldan pas sbrang ma rtag tu 'khor/ /gcin dang phyi sa gla rtsi
pro| |tshig ni 'jam par 'gyur ba dang / /lag pa dang ni rkang pa 'jam/ /ut+pal la yi dri dang ldan/ /skra dkar gnyer ma las rnam grol/ /lus kyang snum zhing mnyen pa dang / /snying
dang thod pa lte ba ste/ /des na ro tsa na ru 'gyur/ /grib bdun ngang pa'i 'gros su 'gro/ /snying rje'i bsam pa can yin te/ /dkon mchog gsum la rtag tu dad/ /sbyin dang tshul
khrims dag dang ldan/ /'di 'dra rnal 'byor pas rtogs na/ /mi gsod me yis tshig mi 'gyur/ /srog chags sna tshogs gdug pa dag /gang yang rlung bas za mi nus/ /
de ni mtshan mo mi mthong ste/ /mi snang ba yi dbang phyug mchog /'di 'dra sngags pas rtogs nas ni/ /bdag gis blangs te sbyin pa spyad/ /
dri chen chu dang byang chub sems/ /mkhas pas blangs te ril bu bya/ /lcags gsum gyis ni rnam dkris te/ /blo dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya/ /dbang po gnyis ni rab
sbyar nas/ /nye ba'i snying po lan 'bum bzlas/ /de 'di lag tu byin nas ni/ /sbyin pa 'di las bdag la byin/ /de 'di de ma thag tu yang / /mi bskyod pa yi bya ba rnyed/ /de
ni dben par khyer nas su/ /mnyam par bzhag ste bsgrub par bya/ /gzhan yang las rnams rab bshad bya/ /dngos grub sgrub pa'i mchog dam pa/ /de yi spyi bo'i skra
bcad nas/ /gzhan yang dud 'gro'i spu dang ni/ /de bsgres the gur byas nas su/ /gang gi mgul du bcings byas pas/ /de 'dra ba yi gzugs su 'gyur/ /sna tshogs
gzugs kyang byed pa yin/ /de yi pags pa blangs nas ni/ /de la he ru ka dpal bri/ /mngon sum khro bo'i dngos grub ni/ /he ru ka dpal byed pa yin/ /rkang lag pags pa
glangs nas ni/ /'byung ba'i skra dang bcas bsres nas/ /phyi ma'i ril bur byas nas su| /mngon par bsngags te cho ga bya/ /mkhas pas rgyal gyi nyi ma la/ /lcags
gsum gyi ni rnam dkris nas/ /lag pa g.yon pas de blangs te/ /mthe bong sbas pa'i khu tshur gyis/ /khu tshur de ni mgor bzhag na/ /de ma thag tu rkun ma rengs/ /rang gi
lag gis dpung gnyis blangs/ /rang skra zhags pa blangs nas thogs/ /g.yas pa lcags kyu thogs nas ni/ /the gu lnga yis rnam bar dkri/ /phyogs gar nor gyis gang ba
yi| |de yi phyogs mthong blang bar bya/ /khyim du bkod cing steng 'dug nas/ /sngags bzlas nas ni mkha' la spyod/ /oM dz+waH a bAM ba hUM ba hUM a ba rA na du khe tsa ri dza ri hrIH
swAhA| nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos/ /yid la gang 'dod ci yang rung / /de dag thams cad myur du 'gugs/ /khyim ni gang bar yongs su mthong / /maM sa dag ni zos nas
su| |lha yi lus su gyur pa yin/ /rnal 'byor rdo rje'i lus gyur te/ /des ni shi ba dbang du 'gyur/ /chu ba cho ga bzhin blangs nas/ /skra dang bsres nas de bsgril te/ /the gu cho ga
bzhin du ni/ /bsgril nas zhags pa dag tu bya/ /g.yas brkyang gnas shing khro gnas par/ /gang gi ming gi bzlas brjod kyis/ /zhags pa btab na de ma thag /lha mo
'gugs shing de mdun gnas/ /de yi rus pa'i phye ma yis/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /'di la dkyil 'khor dngos grub ni/ /ci 'dod pa ni de la gnas/ /
gzhan yang rgyun du byas pa dang / /rdo rje mtshan gyis mdzes par bya/ /chu ba dag gis mchod phyir thogs/ /de ru bdar ba'i tsan+dan gyis/ /byug
pa'i brtul zhugs 'dzin pa ni/ /mkha' la spyod par 'gyur ba yin/ /sgrub pa til mar chen po yi/ /mig sman nges par byas nas ni/ /grib ma yang ni mthong mi
'gyur| |rnal 'byor zhag gis bskus na ni/ /mtshan mo'ang nyin par lta bur 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor rkang dag zos nas ni/ /tshim par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ /ji srid gnas
par mi bkres shing / /yid gzhungs dran pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor sngon gyi skye ba dran/ /rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur ba yin/ /sgyu ma phye mar byas nas su/ /mkhas
pas grib ma la yang bskam/ /gang gis mgo la bzhag pa na/ /de ma thag tu dbang du 'gugs/ /sngags pas glo ba zos na ni/ /de ma thag tu nad med 'gyur/ /rkang pa
blangs nas sar bsnun na/ /char gyi rgyun ni 'bebs par byed/ /blo ldan gsang ba blangs nas bskam/ /tsan+dan dmar po dang bsres nas/ /de ni phye mar byas nas su/ /bud
med gang la byin na ni/ /'dod pas gdungs pa'i bu med gang / /dbang du gyur te mang ga gzhug byed/ /pus mo'i rus pa ki la ya/ /sor ni bcu gnyis tshad tsam zhig/
gang gi ming bcas sbas pa yis/ /de yi rigs rgyud med par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ji hwA zos na ni/ /ngag gi dngos grub dag tu 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor hr-i da zos na ni/ /sems ni
thub pa nyid du 'gyur/ /so yi rgyal po bzhi po dag /steng 'og dag ni blangs nas kyang / /bung pa yi ni gshog pa dang / /tshub ma'i 'dab ma rdul dang ni/ /rdul 'dir sgrub pa
byas nas ni/ /rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu rmongs/ /rtswa rnams phye mar byas pa yi/ /bud med thams cad skam par 'gyur/ /rang byung me tog ro tsa na/ /a lag ta dang gur gum gyis/ /thig
le sngags pas sbyar na ni/ /'khor los bsgyur pa'ang dbang du 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor mig 'bras che ba yis/ /pha rol sde ni 'byed par 'gyur/ /nu ma zos pa tsam gyis ni/ /de ma
thag tu 'o ma 'gugs/ /rnal 'byor mtshan ni zos cam gyis/ /bud med sa bon mod la 'gugs/ /rnal 'byor so deng sen mo phyes/ /gang gis gang gis mgo la gtor/ /
grub pa brgyad po 'grub pa yin/ /pha dang bu ni yin na yang / /rnam par sdang bar byas par 'gyur/ /mchu phyer byas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /kha ni gnon par 'gyur ba yin/ /
sna phyer byas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /dbugs ni gnon par 'gyur pa yin/ /rna ba'i sbyor bas 'on par 'gyur/ /mgo bo'i pags pas mngon btags te/ /kha yi drung du mngon
bzlas na/ /lha rnams kun gyi gtso bor 'gyur/ /thod pa yi ni sbyor ba yis/ /rak+ta 'gugs par byed pa yin/ /thod pa kha ni sbub pa yis/ /
gnod par byas pa kho na yin/ /in+d+ra ba ru ro tsa na/ /de gnyis gcig tu bsres byas nas/ /gang la thig le gcig gyur na/ /dbang po'i gnas ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /
ro tsa na dang myang spras dag /lhan cig tu ni byug pa yis/ /thub pa med pa'i stobs 'gyur te/ /pha rol dag ni gnon par 'gyur/ /pu tran dza li ro tsa na/ /lhan cig tu
ni phyer byas nas/ /bud med gang la phyes gtor na/ /de ni 'dod pas myos gyur nas/ /ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du gnas/ /ro tsa na dang pu tras gnyis/ /lhan cig tu ni
bskus pa yis/ /'byung po kun dang 'byung mo rnams/ /ci bgyi zhes ni smra bzhin du/ /de yi drung du 'khod par 'gyur/ /ci 'dod pa dag ster bar 'gyur/ /ro tsa na dang dzi
ban+ti/ /lhan cig tu ni phyer byas te/ /shi ba'i mig dang mig sman sbyar/ /bskal par gnas kyi bar du ni/ /'tsho bar yang ni 'gyur ba yin/ /chu srin lag ni ro tsa na/ /
lhan cig tu ni phyer byas nas/ /nA ga ma do lhan cig tu/ /ril bu dag tu byas nas kyang / /rdo rje gzi brjid dang bsres nas/ /mig gi sman ni byas gyur na/ /nor skyong
gi ni glang po yang / /mngon sum du ni gnas nas kyang / /de la bdag gis zhon na ni/ /glang chen 'khor ni mang po dang / /gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol sde ni
'joms byed cing / /gzhan gyi yul la dbang byed pa'i/ /ci 'dod pa ni ster bar 'gyur/ /brah+ma daN+Ti ro tsa ni/ /lhan cig tu ni sbyor ba yis/ /rig byed rgod pa med par
'gyur| |rma bya'i mkhris pa'i ro tsa na/ /ri bong khrag dang lhan cig tu/ /ril bu dag tu bsgrubs byas nas/ /rma bya'i mjug mas bcings na ni/ /bung ba bzhin du 'phur
'gyur te/ /lha rnams 'gugs pa'i dngos grub cing / /rig pa 'dzin pa 'ongs par 'gyur/ /de yi lan ni 'ga' tsam gyis/ /ji ltar 'dod pa ster bar 'gyur/ /lha yi
gzhal med khang 'phrog cing / /lha yi bu mo'ang 'gugs par 'gyur/ /'dod na dbang du sdod byed cing / /mi 'dod sems can don yang byed/ /mjug ma thur bltas
byas na ni/ /gter rnams kyang ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /blangs pas sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin/ /yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba yin/ /sa 'og gter gyi sgo dag la/ /mjug
ma bskor ba byas na ni/ /sgo dbye bas ni 'jug par bya/ /lha min bu mo lhan cig rol/ /lha yi bcud dang bcud kyis len/ /'phrog cing des ni zos gyur te/ /'dod pa'i lha
yi gzugs su 'gyur/ /grub pa'i rdzas ni blangs pa yis/ /sems can don rnams byed cing 'gro/ /de nas yan lag lnga pa yi/ /cho ga dag
tu 'gyur ba ni/ /spu dang pags pa sha dang ni/ /rus pa rkang pa blangs nas su/ /dri chen chu dang shu kra dang / /mtshal rnams dag ni lhan cig tu/ /ril bu byas ras bsgrub par
bya| |lcags gsum gyis ni rnam dkris nas/ /kha yi nang du sbas na ni/ /nam mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /ro tsa na dang lhan cig tu/ /khams gsum du ni rgyal cher
'gyur| |mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ skye ba bdun pa'i phyugs chen sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad
bya ba| |rang gi chos kyi yig sgom pa/ /rang gi chos kyi yi ger sbyor/ /bdag med chos ni yang dag bsgom/ /rang chos yi ge mchog dga' ba/ /chos kyi sku lus rang
byung yin/ /yi ge he las nges 'byung ba/ /he ru ka ni rnam par bsgom/ /yi ge hi las nges 'byung ba/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnam par bsgom/ /hUM gi ye shes las byung ba/ /rdo
rje hUM mdzad rnam par bsgom/ /hUM gi yi ge las byung ba/ /mi bskyod pa ni rnam par bsgom/ /baM gyi ye shes las bskyed pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom/ /oM b+hUM
aM b+hUM las byung ba/ /sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro rnam par bsgom/ /aM trAM raM swa las byung ba/ /rin chen mkha' 'gro rnam par bsgom/ /hrIM hrIM a las nges 'byung ba/ /pad+ma'i
mkha' 'gro rnam par bsgom/ /khaM ho ho haM las byung ba/ /sna tshogs mkha' 'gro rnam par bsgom/ /DA las mkha' 'gro ma nyid do/ /yaM las rnal 'byor ma de bzhin/ /b+hUM las
lha mo sa la spyod/ /baM las mkha' la spyod pa yin/ /maM las ma mo nyid yin te/ /dpa' ba'i btsun mo snyan grags ma/ /he ni thugs kyi gtso bo ste/ /ru las ngag na byung ba
yin| |ka ni lus kyi rdo rje ste/ /yig gsum las byung he ru ka /maM las 'jam pa'i rdo rje ste/ /saM las kun tu bzang po yin/ /laM las 'jig rten mgon po ste/ /k+ShiM las sa yi
snying po'o/ /baM las phyag na rdo rje ste/ /meM las byams pa nyid yin te/ /khaM las nam mkha'i snying por grags/ /gaM las nam mkha'i mdzod yin no/ /saM las sgrib pa kun
sel ba| |gaM las spos kyi glang po yin/ /dz+nyAM las ye shes rtogs kyang yin/ /aM las blo gros mi bzad pa/ /praM las spobs pa brtsegs pa ste/ /saM las ngan song kun
'dren pa/ /saM las ngan song kun 'joms pa/ /dzaM las dra ba can gyi 'od/ /tsaM las zla ba'i 'od yin te/ /raM las byung ba'i rin chen 'od/ /sUM las nyi ma'i 'od yin no/ /
baM las rdo rje 'od kyang yin/ /maM las mthu chen thob pa ste/ /suM ni su d+ha na yin no/ /b+haM las bzang skyong nyid yin te/ /saM las blo gros rgya
mtsho'o/ /kun tu bzang po 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /'jig rten mgon pos snying po/ /phyag na rdo rje byams pa dang / /nam mkha'i snying po nam mkha' mdzod/ /sgrib pa
rnam par sel ba dang / /spos kyi glang po nyid yin te/ /mi zad pa dang ye shes tog /spobs pa brtsegs pa mchog yin te/ /mya ngan kun 'joms nyid yin no
ngan song kun 'dren nyid dang ni/ /dra ba zla ba rin chen dang / /nyi ma rdo rje 'od mchog ste/ /su d+ha na dang rin chen thob/ /rgya mtsho dang ni bzang skyong ngo / /de dag sngon nyid
grub pa ste/ /phreng ba'i gsang sngags rnam par sbyar/ /de dag dam tshig tu bshad de/ /dngos grub kyi ni grub pa stsol/ /rdo rje pho nya ma nyid dang / /skul byed dang ni
rin chen sgron/ /rdo rje nyi ma de bzhin te/ /ro langs rdo rje gzhon du ma/ /kaM po dzi dang de bzhin te/ /sangs rgyas byang chub ma de bzhin/ /ye shes sgron dang rdor 'jigs
ma| |ye shes sgron dang rgyal byed ma/ /sgrol ma ngang ni gos dkar mo/ /spyan dang mA ma kA ma chog dang / /rgyal mtshan so sor 'brang ma dang / /rma bya dang ni ri khrod
ma| |lu gu rgyud dang phyir zlog ma/ /lha mo gtsug tor rdor 'jigs ma/ /sngon grub pa yi lha mo ste/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad stsol/ /gsal byed ming dang bcas
par ni| |mthar ni hUM phaDa sbyar bar bya/ /tha mar swAhA mnyam par sbyar/ /sngags kyi dngos grub rab tu stsol/ /gshin rje gshed dang rta mchog rgyal/ /bgegs ni gnon
par mdzad pa yin/ /shes rab mthar byed bzhi po ni/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed yin/ /'dod rgyal dbyug sngon stobs pa che/ /brgyad par mi g.yo grags pa ste/ /
khro bo chen po sngon grub pa/ /gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon/ /dkar mo sogs dam tshig lha mo/ /khrag 'thung lha mo brgyad pa yin/ /sngar bshad mkha' 'gro ma
rnams te/ /khro bo brgyad dang gnyis med gnas/ /rtsa ba'i brgyad dang ldan pa'i sngags/ /ming dang yang dag sbyar bar bya/ /gsal byed oM ni kun tu yang / /mthar ni
hUM phaDa swA hAr sbyar/ /gsal byed ming dang hUM dang ni/ /mthar ni phaDa dang swA hAr sbyar/ /gzugs dang sgra yi lha mo dang / /dri dang ro yi lha mo ste/ /'dab ma bzhi la rnam
par sbyar/ /phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ma/ /reg pas reg pa'i rdo rjer grags/ /gnyis su med par yang dag gnas/ /dbus su khrag 'thung rgyal po ni/ /lha mo'i
reg pas bde bar bzhugs/ /snying po chos kyi dbyings su grags/ /shes rab pha rol phyin las byung / /ye shes sems dpa' gnyis
med bzhugs/ /rdo rje chos kyi dbyings ma ste/ /gnyis med mnyam pa'i ye shes ni/ /chos kyi dbyings de mi dmigs pa'o/ /de ni gsang ba de nyid mchog /rdo rje
can ni yang dag stsol/ /che ba'i mchog ni 'dus pa ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /sbyor ba rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs pa/ /bgrod dang bgrod min rnal 'byor
ma| |rig pa'i rgya mtsho mchog yin te/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro nyung zad cig /sgyu 'phrul sdom pa'i rgyud yin no/ /rnal 'byor ma ni 'byung ba'i rgyud/ /gsang ba'i rgya
mtsho rgyud yin te/ /nges brjod rgyud ni bla med pa/ /'dus pa mchog ni bshad pa yin/ /ji ltar bsam pa'i khyad par gyis/ /sems can rjes su gzung pa'i
rgyur| |'dus pa mchog gi dam pa 'di/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'bras bu ste/ /rigs ni rnam pa lnga bshad pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' du ma dag /ji ltar 'dod
pa de ltar ni/ /bdag po nyid du bya ba yin/ /ji ltar ming gi rjes mthun par/ /nges brjod rgyud kyi rim pa dag/ /rdo rje sgrub pa po yis ni/ /nges brjod rgyud kyi las rnams
bya| |yid kyis dogs pa kun spangs te/ /gnyis su med pa'i sgom pa nyid/ /theg pa chen po'i dam pa mchog /dngos grub che dang ldan par 'gro/ /de nas phyag mtshan
mchog bshad bya/ /gzugs dang mdog gi cho ga'i rim/ /yi ge he las nges 'byung ba/ /bdag nyid he ru ka ra bsgom bya/ /sku lus dkar la drag shul che/ /mche ba rnam
gtsigs 'jigs pa ste| |spyan gsum pa la zhal lnga pa/ /phyag drug zhabs ni bzhi pa ste/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /ral ba zla phyed dbu la bcings/ /sna tshogs
rdo rje'i dbu rgyan can/ /phyag rgya drug gis sku lus brgyan/ /stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs/ /mgo bo'i do shal gyis brgyan pa/ /dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /
ljang gu steng zhal sngo ba'o/ /bzhad dang dpa' dang sgeg pa dang / /rngam dang zhi dang drag po ste/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas/ /rdo rje reg pas gnyis med gnas/ /rgyal ba'i
pags pa mchog kyang 'dzin/ /bde ba kun gyi 'bras bu stsol/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /rdo rje mdung ni phyag mchog ste/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis/ /bdud
bzhi po yi zhabs 'og gnon/ /rig pa'i rdo rje ljang ba dang / /dkar ba'i mdangs kyis gzugs can la/ /ljang dang ser dang dmar ba dang / /dkar ba'i g.yon pa'i
zhal gdong ste/ /steng gi zhal gdong sngo la 'jigs/ /skra grol ba ni rnam par myos/ /seng+ge'i rnam grol phyag rgya can/ /byin pa gnyis ni legs
par 'khril/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /spyan gsum shin tu dmar ba ste/ /rdo rje thod par mnyam par ldan/ /dril bu cang te'u yis brgyan/ /mdung dang kha T+wAM
phyag na bsnams/ /chags pa chen po me yi 'od/ /phyogs kyi gos can zhi ba'i nyams/ /gdul dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad cing / /sna tshogs sems can
'dul bar mdzad/ /thugs rje'i nyams ni yongs su rdzogs/ /zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su yang / /sna tshogs pad+ma'i dkyil na bzhugs/ /'jigs byed dang ni dus
mtshan dag /zhabs kyis gnon par rnam par bsgom/ /'khor kun dag ni zhal gsum pa/ /thod par phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /drag cing zhi ba nyid yin te/ /
rigs gsum gyis ni phye ba'i gzugs/ /rigs gsum gyi ni phyag mtshan 'dzin/ /lha mos phye ba'i gzugs can ni/ /dam tshig gnyis su med par sbyor/ /
thams cad yi dwags gdan la bzhugs/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis gnon/ /byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril/ /shes rab thabs ni rnam par
bsgom| |mtshams rnams su ni bum pa dag /thod pa zla ba yongs su gang / /zur rnams su ni sgo srung ste/ /ji ltar mdog gi cha rnams so/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs
kyis bzhugs/ /'jig rten skyong ba zhabs 'og gnon/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /thugs rje khro bas rnam par myos/ /dkar po la sogs mdog sbyor ba/ /ji ltar
g.yas pa'i zhal rim pa zhin/ /phyag rgya rim pa'ang de bzhin no/ /lugs 'byung lugs las ldog par ni/ /'khor sogs mchog kyang dgod par bya/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i
dbus su ni/ /rigs kyi 'khor lo gsum dkyil na/ /rang gi byin rlabs 'chang ba'i mchog /sangs rgyas mu stegs can la sba/ /'di ni rab tu gsang ba ste/ /bla ma'i
ngag la gnas pa yin/ /rnal 'byor ma yi drin yin no/ /gnas la sogs pa'i rim sbyor ba/ /sum cu rtsa bdun rnam dag dgod/ /shes rab thabs bdag 'gro ba yin/ /
sa bcu pa yi mchog kyang 'gugs/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas/ /sbyor ba gsum gyi rnam dag don/ /'di ni dri mad sgom pa mchog /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i
bla ma las/ bdag nyid chos kyi yi ge las bskyed pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgom pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas mchog tu bshad bya ba/ /
bdag nyid cho ga'i sgom pa'i rim/ /mA ma kI dang spyan dang ni/ /lha mo sgrol ma gos dkar mo/ /'od zer can dang dzaM b+ha la/ /lha mo skul byed sa 'dzin ma/ /rang
gi sa bon las byung ba/ /phyag bcu gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan/ /spyan gsum pa la g.yas brkyang bzhugs/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung gis
gnas/ /rig byed bzhi yi zhal gdong ste/ /phyogs kyi gos can ro yi gdan/ /skra grol ba la 'jigs pa ste/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /khro bas lta zhing thugs
rje'i nyams/ /shes rab pha rol phyin lha mo/ /de nyid ye shes mchog las byung / /so so yang dag sbyor ba'i bdag/ de nyid ye shes gdon mi za/ /khro bo sna tshogs
gzugs can ni/ /dpa' bo rang nyid las byung ba/ /khro mchog mkha' 'gro 'byung ba yang / /gos pa med par nyams pa yi/ /bdag po nyid du sbyar bar bya/ /bdag nyid
sgom pa nyid yin no/ /mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba yis/ /sgom zhing rnam par bsgom par bya/ /phra ba'i khro bo'i rdo rje can/ /snying ga'i pad+ma'i dbus su ni/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro
thugs brtse can| |'di nyid du ni gnas mdzod cing / /rdzogs sangs rgyas kun byang chub sems/ /'gro ba gsum po 'di lag gnas/ /'di nyid kyis mchod pa nyid kyis/ /mchod 'os
thams cad mchod pa yin/ /gang zhig 'di la rtag lta ba/ /de ni rgyal bas mchod par bzhed/ /nang gi sbyor ba rdo rje yis/ /rnal 'byor rdo rje can du 'dod/ /de bas rdo rje mchod
pa yis| |yid 'dod rnams kyi lus la 'dod/ /mchog pa lnga yi sbyor ba yis/ /myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob par/ /gang 'di rgyud las gsungs pa dag /de ni pha rol gzhan
du 'dod/ /dngos med bzhi la dgod pa yis/ /lha yi gzugs su sgom pa yi/ /mnyam nyid mchod pa chen po ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /sngags dang de nyid
bstan pa yi/ /bstan pa tsam du legs 'byung ba'i/ /rgyud ni don dam ma yin te/ /don dam yang dag skyes pa na/ /ston pa med cing bstan pa'ang med/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir
phye ba yi| |gnas sogs 'di nyid la gnas te/ /de bas de ru 'khor ba nyid/ /skyo bya de nyid can gyis min/ /gal te de nyid med gyur na/ /de yi 'khrul pas ci zhig bya/ /
'on te de nyid ldan gyur na/ /de la 'khrul pa ci zhig yod/ /gnas dang nye ba'i gnas mchog rnams/ /bstan pas dri ma med par 'gyur/ /yang na mi nus bag
med pa'i/ /mi yi gnas ni bsgrag par bya/ /nga yis 'di ltar bshad pa ni/ /sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis te/ /bsam gtan las gzhan bde med phyir/ /de
bas bsam gtan mchog gzhol bya/ /rnal 'byor pa ni phyi rol 'khor/ /de yi khams rnams zad par 'gyur/ /de bas phyi rol spangs nas
ni| |rnal 'byor rol pas gnas par bya/ /dpal ldan rdo rje rnal 'byor can/ /rnam dag ye shes spyan gyis ni/ /thugs rje thugs gdungs ring po nas/ /rdo rje rnal
'byor can dag gzigs/ /de rnams dgyes pas dngos grub mchog /ci 'dod par ni stsol bar 'gyur/ /des ni rje btsun ye shes kyang / /rab tu 'bad de bsgrub
par bya/ /sna tshogs spyod pa yang dag ldan/ /spyod dang brtul zhugs spyad pa yi/ /spyod dang brtul zhugs 'dir spongs la/ /de nyid brtul zhugs la dgar bya/ /
gang yang rung ba'i zas gnas pa/ /rnam pa des byas brtul zhugs can/ /bsam gtan zas mchog gzhol 'gyur bas/ /smyon pa'i spyod pas gnas par gyis/ /
gcer bu'am yang na gcer bu min/ /gang rung ji lta de ltar 'gyur/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lha dmigs la/ /de nyid gcig pu rnam par bsam/ /skugs pa'i dngos
por gyur pa yis/ /zla drug tsam gyis nges par ni/ /rnal 'byor can gyis nyer bsten na/ /rnal 'byor chen mo 'di gsal 'gyur/ /ye shes sgron ma'i mchog
mthong na/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams legs 'dus te/ /pad+ma'i 'byung gnas nyams dga' bar/ /dang pa'i tshogs 'dus ji bzhin no/ /mig 'phrul mkhan ltar 'jig rten
du| |'gro kun don ni byed pa 'o/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin par ni/ /mngon 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /spyod pa 'di la nges par ni/ /ji skad bshad pa der 'gyur bar/ /
sems ni dag par gyis shig ces/ /sems can rnams la bdag gsol 'debs/ /gang gis rmad byung snying rjer ldan/ /gang gis gsung ba de nyid 'gyur/ /rdo
rje drag po'i sbyor ba yis/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni snying gar dgod/ /snying gar rdo rje lcags kyur sbyor/ /thugs kyi rdo rjes nang sbyar te/ /gzhan yang rdo rje dgod bya ba/ /
chos kyi dbyings su rnam par brtag /rang gis nam mkhar sbyor nas su/ /gzi brjid gzugs ni 'dzin par bsgom /rang gi chos kyi yid dgod pa/ /rang drod rang
bzhin dri ma med/ /rang gi sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rang gi chos kyi yi ge bsgom/ /ji lta ji ltar rtogs pa yi/ /gzhan nyid gzugs kyi sgom pa la/ /yid kyi
gti mug grub pa yi/ /dbang po gzhan na bsgom par bya/ /ji lta ji ltar mos pa yis/ /gzhan nyid gzugs la blta bar bya/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i
bla ma las/ bdag 'dul ba'i mchod pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i ye shes gsang ba 'di gsungs so/ /rang bzhin bdag med chos rnams ni/ /nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med/ /stong nyid ye shes
rdo rje yis/ /stong nyid rtag tu bsgom par bya/ /legs so bya ba rnams byin nas/ /rgyud skyes pa yi sbyor ba las/ /legs so legs so ye shes che/ /nges par
brjod pa mchog gi mchog /legs so rdo rje tshul drag po/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bka' drin rab/ /legs so gnyis med sbyor ba ni/ /mchog dang mchog
ni grub pa la/ /legs so zhes bya nges par sbyor/ /'dod pa med pa'i sgom pa ni/ /legs so thams cad 'gro ba'i mgon/ /theg pa chen po bstan pa 'di/ /
gnyis med ye shes mchog dang ni/ /man ngag thob pa'i dang po ste/ /legs so rdo rje bla ma kun/ /de la bstan pa rnal 'byor ma/ /legs so 'khor gyi
dkyil 'khor la/ /dngos grub bla na med pa byin/ /rdzogs te cang mi gsung bar gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas de skad ces bka'
stsal nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i rdo rje rnams nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla na med pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i sdom pa bcom ldan 'das kyis
gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma zhes bya ba gsang ba'i yang gsang ba bde mchog rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po the tshom med
par de kho na sgom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa dgu pa'o// //mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gsang ba las gsang ba'i bde
mchog gi rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po dge
slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ phyis paN+Di ta chen po dz+nyA na shrI dang / lo tsA ba khyung po chos kyi brtson 'grus kyis kyang zhus pa'o/ /phyis
paN+Di ta A nan+da dang / lo chung gis chad lhag rnams bsabs nas zhus dag byas nas legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar
skad du/ shrI badzra DA ka nA ma ma hA tan+t+ra rA dzA/ bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i
mchog /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /lhag pa yi ni lha gcig nyid/ /'byung gnas
sgra tshul nges 'byung rnams/ /dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul yin/ /'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba/ /thog ma dbus mthar yang dag gnas/ /'dod chags ma yin
chags bral min/ /dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so/ /bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya/ /'di ni gnyis med ye shes mchog /rnyed dang bde ba kun mos pas/ /ngan par spyod
pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur/ /nam mkha' kun tu rgyu grub pas| /mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags/ /sna tshogs kun tu phyag rgya ni/ /sna tshogs kun gyi sdom pa yis/ /
mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes byar grub/ /de nyid med sems rnal 'byor ba/ /lha la dmigs par byed pa dang / /kun tu gzugs brnyan
yid kyis ni/ /lugs sogs rnal 'byor skye ba min/ /byang chub sems chen rnal 'byor gang / /rnal 'byor dbang phyug rang nyid gtso/ /byang chub sems 'di rdo rje
ste| |sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin no/ /'gro pa'i rtsal lag rang bzhin gyis/ /sna tshogs g.yogs te rnam bzhugs pas/ /de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /sna tshogs tshul
gyis mchod par bya/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /dpa' bo thams cad bdag yin te/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag nyid rab tu bsgrub par bya/ /'di
yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /dpa' bo thams cad nyid dang ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du/ /tshe 'di nyid du 'grub 'gyur zhes/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor
ba'i| |rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /dpal ldan bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid
de| |nam mkha' la ni mtshan nyid med/ /khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa'i/ /'gro kun sgyu ma sta bu yin/ /brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yi/ /'gro ba dmigs su med pa ste/ /mthong
ba dang ni reg pa'i dngos/ /thams cad sgyu ma ji bzhin no/ /gang gis blun po 'ching 'gyur ba/ /'dir des mkhas rnams rnam par grol/ /phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /sa
gsum ma lus bza' bar bya/ /gzhan du gal te sbyor ba ni/ /ma tshang mar me lta bur 'da'/ /gzugs ni sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad/ /tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma yin/ /'du shes
pad+ma gar dbang ste/ /'du byed rdo rje rgyal po yin/ /rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /'di dag dngos kun rang bzhin no/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro
zhes byar grags/ /yang dag chen po gcig pa'i lha/ /bde ba thams cad rab ster ba/ /sgyu ma chen po'i rang bzhin gyis/ /chags bral chags pa zhes byar bshad/ /
sa khams ltung byed ma yin te/ /de bzhin chu khams gsod ma'o/ /me khams 'gugs byed ma yin te/ /de bzhin rlung ni gar dbang ngo / /nam mkha'i khams ni sgyu ma
che| |rang nyid 'gro ma zhes byar bshad/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni 'bar ba'i mchog /'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin gyis/ /de ni rdo rje
gtso mor gnas/ /mig gnyis gti mug rdo rjer bshad/ /nyan pa zhe sdang rdo rjer brjod/ /sna ni ser sna rdo rje ste/ kha ni 'dod chags rdo rjer gsungs/ /lus ni phrag dog
rdo rje ste| |skye mched thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /gzugs 'di thams cad stong pa nyid/ /stong pa'i tshul gyis mig gis ni/ /dogs
pa med par sgom pa'i mchog /rnam par mi rtog pa yis blta/ /nam mkha'i tshul gyi sems kyis ni/ /der ni thams cad nam mkha'i dngos/ /dgos pa med pa'i
sgom par ldan/ /rnam par mi rtog skye 'gyur zhes/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thogs pa med cing gdon mi za ba bde ba chen po'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces
gsungs so/ /ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i bar/ /de srid sems can mtshungs med de na/ /mya ngan mi 'da' bar ni mdzad/ /de ltar
sems can dam pa rnams/ /srid pa'i zhags pas 'jigs med par/ /mi skyo bar ni brtson 'grus kyis/ /rtag tu sems can don rnams mdzad/ /nam mkha'i gnas kyi
mthas thug par/ /smon lam rnam par spyod byed cing / /sems can don brtson sems kyis ni/ /dpa' bo srid pa sbyong bar mdzad/ /rtag tu 'dod pas myos pa yi/ /lha yi
bu 'di rnams dang ni/ /gzhan yang skye bo chags can phyir/ /'dod chags thams cad dag par mdzad/ /bde chen shin tu grub bya'i phyir/ /rtog pa rgyas par sbyin pa dang / /
thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /rtog pa thams cad dang por bshad/ /'das pa'i dus na sngo na byung ba/ /rtog pa dang po bde ba che/ /der ni rdo rje sems chen gyi/ /lhag pa yi ni lha
gcig bzhugs/ /'jig rten khams rnams mtha' yas kyi/ /sems can kun don 'byung ba'i phyir/ /glu dang rol mo sogs pa'i gar/ /srid pa
kun gyi gtso bor gyur/ /sems can thams cad 'byung ba yi/ /dga' ba yang dag bsdus pa dang / /de nas sems can skye 'gyur ba'i/ /'dod pa'i chags pa rnam spangs te/ /
des 'dul bar ni mkhyen nas su/ /yi ge las byung rnam spangs shing / /nam mkha'i lta bur bdag med par/ /dag pa nyid du de nas so na/ /de nas sems can sangs
rgyas kyi| |bla med don ni nus med pa'i/ /stong pa nyid la rtag bzhugs pas/ /'gro kun stong pas bcom nas ni/ /thams cad dmyal bar ltung mthong ste/ /slar yang bdag
dang gzhan don la/ /mos pas gus pa nyid du gyur/ /de nas 'jig rten khams kun na/ /bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun bsdus te/ /myur ba nyid du bdag la bskul/ /oM
ma hA su kha badzra satwa dzaHhUM baM hoHsu ra ta staM/ 'ongs ni bskul ba tsam gyis kyang / /dag pa'i bde ba kun ster ba/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed cing / /'gro kun bde ba bskyed
par gyur/ /nga ni 'dod pa'i gzugs kyi mchog /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa/ /nga nyid chos kyi sku yi mchog /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag po yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyor
'phrog cing / /sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung snyan pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal
po che| |rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag /'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi gtso/ /rin chen 'dzin pa kun gyi dbang / /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas kun dang
mnyam par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pas na/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes byar 'grub/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ /de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad
bri| |de yi dbus su tshul bzhin du/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gzhag par bya/ /zla ba'i mdog can 'dzum dang bcas/ /'od zer dmar po 'khrugs pa las/ /sangs rgyas phreng
bas mdzes pa ste/ /rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par klubs/ /zhal bzhi phyag bzhi spyan gsum dang / /ral ba'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan cing / /lha mo bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /
sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nye bar brgyan/ /rtsa zhal zhi zhing g.yas dkar min/ /de bzhin gzhan yang g.yon pa dmar/ /rgyab zhal ser po gser bsregs 'dra/ /thod pa
la bzhugs gar dang ldan/ /sum cu gsum pa 'jigs par mdzad/ /rdo rje dang ni ral gri dang / /dril bu thod pa bsnams pa nyid/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor los gang / /
skyob pa sna tshogs bri bar bya/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde mchog ces/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs
bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo dang / /de bzhin nye du mo rnams ni/ /dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pas/ /'dod pa'i sbyor bas chags par
bya| |ba lang sha dang rta sha sogs/ /dogs pa med par bza' bar bya/ /'jig rten la rtag g.yon la spyod/ /brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yis/ /'gro kun g.yon las
byung bas ni/ /g.yon gyis bza' zhing g.yon mchod bya/ /pho nya ma gtogs gzhan rnams la/ /'dod la rmongs pas bgrod mi bya/ /pho nya mo rtag zhen thar par/ /'gyur ba
nyid du the tshom med/ /sgrub pos mchog tu 'bad byas te/ /brtul zhugs min spangs brtul zhugs rdzogs/ /dam tshig rigs la spyod pa dang / /tsa ru'i bza' ba lhan
cig bya| |rigs lnga la ni kun spyod par/ /rigs gcig nyid du brtag par bya/ /sbrang rtsi khrag dang ga bur bcas/ /tsan+dan dmar po sbyar byas la/ /rdo rje chu dang bsres
pa ni| |dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed pa'i/ /de dag bdud rtsi lngar ni 'gyur/ /mthe bo srin lag sbyar ba yis/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu bza'/ /zhi ba'i btung ba
bzhin myangs na/ /dengs grub rtag pa thob par 'gyur/ /'di dag dam tshig dam ba ste/ /mdzes ma'i gdong can khyod la bshad/ /las rnams kun la thabs bcas shing / /
dogs pa med par gang spyod dang / /rnam par mi rtog sgom pa ni/ /brtul zhugs rnams kyi mchog gi mchog /las rnams kun la kun tu ni/ /rnam par mi rtog sgom byed
cing / /dogs pa med par kun tu spyod/ /de ni dka' thub rnams kyi mchog /the tshom med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /skra zla la sogs rjes dngos kyi/ /yul rnams ma lus sten
byed pa'i/ /dka' thub shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o/ /gang yang las rnams thams cad la/ /shes rab dang ni sbyar byas te/ /de yang stong pa'i gnas su sbyar/ /de 'dir
bdag chen dka' thub yin/ /rnam par mi rtog sems kyis ni/ /shes rab dang ni mtshungs gzugs la/ /dogs med spyod pa'i kun spyod pa/ /de ni bdag chen dka'
thub yin/ /shes rab thabs ni ma gtogs par/ /gang tshe byams gzhan mi g.yo na/ /de tshe byang chub chen po ni/ /nges par ster ba nyid du bshad/ /rnam par mi rtog rjes
'jug la/ /rnal 'byor pa ni mngon par brtson/ /de ni thams cad 'byung ba yi/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa yin/ /gang tshe 'dus byas tshul rnams ni/ /rnam par mi rtog sems
kyis su/ /me long lta bur rab shes pa/ /de ni shes rab bsten pa yin/ /glog dang chu bur ltar smin pa/ /gang tshe 'dus byas tshul rnams ni/ /
gang gis ji ltar mthong 'gyur ba/ /de ni shes rab bsten pa yin/ /me long nang gi gzugs brnyan dang / /rmi lam sgyu ma dri za'i grol/ /mig 'phrul mtshungs par gang
gis mthong / /de ni gtso bo yin par brjod/ /de ni gang du'ang mngon zhen dang / /gang du'ang gnas pa yod ma yin/ /de ltar yang dag 'byung mod kyi/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i
dngos dag ni/ /longs spyod khyad 'phags skye 'gyur ba/ /bde ba yongs su 'gyur bzhin pas/ /'bras bu khyad 'phags thob 'gyur par/ /ci yi phyir na 'dod mi bya//
brtan g.yo'i dngos po yod min te/ /'on kyang snang ba tsam mtshan nyid/ /sgom pa khyad par can gang zhig /goms pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pa na/ /yid 'od bde
ba'i 'bras bu ni/ /bla med gsal ba'i blo yi mthu/ /'bras bu don gnyer rgyu bsgrubs na/ /der ni lha mo su zhig 'gog /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /kun tu
'gro ba mchod par bya/ /dka' thub sdom pa mi bzad pas/ /lus ni bskams shing sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal gyis ni sems g.yengs na/ /g.yengs pas
dngos grub gzhan du 'gyur/ /lus dang sems ni brtan gyur na/ /bde ba thams cad brtan par 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal gyis ni g.yo gyur pas/ /shin tu 'gog par 'gro bar
'gyur| |des na lus dang ngag sems rnams/ /brtan par byas nas byang chub thob/ /gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang / /dmyal bar nges par sreg 'gyur zhes/ /mkha' 'gro
kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dang de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal rdo rje
mkha' 'gro las/ /de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa'i yul la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi rim par phye ba dang po'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la btsun mo
rnams kyis slar yang mchod cing phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ snying po gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa 'bral
pa'i lha la sogs pa'i gdug pa can rnams dang / skye bo gdug pa can gzhan dag kyang gdul ba dang / 'joms pa dang / zhum par byed pa dang / ltung ba dang / zhi bar byas
te byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur ba'i snying po sdang ba thams cad rab tu 'joms pa lhas bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos glur blangs te 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /dang bor rnam par snang
mdzad gnas/ /der ni sde mtshan rnams kyi mtha'/ /ta dang po yi d+ha b+ha'i mtha'/ /dbyangs kyi gsum pas spyir brgyan pa'i/ /sa yi mtha' ni rang gis blta/ /la sa'i
dbus kyi stan bzhugs pa'i/ /sa yi mtha' ni sbyar bar bya/ /mda' gnyis kyis ni rnam par sbyangs/ /a stan gnas pa sa yi mtha'/ /slar yang sa mtha' mda' lnga stan
zla ba'i dum bu thig les brgyan/ /la sa'i dbus gnas sa bon ni/ /mda' bcu yis ni yongs su sbyangs/ /sha dang sa yi dbus gnas la/ /zhal gsum gyis ni
brgyan pa dang / /rlung gi phyogs gnas sa bon la/ /ru ta yis ni rnam par brgyan/ /hUM hUM ha ni bzung nas su/ /dbyangs kyi dgu pas yang dag dgang / /phaT ces bya ba
dgod par bya/ /lhag ma ha yi rkang pa dgang / /lnga pa'i dbus gnas de nyid de/ /de la ha dzo zhes bya'o/ /ra stan la gnas sa yi mtha'/ /i zhes bya ba'i mda' dang
sbyor/ /slar yang pa zhes bya ba'i mtha'/ /mda' ni gsar pas yongs su sbyangs/ /sa mtha' der ni ra yig zhon/ /e zhes bya ba'i snang ba'i rgyan/ /i dbyangs
zla dum thig les brgyan/ /yi ge ra zhon sa yi mtha'/ /slar yang sa mthar sgra lngar ldan/ /zla dum thig les cod pan brgyan/ /slar yang de nyid mgon po bzla/ /rin chen mtha' ma
phaT kyis brgyan/ /rnam par snang mdzad sna tshogs kyis/ /tshig rnams kun la dgang bya zhes/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /
dpa' bo drug dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i nyi dkyil la/ /der ni hUM las byung ba yi/ /las kyi rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /hUM
gi de nyid rnam sgom pa'o/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba las/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs spro ba'o/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa'i/ /sku mdog da mar mo drag
chen mo/ /mdung gi dbyibs can 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /spyan dmar kham skra gyen du brdzes/ /lang tsho phun sum tshogs par ldan/ /stag gi pags pa'i na bza'
can| |ljags 'dril bas ni cher 'jigs te/ /'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par mdzad/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro rab grags zhes/ /rdo rje
sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /sngon bsags las ni mthar byed pa/ /me dang bcas te lan gnyis bzla/ /ku ru ku ru sems
dpa' bral/ /ral pa gya gyu ban+d+ha gsal/ /de ni slar yang bzla bar bya/ /'jig rten gzugs dang bral ba yi/ /trA sa ya zhes bya ste rdzun/ /dam pa de ni
lan gnyis bzla/ /k+Sha zhes bya ba o sgrar ldan/ /glo na b+ha ya yang dag gnas/ /de yang slar ni bzla bar bya/ /sa yi mtha' ni nyi stan gnas/ /mda' bcu zla dum thig
les dgang / /de yang slar ni brjod par bya/ /'od byed sbyangs pa'i sa yi mtha'/ /gshegs su gsol ba glo na gnas/ /nyis 'gyur du ni bya ba yin/ /zla zhon thig gsal
phe zhes bya/ /de yang slar ni bzla bar bya/ /phaT ces bya ba bsgyings te bsgrags/ /rnam par rtog pa kun gyi shing / /da ha da ha mkha' 'gro'i sdom/ /lnga sde'i thog ma

gnyis dang ldan/ /sde gtso de ni slar bzla bya/ /b+ha k+Sha b+ha k+Sha zhes bya dang / /pa sa ru d+hi ra an+t+ra/ /mA lA ba laM bi ne dang / /gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na sap+ta ste/ /pA tA la ga ta b+hu dzaM ga /sarbaM
bA tardza ya nyis 'gyur bya/ /A dang ka yi yi ge dang / /gsum pa yi ni gsum par sbyar/ /bzhi pa dang ni rlung la gnas/ /lan gnyis su ni bzla bar bya/ /sa yi
mtha' ni nyi mar gnas/ /yi ge bzhi pas dgang bar bya/ /slar yang de ni lan gnyis bzla/ /lnga sde mtha' yi stan bzhugs pa/ /ka Sha a dang thig ler ldan/ /
sa bon de ni gnyis bzla bya/ /sa mtha' mda' gnyis dang ldan pa/ /slar yang sa mtha' mda' gsum sbyar/ /de bzhin sa mtha' mda' lnga'i stan/ /de kun zla ba'i dum
bu dang / /thig le yis ni cod pan brgyan/ /de dag yang yang bsgyur bar bya/ /ka sa tsa dang d+ha rnams ni/ /i sgra yi ni mchog gis bzung / /li yi mtha' ni re rer sbyar/ /
de dag kyang ni yang yang bsgyur/ /u sgra la zhon sa yi mtha'/ /slar yang zla dum thig les sbyangs/ /phaT ces bya ba'i rin chen sgrub/ /cha dang cha min sna tshogs pa'i//
me tog mang pos yang dag zin/ /de dag lha mo sgyu ma che/ /dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'o/ /'di ni gsungs pa tsam gyis kyang / /'jig rten khams kun g.yos
gyur cing / /de bzhin gshegs pa kun skrag nas/ /slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /byang chub tu ni mngon sangs rgyas/ /ri bo thams cad 'dar zhing gas/ /ma mo'i
tshogs dang 'byung po'i tshogs/ /gdon dang rims dang dbyig dug dang / /gnod sbyin srin po log 'dren sogs/ /sdang ba thams cad btul zhing bcom/ /zhi 'gyur bkug
ste dkyil 'khor gyi/ /dbus su bcug ste dam tshig gis/ /bcings nas kyang ni dbang du mdzad/ /dmyal ba pa yi sdig pa kun/ /dral te nges bcom bsnyil lo zhes/ /mkha'
'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/
gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /sgo skyong dang ni yang dag ldan/ /de dbus pad+ma bri bya ba/ /'od zer dmar chen gsal ba'i mdangs/ /phyi rol ri mo zlum por bskor/ /de yi dbus
su bcom ldan 'das/ /khro bo chen po zhal bzhis brgyan/ /zhal ni mche ba cung zad gtsigs/ /khro dang bcas shing bzhad pa'i zhal/ /g.yas pa dkar zhing zhi ba ste/ /
g.yon pa dmar po cher 'jigs pa/ /rgyab ni 'od zer ser po'i mdog /phyag bzhi yis ni brgyan pa ste/ /dpa' bo g.yon na kha T+wAM dang / /de bzhin du ni thod pa bsnams//
g.yas na 'bar ba'i rdo rje dang / /khyad par du ni gshor gyis brgyan/ /rig pa bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nye bar brgyan/ /dpa' bo'i shes rab
dga' mdzes ma/ /mda' dang gzhu ni bsnams pa ste/ /sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba'i dngos/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po can/ /dur khrod me ltar gsang mtho
zhing / /'jig pa yi ni dus ltar drag /me ltar 'bar ba'i skra la ni/ /thod pa yi ni dbu rgyan bcings/ /ro langs dang ni lhan cig rol/ /he ru ka yi gar gyis spyod/ /ma mo'i
grong khyer nyams dga' bar/ /sa yi dbang phyug rol par mdzad/ /thams cad du ni thams cad kyis/ /kun tu thams cad kun bdag nyid/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /rdo
rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /bsam gtan bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'grub 'gyur 'di ni the tshom med/ /dus bzhi ru ni rab sbyor bas/ /bde mchog bla ma sgom byas te/ /rdo rje
chen po 'bum bzlas na/ /khro bo'i rgyal po mtshungs par 'gyur/ /rdo rje tshe 'dzin tshe dang ni/ /mdog dang na so stobs dang rtsal/ /dngos grub rdzu 'phrul chen por ldan/ /mi zad 'gro
don byed mthur ldan/ /yang na ma bsgrubs par yang sngags pas lan gcig bzlas pas las brgya tham pa byed par 'gyur ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu ba thams cad nges par
gnon pa dang / ltung ba dang / bskyod pa dang / skrag pa dang / rgya gdab pa dang / rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / zlog pa dang / rmongs pa dang / bcing ba dang / dgas pa dang / gtor
ba dang / brlag par bya ba dang / smyo bar bya ba dang / gtub pa dang / spyug pa dang / dbye ba dang / rmeg med par bya ba dang / nor dbrog pa dang / bsdu ba dang / lkugs pa dang / bcing ba dang /
bdag nyid brdung ba dang / gsod du gzhug pa dang / long bar bya ba dang / sa bon brlag par bya ba dang / rims dang / dug dang / dbyig dug gis gzung ba dang / sa g.yo ba dang / dmyal
bar btang ba dang / byol song gi mngal du spo ba dang / skyes pa bud med du bya ba dang / mngal na gnas pa dbyung ba dang / chu bsgag pa dang / ma ning du bya ba
dang / 'dod pa'i chags pa bskyed pa dang / gsad pa dang / gzhan gyis gsod du gzhug pa dang / mtshon bcing ba dang / byas pa chud gsan pa dang / gcer bur bya ba dang /
b+ha ga dang / bshad pa'i lcags sgrogs dang / b+ha ga dang / bshad pa'i smra ba dang / rgod du gzhug pa dang / khrag dang khu ba dbab pa'i nad dang / gzhom pa dang / khrag dang
mdze la sogs pa'i nad bskyed pa dang / mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal dang / btags pa dang / bcing ba rnams dang / dum bu dum bur bya ba dang / lus thams cad phye mar
bya ba dang / gzer ba dang / thams cad tshogs pa dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bskyod pa dang / gar dang / glu dang / rgod du gzhug pa dang / mang du smrar
gzhug pa dang / ltas ngan bstan pa dang / thob pa dang / dbang du bya ba'i las thams cad la sbyar ba dang / bkol ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang
log 'dren dang / 'dul byed dang / 'byung po dang / ma mo dang / mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa thams cad gdul ba dang / mchog sbyin dang / sa dang / chu dang / me
dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i las bya ba dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po las rgyal ba dang / chags pa thams
cad gzhom pa dang / rims dang / dug dang / dbyig dug dang / mkha' 'gro ma las dgrol ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba
dgas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i skyo ba bsal ba'o/ /las rnams thams cad sgrub byed par/ /'di ni lha mo bshad pa yin/ /sngags kyi
rgyal po 'di nyid ni/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhes/ /sgyu ma kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab grags pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/
bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ /las thams cad kyi cho ga las sgyu ma chen pos rnam par 'phrul ba'i
sngags kyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba/ /mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par min/ /sgyu ma kun gyis mnyam sbyor bas/ /las
rnams thams cad rnam 'phrul ba/ /sgyu ma kun gyi rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /dbang phyug thams cad rab sgrub cing / /'byung po gdon gyi rig pa che/ /gang gis sdud cing spro byed pa'o/ /hi ma ban+d+ha
