kyi| |sgyu ma zhes byar grags pa ste/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid gang gnas pa'o/ /'di ni kun mkhyen zhes bya ste/ kun tu 'gro ba mi shigs pa'o/ /
pad+ma yi ni sna rtse ru/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu kun bsgom bya/ /phyi rol yi ge spangs nas su/ /yid kyi bzlas dang ldan par bya/ /nges pa'i go 'phang rtag tu gnas/ /brtan pa chos dbyings rang bzhin no/ /
rtag tu phra brdul dang bral/ /ye shes sku ste dru ma med/ /gsal ba chos kyi rang bzhin shes/ mya ngan 'das pa 'ba' zhig yul/ /phan tshun mdud pa gsang sngags ni/ /bye brag tu ni
phye nas su/ /sa bon phreng ba de nas bsgom/ /hUM gi skud pas brgyu bar bya/ bsgrub bya 'gog par 'gyur na ni/ /gom pa gnyis kyang mi 'gro'o/ /'di ye shes rab lhan skyes te/ /
de yi gzugs su gyur pas gnas/ /las kyi rlung gis bskyod nas su/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di nas 'bar/ /sgyu ma chen po zhes byar bshad/
las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /skra rtse brgyar gyur pa yi cha/ skad cig glog gi 'od zer can/ /lha yi rnal 'byor dus su ni/ /ba sbu rnams kyi bu ga gnas/ /phyogs
bcu rnams su spros nas ni/ /lha dang lha min kun bsdigs te/ /snying ga'i chos kyi 'khor lo ni/ /bsregs te longs spyod 'khor lor song / /sna bug g.yas nas byung nas ni/ /
slar yang zhugs te smin mtshams kyi/ /mdzod spu'i khung nas byung nas su/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi/ /sna sgo
g.yon du zhugs nas ni/ /spyi bo'i 'khor lo bsregs nas su/ /sngon gyi lam nas slar byung ste/ /slar yang spyi gtsug tu ni zhugs/ /bsregs par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /
dga' ba bskyed nas lte ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor du ni song gyur nas/ /sngon bzhin du ni gnas par gyur/ /dus min 'chi ba las rgyal nyid/ /yan lag kha T+wAM ga dang sbyar/ /thod pa'i
mchod yon snod du ni/ /zhal du mchod yon nges sbyar zhes/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs/ /
bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las /sku gsum dang / sngags dang / rgyud kyi 'byung ba dang / 'chi ba blu ba zhes bya ba'i rim par
phye ba ste bco lnga pa'o// //de nas dngos grub kun gyi gnas/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa ste/ /yid 'ong bcud ni kun gyi rtan/ /sems can kun la bde ster ba/ /'dod pa'i
yon tan lnga yis brgyas/ /bla re dam pa bres pas 'bar/ /'dab stong ldan pa'i pad+ma che/ /sbyor ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa la/ /der ni lha mos zhus gyur pa/ /'khor lo kun gyi nges pa dang
dbyangs rnams kyi ni bye brag dang / /yi ge dbye ba mi 'tshal te/ /'khor lo'i grangs ni ji lta bu/ /de rnams las ni ci zhig lags/ /sna tshogs glu yi sngags dang ni/ /'khrul 'khor dag
ni mdor bsdus dang / /'khor lo'i dbang phyug dus dang ni/ /de bzhin dpa' bo rnams kyis bstan/ /'di dag la ni the tshom mchis/ /bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyud rnams kun tu spas pa gang / /de dag thams cad zhu 'dod pa/ /legs so legs so lha mo che/ blo gros chen mo legs so legs/ /
mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad kyang / /the tshom skye na gzhan ci smos/ /sgyu ma kun tu rnam 'phrul ba/ /nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che/ /gang zhig bris pa tsam gyis ni/ /sgrub po
dngos sgrub thob 'gyur ba/ /mdor bsdus nas ni brjod bya ste/ /de ni bdag gis bshad kyi nyon/ /nag dang dmar par rtag gyur nas/ /khyad par du ni
gtor ma sbyin/ /tsa ru'i bza' ba lhan cig bya/ /sgrub pa po yis g.yon nas bskor/ /'di yis sgrub po kun la ni/ /ma mo dga' 'gyur the tshom med/ /de nas mkha' 'gro ma
rnams ni/ /sa rnams la ni rnam rol ba/ brtson chen 'khor los sgyur ma dang / /stobs chen ma dang rab dpa' mo/ /'khor lo'i go cha glang sna ma/ /khaN+Da ro ha 'khor lo'i shugs/ /
bya gdong ma dang rta rna mo/ /shin tu bzang mo sngo bsangs mo/ /chang 'thung ma dang rlung shugs ma/ /de bzhin 'jigs byed chen mo dang / /sa srung ma dang ljon grib ma/ /lang+ga'i bdag mo
mi'u thung mo/ /dpa' bo'i blo ma sna chen mo/ 'od ldan ma dang gtum mig ma/ /rab gtum ma ste sgrub byed yin/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni nyi shu bzhi/ /'di dag sngon nyid grub pa yin/ /
rang ming brjod pa'i sngags la ni/ /mthar ni hUM hUM phaT dang sbyar/ /oM ni thams cad gsal byed do/ /grub gsol 'dod pa thams cad la/ /rnal 'byor dam mchog 'dir
mthong na/ /gzhan dag snying po med rtswar mtshungs/ /dpa' bo nyid gyur grub pa ni/ /dpal ldan he ru ka yi ni/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa mthong ba yin/ /de nas de shes rtag sgom pa/ /dngos
grub de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /nyon cig lha mo shes rab can/ /rig pa'i rgyal po sgrub pa'i thabs/ /'khor lo chen po rmad gyur ba/ /gdengs ka'i dbang phyug zhes bya ste/ /thos
pa tsam gyis sreg byed na/ /ming dang ldan par bris pa yis/ /gdengs ka thams cad smos ci dgos/ /dbang ldan nas ni brtsams nas su/ /klu rnams sa bon las byung ba/ /rin chen dang
ldan gdengs gsum mtho/ /gzhan yang phyogs ni kun tu bsam/ /de nas mgur ni 'di bzhes te/ /shar du k+Sha mang bar du bri/ /nub tu hi ste byang du haM/ /gshin rjer hUM zhes bya ba bri/
ki li ki li yi dwags su/ /srin por ci li ji snyed pa/ /rlung ni si li si li bri/ /me yi phyogs su d+hi li nyid/ /dang por rab gtum ma nas ni/ /brtson chen ma yi mthar thug pa/ /sngags
'di dag ni byin gyis brlab/ /'khor lo 'di ni skal chen ldan/ /dgra rnams kyi ni gnad gcod pa/ /hUM phaT ces bya spel ba yi/ /bsgrub bya de yi dbus su bri/ /lan gcig bzlas pa'i gu gul
gyis| |gdug pa nyid du sbyar byas na/ klu rnams thams cad 'bebs par 'gyur/ /lag pa g.yon pa la 'khor lo 'di dngos su'am yid kyis bris la sngags lan gcig bzlas
pas bya bas na/ 'chi bas dus su zin pa slong bar byed do/ /gA ra bI ra'i 'dab ma'i khu bas gAr bI ra'i smyug gus bris te lan gcig bzlas pas reg na/ mngal gang du 'dod pa der 'pho
bar 'gyur ro/ /dug dang lan tshwa dang ske tshes bris te khros na/ /gsod par 'gyur ro/ /ro bsregs pa'i mgal ba d+hA ru ra'i khu bas bsad de 'byung po'i
nyi ma la de nyid kyis 'khor lo bris la lan gcig zlas pa des gang la bsnun pa ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /saM ko ta'i smyug gus sngags tshag snga ma bzhin bris la thal ba la mngon
par bsngags te gang la bsnun pa de sha zas bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /dur khrod kyi sol bas shing leb bam rtsig ngos la 'byung mo'i mtshan mo gang gi snying gar ming bris pa de gdon
chen pos bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /bsgrub bya'i gzugs byas la de'i snying gar 'khrul 'khor bcug ste zhag bdun gyi bar du dri'i chu'i nang du bzhag nas a ti mug+ha'i lcug ma la lan bdun
bsngags te de la bsnun na/ zhag bdun kyi mthar rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo de nyid bye brag tu dur khrod kyi ras la pho nya'i kha dog gis bye brag tu gyur ba bris
la las kyi pho nya dang lhan cig tu bsgrub par bya'o/ /gA ra bI ra'i lcug ma khru phyed dang gnyis kyi tshad dang ldan pa la gang la mngon par phyogs te sngags bris nas ro bsregs
pa'i me 'bar ba la dor te/ ji srid dam tshig pa dang myur du blangs la rig pa'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas nas gang zhig dran te klad la bskor na/ /de de'i mod la rlung gi shugs kyis
'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /skyes pa'i ro'i kham phor la ba bla dang yung ba'i khu bas gang gis ming bris pa de de'i mod la bcings par 'gyur ro/ /dur khrod kyi ras sam zla mtshan gyi ras la shing
a shog ka'i smyug gus klu rnams spangs pa'i 'khor lo 'di bris la/ /de'i dbus su sngags pas chog gzhin yi ge e dang spel ba bris na/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i khyad par thams cad dang
lus srul po thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/ /thod pa la skyes pa'i khrag gis gang gi ming bris la sngags pa khro ba dang bcas pas sngags bzlas na/ /de'i khrag 'gugs par byed
la yid zhi ba dang ldan pas zhi bas sngags bzlas na/ /slar gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo de nyid zla bas brgyan cing gsal bar go ro tsa nas grog la skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par bris te
bud med gang gis rtag tu bcings na/ /rig pa'i rgyal po nyid de'i lhums su 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bud med dang zhi ba'i 'dus pas kun tu spyod pa'i mchog de'i lag mthil na yod
pa'i dpal gang gis kyang dbrog par mi nus la/ /rnam pa de lta bu'i cho ga dang ldan pas ni/ /dngos grub thams cad kyi 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das
'di la ni/ brtul zhugs dang / spyod pa dang / /bsnyung ba dang / /cho ga med par yang cho ga zhib mo'i sbyor ba'i tshul 'di nyid kyis las thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin byed do/ /
nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus bsam pa/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /'od zer tshogs ni gsal ba'i mdangs/ /'khor lo'i phreng ba rnam par
klubs| |de dbus 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dang / /pad+ma'i phreng bas shin tu mdzes/ /slar yang 'khor lo bri bar bya/ /rdo rje phreng ba shin tu mdzes/ /slar yang 'khor lo bri bar bya/ /
rdo rje phreng ba rnam par 'phro/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor lta bu yin/ /nam mkha' thams cad g.yogs byed pa/ /rang gi lus las spro bar bya/ /dkar
dang dmar dang sngon po ste/ /kha dog mchog gi bye brag bya/ /bya ba'i cho ga 'di yis ni/ /dpa' bo'i dbang phyug de bzhin bri/ /dbus su bsgrub par bya ba'i ming / /ji ltar 'dod bzhin
sbyar bar bya/ /phyi rol rdo rje'i phreng ba ni/ /'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs bri/ /'di ni srung ba chen po ste/ /thams cad srung bla na med/ /rims dang nad dang dug dang ni/ /mkha' 'gro
ma yis 'tshe ba dang / /gdon dang bdud dang log 'drin dang / /gang yang lus srul la sogs pa/ /grib ma yang ni mi 'god na/ /de yi lus lta smos ci dgos/ /zla gzugs
lta bu'i yi ge blta/ /phyogs bcur rnam par 'byer bar byed/ /dkar po yis ni zhi 'gyur te/ /nag pos skad cig dag gis gsod/ /dmar po yis ni dbang byed de/ /de nyid
kyis ni nges par 'gugs/ /ser pos nges par 'ching 'gyur te/ /dmag gi dpung ni 'ching bar 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/ /las thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya
ba'i srung ba'i 'khor lo'o/ /bka' yi 'khor lo'i khyad par ni/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis/ /sems can kun gyi don byed pa'o/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi
dbus gnas par/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bu yi/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo lta bu bsam/ de dbus pad+ma bri bya ba/ /bcu drug 'dab mas rnam par brgyan/ /de dbus pad chen 'dab
brgyad pa/ /rdo rje rtse lnga pa yi mchog /'od zer dkar pos shin tu mdzes/ /sgrub pos 'khor lo'i phyi rol bri/ /pad+ma'i lte bar swAhA bri/ /dngos grub thams cad ster ba'o/ /ma mo'i
khyim ni nyams dga' bar/ /tsan+dan dmar pos byug nas ni/ /'bol zhing shin tu 'jam pa yi/ /stan la skye gnas phyag rgya bcings/ /sngags pas bsgrub bya mngon phyogs te/ /brgya
rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya/ /yan lag rus pas brgyan bsam zhing / /gcer bur gyur pas rang gis bri/ /yi dwags gos sam ro yi ni/ /bum pa skam po dag la yang / /yi dwags
sren rtsi khrag dang ni/ /de bzhin tsan+dan dmar pos bri/ /'khor lo de yi steng gnas te/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin thun gsum du/ /blo ldan mthe'u chung bskyod nas ni/ /bram ze gsod pa'ang nyin
bdun 'grub/ /tsan+dan dmar po'i rdul las ni/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs byas la/ /tsha ba gsum gyis lus byugs nas/ /spra tshil gyis kyang byug par
bya| |zangs ma'i khab kyis skye gnas dbug /seng ldeng 'dag ma du med la/ /blo dang ldan pas nyin bdun bsro/ /sgrub pa po yis brgya bzlas na/ /rgyal po blon bcas mdun na 'don/ /
btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas par ni/ /myur du 'gugs par byed pa yin/ /gro ga yi ni 'dab ma la/ /ro yi sen rtsi ro tsa nas/ /mi yi bdag po 'khor bcas la/ /ming dang
spel te bri bar bya/ /mngon par phyogs te bzlas bzhin du/ /seng ldeng dang ni dur khrod mer/ /ji srid spra tshil ma zhu bar/ /me yi steng du gdung bar bya/ /bsgrub bya mngon par
gdungs tsam gyis/ lha dang lha min 'ong 'gyur na/ /sa steng skye bo smos ci dgos/ /yi dwags sen rtsi skyes pa yis/ /khrag dang gi wang bcas pa yis/ /bsgrub bya'i ming sbel
gro gar bri/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes sa/ /tsan+dan dmar po nyid dang ni/ /dur khrod zas lhag thal ba rnams/ /sgrub pa po yis gcig bsdus nas/ /seng ldeng me ni du
med la/ /rdul de lag pa gnyis kyis ni/ /mnyes nas sbyin sreg byas pa yi/ /thal ba de ni bzung nas su/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs bya ste/ /snying gar 'khor lo
bcug nas ni/ /zlos bzhin du ni mer gdungs na/ /brgyal zhing sems dang bral 'gyur la/ /rmongs shing rab tu myos nas ni/ /rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur/ /cho ga'i
bya ba 'di yis ni/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis bzhed/ /lha mo sngags chen 'di dag ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi snying 'joms yin/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/ /yid 'ong zhi ba
skyed pa mo/ /bka' yi 'khor lo bshad par bya/ /mkha' dbyings dbus gyur bsam pa ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /rdo rje rtse gsum pa bzhi pa/ /des ni de nas bri bar bya/ /de
dbus pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /shin tu mdzes pa bris nas su/ /bai ro tsa na'i rig pa che/ /sems can kun byed sdud pa mo/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can
gyis gsungs/ /nad thams cad med par byed pa zhes bya ba'i srung ba'i 'khor lo sbyor ba'o// //de nas bcom ldan kun mkhyen pas/ /ye shes mngon par shes pa yi/ /
'khor lo zhes bya bka' stsal pa/ /ge sar lte ba'i ldan pa yi/ /pad+ma 'dab ma drug par bri/ /zla ba bzang pos nye bar brgyan/ /rdo rje phreng bas rnam par klubs/ /de yi phyi rol 'khor
bo ste/ /ston ka'i zla ltar dri med pa/ /yi ge'i mchog ni rnam pa bdun/ /lha mo chen mo phan pas gcig /bdud thams cad kyi las 'joms par byed pa 'khor lo rgyal po zhes bya'o/ /tsan+dan
dkar po ro tsa nas/ /gro ga la ni bris nas su/ /'khor lo lag pa g.yon par bcang / /'khor lo 'di ni lha mo che/ /las kyi 'od kyis brgyan pa yin/ /de nas
bsgrub bya nyi dbus su/ /bsams te stong du bzlas nas ni/ /yi ge shel gyi rnam pa ltar/ /bsams te nad kyis gdungs la bstan/ /mthong ba tsam gyi mod la ni/ /nad rnams
kun las rnam grol bar/ /'gyur ba nyid du the tshom med/ /lag pa g.yon par 'khor lo 'di/ /zla ba'i dbus su rnam bkod na/ /ston ka yi ni zla 'drar 'gyur/ 'khor lo 'di ni
lha mo che/ /las kyi 'od kyis rab brgyan na/ /las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis/ /bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /dur khrod ras sam thod pa'am/ /arka yi ni 'dab ma la/ /sngar
bstan pa yi sel ba dang / /skyes pa'i khrag gi snag tsha yis/ /sgrub pos ming rus smyug gus bri/ /nyi ma'i dbus su gyur khro sems kyis /gzugs brnyan byas la bsgrub bya
yi/ /dbus su de ni bcug nas su/ /ske tshe yis ni byugs nas ni/ /yang dang yang du bsro bar bya/ /sngags kyi rgyal po bskul ba yis/ /bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur
'di yi nad rnams thams cad ni/ /'phel dang de bzhin sbyor byed pa'o/ /rims la yi dwags snying gar bri/ /'ga' ri yi dwags klad pa ste/ /brjed byed rlung dang sprin la
bri/ /gzer bar bya ba mdung la ste/ /dug dang mdze nad lto 'phye la/ /gza' la gza' yi mtshan mar bri/ /mdor bsdus nas 'khor lod god/ /shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba'i/ /
yi ge bdud rtsi rgyun 'bab pas/ /ston ka'i zla zer lta bur ni/ /bsam gtan bsam pa tsam gyis ni/ /'chi ba'ang nges par slong bar 'gyur/ /sprul chen brgya yis zin nas ni/ /'chi
ba'ang myur du slong bar byed/ /dug gis brgyal bar gyur pa dag /bstan pa tsam gyis slong bar 'gyur/ /rims dang gdon dang brjed byed dang / /lag pa mthong bas brlag par
byed/ /grib ma yang ni mi 'gom na/ /de yi lus lta smos ci dgos/ /zangs ma yi ni 'dab ma 'am/ /lag pa g.yon par 'khor lo 'di/ /ba bla dang ni yung bas bri/ /de nas chu
yi nang bzhag la/ /ji ltar 'byung bzhin 'bad de mchod/ /mtshams kyi dus su mnyam bzhag pas/ /de bzhin du ni sngags bzlas bya/ /chu yi nang nas bton nas su/ /'o mas
bkrus la rgya mtshor gzhug /g.yul du khu tshur bcangs nas ni/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam brgyan te/ /yid la rtag tu zlos byed na/ /ji srid khu tshur ma dkrol bar/ /myur
du thams cad rengs 'gyur te/ /dgra bo gal te lag na ni/ /mtshon cha phyar te thogs pa yang / /ji srid khu tshur ma dkrol bar/ /mtshon cha gtong bar mi nus so/ /yi ge bdun dang rnal
'byor ma/ /drug gi yi ge 'di dag ni/ /'khor lo drug la gnas par ni/ /lag pa'i dbus su bkod nas su/ /cho ga rig pas bcang bar bya/ /kha nas
gsang sngags rgyal po zlos/ /de yi gzugs gyur bzung nas ni/ /de ni 'gugs 'gyur the tshom med/ /tsan+dan dmar po'i rdul dang ni/ /lan tshwa ske tshe de bzhin te/ /bsgrub bya'i
rkang rjes rdul dang ni/ /gcig tu byas nas brtag par bya/ /lan brgyar bzlas te rab bsgoms na/ /sa bdag skye bo'i nor dang ni/ /bcas te dbang du 'gyur ba'am/ /de ni
'gugs 'gyur the tshom med/ /sbyor ba 'di ni 'grub pa ste/ /gzhan dag tu ni nga mi smra/ /rdul de nyid ni bzung nas su/ /lcags phye dang ni bsre bar bya/ /dur khrod ras la gtum
nas su| |lan bdun du ni bzlas par bya/ /lam gyi bzhi mdor sor brgyad tsam/ /brkos te dgra yi ming nas ni/ /bzung nas sa yis dgab par bya/ /gang gi ming bzung de bcings 'gyur/ /
phye ma de nyid bzung nas su/ /'o ma yis ni 'bad de bkru/ /slar yang grol 'gyur the tshom med/ /phye ma de nyid bzung nas su/ /smyo byed lnga dang ldan par bya/ /ro yi gos la bsgrub
bya yi| |ming bris nas ni gtum par bya/ /lan brgya bzlas te dur khrod du/ /sbas na skyes bu 'phral du ni/ /smyo 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /phyung nas ba yi 'o ma yis/ /'bod
de slar yang bkrus na ni/ /grol 'gyur 'di ni the tshom med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ /
rdo rje dpa' bo'i 'khor lo gsungs/ /zla ba'i dbus gyur rdo rje ni/ /rtse gsum de bzhin kha drug pa/ /slar yang zla bar pad+ma ni/ /'dab drug legs par gnas pa bri/ /de yi dbus gyur sa
bon ni/ /'dod don thams cad sgrub byed pa'o/ /sngags pas lte bar bri bar bya/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni spel bar bya/ /rdo rje sems sogs lha rnams ni/ /thams cad sna tshogs bla na med/ /sangs
rgyas kun gyi go cha che/ /mdzes ma'i gdong can khyod la bshad/ /dbus su snga ma'i gsang sngags bri/ /pad+ma'i 'dab mar de bzhin gzhan/ /ring po drug ni yongs spangs pa/ /rdo rje yi ni
lte bar bri/ /gur gum sen rtsi rang khrag dang / /ro tsa na yis gro ga la/ /cho ga bzhin du bris nas ni/ /dus gsum du ni bzlas byas la/ /mchod chen byas nas gzung bar bya/ /lan bdun du
ni mngon bzlas te/ /gos kyi tha mar bcing bar bya/ /lam du 'gro na rkun po dang / /stag sogs 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du ni srung 'gyur ba/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom
med| |lte ba der ni thig la yis/ /bskor ba'i thig le dag kyang bya/ /a ri tsa ta ka bcud dang / /yung ba dag gis khyad par du/ /a sho ka yi smyug gu yis/ /dpa' bo yis ni ras mar bri/ /
bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel ba yi/ /sngags 'di stong du de nas bzla/ /bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes sa dang ni/ /glang po che yi rkang rjes rdul/ /dur khrod thal bar bcas
pa las/ /sgrub pos gzugs brnyan byas nas su/ /bcing bas bcings te de yi ni/ /snying ga ru ni gzhug par bya/ /me tog ser pos mchod nas ni/ /gsang ba'i gnas su sbas
gyur na| |dgra rnams thams cad 'ching 'gyur zhing / /rlag par byed pa mi bzad par/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /mkha'
'gro ma yi snying po'i sngags/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /nam mkha'i dbyings gyur sa bon ni/ /kun tu 'od zer rab 'phro ba/ /ston ka'i zla ltar dri med pa'i/ /
'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu gnyis bya/ /rtsibs de rnams la sa bon gyi/ /yi ge mchog tu phan pa dgod/ /de yi lte bar dgod bya ba/ /rig pa chen mo'i yi ge che/ /srung ba rdo rje'i
cho ga rigs/ /mkha' 'gro ma kun cho ga bya/ /sngags kyi rgyal po bskul ba yi/ /dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming bri bya/ /rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa ru/ /spro ba'i bdag nyid can
gyis spro/ /gur gum dang ni ro tsa nas/ /gro ga 'am ni ras dkar la/ /snying stobs can gyis bri bar bya/ /las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis/ /thams cad du ni srung ba dang / /sgrub pa po
yis sngar bstan bzhin/ /gdug pa rnams ni tshar gcod byed/ /dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'i/ /las mchog de nas bshad par bya/ /gang zhig bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni/ /
'jig rten gsum po dbang byed pa'o/ /skye gnyis rdo rje'i rigs dang ni/ /gzugs bzang bu mo gzhan yang rung / /kA ra pI ra'i me tog dmar/ /rgyal gyi sbyor bas bsgrub par bya/ /go ro tsa nas
bsgrubs nas su/ /me tog der ni chur gnas la/ /sgrub po shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /lan brgya ru ni bzlas par bya/ /chu bo chen por zhugs nas su/ /lte ba man chad chur bcug ste/ /lag pa
thal sbyar dbus bzung nas/ /rig pa stong du bzlas par bya/ /snyim pa chu yis bkang ba dang / /bcas pas sgrub pos btung bar bya/ /de nas de ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /sgrub pos dag ni grub
pa yis| |rgyal po chung mar bcas pa dag /yid kyis 'gugs 'gyur gdon mi za/ /kA ra bI ra'i me tog ni/ /dmar po yang dag bzung nas ni/ /rig pa lan bdun bzlas byas la/ /skye
gnas dbus su gzhug bya ste/ /me tog de ni kha sbyar nas/ /gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag par bya/ /gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor pas/ /brgya phrag gcig tu bzlas par bya/ /sgrub po
rtse gcig yid kyis ni/ /me tog de ni blangs nas su/ /me tog gis ni gang bsnun pa/ /de yi mod la dbang du 'gyur/ /brgyal zhing sems dang bral ba dang / /yan lag tshigs kun gzhan
dbang ste/ /mngon gyur sems ni ldog pa ru/ /skad cig gis ni dbang byed 'gyur/ /'di ni mngon sum grub pa yi/ /don yod dbang du byed pa yin/ /
zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams 'gugs pa'i cho ga 'khor lo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'o/ /gang zhig bris pa tsam gyis su/ /rdo rje sems dpa'ang
brlag 'gyur zhing / /dngos grub myur du ster 'gyur ba/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /zla ba'i dbus gyur rdo rje ste/ /de bzhin gzhan yang pad+ma'o/ /kun nas rnam par 'phro ba yi/ /mkha'
'gro ma yi sa bon dgod/ /dbus su rdo rje phag mo ni/ /shin tu drag cing gsal ba'i gzugs/ /yi ge'i dgod pas dgong par bya/ /rim pa de ltar brjod pa la/ /zhi la zhi ba'i yid
kyis su/ /ro tsa na yis gro gar bri/ /na mo'i gnas dang dur khrod du/ /gos chen de bzhin khro dang bcas/ /chags pa la ni dmar po'i gos/ /rgyas la gos ser de bzhin te/ /de
dang der ni bsgoms byas nas/ /ci rigs par ni sbrul par bya/ /bu mo gzhon nu'i ro yi ni/ /gos ni 'bad de blangs nas su/ /tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la/ /de nyid las byung sol
ba yis| |sna tshogs rdo rje kha bzhi la/ /sngags dang spel bar bris nas ni/ /lan bdun du ni bzlas nas su/ /gang gi khyim du sbas gyur pa/ /de ni gshin rje'i grong khyer du/ /nyi ma bdun
gyis 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de yi rkang pa'i rkang sbubs dang / /bum pa la sogs dag kyang rung / /rus pa'i phur bu'i sbu gur ni/ /'khrul 'khor 'di ni bcug bya ste/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /'chi
'gyur 'dir ni gdon mi za/ /las rnams kun la sgrub pa pos/ /cho ga dang ni ldan par bya/ /rang gis bzung ba'i sngags kyis ni/ /bskal pa bye ba brgyas mi 'grub/ /las 'di mchog tu shes bya ste//
sngags gzhan rgyas pas ci zhig bya/ /de dag thams cad spangs nas su/ /'di ni 'bad de gzung bar bya/ /gang dang gang gi bsam gtan gyis/ /sgrub pos bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /sbyor ba de dang de
dag gis/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ /ji ltar nor bu dag pa ni/ /rdzas gang la brten de gzugs 'dzin/ /de bzhin rdo rje mkha' 'gro yang / /yang dag bsam gtan mchog
'dzin 'gyur/ /bsam pa gang dang gang gis ni/ /mi rnams yid ni yang dag sbyor/ /de dang de yi dngos 'gyur te/ /sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu bzhin/ /de nyid bsdus dang 'dus pa ste/ /
gzhan yang sngon dang tha ma yin/ /de nyid sbyor ba'i cho ga can/ /bya ba'i rgyud rnams thams cad du/ /ji srid me yis 'jig gi bar/ /de der 'gro ba nyon rmongs 'gyur/ /thams cad du ni
spangs pa ste/ /brtson 'grus pha rol 'joms pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam ldan pa'i/ /rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid che/ /myur du dngos grub skye 'gyur ba/ /'phral du yang dag yid
ches byed/ /sgrub pos phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis/ /nyon mi rmongs par 'grub par 'gyur/ /dam tshig mi ldan mi dag la/ /klog gam gal te byin gyur na/ /
dam pa'i bdag nyid bcom nas ni/ /ngan 'gro rnams su ltung bar 'gyur/ /g.yon gyi rgyud ni dmigs nas su/ /skye bo g.yon gyi spyod pa bya/ /thams cad g.yon pas byas nas
ni| |myur du dngos grub 'grub 'gyur zhes/ /sgyu ma kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo
rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ /dpa' bo thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i 'khor lo 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu
drug pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /snying po thams cad bsdus pa ste/ /sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir/ /sgrub po'i bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i mchog /
ga bur dang ni gur gum dang / /gan+d+ha gan+d+ha pa tre ste/ /shing tsha dang ni sug smel bcas/ /ku suM dang ni de bzhin chu/ /bi si ta dang kun du ru/ /de bzhin ri yi zhags dang ni/ /ri skyes dang
ni sbu gu'i zhag /dri yi mar khu so dang ni/ /de bzhin lag skyes kyi ni rdul/ /gangs kyi chu dang snying po dang / /rgya mtsho las skyes de dag ni/ /lus can rnams la phan byed pa/ /gang gang
la ni gangs chu bzhin/ /de ltar bco brgyad rdzas rnams ni/ /bcud kyis len mchog phan byed yin/ /de nas brtag pa'i las dang ni/ /yon tan yan lag cho ga bshad/ /tsam pa ka dang ba ku la/ /

na ga ge sar ku mu da/ /ut+pal she phA li ka dang / /sbrang rtsi 'dzag dang pri yang+ku/ /ku su ma ni nyid dag go/ /shrI pha la dang po so 'cha'/ /ka pi ta dang la ku tsha/ /ku ba dang ni brta ki/ /a ru ra dang ba ru

ra| |ba la ta ka skyu ru ra/ /e la tsi dang phu na ka /e raN+DA dang mi ri tsi/ /de bzhin du ni pi pi ling / /bca' ba dang ni shu dag dang / /yung ba dang ni ru rta dang / /btsa' sga dang ni sgog skya dang / /rlan
can gyi ni dwa ba dang / /nA ga pha la dkar po dang / /de bzhin rgan po gzhon nur byed/ /glang chen dgra dang ri mdzes dang / /'dzag dang byis pa stug po dang / /ral pa dmar po smyo byed dang / /

mtshan mo'i shing dang myur 'gro dang / /ka tam+ba dang gser shing ste/ /de bzhin du ni shi ri sha /ka rany+dza dang shri khru dang / /ni ma pa dang ni pi la si/ /de bzhin ga du ma dza ri/ /pa la sha dang tsan+dan
gnyis/ /de bzhin a gar nag po dang / /gur gum gur shing bye ra ka /sbrang rtsi mok+Sha puskar/ /me tog 'bras bu rtsa ba dang / /shun pa shing dang ro nyid do/ /khu byug zangs kyi gtsug phud can/ /bya

rog dang ni gar ra dang / /rma bya ti bya phug ron dang / /drang srong bu stobs 'phel bar byed/ /ra dang ri bong ri dwags dang / /sa li ga dang phag dang ni/ /khyad par du ni byi ba rnams/ /nad rnams thams
cad 'joms par byed/ /me tog 'bras bu shun pa'i chang / /de bzhin du ni 'bru yi chang / /gzhan yang chang gi bye brag dag/ /mdor bsdus nas ni btung ba'i
mchog |'di dag skyes pa bud med kyi/ /stobs rnams bskyed pa'i sman yin te/ /bza' dang btung dang gzhib pa dang / /bldag pa dang ni mur ba dang / /sna sman mgo bor bsku ba dang / /
bkru ba dang ni dril phyis dang / /bza' dang btung sogs de dag ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yi sbyor ba mchog /de ltar drug cu rtsa bzhi yi/ /rdzas dang bco brgyad dag tu sbyar/ /sbom po phra mo'i sbyor
ba rnams/ /skyes pa dang ni bud med kyang / /chung ngu la sogs dbye ba ste/ /rlung dang mkhris pa rbad kan sogs/ /re re zhing yang gsum du 'dod/ /nag po dkar po sngo bsangs te/ /'dzag
dang de bzhin 'pho ba la'o/ /dgra dang mdza' bshes bar ma ste/ /khams kyi sde tshan bsdus pa yin/ /dpa' bo gcig dang skye gnyis rtsa/ /'bras bu chen po bska ba gsum/ /lhang tsher dang
ni dngul chu bzhi/ /bdud rtsi yi ni snying po lnga/ /dus drug de bzhin drug cu ste/ /bdun po yal ga 'dab sogs bcas/ /skam sa dang ni rlan can yul/ /mar dang mar nag bkru sman ni/ /rno
dang dngul chu'i zas su sbyin/ /rang skyur dang ni yung ba dag /cha mnyam dngul chu'i 'bras bu ste/ nyi ma'i 'od zer bsros nas ni/ /sbrang rtsi yi ni thigs pa blugs/ /thal sman lan

tshwas bu gar bsgrub/ /ro ni bska ba rnams dang yang / /lhang tsher dkar po'i skyo ma sbyin/ /dngul chu drug char bya ba mchog /skyed byed don ni rga ba 'joms/ /cha ni tshad ldan 'ching byed de/ /'bras
bus bya ba byed par 'gyur/ /sngon du gser shog blugs pa yis/ /rang skyon 'joms pa'i cho ga yin/ /de nas chu dang lan tshwa dang / /thal ba'am rdul ni blug par bya/ /dron mo blugs na
skra dkar skye/ glang chen mgo yi bcud blangs la/ /seng+ge'i tshad du btso bar bya/ /de nas slar ni phyung nas su/ /arka'i shing gi khu ba blugs/ /tshos pa'i 'od kyis snying mig 'joms/ /

tsan+da dang ni ra sa na/ /sgog skya dang ni ker sa dang / /a tra pa ti'i rus pa dang / /de bzhin du ni me tog gzung / /bya gri dang ni kun du ru/ /sa ri ba dang sen mo dang / /nor bu zla 'od nA ge sar//
thigs pa'i rgyun dang ka tam+pa/ /tsa pa ki ri so ba dang / /shi shu bil ba ut+pa la/ /rang skyur dang ni bcas pa ru/ /'dzag dang dngul chu kha tshos bya/ /phyung na sbrul gyi gzugs ltar 'gyur/ /
khrag dang smyo byed mtshan shing blugs/ /skra dkar gyi ni nyes pa 'joms/ /rgas dang mdze nad sel bar byed/ /rnon po thal sman bcas pa yin/ /bkrus shing bskud na gzhang 'brum 'joms/
lto skyes me rnying rdzas kyi las/ /bcud dang bcud len mar zhag bsngags/ /shi ri sha yi rtswas kyang gzag /mgor gnas la skyes ldan par bya/ /mdog dmar dngul chu rmongs pa gsol
gsol te 'khrul na 'bras bu'i lam/ /tshad las 'das na dug tu 'gyur/ /de nas pags pa shun pa dang / /me tog dang ni 'bras bu sogs/ /kha dang bska
dang mngar ba dang / /tshwa dang skyur po la sogs pas/ /khyad par du ni btso bya ba/ /kha med rdzar ni btso bar bya/ /kha dang bcas par sreg pa ste/ /tshar gcad pa dang mnan pa yis/ /
kha med pa dang thod pa'i dbyibs/ /'od ma dang ni bya rog ma chu/ /de dag btso ba'i zhi kha rdza/ /btso ba yi ni tshad bzhi ni/ /yib dang khros dang 'thor ba dang / /bzhi pa chu ru 'bros pa'o/ /shin

tu tshos par gyur na ni/ /'dar dang rmongs dang du ba dang / /khrol khrol sgra ni sgrog pa yin/ /btsir dang mnye dang dkrug pa dang / /de bzhin du ni brdung ba'o/ /sbrang rtsir btso dang bu ra ma btso/ /
glang chen btso dang seng+ger btso/ /rnon por byas te btso bar bya/ /mnyes pas dri ma'i rdul 'thor 'gyur/ /blo gros 'khrul pa med pa yis/ /rim gyis rim gyis ma nye bar bya/ /
cha yi tshad byas gso ba na/ /sbyangs nas 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ /de nas cha gzhan bcas pa la/ /gi ri kar ni'i phye ma ni/ /lugs las ldog pa'i lam btsugs la/ /tshad ldan
cho ga bzhin du btso/ /du ru ka dang ba li ka /tsakra mar de'i sa bon dang / /ba la ta ka shi kru'i 'bras/ /ba ri tsa ta ku su ma/ /ut+pal ma li ka sa bon/ /bar dar rus pa ka si dang / /sa ri sa sku
sa bon dang / /sbrang rtsi po son pa la sha /zhi ga rdze'u ni tshos pa dang / /de dag skyo ma bskyed phyir blugs/ /de dag gi ni rtogs byas la/ /yid la sems pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis/ /bu mo'i bcud ni
drangs te blugs/ /'di yis rab tu bsgrub par bya/ /gzhan du nam yang ma yin no/ /bu mo gcig dang gnyis dang ni/ /mang po'i bar du brtag par bya/ /lhang tsher dngul chu shing chen ni/ /de tshe 'bras
bu smin par 'gyur/ /bya ba kun gyi lam gyis ni/ /byed pa po dang za bor 'gyur/ /lha yis rgya mtsho bsrubs pa bzhin/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i cha yi bar/ /stobs ldan bzung ba gnas su 'gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul

gyi ni tshad dang ldan/ /dngul chu rma bya'i mgrin 'dra dang / /sbrul gyi gzugs dang sbal ba'i gzugs/ /chu 'dzin dbyibs dang rnam pa bzhi/ /sa la'i dri dang dri zhim dang / /de bzhin chang dang chang min
dri| |cha gnyis dang ni cha gsum dang / /bud med mdog nyams snang 'gyur zhing / /bong tshod ran dang ring ba dang / /yan lag rtsub 'dod mgrin pa ring / /mig ni zangs ltar dmar ba ste/ /stobs ldan
sngo bsangs nu ma med/ /rked pa'i khyad par sngar bshad dang / /sbrang rtsi lta bu'i dri dang ldan/ /sgrub po dbang po'i yon tan byed/ /de rnams thabs kyis sbyangs yin te/ /rtsub dang mnyen dang yan

lag mkhrang / /stobs ldan zhes ni bya ba yin/ /de dang 'khyud las byung ba ni/ /rdzas ni yongs su sbyor byed de/ /rnon po dang ni lhang tsher la/ /thun mong du ni bsten nas su/ /zha nye blugs pas 'joms
par 'gyur/ /ro ni kha dang bska bar 'gyur/ /de nas rang skyur nang du ni/ /lci bas btsos na nyes pa 'byang / /de nas gci ba'i lan tshwa dang / /phag gi zhag

dang tshil dang khrag /bcas par mnyes na'ang nyes pa 'byang / /slar yang cu ta dzA ti ni/ /tshwa dang dmar po nyid dang ni/ /pi na dza ra dang tsam pa dang / /smyo byed cha mnyam dngul chu gcig /de dang mnyam
pa'i sbrang rtsi chu/ /mnyes na nyes pa zad par 'gyur/ /de nas ma he'i rmig par ni/ /char pa'i chu dang bcas pa la/ /zangs kyi phye ma mkhar phye dang / /mig sman phye ma blugs shing btso/ /
tshos nas sbrang rtsi'i nang du gzhug /de yis bcings par 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas khrag ni cha bdun gyis/ /sbyangs na snum zhing stobs ldan la/ /slar yang cha mnyam khrag dang ni/ /mnyes
pas snum zhing rtsub par 'gyur/ /ra gan tsu ta'i shing dang ni/ /zangs dang yungs pa la sogs drug /byin pas nyes pa tshar gcod 'gyur/ /de nas tsan+ta'i shing dang ni/ /sbrang rtsi 'dzag dang

sen mo dang / /thal sman 'bus zos shing phye dang / /ma hA ha ta mo k+Sha dang / /puska ra dang brta gi /ku ba sin+du ba ri phye/ /bcas par mi yi rkang du gzhug /cung zad bzhag ste phyung nas su/ /rdo
yi gtun du mnye bar bya/ /'od ma'i nang du blugs nas ni/ /btso dza rgod ma'i kha 'dra dang / /kar na da yi chu yi dbyibs/ /bong bu'i gdong dang rnga mo'i gdong / /kha chen 'di dag bcing ba
dang | |tshar bcad pa la bsngags pa yin/ /gang yang 'khrul 'khor kha che ba/ /rdza rnga yi ni dbyibs 'dra dang / /'o ma'i dbyibs 'dra la sogs dang / /mtshon cha ral gri'i shugs 'dra ba/ /kang+ka yi
ni mgrin pa 'dra/ /nyes pa tshar gcod pa la bsngags/ /gzhan yang dngul chu bcings pa la/ /bshad pa de dag rjes su gzung / /bzhi cha lus pa btso yin te/ /phyed lus stobs chen btso ba yin/ /dngul

chur brten pa'i dri ma ni/ /de bzhin du ni sbyang bar bya/ /sbyang pa dang ni rtogs pa dang / /rmongs pa de bzhin gsod pa'o/ /de nas lhang cher rdul phye dang / /bcas par rtsi yi nang du blug /ban du zhes
bya'i phye ma ni/ /skyo mar bcas pa'i nang du btung / /lhang tsher dngul chu rnon po yi/ /cho ga yis ni so sor bcing / /de nas cung zhig ngal bso bya/ /bzhag pa me yi gnas sam ni/ /chu yi shing
la brten par bya/ /lci ba'am 'bras kyi phung po'ang rung / /rngo ba yi ni nang dag dang / /ba lang ma ho sogs pa'i ltas/ /bye ma yi ni phung por sbo/ /de nas ngal bso phyung nas ni/ /gzugs
dang sgra dang dri ro sogs/ /tshad dang mtshan ma ji bzhin brtag /la la'i 'bras bu la'i rtsa/ /kha cig me tog 'dab ma dang / /shun pa dang ni rus pa'ang rung / /rnal 'byor pa yis longs
spyod ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs blta bar bya/ /bcos pa'ang bcos min yo byad ni/ /rnyed na rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur/ /de yang stobs can bcud bral na/ /sngon bzhin nyes pa sna tshogs 'gyur/ /
dngul chu lhang tsher kha dog ni/ /sna tshogs dang ldan skyon yin te/ /khrag dang mkhris pa skyed byed yin/ /dmar pos khrag kyang skyed par byed/ /dkar pos
zug gzer skyed 'gyur zhing / /srog ni 'joms par byed pa yin/ /ljang ser dag ni ma smin dang / /ser skya lam ni 'gag 'gyur zhing / /nyis 'gyur cha ni shin tu 'ching / /nyes pa dag
ni brgyar ldan pas/ /blo dang ldan pas dpyad de bza'/ /sngo dang nag po bcud chen yin/ /de ltar bcud len rnam dpyad na/ /chu skyes chen po'i yon tan ldan/ /dngul chu'i 'ol so
gcig dang ni/ /rgya mtsho las byung nyis 'gyur ldan/ /bzhi 'gyur gyi ni me tog bcas/ /sna sman bldag pa'i mchog yin te/ /khrag dang dngul chu bcu 'gyur du/ /rim gyis spel te bza'
bar bya| |de phan chad ni 'bras bu med/ /dngul chu bso bas rmongs pa dang / /khyad par du ni bsad kyang rung / /sngar bstan pa yi me tog dang / /byang chub sems dang bcas te bza'/ /
thams cad du ni snga dro bza'/ /cho ga'i rim pa 'di yin no/ /lhang tsher chu dang dngul chu ni/ /dgong mo'i dus su bldag par bya/ /zla ba la ni zla ba'i lam/ /nyi ma la ni nyi ma ste/ /de dang
de nas sbyin par bya/ /de ltar yul dang dus dang ni/ /rdzas rnams rgya cher bstan pa dag /yid gzhungs la sogs 'phel byed yin/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha'
'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ /bcud kyis len gyi cho ga'i rim par phye
ba ste bcu bdun pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /rgyud du sbas pa nges par bya/ /yang dag bsdus pa'i cho ga ni/ /bshad kyi sgrub pa po rnams nyon/ /bde mchog
bla ma'i gnas la sogs/ /mkha' 'gro mas ni thams cad khyab/ /ye shes ldan pa'i rang skyes gnas/ /yul dang yul du mngon par skye/ /'di ni mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya/ /rdo rje dkyil
'khor gtso mo yin/ /rnal 'byor ma drug sgrub po la/ /brda yi skad kyis bshad pa yin/ /ku lu ta dang ma ru yi/ /yul du gnas pa ma mo ste/ /sin+d+hu dang ni na ga rar/ /rigs kyi gtso
mo rnams yin no/ /lam pa ka dang sau rASh+Tar/ /gang gnas rigs kyi lha mo yin/ /kha ba'i ri dang kany+tsi na/ /gang yod byis bcas mo zhes bya/ /pAny+tsa la yi yul dag dang / /gri ha de ba
tA dag na/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i bu mo gnas/ /ka ling+ka dang ko sa lar/ /brtul zhugs 'dzin ma sha chen za/ /pre ta pu ri zhes bya dang / /tri sha ku na ri sbom dbang phyug /khaN+Da ro ha zhes
bya gnas/ /pu l+lI ra dang dzA lan+d+ha ra/ /tsaN+Da li yi bud med gnas/ /o Te dang ni kI rU yi/ /yul du bu mo chen mo ste/ /de bI ko Ti zhes bya dang / /rA me shwa ri'i bu mo'ang 'dod/ /go dA ba ri
ar bu dar/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dbang phyug mchog /gser gling ji ltar bstan pa bzhin/ /aud+ya na yang ni de bzhin no/ /yul 'di rnams kyi bu mo gang //
dpa' bo gnyis med khyab pa ste/ /kun kyang 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma/ /yid kyi shugs kyis 'jug ma yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mos slar yang mchod cing phyag byas
te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi khyad par dang / /zhing skyong 'jigs pa chen po yi/ /ming dang zhing gi ming dang ni/ /gnas rnams kyi ni khyad par dang / /gang du sgrub pa
pos thos na/ /the tshom med par 'grub 'gyur ba/ /de dag thams cad mdor bsdus te/ /gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems dpa'
de bzhin gshegs/ /nga yis gang la'ang ma bshad pa'i/ /gsang chen shin tu rnyed dka' ba'i/ /gang yin khyod ni zhu 'dod pa/ /legs so legs so lha mo che/ /sgyu ma chen mor
rang 'gro ba/ /bshad kyi rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/ /a T+Ta ha se'i yul gnas pa/ /zhi ba'i gdong zhes grags pa ste/ /rgyal ba'i lha mo'i skye gnas 'byung / /rdo rje yi ni mtshon cha bsnams/ /
yul der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /ka taM pa yi shing la brten/ /dril bu chen po zhes bya ba'i/ /k+She tra pA la stobs po che/ /kau la kir ni dpal chan mo/ /gtsigs pa'i skye gnas las byung ba/ /
gtsigs pa'i gzugs can lha mo ste/ /rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jigs su rung / /grong khyer der gnas drag shul can/ /ri yi rtse mor brten te gnas/ /me yi gdong pa zhes bya ba/ /k+She tra pA
la mdzes pa'i gdong / /da ra nar ni bde byed ma/ /sme brtsegs chen po'i skye gnas byung / /lha mo ga yi mtshon cha bsnams/ /chos kyi dbang phyug gsol ba mo/ /zhing der gnas par
grags pa ste/ /ta la'i shing la brten te gnas/ /gyen du 'bar skra zhes bya ba/ /k+She tra pA la gtsigs pa che/ /de bI ko Tir rna mo che/ /stobs po che yi skye gnas byung / /lha mo lag na mdung
can te/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun gyi mchog /gnas der lha mo drag chen mo/ /b+ha dra'i shing la brten te gnas/ /k+She tra pA la lus chen po/ /mchog gi dbang phyug rgyu zhes bya/ /pi ra
dzar ni phyi mo ste/ /ba dan gyi ni phyag na bsnams/ /zhi ba'i gzugs can lha mo che/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug rab stsol pa/ /zhing der gnas pa me 'bar ma/ /a mra'i shing la brten te
gnas| |ha har dgod pa sgra chen po/ /sems can thams cad 'jigs par byed/ /e ru dar ni me lce 'bar/ /thod pa dge ba'i skye gnas byung / /lha mo rdo rje shag+ti bsnams/ /zhing der
shin tu myos pas gnas/ /grong khyer der gnas lha mo de/ /gser shing la ni brten te gnas/ /dril bu sgra zhes bya ba yi/ /k+She tra pA la dpa' bo che/ /pre ta pu rir dmar ser te/ /'jigs
pa chen mo'i spyan dang ldan/ /lha mo gtun shing mtshon cha bsnams/ /gtsigs pa'i skye gnas las byung ba'o/ /zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo der/ /dzA ti'i
shing la brten te gnas/ /byin chen zhes bya'i zhing skyong ni/ /shin tu gtsigs shing 'jigs su rung / /e la phu ring bong zhon ma/ /rab tu gtum pa'i skye gnas byung / /phyag na
zhags pas 'jigs chen mo/ /zhing der myos pas yang dag gnas/ /khyogs der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon pa mo/ /glang chen rna ba zhes bya ba'i/ /
zhing skyes mchog las skyes pa'o/ /kha che'i yul du ba lang rna/ /gtum pa'i skye gnas las byung ma/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog thogs nas ni/ /sgra rnams 'joms la mchog tu brtson/ /
gnas der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /ri yi rtse la brten te gnas/ /spu gu'i byin pa can zhes bya'i/ /k+She tra pA la 'jigs chen po/ /ma ru'i yul du rim pa mo/ /'jigs gdong dpa' bo'i skye gnas
byung | |lcags kyu zhags thogs lha mo de/ /zhing der shin tu myos pas gnas/ /yul der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /dbye chen la ni brten te gnas/ /gtsigs pa zhes bya'i zhing skyong ni/ /
rmongs par byed pa'i bzhin yangs pa'o/ /nag rar ni thong gshol ma/ /sme brtsegs yan lag skye gnas byung / /ro langs can ni 'od chen ma/ /dpa' bo kun la dngos grub stsol/ /
gnas der gnas pa'i bzang mo de/ /sba yi shing gi ldum rar gnas/ /sbu yi byin pa zhes bya ba'i/ /k+She tra pA la gtsigs pa che/ /pUN+Da bar+d+ha'i yul du ni/ /tsa muN+DI zhes bya ba ste/ /stobs po che

yi skye gnas byung / /kha T+wAM ga yis lag pa brgyan/ /lha mo spyod dang grol bar byed/ /sdig pa ma lus zad byed pa/ /bum pa zhes bya'i zhing skyong ni/ /zhing de na ni yang dag gnas/ /dzA lan+d+ha ra ni bzhin
dwangs ma/ /chags pa'i rigs kyi skye gnas byung / /rdo rje lcags sgrog thogs nas ni/ /bde ba'i mchog ni kun la ster/ /grong khyer mchog der gnas lha mo/ /khang pa brtsegs mar brten te
gnas| |ral pa gsum zhes bya ba yi/ /zhing skyong shin tu gtsigs pa che/ /pre ta pu rir glog gi gdong / /gtsigs pa'i skye gnas yang dag byung / /lha mo dbyig pa shag+ti thogs/ /bsam
pa thams cad rdzogs byed ma/ /zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /drag po'i gzugs can 'jigs par byed/ /dril bu'i sgra zhes bya ba yi/ /k+Shi tra pA las smad pa min/ /'ug pa'i gdong
can 'jigs su rung / /so pa der ni me lce'i gdong / /zangs gri yis ni lag pa brgyan/ /sha chen gyi ni stan la gnas/ /bde ba'i dbang phyug rab ster ba/ /zhing dar gnas pa'i lha mo che/
shal ma li yi shing la gnas/ /bya ba kun mdzes zhes bya ba'i/ /k+She tra pA la 'jigs chen po/ /tsa rit+ta yi yul du ni/ /ka rany+tsa gnas zhes bya ba/ /shag+ti gtsigs pa'i skye gnas byung / /
shag+ti yi ni phyag rgya thogs/ /dril bu chen po zhes bya ba/ /k+She tra pA la stobs po che/ /sbrul dang ldan pa'i gyen skra can/ /gdug pa thams cad 'jigs
par mdzad/ /au D+yan du ni lha mo che/ /gsang ba zhes bya'i skye gnas byung / /lha mo rdo rje lcags sgrog thogs/ /shin tu drag cing gsal ba'i gzugs/ /sgra chen zhes bya drag po'i
gzugs/ /k+She tra pA la stobs po che/ /gnas mchog der gnas lha mo de/ /a sho ka yi shing brten gnas/ /dzA lan+d+ha rar gtum mo ni/ /zhi ba yi ni skye gnas byung / /lag na
zangs kyi phyar te thogs/ /dbang phyug thams cad ster ba mo/ /gnas der gnas pa drag chen mo/ /gser shing la ni brten te gnas/ /skyed pa zhes bya'i dpa' bo che/ /bdud rnams
thams cad 'jigs par byed/ /k+She re ker ni skye bo'i ma/ /drag cing sngo la stobs chen ma/ /ral gri lag thogs lha mo che/ /dngos grub thams cad ster ba mo/ /lha mo chen mo gyan skra
'bar| |sA la'i shing la brten te gnas/ /lhun po chen po zhes bya ba'i/ /k+She tra pA la zhing der gnas/ /ma ya pu rer 'dod ma ste/ /'jigs pa'i gdong gi skye gnas byung / /rdo rje
shag+ti dge ba thogs/ /sgrub po rnams la stobs ster ba/ /gzugs sngon 'jigs pa chen mo ste/ /'byung po'i shing la brten te gnas/ /der gnas 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i/ /
k+She tra pA la stobs po che/ /bu ta nar ni a mra ke /dgra rnams thams cad 'jigs byed pa/ /thong gshol dang ni ga ya thogs/ /sems can thams cad dbang byed ma/ /da ru'i shing
la brten te gnas/ /sems can thams cad 'jigs par byed/ /brtul zhugs chen po zhes bya ba'i/ /k+She tra bA la zhing der gnas/ /rgyal ba'i khab tu dzan sa/ /khrag chen gyi ni skye
gnas byung / /rdo rje lcags kyur yang dag ldan/ /pha rol g.yul las rgyal bar mdzad/ /zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /dzi li 'i sgra 'byin 'jigs par byed/ /rna chen zhes bya'i
zhing skyong ni/ /rtag tu de dang nye bar gnas/ /bod yul du ni lhan skyes te/ /rang byung gi ni skye gnas byung / /chu srin rgyal mtshan lag na thogs/ /zhi zhing gsal ba'i gzugs can te/ /
yul der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /brag gi khyim la brten te gnas/ /longs spyod ces bya'i dpa' bo che/ /k+She tra pA la thub dka' ba'o/ /ma la bar ni dbang bskur ma/ /tho ba yi ni phyag rgya
thogs/ /sgrub pa bo la rtag tu brtse/ /grags dang dpal dang bkra shis ster/ /zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo de/ /mngar ba'i shing la brten te gnas/ /skyes bu'i dbang phyug ces bya ba'i//
zhing skyong sna tshogs dbang phyug yod/ /zhing 'di rnams kyi bu mo dang / /dpa' bo rnams ni dngos grub ster/ /rtag tu mtshan mo 'byin pa dang / /rtag tu mtshan mo 'du bar byed/ /mkha'
la spyod pa rnyed dka' ba'i/ /dngos grub yangs pa ster 'gyur te/ /sgrub pa po yi las rnams ni/ /thams cad 'grub 'gyur the tshom med/ /de nas
dngos grub kun ster ba'i/ /mchod pa'i cho ga bshad par bya/ /me tog bdug pa de bzhin du/ /mar me dri yi khyad par dang / /gtor ma'i snod kyis nye bar mchod/ /sha rlon
dang ni nya la sogs/ /bza' ba'i rdzas ni thams cad dang / /de bzhin bdud rtsi lnga yi mchog /g.yon gyi char ni snod yin te/ /g.yas su khro bo bstan par bya/ /oM| shing
gcig dang ni dur khrod dang / /ri bo dang ni ri sul phug /grong dang bzhi mdor zhing dang ni/ /khyad par du ni khang stong dang / /sems can snod dang thang dang ni/ /khyad par du ni chu la
gnas| |nag pa drag po drag chen po/ /lha sbyin mnyam du bsten pa dang / /nag po gtsigs pa 'jigs byed dang / /rga las 'das dang log 'dren rnams/ /rgan byed ma dang drag
mo dang / /'jigs byed ma dang u ma dang / /rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ma dang / /mi thub gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ /nag po bzang mo nag chen mo/ /nag spom ma dang rnal 'byor
ma| |dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo/ /drag tu ldang dang 'phyang ba mo/ /'phrog byed ma dang mar me ma/ /'jib byed grong gnas rnal 'byor ma/ /drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen mo//
mche ba gtsigs dang thod chen ma/ /thod phreng phreng can kha T+wAM ma/ /sprul chen ral gri dgra sta can/ /rdo rje de bzhin gzhu can ma/ /de nyid chen mo'i mkha' 'gro lnga/ /las kun rjes su sgrub
byed pa| |sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal mo che/ /de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen te/ /rdul med rnal 'byor 'byin pa mo/ /rdo rje dbang mo bka' 'di yis//

thams cad kun nas 'dir sbyon cig /oM kA kA ka d+ha na b+ha ba ban+d+ha na kha kha khAd+ha na sarba duSh+Ta na/ ha na ha na/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ a mu ka s+ya kA R+yaM ku ru hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT dzaH swAhA/ bdud
rtsi yis ni kha bkang ste/ /lha rnams thams cad tshim par bya/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma yis ni/ /las rnams thams cad sgrub par bsgom/ /oM b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ sarba yo ge shwa ri hUM
hUM hUM dzaHswAhA/ la sogs sbyor ba ji bzhin du/ /gtor ma'i las ni sbyar bya ste/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang dgug /bsad dang sdang dang bcing ba la/ /sgrub pos gtor ma'i
de nyid kyis/ /las rnams thams cad bsgrub bya zhing / /ye shes lcags kyu'i bye brag gis/ /rang 'dod lha ni tshim par bya/ /zhing dang gnas dang de bzhin grong / /grong khyer
ri yi rtse mo ru/ /'byung po thams cad tshogs gyur par/ /'dus na sgrub po la mchog ster/ /gnas la sogs par rtag gnas shing / /sgrub pa po ni gus ldan la/ /lha mo
rnams kyis mchog ster bar/ /sgrub pa po la the tshom med/ /gang gis sgrub pa po 'grub pa'i/ /ro yi sgrub pa bshad par bya/ /rgan po ma yin
rma med cing / /mdze dang shu ba la sogs spangs/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa yis/ /'byung po'i nyi ma la bsgrub bya/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par dang / /lha yi chu yis
bkru bar bya/ /mar khu chen pos byug pa dang / /bdug pa chen pos de bdug bya/ /maN+Dal gru bzhi byas nas ni/ /de dbus 'bad pas gru gsum bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
bdag la gson/ /zhes bya la sogs sngon bzhin brjod/ /ha hA hi hI hUM hUM he he zhes bya'i rgod pa rnam par brgyad/ /sgrub pa po yis chog bzhin bya/ /me la gnas pa'i sa bon
ni| |rlung gi sa bon gyis phye ba/ /spyi gtsug tu ni sbyar byas la/ /sa yi steng du mchod par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma yi dbus gnas par/ /'bad pa yis ni myur du blta/ /sgrub
pos bdag nyid bsam bya ba/ /skye gnas dbus su rim bzhin blta/ /'bar phreng gi rgya mtsho ste/ /pho nya 'od dang bcas blta zhes/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo
rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ 'du
ba'i gnas nges pa dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bco brgyad pa'o/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dge ba dang / /lha rnams thams cad sgrub pa dang / /de
bzhin pho nya'i khyad par dang / /'byung po gdon gyi rig pa che/ /gang gzhan lus srul la sogs pa/ /de bzhin sngags kyi phreng ba rnams/ /da ni khyod la bshad kyi nyon/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi
pa| |sgo khyud dang ni ldan pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor nyams dga' bri bar bya/ /dngos grub kun gyi yon tan gnas/ /'dod yon lnga yis rab brgyan pa/ /mchod pa lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /
ro la g.yogs pa'i ras sam ni/ /mtshon gyis brgyab pa'i ras dag dang / /bu btsas pa yi ras dang ni/ /ba lang ko ba la sogs la/ /dam tshig can gyi 'bri mkhan gyis/ /sgrub po mchog
gis 'bri ru gzhug /tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la/ /'byung po'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya/ /de nas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pas/ /mngon sum du ni mdun gnas 'gyur/ /
tshangs pa mo dang zhi ba mo/ /gzhon nu mo dang phag mo dang / /dbang mo dang ni tsa muN+DI/ /tshogs kyi dbang mo sreg byed ma/ /rim pa gnyis pa'i 'o/ /dbang po gshin rje chu lha dang / /lus
ngan dang ni yi dwags gtso/ /sreg byed bden bral rlung gi lha/ /rim pa gsum pa'i'o/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang / /mig dmar dang ni gza' lhag dang / /phur bu dang ni pa bsangs/ /spen pa
dang ni rA hu la/ /rim pa bzhi pa'i 'o/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug de bzhin du/ /ru tra skem byed sgo bzhir ro/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung / /'byung po chen po'i khams
rnams dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang mar me ma/ /'jib byed 'phrog byed bcas pa'i gtso/ /'byung po las kyang 'byung ba'i gzugs/ /sgrub po cho ga bzhin du sgrub/ /dkyil 'khor chen
po'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /dbus su kun nas zlum por ni/ /ri mo mdzes pas bskor bar bya/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad bris nas ni/ /ge sar gsang ba'i spyod
yul gyi| |dbus su khro bo chen po bri/ /zhil gcig phyag ni bzhi pa ste/ /zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs/ /khro dang bcas shing bzhad pa'i zhal/ /sku mdog sngon po drag chen po/ /
thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par klubs/ /yi dwags la zhon nyi mar bzhugs/ /sum cu gsum pa 'jigs par mdzad/ /gar dang ldan zhing stag lpags man pas/ /spyan gsum
shin tu gsal ba'i gzugs/ /rdo rje 'bar ba ba dan gsum/ /khrag gang ba yi gshor dang bcas/ /mda' dang gzhu ni de bzhin te/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gis 'phyar/ /
shar du mkha' 'gro ma bri ste/ /lho yi phyogs su 'phrog byed ma/ /'jig byed lha mo nub tu bri/ /byang du lha mo 'bar ma'o/ /lha mo phag mo zhes bya ba/ /phyag bzhi yi ge hrI las byung / /sku
mdog sngon mo grags chen mo/ /phag gi gdong can 'jigs par byed/ /mda' dang de bzhin gzhu dang ni/ /rgyal mtshan thod pa thogs pa'o/ /zhi ba mo ni phaiM las byung / /mdog dmar gzi
brjid chen mo ste/ /thod pa dang ni lcags kyu dang / /kha T+wAM DaM ru de bzhin no/ /gzhon nu ma ni haM las byung / /kha dog ser mo phyag bzhi pa/ /mdung rtse gsum dang ba dan gsum/ /mda' dang
gzhu ni de bzhin no/ /tsa muN+Di ni ho las byung / /mdog sngo lag pa bzhi pa ste/ /kha T+wAM dang ni thod pa dang / /gshor dang de bzhin Da ma ru/ /baM las byung ba'i tshangs pa mo/ /mdog dkar lag pa
bzhi pa ste/ /pad+ma dang ni thod pa dang / /de bzhin gzhan na mda' gzhu 'o/ /tshogs kyi dbang mo gaM las byung / /sngo bsangs mdog ste lag bzhi ma/ /mdung rtse gsum dang thod pa dang / /bgrang
phreng g.yas g.yon lag tu thogs/ /khyab 'jug ma ni baM las byung / /mdog sngo lag pa bzhi pa ste/ /chang dang chu yi thod pa dang / /zhags pa kha T+wAM de bzhin gzhan/ /dbang mo i las
byung ba ste/ /mdog ser lag pa bzhi dang ldan/ /rdo rje shag+ti thod pa dang / /sdigs mdzub dang ni zhags pa nyid/ /thams cad gyen skra 'bar ba dang / /sna tshogs kyis ni brgyan pa ste/ /
ro yi stan bzhugs spyan gsum dang / /stag gi pags pas rked dkris pa'o/ /shar skor tshangs pa bri bya ste/ /mdog dkar lag pa bzhi dang ldan/ /thod pa dang ni bgrang phreng dang / /ril ba
spyi blugs pad+ma thogs/ /byang du de bzhin khyab 'jug ste/ /mdog sngon lag pa bzhi dang ldan/ /mdung dang de bzhin 'khor lo dang / /thod pa dang ni dbyug pa
mchog |lho ru ru tra bri bya ste/ /du ba'i mdog can lag pa bzhi/ /rtse gsum mdung dang thod pa dang / /zhags pa dang ni bgrang phreng thogs/ /nub tu skem byed bri bya ste/ /mdog ser lag pa
bzhi dang ldan/ /shag+ti dang ni dbyug pa dang / /dpa' bo'i thod pa bgrang phreng thogs/ /dbang ldan khyu mchog stan la zhon/ /kha dog dkar po lag bzhi pa/ /thod pa dang ni rtse gsum thogs/ /
gzhan gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /dbang po glang chen zhon pa ste/ /mdog ser lag pa bzhi dang ldan/ /rdo rje dang ni thod pa thogs/ /gzhan gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /me ni lug gi stan
la zhon| |kha dog dmar po lag bzhi pa/ /me thab nyid dang thod pa dang / /gzhan gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /gshin rje ma he'i stan la zhon/ /kha dog sngon po lag bzhi pa/ /dbyug pa
dang ni thod pa thogs/ /gzhan gnyis skrag ste thal sbyar ba'o/ /bden bral mi ro'i stan bzhugs pa/ /kha dog ljang gu lag bzhi pa/ /kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa thogs/ /gzhan gnyis
skrag ste thal sbyar ba'o/ /chu lha chu srin stan la bzhugs/ /kha dog dkar po lag bzhi pa/ /zhags pa dang ni thod pa thogs/ /gzhan gnyis skrag ste thal sbyar ba'o/ /rlung ni sha ba'i
stan la bzhugs/ /du ba'i mdog can lag bzhi pa/ /ba dan dang ni thong ba thogs/ /gzhan gnyis de bzhin thal sbyar ba'o/ /lus ngan gter gyi stan la gnas/ /kha dog ser
po lag bzhi pa/ /rin chen dang ni tho ba thogs/ /gzhan gnyis de bzhin thal sbyar ba'o/ /gza' dang skar ma thams cad kyang / /rang rang dam tshig las byung zhing / /rdzu 'phrul ldan
zhing stobs chen po/ /rang rang stan la gnas par bsam/ /ma mo rnams kyang kun gyi ma/ /'byung po'i rig pa gzhan de bzhin/ /las rnams thams cad sgrub pa yi/ /pho nya'i sgrub thabs
de nas bshad/ /so sor stobs kyis tshar bcad pa/ /nyon cig lha mo skal chen mo/ /longs spyod la dga'i sgrub pa pos/ /pho nya'i las ni brtsam par bya/ /zla ba rdo rje'i cho ga yis/ /rdo rje
sems dpa' bsgoms byas te/ /sngags kyi rgyal po bskul ba yis/ /thams cad bran bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /dur khrod dang ni shing gcig tu/ /der ni dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya/ /shar
dang byang dang nub dang ni/ /de bzhin du ni lho phyogs su/ /drug drug tu ni byas nas su/ /de nas mchod pa brtsam par bya/ /gnas las sogs pa nyi shu bzhi/ /rim pa bzhin du yongs
su bskor/ /dri dang me tog de bzhin du/ /mar me dang ni dri yi chu/ /dri yi chu yis bkang ba yi/ /bum pa'ang gos kyis mdzes par bya/ /nyin mtshan phrugs gcig gnas gyur cing / /
de nas mtshan gcig gnas par bya/ /gnas sogs yang yang phyag byas nas/ /de nas bzod pa gsol bar bya/ /dpa' bo yi ni ston mo yis/ /dang
por slob dpon mnyes par bya/ /de ltar byas pa'i sngags pa yis/ /phyi nas las ni brtsam par bya/ /gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang / /dmyal bar nges par sreg 'gyur te/ /
bgegs kyis nye bar gtses nas ni/ /nges par dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur/ /dam tshig ldan pa'i bri mkhan gyis/ /'byung po'i nyi ma la rnyed pa'i/ /bu btsas la sogs ras la ni/ /
tshon rtsi khrag dang bsres nas su/ /steng du skyes pa'i nang bzhag nas/ /sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /yi dwags sen rtsi mar chen dang / /sha chen gyis ni bdug par bya/ /de la dri yis
bsgos nas su/ /de bzhin yi dwags me tog mchod/ /lha mo chen mo mchod pa 'dis/ /me 'bar ma ni mchog tu mnyes/ /shing gcig gi ni drung du ni/ /cho ga bzhin du 'bum bzlas bya/ /rgyal
la sogs pa'i dus su ni/ /slob dpon gyi ni 'bri ru gzhug /sor ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya/ /gzugs bzang bzhon pa phun sum tshogs/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ /gos
ni ser po bgos par bri/ /lag gnyis gyen du thal mo sbyar/ /me 'bar ba ni kun tu 'od/ /sgrub po'i mdun du bkram nas ni/ /'bad de cho ga bzhin mchod bya/ /me tog dmar dang dri la
las sogs/ /sha skam gyis ni bdug par bya/ /sha dang nya sha tsong la sogs/ /nye bar spyod pa'i gtor ma sbyin/ /rdzas lnga dag gi dngos po yis/ /mchod nas 'bum du bzlas na
ni| |dang po la ni sgra 'byung ste/ /gnyis pa la ni nya dri bro/ /gsum par shing ni g.yo 'gyur te/ /bzhi pa la ni mdun du gnas/ /dam tshig phyag rgya bstan nas ni/ /sngags ni de la brjod
par bya/ /lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /spyi bor bzhag ste brjod bya ba/ /oM de be shwa ri hUM/ phuHphuHphuH/ dam tshig gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis bkang ba yi/ /
dam tshig chu ni sbyin par bya/ /'bad de dam tshig byin nas ni/ /lag pa g.yon pas gzung bar bya/ /rnal 'byor ma dang gnyis med pa/ /byin gyis rlobs la nga sgrubs shig /de nas
shin tu mdzes ma yis/ /bza' dang btung sogs ston mo dang / /gser zho gnyis ni ster 'gyur te/ /zad pa nyid du longs spyod bya/ /'dod la dga' ba'i 'bar byed ma/ /gal te grub
par ma gyur na/ /drag mo yi ni sa bon gyis/ /gzir te 'bum du bzlas par bya/ /sa bon gyis ni gzir tsam gyis/ /mar me ma yi spyi bo 'gems/ /rtag tu sems can don brtson pas/ /
'bar ma chung mar bsgrub par bya/ /nyon cig lha mo shes rab che/ /gzhan yang mkha' 'gro sgrub pa'i thabs/ /thang ga khru gnyis byas nas su/ /lhag par gnas te mchod gtor nas/ /
de nas ri mo 'bri ru gzhug /dkar zhing dmar la shin tu mdzes/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol/ /lag
na sdigs mdzub lcags kyu thogs/ /skra grol bas ni rnam par mdzes/ /me 'bar 'od zer shin tu gsal/ /ha har dgod cing mig yon ma/ /sa la khrag gis byugs nas su//
gnas der bris sku dgram par bya/ /me tog dmar po las sogs dang / /dri dang bdug pa'i khyad par gyis/ /nye bar mchod pa'i gtor ma dgod/ /sha dang nya dang tsong la sogs//
bdud rtsi lnga yis dgang bar bya/ /rnal 'byor ma ni sgom zhing zlos/ /'bum phrag gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas su/ /khar bcug nas ni bgad par bya/ /
oM DA ki nI hUM phuHphuH/ sgrub pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /dang pos ni g.yo 'gyur te/ /gnyis pa la ni mdun du dgod/ /gsum pa mdun du snang 'gyur te/ /bzhi pa la ni bka' nod do/ /
bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyis/ /dam tshig 'bad de byin nas ni/ /g.yog mo ru ni bsgrubs pa yis/ /ci 'dod bka' ni bsgom par bya/ /dgra rnams bsad cing smad pa dang / /yan lag
gzir ba gang 'dod pa'i/ /las la sogs pa thams cad ni/ /g.yog mo'i las kyis sgrub par 'gyur/ /gal te 'bum gyis gdon zan/ /rdo rje ma yi sa bon gyis/ /sngon du bstan pa'i
chog bzhin/ /mkhas pas gzir bar byas te bzla/ /ra dag gi ni pags pa la/ /'bad de thad ka brkyang bar bya/ /'jib byed ma ni 'bri ru gzhug /kha dog dmar po shin tu mdzes/ /lus
la rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / /mdzes pa'i gos ni gyon par bri/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang / /g.yas su dgra sta dgod par bya/ /lam gyi bzhi mdo yid 'ong bar/ /mkhas
pa yis ni bsgrub bya ste/ /lci ba yis ni byug bya la/ /me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya/ /me tog bdug pa mar me sogs/ /'byung po kun gyi gtor ma sbyin/ /khrag dang nya dang sha dang tsong / /
bza' ba dag ni sna tshogs dang / /bdud rtsi lnga yis bkang la sbyin/ /'bad de bsam gtan gnas par bzla/ /oM A kaR+Sha ya phuHphaT/ /lag gnyis mnyam par byas nas su/ /
zhags pa'i tshul gyis gar bskyod bya/ /snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas pas/ /'jib byed ma ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /dang po khyi ni du ba'i sgra/ /gnyis
pa la ni gsal bar dgod/ /gsum pa la ni mtshon thogs nas/ /bsdigs pa'i phyir ni 'ong bar byed/ /bzhi par mdun du gnas nas ni/ /bdag gis ci bgyi bka' stsol smras/ /
bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyis/ /dam tshig dag ni byin nas su/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /dbul po bdag gis khyod bsgrubs so/ /de nas nyi ma re re zhing / /gser
srang phyed phyed ster bar 'gyur/ /gal te 'bum gyis ma grub na/ /ro langs snying pos gzir te bzla/ /sa bon 'di yis gzir tsam gyis/ /'jib byed
ma yi mgo 'gems so/ /chu 'gram gyi ni sa phyogs su/ /kam po dzi ni bsgrub par bya/ /ba lang la sogs ko ba ni/ /brgyang ste 'phrog byed ma 'brir gzhug /lus ni sprul gyis
brgyan pa ste/ /kha dog sngon po 'bar ba'i 'od/ /skra grol bas ni rnam par brgyan/ /gos dmar bgos shing phyag gnyis mdzes/ /ral gri dang ni zhags pa thogs/ /ha har
dgod cing rnam par gtsigs/ /khrag gis maN+Dal byugs nas ni/ /dri dang me tog bdug pas bdug/ /sha dang nya dang tsong la sogs/ /nye bar mchod pa'i gtor ma sbyin/ /bdud
rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi/ /sngon bzhin lha yi gtor ma sbyin/ /rnal 'byor pa ni sgom zhing zlos/ /'bum gcig gis ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /dang po chu ni g.yo bar 'gyur/ /gnyis pa
la ni char chen 'bab/ /gsum par thog ni 'bab 'gyur te/ /bzhi pa la ni mdun du gnas/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyis/ /dam tshig de nas 'bad de sbyin/ /oM kraM kruM phuMH phuHswAhA/
lag gnyis khu tshur bcings nas su/ /de yi sngags ni brjod par bya/ /snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /mdun na thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /ci zhig bgyi zhes brjod par 'gyur/ /ti

se'i gangs kyi rtse ru ni/ /brtse phyir khyod kyis nga khrid la/ /slar yang 'dir ni 'ong ba dang / /rgyal po'i bu mo'am gzhan yang rung / /nga 'dod pa ni khrid de shog /gser dang dngul dang zangs la sogs
bza' dang bgo dang btung ba dang / /ji ltar 'dod bzhin khyer te 'ong / /lha yi bu mo'am mi yang rung / /ti se'i gangs kyi rtse ru ni/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin khrid par byed/ /bstan pa'i las kyis
ma grub na/ /las gzhan gyis ni bsgrub par bya/ /bdag nyid ye shes mkha' 'gro ru/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgoms nas su/ /de ni rkang pa g.yon pa yis/ /mnan te lnga brgyar bzlas na
ni| |gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /gal te des kyang ma grub na/ /dpa' bo'i dbus su bkug nas ni/ /dum bu dum bur gtub par bya/ /kri zhes bya dang gsod pa dang / /hUM gi sa
bon bsgoms pa yis/ /thams cad du ni bza' bar bsam/ /des ni bsgrub bya'i rnal 'byor ma/ /thams cad kyi ni dbang phyug ma'ang / /gal te ma grub 'chi bar 'gyur/ /bstan pa'i
las kyis ma grub na/ /ba la ta ka nag po'i shing / /me sbar ba yi dbus su ni/ /khrag dang bcas pa'i yungs kar ni/ /nyi ma phyed na hUM zhes pa/ /brjod cing sbyin sreg byas na ni/ /mkha'
'gro rnams ni 'chi 'gyur bas/ /gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas sha dar sgrub pa'i thabs/ /nyon cig lha mo skal chen ma/ /dur khrod dang ni shing gcig dang / /chu 'gram
lam gyi bzhi mdor bsgrub/ /dam tshig can gyi 'bri mkhan gyis/ /tshon gyis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /sor ni bcu bzhi'i tshad dag tu/ /dpa' bo yi ni
ras la bri/ /gru gsum dkyil 'khor dge ba ste/ /dkyil 'khor zlum po'i tshul du bya/ /sku mdog sngon po glang la zhon/ /lus la thal ba'i rdul gyis byugs/ /pho mtshan gyen
'gren gzhi ba'i gzugs/ /ral pa'i cod pan mdung dang ldan/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par klubs/ /kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa nyid/ /de bzhin
gzhan ni gshor dang ldan/ /bshang gcir ldan pas mchod bya ste/ /'byung po kun gyi gtor ma sbyin/ /sngags 'di yis ni bkug nas su/ 'bum du bzlas par bsgrub par bya/ /
oM ka pA la mA la a laM kri ta shi ra se hUM hUM/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha ru trA ya swAhA/ spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /oM AHru trA hUM hUM swAhA/ 'bum du bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /
gal te grub par ma gyur na/ /de nas de ni bsreg par bya/ /grub nas bya ba thams cad ni/ /byed par 'gyur te gzhan du min/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /nor lha yi ni sgrub pa'i
thabs| |ri bo dang ni rgya mtsho'i 'gram/ /'bab chu 'dus pa'i mdog dag tu/ /sngar bstan pa yi cho ga yis/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /ser ni bcu gnyis tshad dag tu/ /
khyad par du ni bsgrub par bya/ /kha dog nag po shin tu mdzes/ /zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa ste/ /'khor lo dang ni dbyigs pa bsnams/ /thod pa pad+ma de bzhin no/ /rin chen gyi ni cod
pan dang / /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs/ /bshang gci dang ni khu ba khrag /mchod pa nyid du sbyin bya zhing / /mi yi sha yis bdugs byas na/ /dngos grub nye bar byed par 'gyur/ /
oM AHbadzra nA rA ya na hUM hUM swAhA/ /spyan drangs pa'i sngags so/ /oM ma ma tsa kra sA d+ha ya sarba a su rad ma na hUM swAhA/ stong phrag brgyar ni bzlas pa yis/ /lha ma yin ni kun gyis bskor/ /
'jug pa'i nus dang ldan 'gyur zhing / /sgyu ma thams cad ston byed de/ /dgra rnams thams cad 'dul nus shing / /rgyal srid dag kyang thob par 'gyur/ /cho ga'i rim pa 'di nyid kyis/ /
de nas tshangs pa'ang bsgrub bya ste/ /chu yi 'gram ni dpen pa dang / /khyad par pad+mo'i tshal du bsgrub/ /kha dog ser po phyag bzhi pa/ /gdong bzhi yis ni mdzes par byas/ /zhi ba ral ba'i
cod pan 'chang / /mchod phyir thogs kyis rnam par brgyan/ /pad+ma dang ni bgrang phreng dang / /dbyug pa dang ni thod pa bsnams/ /sgrub pa po yi gtso bo yis/ /bri sku dag ni dmigs nas su/ /
yid 'ong sna tshogs dri zhim ni/ /gur gum tsan+dan las sogs pa/ /dri chus yang yang bsgo bya zhing / /rtag tu sgom dang ldan pa yis/ /mchod pa'i cho ga rim de dag /b+ha ga'i dbus su sbyin par
bya/ /oM brah+mA gats+tsha hUM AHswAhA/ spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /oM b+hur+b+hu ba sta twa bi durba ru Na b+ha rgo de ba sa d+hi ma hi d+hi yo yon pra tso da ya ta/ 'bum du bzlas
pas 'grub 'gyur te/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / /dgug dang dbang du bya ba dang / /nor bskyed pa dang mngon spyod sogs/ /las rnams thams cad nus 'gyur te/ /bzlas dang
sbyin sreg kun gyis 'grub/ /khyod la yang dag bshad pa yin/ /nyon cig lha mo skal chen mo/ /bgegs kyi rgyal po sgrub pa'i thabs/ /ma mo'i khyim ni nyams dga' bar/ /sgom
pa dge ba byas nas ni/ /blo ldan mchod pa sngon 'gro bas/ /'bad de bris sku dmigs par bya/ /kha dog dmar po cher 'bar pa/ /skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs/ /
zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs dag dang ldan/ /'od zer dmar po 'bar zhing 'khrug /mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs par bri/ /dgra sta dang ni gtun
shing dang / /mda' dang gzhu ni de bzhin te/ /kha T+wAM ga dang lcags kyu dang / /khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang / /de bzhin rdo rje ral gri ste/ /gzhan yang sha chen thod pa bsnams/ /
mu sun+di dang ba dan gsum/ /shag+ti dang ni bcu gnyis so/ /oM a mo g+ha sid+d+h+ya sarbAr+tha me pra sA d+ha ya hUM hUM dzaHdzaHswAhA/ spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /oM AHga hUM swAhA/ bzlas
pa'i sngags so/ /stong phrag brgyas ni 'grub gyur te/ /de nas las ni brtsam par bya/ /lan gcig bzlas nas thig le dag /sngags pas byas na skal bzang 'gyur/ /rgyal po sgor yang
mchod 'thob ste/ /dgra rnams thams cad zad byed 'gyur/ /bgegs rnams ma lus bskrad pa dang / /'dod pa kun gyi 'bras ster bar/ /'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med/ /cho ga'i
sbyor ba de nyid kyis/ /ma mo rnams kyi sgrub thabs mchog /sbyor ba'i rim pa de nyid kyis/ /gza' rnams kyang ni sgrub par 'dod/ /oM sarba ti thi na k+Sha tra gra ha mang+ga bye b+h+yaHswAhA/
gza' thams cad kyi sngags so/ /oM zhes bya ba dang po ste/ /swAhA'i mtha' can byin brlab ces/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje
sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dang la rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ 'byung po dang gdon thams cad kyi sgrub thabs 'byung
ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu dgu pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo rnams kyis mchod cing phyag byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /ye shes de nyid khyad par dang / /
lus kyi mtshan ma ji ltar lags/ /rtsa rnams gang la brten gyur dang / /de rnams dbye ba mi 'tshal te/ /bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal/ /bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/
nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che/ /sgyu ma kun tu rnam 'phrul ba/ /rtsa chen po ni sum cu gnyis/ /de dag gzhan las shin tu gtso/ /bcu dang gnyis ni de bzhin du//
dbyangs rnams 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid de/ /yar ngo mar ngo'i bye brag gis/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir brjod pa yin/ /dus ni myur dang ring ba dag /yan lag mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid ni/ /
gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /'chi ba'i dus la bab pas gnas/ /dbugs ni rnam par rgod gyur na/ /lus can drug dang gnyis kyis 'chi/ /snga dro ro hi ta'i dus su/ /de yi mtshan
ma mtshon par bya/ /sna dang mig gi gnas dang ni/ /'gram pa dang ni rna ba'i rtsa/ /lce dang so yi mtshams dang ni/ /de bzhin mgrin pa'i phyi rol dang / /snying ga'i dra ba lte ba dang / /brla dang
byin pa de bzhin gzhan/ /chu so dang ni mtshan dag dang / /mgo dang spyi gtsug gi ni phyogs/ /dbugs ni tshad cing chad gyur pa'i/ /lus kyi mtshan ma myur ba ru/ /'chi ba'i dus ni ston
par byed/ /nyi ma'i grangs kyi tshad kyis ni/ /'khor los dus kyi bdag nyid brtsi/ /sgo gcig nas ni nyin drug tu/ /gang tshe dbugs ni rgyu gyur pa/ /yon tan gsum gyi lo dag ni//
zhag ni sum brgya drug cu ru/ /bgos pa yi ni tshad dag ni/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bstan par bya/ /lo gnyis dang ni zla ba dag /dus kyi grangs su bsten pa dang / /nyin zhag dag ni
bco ba rgyad du/ /de yi tshad ni yang dag brjod/ /nyi ma dag ni bdun dang mtha'/ /gal te rlung ni rgyur gyur na/ /lo gnyis dang ni de bzhin du/ /zla ba drug tu 'tsho 'gyur zhing / /de bzhin
lo gnyis zla ba ni/ /rig byed kyi ni grangs dang ni/ /nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru/ /'tsho 'gyur dus kyi grangs yin no/ /gal te nyin dgur rgyu gyur na/ /lo gnyis zla ba bzhi dang ni/ /nyin zhag nyi
ma'i grangs su ni/ /lus can rnams kyi sbyor pa yin/ /gal te nyin bcur rgyu gyur na/ /lo gnyis las ni mi 'tsho'o/ /gal te nyin zhag bcu gcig tu/ /sgo gcig nas ni rgyu ba dag /
lo gcig zla ba dgu dang ni/ /nyin zhag bco brgyad dag las ni/ /mi 'tsho mdzes ma khyod la bshad/ /nyin zhag bcu gnyis rgyu na ni/ /lo gcig dang ni zla ba ni/ /dbyangs kyi grangs dang nyin
zhag ni/ /dus kyi grangs las mi 'tsho'o/ /gal te nyin ma bcu gsum du/ /g.yas kyi lam nas rgyu ba ni/ /lo gcig dang ni zla ba dag /rig byed kyi ni grangs dang ni/ /nyi ma dgu las mi 'tsho
zhes/ /mdzes ma'i gdong can khyod la bshad/ /gal te bdun phrag gnyis su ni/ /g.yas kyi lam nas rlung rgyu de/ /lo gcig zla ba gnyis dang ni/ /nyi ma bcu yi phyed dag las/ /'tsho
bar mi 'gyur de yi ni/ /tshe tshad nges par bstan pa yin/ /gang zhig nyi ma lnga gsum du/ /g.yas kyi sgo nas rlung rgyun/ /lo gcig na ni gdon mi za/ /gang zhig brgyang phrag gnyis su ni/ /
g.yas nas rlung ni rgyu ba dag /de yi tshe tshad nges pa dag /zla ba bcu dang nyi ma ni/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi dag las ni/ /mi 'tsho bar ni ngas bshad do/ /
gal te nyin zhag bcu bdun du/ /g.yas kyi lam nas rlung rgyun/ /de nas de yi tshe tshad ni/ /zla ba dgu dang nyin zhag ni/ /bco brgyad dag las mi 'tsho bar/ /gdon mi za bar
bshad pa yin/ /nyin zhag bco brgyad rgyu na ni/ /zla ba dag ni brgyad dang ni/ /nyin zhag nyi ma'i grangs su ni/ /de yi dbus ni bshad pa yin/ /gal te nyin zhag bcu dgu ru/ /dri
yi bzhon pa rgyu ba dag /ji srid 'tsho bar bshad par bya/ /zla ba dag ni bdun dang ni/ /nyin zhag dus kyi grangs las ni/ /'tsho bar mi 'gyur gdon mi za/ /gal te nyin zhag nyi shur
ni| |rgyu ba zla ba drug na ni/ /de yi srog ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gal te nyin zhag nyi shu gcig /nyi ma'i lam nas rlung rgyu ba/ /zla ba lnga dang nyi ma ni/ /nyi ma'i grangs las mi 'tsho'o/ /
nyin zhag nyi shu gnyis rgyu na/ /zla ba rig byed grangs dang ni/ /nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bzhi las/ /mi 'tsho bar ni yang dag brjod/ /gal te nyin zhag nyi shu gsum/ /sgo gcig nas ni rlung

rgyun/ /zla ba bzhi dang nyi ma ni/ /dus kyi grangs las mi 'tshor brjod/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir rgyu ba dang / /zla ba gsum dang nyi ma ni/ /bcu gcig dag las mi 'tsho 'o/ /nyin zhag nyi shu lnga rgyun/ /zla
ba gsum las mi 'tsho'o/ /de las gong ma sngar bstan pa'i/ /grangs las mdor bsdus shes par bya/ /bcu dang gnyis kyi rtsis las ni/ /bar bar gyi ni bstan pa yin/ /cha dang cha yis
rim bzhin du/ /bar bar nyi ma gsal bar byas/ /blo dman rnams kyis rtogs bya'i phyir/ /dus de dag ni bshad pa yin/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams la ni dus/ /shin tu phra ba ngas bshad pa/ /
khams rnams snyoms pa'i lus la ni/ /de dag blta zhing yid ches bya/ /sgo ni steng du ltas 'bab pa/ /sna yi bar sha chad gyur na/ /nyin zhag bdun gyis the tshom med/ /cha shas dgu ni yang dag
gnas| |de bzhin sgo ni steng bltas las/ /mig gi chu ni chad gyur na/ /nyi ma lnga na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /cha shas bcu ni shes bya ba/ /steng du bltas te 'gro ba las/ /rna ba g.yon dang
'gram pa yi/ /ngos kyi mtshan ma dag las ni/ /nyin zhag gcig las mi 'tsho'o/ /cha shas bcu gcig gnas pa yi/ /gsal bar steng du 'gro ba las/ /rna ba g.yas par brten pa yis//
nyin zhag bco brgyad dag na 'chang / /cha shas bcu gnyis de bzhin gnas/ /lce yi skud pa nag mthong na/ /lus can dus kyi nyin zhag 'chi/ /cha shas bcu gsum brten pa yi/ /de bzhin
steng du 'bar ba yi/ /steng 'og so ni 'thams gyur na/ /'byung pa dag ni ma lus 'dren/ /srog ni dus grangs nyi mas 'gro/ /dbyangs yig bcu bzhi brten pa ni/ /mgrin pa'i bla na gnas pa'i rtsa//
steng du bltas pa zhes grags kyi/ /nyin zhag lnga las mi 'tsho'o/ /cha shas bco lnga gnas pa yi/ /steng du bltas pa'i mchog de la/ /brang gi dra ba zhom gyur
zla phyed na ni gdon mi bra/ /cha shas bcu drug rdzogs pa'i bdag /lte ba'i dbus gyur steng bltas pa/ /sen mo'i khrag ni med gyur na/ /nyin zhag bcu na yang dag nyal/ /slar yang cha shas
bcu bdun ni/ /gnas pa'i brla yi mtshan ma las/ /nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bzhi na/ /'chi 'gyur 'dir ni gdon mi za/ /cha shas bco brgyad gnas pa yi/ /byin pa la ni gnas pa'i
rtsa| |de bzhin steng du bltas pa yis/ /nyin zhag nyi ma'i grangs kyis mchi/ /bcu dgu yi ni cha shas gnas/ /chu so de bzhin steng bltas pas/ /de dang mnyam pa'i nyin zhag gis/ /
'chi 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /cha shas nyi shu gnas pa yi/ /pho mtshan la ni gnas pa'i rtsa/ /steng du bltas pa mchog dbang phyug /mtshan mas nyin zhag dus kyi ni/ /grangs kyis
'chi 'gyur the tshom med/ /re'u mig bcu gnyis brtsis pa la/ /bar bar nyi ma bstan pa dag /lo yi rim gyis de sbyangs te/ /bdun cu rtsa gnyis rim pa dang / /sum cu rtsa drug bco
brgyad kyis/ /zla ba la sogs go rim bzhin/ /rim gyis rim gyis 'bri bar bya/ /lhag mar gang zhig gyur pa ni/ /bsdus te 'tsho ba'i dus su ni/ /lha mo chen mo shes bya zhes/ /
mkha' 'gro gun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal rdo rje
mkha' 'gro las/ /rtsa dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i dbugs 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu pa'o// //sgo dgu po yi mtshan nyid dang / /rtsa ni gang bar
gnas pa yi/ /yon tan skyon sogs ji ltar blta/ /de rnams bye brag mi 'tshal te/ /ye shes dbang la nyan par 'tshal/ /bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/ /god du 'pho ba'i sbyor
mtshan nyid/ /bshad kyi lha mo mnyan par gyis/ /sngon du bdag nyid sbyangs byas la/ /phyi nas las ni brtsam par bya/ /gzugs med gnas pa mdog sngo ba'i/ /bde chen zla ba lta bu 'dzag/
slar yang gzugs su gnas pa ste/ /rnam pa kun gyis brgyan pa'o/ /cha shas bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /kha ni thur du bltas te 'phyang / /go 'phang gnas pa'i gnas nas ni/ /kun da zla 'dra rtag tu
dag /rnam shes ye shes bdud rtsi ni/ /lha mo chen mo 'bab pa'i mchog /rten du gyur pa'i pad+ma gang / /zla ba'i 'od kyis rnam par brgyan/ /de ni cha dang cha yi gzugs/ /gong du gnas pa zhes
byar brjod/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gnas kyi mtha' ni dag par bya/ /dag nas srid pa 'pho bya yi/ /gzhan du na ni don med 'gyur/ /dgang ba yis ni lus bkang na/ /dug dang rims
kyis tsha ba 'phrog /bum pa can gyis sgo bcings na/ /sgo yi sbu gu dag par 'gyur/ /'thor bas sna tshogs rdul du bya/ /rab tu zhi bas zhi bar 'gyur/ /rnam shes
dbrog pa'i cho ga dang / /gzhan du 'gro ba'ang bshad par bya/ /de nas phyi rol sbyor ba ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni sbyang bar bya/ /gnas gnyis dag ni bsams nas su/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor
bsgom par bya/ /rlung gi dbus su me yis ni/ /yang dang yang du dbye bar bya/ /A li kA lir ldan pa yi/ /sa bon der ni sbyar bar bya/ /rnal 'byor pa yis khyad par du/ /'byung dang
'jug pas bzlas par bya/ /'byung ba ye shes sa bon gyis/ /bsnun dang ldan par bsam par bya/ /'jug pa snying gi rnam shes la/ /me tog lta bur bsnun par bya/ /rnal 'byor pas ni 'byung
bzlas te/ /bdag nyid las ni phyi rol bya/ /'jug pa 'byung bar 'tsho bya ste/ /de kho na nyid mnyam par bsgom/ /mnyam gzhag dngos po bsgoms na ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom
med| |de nas phyi rol lus la ni/ /sgrub pa po yis rnam par sprul/ /nyi ma'i lam nas dang phyung ste/ /lha mo cha shas ldan par bya/ /bsgrub bya'i snying gar zhugs nas ni/ /rlung dang me yis
'bar ba dag /de yi rnam pa des bzung nas ni/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug /bsgrub bya'i rnam shes bsdus nas su/ /'og gi 'khor lor sbyar bar bya/ /ji srid zad par byas bar du/ /
de srid lkugs te gnas par 'gyur/ /'chi ba'i dus la bab gyur na/ /'chi ba'i mtshan ma ston pa dang / /rims la sogs pas ma phog par/ /gong du 'pho ba mchog yin no/ /de nas gzhan lus
la 'jug pa/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /seng+ge rnam rol phyag rgya yis/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bcings nas su/ /rtag tu srog dang rtsol bar bya/ /khyod kyis gnas su sbyar nas ni/ /
rang gi lus ni yongs btang ste/ /rim gyis sbyor pas phye nas su/ /cho ga 'di ltar byas pa yis/ /sngags pa gzhan gyi lus la 'jug /sbyor ba'i rim pa de nyid kyis/ /rang gi lus la sbyar bar
'dod| |'gro dang 'ong ba'i bye brag gis/ /mnyam par bzhag ste gang byed pa/ /dpa' bo'i dbang phyug thams cad dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang sbyor bas mchod/ /gang gi ring nas thes gyur
pa| |de ni yang dag bshad kyi nyon/ /de bzhin mkhas pas gzhan sems kyi/ /bsam pa rjes su shes par bya/ /sgom dang bzlas pa'i khyad par bgyi/ /sbyor ba'i dam pa skye bar 'gyur/ /gang
gis lam nas bsams na ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /'khor lo gang zhig sngar bstan par/ /zhugs te nyan pa gnyis su ni/ /'jig rten gsum dang 'dres nas ni/ /me stag
bzhin du rnam par 'khor/ /rlung gis bskyod pa'i me yis ni/ /shes rab ldan pas zhugs bsams na/ /zla drug tsam gyis nges par ni/ /ring na gnas pa thos par 'gyur/ /sgom pa'i sbyor
ba 'di yis ni/ /ye shes mig gis mthong gyur pa/ /shin tu ring na gnas pa yang / /sgrub pos skad cig gsal bar mthong / /bstan dang ma bstan gang ci'ang
rung | |de kun nga yis yang dag bshad/ /nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che/ /dge ba'i sgo nas 'gro ba dang / /gang gis lam nas 'gro ba yis/ /thar pa'i dngos grub rab ster ba/ /mchog dang tha
ma'i bye brag rnams/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /lte ba las ni 'dod khams lha/ /thig ler gzugs can mtho ris te/ /steng nas 'gro bar steng gi ni/ /myur du 'gro ba
byed par 'gyur/ /sna nas gnod sbyin gnas su ste/ /rna ba dag ni grub pa'i lha/ /gal te mig las ye shes 'gro/ /mi rnams kyi ni bdag por 'gyur/ /srid pa'i sgo las yi
dwags te/ /de bzhin chu las dud 'gro'o/ /chu min gyis ni dmyal bar ltung / /thar pa'i lam las gzhan du 'gro/ /sngon du bum pa brtsams pa yis/ /sgo rnams thams
cad bcing bar bya/ /rgyal ba lnga yi mchod rten gyi/ /sgo yi bu gar bsgom par bya/ /de la 'og gi sgo ru ni/ /chu yi sa bon dkar po bsam/ /chu dang chu min sgo la ni/ /me yi sa
bon 'bar ba ste/ /de la shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /dbugs ni bum pa can du bsgom/ /lus ni rlung gi mdog tu ste/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /rlung gi mtha' ni rtsa ba
can| |rlung gi sa bon 'bar ba ste/ /thig le sgra dang ldan pa yi/ /rtsa ba'i sa bon drang bar bya/ /'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis/ /sgra dang sgra yis 'phul bar byed/ /dus la bab na 'pho bya ste//
dus min lha rnams gsod par 'gyur/ /lha rnams bsad pa tsam gyis ni/ /dmyal bar nges par sreg par 'gyur/ /de bas 'chi tha'i mtshan ma ni/ /mkhas pas 'bad de shes par bya/ /
rnal 'byor pa yis sngar bstan pa'i/ /sngon chen bde ba phun sum tshogs/ /sgrub po rnams kyis smin pa la/ /steng gi rtsa ba bza' bar bya/ /chu dang skya rengs ldan pa dag /g.yon pa'i bdud
rtsir sbyar byas la/ /zos na zhi dang rgyas pa ste/ /dug dang rims kyis tsha ba 'phrog /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rnying dang smin pa 'joms par byed/ /lha mo slar yang bzlog pa yis/ /nam
mkhar 'gro ba brjod par bya/ /rlung dang me yi bye brag gis/ /rkang pa'i 'khor lor sbyar byas te/ /yid kyis rab tu zhir sbyar nas/ /nam mkha' la ni 'gro 'gyur zhing / /mkha' 'gro kun
gyis bskor nas su/ /lha yi lus kyi sa kun tu rtse/ /ji srid zla nyi yod kyi bar/ /de srid nam mkhar gnas par 'gyur/ /slar yang lugs las ldog pa yi/ /kha dog dkar po'i pad+ma bsam//
bsgrub bya'i dbus su sbyar na ni/ /rtag tu ngag gi dngos grub byed/ /rang gi lus dbus bsgom bya ba/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'khrug pa ltar/ /rang gi kha nas byung nas su/ /bsgrub bya'i kha ru
thim par bya/ /nyi ma bdun gyis dngos grub tu/ /'gyur te gzhan du yong ma yin/ /rlung gi lam nas bsgrub bya yi/ /lus la thim par gyur pa dang / /de yi
sems ni bzung nas su/ /bdag la gzhug ste me la ni/ /bsams te rlung dang me sbar bas/ /de yi lus ni 'khrug par 'gyur/ /tshigs dgu las ni steng gzhan gyis/ /mod la 'pho bar
shes bya ste/ /nyin re bram ze gsod pa dang / /mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang / /rku 'phrog 'dod la spyod pa yang / /lam 'di yis ni dag 'gyur te/ /sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur zhing / /
srid pa'i skyon las ring du 'gro/ /ji ltar 'dam las skyes pa yi/ /pad+ma dri med yid 'ong ba/ /de bzhin lus kyi 'dam las ni/ /ye shes sku ni 'dod bzhin 'gro/ /mkha' 'gro
kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po

dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ gong du 'pho ba'i bsam gtan dang / seng+ge rnam par rol pa'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu gcig pa'o/ /ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /g.yas kyi cha ru rnal 'byor pa/ /g.yon du rnal 'byor ma nyid de/ /sor mo khar ni 'jug byed pa/ /mkha' 'gro
ma yi mtshan ma'o/ /g+ho g+hu/ thal mo spyi bor 'jog byed pa/ /'bar byed ma yi mtshan ma'o/ /gu g+hu/ mthe bong 'tshir bar byed pa ni/ /'jib byed ma yi mtshan ma'o/ /mu g+hu/ lag pa rnam par
rdeb pa ni/ /blo ldan 'phrog byed rtags yin no/ /lu g+hu/ sna rtser skyor ma rdeb pa ni/ /thugs bde mi bde 'dri ba yin/ /daMSh+Tu/ sha ba'i mgo ltar ston byed pa/ /rnal 'byor byed pa'i mtshan ma
'o| |gan+d+ho de/ gang zhig smin ma'i dbus reg pa/ /nga yi snying sdug grogs po'o/ /a li ni da ha/ so yis lce ni 'tshir byed pa/ /'dus nang gtor ma bza' zhes pa'o/ /b+hak+She yo/ /lag pa rtsa

la 'du byed pa/ /khyod kyi khyim du ngas phyin pa'o/ /dwa ri ti/ lag pa snying gar nyed byed na/ /da ni nga yi yid 'ong ba'o/ /ru tsa ba ta ba te/ sna rtser khu tshur 'chang ba ni/ /med do zhes ni ston pa'o/ /shU
