n+ya ta/| lag pa brkyang ste ltor rdeb na/ /phun sum ldan par yod ces pa'o/ /tri ka sa ha/ lte ba ru ni nyed byed na/ /kha zas za bar 'dod pa'o/ /tsar+N+DA li ka /mdzub mo mdun du ston byed na/ /zhe
nag gtum la drag pa'o/ /ni la dan+ta pa tra/ smin ma la ni reg byed na/ /'dir 'dod pa ni da lta ston/ /a naM ga yu ta/ lce ni 'dril bar byed pa dag /da ltar 'chi zhes bya ba'o/ /dur ga ti/
kun tu lta bar byed pa ni/ /tshes grangs shes par 'dod pa'o/ /ta ra ga na/ tshes gcig nas ni brtsams nas su/ /mthe bos ri mo bri bar bya/ /nyi tshod yi ge la sogs pa/ /sngar bstan
bzhin du mdun du reg /gi ri/ steng du lta bar byed pa ni/ /nyin phyed dga' bas rol pa'o/ /sa ma tsha ya/ 'dzum dang bcas par lta byed cing / /lag pas lag pa
bzung nas su/ /rgya mtsho lta bur ston byed pa/ /nor zas byin ces bya ba'o/ /dzir na ba ta/ lag gnyis khu tshur 'chang byed na/ /da ltar grogs la 'dod zhes pa'o/ /salba ta/ mthe bong
yis ni srin lag la/ /reg pa 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba'o/ /so ma/ mthe bong khro bo bza' la sogs/ /sU R+ya/ mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/
rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi dag gi
phyag rgya'i brdas rol pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o/ /lha mos slar yang gar mdzad de/ /glu 'di yis ni mnyes par byas/ /e baM si ta a ru Ni na

b+ha/ dza ni te ma d+h+ya ma ga ma A ga ma d+ha ma pA si ni sA sA sA/ ni ga ma sA sA sA/ ri ga mo b+hu pa ti/ sa ri ri sa ri rI sA sA sA/ ma d+h+ya ma a d+ha ma sA sA sA/ sa shru ta ni sa sA sA sA/ nis ri ta
g+ha ma g+ha ma/ a d+ha ma d+ha ma sA sA sA/ ba ba ma ya ba ba d+ha na mo zhes bya'o/ /shar du me'o/ /gshin rjer ni bre'o/ /nub tu ni mi'o/ /byang du ni ku'o/ /me mtshams su d+ha si'o/ /bden bal

du ni ma ka'o/ /rlung mtshams su ni tu ku'o/ /dbang ldan du ni bi mo'o/ /a ni/ sgur po'o/ /i ni/ zla ba la skye pa'o/ /u ni/ lha'i bla ma'i 'o/ /e ni/ pa ba sangs kyi'o/ /o ni/ nyi ma'i bu'i 'o/ /aM ni/

gza'i bdag po ri bong can no/ /a ni/ nyi ma'o/ /gza' rnams kyi ni cho ga las/ /zla ba nyi ma'i brjod par bya/ /zla ba karka Ta la dbang / /nyi ma gdong lnga pa la ste/ /gza' rnams lhag ma ji snyed pa/ /rA si
gnyis gnyis la ni spyod/ /sgang gshong 'khor lo khyod kyis bshad/ /skar ma dus dang nyi ma yi/ /bye brag dag ni mi 'tshal te/ /bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/ /bka' stsal pa/ lug dang ro hi ta sogs
pa/ /gang gi 'chi ba bshad kyi nyon/ /mdor bsdus nas ni brjod par bya/ /zla ba dang ni tshes grangs dang / /skar ma yi ni dus dang ldan/ /gdon dang nad ni de bzhin te/ /sgang gshong rA si tshad
ma ni| |gang zhig las ni skyes pa'i brjod/ /ba tra yi ni nyi ma la/ /dgun zlar ba'i zla ba yi/ /gza' ni mig dmar dag dang ni/ /rgyu skar smin drug ldan gyur pa/ /de ni de yi 'chi dus yin/ /sus kyang
bskyab par mi nus so/ /khyu mchog gi ni nyi ma la/ /lus kyi mtshan ma la sogs dang / /smyo zhing 'gul pa'i nad kyis ni/ /'chi bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya/ /de bzhin dgun zla 'brid po yi/ /gza'
lag dang ni snar mar ldan/ /nyi ma bzhi pa de la ni/ /dgong mor 'chi 'gyur the tshom med/ /dgun zla tha chung lha mo che/ /skar ma mgo dang ldan pa dang / /gza' ni gza' lag bcas pa la/ /'khrig pa'i
mi ni gang yin pa/ /nyi ma drug la 'chi bar 'gyur/ /dpyid zlar ba'i tshes brgyad la/ /skar ma mgo dang ldan pa dang / /gza' ni pa bsangs 'dzoms shing / /nyi ma
snga dro'i dus la ni/ /karka Ta ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /dpyid zla 'bring po'i gnyis lnga la/ /skra ma mchu dang ldan pa dang / /gza' ni spen par ldan pa la/ /seng+ge'i mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur//
dpyid zla tha chung bcu gnyis la/ /skar ma nag par ldan pa dang / /gza' ni nyi ma dag la ni/ /skran dang gzer ba'i nad kyis ni/ /bu mo'i mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /dbyar zla ra ba'i bcu bzhi
la| |skar ma lha mtshams ldan pa dang / /gza' ni mig dmar dag la ni/ /srang gi mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /dbyar zla 'bring po'i bcu gcig la/ /nag pa dang ni mig dmar la/ /sdig
pa'i mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /dbyar zla tha chung tshes dgu la/ /skar ma gro bzhin ldan pa dang / /gzhu yi mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de dag nges par ldan gyur na/ /'chi 'gyur bden par
nga yis bshad/ /ston zla ra ba'i bdun pa la/ /skar ma rgyal dang ldan pa dang / /gza' ni zla bar bcas pa la/ /chu srin mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /ston zla 'bring po'i bcu gsum la/ /
skar ma tha skar ldan pa dang / /gza' ni zla bar bcas pa la/ /bum pa'i mi ni zad par 'gro/ /ston zla tha chung sgyu ma che/ /nyi ma dag ni brgyad pa la/ /skar ma nam grur ldan pa dang / /gza'
ni spen par bcas pa la/ /nya yi mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sngon du skyes dus shes bya ste/ /phyi nas dus ni brtsi bar bya/ /gzhan du dus ni smra ba dag /thams cad don med nyid du 'gyur/ /skye
dus shin tu mnyam bzhag ste/ /zhi dang drag po dpyad par bya/ /tshe dang 'chi dus la sogs pa/ /de nas de ltar lung bstan zhes/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha'
'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ gza' dang nyi ma'i nges
par 'chi ba tshar bcad pa'i dbang du byas pa'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //ltas kyi mtshan nyid dge ba ni/ /rab tu bshad kyi lha mo nyon/ /A li kA li mnyam
byas la| |sde tshan du ni bsdeb par bya/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed dang po sogs/ /bltas te ming ni gzung bar bya/ /cha shas ldan la snying stobs can/ /de yi rigs ni shes par bya/ /mtha' yas
la sogs klu rnams dang / /nyi ma la sogs de bzhin gza'/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs ma mo rnams/ /de yi rigs su rab tu grags/ /lha rnams thams cad nyid dang ni/ /sngags rnams thams cad

de las skyes/ /skye bo thams cad skyed byed ma/ /des na ma zhes bya bar brjod/ /a yig dang ni de bzhin A/ /ga tsa Ta dang yang dag ldan/ /ta pa dang ni ya sha ste/ /sde dgu yi ni yi ge 'o/ /e dang slar
yang lha mo I/ /de bzhin gzhan yang kha tsha Tha/ /tha pha dang ni ra Sha nyid/ /sde tshan yang dag yin par brjod/ /u dang lha mo de bzhin u/ /ga dza Da da
yang dag ldan/ /da ba dang ni la sa ste/ /de dag sde tshan gsum pa yin/ /yi ge e dang de bzhin ai/ /de bzhin slar yang g+ha dz+ha D+ha/ /d+ha b+ha wa ha slar de bzhin/ /'di dag sde tshan
bzhi pa yin/ /o yig dang ni au yig dang / /aM zhes bya dang tsheg drag bcas/ /slar yang nga nya Na na ma/ /'di dgu sde tshan lnga pa yin/ /kun tu bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi dang / /lhag ma lnga
dang bcas par bya/ /de dag skye bo thams cad kyi/ /skye dang 'jig par yang dag gnas/ /yi ge bcu gnyis sgyu 'phrul che/ /'tsho dang dus kyi rang bzhin brjod/ /de dag rA si zhes
bya ba| |skar ma kun dang yang dag ldan/ /zla ba nyi ma'i bye brag gis/ /de bzhin 'og dang steng du blta/ /brtan pa nyid dang g.yo ba nyid/ /gnyis po gnyis su brjod pa yin/ /rkyang ba dang ni
sbyar ba ste/ /ring dang thung dang pham dang rgyal/ /de las steng gi rgyal ba ste/ /'og ni 'chi bar shes par bya/ /nyi ma'i rgyu bar 'gro ba yi/ /bza' dang rA si skar ma rnams/ /nyi ma la ni gnas te
'char| |rA si gza' dang gsum par 'dod/ /dbugs rgyu ba dang yang dag ldan/ /thams cad rA sir shes par bya/ /karka Ta dang glang po'i dgra/ /de bzhin gzhon nu ma dang srang / /cha shas
drug dang yang dag ldan/ /gza' yis bskul nas 'char bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa dang ni chu skyes dang / /khyu mchog dang ni bum par bcas/ /cha shas lnga yi tshad dang ldan/ /gza' yis bskul
nas 'char bar 'gyur/ /nya dang lug dang de bzhin du/ /gzhu dang zung du sprod pa dag /cha shas bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /snga ma bzhin du 'char bar 'gyur/ /slar yang ltas dang bcas pa
yi| |gza' rnams 'cha rab bshad par bya/ /'bras bu'i ming dang ldan par bya/ /ltas chen 'byung ba mnyam par gyis/ /nag mo dang / gtsigs ma dang / 'jigs su rung ma dang / rga
las 'das ma dang / log 'dren ma dang / gtum mo dang / drag mo'i gzugs can ma dang / dka' zlog lha mo dang / rgyal ma dang / rnam par rgyal ma dang / mi thub ma dang / gzhan gyis mi thub ma

dang | nag mo bzang mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / nag mo sbom mo dang / dbang mo dang / zla ba mo dang / drag mo dang / sdang ma dang / 'phyang me dang / sum cu'i dbang mo dang / 'phrog byed ma dang / 'bar ba
dang / 'jib byed ma dang / lha mo 'di rnams ming dang ni/ /ltas chen nyi shu rtsa bzhi yi/ /ming ni mtshungs pas 'bras bu ste/ /nyis 'gyur du ni byas nas su/ /dbang po'i cha dang yang dag ldan/ /
ltas ni lhag ma bzung nas su/ /ltas ni shes pa nyid du bya/ /nag mo dang ni 'jigs rung dang / /drag mo'i gzugs dang dka' blog nyid/ /nag sbom ma dang rgyal ma dang / /drag mo sum cu'i
dbang mo dang / /'phrog byed ma dang 'jib byed ma/ /bcu po 'di dag rtsub par grags/ /bag ma len dang bkra shis dang / /grong dang tshong 'dus gzugs pa
dang | |lam du spags dang 'thab mo dang / /chen po'i sar ni dbyung ba sogs/ /ltas de las ni 'bras med pas/ /dge ba'i las rnams mi bya ste/ /rigs de rnams la sgyu ma che/ /
bzang po'i las ni spang bar bya/ /dge bas kyang ni gsod 'gyur na/ /drag po'i las kyis smos ci dgos/ /lus la gnas pa'i dbugs dang ni/ /phyi rol gza' dang rA si ste/ /phyi dang
nang du bcas pa yi/ /rgyu ba shes na 'grub par 'gyur/ /gza' gang yin pa dbyangs zhes bya/ /dbyangs gang yin pa de nyid kyang / /rA si nyid du shes par bya/ /dbyangs dang ra si de
bzhin du/ /skar ma 'ang dbyangs kyi gzugs su blta/ /phan tshun sbyor ba ma gtogs par/ /'bras bu 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /g.yo ba 'char la g.yo ba'i las/ /brtan pa la ni mi
g.yo bar/ /'dren ma yis ni 'dren ma ste/ /phyi dang nang du bcas pas gsal/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin
gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ gza' rnams kyi rgyu ba dang sde tshan gyi ltas kyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa
bzhi pa'o// //da ni gza' dang skar ma ru/ /bcas pa'i rgyu ba bshad kyi nyon/ /nyi ma rgyu ba'i nyin mo ni/ /thun phyed lnga dang bdun pa la/ /bya ba ci yang mi 'grub po/ /zla
pa yi ni bzhi dang drug /mig dmar gyi ni gsum dang lnga/ /gza' lhag gnyis dang bzhi ba la/ /gdon mi za bar 'joms par 'gyur/ /bla mas dang po gsum pa la/ /'chi ba nyid du 'gyur
ba yin/ /ngan spong gi ni gnyis pa dang / /bdun pa la ni shes par bya/ /dal ba yi ni dang po dang / /drug pa la ni 'chi bar byed/ /rigs de dag gi 'char pa yi/ /dus ni yongs su chad par bstan/ /de

dag thun mong mtshan nyid de/ /rnal 'byor pa yi gzhan bshad nyon/ /lnga nas nyi shu lnga yi bar/ /'di dag gi ni brjod bya ste/ /de las bcu gsum gsum gyi bar du re re spel bar bya/ /dgun zla tha chung nyi
ma la mtshungs gsum mig zla ba drug /gsum zung bzla ste zla lhag tshes phyogs mnga' yon tan/ /thig le de dag gi ni 'tsho ba yang dag bshad pa yin/ /lnga las bcu yi bar dang de bzhin bcu nas
ni| |bco lnga'i bar te de nas nyi shu'i bar dang ni/ /de nas nyi shu lnga yi bar du sbyang bar bya/ /de nas sgrub pos shes bya ba/ /gnas skabs 'gyur ba bshad par bya/ /zla ba gang la gnas pa yi/ /
dang por skar ma bgrang bar bya/ /nyi ma yi ni chu tshod dag /ji snyed 'das pa de snyed ni/ /zla ba'i gnas skabs rgyu ba'i phyir/ /de ni drug cur bsgyur bar bya/ /slar yang nyi tshod zla ba bsnan/
drug cu ru ni bsgyur byas la/ /mda' dang sreg byed ro yi ni/ /dbang por bcas pas de bzhin bcad/ /bcu gnyis dag gi nang nas ni/ /lhag ma'i cha shas
gzung bar bya/ /lhag ma'i cha shas de yi ni/ /skyid sdug gnas skabs myong bar 'gyur/ /nyin dang mtshan gyi sbyor ba yis/ /lhag ma'i chu tshod du ni brjod/ /dang po'i zla bar rab gnas pa/ /
de yi bya ba nyams par 'gyur/ /gnyis pa bkra shis pa ste/ /gsum pa 'chi ste gsod pa 'gyur/ /bzhi pa rgod de tshim par 'gyur/ /lnga pa nor te rnyed par 'gyur/ /drug pa rims
te lus 'jig 'gyur/ /bdun pa la ni dga' ba ste/ /tshim pa nyid ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /brgyad pa 'jig rten brlag par 'gyur/ /zla ba dgu par gnas pa yis/ /lus ni dgra dang bcas
par 'gyur/ /bcu pa dga' mgur rtse 'gyur zhing / /sna tshogs pas ni rgyal bar 'gyur/ /bcu gcig sna tshogs 'jigs pas gdung / /bcu gnyis pa ni longs spyod de/ /bde ba chen pos
rgyal bar 'gyur/ /lug la sogs pa bstan pa yis/ /zla ba rim pa bzhin du rgyu/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa'
de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ /thams cad rgyu ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mos mchod cing phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sgang gshong 'khor lo khyod bshad pa/ /de rnams dbye ba ci 'dra dang / /dus kyi grangs ni ji bzhin gsungs/
rgyu ba yi ni khyad par dag /'di la bdag ni the tshom skyes/ /bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/ /sgyu ma kun gyis rnal rol pa/ /nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che/ /dus kyi bgrang ba lus med cing / /thams
cad du ni thams cad gnas/ /dngos po kun la khyab pa ste/ /lus la gnas kyang lus mi skye/ /dus nyid dus ni med pa dang / /'jig rten nyid ni 'jig rten min/ /bden pa dang ni rdzun pa min/ /lha
khyod kyis ni sngar bshad pa'i/ /bsam gyis mi khyab dus mtshan nyid/ /gang zhig khyod kyis bshad pa de/ /don dam shin tu rnyed dka' ba/ /lus las 'das shing dri med pa/ /rnal 'byor pa
yis ji ltar rtogs/ /skye bo kun la sman slad du/ /dbugs kyi nges pa bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /nad med rlung dang bral ba dang / /khams ni snyoms
par gnas pa dang / /ran par za zhing tshul bzhin rgyu/ /de yi mig 'dzum gzung bar bya/ /mig 'dzum mig ni btsums pa ste/ /mig 'dzum drug la cha shas ni/ /gcig ces bya bar brjod
pa yin| |yud tsam drug ni skad cig ste/ /skad cig drug ni thad gcig yin/ /thang gcig drug ni cung zad yin/ /dus kyi go rim bya ba 'dis/ /sum cu tham par bsgyur pa la/ /yi ge lci
ba'i dus zhes brjod/ /yi ge lci ba bcu la ni/ /srog gcig ces bya'i dus su bshad/ /de ni bcu gsum bsgyur ba las/ /de yang gnyis su bsgyur ba ni/ /srang
gcig ces ni brjod pa yin/ /srang ni drug cu tham pa la/ /chu tshod gcig tu bzhed pa yin/ /de brgyad thun gcig ces bya'o/ /de bzhi la ni nyin gcig go/ /nyin mtshan dus ni mnyam pa la/ /
mtshan mo 'ang de dang mnyam par bshad/ /chu srin nas ni sbal ba'i bar/ /nyi ma 'phel bar brjod pa ste/ /lha mo srang ni gsum gsum gyis/ /nyin re zhing ni spel bar bya/ /chu srin las ni
'das nas su/ /mtshan mo srang ni gsum gsum 'bri/ /tshad ma de dag bstan pa'i phyir/ /zangs ma sred ni bcu gnyis la/ /snod ni dpangs su sor brgyad dang / /rgyar ni sor mo bcu gnyis
pa| |legs pa nyid du brdung bar bya/ /gser ni 'ol se sum cu las/ /sor drug pa yi tshad tsam du/ /thur ma legs par brdungs nas ni/ /thur ma de yis bu ga ni/ /zangs ma'i snod la
mkhas pas dbugs/ /chu ni rnyog ma med pa las/ /srang ni drug cu'i tshad du bya/ /srang 'dis chu tshod tshad yin te/ /skye bo rnams la phan phyir bshad/ /chu tshod de ni yud tsam ste/ /thun
phyed dang ni thun gcig dang / /nyin dang mtshan mo'i tshad kyis ni/ /rim bzhin zla phyed zla bar sprel/ /zla ba gnyis ni dus yin te/ /de gsum nyi ma 'gro ldog brjod/ /nyi ma 'gro ldog
gnyis la ni/ /lo gcig nyid du brjod pa yin/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can
gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ /dus 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas skar ma'i rigs gang yin/ /
mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /tha skar dang ni mgo dang rgyal/ /de bzhin du ni nab so dang / /me bzhi lha mtshams de bzhin du/ /nam gru sa ri gro zhun bcas/ /lha yi tshogs zhes
brjod pa yin/ /snar ma bre dang chu stod dang / /khrums stod dang ni bra nyed dang / /lag dang mgo dang chu smad dang / /khrums smad mi yi tshogs yin no/ /smin drug dang ni mchu dang ni/ /mon gru
dang ni mon gre dang / /skag dang nag pa snon dang ni/ /sa ga dang ni snubs rnams ni/ /srin po yi ni rigs yin par/ /bzhin mdzes ma ni khyod la bshad/ /smin drug rgyal ni ra yin te/ /
mgo dang snar ma klu yin no/ /lag dang snubs ni khyi yin te/ /lha mtshams nab so phag gi rigs/ /mchu dang gre ni byi ba'o/ /skag ni byi lar bshad pa ste/ /nag pa sa ga stag yin no/ /
dpo dang khrums stod gnyis po ni/ /khyu mchog ces ni bshad pa ste/ /stobs 'dod pas ni shes par bya/ /me bzhi dang ni sa ri gnyis/ /ma her shes bya stobs kyi mchog /tha skar dang ni
khrums smad gnyis/ /rta yi rigs zhes bya bar grags/ /chu stod dang ni gro zhun gnyis/ /spre'u'i rigs su brjod pa yin/ /bra nye dang ni nam gru gnyis/ /glang
po'i rigs kyis byin brlabs pa'o/ /mon gru dang ni mon gre dag /mi yi rigs su yang dag gsungs/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon pa ru/ /lha mo nges ni bden par bshad/ /chu smad
dang ni byi bzhin dag /ne'u le'u rigs su grags pa yin/ /mang po nyid kyis ci zhig bya/ /mdor bsdus pa ni bshad kyi nyon/ /rang gi skye ba'i skar ma ni/ /bya ba kun la dpyad mi dgos/ /
skar ma mi yi srog yin te/ /gzhan du ngas ni ma bshad do/ /skar ma'i cha ni bzlog pa dang / /bzung na nges par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /lug dang srang dang karka Ta/ /chu srin dag ni g.yo bar
brjod| |sdig pa bum pa seng+ge dang / /khyu mchog dag ni brtan pa ste/ /nya dang gnyis sbyor gzhu dang ni/ /bu mo rnams ni 'dren ma'o/ /lha yi bla ma nyi ma dang / /mig dmar skyes pa'i gzugs
yin te| |pa ba sangs dang sgra gcan dang / /zla ba mo yi gzugs yin no/ /gza' lag dang ni spen pa gnyis/ /ma ning nyid du bstan pa ste/ /nam mkha'i 'khor lor gnas pa'i
gza'| |mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dang bde bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal
chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ /skar ma rnams kyi stobs la dbang ba'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// //tshes dang skar ma gza' 'chad ba/ /rab tu
bshad kyi lha mo nyon/ /ro hi ta yi tshes la ni/ /smin drug dang ni mig dmar la/ /mgron po lam du 'jug par bzang / /tshes de rnyed pa 'thob 'gyur ba'o/ /ma ka ra yi nyi ma la/ /mchu dang
mig dmar ldan pa la/ /gzer dang 'dzoms sogs 'byung bas na/ /tshes de yongs su spang bar bya/ /swa pa na yi nyi ma la/ /lag dang spen par ldan pa'i tshe/ /nag po nyid du shes bya
bas| |tshes de'ang yongs su spang bar bya/ /ro hi ta yi nyi ma la/ /mchu dang gza' lag ldan pa la/ /bkra shis dang ni bzang por byed/ /raN+Da yi ni nyi ma la/ /lag dang gza'
lag bcas pa dag /kun tu 'dzoms par bshad pas na/ /mchog gi sbyor bas de yang spang / /sa yi dbang phyug tshes la ni/ /bra nye dang ni gza' lag ldan/ /de yang nag po'i
dus shes bya/ /b+ha dra yi ni tshes dag la/ /gre dang lha yi bla mar ldan/ /tshes de rnyed pa byed pas na/ /sbyor ba po yis bsten bar bya/ /mi ki ra yi tshes la ni/ /mon gru lha yi bla ma dang / /
gal ten ni 'dzoms gyur na/ /'bru dang nor rnams zad byed par/ /gdon mi za bar bshad pa yin/ /tshes ni bcu gsum dag la ni/ /skad dang lha yi bla ma dag /gal te 'dzoms na
nag po bas/ /nyes pa kun gyis 'jigs par 'gyur/ /br-i Sha b+ha yi tshes la ni/ /stobs ldan gyi ni blon po dang / /gal te khrums stod 'dzoms na ni/ /tshes de
rgyas pa ster 'gyur zhing / /dge ba'i grogs rnams thams cad byed/ /br-i d+d+hi ka yi nyi ma la/ /chu stod dang ni pa ba sangs/ /gal te 'dzoms na nad kyis ni/ /gdungs shing 'joms
par the tshom med/ /'byung po yi ni nyi ma la/ /bra nye dang ni ba bsangs/ /'dzoms na gshin rje'i mche ba ste/ /tshes de yongs su spang bar bya/ /kurma yi ni nyi ma la/ /smin drug
dang ni spen pa ru/ /gal te 'dzoms par 'gyur na ni/ /rnyed dang grags pa la sogs dang / /bsod nams kun gyi 'bras bu 'thob/ /bya ku li yi nyi ma ni/ /skag dang spen par ci
zhig ltar/ /'dzoms na gdung bar byed pas na/ /nyi ma de la'ang 'gro ba spang / /zla ba nya yi nyi ma la/ /mchu dang spen par ldan gyur na/ /'chi ba'i dus la bab pas na/ /tshes de shin tu
spang bar bya/ /me yi mtshams su mi kir bri/ /gshin rje du ni raN+Da ste/ /srin po ru ni karma bri/ /chu yi phyogs su khyu mchog ste/ /'jigs byed du ni bya ku la/ /gter gyi phyogs su swa pa na/ /
mig gsum phyogs su bzang po bri/ /shar gyi phyogs su'ang khyu mchog go /zla ba nyi ma'i bye brag gis/ /de rnams su ni rgyu bar bshad/ /b+ha dra nas ni raN+Dar ste/ /bya ku li dang bri Sha b+ha/ /
'di dag nyi ma rgyu bar ni/ /rigs mchog ma ni khyod la bshad/ /khyu mchog dang ni mi ki ra/ /swa pa na dang kurma ni/ /zla ba'i rgyu bar bshad pa ste/ /rim pa de ltar brjod pa yin/ /nya la me mtshams
gnas pa ste/ /stong la rlung gi phyogs su gnas/ /de ltar de dag dbus su ni/ /gnas pa de dag gdung bar 'gyur/ /zla ba nyi ma las byung ba'i/ /ri mo mnyam du lta bas na/ /des na shes
rab can gyis spang / /zhi dang sdig par lta bas na/ /lta ba'i chad pa 'byung pa ste/ /myur du gsod par byed pa yin/ /sgra gcan gyis ni rgyu ba yi/ /dus ni mdo ru bsdus pa yin/ /yar ngo mar
ngo'i bye brag gis/ /blo ldan 'bad de shes par bya/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje
can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ /tshes grangs dang skar ma'i nges pa rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //nyon cig
lha mo sgyu ma che/ /sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol pa/ /lus can kun gyi rnam shes te/ /lus las 'das shing dri ma med/ /lhun po dang ni ti se dang / /de bzhin du ni 'bigs byed sogs/ /shar

gyi lus 'phags ba lang spyod/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan dang ni/ /dzam bu'i gling dang bcas pa dang / /lan tshwa can dang 'o ma yi/ /rgya mtsho la sogs chu tshogs dang / /'og dang steng du gang gyur pa/ /khams
gsum ma lus zad par bya/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po dang / /skye mched khams rnams zad par bya/ /'byung po la sogs phyogs bcu yi/ /'jig
rten khams kun zad bsams te/ /dngos dang dngos med 'dres par ni/ /bdag nyid kyang ni bsgom par bya/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnams/ /mnyam nyid stong pa nyid
du blta| |thams cad nam mkhar thim nas ni/ /ba lang rmig par grong khyer bsgom/ /rnal 'byor can gyis cho ga bzhin/ /sems ni me mar lta bur bsgom/ /de dbus yid kyis bltas
nas ni| |der ni mtshan ma brtag par bya/ /me mar lta bus zhi bar gyur/ /dmar pos brgyan na rgyas pa ste/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar snang ni/ /chags pa la sogs 'grub par 'gyur/ /
tha mar du ba 'am nag mthong na/ /mngon spyod du ni grags pa yin/ /rlung gi mdog ltar rab 'khrugs na/ /de ma thag tu bskrad par 'gyur/ /'od zer dkar po long long pos/ /blo ldan
sngags kyi dngos grub ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub ces bya/ /bkra shis kyi ni lam ston yin/ /chog 'dis ni gzhan gsal dang / gzhan gyi gzugs sogs dbu ma rnams/ /
de 'og rnal 'byor bskyed par bya/ /ye shes la sogs sems kyis ni/ /gang zhig stong nyid shes byas na/ /sems ni myur du thar par 'gyur/ /ye shes kyis ni shes bya brtag /shes
byas 'gro ba brtag par bya/ /pha dang ma ni bsad byas shing / /bram ze gtsang ma gnyis bzung nas/ /rgyal po yul 'khor bcas bcom na/ /mi de dag par 'gyur zhes bya/ /ye shes rang bzhin
kun dang sbyor/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/
ye shes 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// //ye shes khyad par gang gis ni/ /ye shes thun mong byin brlabs pa/ /bye brag can ni ji lta bu/ /lha las rol
mo mnyan par 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /lci bar gyur pa sum cu pos/ /dge dang sdig pa'i 'bras 'byung ba/ /nga rgyal gyis ni byin brlabs pa/ /sems kyis byas
pa'i las tshogs kyis/ /bsgoms par gyur pa'i rang rig pa'i/ /sems ni 'gro ba de ru 'gro/ /srid pa'i zhags pas rtag 'jigs pas/ /de yi 'gro pa mi mthong ngo / /'du shes rnam pa
lnga dang ni/ /lta ba lnga yis pha rol 'gro/ /lha yi ye shes gsal bar blta/ /lha min ye shes khro ba'o/ /yi dwags ye shes zhan pa ste/ /dmyal ba'i ye shes 'jigs pas non/ /byol
song ye shes blun pa ste/ /brtan pa rnams ni sems med pa'o/ /rgyu ba'i ye shes rnam pa lnga/ /glen pas bsgribs dang lkugs pa dang / /byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can/ /sems can yongs
su ma smin dang / /bla ma'i lam ni sun 'byin pa/ /de dag kun gyis mi shes te/ /gsang chen sangs rgyas spyod yul lo/ /ye shes de nyid kyi bye brag dag/
bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /ye shes de nyid bye brag dag /nyon cig yang dag sgyu ma che/ /las rnams kyi ni bye brag gis/ /ye shes bye
brag sprul pa yin/ /dman dang rab dman dman pa can /gnod sbyin lha min grub pa po/ /klu dang byol song gsang bab/ /lto 'phye dang ni mi'am ci/ /mi dang yi dwags mkha' 'gro ma/ /
dmyal ba la sogs gang 'gyur dang / /gsal ba'i gzugs su mngon brjod dang / /phra mo sgo nga las byung ba/ /chu dang med dang rlung dang ni/ /de bzhin du ni sa yi khams/ /brtan pa la sogs
thams cad dang / /rtsa dang 'dab ma phra ba dang / /sa dang rdo dang brag las sogs/ /thams cad ye shes byin brlabs pas/ /thams cad snang ste gzhan du ni/ /ye shes med par skye mi 'gyur/ /
skye ba bye ba stong phrag tu/ /sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bskul bas/ /de nas rnal 'byor bstan bcos la/ /'bad de dad pa bskyed par bya/ /gang gyi gnas dang mtshungs pa yi/ /phyi rol bstan bcos
sun 'byin pa/ /rnal 'byor bstan bcos rjes 'brangs na/ /spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras bu 'thob/ /snying po las kyang snying po mchog /rnal 'byor bstan bcos mtshon par bya/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang
snyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ /rdo rje sems
dpa'i rnam par 'phrul par 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu ba'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /rdo rje dril bu'i mtshan nyid de/ /rdo rje sems sogs lha rnams su/ /rdo rje'i
blos ni shes par bya/ /zhi dang rgyas dang mngon spyod kyi/ /rdo rje dag ni thams cad kyang / /gser la sogs pa legs par brdung / /rdo rje kun gyis shin tu brgyan/ /cha gsum du ni bzung nas su/ /
cha brgyad ska rags legs par brgyan/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams brgyad dang ni/ /dbus ma nyid dang sangs rgyas dgu/ /rtse mo dgu ni lha nyid de/ /lha dgu yis ni byin gyis brlabs/

chu srin las ni byung ba yi/ /rtse mo pad+ma zla bar gnas/ /rtse dgu zhes ni bya ba ste/ /rdo rje ye shes 'gro ba sgrol/ /cha gsum gyi ni tshad dag la/ /dbu ma cung zad ring yang rung / /'di ni thun mong
tshad yin no/ /rtse mo kun gyi dbu ma zlum/ /phyogs sogs rtse mo bdud pas gnas/ /dbus ni zur brgyad dag tu bya/ /dbus kyi cha yi tshad ldan pa/ /gnas pa lte ba zhes bya ba'o/ /rin chen ma ra ga ta
ltar| |de yang cung zad zur brgyad bya/ /steng dang 'og dang dbus dag ni/ /so sor cha ni gsum gsum 'dod/ /steng gi pad+ma zla ba ni/ /drug cha kun nas zlum por bya/ /de dag la ni seng+ge'i snam/ /nas
phyed tsam du mtho bar bya/ /mche ba yi ni mthar gnas pa/ /de ni drug cha zhes byar grags/ /cha ni nyi shu rtsa bdun la/ /so so ru ni dgu dgur
'dod| |cha gsum bla ma'i mtha' ma ni/ /steng gi cha gnyis spangs nas ni/ /dbus kyi mtha' yang de bzhin no/ /'dab ma la ni gang gnas pa'i/ /chu srin cha gcig
nyid yin te/ /de yi phyed du ska rags 'dod/ /rdo rje kun la blo ldan pas/ /mchu dang zheng ni mnyam por bya/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dam tshig rdo rje'i mtshan
nyid de| |gser la sogs pa las brdungs pa/ /cha la sogs pa sngon du ni/ /ji ltar bstan bzhin ldan par bya/ /pad+ma zla ba la gnas pa'i/ /chu srin gyi ni mche
ba'i gzugs/ /'og gi chu srin las byung ba/ /chu zheng ji ltar bstan pa bzhin/ /rtse mo ye shes rang bzhin 'byung / /kun gyi dbus su rnam snang ste/ /shar phyogs
su ni mi bskyod pa'o/ /lho ru rin chen bstan pa ste/ /'od dpag med pa nub tu dgod/ /byang du don yod grub pa ste/ /rtse bzhi la sogs lha yin no/ /pad+ma byang chub
yan lag brgyad/ /sa la ji bzhin dgod par bya/ /phyag na pad+ma byams pa dang / /mkha' snying kun tu bzang po dang / gnod sbyin bdag dang 'jam pa'i dpal//
sa snying sgrib sel de bzhin te/ /lha ni brgyad po 'di dag nyid/ /'dab ma brgyad la ji bzhin brtag /dbus su ye shes sems dpa' ni/ /bcu gsum gnas su thim par bya/ /gzhan
yang 'dab brgyad lha mo brgyad/ /ji bzhin gnas su sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa dang / /rdo rje lcags sgrog dril bu nyid/ /lha mo dag ni bzhi po 'di/ /phyogs kyi pad+mar yang dag
gnas| |mtshams ni bzhi po dag tu yang / /slar yang de bzhin lha mo bzhi/ /skul byed rin chen sgron ma dang / /de bzhin rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / /de bzhin gzhan gyis mi
thub ma| |pad+ma'i 'dab ma kun la dgod/ /rtse mo dag ni rnam lnga la/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni lnga nyid de/ /shar du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /byang du drag mo zhes bya ba/ /ro langs ma ni
nub tu gnas/ /lho ru de bzhin tsaN+Da li/ /dbus su ye shes mkha' 'gro ste/ /dam tshig rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /gdug la rdo rje rtse gsum ste/ /rtse mo dag ni gdengs par bya/ /
de bzhin rtse mo gcig pa ni/ /glu rnams skrag par byed pa'o/ /khro bo'i rdo rje gdengs po ste/ /lhag ma rnams ni 'dul byed pa'o/ /zhi la zhi ba'i lha nyid de/ /rigs kyi rim pa'i
chogs dbye/ /las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis/ /bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gsang ba'i rdo rje'i mtshan nyid do/ /cha lnga'i tshad dang
ldan pa ni/ /spyi gtsug rdo rje zhes byar grags/ /rna cha cha drug tshad du bya/ /mgul do tsha ni bzhi pa ste/ /snying gar cha lnga pa ni gzung / /gsang ba dang ni
lag par yang / /cha drug par ni gzung bya ste/ /ji ltar mdzes par brtag par bya/ /rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan nas ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yi ye shes 'phel/ /cho ga'i bya ba
'di nyid kyis/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu bsgom/ /de nas dril bu'i mtshan nyid kyi/ /chu zheng la sogs bshad par bya/ /rin chen sna tshogs 'bar ba dang / /rdo
rje'i ska rags phreng gnyis bya/ /shel sgong dri ma med pa ltar/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pas brgyan/ /cha gsum mtshan nyid ldan pa la/ /rdo rje la sogs mtshan mas brgyan//
dbus su khog pa zab pa dang / /thams cad dga' byed bcud kyis gnas/ /de nas pad+ma rin chen dang / /ut+pal ku mu da yis brgyan/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams
cha brgyad du/ /lha mo la sogs brgyad du grags/ /de yi steng du lha mo ni/ /sa bon brgyad las bsam par bya/ /shar phyogs su ni sgrol ma ste/ /de bzhin byang du gos
dkar mo'o/ /nub tu bdag mo'i ming can te/ /lho ru sangs rgyas sbyan zhes bya/ /mdog mdzes sbrang rtsi yid 'ong ma/ /de bzhin rin chen 'khyil ma'o/ /nam mkha'i phyogs
kyi dbus su ni/ /gzugs rdzogs bskor bas yang dag gnas/ /pad+ma rgyas pa lta bu'i dbyibs/ /gzugs med srid pa'i phyogs su ni/ /ye shes bdud rtsi bum pa 'dra/ /shes
rab bdud rtsi'i gnas yin te/ /de yi dbus kyi stan la ni/ /steng du pad+ma rdo rje ni/ /rtse mo dgu pa bsam par bya/ /dbus kyi dbyug pa ye shes te/ /thams cad spro zhing sdud pa
mo| |oM ltar mchog ni stsol bar grub/ /bya ba thams cad rab sgrub ma'o/ /ye shes rdo rje'i dril bu ni/ /rtse mo dgu pa de bzhin no/ /sor mo bcu gnyis tshad du ni/ /rdo rje'i
phreng ba ska rags byas/ /pad+ma mchog gi 'dab ma dang / /dra ba dra ba phyed pas brgyan/ /sngon bzhin mtshan nyid thams cad ldan/ /lha mo yi ni mtshan mas mdzes/ /shar gyi
phyogs su pad+ma ni/ /kha dog dkar pos mdzes par bya/ /gshin rjer pad+ma sngo dmar te/ /nub kyi phyogs su pad+ma dmar/ /byang du ut+pal la ni bri/ /bdud rtsi gnas kyi dbus na ni/ /
lha mo yi ni zhal gcig bri/ /shes rab pha rol phyin ma'o/ /gzugs mdzes bskor bas yang dag gnas/ /steng gi pad dang rdo rje ni/ /snga ma bzhin du bsam par bya/ /dbus
kyi ye shes dbyig pa ni/ /zur brgyad pas ni mdzes par bya/ /dril bu 'di ni lha mo che/ /tshe dang nad med phun sum tshogs/ /de nas dpa' bo'i dril bu ste/ /rdo rje'i phreng ba'i ska
rags ldan/ /de bzhin du ni shes rab dang / /bdud rtsi yi ni bum par ldan/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /dra ba dra phyed dpyang
bar bya| |sor dgu ru ni yangs pa ste/ /kha dog sor lnga'i tshad du bya/ /de las cung zad lhag bya min/ /rtse lnga pa'am rtse dgu pa/ /skal pa bzang po thams cad dang / /dbang
phyug dang ni sngags rnams kyi/ /'bras bu thams cad rab ster zhing / /mkha' 'gro'i stobs dang rdzu 'phrul ster/ /de bzhin phun tshogs thams cad dang / /de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /dngos grub mchog ni gsal bar ster/ /da ni de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /dril bu'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /'khar ba las byung
sgra snyan byed/ /khong stong dang ni bum par ldan/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang / /ral gri la sogs mtshan ma can/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pas sbras/ /chu srin las ni byung ba yin//
ye shes lnga yi rnam dag pas/ /rtse mo lnga dang bcas pa ste/ /ska rags gnyis gnyis dbus su ni/ /'khor lo'i phreng ba gnyis dang ldan/ /de bzhin ska rags
gnyis dbus su/ /pad+ma la ni pad phreng gnyis/ /rin chen la ni rin po che/ /de bzhin ska rags ldan par bya/ /don yod grub pa zhes bya la/ /ska rags gnyis
dbus ral gris brgyan/ /kun la shes rab gdong ldan pas/ dpa' bo kun gyis rgyal bar 'gyur/ /kun la'ang 'khar ba'am yang na ni/ /lcags gsum las
byung dril bu ste/ /cha gsum dang ni ldan par bya/ /rdo rje'i rigs la ba glang gdong / /ska rags rdo rje'i phreng las bskor/ /bum pa'i steng du gnas pa yi/ /kha khyer cung
zad gru bzhir byed/ /pa glang gdong ni myur ba ru/ /nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel bar byed/ /nad med stobs ni rtags ster zhing / /sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog par byed/ /
sngar bsten rjes su 'brangs nas ni/ /rdo rje'i mtshan nyid mtshon par bya/ /rin chen dbang sogs thod pa dang / /rang rang mtshan ma shes par bya/ /sor brgyad dam ni bcu drug
gam| |nyi shu las ni lhag mi bya/ /ji ltar nus shing rjes mthun par/ /sgrub pa'i dbang pos de dag bya/ /kha yang cho ga'i rim pa yis/ /sor mo lnga las gzhan par spang / /lha
mo 'di ni dril bu yi/ /sgrub thabs rgya cher bstan pa ste/ /thun mong gi ni rgyud kun las/ /dpa' bo rnams kyis bsngags pa yin/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje
mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ /rdo rje
dang dril bu'i mtshan nyid dang tshad kyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// //rdo rje slob dpon mtshan nyid ni/ /rab
tu bshad kyi lha mo nyon/ /dul zhing cha lugs mdzes pa dang / /sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes/ /rnal 'byor bzo yi cha la mkhas/
thams cad du ni 'jam par smra/ /sems can kun la bu bzhin ste/ /rtag tu gdong la dga' ba dang / /bsam gtan sbyor la mngon par brtson/ /snying rje phan pa'i
sems kyis ni/ /bden par smra zhing 'tshe mi byed/ /rtag tu mnyam pa'i sems bskyed pas/ /sems can kun gyi mgon skyob ste/ /sems can bsam pa'i bye brag
mkhas| |mgon med rnams la gnyen ltar brtse/ /mdzes sdug gi ni legs pa ste/ /sngags kyi tshul la shin tu goms/ /dam tshig spyod la rab tu gus/ /phyag
rgya brda yi sbyor ba rig /rnal 'byor ma rnams dam tshig la/ /brda yis sbyor ba ston pa dang / /gnyis med sbyor ba mi phyed gnas/ /sngags kyi 'khor lo spyod la
gus| |dbang bskur don gyi yon tan 'byung / /gnas sogs mthong ba'i ngang tshul can/ /de nyid bcu ni yongs su shes/ /'di ni slob dpon zhes byar brjod/ /gsol
pa| de lta bu'i slob dpon la ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ /bka' stsal ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/ /yan lag byang chub sems dpa' ste/ /ba spu rnams ni dgra
bcom nyid/ /spyi gtsug rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas te/ /'jig rten pa ni zhabs kyi gdan/ /'od zer gnod sbyin gsang la sogs/ /de ltar yon tan rang bzhin lus/ /rnal
'byor can gyis rtag tu blta/ /ji lta'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par/ /ye shes can gyis mtshan shes nas/ /de lta'i bla ma 'bad de bsten/ /gang yang khro dang sgyu can dang //
ngag ni shin tu rtsub pa dang / /yon tan dag gis chog shes pa/ /de ni bla mar bsten mi bya/ /gzhan yang slob ma'i spyod pa dang / /las kyi de nyid bshad kyi nyon/ /khro dang bcas
shing rtog ger bus/ /na so dag ni yol ba dang / /gang yang dge slong dngos gnas dang / /zhen dang chags pas bcings pa la/ /rin thang med pa'i rin chen ni/ /de la bshad
par mi bya'o/ /gang yang nga rgyal med pa dang / /sgyu med bdag tu mi 'dzin cing / /de bzhin chos la mngon par dad/ /de la man ngag sbyin par bya/ /gzhan du na ni ltung bar 'gyur/ /
slob dpon gyi ni gsang ba dang / /rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig sbyor/ /lha yi dam tshig spyod pa dang / /gtor ma la sogs gsang sbyor ba/ /smod pa dag tu gang byed pa/ /skrag
pa kun dang bcas bzhin du/ /mnar med par ni myur bar ltung / /slob dpon gyi ni mal stan dang / /lham dang gdags dang na bza' sogs//
nye ba'i longs spyod thams cad dang / /grib ma 'gom par mi bya zhing / /tse 'dri bar ni mi bya 'o/ /gal te byas na dus kun tu/ /de ni kun tu gzir 'gyur zhing / /don nyams
dpal las ring du 'gyur/ /bdud dang sdang bas gzir 'gyur te/ /mchod rten bshig dang sdig mtshungs pas/ /de bas grib ma 'gom mi bya/ /slob dpon smod byed gang
yin pa| |rmi lam du yang dngos grub med/ /slob dpon gyi ni yon tan gzung / /skyon rnams nam yang gzung mi bya/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor la sogs/ /de yi lam
gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /maN+Dal cho ga sogs rim pa yis/ /sngon du bslab pa sbyin par bya/ /dngos po rang bzhin med par ni/ /mthong ba byang chub rim pa ste/ /rang bzhin
dag pa'i chos rnams ni/ /ngo bo med la dngos mthong bas/ /lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang / /ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang / /yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ste/ /de ltar
rnam bcur phye ba las/ /dkar po yis ni dkar 'gyur la/ /nag pos de bzhin 'bras nag 'byin/ /des na de dag spang bya ste/ /sems can rnams la tshig rtsub dang //
tshig 'khyal smra bar spang bar bya/ /snying rje yi ni sems kyis su/ /'tshe dang gnod pa spang bar bya/ /bdag ni shi bar gyur kyang bla'i/ /srog chags gsod pa de ltar min/ /rab
tu 'bar mer mtshungs pas ni/ /gzhan gyi nor la reg mi bya/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rdzun srung zhing / /bla ma'i bka' stsal thams cad bya/ /rnal 'byor pa yin rnal 'byor ba/ /
brdzun du smra ba thams cad dang / /sems can kun la skyon brjod min/ /gzhan gyi bud med spang bya zhing / /log pas 'tsho dang rnyed la sogs/ /de bas thams cad spang
bar bya/ /dga' ba dag la spyod pa dang / /gtor ma dag gis dus sogs la/ /dam tshig spyod par byed pa yang / /bza' dang bca' sogs tshod zin bya/ /rnal 'byor dngos
grub 'dod pa rnams/ /sems can mgu las dngos grub 'byung / /de la dang por re zhig slob mas bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
btsugs la lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /rnal 'byor gsang
sogs mkha' 'gro ma/ /theg pa gsum po thams cad dang / /dpa' bo dpa' mo dbang lha mo/ /bdag nyid chen mo rnams dang ni/ /khyad par du yang slob dpon la/ /rtag par
bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /oM pany+tsa DA ki nI pU dza u pas+thA nA ya At+mA naM niR+ya ta yA mi hUM/ sarba A tsAR+ya pU dza u pas+thA nA ya at+mA naM niR+yA ta ya mi hUM/
sarba satwa pa ri drA NA r+thA ya At+ma naM niR+yA ta yA mi hUM/ zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs la slar yang 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ khro dang bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / /tshig
rtsub zhe gcod spang bar bgyi/ /sdig pa'i grogs dang srog gcod dang / /rku 'phrog dag ni spang bar bgyi/ /longs spyod rgya che spang bgyi zhing / /des dang bcas pas chog
shes bgyi/ /gar dang gnas dang mtshungs pa yi/ /phyi rol bstan bcos spang bar bgyi/ /zhes so/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /sdom pa'i cho ga bla na med/ /dang po
bla ma dam tshig ni/ /thob pa rgyu dang 'bras bu 'byung / /bstan dang de bzhin nges par bstan/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin te/ /bstan pa dag ni longs spyod yin/ /
nges par bstan pas mya ngan 'das/ /bshang gci la sogs bza' ba dang / /rigs dang rigs min de bzhin gzhan/ /sngags rnams kyi ni man ngag gis/ /ming sogs
cho ga bzhin dbang bskur/ /slob mas dngos po bsgoms nas su/ /mya ngan 'das pa bstan par bya/ /khyod kyis srog chags gsad bya zhing / /brdzun du yang ni smra bar
bya| |ma byin par ni blang bar bya/ /gzhan gyi bud med bsten par bya/ /mchod rten las ni mi bya zhing / /glegs bam bklag pa'ang mi bya 'o/ /lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcings shing /
sngags kyi yi ge bzla mi bya/ /bstan bcos dag ni rnyed sla ste/ /de yi sbyor ba rnyed par bka'/ /bla ma'i bsnyen bkur brtson pa yi/ /thabs kyis rnal 'byor pa yis rnyed/ /
bdag nyid lus dang gzhan gyi lus/ /bdag nyid bde mchog byang grol te/ /bdag gi lus la ma chags shing / /gzugs brnyan sogs 'dra'i lha ru brtag/ mkha'
'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po

nya| Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha/ k+ShaH/ 'di ni bcom ldan lha de nyid/ /lha rnams kun gyi mchog gi gnas/ /sngags
rnams thams cad skyed byed pa/ /rgyud rnams kyang ni de bzhin no/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems
dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ sngags kyi cho ga rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa
gsum pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /rgyud du sbas pa nges par bya/ /de nas thams cad chos 'byung bar/ /sna tshogs lte bar mi shigs dge/ bris
nas cho ga bzhin du sngags/ /chos kun gcig tu bsdu bar bya/ /A li kA li mnyam byas nas/ /sde tshan la ni tshim par bya/ /der gnas pa las dpa' bo ni/ /'dod
pa'i don kun sgrub byed btu/ /ye shes longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / /sprul pa thob 'gyur gdon mi za/ /'og dang steng 'grub rtag tu ster/ /bdag gi pho nya mo kun 'gro//
pho nya mo de grub kun ster/ /mthong dang de bzhin reg pa dang / /tsum pa na dang rtag par 'khyud/ /sbyor ba'i gnas kyi khyad par nyid/ /ji snyed rnal 'byor tshogs rnams ni/ /thams
cad dngos grub byed par bshad/ /bden pa thams cad sbyin bya ste/ /gzhan du nam yang ma yin no/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo dang / /chung ma pho nya mor gnas la/ /gang zhig
rtag tu sngags sbyin pa/ /rang gi cho ga de bzhin bya/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang / /de bzhin sangs rgyas gtsug nor bu/ /pad+ma dpal gyi nags rtsa ba/ /brda yis sangs
rgyas phyag rgya yin/ /dbang po gang dang gang lam nas/ /rang bzhin de dang de 'gro ba/ /mchog tu mnyam bzhag sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas
kun tu rang nyid 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje
can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //de
nas mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi/ /dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'i/ /ye shes 'byung ba bshad par bya/ /bong bu'i cha byad rnal 'byor bdag /yid shugs kyis
ni zlog par byed/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang mdzes ma dang / /dum skyes gzugs can rnal 'byor ma/ /rnal 'byor ma ni 'di dag nyid/ /brda yi tshul gyis bstan pa
ste| |bsam gtan phyag rgya 'dod gzugs can/ /bong bu'i chi byad khrag 'dzag zhal/ /sbrul kyis dkris pa'i mdung rtse ni/ /gsum pa mkha' 'gro'i lag na thogs/
kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa ni/ /steng du bstod de thogs pa dang / /mi ri'i stan bzhugs cher 'bar ba/ /sgra ni kham pa gyen brdzes shing / /spyan gsum gyis ni mdzes
par byas/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs/ /phyag na zangs gri bsnams shing rtse/ /sna tshogs me tog 'bras ldan pa'i/ /rin chen mthon po'i gnas su bsgom//
tshe thung ba dang shi ba yang / /'tshe ba dang ni tshe ring bar/ /bong bu'i tshul gyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /lag mthil gnas pa bzhin du mthong / /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor
ba'i| |rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro
las| he ru ka'i rnam par rol pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /sgrub po'i cho ga ji bzhin te/ /nyin
re'am yang na zla re'am/ /yang na de bzhin lo re ni/ /ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs na ni/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'jug par 'gyur/ /sgrub pa po yi lag g.yon gyis//
pad+mo'i snod ni bzung nas su/ /lag pa g.yas pa ba dan ni/ /gsum par byas te bsgom par bya/ /khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dang / /de bzhin srog dang rtsa las
byung / /mngon par 'dus byas legs bris pa/ /thams cad kun spyod sbyin par bya/ /lha yi rgyan dang yang dag ldan/ /phyag rgya'i mtshan mas rnam par klubs/ /sangs
rgyas rnal 'byor sdom skyes pas/ /skal pa bzang po'i gar chen bya/ /pad+ma mchog la reg byed pa/ /lo gcig bar du'ang ma byas na/ /sgrub
pos dam tshig spangs 'gyur te/ /des ni dam tshig sbyangs nas su/ /slar yang mi bya'i sdom pa blang / /gzhan du sngags dang phyag rgya ni/ /rim pa 'bras bu med par
'gyur| |mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis
gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ brda yis rol pa dang / dam tshig dang sdom pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa drug
pa'o|| ||mtshon cha kun gyi mtshan nyid ni/ /rab tu bshad kyi lha mo nyon/ /'khrul 'khor gyis 'phen mi 'phen dang / /de bzhin lag pas
'phen pa dang / /'phangs nas slar ni gzung pa dang / /lag pas 'gyed dang rnam pa lnga/ /dbyibs dang bde blag sbyor ba dang / /ltong rgyud sbyor dang 'dren dang myur/ /
'gengs dang 'phen dang gsal ba 'o/ /grims pa nyid dang sran 'dzugs dang / /mnyen zhing yan lag brtan pa dang / /rgya chen 'gongs shing rnam par dag /lus
gyi phyag rgya bde blag can/ /'di yis lus la brgyan nas ni/ /rims dang dug dang dbyig dug dang / /mkha' 'gros gtses dang gdon rnams kyis/ /nam yang tshugs
par mi 'gyur ro/ /rang gi snying gar 'dren tshul du/ /bde blag can gyis gzhu bzung nas/ /g.yas su rab tu bskor byed cing / /mngal 'phangs na ni grub par 'gyur/ /shar
phyogs legs par bsrangs nas ni/ /nub phyogs cung zad bkug nas su/ /gzhu rgyud dal bus drangs na ni/ /'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur/ /thams cad
dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rna drung bar du zlum por ni/ /ci rigs par ni legs par bzung / /yi ge oM gyis khar drangs te/ /ji srid yi ge a brjod pa/ /de srid bar du gzung
bar bya| |'dzin pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /ci rigs par ni drangs nas su/ /cho ga bzhin du bzung nas su/ /der ni cung zad dbye bar bya/ /'gengs pa thams cad grub par 'gyur/ /
'gengs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /chad pas 'ben ni bsgribs nas su/ /mig ni cung zad gdangs te blta/ /lta ba chang ba la gtad de/ /myur du 'phangs na 'grub pa'i mchog/
mda' gzhus rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /gru bzhi pa dang rnon po dang / /de bzhin kun nas zlum po ste/ /g.yas phyogs nas ni bskor nas su/ /steng dang de bzhin 'og tu
ni| |rim gyis gnon cing drag tu gnon/ /'bigs pa bcu yi rgya mchog gis/ /khams gsum rgyal srid chen po la/ /bde bar rgyal
zhing longs spyod 'gyur/ /dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba bla na med pa'o/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde
ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ mtshon cha thams
cad kyi brda'i ye shes kyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// //pho nya gdul ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya//
tha mal sngags kyi lus can dang / /zhing skyes ma ni gang yang rung / /sgrub pos de dag thams cad la/ /phan pa'i mchog gis bde ba sgrub/ /'di dag gnas pa longs
spyod kyi/ /bsnyen bkur gyis ni bsten mi bya/ /skal bzang phyug cing sra ba ste/ /rang gi bkra shis rigs spyod dang / /ri mo can ni sems g.yo zhing / /'o ma 'dzin
sbom pad+ma can/ /lte ba dung 'dra dung can ma/ /de dag rim pa bzhin du brjod/ /'byung po'i shing gi rtsa ba 'bad pas khar bcug na ji srid du bu mo'i bde ba rnyed pa de
srid kyi bar du sngags pas 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /gan du sha dang la k+Sha na'i sman btags te til mar du btsos la rkang pa la bskus na yang 'dod pa la spyod pa rnams
kyis bsngags so/ /a shwat+tha'i shing kan da dang / pa tha dang / pu shel rtsi rnams cha bsnyams te shing arga'i 'o ma dang sbyar la/ des pho mtshan dril phyis byas na/ /gdon
mi za bar 'phel bar 'gyur te/ de'i 'og tu myur du chu dron gyis bkrus na ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma dkar po'i ge sar sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig btags te lte
bar bskus na/ bud med sra ba rnams kyang khu ba 'dzag par 'gyur ro/ /til dkar po dang / na ga ge sar dang / dpa' bo tshig 'greng gi rtsa ba rnams btags te sbrang
rtsi dang ma he'i mar dang lhan cig tu sbyar te lte bar bskus na/ pho mtshan mkhrang zhing bud med chags pa che ba rnams yid 'phrog par 'gyur zhing / /bong bu ltar ni 'dod
spyod pas/ /bde don gnyer la bde ster ba/ /'dul ba don yod rgyud las te/ /ngas ni 'dzin pa bshad pa yin/ /ling+gas bud med bsgrub bya zhing / /b+ha gas skyes pa
bsgrub par bya/ /ling+ga don gnyer mtshan ma zhes bshad de/ /b+ha ga la ni spel bar bya/ /phyag rgya phyag rgyar sbyor ba yin/ /rnam par rol pas ling+ga zhes/ /bya ba ru ni bstan
pa ste| |rnam par 'byed pas b+ha ga yin/ /mi bstan gsal bar bstan pa ste/ /nye bar bstan pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /a yig ba yi yaM
ge las| |b+ha ga ling+ga bskyed nas ni/ /bung ba la sogs rim ji bzhin/ /mkha' 'gro ma kun bsgrub par bya/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje
mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/
pho nya gdul ba'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mos mchod cing phyag byas te 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /sems can bsod nams med pa dang / /sngags rnams rten par mi nus pa/ /de rnams dngos grub ji ltar 'thob/ /stobs med rnams ni stobs
bskyed cing / /sngags dang bral yang srung 'gyur ba/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad du gsol/ /sgyu ma kun tu rnam 'phrul ba/ /nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che/ /sems
can rnams ni chags bya'i phyir/ /lha yi sman ni bshad par bya/ /de ni ji ltar gzung bya ba/ /de ni de bzhin bshad par bya/ /bdag nyid lha yi dngos byas nas/ /phyi
nas sa bon bsgrub par bya/ /sems can rnams ni chags pa dang / /de bzhin bya ba sna tshogs byed/ /sa bon la sogs gzugs pa yi/ /las rnams sna tshogs
'byung ba'o/ /lha mos gsol pa/ ji lta bu'i sa bon la sogs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ e ran+Da dang gser shing la sogs
pa'i shing gi sa bon te/ de la sogs pa yongs su smin pa rnams cho ga bzhin bsgrub par bya'o/ /mar ngo'i 'byung po'i nyi ma la/ /zla mtshan tshon dang dbang po bsgo//
dur khrod thal bar ldan pa dang / /gtor ma dang ni srung bar bcas/ /de bzhin lha yi lcug ma gzugs/ /pa tha dang ni rgyal ba dang / /gzhan gyis mi thub pa
nyid dang / /tsakra ang ga rmongs byed rnams/ /mtshon cha thams cad zlog par byed/ /tsakra ang ga lag pas 'phen/ /ba tas 'khrul 'khor 'phen pa ste/ /'phangs
nas bzung bas rgyal bas so/ /gzhan gyis mi thub lag pas 'gyed/ /rmo ngas byed kyis mi 'phen pa'o/ /'di dag brnga yi tshul gyis bshad/ /de dag thams
cad grims par ni/ /g.yon phyogs su ni bsgran nas su/ /mgrin pa'am spyi bor bzung byas na/ /mtshon cha lnga ni zlog par byed/ /gdul ba'i bu mo mdog sngon gyi/ /pad+ma
las ni skyes pa dang / /bdud rtsi lnga yis bsgos nas su/ /nyi tshan dag la bskam par bya/ /khyi nag po yi thod pa ni/ /dur khrod sa
yis bkang ba ru/ /mar ngo'i tshes brgyad bcu bzhi la/ /pha mas kyi ni nags su gzugs/ /de ni 'bad de blangs nas su/ /dur khrod dang ni bla ma dang / /he ru ka
dpal mchod byas la/ /grub pa'i sa bon bzung byas te/ /thod pa ru ni bzhag pa la/ /cho ga bzhin du mngon bsngags te/ /mgul pa bcings na sbed par
'gyur/ /mnyam par bzhag ste bcing pa dgrol/ /bya rog nag po'i thod pa dang / /mdung ngam mtshon gyis bsad pa yi/ /skyes bu yi ni thod pa ru/ /sprul nag
po yi zhag gis ni/ /gser shing la sogs sa bon la/ /yang dang yang du bsgos byas la/ /grog mkhar gyi ni sa dag dang / /dur khrod sa yis bsres bkang
ste| |bzhi mdo lam gyi dbus sam ni/ /chu bo yi ni 'gram dag tu/ /sgrub po shin tu mnyam bzhag pas/ /thod par dgong mo'i dus su gzhag /gtor ma sbyin zhing
bcu pa dang / /srung ba dag ni nyin re bya/ /kha T+wA la sogs ldan pa yi/ /dpal ldan he ru ka gzugs bya/ /lag g.yon thod pa bzung nas ni/ /brtul zhugs
spyod par ldan pa yis/ /cho ga bzhin du bskyed byas na/ /sha za la sogs co mi 'dri/ /sa bon smin pa bzung nas ni/ /mkhas pas sngon bzhin mchod byas nas/ /grub
pa'i rdzas kyi phud dag ni/ /khyad par du ni bla mar dbul/ /sgrub pos de ni khar bcug na/ /sna tshogs pa yi gzugs su snang / /lha dang sbyin bdag gnod sbyin sogs//
ji ltar 'dod bzhin gzugs bsgyur te/ /lha yi bu mo rnams dang ni/ /ji srid 'dod kyi bar du rol/ /dgong mo gtor ma sngon 'gro bas/ /ji bzhin lhag par gnas
bya zhing / /shing bskyed cho ga rgyas pa las/ /'byung bzhin srung ba la sogs bya/ /gzhan du me tog 'bras bu sogs/ /drag po'i gdon gyis gtses pas ni/ /
'grub pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas skra grol gcer bur ni/ /gyur pa'i bu mo'i lag g.yon du/ /gal te smin pa'i 'bras bu de/ /sgrub pa pos ni gzhag par
bya| |gang dang gang gi khrag gis ni/ /yang dang yang du 'bras bu bsgo/ /de yi khrag gis bsgos pa yi/ /sha la sogs pa mtshon bya zhing / /de yi thal bas bskyed
par bya/ /de yi thod par gzugs pa dang / /de yi sha khrag zhag gis ni/ /yang dang yang du bcu par bya/ /de yi sha sogs bdug pa dang / /byug pa'ang yang dang yang
du bya| |sngon du gtor ma srung sogs bya/ /sa bon de ni smin pa dag /cho ga bzhin du blangs nas ni/ /kha yi nang du bzhag gyur na/ /cho gas
ji ltar bsam pa bzhin/ /de dang de yi gzugs 'gyur te/ /de bzhin 'di yi mthu yis ni/ /mi snang bar ni thams cad 'gyur/ /sa bon ma nyams stobs kyis
su| |'ug pa la sogs rnams kyis kyang / /cha tsam yang ni mthong mi nus/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mtshon cha thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir/ /nyi ma gzas
ni zin dus su/ /paN+Di rA ga zhes bya ba dang / /dpa' bo gcig pa stobs po che/ /snga dro nyi ma shar dus su/ /byang phyogs rtsa ba brkos nas ni/ /mnyam par bzhag pas
gzung bar bya/ /sngar bstan cho ga'i rim pa yis/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu rmongs par byed/ /bgrod dka'i lam ni nyam nga ru/ /stag dang seng+ge sogs 'jigs dang / /rgyal po
rkun po'i 'jigs sogs pa/ /thams cad srung ba bla na med/ /yang na de yi ge sar ni/ /zho dang lhan cig bza' bar bya/ /ji srid mgrin par lud kyi bar/ /de
srid bar du bza' bar bya/ /ji srid de ni ma zhu'i bar/ /rdo rje 'dzin 'dra'i lus su 'gyur/ /de'i lus mtshon cha phog pa yang / /chu yi thigs pa ltar mi gnod/ /
mtshon cha thams cad zlog pa yi/ /de nas sbyor ba gzhan bshad bya/ /sngon bzhin gtor ma sogs ldan par/ /ang ko ta ka'i rtsa blangs la/ /de las ril bu byas nas
su| |lcags gsum gyis ni dkri bar bya/ /lha mo der ni khar bcug na/ /mtshon cha thams cad ldog 'gyur zhing / /rims dang glo dang dbugs mi bde/ /nad rnams
gzhan yang tshar gcod la/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dug dang ni/ /lus srul la sogs gzhan dag kyang / /seng+ge yis ni glang chen bzhin/ /dri tsam gyis ni 'bros par
'gyur| |de nas sbyor ba gzhan bshad pa/ /po ti zhes bya lha yi sman/ /rgyal dang nyi ma dag gam ni/ /yang na zla ba gzas zin tshe/ /phyag rgyar bcas pa'i sgrub pa pos//
lha yi rnal 'byor dmigs na ni/ /gtor ma mchog sogs byas nas su/ /'bad de sngags ni bzlas byas la/ /skra grol gcer bur gyur pa yis/ /shin tu mnyam
par bzhag ste gzung / /cho ga'i bya ba 'di yis ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /cha bdun du ni bgos nas su/ /mkhas pas spyi bor gzung bar bya/ /rim
pa 'di yis sgyu ma che/ /mtshon cha thams cad ldog 'gyur te/ /ji snyed sa steng gnas pa yi/ /mtshon cha gzhan yang zlog byed pa/ /nyi ma yis ni mun pa bzhin/ /bltas
pa tsam gyis zlog par byed/ /de nas cho ga gzhan bshad pa/ /nag po chen po sman chen po/ /blo ldan gza' ni nyi ma dang / /skar ma rgyal
dang ldan pa la/ /mchod dang gtor ma'i cho ga yis/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas gzung / /khyu mchog ra yi sa dang ni/ /phyi nas gcig tu bsre bar bya/ /lo gcig
bar du nus dang ldan/ /de nas gsar ba gzhan gzung bya/ /ji srid lus la gnas kyi bar/ /mtshon chas chod cing phugs mi 'gyur/ /sgrub po de yi lus la ni/ /
dug kyang 'pho bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sngar bstan cho ga'i bya ba yis/ /b+ha ma dan ti'i sman gzung bya/ /pad+ma yi ni 'dam dang ni/ /lhan cig tu ni bsre bar bya/ /sngar bstan
cho ga'i rim pa yis/ /i shwa ri ni gzung bar bya/ /mtshan ma gcig gis dag dang / /shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste bsre/ /yon tan dag ni snga ma bzhin/ /
nyon cig lha mo shes rab che/ /kum ri zhes bya ba'i sman/ /gzhon nu ma yi rkang rjes rdul/ /de yi gci ba'i sa dang bcas/ /ma he rwa yis dang ldan/ /'dam 'di
sum cu gsum pas mchod/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /bi snu bi zhes bya ba'i sran/ /sngar bstan cho ga'i bya ba yis/ /nags kyi phreng ba gzung bar bya/ /bzlog
ste 'khor ba'i 'khor lo yi/ /'jim pa 'bad de blangs nas su/ /de dang lhan cig ldan par bya/ /lus la gnas na srung bar 'gyur/ /rtse gcig yid kyis mnyan par
gyis| |phag mo zhes bya'i sman dang ni/ /phag gi lus las byung ba'i 'dam/ /ma he'i rwa yi nang du bzhag /lo gcig bar du nus dang ldan/ /des kyang snga ma bzhin du
'gyur| |lam gyi bzhi mdo ra rtsi dang / /glang chen mche bar chags pa'i sa/ /dbang po shing gi rtsa bar bcas/ /sum cu gsum dbang 'dam zhes bya/ /de na rtsa muN+Da bshad
bya| kha dog gcig pa bla na med/ /tsaN+Da li yi rtsa bzung la/ /sngar bstan bzhin du bsgrub par bya/ /shing gcig dang ni mtshan gcig ba'am/ /sa dang sbyar te 'dam du
bya| |de ni lus la gnas par du/ /sum cu gsum pas kyang mi shigs/ /de nas cho ga gzhan bshad bya/ /snying po thams cad bsdus pa ste/ /mngal nas dang po
byung ba ni/ /ma yi nu zho ma 'thungs pa/ /rdo rje phag mor bcas pa yi/ /he ru ka ni mchod byas la/ /de ltar byas nas lha mo che/ /gtor ma byin pa la yang srung / /de yi
ltag pa gshags nas su/ /lce ni rtsa bar bcas te blang / /bring gi rA dza gser shing dang / /ka ga ga dza gzhan mi thub/ /lha yi sman dang bcas pa las/ /ril bu ru ni
byas nas su/ /khar bcug nas ni bzung gyur na/ /mtshon cha thams cad bzlog 'gyur te/ /ji srid sa steng gnas pa yi/ /mtshon cha
rnams kyang zlog byed na/ /kha cig la lta smos ci dgos/ /rims dang dug dang nad rnams dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang gdon gyis 'tshe/ /de dag thams cad bzlog
'gyur te/ /gzhan dag tu ni nga mi smra/ /de nas sbyor ba gzhan bshad bya/ /de yi sha dang zhag dang khrag /gcin dang khu bar bcas pa yis/ /yung ba nag po la
byugs te/ /rgyal dang 'byung po'i nya mi la/ /bgegs ni zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ /'byung po kun gyi gtor byin te/ /las rnams thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /
sngags pa cho gar ldan pa yis/ /byis pa'i ro yi lto bar ni/ /mar ngo 'byung po'i nyi ma la/ /dur khrod kyi ni sa gzhi ru/ /cho ga bzhin du btsugs la bskyed/ /
lce sbyang la sogs bsrung bar bya/ /'dab ma brul zhing smin pa dang / /sngar gyi cho ga bzhin blangs te/ /de ni lus la gnas kyi bar/ /skad cig gis ni dpa'
bor 'gyur/ /sngar bstan byis pa'i lci dang ni/ /yung ba nag por bcas pa las/ /ril bur byas te khar bcug la/ /g.yul du zhugs na dgra bcings 'gyur/ /
de nas dpung rnams thams cad ni/ /rmongs byed skud pa bshad par bya/ /skar ma rgyal la nan tan du/ /nags kyi ras bal blangs nas ni/ /zla mtshan gyis ni byugs byas
la| |sum sgril yang ni sum sgril du/ /gzhon nu ma yis 'bad de bkal/ /rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /bzlas shing mdud pa de tsam bya/ /mdud pa dag ni thams
cad kyang / /ma mo brgyad du btag par bya/ /de ltar sngags brgyad byas pa yis/ /byin gyis brlab pa byas nas su/ /so so re re dag la yang / /brgya rtsa brgyad brgyad
bzlas byas la/ /lag pa g.yon par btags na ni/ /mda' dang ral gri la sogs pa'i/ /mtshon cha thams cad bcings par 'gyur/ /sgyu ma chen mo'i rig pa 'di/ /
rab tu 'bad de gsang bar bya/ /de nas cho ga gzhan bshad pa/ /nags kyi shal ma li yi ni/ /bal ni skar ma rgyal la blang / /bu mo yi ni gci ba yis/ /btags te
de dang bsre bar bya/ /bu mo yi ni bkal bar bya/ /gza' dang skar ma dge ba dang / /zla ba stobs can dag la ni/ /mdud pa'i sbyor ba byas nas su/ /so so zhing ni re re
la| |sngar gyi rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste bsgrub /'di yis bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ /sum cu gsum pas kyang mi 'ching / /lus kyi
cho ga mthong ba yis/ /mtshon cha thams cad 'ching 'gyur te/ /'di ni ba lang lhas su sgrub/ /su ra gta dang seng ldeng dang / /nim pa
dang ni a rka'ang rung / /skar ma rgyal dang nyi ma la/ /shing bu de gnyis bzung nas ni/ /myos par byed pa'i rig pa che/ /rig pa kun gyi gtso mo ste/ /lan brgya ru
ni bzlas nas su/ /shing bu phan tshun drung gyur na/ /dgra bo nang ni 'thab par 'gyur/ /rdo rje yi ni chu dang ni/ /mdzub mo'i khrag dang bcas pa la/ /myos par byed
pa'i rig pa bzla/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa sngon 'gro bas/ /dpral bar thig le byas nas ni/ /chom po dang ni rkun po dang / /'tshe bar byed pa gzhan yang rung / /skye
bo thams cad rmongs par byed/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom

ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ /stobs bskyed pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o// //gang gis sgrub pa po 'grub pa'i/ /de nas sbyor ba gzhan bshad bya/ /ras ster gyi ni sa bon dag /snye ma'i rtser gnas blang bar bya/ /sngon bzhin cho ga'i sbyor ba
yis| |'byung ba'i nyi ma gza' bzang la/ /gau rI la sogs mkha' 'gro mar/ /bcas pa'i he ru ka mgon mchod/ /bud med kyi ni me tog gis/ /yang dang yang du
bsgo bar bya/ /bsgegs pa 'am ni mtshon gyis bsad/ /spyang ki la sogs ma zos pa'i/ /bud med thod pa mdzes pa ru/ /cho ga de yis bskyed par bya/ /de yang
rnga mo dag gi ni/ /'khrul 'khor la ni bskyon nas su/ /de yi rtse mo blang bar bya/ /sngags pas mchod pa byas nas ni/ /bu mor bsgoms shing de bskol ba'i/ /chu ni
'bad dang bcas te gtor/ /bud med ro bsregs sa dang ni/ /thal bar bcas pas de bkang la/ /ras ster gyi ni sa bon nyid/ /thod pa der ni bskyed par bya/ /bgegs
dgra dang ni gshin gshed kyi/ /sngags ni mngon par bzlas pa yis/ /mchod dang gtor ma phul nas ni/ /ci rigs su ni bsrung bar bya/ /zhi ba'i tshigs bcad sngags kyis
ni| |brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa'i chus/ /der ni bcu ste bskyed par bya/ /gzhan du yi dwags 'tshe ba 'byung / /'bu la sogs pa srung ba dang / /shing bskyed rig byed
bzhin du bya/ /de ni 'bad de smin pa yi/ /ras bla dag ni bzung nas su/ /gzhon nu ma yi khrag gis ni/ /bskos la sngar gyi bu mo yis/ /skra dang bcas pa bu mos
bkal/ /skud pa de yis bcings gyur na/ /de ma thag tu skyes bu ni/ /'dod chags gdungs pa'i bud med 'gyur/ /dkrol na slar yang rnal
mar 'gyur/ /bsgegs pa'i ro yis khrag dang ni/ /zhag gis yungs kar yang yang bsgo/ /gsang ba yi ni zhing sa ru/ /tshes brgyad skar ma rgyal la ni/ /lam dang
rigs mchog thod pa ni/ /ro bsregs sa bkang ro dang bcas/ /nyi ma shis pa dag la gzugs/ /de ni shin tu smin pa blang / /ci rigs 'khrul 'khor btsir ba'i
mar| |bskrad pa la sogs bya ba kun/ /blo ldan ji ltar 'dod bzhin byed/ /sa mtha' lnga yang yang dag ldan/ /rlung gi sa bon las byung ba/ /de yi mod la bskrad
'gyur te/ /bsgrub bya de ni slar mi ldog /bsgegs nas bsad pa'i skyes bu'i ro/ /cho ga'i rim bzhin mchod byas la/ /sngar ni ji ltar bstan pa bzhin/ mar des yan
lag kun tu byug /he ru ka yi spyod pa yis/ /sngags ni zlos shing kun tu gnas/ /sbyor chen des ni bgegs bskrad bya/ /sngags pa chen pos de dus su/ /bgegs
ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /ro yi lus las byung mthong ste/ /de nas der ni de dus su/ /grub pa'i rdzas kyi bar chad byed/ /g.yog dang bcas pa'i sgrub pa pos/ /de tshe
phyag rgya bcing bya ste/ /skye gnas phyag rgya dpral ba yi/ /steng du bcings la bstan bya zhing / /drag po yi ni gzugs kyis su/ /dba' bo'i dam tshig ci rigs bstan/ /sha dang
khrag tu bcas pa yi/ /gtor ma yi dwags rnams la spyin/ /de yi lus las 'jags pa'i mar/ /blangs te bsku ba la sogs blugs/ /de yis lus la byugs tsam
gyis| |nam mkhar rgyu ba 'grub par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang ral gri mig sman dang / /rtsi la sogs pa rab tu 'grub/ /khrag dang mi yi zhag gis ni/ /yungs kar la ni bsgos
nas su| |mi ro yi ni khar bcug la/ /srung pa la sogs 'bad de bya/ /de nas snga ma bzhin bskyed pa'i/ /yungs kar gang la bsnun pa yi/ /bsgrub bya de ni rims nad kyis/ /
'dzin te de ma thag tu 'chi/ /so bya yi ni khrag dang ni/ /zhag gis snu ma ster bsgo byas la/ /de yi thod par ro bsregs pas/ /bkang ba ru ni bskyed par bya/ /mchod dang
gtor ma la sogs pa/ /sngar bstan bzhin du ci rigs bya/ /smin pa'i 'bras bu khar bcug na/ /skyes bu bya yi gzugs su 'gyur/ /de ltar sa bon gzhan dag kyang / /
dog pa la gnas 'bras bu gzung / /de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs 'gyur te/ /kha las bton na sngon bzhin 'gyur/ /bya rnams kyi ni tshe dang mtshungs/ /glang po'i gzugs sogs
de bzhin bya/ /bi di ri yis bon ni/ /mar ngo skar ma rgyal dang ni/ /gza' ni nyi ma dag la gzung / /ma tu lung ga yar ngo la/ mi ro'i zhag/
gis byugs nas su/ /zla ba gzas ni zin pa'i tshe/ /de yi yan lag mchog tu gzugs/ /zin pa de yi gzugs su 'gyur/ /de yi rus pa rkang dang ni/ /sha la
sogs pa bskyed par bya/ /de yi pags pa rus pa yi/ /phyag rgyas yan lag brgyan byas la/ /blo dang ldan pas sngar bstan bzhin/ /mchod sogs byas te thal
pa gtong / /sngags dang bcas pa'i chu yis ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni rtag tu bcug /bgegs mthar byed dang gshin gshed kyi/ /sngags ni sngags pas rtag tu
bzla| |sha za la ni gtor ma sbyin/ /gzhan du na ni bton te khyer/ /sa bon de ni smin pa gzung / /lcug ma gsum gyis dkris nas su/ /khar bcug na ni sped 'gyur
te| |nyi ma zla ba sogs pas kyang / /'jig rten gsum 'dir mthong mi 'gyur/ /ma du lung ga gcig pu ni/ /khar bcug ma du lung gar 'gyur/ /bton na slar yang
snang 'gyur te/ /'bras skyed thun mong cho ga'o/ /de nas sngags kyi chog bshad/ /spyan ba'i sngags kyis gzugs par bya/ /mA ma kI yi sngags kyis bcu/ /sgrol ma'i
sngags kyis bskyed par bya/ /de bzhin gos dkar mos ni srung / /'di dag sa la sogs pa ste/ /thams cad 'dzin cing gso ba yin/ /des na 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /spyan
la sogs pas bsrung bar bya/ /de nas dgong mo'i dus su ni/ /ku ba khan de'i sa bon dag /mi yi zhag sogs kyis byugs la/ /bzhi mdo'i sas bkang thod par bskyed/
de yi dpral bar thig le bya/ /bza' dang bca' sogs rnam pa lnga/ /mthong ba tsam gyis kha bar 'gyur/ /de nas thig le phyis na ni/ /de yi mod la rnal mar 'gyur/ /'ol
ma se yi sa bon ni/ /bram ze yi ni thod pa ru/ /skar ma rgyal la sngags pas bskyed/ /de nas phyung ste slar yang ni/ /tha mal skyed bu'i thod par bskyed/ /sa bon de ni 'grub
gyur na/ /kha ru bcug pas de gzugs 'gyur/ /skyes pa bud med ma ning sogs/ /bya ba'i cho ga bzhin du 'gyur/ /kha las gton na slar yang ni/ /tha mal gzugs
'gyur the tshom med/ /sbyor ba 'di ni grub pa ste/ /gzhan dag tu ni nga mi smra/ /sngags pas bung ba'i rgyal po'i sman/ /gsal shing bsad pa'i thod par bskyed/ /zhag dang
khrag gis gtor bar bya/ /de yi rtsa ba blangs nas su/ /srin lag gi ni khrag dang ni/ /zhag tu bcas pa bsre bar bya/ /spyi bor bzhag na rgyal bar 'gyur/ /lha la sogs
pa dbang du byed/ /ba lang rna ba'i lcug ma ni/ /rnyed nas de yis bon ni/ /smin par bzung ste khar bcug nas/ /g.yul du zhugs na rgyal
bar 'gyur/ /b+hing gi rA dza bzung nas su/ /shan pa'i bu mo sngon mo yi/ /khrag gis zla ba mar ngo la/ /yang yang byugs te sbyar bar bya/ /ba lang rna ba'i lcag dang
ni| |skyes pa'i thod par bskyed dang bcas/ /'bras bu chen po ster bar 'gyur/ /de la sogs pa'i rtsa ba dang / /'bras bu tshul bzhin bskyed pa yis/ /bgegs
rnams thams cad brlag byed par/ /sangs rgyas nges pa'i rgyud las gsungs/ /bsgrub par mi bya ba dang ni/ /'grub par mi 'gyur ci yang med/ /man ngag
dag ni ma gtogs par/ /dngos grub snang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ko ka na ta'i 'bras bu ni/ /sna chen gyi ni thod par bskyed/ /dur khyod skyes pa'i b+hing gi ni/ /thod
par bskyed pa'i rtsa dang bcas/ /yar ngo mar ngo'i bcu bzhi la/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang lhan cig btab/ /ril bu mdzes pa byas nas ni/ /grib ma la ni bskam par
bya| |de yis thig le byas nas ni/ /'gro kun bran bzhin dbang du 'gyur/ /aM ba'i shing gi rus pa ni/ /mar khu chen pos byugs pa dang / /de bzhin ba yi rnam
lngas byug /lag bar khu ba byugs nas su/ /'bras de gang la byin pa ni/ /de dbang 'gyur te gzhan du min/ /bal po se'u'i 'bras bu ni/ /khrag gis byugs te bud med kyi/ /
thod par btsugs pa smin pa yi/ /'bras bu de ni mi dbang la/ /rgyal la byin na rtag dbang 'gyur/ /sku ba khan de'i sa bon ni/ /nim pa la sogs
'bras bus byug /ro bsregs sa dang ldan pa yis/ /chags can kham phor sa bon bskyed/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste bsrung / /mar ngo yi ni nyi ma la/ /nyin
phyed nyi ma tsha dus sgrub/ /de ni blugs pa tsam gyis su/ /chang sogs brlag 'gyur the tshom med/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /yungs kar smin pa brgya dang ni/ /rtsa
brgyad blangs nas zhag gis ni/ /bsgos te legs par thum por bya/ /bud med ro yi lto bar gzhug /nyin bdun bzhag ste phyung nas su/ /de yi mchin par bcas
pa'i sas/ /de yi thod pa bkang bar bskyed/ /gtor ma dang ni srung ba dang / /bdug pa dang ni chus bcu sogs/ /shin tu 'bad dang bcas pa yis/ /las rnams
thams cad sngon bzhin bya/ /ji srid smin gyi bar du bskyed/ /de nas sngar bzhin 'bad pas blang / /bud med gyi ni khrag gis byug /'dab ma dang ni sa bon sogs/ /de
yi yan lag ci yang rung / /bud med gang dang gang bsnun pa/ /de ni phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur/ /'ol se'i sa bon 'bad de gzung / /
dmar ser thod par bskyed par bya/ /de yi lcug ma bzung nas su/ /blo dang ldan pas sgo nga bya/ /de yi nang du chang blugs na/ /snod der gnas pa'i rdzas rnams
ni| |ji srid ma zad bar du ni/ /de na gnas pa'ang zad mi 'gyur/ /chu 'gram sa dang rdza mkhan sa/ /de bzhin thod par chags pa'i sa/ /grog mkhar gyi ni sa dag
dang / /mtshan ma gcig pa'i sa rnams ni/ /bskyed pa kun la shin tu bsngags/ /gci ba'i shul gyi sa bzung la/ /sngags kyis mngon par byin gyis brlab/ /
bong bu'i gcin dang bcas pa las/ /mkhas pas mi yi gzugs brnyan bya/ /gser shing sngar bzhin spyad byas la/ /sngags pas de yi khar bskyed bya/ /de yi
yan lag lnga bzung ste/ /ril bu rag ni mdzes par bya/ /las rnams thams cad byed 'gyur te/ /khyad par du ni dbang du byed/ /yungs kar la sogs 'bras
bu ni/ /glang po che yi sha dag dang / khrag dang rus pa'i zhag la sogs/ /de yi thal ba sogs pas byug /de yi thod par bskyed pa dag /de yi kha ru bcug tsam
gyis| |glang po che yi gzugs su 'gyur/ /'di ni thun mong cho ga ste/ /de bzhin rta dang ma he sogs/ /de bzhin stag dang ri bong sogs/ /cho ga de bzhin bskyed pa yis/
khrag bcas bsgoms na stag sogs 'gyur/ /sbyor ba'i cho ga'i dus su ni/ /grub pa'i gza' la sogs dang sbyar/ /rtag tu sgom dang bzlas la dga'/ /dam
tshig spyod pa srung ba dag /de yis rtag pa 'grub 'gyur te/ /gzhan du na ni 'bras bu med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis
gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ 'bras bu bcos ma'i phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi rim par phye ba ste bzhi bcu pa'o// //
de nas A li kA li gnyis/ /de nyid las ni kun bskyed cing / /spro zhing sdud par byed pa po/ /tha snyad kyi ni cho ga ste/ /sngags kyi mtshan nyid thun mong ba/ /cho ga 'di
dag ji bzhin nyon/ /a zhes bya ba mdog dmar ba/ /mgo dang thig le slangs pa ni/ /sgrub bya'i snying ga mgo po dang / /gsang ba dang ni lte bar bsam/ /a zhes
bya bar thig ler ldan/ /mtshan dang 'ol ma se dang ni/ /ku su ma ni lta bu'i mdog /bsgrub bya'i mgor ni bsam byas la/ /myos shing sems dang bral ba dang / /klugs/
shing rnam par nyams par bsam/ /de yi lus ni rang nyid kyi/ /sa bon gyis dkrugs rmongs bsgoms na/ /ring por mi thogs dbang
'gyur te/ /rtag tu thams cad ster bar 'gyur/ /i zhes bya ba skas lta bu/ /dbyangs yig gsum pa thung ngu ni/ /bsgrub bya'i snying ga lte ba dang / /de bzhin du ni
mgrin par bsgom/ /I zhes bya ba'i dbyangs yig bzhi/ /li khri yi ni mdog lta bu/ /bsgrub bya yi ni dbral bar dgod/ /gang gi lus la gsum pa dang / /
bzhi pa'i mchog ni bkod pa yis/ /myos shing cha lugs nyams pa dang / /sems dang bral bar byas nas su/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /lkugs pa bzhin du
dbang du 'gyur/ /de nas dbyangs yig lnga pa yi/ /dbang po'i mtshon cha lta bu'i 'od/ /U zhes bya ba'i bsgrub bya yi/ /mgrin par zhags pa lta bur bsam/ /glog
dang mtshungs par 'bar ba ni/ dbyangs yig mchog ni drug pa ste/ /U zhes bya ba bsgrub bya yi/ /snying gi dbus su bsgom par bya/ /lkugs shing myos par
'gyur ba dang / /lus ni g.yo zhing sems dang bral/ /gang du sgrub pa por gnas par/ /'khrugs bzhin du ni 'ong bar 'gyur/ /bdag nyid dang ni nor dang bcas/ /
dbang du yang ni 'gyur ba yin/ /ri zhes bya ba du ba'i mdog /dpral bar lus dang bral ba ste/ /dbyangs yig gi ni dam pa de/ /snying ga dang ni gsang bar bsgom/ /de nas
rA nI mun pa'i mdog /bsgrub bya'i lus kyi mgo bo dang / /de bzhin rkang pa mgrin pa ru/ /ring po de ni bsgom par bya/ /bdun pa dang ni brgyad pa 'dis/ /myur du skrod
par byed pa ste/ /sems ni rmugs shing nyams gyur nas/ /sa gzhi ma lus rgyu 'gyur te/ /mthong ba yi ni tshe 'di la/ /slar yang ldog par mi 'gyur ro/ /l-i zhes bya
ba srid pa sdom/ /bya rog gi ni gshog pa 'dra/ /sgrub pos bsgrub bya'i mig dang ni/ /mgrin pa dang ni gsang bar bsgom/ /dbyangs yig ring po l-I zhes pas/ /bsgrub
par bya ba dkris par bsam/ /bsgrub bya'i lus la bsgoms tsam gyis/ /sdang bar byed pa'i mchog yin te/ /sems can kun gyis smad pa dang / /skye bo kun gyis
brnyas pa dang / /mar khu phyung ba'i 'ba' cha bzhin/ /skye bo kun gyis spong bar 'gyur/ /cog la ma yi mtshal dang ni/ /lham bu chu gsher lta bu'i mdog /ai zhes bya
pa dbyangs kyi rgyal/ /gsang dang lte ba snying gar dgod/ /ai zhes bya ba gzi brjid che/ /li khri dang ni nyi ma'i mdog /bsgrub bya'i mig dang de bzhin du/ kha dang
mgrin par bsgom par bya/ /sgrub pa'i mchog gis yid la ni/ /las 'di byas pa tsam gyis su/ /khams gsum po ni ma lus pa/ /
mthe bo'i khyon tsam du ni mthong / /gdong dang gdong ni mngon phyogs te/ /de yi yi ge'i cha shas kyis/ /dbugs kyi ri mo lcug mas dgug /cha shas lcug
ma'i dam tshig dbang / /a zhes bya ba'i dbyangs yig ni/ /thig le dang ni zla phyed bcas/ /zla ba gnyis ni tsheg drag bcas/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad
kyi| |yi ge mchog gi phyag rgya ste/ /sangs rgyas ri mor yang dag gnas/ /'di ltar A li kA li zhes/ /bcud len thams cad zhes byar brjod/ /gtso bo la
ni thim byas nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sogs dang sbyar/ /de yi 'og tu phyin nas ni/ /yi ge thams cad gzhug par bya/ /ji srid snang ba yod kyi bar/ /'dis
ni srung bar byed par brjod/ /thig le zhes bya sems yin te/ /sems kyi rang bzhin stong ba yin/ /zla ba gnyis dang yang dag ldan/ /mi 'gyur mchog gi
phyag rgya'o/ /de las dbyangs yig rnams kyi ni/ /sgrub po bdag nyid chen po yi/ /las ni lha dang lha min dang / /mir bcas myur du dbang du byed/ /oM zhes bya ba
nyi ma ltar/ /'od zer 'bar ba stong dang ldan/ /bsgrub bya yi ni mgo bo dang / /dpral ba khyad par snying gar bsgom/ /oM zhes bya ba rtag 'bar ba/ /nyi ma bye ba'i gzi brjid
can| |bsgrub bya yi ni lus kun la/ /khyab pa nyid du bsgom par bya/ /bskal pa yi ni me dpung ltar/ /dbyangs kyis khyab nas sgom pa dang / /dbyangs kyi me yis bsgrub bya
yang / /rab tu 'bar bar bsgoms byas nas/ /dgra bo lo brgyar 'tsho ba yang / /de ma thag tu ltung bar 'gyur/ /a ni thams cad sdud pa ste/ /'tshe ba zlog par byed
pa'ang yin/ /a ni gshegs su gsol ba ste/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin lha yang byed/ /bud med kun gyi mngal du ni/ /bsams na khu ba 'dzag par 'gyur/ /khyad par
du ni gzhan dag la'ang / /dkar po dmar po'i ting 'dzin bya/ /a la sogs dang yi ge rnams/ /lus la bkod na dpyang mi dgos/ /de ltar dbyangs kyi las rnams
ni| |khyod la bdag gis gang bstan la/ /dbyangs yig dge ba bcu drug ni/ /lus la go char bkod de bya/ /a zhes bya ba rkang gnyis dgod/ /A ni byin pa gnyis
la bsam/ /pa'i ni bral la dgod bya ste/ /pa'i zhes bya ba gsang bar gnas/ /u ni lte ba'i brtsa ba ste/ /U zhes bya ba lte ba'i dbus/ /r-i Ni lte ba'i steng du dgod/ /r-I zhes bya
bying gar yin/ /l-i zhes bya ba mgrin par dgod/ /de bzhin l-I ni rkan la 'o/ /e zhes bya ba kha la ste/ /de bzhin ai ni sna la 'o/ /o ni rna ba dag
la ste| |au zhes bya ba dpral bar ro/ /aM ni mgo la dgod bya ste/ /aH zhes bya ba rgyab tu dgod/ /dbang dang dgug la dmar por te/ /bsad la thams cad sngon
por ro| |du ba lta bur bsams na ni/ /bskrad pa nyid 'gyur the tshom med/ /dbyangs yig kun gyis byin brlabs 'di/ /bdag gi de nyid gsal ba yin/ /sgrub po bdag
nyid dam pa yis/ /de ltar go cha bgos nas ni/ /sgrub pos dbyangs dang yi ge yi/ /phyi nas las rnams shin tu sbyar/ /de nas rig pa'i de nyid 'byung / /las rnams dag tu
byas pa ste/ /ka nas ma yi mthar thug pa'i/ /las ni blo gros chen pos nyon/ /lha dang lha min mi dang bcas/ /gang gis sa gsum thams cad ni/ /sgrub bo shin tu rgyas pa yi//
dbang du de dag thams cad 'gyur/ /yid la 'dod pa'i 'bras ster ba/ /de ni nga yis bshad par bya/ /dbyangs yig bcu drug po rnams kyi/ /mdzes ma khyod la ngas bshad
nas| |da ni ka sogs yi ge yi/ /las rnams 'dod bzhin byed pa bshad/ /lha mo yi ge dang po ni/ /nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang mtshungs shing / /li khri sbungs pa lta bu yi/ /
thig ler ldan pa'i yi ge che/ /sgrub pos bsgrub bya'i snying ga dang / /lte ba dang ni mgo bor bsgom/ /de yis bsgrub bya'i lus kyi ni/ /nang du phug ste khyab par bsam/ /de yis lus
ni 'khrugs nas su/ /rmongs shing sems dang bral ba dang / /brgyal bzhin du ni dbang du 'gyur/ /ji srid lus la gnas kyi bar/ /de srid dbang du 'gyur ba ste/ /de srid 'tsho
yi bar du ni/ /bdag nyid nor dang bcas 'gyur la/ /kha zhes bya ba'ang brtson chen ma/ /lha ma bu chu gsher lta bu dang / /nyi ma 'char kha lta bu'i mdog /thig ler bcas pa gzi
brjid che/ /gsal zhing 'od dang bcas pa ste/ /bsgrub bya yi ni snying ga dang / /mgo dang rkang pa kun tu dgod/ /de yis bsgrub bya phug nas ni/ /rmongs shing sems dang bral bar
bsam| |sgrub pa po yi mchog gis ni/ /de yi lus ni dkrugs pa dang / /myos shing brgyal bar bsgom par bya/ /de yis shin tu brgyal 'gyur zhing / /yi ge'i dbang pos
che bas na/ /sgrub pa bdag nyid chen po yi/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /nor dang bcas pa da'ang du 'gyur/ /ga zhes bya ba'i sa bon che/ /rang gi lha yi sdom pa ste/ /
tsheg drag bcas pa gzi brjid che/ /gtso bo char sprin lta bu'i mdog /bsgrub bya'i mgo dang mgrin pa dang / /khyad par du ni snying gar bsam//
de yis bsgrub par bya ba'i lus/ /yi ges kun tu phug bsam na/ /lus ni rtag tu dkrugs pas na/ /'dar zhing de yi dbang du 'gyur/
bdag nyid dang ni nor dang bcas/ /sdang ba'i dgra rnams ma lus pa/ /khyim la sogs pa kun tu ni/ /ji srid nyi zla yod kyi bar/ /ma lus par ni 'joms par byed/ /
g+ha zhes bya ba sgyu ma che/ /bskal pa'i me dang gzi brjid mtshungs/ /steng du thig les brgyan pa ste/ /ku su ma yi khu ba 'dra/ /bsgrub bya yi ni lte ba dang / /gsang ba snying ga kha dang
ni| |mgo bo ru ni bsams tsam gyis/ /bsgrub bya dga' bas myos nas su/ /sems dang bral zhing nyams nas ni/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /bdag nyid nor dang bcas pa ru/ /shin
tu de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /nga zhes bya ba gzi brjid che/ /sde tshan gyi ni mtha' mar gnas/ /de ni 'dod pa'i mnga' yin te/ /'jig rten gsum po dbang du byed/ /de ni bsgrub
bya'i gsang bar bsam/ /khu ba dag ni 'dzag par byed/ /gsang ba ru ni zhugs pa yis/ /thams cad du ni 'bigs par 'gyur/ /yan lag gi ni tshigs kun tu/ /de yi
phug pas myos nas ni/ /nor dang bdag nyid bcas pa ni/ /myur ba nyid du dbang du 'gyur/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /de la chags dang bral mi 'gyur/ /yi ge lnga po kun
gyis kyang / /bdag nyid go cha bskon par bya/ /ka zhes bya ba snying gar dgod/ /kha zhes bya ba mgo la ste/ /ga zhes bya ba spyi gtsug tu/ /g+ha zhes bya ba go char bya/ /nga zhes bya ba sgrub bo
po'i| |lag pa g.yon la dgod par bya/ /de nas bsgrub bya dbang dang ni/ /dgug dang gsad la sogs par sbyar/ /cho ga de ltar byas na ni/ /dpyad mi dgos par dngos grub 'gyur/ /tsang
zhes bya ba du ba'i mdog /rlung ga gnas kyi yi ge ste/ /sgrub pos de yi snying ga dang / /mgo dang rkang par bsam par bya/ /bsgrub bya rlung la gnas nas ni/ /kun tu 'pho bar bsam
pa dang / /sems dang bral bar gyur nas su/ /nam mkha' la ni gnas bzhin du/ /rlung gis gzhan dang gzhan dag tu/ /khyer pa ru ni bsgom par bya/ /bsam gtan
sbyor pa 'di yis ni/ /bsgrub bya shin tu brtan pa yang / /bskrad 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /bsgrub bya'i lus ni 'phangs pas na/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /
slar yang 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /tsha zhes bya ba'i yi ge che/ /gsal zhing mig sman nag po'i mdog /cha gnyis pa dang yang dag ldan/ /bsgrub bya yi ni
mgo bor bsam/ /de yi mgo la du ba yi/ /tshogs dang mtshungs pa'i rlung gis khyab/ /cung zad tsam gyis bsgrub bya yi/ /lus ni de yis bskor bar bsam/ /slar yang tsha ni tsheg drag bcas/ /
lte ba ru ni bsams nas su/ /lan gsum du ni brjod byas na/ /yi ge 'di ni bskrad pa'i mchog /bsgrub bya rmongs shing sems dang bral/ /dgra bo
mdangs ni nyams nas su/ /sa steng ma lus pa ru 'khyams/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /slar yang ldog par mi 'gyur ro/ /dza zhes bya ba'i yi ge rgyal/ /du ba'i mdog can gzi
brjid che/ /'od zer ldan zhing shin tu 'bar/ /rdul phran dag ni stong du 'phro/ /bsgrub bya yi ni mgo bo dang / /gsang bar yi ge zhugs par bsgom/ /yan lag tshigs kun
phug pa dang / /sems dang bral ba bzhin du gnas/ /yi ge yongs su bkang bas na/ /de nas rgyal bar gyur nas ni/ /nyin dang mtshan du rmongs pa dang / /mi sad par ni bsgom
par bya| |sa steng shing dang nags tshal bcas/ /thams cad du ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bskrad pa'i cho ga 'di dag ni/ /dge ma khyod la nga yis bshad/ /ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar
du ni| |slar yang 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dz+ha zhes bya ba stobs po che/ /bsgrub bya yi ni snying ga ru/ /nyi ma lta bur 'bar ba dang / /'od zer gsal ba rnam par 'phro/ /thig
la zla ba phyed pas brgyan/ /bsgrub bya'i mgo dang snying ga dang / /lte ba'i steng du yi ge bsam/ /sgrub pa'i dbang pos bsgrub bya'i lus/ /'bar bas bcud dang phral
bar bsam/ de yis bsgrub bya brgyal 'gyur zhing / /bskrad pa'am ni 'chi ba'am/ /yang na smyon pa nyid du 'gyur/ /yi ge yis ni ltung bas na/ /slar yang 'ong bar mi 'gyur te/ /
sa gzhi nags tshal bcas pa ru/ /smyo zhing 'gro 'gyur the tshom med/ /dz+ha zhes bya ba 'di yis ni/ /myur du bskrad 'gyur the tshom med/ /nya zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog /sna tshogs pa
yi mdog dang ldan/ /pa la sha yi me tog gi /'od zer stong phrag 'bar ba ste/ /chu rgyun stong ni 'bab pa yis/ /de yi lus la dbo bar bya/ /de yis nor dang bcas pa ru/ /brgyal
