zhing sems dang bral ba dang / /rmongs shing myur du dbang du 'gyur/ /Ta zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog /dbang po'i mtshon cha lta bu'i mdog /'od zer 'bar ba stong phrag gis/ /yi
ge 'bar dang ldan par bsam/ /bsgrub bya yi ni dbral ba dang / /mgrin pa dang ni snying gar bsam/ /bsgrub bya'i steng du nam mkha' la/ /bdud rtsi sgo yi thig le ni/ /spyi bo'i
steng du rtag tu bsam/ /cung zad glog ni g.yo 'dra ba'i/ /kha ba dag ni 'bab par bsam/ /sgrub pa po yis bsgrub bya ni/ /yan lag tshigs kun g.yo ba dang / /brgyal zhing
rmongs la myos bsams na/ /ji srid nyi zla yod par du/ /nor dang bdag nyid bcas pa ru/ /de yis thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /de ltar Ta yi rgyal po yi/ /las ni khyod la
nga yis bshad/ /de nas yi ge gnyis pa yi/ /las kyi mchog ni bshad par bya/ /T+ha zhes bya ba'i yi ge ni/ /dbang chen dang ni 'dra bar 'dod/ /spyi bor
bdud rtsi thig les brgyan/ /de bzhin glog dang 'brug gis brgyan/ /yi ge'i mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /bdud rtsi chu rgyun 'bab pa yis/ /bsgrub bya'i lus la kun tu gtor/ /
bsgrub bya'i mgo dang mgrin pa dang / /snying ga ru ni gnas par bsam/ /bsgrub bya'i mgo ni phug pa dang / /lus la kun tu khyab pa yis/ /bsgrub bya myos shing 'dar ba ru/ /
sngags pas yi ges rtag tu bsgom/ /de nas ji srid 'tsho bar du/ /brgyal zhing rmongs pas dbang du 'gyur/ /de nas Da zhes bya ba ni/ /ye ge'i rgyal po gsum pa ste/ /de yi
las kyi mchog rnams ni/ /rtse gcig yid kyis gus pas nyon/ /Da zhes bya ba thig ler bcas/ /rdo rje lta bu'i dbyibs can yin/ /ut+pa la ltar ljang ser te/ /'od zer
gsal ba kun tu 'gro/ /bsgrub bya'i spyi bor bsam pa yis/ /bsgrub bya'i tshigs ni 'bugs shing 'byed/ /bsgrub bya mi g.yor bsgoms byas na/ /lus ni kun tu
g.yo bzhin du/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /rmongs dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur/ /de nas las kyi mchog gzhan ni/ /shin tu gnyer bar byed pa ste/ /D+ha zhes bya ba yi
ge'i rgyal/ /shin tu rmad byung phyed pa po/ /dbang po'i mtshon cha lta bu'i mdog /nyi ma lta bur 'bar ba ste/ /bsgrub bya'i snying dang lte ba dang / /mgrin par yi ge bsams nas su/ /
byang chub sems ni rab 'dzag pas/ /de yi lus la dbo bar bya/ /de yis bzi zhing brgyal nas su/ /gnyid log par ni bsgoms byas na/ /'di yis ring por mi thogs par//
rmongs shing sgrub po'i dbang du 'gyur/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /nam yang chags dang 'bral mi 'gyur/ /de nas D+ha mtha' yi ge las/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'bad de
nyon| |Na zhes bya ba du ba'i mdog /cung zad 'bar zhing gsal ba ste/ /dri ma med pa'i du ba las/ /'od zer gsal ba rnam par 'phro/ /bsgrub bya yi ni lus kun la/ /de yis
rnam par khyab byed cing / /'od zer glog stong 'khyug 'dra ba/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i steng du bsgom/ /'od zer brgya yis bkang bas na/ /myos nas su ni brgyal bar 'gyur/ /de yis
ji srid 'tsho bar du/ /de ni de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /ta zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog /'od zer glog ltar gsal ba ste/ /mdog ni rma bya'i mgrin pa 'dra/ /yi ge 'di ni bsgrub bya yi//
snying dang mgrin pa gsang ba dang / /lte bar bkod de 'bugs par bsam/ /yi ge de yis rmongs pas na/ /bsgrub bya sems dang bral ba dang / /rmongs shing brgyal bar
gyur nas su/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du ni/ /myos shing dbang 'gyur gzhan du min/ /de yi drung na gnas pa yi/ /tha zhes bya ba yi ge mchog /mu men
gyi ni mdog 'dra dang / /ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma'i 'od/ /bsgrub bya'i snying ga dpral ba dang / /de bzhin du ni rkang par dgod/ /bsgrub bya'i lus la dbang pa yi/ /mtshon
cha bzhin du thim par bsam/ /yi ge'i rgyal pos mnan pas na/ /bsgrub bya sems dang bral 'gyur zhing / /sa 'dzin gyi ni dbang po bzhin/ /'gro ba dag kyang bcings
par 'gyur/ /reg bya mi shes dri mi shes/ /sgra mi shes shing gzugs mi mthong / /lce yis ro rnams mi myong zhing / /dug gis brgyal ba bzhin du gnas/ /gang dang
gang gi steng du ni/ /nyi 'od lta bu'i yi ge bsam/ /yi ge'i rgyal po tha yis ni/ /skyes bu bcings 'gyur the tshom med/ /de nas gzhan yang de yis ni/ /sdong po'i
las kyi cho ga nyon/ /de zhes bya ba mdog sngon ni/ /char sprin nag po'i 'od dang mtshungs/ /'od zer 'bar ba rnam 'phro ba/ /bsgrub bya yi ni mgor bsams la/ /me
stag 'phro ba bsgoms pa ni/ /phyogs kun du ni bsam par bya/ /yi ge'i dbang phyug de yis ni/ /bsgrub bya'i mgo bo phug par bsam/ /'bar ba'i sprin ni stong
phrag gis/ /de ni kun tu bskor bar bsam/ /de ni bkod pa tsam gyis su/ /sdong gog dang ni mtshungs par 'gyur/ /phug ste shin tu bcings pas na/ /'gro ba'ang mi g.yo
bar ni 'gyur/ /ji srid sgrub pa 'dod bar du/ /sems dang bral zhing brtan par gnas/ /slar yang sgrub pos bsam tsam gyis/ /rmongs pa las ni grol bar 'gyur/ /de
nas yi ge d+ha yi ni/ /las ni rmad du gyur pa nyon/ /d+ha zhes bya ba gzhu yi dbyibs/ /kha dog ser po gser gyi mdog /gser lta bu yi 'od zer 'phros/ /bsgrub bya yi ni
mgrin pa ru/ /zhags pa lta bur 'bar bar bsam/ /sgrub pa'i dbang pos bsgrub bya ste/ /khrid de 'ong bar bsgoms byas na/ /sgrub pa po ni gar gnas par/ /rmongs de
bcas te 'ong bar 'gyur/ /ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du ni/ /phyugs de sems dang bral 'gyur zhing / /nyi ma brgyad pa'i cha la ni/ /rang gi gnas nas 'ong bar 'gyur/ /de nas
yi ge na yi ni/ /las kyi cho ga'i sgrub pa nyon/ /mdog ni du ba'i phung po 'dra/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'khrug dang ldan/ /bsgrub bya'i snying ga mgrin pa dang / lte ba dang ni
rkang par sbyar/ /de yis dgra rnams rang yul las/ /bskrad 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med/ /de ni rmongs pas rang yul du/ /nam yang phyis ni 'ong mi 'gyur/ /de nas sde
tshan lnga pa ni/ /yi ge rnams kyi dbang phyug mchog /las ni shin tu sgrub pa ste/ /gzhan dang gzhan ni bshad par bya/ /pa zhes bya ba rlung gi
gnas| |char sprin gyi ni sprin gyis bskor/ /'bar zhing du bas 'khrigs par ldan/ /bsgrub bya yi ni mgo bo dang / /mgrin pa snying ga rked pa dang / /rkang pa dag tu bsams
nas ni| |pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge des/ /bsgrub bya'i lus ni dkri bar bya/ /bsgrub par bya ba nga rgyal dang / /khro bas brtan gnas gtso bo yang / /yi ge gtso bo bkod pa yis/ /
skad cig gis ni bskrad 'gyur te/ /gal te tshe rabs gzhan dag la'ang / /slar zhing ldog par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas yi ge pha yi ni/ /las mchog nga yis bshad kyi nyon//
yi ge pad+ma'i mdog 'dra zhing / /'bar pa bsgrub bya'i spyi bo dang / /mgrin pa snying ga lte ba dang / /gsang ba'i gnas su bkod nas ni/ /ku sum yi khu 'dra pa/ /'dzag
pa ru ni rnam bsams te/ /bsgrub bya'i lus ni phyi nang du/ /de yis gang bar bsgoms byas na/ /bsgrub bya rmongs shing brgyal 'gyur la/ /sems med lus ni 'dar gyur
nas| |rmongs pas sgrub pa po yi ni/ /dbang du 'gyur te dpyad mi dgos/ /ba zhes bya ba'i rgyal po ni/ /gru bzhi pa la stobs po che/ /dung dang zla 'dra dkar po'i mdog /zla ba'i
'od can bsgrub bya ni/ /dbus su sgrub pos thim par bsam/ /de lus dug gis mi tshugs shing / /nad la sogs pas gzir mi 'gyur/ /rims dang bkres dang skom mi 'byung / /
'di ni rtag tu bsgoms gyur na/ /tshe ring nad med rgyal bar 'gyur/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /zla ba dmar dang bcas pa ru/ /lhan cig tu ni bzlas gyur na/ /rtag
tu bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'drar 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal po b+ha zhes pa'i/ /las kyi mchog ni mnyan par gyis/ /dbang po'i mtshon cha lta bu ste/ /nyi ma 'char ka lta bu'i mdog /bsgrub
bya yi ni mgo bo ru/ /rgyal ba'i mchog ni rtag bsam la/ /de yi lus ni ma lus par/ /yi ge'i rgyal pos dbug par bya/ /rmongs shing sems dang bral 'gyur te/ /
rdo rje yin yang brgyal gyur nas/ /mche bas zin ltar skad cig la/ /ltung zhing 'chi ba nyid gyur pas/ /de yi srog ni rmongs par 'gyur/ /dgra ni lo brgyar 'tsho ba yang / /
skad cig gis ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de nas gzi brjid chen po yi/ /yi ge nyi shu rtsa lnga pa/ /ma zhes bya ba dam pa mchog /de yi las ni ji bzhin nyon/ /tsam pa ka ltar ser
ba'i mdog /bskal ba'i me bzhin gzi brjid 'bar/ /'od ni glog ltar 'khyug pa bzhin/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i steng bsam la/ /de yi 'od kyis bsgrub bya yi/ /steng dang 'og
ni ma lus par/ /lus ni kun tu g.yogs bsams na/ /gnod sbyin lha dang klu yi bu/ /sha za dang ni srin po dang / /khams gsum yi ge'i bdag
po dang / /lha dang lha min mi dang bcas/ /sgrub po bdag nyid chen po yi/ /skad cig gis ni dbang 'gyur bar/ /mdor bsdus ngas ni khyod la bshad/ /ya zhes bya ba'i yi
ge mchog /mun pa dang ni du ba'i mdog /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing / /rlung gi gzugs can yi ge che/ /rlung bdun gyi ni gtso bo dang / /gnas zhes bya
bar brjod pa ste/ /zla phyed kyi ni dbyibs can la/ /ba dan brgya yis rnam par klubs/ /rnam pa bzhi yi rten gyur pa/ /phyi rol gos ltar dkris pa ste/ /ra zhes pa yi yi
ge mchog /'bar ba bye ba stong dang ldan/ /de yi steng du bsam par bya/ /du ba yi ni phreng bas brgyan/ /bsgrub bya'i mgo bor bsgoms nas ni/ /dgra bo lo brgyar 'tsho ba
yang / /sbrul gyi mche bas zin pa ltar/ /skad cig tsam gyis srog dang ni/ /bral zhing 'chi ba'i sgor gzhol 'gyur/ /lha sogs thams cad gang rung gi /steng du yi
ge 'di sbyar na/ /myur du ltung 'gyur dpyad mi dgos/ /gdon dang rims rnams thams cad ni/ /de la 'bab par 'gyur ba dang / /sprul chen brgya yi mche ba 'bab/ /de yis
myur du 'chi 'gyur na/ /gnod pa gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /ya zhes pa dang ra zhes pa/ /rlung dang me yi gzugs can du/ /nam mkha'i phyogs su bsams nas ni/ /nam mkha'i
ngos ni g.yogs bsams na/ /nyi zla gza' skar sogs pa'ang rung / /chu bo dang ni rgya mtsho yi/ /dbus su yi ge gnyis po dag /bsams nas nyi ma brgyad pa la/ /rgya mtsho
la sogs thams cad skam/ /zhing sa 'bru yi phung po dang / /khyim la sogs pa'i gnas bsams nas/ /phyi rol me lce 'bar ba yis/ /thams cad yi ge thal bar
byed| |me yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas te/ /rlung gis kun tu bskor ba ni/ /yi ge mchog ni gnyis bsams na/ /las ni kun tu nye bar gnas/ /de nas gzhan
yang yi ge gnyis/ /stobs chen ldan pa bshad par bya/ /dbang chen dang ni de bzhin chu/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa po/ /la zhes bya bas yin te/ /sa zhes
bya ba 'dzin pa'i mchog /dbang po rdo rjes mtshan pa dang / /'od zer glog ltar 'bar ba ste/ /kha dog lnga dang ldan pa ru/ /yi ge'i dbang po sa la bsgom/ /de steng chu yi yi
ge ni/ /bzhi pa legs par gnas pa ste/ /dud dang zla 'dra dkar po'i mdog /kha ba'i rgyun ni 'bab pa ste/ /la yi steng du bkod nas su/ /shin tu bsil ba'i bdud rtsi
'dzag /dbang chen gyis ni bskor ba yi/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ /spyi bor thig le dang ni ldan/ /char ba'i rgyun ni stong phrag
'bebs/ /steng du sprin gyi phung po ni/ /glog dang 'brug la sogs pas brgyan/ /bdud rtsi char gyi rgyun 'bebs pa/ /nam mkha' thams cad khyab pa ru/ /dkyil 'khor
gnyis kyi dbus 'gyur ba/ /gang gi mgo yi steng bsgoms na/ /sgrub po bdag nyid chen po yi/ /las ni ji ltar 'dod bzhin byed/ /gdengs ka gsum gyis
mdzes pa yi/ /lhag ma can ni zhi gzugs bsam/ /de yi mig gnyis dbang po yi/ /mtshon chas brgyan pa'i dbus su ni/ /bdud rtsi 'bebs pa'i i yig
dgod| |grong khyer gyi ni mtha' ma ru/ /bsgrub bya yi ni steng du dbab/ /dug dang gdon dang rims la sogs/ /skad cig gis ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /de ni skra dkar
gzhom pa yi/ /cho gar bshad kyi mnyan par gyis/ /dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur yi ge ni/ /de ltar rtag tu bsam gyur na/ /tshe thung ba yang ring 'gyur na/ /skra dkar
la sogs smos ci dgos/ /bud med dbang phyug rnams la ni/ /'bad pas yang dag g.yon bskor zhing / /rang gi spyi bo'i steng du ni/ /lo gcig bar du bsgoms
byas na| |rga ba dang ni 'chi ba 'joms/ /nad kyis gdung bar mi 'gyur te/ /gal te klu chen brgyad kyi ni/ /mche ba'i dug gis zin gyur kyang / /dug ni dug med byas nas su/ /dug
gis brgyal ba slong bar mdzad/ /mgron po lam gyis dub pa dang / /gdon la sogs pas gzir ba rnams/ /kun las thar bar 'gyur ba yin/ /bdag gi spyi bor bsam
tsam gyis/ /skad cig gis ni bkres skom 'joms/ /nad rnams kun gyis gdungs pa la/ /yi ge bkod pas grol bar 'gyur/ /de ltar las rnams sna tshogs ni/ /lha
mo khyod la bshad pa yin/ /gtso mo bzhi yi rnam pa bzhi/ /las kyi cho ga rgyas pa ste/ /rlung dang me dang bdud rtsi bcud/ /de bzhin drod kyi sde ba ste/ /gshin rje brtan ma phyag
gnyis pa/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs/ /lus ni me las byung ba ru/ /bskal ba'i me lce lta bur bsam/ /'og dang steng du wa yis brgyan/ /de yi phyogs
kun thams cad du/ /'bar ba gang gi snying gar bsam/ /'od zer 'bar ba rnam par 'phro/ /wa dang ldan pa'i yi ge che/ /nam mkha' khyab pas bcings 'gyur te/ /
brtan ma yi ni 'khrul 'khor gyi/ /yi ge'i rgyal pos bcings pas na/ /sa 'dzin la bar brtan par 'gyur/ /rkang med dang ni rkang gnyis dang / /rkang bzhi la sogs
sems can gyis/ /lte ba ru ni bsgoms byas na/ /de ma thag tu 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de yang bskal ba'i me lta bu'i/ /'od zer 'bar ba 'phro ba yi/ /
wa ni steng du bsgom par bya/ /slar yang me yis 'bar bsams na/ /gang gi lag pa g.yon pa la/ /yi ge de ni dgod par bsam/ /ji srid lag tu bsam gyi bar/ /sa
steng gi ni skye bo rnams/ /rang gi gnas ni de nyid nas/ /'bebs shing 'gugs par byed pa'i mchog /'di ni gshin rje brtan ma la/ /mos pa'i las rnams bshad
pa yin| |dbang po thams cad 'bebs pa yi/ /gshin rje'i pho nya'i las bshad bya/ /ut+pal sngon po'i 'deb 'dra ba/ /mgo dang thig le spangs pa ni/ /ut+pal
sngon po'i 'dab lta bu/ /gang gi lce dang rkan bsams na/ /skal ba bzang po 'joms par 'gyur/ /snying dang kha dang sna dang ni/ /mig dang rna bar de bzhin du/ /yi ge dbu ma
bkod na ni/ /dbang po thams cad 'phrog 'gyur te/ /gzugs mi mthong zhing sgra mi thos/ /dri mi tshor zhing stobs mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin lce yis ro mi myong / /dug gis
brgyal ba bzhin du gnas/ /las rnams de dag thams cad la/ /yid kyis bzlog na grol bar 'gyur/ /gshin rje mche ba du ba'i mdog /sreg pa'i bskal pa lta bu
ste| |thams cad khyad par 'khyams 'gyur ba/ /sna tshogs 'od can bsgom par bya/ /drod kyi sde ba'i yi ge sa/ /du ba dang ni rlung gi mdog /snying dang lag pa rkang par dgod/ /
khams gsum yang ni bskrad 'gyur na/ /sa steng skye bo smos ci dgod/ /thig ler bcas shing ha dang ni/ /bcas pa gang gis lce steng du/ /bsams na phur bu lta bur 'gyur//
yi ge dge ba de nyid ni/ /rtag tu lce steng bsams na ni/ /lan gcig bzlas pas zin 'gyur te/ /de ni snyan dngags mkhan por 'gyur/ /de ltar sa dang sa mtha' yi/ /
yi ge'i cho ga bshad pa 'o/ /'jig rten gsum po 'joms byed ma/ 'od zer dmar po gzi brjid che/ /nyi ma bye ba lta bu'i 'od/ /cung zad sngo ba 'jigs chen mo/ /ma he
dang ni rta dag gi /'khrul 'khor sbyor ba kun la bsam/ /de yis yi ge'i rgyal po ni/ /gzi brjid chen po yi ge ha/ /de yi las ni sna tshogs mchog /'dod pa'i las ni
bshad par bya/ /de ltar bdag lus rtag tu ni/ /yi ge sngar ni bsams byas na/ /'gro ba rnams kyi bya ba ni/ /chig gis thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /sa steng lha dang lha
min dang / /mi dang bcas pa 'bebs byed cing / /sgrub pa po ni dus min par/ /'chi ba dag ni 'joms par byed/ /sgrub po yid la 'dod bzhin du/ /nad rnams thams
cad gnon par byed/ /ngag tsam gyis ni dpung tshogs dang / /chu dang rgya mtsho'i mching ba dang / /gru dang khyogs dang 'khrul 'khor dang / /rta dang
glang po la sogs 'ching / /shing chen sa la sgyel ba dang / /sems can rnams ni dbang du byed/ /las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis/ /bya ba rnams ni 'dod bzhin byed/ /ha
zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog /mgo dang bral zhing thig les brgyan/ /de yi las rnams ma lus pa/ /phan pa bshad kyi mnyan par gyis/ /khyab bya khyab byed stong pa ste//
kun tu 'gro ba mi shigs pa/ /shin tu stong dang stong pa che/ /de ni sems med gnyid log pa/ /sad pa dang ni bral ba ste/ /de ni cir yang snang mi 'gyur/ /lha dang lha
min gnod sbyin min/ /mi 'am ci dang dri za min/ /klu rnams dang ni srin po dang / /rgya mtsho dang ni ri rab min/ /chu bo'i shing dang nags chal dang / /de bzhin sa sogs
ma yin te/ /'jigs rung dmyal ba la sogs min/ /me dang du ba sogs min zhing / /nyi ma zla ba gza' skar min/ /mi dang sha za la sogs min/ /mngal skyes
dang ni drod las skyes/ /sgo nga dang ni rlan skyes min/ /thang la gnas dang chu gnas min/ /pad+ma las ni skyes pa dang / /dbang po khyab 'jug bde byed min/ /rlung dang
mkhris pa bad kan sogs/ /'byung ba'i tshogs la sogs min te/ /ha zhes bya ba'i yi ge mchog /rtag tu bsams na dmigs mi 'gyur/ /lo gcig bar du bsgoms gyur
na| |rga dang nad kun 'joms 'gyur te/ /de la dug kyang mi 'pho na/ /nad kyi 'jigs pa ga la zhig /dug ni khur bu brgya zos kyang / /de ni 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu stong nyid
bsgoms na ni/ /de ni thar 'gyur the tshom med/ /mgo dang dpral bar yi ge k+Sha/ /de nyid mchog tu thim nas su/ /bsgoms na skad cig mngon shes skye/ /thig ler ldan pa'i sbyar
ba yis/ /rkan dang sna sgo'i lam du ni/ /ri mo dag ni zhugs pa bsam/ /ri mo mar me'i rtse lta bu/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi yi gzhi can bsam/ /rtag tu rkan ni phug ste gnas/ /rtag tu sbyor
bar gnas pa yis/ /nyi ma bdun na mthong 'gyur te/ /'di dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin/ /bram ze gsod pa'ang nyin bdun gyi/ /rtse mo rgyas par mthong 'gyur te/ /de ltar
mthong ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /gzhan gyi grong sogs 'dod bzhin 'gro/ /k+Sha yi rgyal po 'di nyid kyi/ /las ni bsam gyis mi khyab gnas/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das
dngos grub/ /brtul zhugs ma ni khyod la bshad/ /re re yi ni las rnams kyang / /bstan pa ru ni nus ma yin/ /skye bo rang don byed pa yi/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bu yin/ /yi
ge sde tshan so so yi/ /yi ge dag ni so so zhing / /re re'ang sbyor ba bzhi bzhi ste/ /gcig kyang bzhi ru sbyor ba bzhin/ /A li kA li'i phyag rgya che/ /
dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba/ /shes rab thabs ni ma gtogs par/ /go 'phang mchog ni thob mi 'gyur/ /sgyu ma che dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde
ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ /A li kA li'i sngags
kyi sgrub thabs 'byung ba'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo rnams kyis mchod cing phyag
'tshal te slar gsol pa/ /khyod kyis sngar bshad gsang ba dang / /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /yi ge bcu drug rig pa che/ /bde mchog bla mar bshad
pa dang / /khams rnams dang ni de bzhin rtsa/ /'byung gnas sgra tshul nges 'byung dang / /'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba/ /thog ma dbus mthar dbye ba dag /ji ltar
nang du yang dag gnas/ /de rnams dbye ba de bzhin gsungs/ /bka' stsal ba/ /sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol pa'i/ /nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che/ /sangs rgyas kun la'ang
gsang ba ste/ /gzhan rnams la lta smos ci dgos/ /sgyu ma chen po bcu drug ni/ /ma mo nyid du rab tu bshad/ /de yis nang gi dkyil 'khor du/ /gyur pa nyid du the tshom med/ /
rnal 'byor pa yi bdud rtsi sbyor/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /slar yang bdud rtsi rdzas rnams ni/ /da ni bshad kyi mnyan par gyis/ /ra ni dmar chen po yi khams/ /
ha zhes bya ba ri las skyes/ /sa ni gnad pa tra ste/ /pa ni pags par bstan pa yin/ /ra zhes bya ba dri ru gsungs/ /me zhes bya ba me tog ste/ /de bzhin ra ni chu yin no/ /
me zhes bya ba pi si ta/ /sa ni kun tu ru nyid yin/ /rwa ni sa ri zhes bya ste/ /at+ma zhes bya na la dza/ /ni zhes bya ba dri yi mar/ /sa ni so dang lag skyes yin/ /dA ni rgya mtsho
las byung ba/ /s+thi ni kha ba'i snying po yin/ /ta zhes bya ba ga bur te/ /byang chub sems las byung ba yi/ /rtag tu ye shes dam pa mchog /rtsa rnams thams cad yang
dag 'dus/ /de dag lha mo khyod la bstan/ /gsang sogs rnal 'byor ba yi rdzas/ /bshad dang gci sogs lnga la bya/ /khams rnams sdud pa'i sde tshan ni/ /de ltar bcud len
bsten pa yin/ /mkha' 'gro kun dngos chags pa yi/ /sems dpa' rdo rje las byung ba/ /pad+ma 'byed pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /pad+ma gar dbang zhes bya ste/ /steng du gsal bar 'phro
bas na| |rdo rje nyi ma zhes bya la/ /'di ni gsal zhing 'bar bas na/ /rnam snang mdzad chen thub pa'ang yin/ /rlung ni sna tshogs las byung ba/ /khyad
par spyod pas rta mchog yin/ /rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /phan tshun gnyis med rang bzhin no/ /gnas der nyi ma nub pa yi/ /sprul pa'i sku yi gzugs kyi bdag /
lha dang mi yi bde ba ni/ /bsdus byas rnyog pa med pa ste/ /'khor ba'i lam ni gcod pa po/ /spros pa thams cad nyer zhi ba'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka/ /mkha' 'gro ma
kun sgra ru bshad/ /yang na mkha' 'gro ma kun gyi sgra ni/ rab gtum mo la sogs pa la bya la/ dngos bo ni/ rang bzhin te/ de rnams kyi rdul phra rab las
bsgrubs pa'o/ /de nyid sems can gyi don la nus pa dang ldan pa'i phyir sems dpa'i sgrar brjod de/ mi shes pa'i ri bo 'joms pas na/ ye shes nyid ni/ rdo rje'o/ /
sems dpa' rnam pa gnyis gsungs te/ /snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten no/ /bcud ni rgyu ba zhes bshad la/ /de bzhin snod ni brtan pa'o/ /re re zhing yang gnyis gnyis
te| |skal pa bzang dang skal ngan no/ /sa dang chu dang me rlung gi /gzugs ni rnam pa bzhi ru gnas/ /'di ni zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid rang byung bas na/
rang byung bcom ldan 'das so/ /rang byung ba zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung ba chen po rjes su dpag pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ dbang phyug la sogs
pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas so/ /yang na nyon mongs pa'i bdud bcom pas na/ bcom ldan 'das te/ rang byung bcom ldan 'das de nyid lhag pa'i lha ni/ gcig nyid de/
lha nyid yin zhing lhag pa nyid kyi phyir lhag pa'i lha ste/ lhag pa'i lha'i sgrar gang sngar bstan pa'i khams rnams kyi nang na gtso bo dang dam par gyur pa ste/ phung po dang
khams dang skye mched rnams yang dag par skyed par byed pa'i khu ba dang khrag go /mchog tu bde ba de las skyes shing byung bas na/ gnas te/ nges 'byung ni/ sems
skyed pa'i bzhed gzhung gsungs pa'o/ /sgra ni/ dbyangs te/ shes rab kyi dbyangs kyi rjes su 'jug pa'o/ /tshul ni/ sgrar brtags pa ste/ de las byung ba'o/ /bsten cing
bsnyen par bya bas na/ dam tshig ste/ yul can gyis yang dag par bzhag pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams dang / don dam par dbyer med pas nye bar brtags
nas yul can dbang po la yang yul zhes bya'o/ /spyod pa ni/ dbang po bcu gnyis po de rnams kyi nye bar rgyu ba ste/ de rnams kyis rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin byang chub
kyi sems thob pa ni/ spyod yul lo/ /'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba zhes bya ba ni/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po gsum las
rnyed par mi 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid de/ thog ma dbus mthar yang dag gnas pa'o/ /de la thog ma ni/ gsang ba ste/ 'di skad ces bya ba sngar 'byung gnas su gyur
pa'i rig pa'o/ /mtha' zhes bya ba ni/ dges pa ste/ thos pa zhes bya ba bsten par bya'o/ /dbus zhes bya ba ni/ mchog ste/ bdag gi zhes bya ba shin tu dam
par gyur pa'o/ /yang dag gnas ni/ thams cad bdag nyid de/ dus gcig na zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ma sgyu ma chen mo de nyid ngan par spyod pa ste/ lo
brgyad pa dang rdo rje pad+mo sbyor bas byung ba'i khrag dang bcas pa'o/ /lha dang mi yi bde ba ni/ /bsdus byas rdo rje rdus kyi ni/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod pa ste/ de la bcu
drug cha ni/ bud med kyi skud pa las byung ba'i khams rnams skud pa bcu drug dang lhan cig tu bsgril ba ste/ chags pa chen po zhes bya ba gang yin pa'o/ /de ltar skud
pa bcu drug dang bsgril ba'i cha shas bcu drug go /bsdus byas zhes bya ba bdud rtsi lnga'i snying po'o/ /gong bur byas pa ste/ bdud rtsi lnga'i sbyor bar gyur pa'o/ /dang zhes bya
ba ni| bsdu ba'i don te/ sde tshan rnams kyis bsdus shing bstan pa'i khams gang dang gang yin pa'i rlan de dang de sa bon dang bsgril te rtag par bya'o/ /lha'i bde ba zhes bya ba
ni| de bdud rtsi ltar yongs su smin pas rang gi sku rdo rjer gyur pa'i skad cig go/ /mi'i yin pas na/ mi'i ste/ nges par gsal ba'i bde ba'o/ /de yang dngos grub thams
cad kyi rang bzhin rtag tu gsal bas mtshan pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i sems kyi rdo rje mngon du bya zhing bde ba bsten pa las bde ba nyid du skye
bar 'gyur te/ ther zug tu bde ba ster bas so/ /de yang dper na/ mngar pos bsgos pa'i sa bon ni/ /mngar po nyid ni bsten pa dang / /gang phyir mngar pos bskyed byas
na| |de yi ro ni mngar por 'gyur/ /de bzhin du chos kyi bdud rtsi las byung ba'i bde ba bsten na/ bde ba 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /de dang mnyam pa dngos po gsum po
gang du yang yod pa ma yin te/ cha shas kun dang mtshungs ba lta zhog /de'i rdul phra rab kyi cha dang mtshungs pa yang yod pa ma yin no/ /rdul phra rab ni/ rdo rje phra mo'i
rang bzhin te/ byang chub kyi sems bde ba'i bdag nyid spros pa'o/ /mthu dang ngo bo nyid dag dang / /rang bzhin gyis ni grub pa ste/ /de yi rang bzhin gtam dag ni/ /bzhin mdzes
ma ni khyod la bshad/ /gang zhig phyi rol sbyor ba dga'/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /sbyor ba'i mchog ni 'di mthong ngo / /de dag 'bus zos
rtswa dang 'dra/ /da ni chu skyes chen po'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i gnas phun sum tshogs pa bshad par bya ste/ mi gsal brda yi tshul gyis ni/ /gnas ni gsang zhes byar
bshad| |mi gsal pa yi dngos por ni/ /brda yi skad kyis bshad pa yin/ /'di ni rtog pa la brten nas/ /gnas ni gsang ba bshad par bya/ /dgon chen zhes bya ba la
sogs pa ni/ sgra ji bzhin no/ /gzhan yang dgon chen zhes bya ba ni/ shes rab ste/ sngags kyi yon tan gyi shing gi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro//
de nyid rang bzhin gyis lha'i bdag nyid bas na sa phyogs so/ /rigs mtha' yas pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir mang po'i tshig go/ /bdag dang sems can la sogs par
rtog pa dang bral bar rnam par dben pa ste/ lta ba ngan pa rnams kyis gzhig par mi nus pa'i phyir ri bo'o/ /'jug par dka' ba'i phyir ri bo'o/ /zang cing rgya che ba'i
shes rab kyi chu bo'i gnas su gyur pas rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram rnams so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / sbyin pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnam
par dag pas gdod nas grub pa ste/ nyan thos la sogs pa'i byang chub 'dod chags kyi mes bsregs pas dur khrod do/ /de ltar na me long lta bu la sogs pa lnga rnam par
dag pas gnas rnam pa lngar bsgrags so/ /chung ngu ni/ dang por lo bcu gcig ma'i pad+ma dang 'ol pas bcud kyis len bsgrub par bya'o/ /gnyis par lo bcu gnyis
ma dang rol pas ni/ dam tshig don du gnyer bar bya'o/ /gsum par lo bcu drug ma dang lhan cig tu dga' bas ni/ sngags rnams goms par bya'o/ /bzhi par lo
nyi shu ma dang nam mkhar 'phur ba bsgrub par bya'o/ /lnga par lo nyi shu rtsa lnga ma dang dbang bskur bar bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de ltar na/ dbugs dbyung mchog dang bar ma dang //
zhes bya ba gnas lnga po de dag dang rim pa bzhin du sbyar ro/ /de la rigs ldan rnams ni/ rdo rje rigs kyi bu mo la sogs pa rnams dri yi chus mchod par bya ste/ bcas pa
zhes bya ba ni/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i me tog bzung la mkhas pas rang gi khu ba dang bcas pas mchod do/ /rtag tu zhes bya ba ni/ thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad par te/ dus kyi
khyad par zhes bya ba snga dro'i dus su'o/ /gzhan yang lhan cig skyes grub zhes bya ba thun mong gi dngos grub dang ldan zhing sgrub pa po la brtse ba ste/ thig le des sangs rgyas
dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mchod par bya'o/ /gzhan yang dgon pa chen po zhes bya ba ni/ bud med kyi phyag rgya ste/ 'dod chags la
sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i nags tshal dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /de nyid thabs kyis yongs su sbyangs nas byang chub kyi lam ste/ yongs su sbyangs pa ni/ mthar thug
par son pa'o/ /de'i d+harmo da ya ni/ sa phyogs te/ de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i rdo rje rigs la sogs pa'i bu mo bas na/ rnam
par dben pa'o/ /de nyid bde ba chen pos mi g.yo bas na/ ri bo'o/ /sems can dman pas 'jug pa dka' bas na/ ri bor te/ phug dang ldan pas na/ tshang
tshing ngo / /thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'i rgya mtshor gnas pas rgya mtsho'i 'gram ste/ sems can thams cad kyi rgyud kyi rgyud la mnyam par gnas
pas na/ dur khrod do/ /gdod nas grub pa ni/ rtag tu grub pa ste/ 'char ba dang nub pa spangs shing nam mkha' ltar yongs su grub pas rtag tu bde ba chen po'i tshul
gyis dmigs pas de'i rang bzhin du byas pa'o/ /ni zhes bya ba ni/ 'dus pa ste/ de dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /sna tshogs pad+ma ras kyis g.yogs zhes bya ba la/ sna tshogs
ni| rnam pa du ma ste/ pad+ma ni/ gzugs kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /ras ni/ gsal bar ma byas pa ste/ g.yogs pa ni/ shin tu ma mngon par byas pa'o/ /stan ni/ rig
pa nyid gdan du byas pa ste/ dag pa ni/ 'jam pa'o/ /lha mo rnams kyi pad+ma rang gi mtshan ma'i gos kyi rgyan gyis rgyan pa'o/ /bzhag pa ni/ mchod bar bya ba ste/ yang dang yang
du 'dod pas mnyes par bya ba'o/ /sdom pa ni/ bde ba'i mchog go/ /pad+ma'i khrag dang zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin du khrag ni/ bcud kyis len pa ste/ khrag ni/ pad+ma yin
la| bshang ba la sogs pa ni/ bcud kyis len no/ /des 'di skad du bstan par 'gyur te/ khrag chen ga bur bcas pa dang / /tsan+dan dmar por sbyar ba dag /tshogs
kyi nang du zhugs pa na/ ra sa ya na bla na med/ /ces bya ba la/ khrag chen ni/ dus su 'bab pa'i zla mtshan du gyur pa'o/ /tsan+dan dmar po ni/ sha ste/ de dang bcas
pa'o/ /chags kyi nang du zhugs pa ni/ dbang po thams cad las byung ba ste/ de dag thams cad kyi bcud ni/ ra sa ya na'o/ /bza' bar bya ba la cho ga gang gis bza'
par bya zhe na/ sbom po'am mtha' ltag ces bya ba la/ sbom po ni/ rdo rje'o/ /mtha' ltag ni/ b+ha ga ste/ A nA ma zhes bya ba ming gis bsnyad pa'i phyir ro/ /khar zhes bya
bya ba ni/ de nyid kyi khas rang gi lha'i khar ro/ /de yang / dang po bla mar dbul byas te/ /de nas sangs rgyas rnams la dbul/ /phyag rgya la ni byin
nas su| |zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin du myang / /mchod pa bzhi zhes bya ba la/ /byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa pos ni/ dus bzhir mkha' 'gro ma la sogs
pa'i lha mo dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi'i bdag nyid can ji srid stong pa nyid kyi nga rgyal nas bzung ste gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar du nges par byas
pas mchod par bya'o/ /dpa' bo dang ni snyoms 'jug pa/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan yongs su rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i sgom pa po'i ste/ dus kyi nges
pa med cing thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i nga rgyal gyis rtag tu gnas pa rnams kyis ci zhig bya zhe na/ yid ni nang du chud pa'i ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi skyed ma mo'i shes rab dang ji lta ba bzhin du mnyam par sbyor ba dang ldan pas mchog tu dga' ba rnam par spro ste/ gnas pas tshim par bya zhes bya ba'i bar
du'o| |de ltar mchod pas mchog dang bar ma ste/ tha ma ni/ chags pa chen po'i tshul lo/ /de yang rdo rje can gyis thams cad bsdus nas btsun mo'i b+ha ga bde ba
can du spros la/ der ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ zhes bya ba dang sbyar ba ste/ gzhan gyi de kho na nyid ji bzhin du bstan pa'o/ /bar ma ni/ bdag gi de kho na nyid rdo rje'i
'dzin pas 'khor lo thams cad rang gi dbus su bsdus la/ rdo rje kun gyi rang bzhin du byas pa cho ga des bsgoms pa ni/ mchog go/ bud med kun gyi sgyu ma zhes bya
bya ba la| bud med kun ni gzugs la sogs pa'o/ /sgyu ma ni/ yon tan te/ rang bzhin gyis sku la sogs pas gnas pa'o/ /sgyu ma ste/ yon tan gyi rgyus ma lus
pa sgyu ma'i don du gsungs so/ /ma lus pa ni/ cha shas te/ cha dang bcas pa'o/ /cha ni dngos por bstan pa ste/ /cha med yon tan zhes bya yin/ /yon tan yon tan
can sbyar ba/ /yul dang dbang po rab tu dge /A li kA li yon tan gsungs/ /mnyam pa dam tshig spyod yul yin/ /de nyid ni/ mtshan ma yin pas na/ phyag rgya ste/
'di ni zhes bya ba ni/ 'dzin pa po'i blos mngon du byas pa'o/ /yon tan des rtag tu yon tan dang ldan par gyur pa'i ring po la sogs pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul nyid
mchog ste/ bla na med cing dam par gyur pa'o/ /de yang lugs ma la sogs pa gzhan dag las phul du byung bar rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i phyir ro/ /rang bzhin gyis
grub pa ni/ 'gyur ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang / ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa ste/ ji ltar 'o ma la zho la sogs pa bzhin no/ /de bas na/
bcos ma las bye brag tu gyur ba'o/ /gzhan yang / ngan par spyod pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur/ /rnyed dang bde dang dga' kun gyis/ /zhes bya ba la/ rnyed pa ni/ byang chub
kyi sems rnyed pa ste/ de nyid dga' ba kun gyis khyad par du 'phel bas yin gyi/ slong mos 'tsho ba la sogs pa dang / dka' thub kyi sbyor ba la sogs pa ni/ mi
mthun pa'i phyogs yin pas nam yang 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ spang bar bya'o/ /des zhes bya ba ni/ grub pa'i rdzas kyis te/ khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na/ rang bzhin
dang ngo bo nyid kyis grub pa ste/ rang bzhin gyis sngags kyi yi ge yongs su gyur pa las rang gi lha'i gzugs su yongs su brje ba ste/ sngags bzlas pa dang / rang gi sa
bon yongs su gyur pa las rang bzhin yongs su brje ba'o/ /sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni/ khams kyi rang bzhin te/ mkha' 'gro ma rnam pa bco brgyad du phye ba yin gyi/
b+hu ba la sogs pa'i khams ni/ ma yin no/ /nam mkha' kun tu rgyu grub pa/ /zhes bya ba la/ nam mkha' sgras ni/ sems la bya ste/ ji ltar nam mkha'i khams
la sogs pa thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa bzhin du thams cad kyi go skabs ster ba'i phyir ro/ /yang na nyan thos la sogs pa'i gnas bsregs pas na/ nam mkha'
ste| nam mkha' der bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gyis rgyu zhing spyod pas na/ de ni/ nam mkha' kun tu rgyu grub pas/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags/ /zhes so/ /sna tshogs
kun tu phyag rgya ste/ /zhes bya ba la/ kun tu ni/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i rigs thams cad do/ /sna tshogs ni/ rdo rje 'dzin chen po ste/ de'i phyag rgya ni/ dkyil 'khor
gyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya thams cad do/ /nges na sna tshogs phyag rgya ste/ sems kyi rang bzhin gyis zla ba dang dmar po'i grub pa'i rdzas de dag nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar tu rtag tu
goms par bya bas stobs su gyur pa'o/ /sna tshogs sdom pa ni/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bde ba grub pa ste/ mkha' 'gro kun zhes bya ba khrag dang mnyam par sbyor
ba'i cho gas sngags pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes bya bar grags pa ste/ rang nyid skyes par gyur pa'o/ /de nyid med sems ni/ de kho na nyid kyi sems med pa ste/ phyin ci
log gi sems kyis sbyor ba'o/ /lha la dmigs pa ni/ 'dod pa'i lhar sgom pa'o/ /shin tu de nyid sems zhes bya ba ni/ de kho na nyid kyi sems kyis brgyan pa ste/ phyin
ci ma log pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /de yang khrag la sogs pa'i khams sangs rgyas rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi de kho na nyid de/ dngos grub thams cad kyi
gnas so/ /lugs ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ de spangs nas bcos ma sgom par byed pa ste/ gang gi phyir gzugs brnyan ma yin pas so/ /des ni/ 'di skad
bstan par 'gyur te/ ji ltar smin pa'i 'bras bu bor nas shing gi rtsa ba len par byed pa bzhin du rnal ma bor te bcos ma la chags pa yang blo gros dman zhing shin tu
blun par ston to/ /des na de kho na nyid kyi sems kyis phun sum tshogs pas bdag nyid sbyor zhing rdzogs pa'i rim pas sangs rgyas kyi sku la dmigs pa ni/ mchog tu
mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /ye shes de nyid ni/ mchog tu mi 'gyur ba ste/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i phyir ro/ /des na gzhan yang gzugs brnyan
dang lugs ma la sogs pa spangs te khams sna tshogs kyi shes pa nyid sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus par brtag par bya'o/ /lha yi rnal 'byor dus su ni/ /ba spu rnams
kyi bu ga nas/ /zhes bya ba la/ ba spu ni/ lte ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ bu ga ni/ nam mkha'o/ /rtse mo'i bar zhes bya ba ni/ yi ge bcu drug yongs su gyur pa'i khams
rnams te/ spro ba dam tshig dkyil 'khor te/ /rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu bsgom/ /dam tshig dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba/ /rang gi pad+ma'i lte dbus su/ /zla bar gnas pa'i hUM
yin te| |sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag ni/ /phyogs bcu dag tu spro bar byed/ /thig le bcu drug thig skud kyi/ /sngags pas thig gis thig btab pa'i/ /lto ba'i dkyil 'khor
bcu drug par/ /a sogs k+Sha yi mthar thug pa/ /tha ma las ni sngags btu bya/ /phyi nas thig ler cha dang bral/ /bshang dang gci ba'i rang bzhin pas/ /'di ru k+Sha ni spangs bar
bya| |yi ge ha ni yongs gyur pas/ /yi ge thams cad yal ga 'dra/ /'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos stong pa yi/ /
yi ge nyid ni mkha' 'gro ma/ /zhes bya ba ni/ sngags kyi man ngag go/ /ka sogs yang dag gnas ba yi/ /yi ge lha yi gzugs yin te/ /a sogs dbyangs rnams thams
cad kyi| |sngags kyis sgeg cing brgyan pa yin/ /lha pa'i lha ni yi ge hUM/ /lte ba'i dbus su bsam par bya/ /lte ba pad+ma zhes bya ste/ /bsam pa bsgom par bya ba yin/ /
sangs rgyas kun dngos stong pa nyid/ /rnam shes hUM gi gzugs nyid do/ /yi ge nyid ni mkha' 'gro ma/ /sgra yi gzugs kyis gnas pa'o/ /gang phyir gzhan yang 'di dag ni/
ji ltar sangs rgyas kun de bzhin/ /'di ni rtag tu 'don pa dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas/ /mgo dang thig le rnam spangs pa/ /
gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha/ /rang gi dbus gnas rdo rje can/ /yi ge rnams kyis yongs su bskor/ /de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa'i yul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba
la| ye shes ni/ spyod yul yongs su shes pa'o/ /yongs su shes pa zhes bya ba ni/ kun nas shes pa'i ye shes te/ de nyid kyis ni/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams
cad do| |bdag nyid ces bya ba ni/ kun rdzob ste/ kun rdzob yongs su shes pa ni/ sangs rgyas nyid do/ /de nyid kyis sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'grub bo/ /thabs
gang gis she na/ de kho na nyid snang ba zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin
gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa de kho na nyid 'byung ba'i
rim par phye ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga ni/ /ji bzhin bshad kyi lha mo nyon/ /rgyal srid phyir ni sngags pa yis/ /stong
phrag bcur ni bzla bar bya/ /pho nya'i steng du gnas nas ni/ /sbyin sreg stong phrag lnga ni bya/ /sha chen 'o ma la bsgres pa/ /rim pa 'di yis bsregs na ni/ /dpag tshad 'bum
phrag brgya yi bar/ /tshun chad pho brang rnyed par 'gyur/ /dpal ldan rgyal srid che grub pa/ /sus kyang gzhig par mi nus so/ /mi dang ba lang lce spyang shas/ /de bzhin ngo mtshar
mchog 'gyur te/ /chang dang 'o mar sbags nas ni/ /sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gcig byas na/ /gling bdun la ni dbang ba yi/ /rgyal srid longs spyod dpal chen 'gyur/ /de nas
mtshams med lnga byed pa/ /gang gi gzhom par 'dod pa des/ /dug dang khrag dang mar nag bcas/ /mi yi rus pa bsregs byas te/ /tsher ma can gyi shing dang ni/ /de
bzhin phub ma mi skrar bcas/ /shan pa yi ni me sbar la/ /gcer bu skra ni lhug pa yis/ /lho phyogs su ni kha bltas te/ /khro dang bcas pas nyan phyed na/ /sems mi g.yengs
bas sreg pa'am/ /yang na gos sngon gyon nas su/ /mtshan phyed na ni bsreg par bya/ /sngags kyi mthar ni ming dang sbyar/ /dgra bo stobs dang ldan pa yang / /dpung dang bcas
par brlag 'gyur na/ /phal pa la lta ci zhig smos/ /de nas dgra bo stobs kyis ni/ /dregs pa bskrad pa'i cho ga bshad/ /khwa yi gshog pa zhag dang ni/ /nim pa'i khu bar
bsregs pa dag /sha za'i shing la me sbar te/ /rlung du bltas te bsregs byas na/ /mtshan mo bdun ni tshun chad kyis/ /bskrad 'gyur 'dir ni the
tshom med/ /de nas dbye ba bshad par bya/ /smyo byed me ni 'bar ba la/ /nim pa yi ni lo ma dang / /sprul gyi pags par bsres byas la/ /bya rog dang ni 'ug pa yi/ /tshang
gi shing dang bcas pa dag /brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs nas ni/ /mdza' shes gnyen 'dun bcas pa dag /skye bo thams cad sdang bar 'gyur/ /de nas dgug pa bshad bya
ste| |bsgrub bya shing gi stan la ni/ /rol par bcas shing g.yo dang bcas/ /rlung gis gdong ni steng du lta/ /li khri lta bu'i mdog tu bsam/ /zhags pa lcags kyu'i
sbyor ba yis/ /sngags kyi mthar ni dza bzlas te/ /bsgrub bya'i snying gi pad+ma dbug /bud med yin na skye gnas dbug khams gsum 'grub par gdon mi za/ /de
nas cho ga gzhan bshad pa/ /dgug pa la sogs ji bzhin 'byung / /dum bu gcig pa'i thod pa ni/ /gzugs mdzes ma chags ma gas la/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i
gzugs bris te/ /'dab ma rlon pa brgya la ni/ /khrag dang go ro tsa nar bcas/ /d+ha du ra yi smyu gu yis/ /sngags ni ming dang bcas par bri/ /thod pa'i nang du bzhag
nas su| |bsgrub bya dmar po ras kyis g.yogs/ /sngags kyi nga rgyal bsgyings nas su/ /'dab ma re re bzung nas ni/ /go ldog snying po'i gsang sngags ni/ /zlos shing 'dab ma
thams cad bsregs/ /yid la bsam bzhin 'gugs par 'gyur/ /de nas gzhan yang tsan+dan ni/ /dmar las bsgrub bya'i gzugs byas la/ /rang khrag go ro tsa nar
bcas| |ming bris bsgrub bya'i snying gar gzhug /tsha ba gsum gyis byugs nas su/ /snying ga lte ba gsang ba'i gnas/ /zangs ma'i khab kyis dbugs byas nas//
mtshan phyed na ni 'dod bzhin 'gug /gser btsag gis ni skye gnas kyi/ /gzugs bris de yi steng du ni/ /lag pa g.yon pa bzhag byas la/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas
na ni| |gang gi ming nas gzung gyur pa/ /de ni de mod 'ong bar 'gyur/ /rlung gis btsugs pa'i shing lo la/ /khwa yi sgo yi smyu gu yis/ /ming dang bcas pa'i 'khrul
'khor ni/ /mchi ma las ni bris nas su/ /gyen du ldang ba'i tshug par bskur/ /cho ga des ni bskrad par 'gyur/ /spre'u'i rus pa'i phur bu ni/ /sor drug pa yi tshang du
bya| |sngags ni lan bdun bzlas nas su/ /gang gi khyim sgor sbas na ni/ /de yi rigs ni chad par 'gyur/ /ba lang rta dang glang chen dang / /bong bu rnga mo ma he yi/ /
gnas su sbas na brlag par 'gyur/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /bsgrub bya rnga mo'i steng du bskyon/ /gcer bu mar khus byugs pa
dang / skra grol kha ni lho ru bltas/ /skyabs med du zhing brgyal bar bsam/ /mgrin pa zhags pas bcings nas su/ /rgyab nas khro bos rdeg byed cing / khams gsum gnon
pa'i bsam pa yis/ /me yi mtshams su gdong bltas ste/ /sngags kyi mthar ni dza bzlas na/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'grub par 'gyur/ /rta dang ma her zhon pa yis/ /dgra bo
nang ni phan tshun du/ /mtshon cha thogs nas khros nas ni/ /phan tshun dpung dang bcas pa ru/ /'thab mo byed pa bsgom par bya/ /sngags pa g.yul du kha bltas te/ /de yi
ming dang spel pa yi/ /yi ge ra ni bri bar bya/ /gdong gi steng du bltas par bsam/ /sgrub po ro yi steng du ni/ /rdo rje skyil krung mi g.yor gnas/ /de yis bsgrub bya mnan
nas su| |lus dang ngag ni gzir bar bya/ /sngags ni ming dang spel ba ru/ /snga ma bzhin du bzla bar bya/ /bcing ba'i cho ga'o/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo
rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ las thams
cad kyi bsam gtan 'byung ba dang / sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bzhi cu rtsa gsum pa'o// //de ni sbyin sreg cho ga gzhan/ /rab tu bshad kyi lha mo nyon//
sgeg pa 'am ni gzhan yang rung / /rma med shin tu mdzes pa ni/ /'byung po'i nyin zhag la rnyed pa/ /sgrub pos sngar bshad bzhin bsgrubs na/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu
'grub| |zla mtshan phyis pa'i ras ma ni/ /byi la'i rtug par bcas pa dag /zhib tu brdungs pas bdug pa bya/ /bdug pa 'di yis sgrub pa po/ /shin tu byin gyis rlob par
'gyur| |khyi mo nag mo'i 'o ma dang / /ma sha 'bras bu bcas pa las/ /'o thug byas te ro yi khar/ /'jigs pa med par sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas ro de langs nas ni/ /ci bgyi
zhes ni smra 'gyur te/ /ril bu mig sman dngos grub dang / rkang byug ral gri de bzhin te/ /gter dang dgra bo tshar gcod dang / /gnod sbyin mo dang bcud kyis len/ /gang bslangs
gcig ni byin nas su/ /'gro bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ /dpa' bo rnams dang rtse 'gyur ba/ /gzhan dag tu ni nga mi smra/ /de nas ro langs chen po yi/ /sgrub thabs gzhan ni
bshad par bya/ /sngar bstan mtshan nyid ldan pa yi/ /ro ni mdzes pa bzung nas ni/ /rnal 'byor chen por legs gnas pa/ /mtshan phyed na ni bsgoms nas su/ /de yi sha ni
dmar chen bcas/ /sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na/ /dpal ldan rdo rje phag mo ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yis bskor gyur cing / /ro langs srin po du
mas bskor/ /ha har bzhad pas 'jigs byed pa/ /der ni drung du 'ong bar 'gyur/ /lce spyang brgya phrag mang po ni/ /bskor nas 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrog byed/ /de mthong 'jigs
par mi bya ste/ /sngags kyis bsgyings pa'i lus su bya/ /rdo rje brtul zhugs bdag nyid sems/ /kye ho dpa' bo chen po legs/ /lha mo de skad brjod nas ni/ /sgrub po
yid la gang 'dod pa'i/ /dngos grub brgya yang ster bar 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ma yis yongs bskor te/ /dpa' bo rang gi gnas su 'gro/ /de ni de yi mod la yang //
lha yi lus su gyur nas ni/ /khams gsum kun tu rgyu bar 'gyur/ /dpa' bo 'dod pa'i gzugs can te/ /skal bzang de bzhin gshegs pa 'dra/ /rtag tu nam
mkhar 'phur ba dang / /rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spong / /sa gzhi kun tu rgyu 'gyur zhing / /ji ltar 'dod bzhin dngos grub 'jug /de nas nyon mongs zhi bya dang / /ting nge 'dzin ni
rgyas bya'i phyir/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor bar gnas/ /nang gi sbyin sreg brtsam par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /bdag nyid rtag tu bsam par bya/ /'od zer
phreng ba 'khrugs shing drag /'od kyi dkyil 'khor phreng ba can/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba ni/ /stong gsum stong gi rdul mtshungs pa/ kha dog dkar la sogs
bkug ste/ /lus mchog de la gzhug par bya/ /'di ni zhi ba'i sbyin sreg yin/ /rgyas la byang chub sems dpa' dgug /rengs pa'i gzugs su lhag par mos/ /shin
tu nyon mongs zad bya'i phyir/ khyad par khro bo'i gzugs su bya/ /sna tshogs rjes su chags bya'i phyir/ /bud med kyi ni gzugs su bsam/ /'di ni nang gi sbyin sreg tu//
sgrub po kun la bstan pa yin/ /phung po la sogs bud shing ni/ /las kyi rlung gis bskyod pa yi/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas 'bar ba/ /ye shes me la bsreg par bya//
tshangs pa'i me ni sked par gnas/ /la la nA ni dgang gzar te/ /ra sa nA ni blug gzar kha/ /dbyug pa rdo rje rin chen 'og /rang gi rdo rje mtha' yi bar/ /thod pa bsreg rdzas
snod yin te/ /rdzas rnams thams cad bsreg par bya/ /'di ni bla med sbyin sreg gi /go cha'i rim pa nyid yin te/ /lha mo khyod la bshad pa yin/ /de ltar byas na ting 'dzin
ni| |nyams par mi 'gyur brtan 'gyur bar/ /rgyud rnams kun las thun mong du/ /cho ga 'dis ni rab tu grags/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro
bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/
ro langs sgrub pa dang / nang gi sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //bgrang phreng cho ga ji bzhin du/ /rab tu bshad kyi lha mo nyon//
yang dag cho ga gang gis ni/ /'di ni grub 'gyur the tshom med/ /shel dang nya phyis mu tig dang / khams kun la sogs gzhan yang rung / /dung dang lung tang mu men ni//
tshe dang nad med 'phel bar byed/ /gser dang de bzhin dngul dang ni/ khyad par pad+ma'i sa bon dang / /rin chen phreng ba mdzes pa ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni bgrangs nas su//
rgyal srid phyir ni sngags bzlas na/ /dpal chen myur du thob par 'gyur/ /gur gum la sogs dri dang ni/ /khyad par du yang byi ru dang / /tsan+dan dmar po dngul la
sogs| |sgrub pa po yis ril bu bya/ /zhen cing rjes su chags pa mchog /sgrub pa po la 'bras bu ster/ /ru rag lung tang sa bon dang / /mi yi rus pa de bzhin te/ /
drag po'i las la sbyar bar bya/ khyad par du ni mngon spyod la rdo rje rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod la/ /bu traM dzi ba las kun byed/ /sngags mnyes par ni lnga bcu ste/ /rjes
su chags par de yi phyed/ /zhi ba la ni brgya yin te/ /rgyas la brgyad ni lhag par bya/ /mngon spyod la ni drug cu ste/ /las kyi bye brag gis ni sbyar/ /las kyi bye brag ji bzhin
du| |bgrang ba'i phreng ba rnams ni bya/ /gser gyi skud pas brgyu bar bya/ /las rnams kun byed dge ba yin/ /yang na ras bal skud pa ni/ /bu mo gzhon nu gzugs mdzes shing / /
yan lag shin tu rdzogs pa dang / /blo gros ldan zhing ngag 'jam smra/ /de yis bkal ba'i skud pas brgyu/ /sngags kyi dngos grub grol bar 'gyur/ /ril bu rnams ni dgra bcom
ste| |steng ma mchod rten du ni brtag /mchod rten chos kyi dbang po bas/ /chos kyi dbyings ni dbus su bya/ /bskrad la bya rog spu dang ni/ /bong bu rnga mo'i sdu las bya/ /rta dang ma
he'i spu yis ni/ /phan tshun sdang ba'i skud par bya/ /dur khrod skra yi skud pa dang / /khyi yi spu dang bsres te bkal/ /drag po'i las la khyad par du/ /mdor bsdus nas ni
bstan pa yin/ /zhi ba la ni mdzub mor gzhag /rgyas la gung mor dag la bar bya/ /dbang du bya ba srin lag gsungs/ /mtha' ma la ni mngon spyod bya/ /mthe bo lcags kyur
byas nas ni/ /lha rnams thams cad 'gug par bsam/ /shin tu mnyam bzhag sngags bzlas na/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor
ba'i| |rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ /bzlas pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// //de nas pad+mar rdo rje bcug pa bskyod cing gar byas te
bcom ldan 'das la lha mos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gtsug lag khang dang khang bzang dang / /mchod rten dkyil 'khor grong khyer dang / khyim dang ldum ra la sogs
pa| |lto 'phye'i lto bar brko ba dang / /slob ma sa gzhi gzung ba dang / /bum pa sta gon gnas pa nyid/ /srung ba'i cho ga sngon 'gro ba'i/ /lha dang slob ma sta gon bcas/ /ye
shes skud pa tshon rtsi rnams/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad du gsol/ /slob ma yi ni cho ga dag /ji bzhin bshad kyi lha mo nyon/ /sngar bshad mtshan nyid ldan pa dang / /ye
shes yongs su rdzogs pa'i lus/ /sems can don brtson sems kyis ni/ /dngos po kun gyis gsol ba gdab/ /slar yang dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir/ /slob ma yis
ni bla ma la/ /yang dang yang du gsol bar bya/ /gsol nas bla mas smra bya ste/ /yo byad thams cad 'byor ram ci/ /cung zad cig ni 'byor gyur la/ kha cig dag ni ma
'byor ces/ /smra na slob dpon bdag chen gyis/ /de yi sems ni brtag par bya/ /brtan pa la ni brtan par te/ /g.yo ba la ni g.yo ba ru/ /'dren ma la ni 'dren mar shes//
slob ma yi ni rkang mthil du/ /gzhu 'dra'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam/ /lte bar ye shes me 'bar ba/ /de yi 'od zer snying gar 'bar/ /'bar bas kun nas 'khrigs
par bsgom/ /paM las byung ba'i mi sdug gzugs/ /sdig ni sna yi sgo nas dbyung / /de nas khro bo'i gzugs bsgoms la/ /de ni kun nas za bar bsgom/ /oM badzra DA ki nI
kha kha khA ha khA hi/ sarba pA paM da ha da ha b+ha smaM ku ru hUM hUM phaT/ bsgrub bya lha gzugs bskyed nas su/ /srung ba dag ni dgod par bya/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga ji bzhin du/ /brtag
pa ru ni su yis nus/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni brtags na 'grub/ /grong dang dur khrod tshong dus dang / /tshal dang lha khang grong khyer gyi/ /shar
dang byang gi sa gzhi shis/ /lho dang nub phyogs de lta min/ /gtsug lag khang gi gnas khang dang / /tshal dang ri rtse rdo leb dang / khang bzang gi ni steng phyogs dang / /dur
khrod dang ni lha yi khyim/ /sa yi cha ni ji snyed pa/ /rgyud rnams kun la bsngags pa yin/ /sa yi mtshan nyid shes par bya/ /yang na yid ni gar dga' bar/ /de rnams su
ni dkyil 'khor bri/ /dman sogs dngos grub bye brag gis/ /pus mo chu so lte ba'i bar/ /brkos la phub ma rdo dang ni/ /g.yo mo sol ba zug
rngu dang / /tsher ma la sogs bsal la bcag /phyi nas mtho gang tshad du brko/ /de ni chu yis rab bkang la/ /shar du bltas te go ma brgyar 'gro/ /slar log las ni
brtag par bya/ /chu ni gang bar gnas na shis/ /bskams na sngags pas spang bar bya/ /sngon du 'bru la sogs pa gzhug /de ltar sa yi cha sbyangs la/ /laM gyi sa
bon las byung ba'i/ /gos dang rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste/ /'od zer ser po kun tu 'bar/ /sa yi lha mo lag pa na/ /gser
gyi bum pa thogs pa ni/ /lus phyed sa la gnas pa ru/ /bltas te lag pa g.yas pa ni/ /sa la reg nas bskul bar bya/ /oM e h+ye hi ma hA de bi pr-i thi bI lo ka mA

te| sarba rat+na saM pUr+Na di bya| a lang+kA ra b+hu Shi te hA ra nU pu ra nir+g+ho Sha badzra sa twa pra pU dzi ta gr-i hI twa/ i daM ar+g+haM asmin+sa n+ni hi to b+ha ba hrIH/ hi hi hi hi swAhA/ me tog dri la
sogs mchod nas/ /de nyid du ni thim par bsam/ khang bzang rdo leb gzhi dang ni/ /gtsug lag khang dang zhabs kyis bcags/ /ba lang lha sa dang rgya mtsho'i 'gram//
lag pa sa la bzhag nas su/ /rang gi snying po brgyad brgyar bzla/ /der ni brko sogs bya mi dgos/ /de ltar sbyangs pa'i sa gzhi la/ /dkyil 'khor dang ni rjes mthun pa'o//
rin chen la sogs bzhi 'gyur gyi/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni khang pa bya/ /oM AH laM hUM zhes brjod nas/ /sa 'og rdo rje'i dngos por bya/ /oM me di ni badzri b+ha ba hUM/ khung ni rim
pa 'di yis dgang / /de dbus khro bo chen po ni/ /bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba bsgom/ /de nas khwa yi gdong sogs ni/ /steng ni khro mo'i gzugs can la/ /lte ba man
chad rtse gcig pa/ /rdo rje yi ni gzugs su spro/ /bgegs kyi tshogs la 'og gzigs pa'i/ /bsgyings bcas sngags ni zlos bzhin du/ /de rnams snying gar gdab par
bya| |oM badzra DA ki nI sarba big+h+nAn a nu ts+tshe da ya kI la ya hUM phaT/ de nas sngar bstan sa dbus su/ /rdo rje 'dzin chen sbyor ba yis/ /bdag nyid nye bar gnas nas ni/ /
nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs par bsgom/ /don dam la ni lta ba ste/ /'di ni srung ba'i dam pa mchog /gang zhig srung ba'i cho ga kun/ /'di nyid du ni brtags pa yin/ /de
nas rdo rje mda' yi ni/ /dra ba rdo rje ra ba dang / /rdo rje'i rang bzhin sa ru bya/ /rgyal po chen por bsgyings byas la/ /dkyil 'khor sa la hUM zhes brjod/ /rdo rje'i 'gros kyis kun
tu bskor/ /bdud rtsi lngas ni kun tu byug /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas rnams su/ /tsan+dan sogs pas gru bzhir bya/ /phal pa yi ni
gnas rnams su/ /so sor zlum por byas nas ni/ /lha yi 'khor lo cho ga bzhin/ /me tog sogs pas mchod par bya/ /de nas rin chen gser dang dngul/ /zangs sam
'jim pa dag kyang rung / /ji ltar 'byor pa'i rjes mthun par/ /bum pa dag ni bya ba ste/ /rtsa ba nag po la sogs spangs/ /lto yangs bum pa bzang po'i dbyibs dang //
bya g+h+ri seng g+h+ri dbyug pa yi/ /ut+pa la dang gzhan mi thub/ /sa ha de ba'i sman chen bcas/ /gser dang dngul dang mu tig dang / /mu men byi ru rin chen lnga/ /til dang nas
dang gro dang ni/ /mon sran gre'u dang mud kar bcas/ /ga pur tsan+dan dmar po sogs/ /sman gyi chu yis dgang bar bya/ /de ltar dam tshig chen po yi/ /me tog chu dang
ldan par bya/ /dngos po rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir/ /yid 'ong mi 'ong brtag mi bya/ /dngos kun rtog pa las byung bas/ /yid 'ong mi 'ong dpyad mi bya/ /rdzas kyi nus pa
bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas nyid du 'bab bar 'gyur/ /dper na spa yi lca ba ni/ /dkar po nag po rna ba dang / /dpral bar byugs pas bud med kyi/ /zla mtshan 'dzag
bzhi bar 'gyur/ /glang chen gcin dang ga bak+Sha/ /dkar po'i sa bon mig bskus na/ /lto ni 'khru bar 'gyur pa bzhin/ /'dir yang yo byad khyad par can/ /sbyangs la nye bar
spyod pa yis/ /khyad par 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ /dper na sngags kyis sbyangs pa'i dug /zos pas nad rnams thams cad ni/ /'joms shing bcud len nyid du 'gyur//
de bzhin 'dir yang brtag par bya/ /thams cad rang rang mtshan ma dang / /so so'i sngags kyis mngon par bzla/ /mtshan mar rang rang mdog tu bya/ /mgrin par ras zung
gsar pas dkri/ /kha ni shing lo gsar pas dgab/ /ku sha'i chun po 'og tu gding / /kha dog btsos pa'i skud pas brgyan/ /lhag par gnas shing mchod byas nas/ /
bdug spos dag ni phul nas su/ /'khor lo'i dbus su gzhag par bya/ /de nas pus mo g.yas pa ni/ /sa la btsugs te spyis gtugs la/ /'di skad brjod de mkhyen
par gsol/ /dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i rang bzhin can/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang / /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /bdag ni de ring 'bri bar 'tshal/ /ji
bzhin re ba bskang ba dang / /sems can rnams la sman slad du/ /mgon pos gus ldan bdag la ni/ /bka' drin dag ni gnang bar gsol/ /de ltar lan gsum brjod bya
zhing / /bum pa sta gon gnas nas su/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon po rnams/ /de ring bdag la brtse bar dgongs/ /byang chub sems
dpa' dgra bcom dang / /gang zhag sngags kyi lha rnams dang / /'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang / /bstan pa la ni dga' ba yi/ /'byung po rdzu 'phrul chen po dang //
gang yang lha yi spyan can rnams/ /rdo rje can bdag 'di zhes byas/ /dkyil 'khor dge ba 'di zhes pa/ /yo byad ci 'byor pa yis ni/ /de ring 'bri bar 'tshal lags
na| |dkyil 'khor dang ni bcas pa yi/ /bdag dang slob ma'i tshogs bcas la/ /kun gyis byin rlobs nye bar bzhugs/ /cho ga bzhin du lan gsum brjod/ /de
nas gsar pa legs par bsgril/ /tshad ldan shin tu mdzes pa yi/ /skud pas shes rab can thig gdab/ /cho ga bzhin du me tog mchog /nyi shu rtsa lngar phye ba yi/ /
skud pa dag ni brkyang bar bya/ /shar dang nub dang byang dang lhor/ /thig skud brkyang ba'i rim pa 'dis/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni cha brgyad bya/ /phyed ni legs par bsngogs
nas su| |thig gdab cho gar brtsam par bya/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur ni/ /lte bar bzhag ste gzung bar bya/ /de yi 'og tu ci bder bya/ /sngags pa shar du kha bltas te//
phyogs kun mnyam par dmigs nas su/ /mnyam zhing tshad dang ldan pa ru/ /tshangs pa'i thig gnyis bri bar bya/ /me mtshams gnas te rlung dang ni/ /bden bral grwar gnas dbang
ldan du| |sngags pa shar dang lhor bltas la/ /skud pa dag ni gdab par bya/ /'di ni slob dpon slob ma dag /g.yas phyogs su ni bskor bar bya/ /slob ma med na rang nyid kyis//
phur bur btags te bri bar bya/ /nyis 'gyur byas te phur bur gdab/ /nang gi 'khor lo rdo rje ra/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor rim gnyis su/ /dbang ldan mtshams nas btsams
nas ni| |g.yas bskor du ni skud pa bskor/ /sgo ni dkyil 'khor brgyad cha ru/ /mu khyud med par 'dod pa las/ /sgo yi tshad kyis sgo khyud de/ /de yi phyed kyis 'gram pa bya/ /sgo
yi sum 'gyur twa ra Na/ /ba dan dril bur ldan pa yin/ /rgyal mtshan ba dan ri dwags bcas/ /kha khyer tshad dang ldan par bya/ /twa ra Na yi phyi rol du/ /tshon gyis yi nyis
'gyur du/ /phyi yi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bya/ /'khor lo de yi phyi rol tu/ /shing la sogs pa'i dur khrod bya/ /gzhan yang 'khor lo'i rjes mthun par/ /ji ltar mdzes par
rab tu brtag /thig skud chad na slob dpon 'chi/ /dman dang lhag pas nad 'byung ste/ /phyogs ni 'khrul na slob ma myos/ /de bas skyon med shes par bya/ /ye shes thig skud gshegs/
gsol nas/ /de nas las 'di brtsam par bya/ /'dod dang thar pa rab ster ba'i/ /tshon rtsi dag ni bskyed par bya/ /dkar dang ser dang dmar dang
ljang / /kun gyi nang rol nag po ru/ /tshon gyi cha ni rim bzhin dgye/ /de nas slob mas ci dgar dgye/ /tshon rtsi re re'i zheng du ni/ /sgo yi nyi shu cha yi tshad/ /gal te tshon rtsi mi
mnyam zhing / /yo dang dma' bar gyur na ni/ /ri mo dma' bas dngos mi 'grub/ /yon po gdung ba skyed byed pas/ /dpangs ni mthe'u chung gang tsam du/ /mtho zhing drang ba
bri bar bya/ /de la sbom na nad 'byung ste/ /dma' na nor ni zad par 'gyur/ /yon pos phan tshun sdang 'gyur te/ /chad na bla ma slob ma dag /gnyi ga 'chi bar shes
par bya| |g.yas bskor ma yin bris na ni/ /rdul tshon phur bus btab par 'gyur/ /shar ni shin tu dkar ba'i mdog /lho ni dmar po'i mdog tu bya/ /nub phyogs
ser por bya ba ste/ /byang ni ljang gu nyid du bya/ /cho ga dag ni de dag gis/ /sangs rgyas bzhi yi gdan bzhugs pa/ /rdo rje la sogs dpa' rnal 'byor/ /'dab ma'i
mkha' 'gro la sogs pas/ khwa gdong la sogs dbye bar bya/ /dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma ni/ /ge sar dang ni ldan pa la/ /mtshams rnams su ni thod pa'o/ /dkar
dang dmar dang de bzhin sngo/ /sku la sogs pa'i kha dog dbye/ /de ltar 'khor lo lha mo che/ /dpa' bo rnams ni mchod par bya/ /sngar bshad sa yi mtshan nyid la/ /dbus
su mtho bar bri bar bya/ /shar dang byang du gzhol ba ni/ /sngags pa rnams kyi dngos grub 'gyur/ /dbus su mtho bas rgyal srid dang / /rig pa 'dzin pa'i gnas dag
'thob| |byang du mtho bas 'chi 'gyur ram/ /nor rnams brlags par 'gyur ba ste/ /yang na nad kyis 'debs par 'gyur/ /ji skad bshad pa'i shar mtho bas/ /myur du rigs
rnams zad par 'gyur/ /dbus su dma' ba'i rang bzhin sa/ /sgrub pa po ni 'joms dang ldan/ /de nyid bsdus dang bde mchog dang / /gsang dang rdo rje 'jigs byed du/ /dkyil
'khor rnams kyi rgyal po 'di/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bshad dang ma bshad gang ci'ang rung / /thams cad he ru ka la gnas/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor
pa'i| |rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro
las| sa gzung ba dang / sta gon la gnas pa dang / thig bri ba'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mos
mchod cing phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rim par phye ba bcu bdun par/ /khyod kyis khams kyi bcud len gsungs/ /phyi rol rnam
pa du zhig dang / /nang ni rnam pa du ru dbye/ /dgra dang mdza' bshas bar ma dang / /de bzhin gzhan yang tshad dbye dang / /skam sa dang ni rlan can yul/ /khams kyi sde tshan
bsdus pa dag /ngo mtshar chen po 'di dag la/ /bdag ni the tshom skye bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /da ni sde tshan rnams dang ni/ /'brel ba rab
tu bshad kyi nyon/ /sbom po phra mo'i sbyor ba yis/ /chung ngu la sogs bye brag dag /rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan sogs/ /skyes pa dang ni bud med kyang / /re re zhing
yang gsum gsum 'dod/ /nag po ser skya sngo ba sangs dang / /rtsub dang 'jam dang yan lag mkhrang / /'dzer pa can zhes bya ba yin/ /sbom thung bong tshod ran dang
ring / /sngo bsangs mtshungs rtsub mgrin pa ring / /mig ni zangs ltar dmar ba ste/ /phreng can thun mong nu ma med/ /mdog nyams sA la'i dri dang ni/ /chang dang chang min
myos pa'i dri/ /chang gnyis dang ni chang gsum ste/ /rked pa yi ni bye brag yin/ /sbrang rtsi ltar 'dzag sbrang rtsi'i dri/ /so sor bya yi gzhan du min/ /yid la sems pa'i
'khrul 'khor gyis/ /bu mo'i bcud ni drangs te blugs/ /'di ni so sor sgrub pa yin/ /bu mo gcig dang gnyis dang ni/ /mang po'i bar du brtag par bya/ /yon tan gsal
bar gyur pa ste/ /sgrub po'i dbang po'i yon tan byed/ /nyi shu'i bar du gzhon nu yin/ /de rnams thabs kyis sbyang bar bya/ /stobs dang ldan pa gzung ba'i gnas/ /de dang
'khyud las byung ba ni/ /rdzas rnams yongs su sbyong byad yin/ /bya ba kun gyi mtshams ldan ni/ /byed po bzang po'i lam chen yin/ /dngul chu yi ni shing chen po/ /de
na chu skyes yon tan lnga/ /rang skyon 'joms pa yid ches yin/ /de dag ni/ thun mong gi cho ga'o/ /lto skyes ma rnying rdzas kyi las/ /skyed byed don ni rgas pa 'joms/
lhang tsher dngul chu bcings pa'i mchog /gser sgyur rtsi chen chog yis/ /rdzu 'phrul la sogs gsal bar 'gyur/ /lhang tsher dang ni dngul chu bzhi/ /rma bya'i mgrin
pa'i gzugs dang ni/ /sbrul gyi gzugs dang spal pa'i gzugs/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro/ /de yi tshad ni kun shes bya/ /de yang stobs ldan bcud bral na//
sngon bzhin nyes pa sna tshogs 'gyur/ /dngul chu lhar tsher kha dog ni/ /sna tshogs dang ldan skyon yin te/ /mkhris pa dag kyang skyed par byed/ /dmar pos khrag ni
skyed par byed/ /dkar pos gzer nad skyed 'gyur zhing / /srog ni 'joms par byed pa yin/ /ljang ser dag ni ma smin dang / /ser skya sa
bshang gci'i lam ni 'gag /nyis 'gyur cha ni shin tu 'ching / /nyes pa dag ni brgyad ldan pas/ /blo dang ldan pas dpyad de bza'/ /bcud len sngon por shes
byas nas/ /'bad pas de ltar bcud len spyad/ /bzhag pa me yi gnas dang ni/ /chu yi shing la brten pa dang / /'bru yi dbus su gzhug pa dang / /bye ma'i phung
por 'khrul 'khor 'jug /gso la kha cig 'bras bu dang / kha cig me tog 'dab mar bcas/ /shun pa dang ni rus pa sogs/ /sgrub po nye ba'i longs spyod ni/ /
de nyid rig pas sbyar bar bya/ /cho ga du ma mthong ba yis/ /bcos ma'am bcos ma ma yin pa'i/ /yo byad dag ni rnyed gyur na/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang mtshungs par 'gyur//
zhes bya ba ni/ gzhag pa dang gso ba'i cho ga'o/ /lci ba dang ni rdo nang dang / /ba lang ma he'i lha sa la sogs/ /cho ga bzhin du rnam brtags pa'i/ /bcud kyi rdzas ni
gzhag par bya/ /bcud len spon po shes nas ni/ /'bad de de ltar bcud len bya/ /bcud brtag pa'i gnas kyi cho ga'o/ /glang chen mgo yi bcud blugs te/ /
seng+ger btso bar byas pa yis/ /'bras chen star ba'i yon tan 'gyur/ /sha ri sha yi rtsa ba dang / /gser shog gis ni gso bar bya/ /mdog dmar dngul chu
rmongs pa yis/ /pags pa dang ni shun pa dang / /me tog 'bras bur ldan pa yis/ /rnon por bcas te btsos pa dag /mnyes na dri ma'i rdul 'thor 'gyur/ /blo gros
'khrul pa med pa yis/ /rim gyis rim gyis mnye bar bya/ /'di dag ni/ 'jug pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas gci pa'i lan tshwa dang / /phag gi zhag dang tshil dang khrag /bcas pas mnyes
na'ang nyes pa 'byang / /slar yang 'byung po'i skra dang ni/ /dza ni ta dang ral pa dmar/ /bin dza ra dang tsam pa dang / /smyo byed dag ni cha bsnyams te/ /de dang mnyam pa'i
sbrang rtsi ru/ /mnyes na rtsi yis nyes zad 'gyur/ /de nas ma he'i rmig par ni/ /char pa'i chu dang bcas pa la/ /zangs kyi phye ma 'khar phye dang / /mig sman phye ma blugs
shing btso/ /tshos nas sbrang rtsi'i nang du gzhug /de yis bcings par 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas khrag ni cha bdun gyis/ /sbyangs na snum zhing lci la sogs/ /de yi stobs
ni zad par 'gyur/ /slar yang cha mnyam khrag dang ni/ /mnyes pas snum zhing lci bar 'gyur/ /ra gan tsu ti'i shing dang ni/ /zangs ma dang ni yung ba dang / /go ra sa ni
dkar nag gnyis/ /drug pos nyes pa tshar gcod 'gyur/ /de nas tsan+d+ra'i shing dang ni/ /sbrang rtsi 'dzag dang sen mo dang / /thal sman
'bus zos shing phye dang / /ma hA ha ha mak+Sha dang / /pus ka ra dang bar ta ki /ku ba sin du ba ra'i phye/ /bcas par mi yi rkang du gzhug /cung zad bzhag ste phyung nas
su| |rdo gtun brdung ba sngar bshad bzhin/ /'od ma'i nang du blugs nas ni/ /de nas 'khrul 'khor nang du gzhug /btsos nas lhang tsher dngul phye dang / /bcas par
rtsi yi nang du blugs/ /lhang tsher dngul chu rnon po yis/ /cho ga yis ni so sor bcing / /de dag zla ba las byung ba/ /a tra pa tI rus pa dang / /de bzhin du ni me tog
gzung / /bya g+hi dang ni kun tu ru/ /sa ri pa dang sen mo dang / /nor bu zla 'od nA ge sar/ /skyu ru ra khu ka tam pa/ /tsam pa ki ri so pa dang / /shi sho bil ba ut+pa la/ /
rang skyur dang ni bcas pa ru/ /'dzag dang dngul chu khwa chos bya/ /phyung na sprul gyi gzugs ltar 'gyur/ /khrag dang smyo byed yung ba blugs/ /skra dkar nyes pa kun 'joms
byed| |mar dang mar nag bskol ba ni/ /gnyis po yang dang yang du bya/ /chur shing a pa marga dang / /snu ha pa la sha yi 'dab/ /so pan ce na'i bcud dang ni/ /thal sman
sde yis sbyang par bya/ /sbyang ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas rang skyur yung ba dag /rnon po dngul chu'i zas su sbyin/ /de nas 'og gi lam nas ni/ /'khrul 'khor gyis ni bkru sman bya/ /
rgas dang mdze nad sel bar byed/ /rnon po thal sman bcas pa yis/ /bkrus shing bskus na gzhang 'brum 'joms/ /rtsi dang bcud len rim gyis 'phel/ /rnon po dang ni
lhang tsher la/ /thun mong du ni brten nas su/ /zha nye blugs pas 'dul 'gyur te/ /de tshe ro ni kha dang bska/ /de nas rang skyur nang du ni/ /lci bas btsos na rtog pa'i byang / /nyi
ma'i 'od la bsros pas kyang / /skra dkar gyi ni nyes pa skyed/ /bcud ni shin tu bskol ba yi/ /'od kyi snying dang mig 'joms so/ /de la sbrang rtsi bo son cha/ /thig le dag ni
byin pas sbyang / /skyon sbyang cho ga sngon du ni/ /gser shog thal sman lan tshwas bsgrubs/ /ro ni bska ba dang bcas pa'i/ /lhang tsher dkar po'i skyo ma blugs/ /cha ni nges pa
dang bcas pas/ /yun ring du ni mnyes gyur na/ /nyes pa 'byang gi gzhan du min/ /gzhan yang cha dang cha can dang / /gi ri kar Na'i phye ma dag /drug cha dngul chu bya ba
yin| |cha ni tshad ldan nges par 'ching / /de tshe go ldog lam nas su/ /'khrul 'khor cho ga bzhin du blugs/ /zhi kha rdze'u ru btso bar bya/ /de nas du ru ka dang ni/ /
li tsi kra mar da yi/ /sa bon pa la ta ka dang / /ka shi shi gru'i 'bras bu dang / /ba ri tsi ta ka me tog /ut+pal ma li ka sa bon/ /rgya shug gi ni rus
pa dang / /shi ri sha dang ku sa bon/ /sbrang rtsi po son cha dang ni/ /pa la sha yi shun pa dag /cho ga shes pas dzi ga rdzer/ /tshos nas legs par blug par bya/ /de nas
cho ga bzhin bton nas/ /slar yang de dag btags pa yis/ /phye ma dang ni skyo ma blugs/ /btso ba dang ni sreg pa dang / /tshar bcad pa dang mnan pa'o/ /btso ba thong
pa'i 'khrul 'khor dang / /'od ma bya rog mchu yi dbyibs/ /yib dang khros dang 'thor ba dang / /chu yi nang du 'bros pa yin/ /shin tu tshos pa'i mtshan ma ni/ /'dar
ba dang ni rmongs pa dang / /du bar 'thul zhing khrol sgra 'byin/ /btsir dang mnye dang dkrug pa dang / /brdung ba dang ni rnam pa bzhi/ /sbrang rtsir btso dang bung bar btso//
glang chen btso dang seng+ger btso/ /rgod ma dang ni ka ra na dang / /bong bu dang ni rnga mo'i kha/ /bcing ba dang ni tshar bcad la/ /'khrul 'khor 'di dag shin tu bsngags/ /
'khrul 'khor gang zhig kha che ba/ /rdza rnga yi ni dbyibs 'dra dang / /'od ma lta bu la sogs pa/ /mtshon cha ral gri'i shubs 'dra dang / /kang+ka'i mgrin pa bya rog mchu//
gzhan yang bcing bar gang bshad pa/ /des ni tshar gcad rjes gzung bya/ /bzhi cha lus pa bskol chen te/ /phyed lus stobs ldan bskol pa yin/ /rtsi la brtan pa'i nyes pa
dag |thun mong min pa de yis 'byang / /sbyang ba dang ni rtogs pa dang / /rmongs dang de bzhin bsad pa'o/ /lhang tsher sman ni bcings pa ru/ /dngul gyi phye ma blug par bya/ /dpa'
bo gcig dang skye gnyis rtsa/ /'bras bu chen po bska ba gsum/ /lhang tsheng dang ni dngul chu bzhi/ /bdud rtsi yi ni snying po lnga/ /dus drug de bzhin drug cu ste/ /bdun po yal ga
'dab sogs bcas/ /tsha dang kha ba skam skyes mchog /mngar dang skyur ba rlan can bzang / /lan tshwa bska ba gnyis ka'ang rung / /nim pa ba ru ra dang ni/ /a ru ra yi 'bras
bu rnams/ /mar nag bskol na bya ba byed/ /skyu ru ra khus mkhris sel te/ /bud med 'o mar bskol ba ni/ /'tsho zhing nad med 'phel bar byed/ /tsam pa la dang ba ku la/ /nA
ga ge sar ku mu ta/ /ut+pal she pha li ka dang / /sbrang rtsi 'dzag dang pri yang ku/ /ku sum pa dang spra ka dang / /re'u nu ka dang bcu gcig ste/ /me tog gi ni sde ru brjod/ /shrI pa
la po son cha/ /ka pi ta dang la ku tsha/ /sa ba dang ni bar ta ki/ /a ru ra dang ba ru ra/ /ba la ta ka skyu ru ra/ /e la dzi dang pu na ka /e raN+Da dang ma ri tsi/ /pi pi ling dang
bcu drug ste/ /'di dag 'bras bu'i sde tshan yin/ /bca' ba dag ni shu dag dang / /yung ba dang ni ru rta dang / /bca' lnga dang ni
sgog skya dang / /rlan can gyi ni do ba dang / /nA ga pha la dkar po dang / /de bzhin rgan po gzhon nur byed/ /ba li ga sdug mtshan mo'i shing / /bcu gnyis rtsa
ba yi ni sde/ /dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'o/ /glang chen skra dang ri mdzes dang / /'dzag dang byis pa stug po dang / /ran pa dmar po d+ha ru ra/ /a shwa ka
na bdun po ni/ /sdong po yal ga rtsa bar bcas/ /ka tam pa dang gser shing ste/ /de bzhin du ni shi ri sha /ka ran dza dang shi gru dang / /nim pa dang ni pi la si/ /
de bzhin ka du ma dza ri/ /'di brgyad shun pa'i sde zhes brjod/ /tsan+dan gnyis dang a kar ni/ /nag po dang gsum sdong po gzung / /bu ram phye ma ka ra dang / /sbrang
rtsi ik+Shu puska ra/ /sha kha ra dang rnam pa drug /bcud kyi sde zhes bya ba yin/ khu byug dang ni bya rog dang / /rma bya dang ni ti bya rnams/ /'di dag gi ni sha gzung
ste| |nyams dang stobs ni 'phel bar byed/ /zangs kyi gtsug phud g+har ga ra/ /phug ron dang ni ne tso rnams/ /'di dag gi ni khu ba gzung / /sems
can kun la stobs rab ster/ /ri dang ri bong sha ba dang / /sa la ki dang phag dang ni/ /khyad par du ni byi ba rnams/ /nad rnams thams cad 'joms par byed//
khyad par du ni rlung la bsngags/ /re'u nu ka dang bar thi ba/ /a mra bi la ba'i me tog dang / /ma dza ri dang lha min dgra/ /su ra si dang ral pa can/ /pa par nA
ga pus pa dang / /ardza ka yi 'dab ma dang / /ka tu dang ni bi sha na/ /sgron shing rig pa 'dzin pa dang / /yal ga rnam pa sngar bshad pa/ /'di dag mdza' bo'i
sde zhes bya/ /par pa ri dang ga na dang / /dza la dang ni gya gyu dang / /u pi ta yi shun pa dang / /rang gi dri dang rkun po dang / khu tra lo ha shu ka ti/ /chur skyes
shing dang brag shun dang / /sbrang rtsi me tog bring gi ra/ /ha ta she ba li dang ni/ /de bzhin du ni pa ya si/ /bar ma yi ni sde tshan yin/ /di ra da dang po la dang / /
zho dang kun dur ki ta dza/ /thang shing dang ni sra rtsi dang / /po son cha yi khu ba dang / /shu dag dang ni gan+d+ha dang / /hu hi na dang ra las skyes/ /mr-i ga dang ni ba gu
dza| |sgog skya dang ni mi si dang / /shing kun dang ni yung ba rnams/ /dgra bo'i sde zhes bya bar bshad/ /dgra bo yi ni rdzas la khyab/ /gu gul dang ni br-i Sha dang / /
dang | |ki tang de bzhin 'o ma ste/ /po ra dang ni rang skyu dang / /ga pur dang ni sa la ki /dgu po de dag sla ba'i rdzas/ /mu ra ral pa
dmar po dang / /dza la dang ni gya gyu dang / /stug po nad dang ku thi ra/ /ni sha dang ni shi khru dang / /shi ra bca' ba shu dag rnams/ /bcu gnyis rtsa ba las
skyes yin/ /bu thi dang ni ke so dang / /gla ba dang ni sen mo ste/ /gan+d+ha su ri zhes bya ba/ /lnga po srog chags las byung ba'i/ /dri ru sgrub pos shes par bya/ /
shi ri sha dang gser shing dang / /lo de dang ni ni ka pi/ /na gi ka dang bi tsu shun/ /skyur rtsi chen po zhes bya ba/ /bdun po 'di dag shun pa'i sde/ /tsan+dan
gsum dang a dkar nag /sgron shing dang ni shi sha pa/ /drug po 'di dag sdong bu yi/ /sde zhes bya bar kun tu bshad/ /sgyu ma kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /
rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes grags pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha'
'gro las/ bcud kyis len gyi rdzas kyi dbang du byas pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha
mos mchod cing phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'i/ /sbyin sreg khyod kyis sngar gsungs na/ /thab khung rnams kyi tshad
dang ni/ /'dug stangs yam shing sogs ma 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol pa'i/ /nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che/ /dang po sa
gzhi bzung nas su/ /phyi nas hom khung brtsam par bya/ /zhi ba sa gzhi dkar po'i char/ /khru gang tshad la shin tu zlum/ /khru phyed thur du brko bar bya/ /shin tu mnyam
par bzhag pa yis/ /sor brgyad pa yi rdo rje ni/ /pad+ma'i steng du bri bas mtshan/ /khung nas sor bzhi bor nas ni/ /sor bzhi'i dpangs dang zheng ldan pa'i/ /kha khyer
gyis ni bskor bar bya/ /mtshams su rdo rje'i dbyibs lta bu'i/ /rtse gsum rdo rjes bskor bar bya/ /sa dkar dang ni lci ba yis/ /hom khung kun tu byug par bya/ /brtul
zhugs can gyis gnyi gar yang / /dri ni dkar pos byugs nas su/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa yis/ /me tog dkar pos gtor bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor
khang pa la sogs pa'i/ /shar gyi phyogs su las de brtsam/ /rgyas pas gzhi ser po la/ /rin po che yi dbyibs 'dra'i thab/ /yang na gru bzhi pa yang rung / /
khru do zabs su khru gang brko/ /de nang sor brgyad bor nas su/ /kha khyer sor brgyad tshad du bya/ /sor brgyad dpangs dang ldan pa la/ /
rin chen phreng bas bskor bar bya/ /hom khung nang du 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs brgyad ser po bris pa la/ /'og tu cha drug sor drug pa'i/ /rdo rje rin chen bri bar bya/ /
sa ser dang ni dri ser gyis/ /ho ma khung kun tu byugs nas su/ /me tog ser po la sogs pa'i/ /mchod pa dag ni ji bzhin bya/ /'di ni rtag tu grong khyer sogs/ /
byang gi phyogs char bya ba yin/ /dbang la sa gzhi dmar po la/ /pad+ma yis ni mtshan pa yi/ /thab khung skye gnas dbyibs su bya/ /yang na zla phyed dbyibs lta
bu| |khung bu dang ni kha khyer sogs/ /zhi ba yi ni tshad du bya/ /sa dmar dri dmar sogs byugs te/ /me tog dmar po la sogs gtor/ /'di ni grong khyer la
sogs pa'i/ /nub kyi phyogs char rtag tu bya/ /mngon spyod pha mes nags drang ni/ /ma mo'i khyim du rtsub pa dang / /gas pa'i sa la bri bar bya/ /gru gsum sor
mo nyi shu tshad/ /sor bcu thur du rko bar bya/ /rtse gsum khro bo'i rdo rje ni/ /char sprin gyi ni 'od dang mtshungs/ /sor brgyad pa yi tshad tsam du/ /de yi dbus su
mtshan par bya/ /khung bu sor gsum bor bar ni/ /kha khyer sor gsum bskor bar bya/ /sa nag dur khrod thal ba sogs/ /ji snyed pa yis byugs byas te/ /dkyil 'khor
khang sogs lho phyogs bya/ /lhag ma yi ni las rnams kyang / /las bzhi'i khung bur 'dus mod kyi/ /slar yang de rnams khyad par gyi/ /khung bur 'dir ni bshad kyi nyon/ /
dgug pa'i hom khung rdo rje ni/ /rtse gcig lta bu'i dbyibs su bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyus bskor ba la/ /lhag ma dag ni dbang dang mtshungs/ /bcing pa la ni gru bzhi ste/ /rmongs la
rgyas pa lta bu yin/ /dbang ldan gyi ni phyogs cha ru/ /sa ni dkar dang ser por bya/ /bskrad la mngon spyod lta bu ste/ /khyad par du ni rlung mtshams su/ /rnga mo'i lci bas
byugs te bya/ /mdza' bo dag ni nyams nas su/ /phan tshun sdang bar bya ba la/ /de yang mngon par spyod pa yi/ /cho ga ji bzhin blta bar bya/ /las rnams thams cad
bsdus pa yi/ /chog de nas bshad bya ste/ /las kun de nyid rig pa yis/ /bsam pa la sogs bye brag dbye/ /las kyi rjes mthun sa gzhi la/ /las kyi rjes mthun
thab khung bya/ /sngags pa'i yid ni gar dga' ba'i/ /sa phyogs su ni sbyar yang rung / /khru gang pa yi tshad du ni/ /pad+ma ut+pal dbyibs 'dra ba/ /kha khyer pad+ma lta bu
ste| |khung dang kha khyer cung zad gdeng / /nang du bor sogs zhi ba 'dra/ /phyogs bzhir rdo rjes mtshan par bya/ /rgyar ni sor brgyad tshad tsam la/ /
dpangs ni sor gcig tshad tsam pa'i/ /'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang / /ral gri mtshon chas bskor ba yi/ /dbus su rdo rje'i mtshan ma bya/ /ngos su rdo rje'i ra ba yis/ /hom khung kun
nas zlum po la/ /'og ni 'khor bar bri bar bya/ /hom khung gi ni cho ga'o/ /yam shing pa la sha dang ni/ /u dum ba ra a mra dang / /n+ya gro d+ha dang pa la sha/ /ka tam pa sogs 'o ma
can| |rtse mo'i cha las byas pa ste/ /sor ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya/ /rlon zhing 'dab mar bcas pa ste/ /rnying dang rtse mo nyams pa dang / /shun pa med cing gas pa dang / /thung dang
shin tu ring ba dang / /phra dang sbom dang 'khyog pa dang / /gas dang chag dang 'bus zos dang / /rtse mo cha ni gnyis yod cing / /srog chags ldan zhing bskams pa dag /dge
ba'i las rnams thams cad la/ /spangs te sdig pa'i las la shis/ /nas dang til dang 'o ma zho/ /sA lu'i 'bras can pri yang ku/ /ku sha sngon po tsu ta'i 'dab/ /me tog
tsan+dan dkar po dang / /sbrang rtsi mar dang yos bog dang / /dur ba dri zhim khu ba rnams/ /rnal 'byor pa yi zhi ba la/ /ji ltar rnyed pa bsreg par bya/ /mchod sbyin gyi ni
shing rnams la/ /bud shing thab pas dma' bar bya/ /nags kyi lci skam dag kyang rung / /srog chags ldan pa spang bar bya/ /zhi ba'i yam shing dang / bud shing dang / 'bru la sogs pa
sreg rdzas kyi cho ga'o/ /yam shing zhi ba'i lta bu ste/ /dbus kyi cha ni mdzes pa las/ /srid du bcag khru gang du bya/ /dri ser chu yis gtor nas ni/ /zho dang 'o ma mar la sbags/ /mngar
gsum la ni btags par bya/ /de nas zas mchog zho zan dang / /mar dang til ni nag po dang / /sha dang pus pa mar dang bcas/ /sbrang rtsi dang ni sA lu ri 'bras/ /'bru rnams
gzhan dang pad+ma dang / /nA ga ge sar bil pa'i 'bras/ /de bzhin dur bar bcas pa dag /rgyas pa'i las la bsreg par bya/ /bud shing sngar bzhin khyad par du/ /'bras
bu dang ni bcas pas bya/ /tsam pa dang ni a sho ka /pu na nA ga nA ge sar/ /shin tu dmar zhing skyur ba dang / /me tog dang ni 'bras bur bcas/ /yal ga yi ni cha las bya/ /
sor lnga pa yi tshad du ni/ /dbang gi las kyi yam shing bya/ /bud shing yang ni skyur ba dang / /me tog bcas pa'i shing la bya/ /me tog dri ngan rnams dang ni/ /de bzhin 'bru
ni nag po dang / /phub ma dag ni gtor bar bya/ /de bzhin ma rus phye ma dang / /dug la sogs pa dbul bar bya/ /tsha zhing kha dang tsher mar bcas/ /dur khrod du ni skyes
pa'i shing / /rtsa ba'i cha las byas pa ste/ /sor mo bcu gnyis yam shing tshad/ /rtse mo rno la rtsub pa ste/ /rtse gnyis dug la sogs pas sngags//
'ug pa'i sgro la sogs pa'ang rung / /drag po'i las kyi bud shing bya/ /de nas mchod yon snod bshams pa/ /gser dang dngul las byas pa'am/ /dung dang nya
phyis dag kyang rung / /zangs dang khar ba'i rdzas rnams dang / /sa dang shing lo dag kyang rung / /ji ltar 'byor par bshams par bya/ /me tog 'o mar bcas pa yi/ /
arga'i snod ni mdun du bzhag /dri zhim bdug pas bdugs nas su/ /rang gi sngags kyis lan bdun bzla/ /g.yon du chu snod gzhag bya ste/ /zhi ba'i las kyi mchod
yon yin/ /zho dang til du bcas pa dang / /dri ser la sogs ldan pa'i chu/ /rang gi sngags kyis mngon bzlas pa/ /rgyas pa yi ni arga yin/ /dbang la zangs kyi
snod sogs par/ /dri dmar la sogs bcas pa'i chu/ /me tog dmar pos 'bar ba ste/ /yongs su bkang bas chags par bya/ /chu ni nag cing dri mi zhim/ /khrag
dang ldan pas bya ba'am/ /rang skyur bar ni ba lang gcin/ /yang na mi yi gci ba'am/ /yang na bong bu'i gcin yang rung / /phaT dang spel ba'i sngags bzlas pa/ /g.yas
kyi phyogs su bzhag nas ni/ /drag po'i las la sbyar bar bya/ /arga'i cho ga'o/ /nad sogs zhi phyir zhi ba ni/ /snying rjer ldan pas dgong mo bya/ /dpa' bo shar du bltas
nas su| |me tog phreng sogs rgyan dang ni/ /bgo ba dag ni dkar por bya/ /'jam pa'i las la gnas nas ni/ /pad+ma'i skyil krung bcas nas su/ /dpal ldan rnam snang mdzad
bsgoms te/ /brtse dang ldan pas mi smra bar/ /bsgrub bya yi ge oM byung ba'i/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor dkar po la/ /seng+ge pad+ma zla ba yis/ /stan la gnas pa dmigs nas su/ /
'og nas 'byung ba'i rim pa yis/ /sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir/ /swAhA'i mtha' can sngags bzlas la/ /rtag tu zhi ba'i las rnams bya/ /dbul dang ri sogs
rgyas pa'i las/ /dga' dang ldan pas snga dro bya/ /gos ser la sogs brgyan dang ni/ /byang phyogs su ni kha bltas te/ /bzang po yi ni 'dug stangs sam/ /yang na rol pa'i
stabs kyis gnas/ /'bras chan dkar po zho dang ni/ /bca' bza' de nyid rig pa yis/ /bza' dang btung bas tshim nas su/ /rin chen 'byung bar bsgoms nas ni/ /yi
ge laM las byung ba yi/ /dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor la/ /glang chen steng du gnas pa yi/ /bsgrub par bya ba dmigs nas su/ /sngags kyi mthar ni oM brjod cing //
rgyas par bya ba'i cho ga sbyar/ /dbang gi don du 'di gsungs te/ /mtshan mo chags pa'i sems kyis ni/ /nub kyi phyogs su kha
bltas la/ /dmar po'i rgyan gyis klubs nas ni/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung gnas nas su/ /rdo rje chags pa mchog tu bsgom/ /yaM las byung ba'i rlung dkyil
la| |btsun mo'i pad+ma 'jam ldan par/ /bsgrub par bya ba dmigs nas su/ /sngags kyi mthar ni ho bzlas te/ /'od zer dmar pos bskul nas su/ /zur
mig lta bas sbyin bsregs na/ /bud med rnams ni rmongs par 'gyur/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa dang / /dam tshig 'das shing khro ba la/ /sdang
ba'i sems kyis lhor bltas te/ /mtshan phyed dam ni nyin phyed la/ /gos sogs sngon pos brgyan nas su/ /mkhrang zhing rtsub pa'i stan la ni/ /khro bo'i skyil
krung gnas nas su/ /rdo rje khro bor bsgom par bya/ /raM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /bsgrub par bya ba dmigs nas su/ /hUM dang phaT ces bya ba ni/ /
'brug gi sgra ltar grags pa ste/ /thog ma dbus mtha' sbyar bar bya/ /bsgrub bya'i las kyi cho ga'o/ /de nas sgrub po dpal ldan pas/ /rgyan rnams kun
gyis brgyan nas su/ /gsang ba gnyis kyi ting 'dzin gnas/ /sbyin sreg las ni brtsam par bya/ /chu yi snod ni g.yon du gzhag /g.yas su bsreg rdzas gzhag par
bya| |las kun byed pas bzlas pa yis/ /rdzas rnams kun la bsang gtor te/ /de nas bkra shis bcas pa yis/ /g.yas nas bskor la ku sha dgram/ /rtse
mo'i cha las byas pa ni/ /dri ma med cing ma nyams pa/ /'dab mar bcas shing kha dog sngo/ /shin tu ring min thung ba min/ /mdud par byas pa g.yas bskor
dgram| |de nas las kyi rjes mthun bar/ /thab khung phyogs kyi bye brag gis/ /gzhan yang shar phyogs bstan te dgram/ /de yis sgor ni bkram nas su/ /de
