'das rdo rje 'dzin pa rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ma dang cha blangs ma nyid dang / /gnyen po de bzhin bzho byas la//
gnyis gnyis sbyor bas 'dod spyad nas/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu ster/ /ba lang sha dang rta sha sogs/ /thogs pa med par bza' bar bya/ /'jig rten la rtag
g.yon la spyad/ /'bad de g.yon pas bsnyen bkur bya/ /brtan dang g.yo la sogs pa yi/ /'gro kun g.yon las byung bas na/ /pho nya mo la chags bral bas//
grol ba nyid du 'gro ba min/ /rtag tu pho nya mor chags grol/ /'di la the tshom yod ma yin/ /sgrub pos de la 'bad byas na/ /brtul zhugs med na'ang brtul
zhugs rdzogs/ /dam tshig gzhung lugs la spyod cing / /zas gcig tu ni mdzes par bza'/ /rigs gcig gi ni mtshan nyid phyir/ /rigs lnga la ni mnyam
par spyod/ /sbrang rtsi mtshal dang ga bur bcas/ /tsan+dan dmar po dang sbyar te/ /rdo rje las byung mnyam ldan pa/ /'di dag bdud rtsi lnga yin te/ /dngos grub kun
ni rab stsol mdzad/ /sbom po mtha' ltag kha sbyar bas/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor bzhin blangs te/ /zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs na/ /dngos grub rtag par 'thob par
'gyur| |mchog gi dam tshig 'di rnams ni/ /zhal bzang mo khyod la bshad yin/ /thabs dang bcas pa'i las rnams kun/ /thogs
chags med par rtag tu spyod/ /rnam par rtog med bsgoms pa yis/ /brtul zhugs rnams kyi mchog gi mchog /rnam par rtog med bsgoms pa yis//
las rnams thams cad rtag tu bya/ /thogs pa med pas spyod pa ni/ /de bzhin bka' thub rnams kyi mchog /thogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /skra shad 'jings
pa 'dra bar ni/ /yid la yul rnams rten byed pa/ /de ni 'da' dka'i dka' thub yin/ /gang zhig las rnams thams cad la/ /shes rab kyis ni nges par spyad//
stong pa'i man ngag can de ni/ /bdag nyid chen po'i dka' thub 'di'o/ /shes rab gzugs brnyan lta bu la/ /rnam rtog med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /don la
thogs pa med spyod ma/ /de yi bka' thub bdag nyid yin/ /shes rab thabs las gzhan pa min/ /gang gis sems ni gnas mi bya/ /de 'drar yang dag
gnas byas na/ /byang chub chen po nye bar ster/ /rnam par mi rtog rjer gnas pa'i/ /rnal 'byor ba la mngon ldan na/ /de rnams kyi ni 'byung ba kun/ /shes
rab pha rol phyin par nges/ /shes rab me long gzugs brnyan bzhin/ /'dus byas dngos po de 'dra bar/ /shes rab blo yis dran par bya/ /de yi rnam rtog
med sems ni/ /me long nang gi gzugs brnyan dang / /rmi lam sgyu ma chu bur bzhin/ /mig 'phrul lta bur blta ba ni/ /de ni gtso bo yin par bshad/ /glog dang
dri za'i grong khyer bzhin/ /'dus byas 'di dag rnam par smin/ /'di ltar dngos rnams rab gsal bar/ /gang de'i rnam grangs rtse mo mchog /des na sems ni gang
zhig tu| |gnas pa yod par gzhag pa min/ /'di dag lta bur kun du byung ba'i dngos po rnams kyang sgyu ma khyad par can rnams yang dag par rdzogs par longs
spyod pa bskyed de/ /bde bas yongs su bzhu bas khyad par can 'ga' zhig tu rdzogs par longs spyod pa skye'o/ /bzang po yongs su gyur pas ni/ /'bras bu khyad
par can 'ga' 'thob bo/ /des ni/ /brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po rnams grib ma lta bu las gzhan 'ga' ci yang ma mthong ngo / /gang yang khyad par 'di
dag bsgom pa goms pa'i stobs las bde ba mchog tu zhi ba la sogs pa'i khyad par can gyi dgos pa bskyed na bla na med pa'i 'bras bu mngon du thob par byed
pa'i rgyu'i dngos por 'gyur ba de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das skyon 'ga' yang ma mchis so/ /de'i phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /rab
tu mchod par kun tu gnas/ /dka' thub sdug bsngal drag pos yis/ /rmongs pa bskams shing sdug bsngal te/ /sdug bsngal gyis ni sems g.yengs pa/ /g.yengs
pa yis ni dngos grub med/ /bde ba kun tu brtan 'gyur ba/ /sems kyi rang bzhin brtan 'gyur gyi/ /sdug bsngal gyis ni sems g.yo zhing / /'gog par yang ni
lhag par 'gro/ /lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni/ /bde bar gnas na byang chub 'thob/ /gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang / /dmyal bar nges par ltung bar 'gyur//
bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba rdo rje
mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud chen po las/ /mchog gi de kho na nyid snang bar byed pa dang / /yul la shes pa 'jug pa'i le'u ste dang
pa'o|| //de nas bcom ldan 'das la yang lha mos mchod pa byas nas phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /snying po gang gis gdug pa can rab
tu 'dul ba ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa la smod pa'i gdug pa can thams cad 'dul ba dang / lha gdug pa can la sogs pa'i sems can
thams cad gdul zhing zhi ba'i gnas la btul te/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du gdug par byed par mi 'gyur bar gnas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung du gsol/
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag pos 'di glur blangs te bka' stsal to/ /dang por rnam pa snang mdzad
gzhag /de rjes ces tha ma ste/ /rgyu ba der lhung ba yis mthong / /snying po'i spyi bor gsum pas brgyan/ /la yi mtha' na gnas pa la/ /steng du yi ge sa dang ldan/ /gnyis
pa yis ni gnyes bya ste/ /snying po de la a yig ldan/ /sa mtha' kun dngos de nyid do/ /rjod byed dang ni rjod byed de/ /rjod byed lnga pas gdan du byas/ /zla phyed thig les
brgyan pa can/ /dbus gnas pa las zha bor ldan/ /sreg pa'i mtha' yis yongs su brgyan/ /sa yi de ma thag gnas pa/ /rlung gzugs su gnas 'og tu sbyar/ /de
'og huM huM thung du gnyis/ /yi ge phaT dang bcas rdzogs pa/ /aM dngos yi ger rdzogs par ldan/ /lnga pa'i dbus na gnas de la/ /gzhan pa'i i yis steng du brgyan//
de nas rjod byed ra la zhon/ /spyi gtsug tu gnas dbang phyug dang / /rjod byed pa yi 'khor 'gyur ba/ /yang dang yang du gzhag par bya/ /
rjod byed ra la skyon pa dang / /e yig rna ba dag la brgyan/ /de nas rjod byed ra nyid ni /yang ni lnga pa dag la bskyon/ /'di yang thams cad pa nyid de/ /rjod
byed mgo bor zla phyed brgyan/ /lnga pa dang ldan nyis 'gyur bya/ /kun gyi mgon po de nyid mchog /phaT dang rin chen dag gis brgyan/ /ha ni mjug thogs nyid
du'o| |rnam par snang mdzad kyi tshogs kun la yongs su mnyes par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas dpa' bo drug dang
mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /yang 'dir hUM yig las byung bar/ /sna tshogs pad+ma nyid dkyil 'khor//
las kyi rdo rje dbus gnas par/ /de nyid hUM ni rnam bsgoms te/ /'od phreng du ma ldan pa yi/ /mkha' 'gro yi ni 'khor lo spro/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan
gsum ma/ /kha dog dmar mo 'jigs chen mo/ /'jigs pa'i dngos po'i nga ro can/ /spyan gsum dbu skra kham ser gyen/ /na so gzhon byed phun tshogs ma//
stag gi pags pa'i smad dkris can/ /'jigs byed chen po ljags 'dril ma/ /'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs mdzad ma/ /mkha' 'gro ma kun dang mnyam sbyor/ /rdo rje
mkha' 'gror rab grub pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sngon gyi rim pa ji bzhin dang //
me dang mnyam pa gnyis brjod dang / /ka ra ka ra bdun pa sbyar/ /ban+d+ha de bzhin dgra snying ste/ /'di yang lan gnyis rjod par byed/ /sa sde la ni ma dang bcas/ /'jig rten
gzugs bral gyi mthar gnas/ /rang bzhin 'di yang gnyis su brjod/ /gzhan dang gzhan dang ldan par bya/ /b+ha dza dag dang nyer gnas pa/ /de ni lan gnyis dag tu
brjod| |rjod byed la ni gsum pa dang / /khong na gnas pas ldan par bya/ /de nas zla ba gzhon nu phyed/ /yengs su gang bas brgyan par bya/ /de dag yang dang yang du
brjod/ /nyin mor phyed pa'i rang bzhin dang / /yongs su ldan pa nyid du bya/ /rjod byed dang ni gshegs gsol gnas/ /lnga par ldan pa nyid 'gyur ro/ /phe yig drag cing
myur ba la/ /zla ba gzhon nu dang ldan pa/ /yang gcig kyang ni brjod par bya/ /drag myur brjod pa phaDa gnyis so/ /rnam rtog kun gyi bud shing ni/ /bsreg pas da ha da ha
ste| |de skad ces pa 'bod pa'i sngags/ /lnga pa'i nye tsher gnyis par sbyar/ /a nyi dang yang yang dag ldan/ /rjod byed gtso dang yang

ldan pa| |yang dang yang du brjod par bya/ /b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha zhes rjes su/ /ba sa ru d+hi ra dang ni/ /an+t+ra mA lA ba la smi ne/ /gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na dag dang ni/ /sap+ta bA tA la ka ta sbyar/ /b+hu
dzang+ga dang sar+b+bam+bA/ /tardza ya ni gnyis brjod do/ /ka yig sde las ga nyid la/ /gnyis pa dang ni bzhi pa sbyar/ /rlung gi ngo bor gnas pa'o/ /i mtha' sa mtha' zhes
brjod la/ /nyi ma bdun gyis gnas par brgyan/ /rjod byed la ni bzhi pas brgyan/ /yang dang yang du brjod par bya/ /ka sha o dang pa sde dang / /de 'og dang po dang
ldan gzhag /ra dang har sprel gnyis dag la/ /thig le gnyis gnyis rab tu sbyar/ /a dang sde tshan sa bon brjod/ /sde tshan gyi ni bzhi pa dang / /dang po ru ni ldan
par bya| |gsum pas kyang ni dang po sbyar/ /gsum pa la yang des mnyes bya/ /rjod byed kyang ni rjod byed ni/ /i yi stan du ldan par bya/ /sa sde la e ra yis
brgyan| |zla dum dang ni thig ler ldan/ /de ni yang yang brjod par bya/ /de nyid e phyogs bzhi par ldan/ /de nas yang dang yang du bzlas/ /rjod byed dang ni bzhi
ba sbyar| |mtha' ru la gcig i dang sbyar/ /de yang yang dang yang du bzlas/ /rjod byed yi ge ha yang sbyar/ /de steng zla dum thig les bskyon/ /lnga pa yang ni mnyes par
bya| |de yang yang dang yang du bzlas/ /rnam mang mtha' yas rab bsgrub cing / /dge ba'i me tog mang spud pa/ /'di ni lha mo sgyu chen mo/ /dngos grub kun rab stsol ba'o//
'dir ni gsungs ma thag tu yang / /'jig rten khams ni thams cad g.yos/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun kyang skrag /slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /mngon
par byang chub rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /ri bo kun yang g.yo shing 'gas/ /gdug pa kun 'dul dul zhing zhi/ /dkyil 'khor du ni bkug nas bcug /dam tshig gis
bcings dbang du 'dus/ /ma mo'i tshogs dang 'byung po'i tshogs/ /gza' dang rims nad thams cad dang / /gnod sbyin srin po log 'dren dang / /sdig pa can dang
dmyal ba kun/ /bkas shing bsgyel te rnam par bshig /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mkha' 'gro ma thams cad
mnyam par sbyor ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /sgo skyong rnams dang yang dag ldan/ /de yi
dbus su rdo rje bri/ kha dog dmar po 'od chen po/ /phyi rol ri mo zlum pos bskor/ /de yi dbus su bcom ldan 'das/ khro bo chen po
zhal bzhis mdzes/ /cung zad mche gtsigs 'jigs bag can/ /cung zad 'dzum zhing bzhad pa'i zhal/ /g.yas pa dkar po zhi ba ste/ /gzhon pa dmar po 'jigs
pa che| |nub kyi zhal ni mdangs ser po/ /lha mo bzhi dang mnyam ldan zhing / /phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par mdzes/ /'jigs pa'i bdud bzhi mnan pa po/ /sangs rgyas
gzugs kyis nye bar mdzes/ /dpa' bo g.yas na kha T+wAM ga/ /thod pa yang ni g.yon na'o/ /g.yas na rdo rje 'bar ba bri/ /thod pa yi ni khyad par ro/ /dpa' bo gzhu dang
mda' 'dzin cing / /shes rab dga' mas rab tu mdzes/ /'bar ba dmar po'i dkyil 'khor gsal/ /sems dpa' 'bar ba 'khyil bar ldan/ /'jigs pa chen
po'i dus dang ni/ /dur khrod kyi ni me bzhin 'bar/ /dbu skra 'bar ba chen po gsal/ /dbu rgyan thod pas rnam par phye/ /rol pa thams cad 'tshogs pa na/ /he ru ka
ni gar la spyod/ /ma mo'i 'khor lo'i gnas mchog tu/ /sa rnams kyi ni dbang phyug nyid/ /kun nas kun tu thams cad pa/ /rang nyid rtag tu thams cad kun/ /mkha'
'gro kun kyang mnyam sbyor ba'o/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /bzlas dang bsgom pa'i rab sbyor gyis/ /'grub pa 'di la the tshom med/ /thun mtshams nas ni rab
sbyor bas/ /mchog gi sdom pa bsgom par bya/ /'bum rdzogs nas ni rdo rje che/ khro bo'i rgyal po dang mnyam 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yi/ /tshe dang mdog dang
na so dang / /gzugs dang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang / /rdzu 'phrul grub pa chen por ldan/ /sems can don byed nus par 'gyur/ /yang na gsang sngags ting 'dzin
gyis| |cung zad tsam zhig bzlas pa bya/ /las ni brgya tsam byed par 'gyur/ /'di lta ste/ brtan pa dang g.yo ba thams cad nges par mnon pa dang / ltung bar byed pa dang /
'jig par byed pa dang / rgyas 'debs pa dang / lkugs par byed pa dang / rengs par byed pa dang / dbugs 'byin par byed pa dang / rmongs par byed pa dang / 'ching ba dang /
'gyes pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / rnam par sgyur bar byed pa dang / smyo bar byed pa dang / rnam par 'gyur zhing skrod par byed pa dang / sdang ba dang / nor rdzas 'joms
shing 'jigs par byed pa dang / dud mo byed du 'jug pa dang / sdigs par byed pa dang / bdag nyid bcings nas 'tshor ba dang / brdung ba dang / long bar byed pa
dang / sa bon 'joms par byed pa dang / rims dang / khong nad dang / dug gis 'dzin pa dang / rang gis brkos nas 'jug pa dang
dmyal bar ltung bar byed pa dang / dud 'gro'i gnas yongs su sgyur bar byed pa dang / skyes pa bud med du byed pa dang / bu chung lto nas lhung bar byed pa dang / b+ha
ga 'ching ba dang / ma ning du byed pa dang / 'dod pa la chags la snyoms par byed pa dang / rgod cing 'ching ba dang / gzhan gyis rang gsod du 'jug pa dang /
mtshon rdug par byed pa dang / dgos rgu byed pa dang / yud kyis skrod pa dang / gcer bur byed pa dang / b+ha ga dang bshang lam sgrog par byed pa dang / b+ha ga dang
bshang lam rang lug tu byed pa dang / khu ba khrag tu byed pa dang / nad rnams myur du sel bar byed pa dang / khrag las gyur pa'i mdze nad la sogs pa sud
par byed pa dang / mya ngan dang sdug bsngal gyis bcings shing gzir bar byed pa dang / dum bu dum bur byed pa dang / lus can thams cad phye mar byed cing
gsad pa dang / thams cad rjes su chags pas dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / g.yo ba dang / 'dar ba dang / dgod pa dang / sems can thams cad la
rgyun du ca blar smra ba dang / sngon gyi gnas so sor thob pa ltar ston pa dang / dbang du byed pa'i las thams cad la rab tu sbyor ba dang / bran du byed pa dang / lha dang /
klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / log 'dren dang / 'byung po dang / ma mo dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad 'dul bar byed pa dang / nor sbyin pa dang / sa dang /
chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' thams cad la bka' bsgo bar byed pa dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dag las rnam par rgyal
bar 'gyur ba dang / chags pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa dang / rims dang / yams dang / dug dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad las grol bar byed pa dang /
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chags pa dang bral ba 'bigs par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'khor ba la skyo ba 'jig par byed pa ste/
de lta bur 'di dag ni/ lha mo thams cad grub par byed par brjod pa ste/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dag nyid ni/ ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das
rdo rje 'dzin pa ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas mkha' 'gro ma'i sgyu ma thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i rab tu 'grub pa de skad ces bka' stsal
to| |'di dag ni/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud chen po las/ /las kyi tshogs thams cad kyi cho ga dang / sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rnam par
'phrul pa'i sngags kyi cho ga'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas gsang ba brjod par bya/ /mdor bsdus phyir na rgyas par min/ /thams
cad sgyu mar mnyam sbyor na/ /las rnams thams cad mnyam par byed/ /dngos grub chen po sgyu ma kun/ /dbang phyug thams cad rab grub pa'o/ /rig pa rnam
par 'phro byed pa/ /'byung po'i gdon rnams 'gugs par byed/ /hi ma ban+ta s+ye ut+ta re Na b+ha pa ts+tshi bo na ma/ ma hA ma so/ so ba i a d+ha ma si haM bi hi ma se hi ma se hi
ba ti bu dz+dza i/ i so/ ni do/ ma hi/ nI to/ kum+b+ha kaN+Da/ sin+na do/ sA ga ras sat+ya pa Da pe sin+na sin+na daM/ ban+d+ha mi/ ku ru ra sas+sa bi Da las/ tuN+Da ban+d+hA me/ dzA ba su ra u da
ni/ ja ba ra bi ba b+ha a d+hi a ha to baN+Na a nu ba de na sA d+hu na/ ma ma ri a sar+b+ba si d+ha na swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas
de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'dis lan bdun du mngon par brjod pas bsngags pa byas te khyim gyi thog tu bzhag na/ rjod par byed par 'gyur ro/ /bas ha to
la i mi dz+nya a/ ba sa ba dza na mo hi a/ e sa bidz+dza tsa ha i na man+ta i in+d+ha na/ ha a bA i dza be na diN+Na Ni/ d+ha tam+b+ha hi mahA swa ba a na no bA d+ho si/ rAM dza ku la khaN+Da/ Da Ni
Da| dze bA i ba d+ha/ ta d+hi Na ta Na/ na ma sid+ha na/ na ma bu pa ja dza pA da na/ ma sa wa rA Ne/ tad+ya da re ma hA da N+De da ha he du na he he swAhA/ 'dis bye ma la lan bdun du bsngags
pa byas te 'bru rnams la btab na/ ce sbyang la sogs pa'i srog chags rnams kyis mi za zhing sprin rnam par zlog par byed/ rat+na ra ti/ oM a la la bar tsu li la tsor bag+g+ha
ka na da sa bA mu ha ban+d+hA mi swAhA/ shing bu sor bzhi pa la lan bdun du bzlas te rna ba g.yas pa la btags na/ chom rkun rnams rengs par byed do/ /i da si/ a ti Ni dza ha
a ka li lo hi di/ bing+ga le/ ma me ga b+ha na i/ ha aM si la u sa ri mi a ba ra b+ha Na i/ a haM bA da u sA ra mi a ba ra b+ha Na mi a ham du ha mi b+hi to badz+dza ba/ mi lo li ka li/
lo hi di pang+ga li hUM phaT/ glang gi rwas brus pa'i sa dbus ma blangs la sngags 'dis lan bdun du mngon par btab na/ nags khrod dang / 'jigs pa'i lam dang / rgyal
pos bkrabs pa la sogs pa thams cad kyis gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur te/ ba lang gi gdong pa can du byas nas cho ga 'di lta ste/ sa de lag par bzhag la ser
ba 'bab pa la sogs pa la btab na/ ldog par 'gyur te/ 'di'i cho ga 'di'o/ /oM dzaM bi li a ba a bi dz+dzi su ti tha da si/ i su b+ha de su
b+ha de o/ so Na o sa tsa la hi suN+Na pa da ne/ i si la ba da ba ra Sha badz+dza hi swAhA/ snod bzang por chu blugs te rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug ste lan bdun du bsngags
nas chu de nam mkha' la gtor na/ ser ba dang rlung 'bab pa la sogs pa rengs par byed do/ /na a mo d+he/ b+ha ga pa ti/ ki b+hi ku re Na sha tra ya/ tha ma ke ha tha ka ra la pA ke /

ni ta saM ru bi ti b+ha tu ya/ ru dza ri Ta ra ma Ta ku ke to li Ta lu ya/ /lu TaM hiSh+Tha le ka si ra le lo ti gra le b+hi Shi Sha le na si mu la kha a ya the sar+b+ba ha de sran b+hu dza ku b+ha na su ther Sha ya
na ba ya ra ti Shu d+ha ya na sho pa d+ya ti ta ka su sa la ka kha se sid+d+ha pa hA la sa hi pa Na swAhA/ chu la lan bdun bsngags nas kha gdong bkrus na/ thams cad 'grub par byed
do| |rim pa bzhin du he ru ka dang 'dab ma rnams la mkha' 'gro ma rnams bkod de/ dbugs mi 'byung bar sbyar ba las/ /'grub pa 'di la the tshom med/ /yang ni rnal
'byor pa rnams 'dir/ /pad+ma la ni rab bsams te/ /yid ni rlabs med par byas te/ /sngags ni pho nya mor sbyar na/ /de yis rtag tu 'grub 'gyur ba/ /'di la sngags pa
the tshom med/ /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyud chen po las le'u gsum pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rab tu rtogs bya'i dpa' bo drug /
dpa' mo drug dang mnyam sbyor phyir/ /gnas rnams re re yi ge ste/ /dang po snying ga nyid du'o/ /mgo bo la ni gnyis par brjod/ /spyi gtsug la ni gsum pa sbyin/ /dpung ba
go cha bzhi ba nyid/ /mig dag la ni lnga pa yin/ /drug pa thams cad la ni brjod/ /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud chen po las le'u bzhi pa'o// //de
nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams nyer 'dus mchog /gang du mnyes par 'gyur ba yi/ /mkha' 'gro ma kun rab sdom pa'o/ /yi dwags gnas
bzhir rab sbyar ram/ /yang na rgya mtsho'i 'gram du'am/ /lam gyi bzhi mdor rab bsgrub cing / /mchog rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /ri bo phug dang nags tshal dang //
de bzhin shing gcig tu brjod par/ /mtshan mo 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis rab bsgrubs nas/ /rnal 'byor bla na med pa skye bar 'gyur/ /der ni rtag tu mkha' 'gro
ma rnams dang / /lhan cig 'dug par sgrub po the tshom med/ /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud chen po las le'u lnga pa'o// //sngar spyod cho ga'i rim
pa rnams/ /rab tu bshad kyi lha mo nyon/ /dka' thub rnal 'byor pas mi bya/ /gzhan pa kun dang gnas mi bya/ /lus la mchog
tu'ang mchod mi bya/ /brnyas pa nyid du'ang mi bya ste/ /sna tshogs rang bzhin med mnyam lta/ /gseg ma sol bas bsgos bya zhing / /thal bas 'bad
de brgyan par bya/ /bza' dang bza' min la sogs la/ /sngags pas kun tu rtog mi bya/ /me tog rnyed rnyed thams cad kyis/ /rtag tu phreng ba nyid du
bya| |dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud chen po las le'u drug pa'o// //de nas go cha rnams kyi ni/ /las kyi tshogs rnams bshad bya ba/ /
'jig rten gsum na bcud yod gang / /smyo byed 'bras skyes la bsres na/ /de la skad cig gis kun grub/ /go cha bzlas bzhin 'gro byed na/ /lha rnams
kyis kyang mi mthong zhing / /chom rkun stag sogs kyis mi 'jigs/ /go cha bzlos bzhin du rgyal po'i grong du byin gyis brlabs te zhugs na/ mi mthong
par yang 'dod pa de blangs nas slar yod pa dang / go cha bzlos bzhin bzlas pas gang la reg na de mdung bzhin du rengs par 'gyur ro/ /sum cu rtsa gsum

pas kyang mi g.yo'o/ /sngags bzlas pa'i rkang pas bsnun na ni/ slar grol bar 'gyur ro/ /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud chen po las le'u bdun pa'o// //de nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyi las bshad de/ sha lnga las gzugs brnyan gyi rab tu sbyor ba las las thams cad byed pa yin te/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / klu
dang / gnod sbyin thams cad dang / dri za thams cad dang / lha'i skye gnas thams cad dran pa nyid kyis mchi'o/ /sprin rnams skrag par byed pa dang / char
'bebs par byed pa dang / zlog par byed pa dang / rgya mtsho skem par byed pa dang / chu bo rgyun phyogs las zlog par byed pa dang / dbang po zlog par byed pa dang /
dbang po zlog par byed pas dur khrod kyi sol ba la ji tsam 'dod pa bzlas nas gang la bsnun na/ de de'i skad cig ma nyid la ltung ngo / /dur khrod kyi sol ba

la yongs su bzlas te gang la bsnun na/ de de'i skad cig nyid la sha zas 'dzin no/ /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud chen po las le'u brgyad pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi spyod pa ste/ /dpa' bo'i dpa' dang cha blangs ma/ /gang gis pho nyar shes byas te/ /dpa' bos mdzes ma
spyad par bya/ /sa ni rten du byas nas ni/ /dam pa'i spyod pa'i bzlas brjod bya/ /rim las ldog pa'i ldang tshul dang / /kha yi rang bzhin
'jigs bag can/ /rtag tu smyon ma bsus pa'i gdong / /chos kyi rim pa myur shes pa/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rnam spyod yin/ /ri mo gsum po yongs zlum por/ /
rim dang rim ldog ji bzhin shes/ /'gro dang 'ong bas mkha' 'gro ma'i/ /mtshan ma kun gyi mtshan nyid do/ /dgrol las bzhin gyi gnyer ma can/ /ci zhig
gis ni slar ldog byed/ /de las rdo rje'i dgug pa gsal/ /de dbyangs ko ka la yi skad/ /rnal 'byor dam pa de lta'i dngos/ /shes par byas na dngos grub
ster| |de la mtshan nyid bsam byas na/ /de yis de yi dngos por 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud chen po las le'u dgu pa'o// //dngos
grub kun ni rab ster ba/ /nga yis bshad kyi lha mo nyon/ /lus ngag sems la rtag tu ni/ /yid kyi rdul dang bral bar bya/ /mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /
lus kyi dkyil 'khor rnam bsam par/ /gang du'ang pho nya mo gnas min/ /yongs su bsgoms pas 'ong min gyi/ /dad pa tsam gyis gzung bya ste/ /mig dang lag
pas ma yin no/ /gsang ba 'di gsal mi bya zhing / /rab tu 'bad de sba bar bya/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams kun bsdus blta/ /de phyir lus nyid du mi blta/ /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro
'gro'i rgyud chen po las le'u bcu pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul te/ /dam tshig rab bsrungs rab 'grub ste/ /
dam tshig las ni sngags par gnas/ /rtag tu 'bras skyes stobs brten cing / /rnal 'byor ma rnams smad mi bya/ /rjes su 'jug rnams mi bzlog go /dam can mi rnams
la mi smad/ /brtson ldan rnams la gnod mi bya/ /'di rnams dang ldan ci bder bya/ /grol bar 'dod pa de don du/ /dam tshig rnams ni spyad par bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams
kyis gsungs pa la/ /cung zad tsam yang smad mi bya/ /khros te rab sbyor 'ga' mi bya/ /sngags la sbyar bar mi bya'o/ /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud chen po las le'u
bcu gcig pa'o// //rdo rje mkha' 'gro sgrub pa'i thabs/ /nga yis bshad kyi lha mo nyon/ /dang por bsgom bya ro nyid do/ /chos dbyings dag tu rig par bya//
de yi steng nus rnal 'byor pa/ /go 'phang mchog ni bsgoms byas te/ /de nyid du ni rnam par dgod/ /rang gi snying ga'i zla dbus su/ /'od las lha mo kun phyung ba/ /
phyag 'tshal mchod sogs 'di ltar gsungs/ /dang por snying gar zla dbus su/ /yi ge a yis zla dkyil 'khor/ /rnam par bsams
la de steng du/ /yi ge hUM ni rnam par bsgom/ /de nas byams pa'i sems byas te/ /de nas re zhig dkyil 'khor bri/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /kha khyer rdo rjes
nges par mtshan/ /skud pa bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /'phan gyi phreng ba shin tu mdzes/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi grwa rnams dang / /sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams
rnams su/ /rdo rje rin po ches mtshan par/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab bo/ /shes rab can gyis thig gdab bo/ /'khor lo'i phreng bas rnam
par mdzes/ /de nang du yang pad+ma ni/ /mdog dkar rab tu mdzes pa bri/ /gzhan yang de yi steng du ni/ /mdog dmar pad+ma 'od dang ldan/ /pad+ma'i phreng
bas bskor bas so/ /sngags pa de yi nang du yang / /rdo rje phreng ba 'khrigs par bri/ /yang na pad chen 'dab brgyad pa/ /in+d+ra nI la'i 'od mnyam pa'o/ /de dbus
dkyil 'khor lngas brgyan par/ /g.yas na rdo rje gtso bor bzhugs/ /ri rab re yi steng du ni/ /sna tshogs gzugs can yid 'ong ba/ /sangs rgyas byang chub
sems dpa' rnams/ /thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming che ge mo zhes pa/ /dus 'di nas ni bzung nas ni/ /ji srid byang chub ma thob par/ /
ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub sems/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /tshul khrims
kyi ni bslab pa dang / /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag gis brtan por so sor gzung / /sangs rgyas
rnal 'byor sdom pa la/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi/ /rdo rje rigs
mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dag /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog rnal 'byor
la| |dam tshig yid du 'ong ba ni/ /nyin re zhing ni yang dang yang / /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs
chen dag pa la/ /phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos rnams so sor gzung / /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams
cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /
dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /sdom pa thams cad gzung bgyi zhing / /ma bsgral ba rnams bdag gis
bsgral| |ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol/ /dbugs ma phyin pa bdag gis dbyung / /sems can mya ngan 'das la dgong / /oM swa b+hA wa/
shud+d+hAHsar+b+ba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ de nas thams cad bdag med pa gnas gzhi dang ngan par bral bar bltas te/ de nyid bcom ldan
rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ kha dog sngon po drag po che/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /phyag bzhi pa la zhal
bzhi pa| |spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par mdzes/ /yi dwags chen po gdan du mdzad/ /nyi ma la bzhugs gar bcas mdzad/ /thod pa dang
ni kha T+wAM ga /gzhu dang de bzhin gzhan mda' 'o/ /de lta'i cho ga'i rim pa 'di/ /ye shes kyi ni rnam par bsgom/ /shar du dkar po sdo mdangs
can| |g.yon na kha T+wAM ga dril bu/ /rdo rje thod pa de bzhin gzhan/ /byang na dmar po'am cung zad ser/ /g.yon na kha T+wAM ga zhags pa/ /phyag
g.yas cang te'u thod pa nyid/ /nub na dmar ba'am cung zad ser/ /'bad bas mda' dang gzhu 'dzin cing / /thod pa sna tshogs pad+ma dag /g.yas
dang g.yon gyi phyag na'o/ /lho na dkar ba'am ser ba'am/ /g.yon phyag rtse gsum rin po che/ /g.yas na de bzhin thod pa'o/ /glang
po dang ni ce spyang dang / /mi dang ba lang nyid dag ni/ /thod pa rnams na cho ga bzhin/ /dang por ltung bar byed ma nyid/ /gnyis pa gsod par byed
ma ste/ /gsum pa 'gugs par byed ma'o/ /bzhi pa gar gyi dbang phyug ma'o/ /rig ma de dag dbu skra ni/ /gyen du 'bar zhing rgyan rnams
kyis| |brgyan nas gar mdzad bzhugs ba'o/ /mtshams bzhir gnas pa'i thod par ni/ /sangs rgyas gzugs lngas nye bar brgyan/ /btung
ba mchog dang yang dag ldan/ /dang por yi ger yang dag ldan/ /skad cig las ni 'bar bar bsam/ /lha mo de ltar bsgoms byas nas/ /'bras bu nor
gyi dngos grub 'thob/ /rig pa chen po sbyor 'grub pa/ /yang dag mngon sum rab tu bsgom/ /mi snang bar gnas thams cad bdag /rnal 'byor
pas ni yud kyis mthong / /lha mchog las skyes bu mo rnams/ /sangs rgyas kun la 'phrog nas spyod/ /rdo rje gsum gyi gnas bzhugs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas gang+ga'i
bye mnyam rnams/ /rang lag skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin/ /rdo rje mig gis mthong bar 'gyur/ /gang+gA'i bya mnyam sangs rgyas zhing / /sku gsung thugs rnams kyis mtshan
pa'i| |sems dngos gar mkhan dngos po ni/ /thams cad bdag nyid du mthong 'gyur/ /rgyud dang sngags rnams rnam bsgoms pa/ /yi ge phyin ci log tu sbyar/ /
mchog tu gsang ba 'di dag ni/ /khyod la legs par bshad pa yin/ /mkha' 'gro ma kun mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems
dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan rdo rjes de skad gsungs/ /'di dag ni/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud chen po las rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen po bzhengs pa'i
le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas dngos grub kun ster ba/ /gang gis dngos grub myur byed cing / /the tshom med par skyed pa yi/ /mkha' 'gro
ma yi snying po bshad/ /mtshan ma gnyis la sngags mnyam sbyar/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma gnyis med/ /rab tu sbyor ba'i don 'di dag /rnal 'byor ma la rab tu bsgrub
de las 'grub par rab tu grags/ /lha dang lha min mir bcas rnams/ /bsgrub bya rnams ni myur bar 'dis/ /ji bzhin rtag tu nye ba dang / /ring yang de bzhin myur
bskyed de/ /'di dag nye bar 'gyur ba ni/ /de yi gzugs sku 'gugs par byed/ /pad+ma'i lte bar rab gnas la/ /dbugs kyi brda yis bsgom par bya/ /der ni sna tshogs
sku bsams te/ /sna tshogs sku la mchod bya zhing / /byang chub sems ni rtogs byas nas/ /bdag nyid rab tu sbyar bar bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /de la
mkha' bzhin gnas par bya/ /'byung gnas thams cad de lta nyid/ /der ni mkha' 'gro ma kun no/ /gnas sogs 'byung gnas mkha' 'gro ma/ /yul rnams kun
la gnas pa yin/ /yul yul du ni skyes ldan ma/ /rang skye'i gnas su yang dag bshad/ /dkyil 'khor la zhugs mkha' 'gro ma/ /de nas mtshan mo shar nas
bza'/ /de yis mnyam par rab sbyar nas/ /sngags pas rtag tu rab bsgrub bya/ /der ni rol pa chen spyod cing / /thams cad sgyu ma lta bur bsgrub/ /dam tshig rang
bzhin du byas nas/ /de la sdom par rab skye ba/ /snang med dga' bar rang rig pa'o/ /de dag ni/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud
chen po las le'u bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dge ba dang / /lha rnams kun gyi sgrub thabs kun/ /pho
nya rnams kyi khyad par dang / /'byung po gdon dang rig pa che/ /lus srul po ni gang zhig dang / /de bzhin sngags kyi phreng ba dang / /de ltar bshad kyi lha mo
nyon| |gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /sgo skyong rnams dang yang dag ldan/ /dngos grub yon tan kun gyi gzhi/ /dkyil 'khor mdzes par bri bar bya/ /'dod pa'i
yon tan lnga dang ldan/ /nye bar spyod pa lnga yis brgyan/ /ri mo mkhan ni dam tshig can/ /sgrub po mchog gis 'bri ru gzhug /ro la dkris pa'i ras dag
gam| |yang na mtshon gyis btab pa'i zas/ /'byung po dag gi ras dag ni/ /ba lang ko ba tsam zhig la/ /nag po'i brgyad dam bcu bzhi la/ /'byung po rnams
kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub/ /de nas 'bum gcig bzlas byin na/ /mdun du mngon sum nyid du 'gyur/ /tshangs pa mo dang shis byed ma/ /gzhon nu ma dang phag
mo dang / /dbang po ma dang rgan byed ma/ /tshogs kyi dbang phyug ma dang ni/ /byin za yi ni bdag can ma'o/ /rim pa gnyis pa dag la ni/ /tshangs dang gshin rje chu lha
dang / /nor sbyin dang ni yi dwags dang / /byin za dang ni dbang ldan dang / /bden bral de bzhin rlung lha'o/ /rim pa gsum pa dag la ni/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang / /mig
dmar dang ni gza' lag dang / /phur bu dang ni pa ba sangs/ /spen pa sgra gcan 'dzin dag go /khyim pa bzhi la sgo bzhir ni/ /tshangs dang khyab 'jug de bzhin du/ /
drag po dang ni karti ka /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung / /'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams so/ /rim pa dang po'i dbus nyid kyi/ /phyogs bzhi dang por mkha' 'gro ma/ /mar me ma
dang mdzes pa mo/ /'jigs byed ma dang de bzhin du/ /dbus su khyab bdag nyid gnas so/ /yang dag mtha' las mthar 'gyur ba'i/ /rang bzhin gyis ni cho ga bzhin/ /
rnal 'byor pas ni bsgrub par bya/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor de bzhin bri/ /dbus su yongs su zlum po ru/ /ri mo shin tu mdzes pas
bskor| |lte ba sbas pa'i spyod yul can/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri bar bya/ /de dbus khro bo chen po ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa
can| |cung zad bzhad pa'i zhal dang ldan/ /kha dog sngon po gtsigs pa che/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /ro gcig gar ldan nyi
mar bzhugs/ /lha rnams 'jigs par mdzad pa po/ /stag gi pags pa'i smad dkris can/ /spyan gsum gzigs mchog dang ldan pa/ /rdo rje 'bar ba phyag
g.yas na/ /'phan lce gsum pa g.yon na 'o/ /mda' gzhu de bzhin g.yas g.yon phyag /mkha' 'gro ma ni shar du bri/ /lho ru 'jigs byed ma nyid de/ /nub
tu lha mo mdzes ma'o/ /byang du mar me ma dgod de/ /yi ge hUM las byung ba yi/ /phag mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma/ /mda' gzhu dang ni de bzhin du/ /rgyal
mtshan dang ni thod pa nyid/ /kha dog sngon mo 'jigs chen mo/ /phag gi gdong bas 'jigs par mdzad/ /yi ge phaT las shis byed ma/ /kha dog dmar mo
phyag bzhi ma/ /thod pa dang ni lcags kyu nyid/ /de bzhin kha T+wAM gcang te'u/ /yi ge ha las gzhon nu ma/ /kha dog ser mo phyag bzhi ma/ /rtse gsum dang ni
'phan lce gsum/ /de bzhin gzhu dang mda' nyid do/ /ho yig las ni rgan byad ma/ /kha dog nag mo phyag bzhi ma/ /kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa nyid/ /de bzhin
ral gri cang te'u/ /baM yig las byung tshangs pa mo/ /kha dog dkar mo phyag bzhi ma/ /pad+ma dang ni thod pa nyid/ /de bzhin gzhan na gzhu dang mda'/ /g+ha yig las
byung tshogs dbang mo/ /sngo bsangs mdog la phyag bzhi ma/ /rtse gsum de bzhin thod pa dang / /bgrang phreng dang ni la du'o/ /baM yig las ni khyab 'jug ma/ /kha dog
sngon mo phyag bzhi ma/ /dbyug to dang ni thod pa 'dzin/ /de bzhin zhags pa ral gri bzhin/ /yi ge las byung dbang po ma/ /kha dog ser mo phyag bzhi ma/ /rdo rje
gsal shing thod pa dang / /sdigs mdzub dang ni zhags pa'o/ /kun kyang dbu skra gyen du 'bar/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /spyan gsum dang ni ro la
zhon/ /stag gi pags pa'i smad dkris can/ /shar gyi sgo ni tshangs ba bri/ /kha dog dkar po zhal bzhi pa/ /thod pa dang ni bgrang phreng dang / /gan+d+ha dang ni
pad+ma'o/ /byang du de bzhin khyab 'jug ste/ /kha dog nag po lag bzhi pa/ /ral gri de bzhin 'khor lo dang / /thod pa dang ni dbyug pa'o/ /lho ru drag mo
bri bya ste/ /du ba'i mdog la lag bzhi pa/ /rtse gsum nyid dang ka pA la/ /de bzhin zhags pa bgrang phreng 'dzin/ /nub tu karti ka bri ste/ /kha dog
ser po lag bzhi pa/ /dpa' bo gsal shing dbyug pa dang / /de bzhin thod pa bgrang phreng 'dzin/ /dbang ldan khyu mchog la zhon
pa| |kha dog dkar po lag bzhi pa/ /thod pa dang ni rtse gsum 'dzin/ /de bzhin gzhan ni thal mo sbyar/ /glang po zhon pa dbang po ste/ /kha dog ser po lag
bzhi pa/ /rdo rje dang ni thod pa 'dzin/ /gzhan ni thal mo kha sbyar byed/ /ra skyes zhon pa me phyogs 'dzin/ /kha dog dmar po lag bzhi pa/ /me thab dang ni
thod par ldan/ /skrag nas gzhan ni thal mo sbyar/ /gshin rje ma he la zhon pa/ /kha dog nag po lag bzhi pa/ /dbyug pa dang ni thod pa 'dzin/ /de
bzhin skrag nas thal mo byed/ /bden bral dang ni khyi la zhon/ /kha dog ljang gu lag bzhi pa/ /ral gri nyid dang thod pa 'dzin/ /skrag nas gzhan dag
thal mo sbyor/ /chu yi phyogs ni chu srin zhon/ /kha dog dkar po lag bzhi pa/ /zhags pa dang ni thod par ldan/ /gzhan dag thal mo kha sbyor byed/ /
rlung ni ri dwags zhon pa ste/ /du ba'i mdog can lag bzhi pa/ /ba dan dang ni thod par ldan/ /de bzhin gzhan ni thal mo sbyor/ /nor sbyin na ni gter la
zhon| |kha dog ser po lag bzhi pa/ /rin po che dang thod par ldan/ /gzhan dag thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /gza' dang rgyu skar thams cad ni/ /so so'i dkyil
'khor la bsam bya/ /rang gi dam tshig las byung ba/ /stobs po che la rdzu 'phrul ldan/ /ma mo kun gyi yang ma mo/ /de bzhin rig par gyur pa'i mchog /
nyon cig lha mo che chen mo/ /gtor ma re res gzung bar bya/ /dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'i/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor gar spyod na/ /de la 'bad pas
khur byed pa'i/ /pho nya'i sgrub thabs rab bshad pa/ /rgyud rnams kun nas rnyed dka' ba'i/ /de yis ldan byas dngos grub 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor gcig pas rtag
gnas pas/ /'khor ba'i skyon dang nges par grol/ /pho nya mor chags rtag par grol/ /mchog gi rim pas spyad par bya/ /bsnyen bkur tsam chib min gyi/
skye gnas dman pa'ang dga' bde'i gnas/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo dang / /chung ma yang ni pho nyar gnas/ /'jig rten la rtag g.yon pas spyod/ /rkang pa g.yon
ba sngon du 'dor/ /lag pa g.yon pas yongs su bsgyur/ /g.yon pa dang por mchod par bya/ /g.yon pa phyogs kyis bskyur bya zhing / /g.yon pas 'bad pas
tshim par byed/ /dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i snying po'i rgyud chen po las le'u bcu bzhi pa'o// //dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud phyi ma snying po
bsdus pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po mchog gi dbang phyug gi zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi dge slong shAkya brtson 'grus kyis grom pa
ru lag rgyang bu'i lha ri mo'i mgul gyi dben gnas su bsgyur ba'o// //gsar bcug kha bskong gras/ //rgya gar skad du/ DA ki nI sarba tsit+ta a dwa ya a tsin+ta dz+nyA na badzra bA rA
hi a d+hi b+ha ba tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes rdo rje phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud
kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ mgon po dpa' bo 'jigs byed dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'i dur khrod
chen po'i gnas mchog tu gyur pa na/ bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang 'joms pa'i he ru ka dang / gti mug 'joms pa'i he ru ka dang / nga rgyal 'joms pa'i he ru ka dang /
'dod chags 'joms pa'i he ru ka dang / phrag dog 'joms pa'i he ru ka dang / yum sangs rgyas spyan dang / /yu ma mA ma kI dang / yum gos dkar mo dang / yum dam tshig
sgrol ma dang / yum kun tu bzang mo dang / de rnams kyi b+ha ga la lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul du bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma
dur khrod kyi bdag mo dang / khros ma nag mo dang / bde chen dkar mo dang / ser mo don grub ma dang / dmar mo sgra sgrog ma dang / sna tshogs mthar phyin ma dang / las kyi gtso mo la
sogs pa'i ye shes dang / las las grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang / gzhan yang badzra DA ki nI dang / rat+na DA ki nI dang / pad+ma DA ki nI dang / karma DA ki nI dang /
sa ma ya DA ki nI dang / bi shwa DA ki nI dang / sarba DA ki nI dang / lo ka DA ki nI la sogs te dur khrod brgyad kyi mkha' 'gro ma dang / dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i tshogs dpag tu med pa
dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i mes po tshangs pa dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang / gzhan yang rgyal po chen po bzhi po rang gi 'khor dang bcas
pa dang / phyogs skyong ba bcu dang / lha ma srin sde brgyad dang / 'khor dpag tu med pa dang thabs cig pa'i tshul gyis gnas so/ /yang de'i tshe na ye shes kyi mkha' 'gra ma dur
khrod kyi bdag mo zhes bya ba rang gi stan las langs nas mgon po dpa' bo 'jigs byed he ru ka la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye kye mgon po bdag la gson/ /khyed kyi 'khor du
'dus pa yi/ /skal dang ldan pa 'di rnams la/ /lam log mu stegs ma lags pa'i/ /dman pa nyan thos ma lags pa'i/ /ma smin mtshan nyid ma lags
pa'i| |bsam gyis mi khyab chos cig zhu/ /phyogs ris med pa lta ba'i mchog /sam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol/ /dgag sgrub med pa spyod pa'i mchog /bsam gyis mi
khyab bshad du gsol/ /bar chod sel ba brda yi mchog /bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol/ /smin par byed pa dbang gi mchog /bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol/ /
sangs rgyas thob byed 'bras bu'i mchog /ye shes lnga yi gzugs brnyan te/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol/ /rnam rtog sel byed rnam rgyal lnga/ /bsam gyis mi khyab
bshad du gsol/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste
dang po'o// //de nas mgon po des spyan phyogs mtshams kun la gzigs nas zhal rdo rje'i mgur 'dzum pa mdzad nas bka' stsal pa ni/ e ma ho/
nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/ /dus 'dir tshogs pa'i 'khor rnams la/ /mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud bshad kyis/ /kha sbub zhabs rdol dri ma can/ /snod skyon
gsum po spang byas la/ /rtse gcig sems kyis mnyan par gyis/ /phyogs ris med pa'i lta ba de/ /gnyug ma'i sems kyis blta bar gyis/ /dmigs gtad med pa'i sgom pa ni/ /gnyug
ma'i yid kyis bsgom par bya/ /dgag sgrub med pa spyod pa'i mchog /gnyug ma'i yid kyis spyad par bya/ /bar chod sel ba brda yi chos/ /gnyug ma'i yid kyis bsal bar bya/ /smin par
byed pa dbang gi mchog /gnyug ma'i sems kyis bskur bar bya/ /tshe gcig 'bras bu sangs rgyas de/ /gnyug ma'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya/ /ye shes lnga yi gzugs brnyan de/ /ma
bcos sems kyis bsgrub par bya/ /rnam rtog sel byed rnam rgyal lnga/ /ma bcos sems kyis gcod par bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam
gyis mi khyab pa las phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las ston pas zhal gyis bzhes pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa/ /tshe gcig
sangs rgyas thob 'dod pas/ /dang po gdeng chen lta ba gces/ /des na lta ba dang por bstan/ /phyogs ris med pa lta ba'i mchog /nam mkha' lta bu shes par gyis/ /thams cad
'dogs pa lta ba'i mchog /sa gzhi lta bu shes par gyis/ /thams cad sdud pa lta ba'i mchog /'byung ba chu ltar shes par gyis/ /nyon mongs sreg pa lta ba'i mchog /'byung
ba me ltar shes par gyis/ /ngos bzung med pa lta ba'i mchog /'byung ba rlung ltar shes par gyis/ /de nas yang ston pas gsungs pa/ 'pho 'gyur med pa lta
ba'i mchog /ri bo lta bur shes par gyis/ /g.yo 'gul med pa lta ba'i mchog /rgya mtsho lta bur shes par bya/ /gsal la ma 'dres lta ba'i mchog /'ja' tshon lta bur shes par
gyis| |gnyis su med pa lta ba'i mchog /ga pur lta bur shes par bya/ /de nas yang gsang bas tshig 'di gsungs te/ zil gyis gnon pa lta ba'i mchog /seng ge lta bur shes
par bya/ /nyam nga med pa lta ba'i mchog /glang chen lta bur shes par bya/ /stobs dang ldan pa lta ba'i mchog /rta mchog lta bur shes par bya/ /kun tu rgyug pa lta ba'i mchog
stag mo lta bur shes par bya/ /'jigs pa med pa lta ba'i mchog /dom bu lta bur shes par bya/ /de nas yang gsang ba'i tshig 'di gsungs te/ skyon gyis ma gos lta ba'i
mchog /byang chub sems de dkar por snang / /dus gsum mi 'gyur lta ba'i mchog /byang chub sems de nag por snang / /yon tan rgyas pa lta ba'i mchog /byang chub
sems de ser por snang / /kun la khyab pa lta ba'i mchog /byang chub sems de dmar por snang / /phrin las rdzogs pa lta ba'i mchog /byang chub sems de ljang khur shar//
de nas yang gsang ba'i tshig gsungs te/ /dus gsum snang ba lta ba'i mchog /rnam par snang mdzad lta bur shar/ /chos nyid don la rtag sems pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' lta bur shar/ /
thams cad mnyam pa nyid rtogs pas/ /rin chen 'byung ldan lta bur shar/ /chos can so sor ma 'dres pas/ /snang ba mtha' yas lta bur shar/ /sna tshogs snang la ma 'dres pas/ /
don yod grub pa lta bur shar/ /zhes pa gsungs so/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud
las lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas dur khrod bdag mo des/ /ston pa la ni 'di skad zhus/ /rtogs pa lta ba'i rjes thogs la/ /bsgom pa'i
go rims ji lta bu/ /zhes zhus pas/ de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa/ /sangs rgyas thob par 'dod pa yis/ /rtogs pa'i don go bsgoms las byung / /gzhan du 'bras bu 'byung
mi 'gyur/ /sna tshogs snang ba'i chos rnams kun/ /ye nas spros dang bral ba la/ /rtag par 'dzin pa bsgom pa'i skyon/ /phyi dang nang gi chos nyid la/ /chad par 'dzin pa'i sgom pha'i
skyon| |'o na ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ /lam med lam gol dman pa'i lam/ /'di rnams spangs te bsgom par bya/ /dang po byang chub sems bskyed de/ /smon 'jug gnyis po sngon du
gces/ /gzung ba yul med sgom pa'i mchog /chos kyi bdag med rtogs par bya/ /'dzin pa'i sems med sgom pa'i mchog /gang zag bdag med rtogs
par bya/ /chos rnams gang yin mi 'gegs pas/ /thabs kyi lam du shes par bya/ /ngo bo ci yang ma grub pas/ /shes rab lam du shes par bya/ /chos rnams rgya med sgom pa'i
mchog /stong pa nyid kyi rnam thar yin/ /'bras bu stong pa sgom pa'i mchog /mtshan med pa yi rnam thar yin/ /rgyu 'bras dbyer med sgom pa'i mchog /smon pa med pa'i rnam thar
yin| |kun la byams pa sgom pa'i mchog /byams pa tshad med rang bzhin yin/ /kun la brtse ba sgom pa'i mchog /snying rje tshad med ngo bo nyid/ /kun la phan pa sgom pa'i
mchog /dga' ba tshad med ngo bo nyid/ /kun la khyab ba sgom pa'i mchog /btang snyoms tshad med ngo bo nyid/ /bsod nams tshogs sog sgom pa'i mchog /bzhi gsum bcu
gnyis bdag nyid can/ /lam la bsgoms pa sgom pa'i mchog /nges 'byed bzhi yi bdag nyid can/ /ye shes mthong ba sgom pa'i mchog /byang chub yan lag rnam bdun
yin| |goms par byed pa sgom pa'i lam/ /'phags lam brgyad gyi bdag nyid can/ /goms pa mthar phyin sgom pa'i mchog /bcu pa la ni yongs su grol/ /sangs rgyas
pa yi rnam thar yin/ /chags sems bal ba sgom pa'i mchog /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa yin/ /rang sems dag pa sgom pa'i mchog /tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa yin/ /ji mi snyam pa sgom
pa'i mchog /bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa yin/ /go cha sbyor ba sgom pa'i mchog /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa yin/ /g.yeng ba med pa sgom pa'i mchog /bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa yin//
'khor 'das shes pa sgom ba'i mchog /shes rab pha rol phyin pa yin/ /nyon mongs mi spong sgom pa'i mchog /thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa yin/ /mi mthun zil gnon sgom pa'i
mchog /stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa yin/ /ci bsam 'grub pa sgom pa'i mchog /smon lam pha rol phyin pa yin/ /ji snyed mkhyen bya sgom pa'i mchog /ye shes pha rol phyin pa
yin| |chos dbyings ye shes sgom pa'i mchog /spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin yin/ /me long ye shes sgom pa'i mchog /thams cad gzugs brnyan ltar shes yin/ /mnyam nyid
ye shes sgom pa'i mchog /kun la snyoms pa'i bdag nyid yin/ /kun rtog ye shes sgom pa'i mchog /ma 'dres gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid/ /bya grub ye shes sgom pa'i mchog /phrin
las thams cad dus gcig rdzogs/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud ces bya ba las sgom
pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas dur khrod bdag mo des/ /he ru ka la 'di skad gsol/ /goms par bya ba'i rjes thog
la| |spyod pa'i go rims ji ltar bgyi/ /de nas ston pas gsang ba'i tshig 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /cung zad drod ni thob pa dang / /de tshe spyod pa spyad par bya/ /dang po
gsang ba'i spyod pa bya/ /byang chub sems ni drod thob nas/ /rig pa brtul zhugs spyod bar bya/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i drod thob nas/ /ma dad zlog pa'i spyod par bya/ /chu chod
lta bu'i drod thob nas/ /tshogs kyi spyod pa ci bder spyad/ /smyon pa lta bu'i sems thog nas/ /phyogs med rnam rgyal spyod pa bya/ /de yi dbye ba gzhan na gsal/ /gnas ngang grog
dang dus dang zas/ /le'u gzhan nas shes par bya/ /kun gyis bkur ba spyod pa'i mchog /rgyal po lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /ngo tsha shes pa spyod pa'i mchog /rje rigs lta bu'i spyod
pa bya| |chags sdang 'khru ba spyod pa'i mchog /bram ze lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /srid dang bral ba spyod pa'i mchog /dmangs rigs lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /dman sa 'dzin pa spyod
pa'i mchog /gdol pa lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /mtho sa 'dzin pa spyod pa'i mchog /seng ge lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /nyam nga med pa spyod pa'i
mchog /glang chen lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /shugs dang ldan pa spyod pa'i mchog /rta mchog lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /rnam rtog gsod pa spyod pa'i mchog /spyang ki lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /drag
shul lta byed spyod pa'i mchog /dred mo lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /gza' gtad med pa spyod pa'i mchog /ri dwags lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /ngo tsha bral ba spyod pa'i
mchog /ro langs lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /ro dang 'grogs ba spyod pa'i mchog /rigs dan lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /dur khrod gnas pa spyod pa'i mchog /ce spyang lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /bag yod rngan
pa spyod pa'i mchog /wa mo lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /de las gzhan yang bshad par bya/ /zung du 'brel ba spyod pa'i mchog /ngur pa lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /gzhan gyis mi mthong spyod pa'i mchog/
khwa ta lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /dug lnga spyod pa spyod pa'i mchog /rma bya lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /dus tshod 'dzin pa spyod pa'i mchog /khu byug lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /nyes pas ma gos spyod pa'i
mchog /bya rgod lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /rim gyis 'dzeg pa spyod pa'i mchog /spre'u lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /'jigs pa med pa spyod pa'i mchog /dom
bu lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /mtshan mo rgyu ba spyod pa'i mchog /zhag mig can gyi spyod pa bya/ /gang la mi gnas spyod pa'i mchog /bung ba lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /snang ba lta ba spyod pa'i mchog
'bar ba lta bu'i spyod ba bya/ /de las gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /dgos 'dod 'byung ba spyod pa'i mchog /nor bu lta bu'i spyod pa bya/ /sman dug gnyid
med spyod pa'i mchog /ga pur lta bur shes par bya/ /cis kyang mi tshugs spyod pa'i mchog /rdo rje lta bur shes par bya/ /mi mthun gcod ba spyod pa'i mchog /ral gri lta bur shes par
bya| |de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /thabs dang shes rab spyod pa'i mchog /mda' gzhu lta bur shes par bya/ /stong pa'i kha 'byed spyod pa'i mchog /shaka ti lta bur shes
par bya/ /'bigs par byed pa spyod pa'i mchog /mdung thung lta bur shes par bya/ /nga bdag gsod pa spyod pa'i mchog /sta re lta bur shes par bya/ /gdul bya 'dren pa spyod pa'i
mchog /lcags kyu lta bur shes par bya/ /dgon pa'i gnas dang dur khrod dang / /grong khyer dag tu rnal 'byor rgyu ba'i tshe/ /de 'dra'i skyes bu'i phyag rgya cher rtogs byed/ /de
nyid sems kyi khyad par mthong gyur na/ /brtul zhugs med kyang sangs rgyas sa la 'gro/ /sems nyid gnyis kyi gnad dang ma bral na/ /brtul zhugs sbyad kyang sdug bsngal
sna tshogs skye/ /bsam gyis mi khyab brtul zhugs rab ldan na/ /rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ltar/ /thogs pa med ba phyag rgya chen po de/ /skye ba 'di la sangs
rgyas sa la reg /ces gsungs so/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyi sa mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las spyod pa'i rab tu dbye
pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas dur khrod bdag mo des/ /ston ba la ni 'di skad gsol/ /yang dag brda ni brda chen po// kun gyis mi rtog sbas ba'i don/ /bar
chad sel ba brda yi chos/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol/ /de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa/ /snang ba thams cad las kyi brda/ /tshig ni ji snyed ngag gi brda/ /de la bsam
gyis mi khyab gnas/ /don gyi brda ru shes par bya/ /de nas dur khrod bdag mos yang zhus pa/ gang zag 'jug pa'i rim pa dang / /dpa' po brtag pa'i rim pa dang / /phyag rgya mo yi
brtag pa dang / /mchog dang thun mong dngos grub dang / /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dus dag dang / /rnal 'byor phag mo rdzogs byed dang / /brda yi bye brag ji snyed pa /'gro mgon khyod
kyis bshad du gsol/ /mgon po dpa' bos bka' stsal pa/ /thams cad kun gyi brda chen po/ /sbas pa'i brda ni bshad bya ba/ /g.yas pa thabs kyi rang bzhin dang / /g.yon pa
shes rab rang bzhin dang / /lus kyi brda rnams rdzogs par bya/ /mi rtog sgom pa ston pa la/ /lag pa g.yon pa bstan pa ni/ /sa ro zhes ni brjod par bya/ /rkang pa grong khyer sa bgrod
pas| |spyod pa nyams myong gis 'gro ba/ /go ba'i phyir nas rkang bstan te/ /a g+hu la zhes brjod par bya/ /srin lag mkha' 'gro ma yi rtsa/ /de yi phyir na de
bstan te/ /shes rab chen por go bya'i phyir/ /b+ha ta ri zhes brjod par bya/ /lce yis zas kyi ro myong ltar/ /stong pas bde ba myong bstan phyir/ /lce bstan tsaR+ya g+ha zhes brjod/ /skal
bar ldan pa'i bdag nyid ni/ /yul la rig par bya ba'i phyir/ /lto ba zas kyi snod bstan pa/ /an b+ha li zhes brjod par bya/ /lto ba zas kyi snod yin phyir/ /de bzhin snod ni bsten
par bya/ /bla ma'i brgyud pa go cha'i phyir/ /paM ka ta zhes brjod par bya/ /sor mo lnga'i ni rgyud gcig ltar/ /lnga yi rtsa ba e baM du/ /bsdus phyir sor mo lnga bstan la/ /tshan d+ho ha zhes
brjod par bya/ /so yi stobs kyis zas 'dul ltar/ /e baM ji bzhin rtogs par byed/ /gang gis so ni bstan byas pas/ /tsa la ni zhes brjod par bya/ /byin pas lus kyi stobs
bskyed ltar/ /goms pas 'bras bu skyed pa'i phyir/ /go phyin pa ni bstan byas la/ /me ga pa zhes brjod par bya/ /sa gzhi 'gro ba kun 'degs ltar/ /'bras bu dam tshig gis
bsten ltar/ /sa gzhi gru bzhir bstan byas la/ /maN Dal zhes su brjod par bya/ /sor mo lnga ni rgyu mthun phyir/ /phung lnga rigs lngar rgyas btab pas/ /g.yas pa'i sor mo lnga
bstan pa/ /s+pha ra na zhes brjod par bya/ /mi bskyod pa dang rdo rje 'chang / /rgyas gdab gnyis ni go bya'i phyir/ /dbugs ni la ni dbyung bar bya/ /dpa' kun sham zhes brjod par bya/ /so
'cha' ba yi zhe sdang gis/ /'bras pu'i rtags ni yin pa'i phyir/ /gnyis snang gcod phyir so 'cha' bas/ /ma ta khra zhes brjod par bya/ /sha ni srog chags thams cad las/ /'byung zhing
chos rnams thams cad ni/ /sems yin phyir nas sha bstan pas/ /ra tsa na zhes brjod par bya/ /khro gnyer khros pa'i rtags yin pas/ /bya ba thams cad sdug bsngal gyi/ /rtags
yin phyir na khro gnyer bstan/ /ni ri ha zhes brjod par bya/ /bsdums pas dbye ba med pa ltar/ /'khor 'das dbyer mi phyed pa ltar/ /b+ha ga ni zhes brjod par bya/ /dpe yis mtshon pa'i
don du ni/ /dri ma kun las grol ba'i phyir/ /bsdams pa bkrol nas gre nan brjod/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i gtor ma yin/ /thams cad tshim par byed pa ltar/ /sna tshogs snang
ba'i chos kun la/ /bde ba chen po'i ros tshim phyir/ /gtor ma btang la hi ka ka brjod/ /lto ba zas kyi snod yin ltar/ /sems can sangs rgyas snod yin pas/ /don du lto ba
bstan nas ni/ /ni gar ma zhes brjod par bya/ /de rnams phan yon dang yid pas/ /snying po rgyud du gsal bar bstan/ /brda dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /bdud rtsi rnam pa
lnga po la/ /longs spyod ba ni thabs kyi mchog /byin gyis brlabs dang sa bon dang / /rang bzhin bdud rtsi la 'bad pas/ /dpag med rim gyis
phan yon 'byung / /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /lnga bsdus rtse mo mnan pa ni/ /bum pa'i dbang ste lus kyi brda/ /mtheb srin e yi drang ro gcig/ /gsang ba'i dbang ste
lus kyi brda/ /byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya ni/ /gsum pa shes rab ye shes yin/ /skyes dang ma skyes gnyis med pas/ /bzhi pa yin te lus kyi brda/ /de yi ngag gi brda smras
smras pa/ /ka la sha ya bum pa'i dbang / /yar la wa gsang ba'i brda'o/ /e baM ma ya gsum pa'i brda'o/ /e hUM oM AHbzhi pa'o/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis
su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung pa'i rgyud las brda'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas dur khrod bdag mo des/ ston
ba mtshan nyid bzhi dang ldan pa de la phyi'i mchog pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang / nang gi mchod pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang / gsang ba'i mchod pa'i tshogs dpag tu med
pa dang / de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa phul nas 'di skad zhus so/ /bla med ston pa he ru ka /'khor ba'i sems can 'dren mdzad pa/ /thugs rje che dang ldan pa khyod/ /nad pa lta bu'i
sems can la/ /chos kyi sman mchog bstan du gsol/ /long ba lta bu'i sems can la/ /chos kyi sgron me sbar du gsol/ /rgyal po lta bu'i ston pa khyod/ /kun la byams pa mdzad du
gsol/ /blo na po lta bu'i ston pa khyod/ /kun la phan pa mdzad du gsol/ /zhes zhus so/ /de nas ston pa 'jigs byed he ru ka de thugs rab tu dgyes te/ sku'i sgo nas mdzes gar rnam
pa gsum mdzad/ gsung gi sgo nas rdo rje'i tshig rnam pa gsum mdzad/ thugs kyi sgo nas khyad par gyi ye shes rnam pa gsum bskyed nas/ 'khor rnams la spyan gzigs nas tshangs
pa'i gsung gis rdo rje'i tshig 'di bka' stsal to/ /nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/ /'khor ba'i sems can thams cad la/ /ma rig pa yi mun pas bsgribs/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen por ltung / /nyon

mongs 'dam du bying ba yis/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri dang / /bzhi stong gi ni grangs rnyed kun/ /nyon mongs pa yi gnyen por bstan/ /dbang po rab 'bring dang sbyar nas/ /thun mong
theg pa rim gyis bstan/ /mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa gsum/ /bstan pa kun gyi rtsa ba yin/ /bder gshegs thugs rje bsam mi khyab/ /sems can rnams la de ltar bstan/ /de nas dur khrod bdag
mo des yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bla med ston pa he ru ka/ /thun mong theg pa de ltar bstan/ /khyad par gsang sngags ji ltar lags/ /rgyud sde rnams kyi dbye ba zhu/ /smin pa'i lam ni
ji ltar lags/ /grol ba'i lam ni gang la bgyi/ /dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol/ /zhes zhus so/ /de nas ston pa he ru kas/ /nyon cig dur
khrod bdag mo khyod/ /skal bar ldan pa'i gang zag la/ /gsang sngags rgyud sde ngas bshad kyis/ /snod skyon gsum po spangs la nyon/ /bya ba gtso bor byed pa la/ /kri ya'i rgyud
sde rnam lnga bstan/ /spyod pa gtso bor byed pa la/ /gnyis pa'i rgyud sde rnam lnga bstan/ /sems nyid gtso bor byed pa la/ /rnal 'byor rgyud sde rnam lnga bstan/ /bde stong gtso bor
byed pa la/ /bla na med pa'i rgyud lnga bstan/ /yid la byed pa med rnams la/ /gong na med pa'i rgyud lnga bstan/ /de'i phyir rgyud sde rnam pa lnga/ /gsang sngags rgyud ces bya bar
grags/ /re re la yang lnga lnga ste/ /rgyud chen nyi shu rtsa lnga ni/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas yang dur khrod bdag mo des yang zhus pa/ rgyud kyi
dbye ba de ltar na/ /smin zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags/ /lam zhes bgyi ba ngag la bgyi/ /de yi dbye ba bshad du gsol/ /zhes zhus so/ /de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa//
nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/ /'khor ba'i sems can thams cad la/ /de nyid yod de smin lam med/ /des na 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur/ /lam log mu stegs byed rnams
la| |de nyid yod de smin lam med/ /des na 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur/ /dman pa nyan thos rang rgyal la/ /de nyid yod de smin lam med/ /de phyir bskal pa grangs med du/ /dka' thub
spyod pa nyon re mongs/ /ma smin mdo sder zhugs rnams la/ /de nyid yod de smin lam med/ /des na tshe gcig sangs rgyas dka'/ /zhes so/ /de nas dur khrod bdag mo des yang zhus pa/
smin zhes bya ba gang la bgyis/ /lam zhes bya ba ji ltar lags/ /dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol/ /nyon cig dur khrod dag mo khyod/ /smin zhes bya ba ni sang dga'i sgra las shes par
bya'o| |lam zhes bya ba'i sgra ni a tha mi tha'i sgra las shes par bya/ 'jig rten pa'i lam dang sbyar ro/ /lus dang ngag dang sems dang gsum/ /ma smin smin par byed pa'i thabs/
dbang bskur cho ga ji snyed bstan/ /dang po bsnyen pa bya ba gces/ /grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma yi/ /bsnyen pa rnam gsum rdzogs byas nas/ /sa cho ga sta gon tshul bzhin bya/ /dang
po sa gzhi yongs su gzung / /gnyis pa sta gon gnas pa ste/ /nub gsum pa la 'jug par bya/ /rgyud rnams gzhan du shes par bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor shar gyi sgor/ ba yi
rnam lnga'i maN+Dal bri/ /skal ldan slob ma der bzhag la/ /bum pa'i dbang rnams rdzogs par bskur/ /dkyil 'khor de yi lho'i sgo ru/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi maN+Dal bya/ /skal ldan slob
ma der bzhag la/ /gsang ba'i dbang rnams rdzogs par bskur/ /dkyil 'khor de yi nub sgo ru/ /dal gyi chos 'byung e dbyibs bri/ /skal ldan
slob ma der bzhag la/ /shes rab ye shes dbang bskur te/ /gsum pa'i dbang rnams rdzogs par bskur/ /dkyil 'khor de yi byang sgo ru/ /phrin las rnam bzhi'i maN+Dal
bri| |skal ldan slob ma der bzhag la/ /bzhi pa'i dbang rnams rdzogs par bskur/ /dkyil 'khor de yi pho brang du/ /seng chen bsnol ba'i khri steng sa su/ skal ldan slob
ma deng bzhag la/ /rdo rje slob dpon byed pa'i dbang / /cho ga thams cad rdzogs par bskur/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbang gsum po/ /thog ma nyid du bskur bar bya/ /de nas
dur khrod brgyad rnams kyis/ /dbang ni rnam pa brgyad po bskur/ /de nas zas rnams bdud rtsi'i dbang / /ji lta bar ni bskur bar bya/ /de nas phyag mtshan rnams kyi dbang //
go rims bzhin du bskur bar bya/ /de nas nyan pa'i dbang rnams bskur/ /de nas bshad pa'i dbang rnams bskur/ /de nas skal ldan gang zag la/ /mnga' gsol sum
cu rtsa lnga bya/ /de nas bkra shis rdzas brgyad kyis/ /dbang rnams ma lus rdzogs par bskur/ /de nas dbang rdzogs gang zag de/ /bder gshegs rnams kyi sras yin te//
mkhyen rab bde gshegs rnams dang mnyam/ /mthu stobs khro rgyal rnams dang mnyam/ /tshe tshad nyi zla gnyis dang mnyam/ /dang po las can sbyor ba yis/ /sa brgyad pa la rab tu
gnas/ /dbang bskur gnang ba ma thob na/ /rig pa shes rab rtsal rdzogs kyang / /slob dpon bya ba yod mi nus/ /dbang bskur gnang ba ma mthong na/ /gzhan gyi yon tan kun 'chang
yang / /'khor lo srog shing med pa 'dra/ /dbang ma thob bar las rtsom dang / /sgyid ma ma rtags khal 'gel pa/ /'di dag phung po'i rgyu yin no/ /slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing //
dbang rnams thob par ma byas na/ /nyan pa la sogs rtsom pa ni/ /'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam
gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud pas dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas dur khrod phag mo des/ /he ru ka la 'di
skad zhus/ /sangs rgyas thob byed 'bras bu'i chos/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bshad du gsol/ /dbang po rab 'bring tham gsum/ /gang dang gang gis grol ba lags/ /dug
lnga spyod pa'i gang zag lnga/ /gang dang gang gis 'joms par byed/ /de nas ston pas bka' stsal te/ /nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/ /dbang pho rab gyi gang zag la/ rang
bzhin rnam dag phag mo bstan/ /dbang po 'bring gi gang zag la/ /brjod pa sgra yi phag mo bstan/ /dbang po tha ma'i gang zag la/ /mtshon pa
brda yi phag mo bstan/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /de nas dur khrod bdag mo des/ /ston pa la ni tshig 'di gsol/ /rang bzhin rnam par dag pa yi/ /rdo rje phag mo ji lta bu/
sgra yi phag mo ji lta bu/ /dbyibs kyi phag mo ji lta bu/ /zhes pa la sogs pa zhus so/ /nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/ /rang bzhin nyid nas dag pa de/ chos kyi sku yi ngo
po nyid/ /skad cig drug gis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /grol 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /brjod pa sgra yi phag mo de/ /longs spyod sgra yi ngo bo nyid/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku'i ngo
po nyid/ /zla drug goms pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /mtshon pa brda yi phag mo de/ /sprul pa sku yi ngo bo nyid/ /zla drug goms pa'i sbyor po yis//
'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas dur khrod bdag mo des/ /dpa' bo che la yang zhus pa/ /gang zag rigs la lnga yod de/ /gti mug can gyi
gang zag dang / /zhes dang can gyi gang zag dang / /'dod pa gtsor byeng gang zag dang / /nga rgyal can gyi gang zag dang / /phrag dog can gyi gang zag lnga/ /de rnams
gang zag gang gis grol/ /zhes zhus so/ /de nas ston pas bka' stsal te/ /gti mug can gyi gang zag la/ /sku yi phag mo dkar mo bstan/ /gti mug tshul gyis gti mug 'joms/
'dod pa gtsor byed skyes bu la/ /gsung gi phag mo dmar mo bstan/ /'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags 'joms/ /zhe sdangs can gyi gang zag la/ /thugs kyi phag mo nag mo
bstan/ /zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms/ /nga rgyal can gyi gang zag la/ /yon tan can gyi phag mo bstan/ /nga rgyal tshul gyis nga rgyal 'joms/ /phrag dog can gyi gang zag la/ /
phrin las phag mo ljang khu bstan /phrag dog tshul gyis phrag dog 'joms/ /de nas dur khrod bdag mo des/ /he ru ka la tshig 'di gsol/ /dug lnga shas che gang zag la/ /'bras bu
bu sku lnga ni ji ltar thob/ /ye shes lnga ni ji ltar snang / /rigs lnga zhes ni gang la bgyi/ /khro mo lnga ni ji ltar bsgom/ /'khor lo lnga ni ji ltar gnas/ /snying po lnga ni ji ltar bzlas/ /dam
tshig lnga ni ji ltar bsrung / /nyams myong lnga ni ji ltar 'byung / /nyon mongs lnga ni ji ltar 'byung / /ye shes lnga ni ji ltar 'phel/ /grangs kyi tshad ni ji ltar bzlas/ /mtshan ma'i rtags
ni ji ltar 'byung / /dus kyi tshad ni ji ltar lags/ /las tshogs rnams ni ji ltar 'grub/ /ces zhugs so/ /de nas dpa' bo he ru kas/ /thugs rab tu dgyes te brda'i tshig 'di/
bka' stsal to/ /nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/ /dug lnga spyod pa'i gang zag lnga/ /'bras bu rnam pa lnga thob ste/ /kun la khyab pa chos sku dang / /
theg chen spyod pa longs sku dang / /gang la gang 'dul sprul sku dang / /cis kyang mi shigs rdo rje'i sku/ /ngo bo nyid kyi sku mchog dang / /skye ba gcig gis thob par 'gyur/ thob
pa'i don la goms par byed/ /tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'thob/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rgyud du bshad/ /thob bya'i ye shes rnam lnga yang / /spros bral chos dbyings ye shes
dang / /me long ye shes gzugs brnyan ltar/ /bdag gzhan gnyis med mnyam pa nyid/ /gsal la ma 'dres so sor rtog /phrin las mthar phyin bya ba rtogs/ /ye shes lnga ni
ni de ltar skye/ /gzhan nas ma yin rang nyid la'o/ /dug lnga spyod pa'i gang zag lnga/ /rigs ni rnam pa lnga thob ste/ /spros med de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ /dgos 'dod
'byung ba rin chen rigs/ /skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma'i rigs/ /sems can don grub las kyi rigs/ /gzhan nas ma yin rang nyid la/ /dug lnga spyod pa'i gang zag de/ /
ye shes khro mo lnga bsgoms nas/ /bde ba skye ba sku yin pas/ /bde chen dkar mo bsgom par bya/ /nus pa 'byung ba gsung yin pas/ /dmar mo sgra sgrogs bsgom par bya/ /
rtogs tshad 'char ba thugs yin pas/ /khros ma nag mo bsgom par bya/ /brtan par byed pa yon tan te/ /ser mo don grub bsgom par bya/ /bar chad sel ba phrin las te/ /sna tshogs mthar
phyin bsgom par bya/ /rim gyis ma yin cig car yin/ /rgya dang 'bur gyi tshul du bya/ /yig 'bru rnams kyi gnas lugs ni/ /spyi gtsug bde chen 'khor lo na/ /bde byed sku yi yi ge bzhi//
rang bzhin rtsa yi gzugs can no/ /mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo na/ /gsung mchog yi ge rnam bzhi ni/ /rang bzhin rtsa yi tshul du gnas/ /snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo na/ /thags mchog
yi ge rnam bzhi ni/ /rtsa yi dbyibs dang mthun par gnas/ /lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo na/ /rten byed yon tan yi ge bzhi/ /de yi rang bzhin rtsa yi dbyibs/ /phrin las yi ge rnam
bzhi ni/ /zhi rgyas dbang drag yi ge bzhi/ /las dang rjes mthun gzugs su gnas/ /snying po lnga yi bzlas thebs ni/ /phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang / /phrin las bzhi yi tshul du
bzlas/ /dam tshig lnga yi bsrung tshul ni/ /bde chen dkar mo'i dam tshig tu/ /sems can kun la byams pa bsgoms/ /khros ma nag mo'i dam tshig tu/ /drag cing rtsub pa'i spyod pa
bya| |ser mo don grub dam tshig tu/ /dngos po kun la chags med bya/ /dmar po sgra sgrogs dam tshig tu/ /smra zhing bud med bsten par bya/ /sna tshogs mthar phyin dam tshig tu/
rgyud cing mchod pa'i spyod pa bya/ /mkha' 'gro spyi yi dam tshig tu/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga la/ /rtag tu longs spyod bya ba ni/ bza' ba'i dam tshig
rnam lnga ste/ /gsang sngags spyod pas bsten par bya/ /de nas nyams dang byin brlabs ni/ /go rims skye tshul 'di lta ste/ /dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje skye/ /sangs rgyas mkha'
'gro'i nyams myong yin/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan ltar mthong ba/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i nyams myong yin/ /thams cad mnyam pa nyid skye ba/ /rin chen mkha' 'gro'i nyams myong
yin| |chos rnams ma 'dres so sor gsal/ /pad+ma mkha' 'gro'i nyams myong yin/ /dngos po gang la'ang thogs med pa/ /las kyi mkha' 'gro'i nyams myong yin/ /nyon mongs
lnga yi 'gyur lugs ni/ /gti mug chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur/ /zhe sdang me long ye shes 'gyur/ /nga rgyal mnyam pa nyid kyir 'gyur/ /'dod chags so sor rtog par 'gyur/ /phrag
dog bya ba nan tan 'gyur/ /de nas 'gyur ba lam du byed/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /sku yi yi ge rnam bzhi yis/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes 'phel/ /gsung gi yi ge
rnam bzhi yis/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes 'phel/ /thugs kyi yi ge rnam bzhi yis/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes 'phel/ /yon tan yi ge rnam bzhi yis/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye
shes 'phel/ /phrin las yi ge rnam bzhi yis/ /bya ba grub pa'i ye shes 'phel/ /A li dang ni kA li yis/ /sgra don dag gis rtogs par 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /de nas gsang ba bshad bya
ste| |grangs kyi tshad ni 'di lta ste/ /'bum phrag gcig gis bgegs rnams skrod/ /'bum phrag gnyis kyis grong khyer skrod/ /'bum phrag gsum gyis rgyal po 'joms/ /'bum
phrag bzhi yis bud med 'gugs/ /'bum phrag lnga yis phyogs rnams bsreg /'bum phrag drug gis 'byung ba bzlog /'bum phrag bdun gyis gnas khang g.yo/ /'bum phrag
brgyad kyis mngon shes 'char/ /'bum phrag dgu yis zas nor 'du/ /'bum phrag bcu yis gang 'dod 'grub/ /de nas gsang ba bshad bya ste/ /mtshan ltas rab 'bring tha ma
gsum/ /skal dang ldan pa'i gang zag la/ /ye shes khro mo rnam pa lnga/ /mngon sum dag tu mthong bar 'gyur/ /dbang po rab kyi snang ba ste/ /las 'phro can gyi snang ba yin/ /skal
pa 'bring gi gang zag la/ /ye shes khro mo rnam pa lnga/ /rang gi las dang gang mthun par/ /rmi lam dag tu mchog tu gsel/ /skal ba 'bring gi mtshan ltas yin/ /skal pa dman pa'i
gang zag la/ /tshul bzhin bris pa'i thang sku ste/ /'od dang sgra dang 'dzum pa dang / /mkha' 'gro lung bstan 'byung ba dang / /skye ba 'di la nges par 'grub/ sbyor ba dman pa'i
gang zag la/ /bar ma do nas lam sna 'dren/ /mkha' spyod gnas su 'khrid par byed/ /dus kyi tshad ni rnam gsum ste/ /rab la skad cig rnam drug yin/ /
'bring la zla ba drug gis grol/ /tha ma lo drug sbyar ba'o/ /phyi dang nang dang gsang ba gsum/ /rnam pa gsum du shes par bya/ /las tshogs rang bzhin dbye ba zhi/ /rgyas dang bsdus pa
shin tu rgyas/ /rnam pa gsum du shes par bya/ /bsdus pa tshar gcad rjes gzung gnyis/ /rgyas pa phrin las rnam pa bzhi/ /shin tu rgyas pa thun mong brgyad/ /de las 'phros pa nyi shu
lnga| |bde chen dkar mo'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /zhi ba'i las tshogs rnam lnga 'grub/ /ser mo don grub ting 'dzin gyis/ /rgyas pa'i las tshogs rnam lnga 'grub/ /dmar po sgra sgrogs
ting 'dzin gyis/ /dbang gi las tshogs rnam lnga 'grub/ /khros ma nag mo'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /drag po'i las tshogs rnam lnga 'grub/ /sna tshogs mthar phyin ting 'dzin gyis/ /
phrin las bzhi yi las rnams 'grub/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las 'bras
bu'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas dur khrod bdag mo des/ /ston pa mtshan nyid bzhi ldan la/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa 'di phul nas 'di skad
zhus te/ skal bar ldan pa'i gang zag gis/ /bdag dang gzhan la phan gdags phyir/ /sku dang mchod rten ji ltar bgyi/ /de yi go rims bshad du gsol/ /zhes zhus pa'o/ /de nas ston pas
bka' stsal te/ /nyon cig dur khrod bdag mo khyod/ /rigs can lnga yi gang zag des/ /bdag don gzhan don byed 'dod pas/ /sku lnga gdung lnga mchod rten lnga/ /rgyu lnga sngags lnga las rim

lnga| |lnga tshan lnga ru shes par bya/ /de yi bya ba'i rim pa ni/ /de nyid gsum dang ldan par bya/ /dang po bdag gi de nyid dang / /gnyis pa rgyu yi de nyid dang / /gsum pa 'bras bu'i de nyid do/ /dang po
po bdag gi de nyid ni/ /de bzhin rigs kyi gang zag de/ /dad dang brtson 'grus rab ldan pas/ /sku dang mchod rten 'debs dus su/ /'du shes gsum dang ldan par bya/ /gnyis pa rgyu yi de
nyid ni/ /rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya/ /sa gzhi dkar zhing snum pa la/ /rin chen sna lnga la sogs pa'i/ /lnga tshan lnga ni legs sbyar te/ /lus ngag yid gsum sbyor ba yis/ /sku dang mchod
rten ci rigs gdab/ /'og min gnas nas sbyan drangs la/ /rab tu gnas pa gzhung bzhin bya/ /de nas mnga' gsol na bza' gsol/ /de la mchod dang bstod pa bya/ /bzhugs
su gsol ba'i rim pa ni/ /dam chos gzhan dang mthun par bya/ /zhi ba'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /dang po bdag gi de nyid ni/ /rin chen rigs kyi gang zag des/ /dad dang
brtson 'grus rab ldan pas/ /sku 'am mchod rten 'debs dus su/ /'du shes gsum dang ldan par bya/ /gnyis pa rgyu yi de nyid ni/ rnam pa lnga ru shes
par bya/ /sa gzhi ser la 'tsher ba la/ /gong du bstan pa ji lta bar/ /sku dang mchod rten ci rigs gdab/ /'og min gnas nas spyan drangs nas/ /rab tu gnas pa gzhung bzhin bya/ de
la mnga' gsol na bza' gsol/ /mchod dang bstod pa bzhugs pa rnams/ /dam chos gzhan dang mthun par bya/ /rgyas pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /dang po bdag gi de
nyid ni/ /pad+ma rigs kyi gang zag de/ /dad dang brtson 'grus rab ldan pas/ /sku dang mchod rten byed dus su/ /'du shes gsum dang ldan par bya/ /gnyis pa rgyu yi de nyid ni/ rnam
pa lnga ru shes par bya/ /sa gzhi dmar la gdang ba la/ /lnga tshan lnga dang legs sbyar te/ /lus ngag yid gsum sbyor ba yis/ /sku dang mchod rten ci rigs gdab/ /'og min gnas
nas spyan drangs la/ /rab tu gnas pa gzhung bzhin bya/ /de la mnga' gsol na bza' gsol/ /mchod dang bstod dang bzhugs pa kun/ /dam chos gzhan dang mthun par bya/ /
dbang gi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /dang po bdag gi de nyid ni/ /rdo rje rigs kyi gang zag de/ /dad dang brtson 'grus rab ldan pas/ /sku dang mchod rten 'debs dus su/ /

shes gsum dang ldan par bya/ /gnyis pa rgyu yi de nyid ni/ /rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya/ /sa gzhi gnag cing rtsub pa la/ /khrag dang dug dang tsher ma dang / /yungs kar yungs nag skye che dang / /lnga
tshan lnga dang bcas pa la/ /lus ngag yid gsum sbyor ba yis/ /sku dang mchod rten ci rigs gdab/ /'og min gnas nas spyan drangs la/ /rab tu gnas pa gzhung bzhin bya/ /de la mnga'
gsol na bza' gsol/ /mchod dang bstod pa bzhugs pa kun/ /dam chos gzhan dang mthun par bya/ /drag po'i las rnams 'grub par byed/ /dang po bdag gi de nyid ni/ /las kyi rigs
kyi gang zag de/ /dad dang brtson 'grus rab ldan pas/ /sku dang mchod rten 'debs dus su/ /'du shes gsum dang ldan par bya/ /gnyis pa rgyu yi de nyid ni/ /rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya/ /
sa gzhi ljang zhing kha dog ser/ /gong du lnga tshan lnga dang sbyar/ /de la sku dang mchod rten rnams/ /ji ltar nus pa bzhin du gdab/ /'og min gnas nas spyan drangs la/ /rab tu gnas pa gzhung
bzhin bya/ /de la mnga' gsol na bza' gsol/ /mchod dang bstod pa bzhugs pa rnams/ /dam chos gzhan dang mthun par bya/ /drag po'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /bstod pa lnga
ni so sor bstod/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las sku dang mchod rten gdab pa'i le'u ste dgu
pa'o// //de nas dur khrod bdag mo des ston pa mtshan nyid bzhi ldan la phyi nang gsad pa'i mchod pa gsum phul nas 'di skad zhus so/ /
kye kye mgon po bdag la gson/ /khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams/ /nyon mongs brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / /rnam rtog brgyad khri bzhi stong gis/ dus gsum kun tu sdug
bsngal bskyed/ /de yi gnyen po bshad du gsol/ /khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams/ /rgyu ni ma rig pa yis bskyed/ /rkyen ni rnam par rtog pa ste/ /de rnams rnam rtog ji ltar
bsal/ /phyogs ngan la sogs 'gro ba'i tshe/ /de yi rtog pa gcad par zhu/ /legs nyes kun gyi stangs gcod pa'i/ /mna' dang gal gyis 'jigs pa la/ /de yi rtog pa gcad par
zhu| |nyon mongs nad kyis nyen pa la/ /de las thar ba'i thabs cig zhu/ /bdag gzhan gnyis po rtsod dus su/ /de las rgyal ba'i thabs cig zhu/ /lus sems gnyis po 'bral dus
der| |de las thar ba'i thabs cig zhu/ /de nas ston pas tshig 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyu 'bras kun tu sdug bsngal ba/ /ma lus dbyer med shes gyur na/ /sdug bsngal ma
lus bde bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang thun mong 'di lta ste/ /phyogs ngan la sogs 'gro ba'i tshe/ /phyogs las rnam par rgyal bar bya/ /nyes legs kun gyi stangs gcod pa/ /mna'
'am gal gyis 'jigs pa la/ /mna' las rnam par rgyal bar bya/ /nad dang gdon gyis nyen pa la/ /bgegs las rnam par rgyal bar bya/ /bdag gzhan gnyis po rtsod pa la/ /dgra las rnam
par rgyal bar bya/ /lus sems gnyis po 'bral dus der/ /rlung las rnam par rgyal bar bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo
mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal ba rnam pa lnga'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //de nas mgon po he ru kas 'khor rnams la de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang
sngags kyi sdud pa mo rab tu dga' ste/ 'khor rnams 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis kyang de ltar dga' mgu yi rangs te/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa phul nas/ mgon po thugs rje dang ldan
pas| |bdag dang 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams dang / /'khor ba'i sems can thams cad la/ /thugs rjes gnang ba bka' drin lags/ /zhes dga' mgu yi rang te/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba
rtsa ba'i rgyud bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed he ru kas gsungs pa rdzogs so// //dur khrod bdag mos gsol pa/ lha mo rnams kyi sku mdog ni/ /ji ltar shes ni grol
grol bar 'gyur/ /phag mo zhes bya/ /phag mo zhes bya gang la bya/ /yi ge'i don ni gang la bskyal/ /bskyed rdzogs ngo bo gang la bya/ /dpa' bo he ru kas bka' stsal pa/ nyon
cig dur khrod phag mo khyod/ /nyes pa'i skyon gyis ma gos ba/ /dkar zhing sbros bral zhi bar byed/ /ma chags skyon gyis ma gos pa/ /dmar la gdang ba sgra sgrogs yum/ skyon med
sems nyid rang dbang 'dus/ /gnyen po gcig kyang mi 'gyur bas/ /khros ma nam mkha'i kha dog bzhin/ /mi 'gyur rang sems dbyings su grol/ /che ba ye shes la rgyas pa/ /ser mo
skyon med don grub ma/ /ngo bo rgyal la g.yo dang bral/ /sna tshogs skyon gyis ma gos pas/ /in+d+ra nI la'i mthar phyin ma/ /sna tshogs ngo bo gcig tu 'dus/ /rnam pa gang yang 'gyur ba
med/ /chos kyi dbyings las 'gyur ba med/ /rnam rtog cis kyang ma gos pas/ /phag ces bya ba rtog med yin/ /dbyings nyid rtog pa sbros bral bas/ /me zhas bya ba dbyings su thim/ /
de la phye na rnam pa gsum/ /dam chos skye med phag mo ni/ /skye 'gag med pas chos sku yin/ /brjod pa sga yi phag mo ni/ /phag ni kA li thabs yin la/ /mo ni A li longs skur
'dod/ /mtshon pa dbyings kyi phag mo ni/ /stong nyid mtshon pa'i sku mdog la/ /rtog med snying rje phag gi gdong / /thabs dang shes rab phag mo la/ /bde stong skyon bral gcer bu

ni| |rtog pa med pas sbrul sku'o/ /yig 'bru gsal la mi rtog pas/ /thim pa na yang cang te'u/ /snang stong mtha' dang bral ba'o/ /bskyed rdzogs ngo bo dbyer med pas/ /mtshon pa snang ba stong pa'i ngang / /de nyid
snang ba'i ngo bo nyid/ /dbyer med zung 'jug khas len bral/ /gcig la gcig rgyas gdab par bya/ /grol 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /ces gsungs so/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i
ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las rgyud phyi ma bskyed rim bstan pa'i le'u ste dang pa'o// //de nas dur khrod bdag mo des dpa' bo chen po la 'dzum pa dang bcas nas
zhus pa/ gsang sngags rnams kyi sngags ni gang / /bzlas par bya ba'i yi ge gang / /'khor lo rnam bzhi dgod pa gang / /zhes zhus pas/ he ru kas bka' stsal pa/ dur khrod bdag mos gus par gyis/ /gsang

sngags rnams kyi yi ge ni/ /thams cad byed pa yi ge oM/ /dgyes pa sku yi yi ge ni/ /badzra bA ra hi zhes 'byung / /nus pa 'byung ba gsung gi kro tA kA li/ /rtogs pa thugs ni ha ri sa/ /yon tan 'byung ba A be Sha ya/ /phrin

las mdzad pa e baM ma yA/ /de las gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ /'khor lo lnga yi dbus nyid du/ /yi ge bzhi pas rgyas btab nas/ /bzlas pa phyi nang gsang ba gsum/ /zhi ba phyi yi bzlas pa ni/ /yig 'a bru rnams ni kha
dog dkar/ /de las 'od zer dkar po 'phros/ /nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa kun/ /ba sbu'i sgo nas bstan pa yi/ /sems can kun la phog pas kyang / /sgrib pa thams cad dag par bsam/ /de bzhin
gshegs la phog pas kyang / /mnyes pa'i mchod pa phul bas so/ /bdag la slar thim zhi ba 'grub/ /rgyas pa ser po 'phro 'du yis/ gong bzhin spro bsdu
shes par bya/ /dmar po dbang gi 'phro 'du bya/ /drag po nag po'i 'phro 'du bya/ /sna tshogs 'phros pas phrin las bzhi'i/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa yin/ /nang dang gsang ba'i
bzlas pa yang / /gong bzhin sbro bsdu shes par bya/ /dur khrod phag mos yang gsol pa/ /zad cing 'phel bar byed pa gang / /mthar thug pa yi yi ge gang / /zhes zhus so/ /dpa' bo chen
pos yang gsungs pa/ /gti mug zad byed a yin te/ /has ni zhe sdang zad par byed/ /da rgyal zad byed ri yin te/ /ni yis 'dod chags zad par byed/ /phrag dog zad byed sa yin no/ /a
ni chos dbyings ye shes 'phel/ /ha ni me long ye shes 'phel/ /ri yis mnyam nyid ye shes 'phel/ /ni yis so sor rtog byed 'phel/ /sa yis bya grub ye shes 'phel/ /a ni sangs
rgyas mkha' 'gror snang / /ha ni rdo rje mkha' 'gror snang / /ri ni rin chen mkha' 'gror snang / /ni yis pad+ma mkha' 'gror snang / /sa yis las kyi mkha' 'gror snang / /as ni de bzhin rigs
thob ste/ /has ni rdo rje'i rigs chen thob/ /ri ni rin chen rigs thob ste/ /ni yis pad+ma'i rigs thob bo/ /sa ni las kyi rigs chen thob/ /chos sku'i mthar thug a yin te/ /longs sku'i rnam pa yi ge

ha| |sbrul pa sku ni ri yin no/ /ngo bo nyid sku'i yi ge ni/ /rdo rje'i sku ni yi ge sa/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dur khrod bdag mos yang zhus pa/ /dbang po rab 'bring rim pa yis/ /ji ltar shes na grol bar 'gyur/ /
dpa' bo chen pos yang gsungs pa/ /dbang po rab 'bring gsum yin te/ /dbang po rab kyi gang zag la/ /skad cig drug gi gdams ngag bstan/ /ye shes skad cig dang po yis/ /gzung ba'i rnam par rtog
